item.text: rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po bzhugs so//
rgya gar skad du/ shrIHha ya grI wa la li ta ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po/ bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po/ dus gsum ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa'i ngo bo/ pad+ma dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin chen dang/
las kyi rigs kyi rang bzhin/ rigs dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid/ rol pa'i rdzu 'phrul la mnga' brnyes pa des/ don chos nyid skye ba med pa las/ rtags 'gag pa med pa cho 'phrul
gyi skur bzhugs so// 'og min gyi gnas gsang ba dbang gi gnas chen po na/ dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams gshegs shing bzhugs te zhugs par gyur pa'i gnas// rgyu rin po che
dang// dur khrod la byas pa'i dbyibs dang/ kha dog tha dad cing ngo bo nyid gcig pa ste// de yang dbyings las ye shes gsal ba'i gzhal yas khang/ kun tu khyab par
gdal ba chen po na/ rigs kyi yab dang/ rigs kyi yum dang/ gzhal yang sems dpa' dang sems ma dang/ sgo skyong sprul skur bcas pa yang sri zhu dang rim gro ba'i tshul gyis/
til la mar bzhin khyab par gnas so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na/ pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' nyid/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las thon te/ spyan snga nyid na bka' nod pa'i
spobs pa dang ldan pa'i zhu ba po nyid du bzhugs so// rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal po chen po des/ dus gsum dang
srid pa gsum dang/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis khyab par gzigs so// de bzhin du gzigs pas/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid/

stong pa chen po'i rang bzhin/ smra bsam las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid du de kho na'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' de rang gi stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das

dbang gi rgyal po la/ phyi nang gi mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs kyis mchod de lan brgya phrag stong du phyag 'tshal nas/ dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings la mnal bzhin du/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dbang mchog
gsang ba'i bdag/ dkyil 'khor rnams kyi de bzhin don// byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de// bdag la sogs la bshad du gsol// de nas dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' nyon

cig/ khyod kyis zhu bar spobs pa legs so// legs par yid la zung zhig/ 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba thams cad dang/ da ltar dang phyis 'byung ba'i rgyal ba rnams kyis ma gsungs gsung bar mi 'gyur zhing dka'

ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de kho na nyid byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de ni brjod du'ang med la/ snod du gyur pa dkon pa'i phyir ro// khyod kyis nga la dris shig/ ces bka' stsal te/ ci yang mi gsung bar
bzhugs so// de nas 'khor ris med kyis pad+ma sems dpa' la bsgo ba mdzad do// 'gro ba rnams la snod ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston cing/ byang chub sems dpa' blo dman pa rnams la byin gyis
rlobs shing/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskul ba dbang gi rgyal po'i thugs su chud de/ ston pa'i zhal du bltas te gnas so// de nas pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ ma chags pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ dbang gi
rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// don dam sems nyid skye ba med pa la// ston pa dang ni gnas dang 'khor// skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'byung ba ci// zhes gsol to// bka' stsal pa/ chos kun sems kyi rtsa ba
ste// rtsa ba de nyid ston pa las// gud nas ston pas stsal ba min// bdag nyid chen po byang chub sems// rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i chos// byang chub sems la gnas pa las// gud na gnas pa ma yin

no// de bzhin gzhal yas byang chub sems// 'khor ba'i gru rten phung po lnga// 'khor ba gnas gyur phyag rgya yin// phyag rgya de nyid byang chub sems// 'byung ba gnas gyur yum lnga ste// yum lnga ma chags byang chub
sems// rnam shes 'khor ba gnas gyur byang chub sems// yul brgyad 'khor ba gnas gyur sems ma ste// gnas pa med pa'i byang chub sems// reg bya reg byed gnas gyur khro bo'o// rtag chad gnas gyur sgo
srung ste// smon pa med pa'i byang chub sems// yid ches kun bzang yab yum ste// nyon mongs gnas gyur sprul sku drug/ gzung 'dzin med pa'i byang chub sems// 'khrul pa bzlog phyir shar ba las// gud

nas stsal ba ma yin no// rtsa ba de nyid rtogs pa na// cir yang ma bkag chos kyi dbyings// lta ba ma bkag sems nyid yin// spyod pa ma bkag rgya mtsho yin// bsgrub pa ma bkag sems nyid bsgrub// phrin las
ma bkag sems kyis kun la rol// dam tshig ma bkag sems la bsrung du med// mchod pa ma bkag sems las longs spyod pa'o// snying po ma bkag sems nyid brjod dang bral// sems nyid ma bkag

sangs rgya'o// ting 'dzin ma bkag ngang la shar// 'khor rnams mtshan ma med pa las// mtshan ma 'byung ba rtag pa'i sku sel to// de nas 'khor rnams byang chub sems la 'khod de stong pa'i ngang las zhi ba'i skur

bzhengs te 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// dus gsum gyi 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa rnams/ stong pa chen por gyur pa ni/ dpe nam mkha'i mtshan nyid tsam du yang/ rgyun du yod pa
ma yin no// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas las kyi sems dpa' chen po des/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol
to// las kyi sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor// 'gro ba ji snyed dad pa las// ma dad par ni gyur pa yi// las kyi log lta ma dad pa// rgyu dang rkyen ni gang las byung// ma dad pa ni ci yi
phyir// rigs dang sde ni gang du gtogs// 'bras bu smin pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dka' thub can gyi sems can de// legs pa'i rgyu las ma byung

ste// med pa'i gzung 'dzin rtog ngan rgyu// rkyen ni chags sdang la sogs te// lta ba log pa nyon mongs lnga// de yi las kyi dbang btsan nas// 'bras bu ma dad rgyu ru smin// rigs ni 'khor ba'i rigs can
de// de ni 'byung po'i rigs su gtogs// pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' des yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po/ ma dad de ni ji ltar 'dul// btul nas yon tan ji ltar thob// ma btul ba yi
skyon ni ci// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// log lta mthu bsnyems sems can de// bden pa'i gzhung gis gdul bar bya// ma btul ba yi skyon bstan pa// phyin ci log tu chos spyad
nas// lha dang mi yi srid brlags te// don las nyams pa'i skyon yod do// dug gsum rtsad bcad 'khor dong sprug/ sangs rgyas zhing khams rab tu rgyas// de nas zhi bas 'dul bar gzigs pas/ rU tra nag po

des se gol lan cig brdabs pas/ mi 'dul ba'i nga rgyal skyes te/ gau ta ma khyod kyis bdag 'dul ba ni ma lags te/ rang rang gnas su dka' thub la dengs shig/ ces smra zhing kha T+wAM ga 'khrol zhing ma nyan
to// rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ ma dad pa'i sems can chen po zhi bas 'dul bar gzigs pas ma thul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rigs lnga rdo rje'i rigs dang/ rin chen rigs dang/
pad+ma'i rigs dang/ de bzhin rigs dang/ las kyi rigs dang bcas pa rnams kyis zhi bas ma thul nas/ bka'i bgro ba mdzad de/ rdo rje rigs kyis bgros pa/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung na// bdag nyid chen

po rtag pa ni// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu khro zhing gtum par gyur// shin tu khro zhing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par ma gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor pas// khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun
mdzad// khro bo'i tshul chen khros pas kyang// 'jig rten gsum dag bsreg byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus dbang sdud na// ma dad sems can smos ci dgos// zhes bgros
so// de nas rin chen rigs kyis bgros pa/ kye ma 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// las kyi mnar ba'i dus zad 'dis// 'khor ba gtan gyi gzhi byas nas// phyi rabs rnams kyang g.yang sar bsgyur// rgyal
ba'i las kyis gdul bar 'os// zhes bgros so// de nas de bzhin rigs kyis bgros pa/ kye ma sems can sangs rgyas tshogs can rnams// ma dad sems can chen po 'di// sngon gyi sa bon
rtsub mos 'phangs// nyon mongs lnga ru smin pa ste// nyon mongs bdud kyi rgyu ru smin// 'di ni gdul bar 'os pa'o// zhes bgros so// de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyis bgros pa/ kye ma gsang mchog gsang ba'i
tshogs// ma dad pa yi sems can 'di// nyon mongs bdud kyi gzhi byas te// srid pa ma lus g.yang sar bsgyur// 'di ni gdul bar 'os pa'o// zhes bgros so// de nas las kyi rigs kyis bgros pa/ kye ma
sangs rgyas tshogs chen rnams// ma dad pa yi sems can 'di// nyon mongs dug gsum bzhi byas te// thams cad ma lus brlag par byed// 'khor ba bsgral ba'i dus la bab// ces bgros so// rta mchog rol
pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bde bar gshegs pas bka' bgros pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de ltar bgros pas/ dbang gi rgyal po la sogs pa rigs lnga dgongs pa gcig tu gyur te/ log pa'i spyod pa can rU tra la
sogs pa gdug pa can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa/ 'jig rten phung bar byed pa rnams// zhi bas phan pa'i skabs la ma bab ste/ rol ba'i mdzad spyod kyis 'dul bar gzigs
te thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur to// de nas dbang gi rgyal pos/ hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod pas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad bdag la bsdu bar mdzad de gnyis su med par gnas so// stong pa nyid kyi ngang las

dgongs te/ snying rje chen po tsam la brten/ 'dzin rtog zil gyis gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'du mdzad de/ mtshan ma rgyu'i snying po yi ge hUM dmar po ye shes kyi 'od du 'bar te/ snod kyi 'jig rten

gzhal yas khang du shar bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ mi rtog pa'i hUM dmar po de las/ cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di rnams brjod do/ sngags rnams sor bzhag/ e ma de wa traM ma maN+Dal kro ta dz+wa la raM hUM yaM hUM yaM/ ma hA rak+ta dz+wa mun ta maN+Da

la/ keng ni ri ti dz+wa la maN+Da la karma ma tiSh+Tha rag sha hUM b+h+rUM/ de nas 'byung ba rim du shar// zhe sdang 'bar ba'i nam mkha' la// phrag dog 'bar ba'i 'tshub mar ldan// chags pa rak+ta'i rba klong 'khyil// gti mug
chen po'i sa gzhi la// nga rgyal chen po'i me ri 'bar// dbang chen 'byung bar shar bar mdzad// nang dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang du shar bar mdzad/ 'khor rnams bskyed de btul nas bsgral bar

gzas pas/ ma dad pa chen po de/ zhe sdang gi me sbar/ chags pa'i rgya mtsho gting nas g.yos/ mun pa'i kha rlangs sprin ltar gtibs/ phrag dog gi zug rngu ni bslang/ nga rgyal gyi de'u bskyed de/ nyon mongs pa'i sgra
ru lu dang kha TAM ga 'khrol zhing rtsogs par gzo ba las/ dbang gi rgyal pos gdug pa'i lag cha phrogs/ kho'i nyon mongs pa'i sgra ru lu ni/ oM dang hUM gi bar du bcug ste/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM zhes

bzlas pas/ dregs pa can de skyes bu lce bcad pa bzhin nyams so// dbang gi rgyal po des/ dam sri 'gam pa ri dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ lhu gdum lhu gdum/ b+h+yo gdum b+h+yo gdum/ shig shig phrug cig/ a hU a hU/

tri hu tri hu/ khaM ru khaM ru/ snying spur rbad/ dzaHdzaHdzaHdzaH/ drag po'i sngags des brgyab pas/ lus dum bu bcu gsum du bshig/ dur khrod brgyad du bshig go/ khog pa gzhal yas khang du byas so// chung ma la sogs

pa thams cad 'khor du byas te sbyor ro// dang po de nyid du grags pa las/ stong pa'i cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di brjod do// shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rnam par mi rtog ye nas skye med cing// gzung 'dzin rtog med

mtha' gnyis ma chags dbyings// ye nas mnyam nyid rang bzhin ji bzhin dang// rnam rtog spros bral smra bsam brjod las 'das// stong pa'i ngang las snying rje shar// kun tu snang ba'i sgra ni brjod// d+harmA d+hA tu hUM/

ma ltar byams pas kun la khyab pa'i sku// mkha' ltar dag pa cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgyu// kun la snyoms pa'i ye shes gsal ba'i ngang// yon tan rin chen 'byung ba dbang ldan yum// de nas 'bras bu hUM dmar la

dngas pa byung ste/ de las skul ba'i sgra 'di byung ngo// yi ge hUM ni sems kyi rang bzhin te// chags pa'i skyon bral pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ sangs rgyas che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// rgya mtsho'i rlabs ltar khro bo'i

sprul pa 'byung// hUM yaM zhes brjod do// de nas gzhal yas sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs dang/ yi ge mang po 'phros/ hUM dmar po las yi ge 'phros/ gzhal yas khang ni bskyed/ phyi rin po che la nang dur khrod
'bar ba/ pad+ma'i gdan/ phyi nas bltas na nang gsal/ nang nas bltas na phyi gsal bar bskyed/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs/ maM zhes brjod pas/ zla gam kha sprod/ mu khyud bar

khyams sgo khyud du bcas par bsam/ hUM zhes brjod pas/ hUM dmar la bkra ba ni bsam/ ye shes kyi 'od ni 'phro// pad+ma d+ha ra hrIH/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ ma hA ro Sha/ kha la ro sha/ hri raM hri raM/ gri 'dung 'dung/ a si mu

sal pra ban shu ken/ ma ra kha khA'i/ shrI bAn khA'i/ ma hA rak+ta khA'i/ shrI men ru ru traM/ bi lang ku sha la s+t+waM/ ban tri sha/ pad+ma gal sha khA'i/ par sid ta/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha rad na gu h+ya dz+nyA na sid+d+hi/ badzra a mo ka

hUM/ dza laM dza laM badzra hUM/ suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ni hUM phaT/ kro ta rag sha ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ zhes pas che ba'i nga rgyal brjod cing/ nga rgyal bsgrags so// dbang chen pad+ma he ru ka dbu lnga pa/ phyag kyang bcu drug pa// traM
dmar po brgyad nas zhabs brgyad byung ba/ rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams// be con rnge'u chung shel gyi rnge'u chung bsnams// thod rlon khrag dang sdigs mdzub mdzad// sbrul nag zhags

pa bsnams pa ste// rdo rje'i gshog pa g.yas g.yon du gdengs pa'o// rta mgo ljang gu lnga byung ba'o// ma dad pa chen po tshul dang bstun te bsgral lo// rang gis rang la yi ge hUM la bstod pa/ hUM hUM gis srid gsum
ma lus dbang du sdud/ hUM gis ngan song gnas rnams stongs par mdzad// hUM gis ma rigs mun khang gtan nas 'joms// hUM gis thams cad 'jigs shing thams cad dbang du sdud// hUM gis dus gsum rgyal

ba'i sku yang bskyed// hUM gis bla med byang chub gnas su sgrol// hUM mdzad hUM gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas rang gi che ba'i nga rgyal 'di brjod do// sku bzhi gcig tu bsdus pas kun tu zhal// phyogs bzhi rigs

bzhir 'bar ba'i skur bstan pas// spyi mthun lnga lngar snang ba nam mkha'i rgyan du ston// rigs kyi dbang rnams rdzogs pas thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud// hUM mdzad khro bo chen po brgyad kyi snying// chad par

bcug nas nang dang bsres te gsol// byams dang snying rjer ldan pa'i tshul mnga' bas// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa dang// be con rnge'u chung b+han+d+ha shel gyi rnge'u chung 'dzin// thod rlon khrag dang bsres pa

gsol// phyogs bzhir hUM gi rgyun du sgra sgrags pas// rdo rje byin chen 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ gdu bu dbu rgyan sbrul nag mi srun pa// hUM gi sgra grags bskal pa'i me chen 'bar// sdigs pa'i rtse la bskal
pa'i me 'bar bas// ma rig rmongs pa'i mun nag sel// mi ldog sa la 'gro ba 'dren pa'i rtags// thabs kyi zhags pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud// rdo rje rin chen las byung gshog pa ni// nyi ma 'bum gyis brgyan

pa'i the'u gshog can// zhi rgyas dbang drag phrin las mngon spyod kyis// thams cad bla med byang chub gnas su grol ba'o// ting 'dzin zil gyis gnon pa stag gi chas// rno gdug zlog byed rgya bye'u lcags kyi
chas// shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje bcas pa'i chas// dbang gi bswe khrab smug po gzi 'bar bgrad pa'i chas// dpa' brjid mnyen lcug sbrul nag rgyan gyis brgyan// dmar gsal dbang sdud ting 'dzin che ba'i

mchog/ mnyen lcug chun 'phyang dar gyi chas// sdug bsngal nyam thag skad chen 'byin// oM nA sha staM pa ni/ yak+sha su ma pa/ b+han d+ha hri sha huM/ zhes che ba'i sgo nas nyid la bstod pa'o// de nas yang huM las/ oM a ka

de big de ka ra ka ra ga te swa maM zhes brjod pas/ yum gzi ldan pad+ma can rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun pa la/ tshul mo bag tu gnas pa zhig bskyed do// g.yas na yid bzhin nor bu bsnams pa/ g.yon na
rin chen za ma tog bsnams pa/ de lta bu cig bsgom mo bsdu'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las// gzhal yas khang dang/ yab yum bskyed cing las bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas

yang dregs pa de dag thams cad bdud dang tshangs pa dang/ lha chen dang/ klu dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ gza' la sogs pa rnams/ rang rang gi che ba ston cing mnyan to// ma dad pa'i chung ma dang/ 'khor
dang bcas pa rnams ma nyan to// rten gyi gzhal yas khang las/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams ni brlan/ thugs rje g.yos te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang gi rgyal po la dbang bskur to// yab

yum gnyis sbyor ba mdzad de/ dgyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems sprin las/ sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa spros te/ yum gzi ldan pad+ma can la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum du bsngags te/ byang chub sems kyi

gzi brjid ldan par byas/ byang chub sems spros pa las/ 'khor ba ru ldog pa'i phyir/ ru dpon ni rigs kyi he ru ka lngas byas/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad nir mngar gnyer/ shar phyogs su dza ni spros/

ye shes dpag gis 'phen dka' ste/ mthar byed khro bo bzhi phyogs bzhir gdan tshogs bcas/ 'khor ba'i phreng ste thams cad zla gam brub khung bcas/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes te/ steng phyogs su spros pas/ khro bo

mthing nag gis steng khebs/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes shar phyogs su spros pas/ khro bo smug nag gis shar phyogs khebs/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes lhor spros pas/ khro bo ser nag gis lho'i phyogs khebs/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes

nub tu spros pas/ khro bo dmar nag gi nub khebs/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes byang du spros pas/ khro bo ljang nag gi byang phyogs khebs/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes pas 'og dang bar khebs nas/ gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs

char du phab/ rtog cig zung chings ma gtang zhes dir dir sgrogs so// yum gyi b+ha ga gru gsum gyi dbyings su shar/ yab kyi rdo rje pad+mar shar/ de nas dbang gi rgyal pos gdug pa'i 'khor ye shes las bskyed

do// de nas yang yab yum ma chags pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa'i sprin las/ ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/ zhes spros/ he he he he he he he he/ zhes spros pas/ khro mo dang mgo brnyan mang po byung ngo// hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ zhes spros
pas/ khro bo mgo dgu brtsegs pa dang/ mgo lnga brtsegs pa dang/ mgo bdun brtsegs pa dang/ mgo gsum brtsegs pa rkang pa gcig pa cig byung/ de nas yang byang chub sems las/ mA mA mA mA/ zhes spros

pas/ gsang ba'i yum bzhi spros so// de nas byang chub sems las/ li li li li li li li li/ zhes shar du spros li li li li li li li li/ zhes lhor spros/ li li li li li li li li/ zhes nub tu spros/ li li li
li li li li li/ zhes byang du spros so// brgyad rtse long ba sum cu rtsa gnyis phyogs bzhir spros so// de nas byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ lu lu lu lu lu lu lu lu/ zhes spros pas/ long ba brgyad

byung ngo// de nas yang byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ sti sti sti sti sti sti sti sti/ zhes spros pas/ spyang mo brgyad byung ngo// de nas yang dgyes pa'i sprin las/ dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza/ zhes pa las khyi brgyad byung

ngo// yang byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ ku ku ku ku ku ku ku ku brgyad spros pas/ ye shes kyi khyi brgyad spros pas/ myu sha byu ru'i khyi brgyad byung ngo// de nas yang byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza

dza dza/ dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza/ dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza/ dza dza dza dza dza dza zhes spros pas/ pho nya ma mgo brnyan sum cu rtsa drug bskyed do// de nas byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ hu hu hu hu hu hu zhes las sgo ma

drug spros/ ya ya ya ya ya ya drug spros pas/ kham brgya ma drug byung ngo// hUM zhes brjod pas khams gsum rgyal ba byung ngo// ha ya grI wa/ ha ya grI wa/ ha ya grI wa/ ha ya grI wa/ ha ya grI wa zhes brjod pas/ rta

mgo can lnga byung ngo// ku ye/ ku ye/ ku ye/ ku ye/ bya mgo can bzhi byung ngo// du ru du ru du ru du ru zhes brjod pas/ phag gi mgo can bzhi byung ngo// d+hi d+hi d+hi d+hi/ hUM hUM hUM la zhes sems dpa' byung

ngo// hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ zhes khro bo brgyad byung ngo// de nas yang dgyes pa'i sprin las/ sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa spros so// khams gsum kun tu khengs par spros so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las/ yi

ge spros pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa gsal zhing/ drag po ma rungs pa tshar bcad de/ dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug des/ dbu lnga ru shar bar mdzad/

dbu'i steng du/ le'u tshe lnga dgu mu khyud gru chad rtsibs khyud dang sgo ru bcas pa/ rigs kyi yab yum lnga ru gsal/ sems dpa' sems mas ni bskor/ dbu'i thog tu rta mgo ljang gu ni byung/ rta mgo ljang gu rngog ma

le brgan ni/ spyan mig zur gsum rna ba shog drag/ rngam pa'i kha tshal/ lhang lhang tser tser phyogs bcur rta skad sgrog pa ru gsal/ rdo rje'i gshog pa ni g.yas nas g.yon du gdengs/ dang ru ni dgu dgu yod pa/

g.yas na gshog pa rim pa bzhi/ g.yon na bzhi/ gshog pa brgyad du lding ba/ yum bzhi mchan du sbas pa/ sder mo can ni lteb tu sbas/ theb gshog can ni 'dab tu sbas// rdo rje'i gshog pa la bse'i ri mo can/

g.yas g.yon na bse'i bya nag lding ba/ gshog pa bar ma gnyis ni go la ma sbas/ steng gi bar na kham brgya mo sbas/ sprul pa mang po dang bcas pa'o// phyag g.yas pa kau ri ma brgyad/ g.yon pa na sing ha ma
brgyad/ khrag 'thung bcu drug gis 'gro ba ma lus pa 'dul ba/ khro bo brgyad zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan/ dur khrod chen po brgyad du rol cing gsal ba/ yi ge 'bru lnga gnas lngar gsal ba'i phreng bas/

ngan song rnam par sbyong ba/ dbang phyug ha ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad gser gyi seng ger sbas/ nyi zla thabs shes rab tu ldan/ pad+ma skyon gyis ma gos/ spyan nas sprul pa bye ba 'gyed/ hUM dmar po la phreng bas dkris/ dam

tshig ye shes rta mgrin yi ge 'bru lngas dbang bskur dkyil 'khor bcu bzhi ni dbu la brgyan/ drag po dbang po dkyil 'khor bzhi ni phyogs bzhir bkod/ spyang brgyad khyi brgyad phyogs brgyad/ khro bo rnam bzhi ni

phyogs bzhir bkod/ rgyal ba kun gyi bsngags pa'i yum ni thugs ka na/ ma dad pa'i bdud sde dang/ lha rgyal dang/ klu dang lang ka la sogs pa de dag ma dad pa rnams bsgral ba'i phyir dbang gi rgyal po nyid kyi

sku dang gsung dang thugs dang/ yon tan gyi gnas lnga nas/ drag sngags 'di rnams thon to// badzra kro ta khA hi/ ma rang ka sha khA hi/ ba su mu tra khA hi/ rA ga rak+ta khA hi/ shwa ri khA hi/ shwa ri khA hi/ kro ta ya kro ta ya/

su ru sha ra ta/ ru rag sha ha la ha la hUM phaT/ tsaN+Da raka sha ha la phaT/ karma bi ma la ha na ha na phaT/ oM dzi na la ti par/ ma tang ka pu she/ u to lo ti par/ shrI he ru ka/ pa ra bi ga raM/ ma hA ka la

bruM/ yag sha ka la bruM/ rak+sha ka la bruM/ dz+nyA na tsakra maN+Da la/ hUM rat+na lo ka baM/ dz+nyA na su ya traM/ ma hA ra ga traM/ nA ga dug phyung/ nA ga dug phyung/ a le ka lang pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga bAn ba su ban d+ha pra be sha phaT/ g+h+ri ba ro sha pra be sha phaT/

ru ru pu ra ta/ sha ma dur ka te/ sha tsit+ta bruM/ shi maM ru ru traM/ ma hA pra we sha rbad dza/ sa ma ya bra be sha swA hA/ dza gar b+ha/ ha ha ha hUM/ oM ba ru bid na/ ga bin du/ nA ga d+hI ra ya/ nA ga dung dung

rag sha pra be sha phaT/ rag sha pre be sha phaT/ ha haM hUM pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga bAn/ hri ti pra be sha phaT/ nA ga le nA ga le/ dum pa le dum pa le/ a ka le a ka le/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/ a ka le a ka le/ a kar ba in dra/ pra be sha phaT/ dung praM

dung praM pra be sha phaT/ rag sha pra be sha phaT/ ha he hUM pra be sha phaT/ tIk+Sh+Na pra be sha phaT/ tIk+Sh+Na pra be sha phaT/ be raM b+ha ga bAn praM be sha phaT/ byin yang te/ trai lo kya bi dza ya/ pra be sha ya phaT/ ag ne pra be sha phaT/ b+ha

ga bAn/ d+h+r-iSh+ta raSh+ta pra be sha phaT/ pad+ma ke tu kraM/ rat+na pa tra pra be sha phaT/ karma ke tu kraM/ bi rU d+ha ka pra be sha phaT/ badzra ke tu kraM/ bi rU pAk+Sha ye/ pra be sha phaT/ rat+na ke tu kraM/ ki pa ni hUM/ ta kem ta kem/ b+han d+ha chom/

tIk+Sh+Nasna tIk+Sh+Nasna shig/ gardza gardza/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ kro ta raM kro ta raM/ rag sha rag sha hUM/ ha na ha na phaT/ dz+nyA na tsakra ke tu kraM/ zhes pa rnams kyis bsgral lo// de ni spyir dril de bsgral ba'o// de ba ma hA rag to rag

to rbad long shar shar ya/ dri bi sha na tsan ling/ kha la hur yaM rbad/ yaM brogs yang/ de ni tshangs pa'i sgrol sngags so// sho ri sho ri kha sur yang kha sur yang khA hi/ sha ra ta rngub rngub he phaT/ dbang

phyug chen po bsgral lo// rag sha rag sha tshal du rbad rbad/ srin mo bsgral lo// ha la yag sha breng breng rbad/ mu la chom chom kha la rbad ya/ sgrol sngags 'di ni bdud rnams bsgral/ oM nA ga le nA ga le/ suM ba le

rag to hu ba rbad/ klu rigs rnams bsgral lo// ma hA rag sha la thums ma hA rak+sha la thums gra he phaT/ traM traM rbad/ des ma hA de ba bsgral/ a pa ru shan nA ga pra be sha rbad ya zhes btab pas/ dri na mgrin sngon

bsgral lo// a de sha ya rbad ya/ bi sha rbad ya/ nya 'gri ba zla med sgrol/ ha ba ri rag sho rbad ya/ sha la sha la he ba ta rbad/ nye'u tu kraM/ zhes bsgral bas/ shor ba gzhon nu bsgral lo// sa ma ya ga te pa la/ ga te

pa la/ shar ya shar ya/ gza' chen po brgyad bsgral lo// ta ke ma ta ke ma/ ro pa la shar kraM/ phyogs skyong bcu spub po// mu la raM mu la raM ti sha rbad ya/ zhes pas rgyal po bsgral/ ru pa sha la yo ga/ tri ba sha pra be

sha hub/ lha dang klu dang bdud la sogs pa bsgral te/ dur khrod kyi gzhal yas su byas so// sgrol sngags kyis de dag ma lus par bsgral lo// shar phyogs su khyi'i brtul shugs te/ lho ru phag gi brtul shugs

byas/ nub tu rta'i brtul zhugs te/ byang du bya'i brtul shugs byas so// bro kha chen po bzhir bcas/ bsgral ba'i phung po la bro dir dir brdungs so// shor ba gzhon nu'i lcang lo la gdul ba'i bro zhig brdungs

so// dri na mgrin sngon gyi gud shing gi rtsib la bro zhig brdungs so// nang khrol rnams la bro brdungs so// snying la bro zhig brdungs so// de nas dbang chen po des/ rang gi gzhal yas la bstod pa/ hUM bde

gshegs pho brang rin chen gzhal yas khang// yid bzhin 'byor ldan rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs// shes rab zab mo rnam dag yum gyi mkha'// b+ha ga klong yangs sprul pa'i gzhal yas khang// sna tshogs yon tan

rgyas pa gsang ba mdzod kyi gter// khro bo 'byung gnas dpal chen rngam pa'i yum// tug chom 'brug sgra khams gsum yongs su ldir// nam mkha' mnyam pa chos nyid dag pa'i sku// phyogs bcur rgya ma chad pas
tshad med dpag las 'das// tshad med yon tan dpag gis mi lang ste// tshangs pa pho mo bsnol ba'i gdung phyam la// ti ra pho mo bsnol ba'i dral ma grab// phyogs skyong g.yang gzhi bar snang sprin ltar

'khrigs// nya tshen 'phan dang sbrul nag za ra tshags// chu srin sgo dang gza' rgyu bad du bcas// sgo skyong dgu dang me ri sprin ltar 'khrigs// rgyal mtshan lnga dang rin chen ka ba brgyad// thod rus bar khyams rdo
rje'i gzer mgo la// nyi ma zla ba bar snang yos ltar bkod// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor lte ba zlum po la// skar ma rgyal gyi 'od zer gdugs su bskor// sngon chad 'das pa rgyal sras rnams kyi
dbyings// thod rus bar khyams rdo rje gser mgo ma// da ltar bzhugs pa khro rgyal rol pa'i sku// slad nas 'byon pa'i rgyal sras gshegs pa'i shul// dus gsum 'khor dang bcas pa'i bzhugs gnas

la// gar gyi dbang phyug sku+u la bstod pa'i phyir// rig 'dzin lha yi bu dang rnal 'byor rnams kyang bstod// rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las/ lha rnams kyi yi ge spro ba dang/ gzhan gyi don sgrol sngags kyi bsgral ba

dang/ gzhal yas khang la nyid kyis bstod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang rang gis nyid la 'di skad ces bstod do// hUM gar dbang lha yi lha mchog pad+ma he ru ka/ che bar bstod pa'i dbang phyug

yang che dpal// srid gsum 'gran zla med pa rgyal ba nga yi mthu// gsang ba dbang du bstan pa'i dbang phyug yang che dpal// gar mkhan sgyu 'dra gar gyi spyi gtsug rgyan// bdud sde dpung bcom gsang ba dbang gi

mthu// ma lus dbang sdud nyid kyi rgyan du byas// dbang mdzad dbang gi lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// e ma ho// gnyis med thugs kar sbas pa gzi ldan pad+ma can// byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur gzi chen
gsal// rgyal ba kun gyis bsngags pa'i gzi ldan pad+ma can// dgyes pa skong mdzad gsang chen nyid la bstod// rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las/ dbang chen nyid la nyid kyis bstod pa'i le'u ste brgyad
pa'o//// hrIH dbang gis dbang gi phrin las mgyogs pa'i mthu// ye shes myur mgyogs shes rab rtsal gyi pha rol phyin// rtsal gyi rlabs kyis sa gsum cig car gnon// 'tsher skad gdangs su snyan
pas gsang ba'i thugs dam bskul// rngam pa'i kha tshal che bas 'khor tshogs dbang du sdud// stabs drug 'gros su mgyogs pas rgyud drug thabs su 'dren// rol pa'i rta bros bdud bzhi thal bar rlog/ 'jig

rten sgrol la mkhas pas mi sdug thabs kyis 'dren// hUM/ rigs gnyis sku la hUM gi sgra bsgrags pas// srid gsum 'gran zla med pa rgyal ba nga yi thugs// che btsan 'gran zla med pa rgyal ba nga yi mthu// zhe sdang

me ltar 'bar ba'i khro bo hUM sgra can// 'bar ba lha yi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod do// rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las/ bstod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal po gar gyi dbang phyug la/
las kyi pad+ma sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma gsang bdag dbang gi rgyal// bdag la sogs pa'i don slad du// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos
bka' stsal pa/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad par bya'o// 'di ni rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor te// dbu yi steng du bzhag pas dkyil// le'u tshe dgu dang mu khyud dang// gru

chad gru bzhi sgo dang khyams// dbus su rdo rje dbang gi rgyal// shar du snang mdzad lho ru rin chen 'byung// nub tu mtha' yas byang du don yod grub// sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// kun bzang yab

yum sprul sku drug/ sgo bzhi yum dang bcas pa'o// de la snying po sngags dang bcas// dbus su rta mchog lnga ru byung// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor te// de las bsgyur ba khro bo ste// de la bzlas pa gong bzhin

te// de ni gsang ba'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ro// dbus su rta mchog rgyal po ste// dbang gi rgyal po bzhad pa'o// dbus su zla gam kha sprod la// zlum po gru chad gru bzhi gnyis// sgo dang khyud du bcas pa la// lha

mo bzhi yis bskor ba ni// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ro// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// dbus kyi zlum po gru bzhi dang// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad sgo dang sgo khyud bcas// de la dbang gi lha bkod

pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// dbus su zla gam sgo gcig pa// zlum po gru bzhi sgo dang sgo khyud bcas// 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni// de la dbang gi lha bkod pa// khams gsum rgyal ba'i

dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi thig rjes la// 'grus thig gnyis la bskyon pa la// phyogs bzhir ma trang mgo bo ste// dbus su rkang la bar du lag/ tha ma gdug pa'i mtshon gyis bskor// de la dbang

gi lha bkod pa// ma trang zhal gyi dkyil 'khor yin// dbus kyi gru gsum zla gam bcas// sgo dang zlum po gru bzhi gnyis// sgo dang sgo khyud rnam par ldan// de la dbang gi lha bkod pa// dur khrod chen po'i

dkyil 'khor yin// dbus ni zla gam gser gyi 'khor lo brgyad// sgo dang sgo khyud de bzhin te// dbus su dbang gi rgyal po la// lha mo bzhi yis bskor ba dang// yi ge'i 'bru yis bskor ba ni// ngan song sbyong

ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// zlum po dag la oM hUM bkod// tha ma ru lu 'bru brgyad dgod// de la dbang gi 'phro 'du ni// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro// zlum po lnga la yi ge lnga// tha ma ru lu'i 'brus bskor
ba// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de ni rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ro// las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ 'di ni grub pa'i dkyil 'khor te// dbus ni zla gam sgo gcig pa// phyi rol zlum po gru bzhi

dang// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug bya// tha ma pad+ma sum cu gnyis// gru bzhi sgo dang khyud du bcas// tha ma rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni// zla gam dbang gi rgyal po yab yum ste// gzhan rnams dbang gi lha tshogs

gsal// sgo srung khro bo khro mo'o// de ni sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs so// dbus zlum 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// de yi tha ma pad+ma brgyad dang ldan// phyi ma sgo la sgo khyud ni// gsang ba dbang

gi dkyil 'khor ro// nub kyi zla gum sgo gcig pa// phyi rim zlum po dag gis bskor// de yi phyi rim khyud kyis bskor// phyi ma gru bzhi sgo dang bcas// de la dbang gi lha bkod pa// dbang bskur thabs kyi dkyil
'khor ro// dbus ni gru bzhi lham pa la// zlum pos mtha' bskor bar khyams sgo dang bcas// dbang gi las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor yin// zlum po gcig la tshom bu lnga// ye shes dbang gi lha gsal ba// bsnyen
pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs// rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las/ dkyil 'khor rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang byang chub las kyi sems dpas/ dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad

ces gsol to// kye ma dbang mchog dbang gi bdag/ gsang sngags dam pa bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ dbang gi rgyal po sngags dang phyag rgya rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ hUM hUM zhes sgra

byung ste/ hUM badzra d+h+r-ika/ mUM d+hA twI shwa ri/ oM dzi na dzika/ lAM dwe Sha ra ti/ swA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ AM A ro lika/ pyAM rA ga ra ti/ hA pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ hAM badzra ra ti/ bud+d+ha ya ta so ta a haM/ badzra ya ta sta tha pra ta a ha~M rat+na ya

ta tha tra a haM/ pad+ma ya ta sta ta swa a haM/ karma ya ta sta tha so ta a haM/ rigs lnga yab yum dzaHhUM baM hoH// rigs re re la yang lha mo bzhi bzhis bskor ba'o// gau rI ha/ tsau rI ha/ pra mo he ha/ be ta lI ha/ puk+ka sI

ha/ g+hasma rI ha/ sma sha nI ha/ tsaN+Da lI ha/ badzra sid+ha mu khA+e he/ byA g+h+r-i mu khI he/ sr-i ga la mu khI he/ shwa na mu khI he/ kaM ka mu khI he/ kA ka mu khA+e he/ gr-iD+ha mu khI he/ u lU mu khI he/ gnas yul du spros pa'o// ha ya grI wa d+hi d+hi

gan d+ha ho// du ru du ru tsha mi b+h+yo/ kha yang ku ku sa ma ya dza/ ku la sa ma ya dza du/ brtul zhugs bzhi yis rnam par spros// badzra shwa na mu kha dza ma na ya/ khyi spyang brgyad kyi'o// oM badzra a mo ka hi ta sha dza/ gsang ba'i

yum mo// a mo ga hUM dza/ gsang ba'i yum chen mo bzhi'o// ma te sha ra raM pa ni/ dra ba mo'i sngags 'thon no// d+hi dam ma a sha ma/ glog 'gyu ma'i sngags 'thon no// shwa ti kha la dun tri dza ya/ long brgyab 'brel gyi

'thon pa'o// rak+sha kra ma sang tre yaM/ dmus long gi 'thon no// oM ru lu ru lu baM ta sa ma ya trig shaM kha la ma b+h+yo/ kham brgya ma drug gi 'thon to// gar dza ha na bin d+ha tsakra da pa la/ khro mo rnams kyi 'thon no// d+h+ri sha

ya rbad/ ya to hUM phaT/ sgo'i khro bo rnams kyi 'thon no// de rnams kyi sgo so sor 'thon no// hUM ru lu ru lu phaT e A ra li hri dza/ zhes pa 'di ni dril ba'i gnas kyi snying po'o// de nas las ma lus par gsungs
so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las/ gsang sngags rnams spros pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang phyag rgya rnam thar spros te/ rnam par grol bas sgrol ba mtshon pa'i phyir/ phyag rgya

chen po ni/ dbu lnga phyag kyang bcu drug ste// dbu la rmad du byung ba ni// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin te// shar du gzigs pa'i dbu mchog ni// dri za'i rgyal po gnon pa'i dgu// lho ru gzigs pa'i dbu mchog ni/
gshin rje'i rgyal po 'joms pa'i dbu// nub tu gzigs pa'i dbu mchog ni// klu dbang rgyal po gzir ba'i dbu// byang du gzigs pa'i dbu mchog ni// gnod sbyin mya ngan skyed pa'i dbu// dbus ni bdud bzhi
'dul ba'i dbu// lhang lhang 'tsher 'tsher phyogs bcur rta skad 'tsher// sangs rgyas 'dus shing gar gyi phyag rgyar gsal// g.yas pa brgyad kyis nyon mongs brgyad rnams sgrol zhing ye shes brgyad du
ston// g.yon pas bsgral nas pha rol phyin bcur sbyor// rdo rje'i gshog pas khams gsum sa rnams gnon// zhabs brgyad bgrad pas dug lnga tshogs brgyad 'joms// dpal chen dbang gi rgyal po ni// 'bar

ba'i gdan las bzhengs nas kyang// ye shes 'phrul gyi dngos grub stsol// phyag rgya g.yas brkyang g.yon mnan te// lan gsum bsgyur cing mkha' la dgrol// phyag rgya'i mchod pa chen por gsungs// rta mchog
rol pa'i tan tra las/ phyag rgya rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang las kyi sems dpas/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug la/ lha rnams rgyan dang cha lugs bshad du gsol// zhes

gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// dbang gi rgyal po las dang skabs dbye na// las dang rnam pa 'di ltar gsungs// dur khrod gar gyi bdag po ni// dbu lnga ru byung ngo// phyag rgya drug tu gsal

lo// traM dmar po brgyad la zhabs dmar po brgyad du bgrad do// sbrul rigs rnams kyis brgyan/ stag lpags zhing gi pags pa dang/ glang gi ko ba/ bse khrab smug po/ chas brgyad/ de ltar mche ba gtsigs pa/

rdo rje'i gshog pas kun tu gtams pa/ gzi ldan pad+ma yab dang mthun par gsal ba'o// ma las gsang ba'i yum chen mo// sku tshon rin po che sna tshogs su 'bar ba'o// phyag na gsang ba'i thod pa re bsnams

pa'o// li las long ba sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ngo// shar gyi long ba brgyad/ sku ni rin chen 'bar ba las/ phyag na shel gyi 'khar ba bsnams pa// chibs su stag mo brgyad la chibs pa/ dbu la sprul pa char du
'bebs// dung gi a long khra la la// lho yi phyogs nas long ba brgyad// sku ni rin chen 'bar ba la// phyag na gser gyi 'khar ba bsnams// dbu la rin chen thog chen 'bebs// chibs su chu srin brgyad la
chibs// gser gyi a long khra la la// nub nas long ba brgyad byung ste// rin chen 'bar ba'i sku lus la// phyag na byu ru'i 'khar ba bsnams// ba glang dmar po brgyad la chibs// dbu la thog rgod

char ltar 'bebs// byu ru dmar po'i a long 'khrol// byang nas long ba brgyad byung ste// rin chen 'bar ba'i sku lus la// phyag na g.yu yi 'khar ba bsnams// chibs su khyung chen brgyad la chibs// rin chen
'bar ba'i a long can// dbu la thog chen char chen 'bebs// dbang chen pad+ma'i bka' la sdod// sti brgyad las spyang mo brgyad la// byu ru dmar po'i a long re re yod pa/ ya 'gal gser la ma 'gal

g.yu// tshig chad kha gdangs dza brgyad las kyi brgyad byung ste// dung gi khyi gser gyi khyi zangs kyi khyi/ g.yu'i khyi brgyad byung ste/ ral pa mda' tshad shar re 'dug pa/ gzhug ma sog ler 'dug pa/ byu ru'i a long la

dza dmar po re re yod pa byung ngo// dza sum cu rtsa drug las/ pho nya mgo brnyan mang po byung ngo// b+h+yo b+h+yo brgya rtsa brgyad las/ sing ha dzam b+ha la b+h+yo/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas/ gser gyi seng ge nyi shu rtsa brgya yin

nam brgyad la/ spyan gsum pa/ 'od 'dzam bu shar ba 'dra ba/ ske na byu ru dmar po'i a long re yod pa/ b+h+yo re la a long re la yi ge b+h+yo// dmar po re yod pa de ltar byung ngo// dza las pho nya mgo brnyan ma drug cu
rtsa gnyis byung ngo// 'ug pa dang/ bzhad dang/ byi la'i mgo can rnams dang/ gcan gzan gdug pa'i mgo can rnams dang/ khyi spyang la sogs pa'i mgo can mang po byung ngo// gzhan yang gdug pa'i mgo bo
can mang po la byu ru'i a long dang/ lcags kyi a long dang/ dung gi a long dang/ a long can mang po yang dbang gi rgyal po la bltas te gnas so// gol ma drug ni/ mdzes pa'i lus la/ ti ra phra mo mdzes

pa'i tshul can no// ti ra gnas nyul ma zhes bya ste/ bud med mi bzad gdug pa'i cha lugs can/ zhing gi dbyug pa lag na thogs pa/ ti ra phra mo kha nas khyer te rgyug pa/ za byed sha khrag gi bdag mor bzhugs

so// a ra las dmus long brgyad dung gi khyi mo byu ru'i khol thag can brgyad la zhon nas rjes la snom zhing rgyug ste/ long ba la zangs kyi zhags pa dang/ khrag gi par bu thogs te dbang gi rgyal po'i bka' nyan
cing/ gsung sdod par bzhugs so// gzhan yang 'khor mang pos bskor te bzhugs so// shar gyi mgo dgu brtsegs pa ni/ lcags kyu bsnams pa/ lho'i mgo bdun brtsegs pa ni zangs kyi zhags pa bsnams

pa'o// nub kyi mgo lnga brtsegs pa ni/ lcags sgrog tho ba bsnams pa'o// byang gi mgo gsum brtsegs pa ni/ dril bu bsnams pa'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las/ 'khor rnams bskyed cing spros pa'i le'u ste
bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dbang gi rgyal po des/ gnas lnga nas yi ge lnga bton te/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ spyi bo bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang nas/ oM dkar po las hu lu hu lu phaT

e A ra li hUM hrIHdzaHsa bskor ba'o// mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i gzhal yas nas/ AM las yi ge hu lu hu lu phaT e A ra li hUM hrIHdzaHsa bskor ba'o// tsit+ta rin po che'i gzhal yas khang nas/ hUM mthing

ga la hu lu hu lu phaT/ e A ra li hUM hrIH dzaHsa bskor ba'o// lte ba sprul pa'i gzhal yas nas/ swA ser po las hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ e A ra li hUM hriHdzaHsa bskor ba'o// gsang ba'i gnas kyi me rlung las kyi

gzhal yas nas/ hA ljang gu la yi ge hu lu hu lu hUM phaT e A ra li hrIHdzaHsa bskor ba'o// bde chen 'khor lo 'dab ma sum cu gnyis/ mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug/ tsit+ta chos kyi 'khor lo

'dab ma brgyad/ lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo drug cu rtsa bzhi/ me rlung 'khor lo gzhu dang ba dan dbyibs/ dngos po'i gnas lugs de ltar gsungs/ de nas bsdus pa 'bru brgya spros/ de las spros dang bsdus pa'i/
lha rnams rdzogs pa gsang ba'i snying po'i don/ dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal to// dang po zhi ba'i bsnyen pa dbul// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la'o// bde gshegs thugs mnyes 'gro ba'i sgrib pa

sbyong// oM ni rigs lnga yab yum snying po'o// hu lu gong ma sems dpa' brgyad du ste// 'og ma sems ma brgyad du'o// phaT ni mchod pa'i lha mo ste// e dang A ra li ni thub pa drug/ hUM ni sgo ma chen mo

bzhi// hrIHdzaHgnyis ni kun bzang yab yum sngags// de ltar zhi ba bsgrub par gsungs// de nas khro bor bsnyen pa ni// oM ni ye shes lnga ste khrag 'thung yab yum mo// hu lu gong ma gau rI khro mo brgyad/ hu lu 'og

ma sing ha phra men brgyad/ phaT ni sgo ba chen po bzhi/ e A ra li ni dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ hUM hrIHni khro bo'o// dzaHni yang sprul sum sprul don/ de la bsnyen pa dbul zhing 'gro ba'i sgrib pa sbyong/ de yis byang

chub 'bras bu thob/ dbyings kyi zhi khro gsang ba'i sgrub pa'o// oM ni ye shes lnga ldan pad+ma he ru ka/ hu lu gong ma drab mo dang/ glog 'gyu ma/ hu lu 'og ma sder mo can dang gshog pa can no// phaT ni kham rgya mo

drug/ e dang A ni long ba ste// ra dang li ni dmus long ngo// hUM ni mgo brtsegs khro bo bzhi// hrIHni spyang gi za byed brgyad// dzaHni khyi brgyad rngam pa'i tshogs// de ltar dbang gi bsnyen pa'o// de ltar dbang gi

sngags chen po// gsung mchog 'grub ste 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob// rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las/ yi ge 'bru yi nges pa dang/ sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal po de la bdud
dang klu dang lang ka la sogs pas/ gdug pa'i mtshon cha'i char dbab pa'i tshe/ dbang gi rgyal po mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas/ gdug pa'i mtshon cha rnams me tog dang lha

mor gyur to// gdug pa thams cad gtan brlag zhi ste/ dgyes pas mi g.yo ba rnam pa bcu drug byung ste/ dbang chen gyi dbu'i thog tu/ rigs lnga'i rgyal ba re la/ lha mo bzhi bzhis bskor te/ tshom bu lnga'i dkyil

'khor du shar ba'o// tshom bu lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ sgrub pa ma lus don tshang ba'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las/ mi g.yo ba'i ngang las lha mo dang rigs sgrub pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas dbang
gi rgyal po la/ dbang phyug ma rnams kyis/ ma chags pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ bdag cag rnams la gzhan gyis mi mthong ba'i dbang zhig bskur/ gsang ba'i ming zhig

gdags su gsol/ e ma ra ga ra sid+d+hi nag tsan tra sa ma ya/ zhes 'bul lo// dam bca' 'o// zhes zhus pas/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug chen pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs so 'thad do legs so// khyed rnams brtse

ba dang/ ma bral ba na ma ra bya'o// 'du 'bral med na bdag gi gzungs mar bya'o// snying nye na bu mor bya'o// ma sring rgya mtshor bya ba'i phyir/ mi 'gyur ba'i gsang mtshan sing ha dzam b+ha la/ des khyed rnams

mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa gzhom zhing/ khyo dang ming po bran pho dang// bran mo la sogs bsgral ba'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thugs rje'i gshol chen 'di thogs la// zhing chen zhing chung

'di rlog cig/ ces bka' stsal te/ pad+ma dbang gi rgyal po yis/ sngar dregs pa bsgral ba'i lhag lhog la/ pany+tsa a mr-i ta yi tshogs kyis btab// rtag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bsgyur/ dam tshig gi rjes su slob ste/

b+h+yo thang gsum gyis bsad/ b+h+yo thang gsum gyis bos/ khA hi thang gsum gyis bstab/ le thang gsum gyis sbyangs nas/ rol du bcug pa las/ dbang phyug ma rnams kyis gsol pa/ gar gyi dbang phyug ngo mtshar
che'o// dri phun sum tshogs pa gda' na ye shes kyi dri lags sam/ ro phun sum tshogs pa gda' na/ bdud rtsi'i ro lags sam/ sgra phun sum tshogs pa gda' na/ ye shes kyi sgra lags sam/ bdag cag rnams ni

sngon las kyang mthu skyes pa snyam bgyid do// bdag cag rnams ni sngon pas kyang rdzu 'phrul skyes pa snyam bgyid do// rig pa skyes pa snyam bgyid do// tshor ba skyes pa snyam bgyid do// dug sman du gyur pa lags
sam/ zas bdud rtsir gyur pa lags sam/ rdzas dag pa'i nus mthu lags sam/ ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du 'grub bam snyam mo// zhes zhus pas dbang gi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ho ma
dang sring mo khyed rnams kyis// dga' ba snyam du blangs so// byang chub don du gnyer ba yis// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i byin rlabs kyis// rtag tu smon du gyur par nges so// zas bdud rtsir gyur pa

nges so// de'i byin rlabs kyis nga'i zhal mthong ba dang/ rta'i dbyangs thos pa yin no// nga'i zhal mthong ba dang rta'i dbyangs thos pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ yab yum thabs dang shes rab kyis sgrib pa sbyangs nas/
sgyu lus kyi 'gyur shes kyi thogs pa med pa'i dbang thob po// de nas sing ha dzam b+ha la bi sa mi te zhes brjod pas/ skad cig gis lus gdos pa can bor nas/ gser gyi seng ge spyan gsum pa/ 'od zer

'bar ba/ rdo rje'i gshog pas brgyan pa/ seng ge'i mgul pa na byu ru'i a long dmar po re la yi ge b+h+yo dmar po re kha thag tu yod pa/ de ni dbang chen gyi zhabs kyi khri'i mthongs bzhir/ drug drug bcug ste/ kha

phyir ston/ mjug bskor nang du bsnol te bzhag nas/ b+h+yo zlog dang las mkhan du bskos so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las/ las kyi dbang phyug ma dam la btags shing gdan du bting ba'i le'u ste bcu drug
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la/ las kyi pad+ma sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan gar gyi bdag/ bskul bskyod phyag rgya der bshad de// ye shes lha tshogs 'di
rnams la// dgyes pa bskyed na gang gis bskyed// gnad nas bskul na ji ltar lags// dbang gi rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// las kyi
sems dpa' nyon cig/ bstod dang mchod pa'i las ni 'di lta ste// zla gam bsil ba'i dur khrod nas// dbang gi rgyal po gar gyi bdag/ rtogs pa'i ye shes dbu lnga 'bar// dri med zhal gdangs ye shes 'od/

sku lus dmar po zhabs ni srid gsum sgrol// ye shes rgyu yi don dang ldan// 'bar ba ye shes mtshon cha 'dzin// rgyal ba'i yum chen thugs kar spras// dri med ma chags pad+ma'i spyan// na bza' gsum ni brjid

du che// thugs rje ye shes gshog pa 'bar// ye shes mkha' 'gro las la 'gyed// dbang gi rgyal po khyod la bstod// srid gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// dpal gyi khyi brgyad las la khye// zas su gtsang sme

med par za// de phyir mAng sa sha chen zhim// skom du kha mngar med par 'thung// de phyir khrag dang dri chus ngoms// bang ni ngal dub med par rgyug/ de phyir gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor skyong// shar gyi phyogs nas

rgyug pa'i khyi// dri za 'dul phyir 'brug sgra ldir// 'brug sgra ldir zhing lha chen 'dul// lho yi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// glog dmar ljibs shing gshin rje gnon// gshin rje'i rgyal mo sha za ma// nub kyi phyogs

nas rgyug pa'i khyi// rdo rje khyung 'brug klu gdon 'dul// klu 'brug stong gi snying 'byin po// byang gi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// gnod sbyin sgal tshigs dra ba 'joms// gnod sbyin stong gi snying 'byin

mo// shar lho mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi/ drang srong me lha dpung sgron ma// me lha stong gi snying 'byin ma// lho nub mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// srin po'i thod rus zas su za// srin po'i khrag 'thung dbang mo

che// nub byang mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// rlung lha sngon mo'i ba dan gcod// rlung lha stong gi snying 'byin mo// byang shar mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// nyi zla gza' skar kha lang ka/ dbang ldan stong gi snying 'byin

po// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po ste// kun kyang mi bzad ci 'dra na// ral pa ser sprin 'khrigs pa 'dra// phra men thod rus khra la la// ku ku+u ra tsa'i dus la bab// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po ste// rdo rje'i gshog
pa gdengs pa yis// khams gsum ma lus zil gyis gnon// rdo rje'i sder mo bcum pa yis// srid gsum ma lus zas su za// gzan gyi mchog ste klu rnams za// de phyir khyung chen gzan la rol// rgyud drug

cig car khyur mid byed// gnam du ston pa'i byin rlabs las// dkar mo'i tshogs dang ser mo'i tshogs// sngon mo'i tshogs dang dmar mo'i tshogs// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa// ser sprin bzhin du 'khrigs
par byed// la la 'jol zhing la la lding// la la 'bab cing la la rol// sha chen tshogs la gshegs su gsol// ka tag sha kwa tag sha a mu ka dza/ phag gi brtul zhugs chen po yis// gti mug 'joms pa'i

dbang phyug ma// blang dor med pa'i mnyam pa la// phyogs bcu stong khams nga yi khron// khron du ma gyur gang yang med// srid pa'i khron brko thabs re mkhas// de mkhas thabs kyi rgyal po ste// tshems ni 'bar

ba'i rang bzhin la// zhal ni phag rgod mche ba sbrul// shangs ni ngan song khron pa brko// skad ni grul bum tshogs la sgrog/ skye shi rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// gdug pa ma lus gzhom par bya'o// zas ni sra snyi med

par za// tshems ni sra snyi med par 'joms// dpa' bar byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir// sbas pa'i tshogs kyang gzhom par bya'o// dmyal tshogs me dpung gsad pa'i phyir// snang srid ma lus za bar bya// gti mug

gnas su sbyang ba'i phyir// hUM dang phaT kyi stang sta/ ru lu ru lu/ tshal pa tshal pa/ kha ya kha ya/ rak+ta rak+ta/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha chom/ ma hang rug ka ya/ zhes gdug pa'i nga ro bsgrags so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/
bstod pa dang las la bskol ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la/ las kyi sems dpas yang gsol pa/ kye ma dbang gi rgyal po las kyi bdag/ dbang gi lha
rnams ma lus kun/ spyan drangs pa ni ji ltar lags// gar gyi bdag pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig las kyi sems dpa' che// spyan
drangs pa yi las dag ni// se gol tsam gyis snyan gsan dbab// dbyings nas spyan drangs 'di ltar gsungs// skye med chos kyi pho brang nas// cho 'phrul 'bar ba'i skur bstan pa// zla gam dmar po'i gzhal
yas nas// bcom ldan dbang chen he ru gshegs su gsol// gnyis med ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// gzi ldan pad+ma yab yum gshegs su gsol// ye shes dgu yi ngang las skur bzhengs
pa// dkyil 'khor dgu yi lha tshogs gshegs su gsol// tshad med bzhi las khro mo'i skur bstan bzhi// sgo ba g.yog 'khor bcas pa gshegs su gsol// tshom bu lnga dang ye shes 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
nas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus gshegs su gsol// zla gam zhal sprod dkyil 'khor nas// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ma lus gshegs su gsol// zla gam dgu brtsegs dkyil 'khor
nas// hUM mdzad chen po 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// pad+ma 'bar ba 'dab brgyad dkyil 'khor nas// khams gsum rnam rgyal yab yum gshegs su gsol// gru bzhi gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor
nas// ngan song sbyong ba'i lha rnams gshegs su gsol// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus gshegs su gsol// yi ge 'phro 'du 'khrugs pa'i
dkyil 'khor nas// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// gnyis med rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i tshogs bcas gshegs su gsol// 'bar ba'i

le'u tshe dgu yi dkyil 'khor nas// dur khrod chen po'i lha tshogs gshegs su gsol// zhes spyan drangs pa'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las// spyan drangs pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// dkyil 'khor dgu

yi gzhal yas nas// yi ge dgu dang phyag rgya dgu// dbyings nas don du spyan drangs te// gdan khri rnams la bzhugs su gsol// mdzes shing spras pa'i gdan khri la// ye shes lha tshogs bzhugs su gsol// sha
khrag rlon pa'i gdan khri ni// ma dad bsgral ba'i gdan khri la// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas bzhugs su gsol// lhag thed lhag lhog ga go la// lhag sdud 'khor bcas bzhugs su gsol// i ta pa hu lus ma

ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ zhes rim par bzhugs pa'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi lha rnams bzhugs su gsol ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang dbang gi rgyal po la/ pad+ma las kyi sems dpas
'di skad ces gsol to// dbang gi lha tshogs 'di rnams la// phyag 'tshal ba ni ci ltar lags// gar gyi dbang phyug chen pos bshad du gsol// skye med chos dbyings ngang las skur bzhengs

te// gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' bar// nyon mongs 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum bsgral kyang nyes pa'i skyon ma gos// 'dam skyes pad+ma lta bur sku 'khrungs pas// skyon gyis ma

gos pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ rgyal bas bsngags pa'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// sprul sku rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lhar bzhugs pa// dbyings kyi lha tshogs kun la phyag 'tshal
lo// pha rol phyin rdzogs 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// ye shes ma g.yos chos mchog ngang la gnas// dkyil 'khor dgu yi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// gdug pa 'dul phyir sprul pa'i tshogs// las mdzad chen po kun

la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes phyag 'tshal bar gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi lha la phyag 'tshal ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas las kyi sems dpa' des// gar gyi dbang phyug chen po
la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan gsang ba gar gyi bdag/ e ma ngo mtshar thugs rje'i bdag/ mchod pa chen po'i las dag bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ dbang gi rgyal pos bkal stsal pa/ pad+ma

las kyi sems dpa' khyod nyon cig/ mchod pa chen po brgyad yod de// ma dad chen po bsgral ba ni// phyag rgya chen pos sgrol ba'o// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgyas dgyes pa bskyed pa'o// dang por phyi

nang phyag rgya chen pos mchod do// de nas chos thams cad mnyam pa chen po yin pas/ mnyam pa'i ngang las kun tu bzang pos mchod// bde bar gshegs pa khro rgyal gtso// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes kyi// srid pa

rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khaM ud ga te s+pha na i maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ chos thams cad ni

phyi'i yul dang nang gis sems su 'dus so// phyi dag par mchod pa'o// oM pa na pe ma pe nu su ra ti pa ra mu sarba ta thA ga ta si ti hu/ sa ma yo ta muH/ badzra d+hU pe/ badzra puSh+pe/ badzra A lo ke/ badzra gan d+he/ pU dza khA hi/

zhes pa ni mchod pa'o// las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ ma dad pa chen po bsgral ba'i phung po 'di dag bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs te rol lo// 'di yang rtsa ba brgyad do// lo ma stong/ rtsa ba sems rtsa chen po

brgyad la rgyu bas rtsa ba brgyad do// yan lag phra ba'o// dbang po ni ra sA ya na la sogs pa'o// de rnams ni bdud rtsi chen po'o// des ni lha rnams la mchod pa'o// rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag/ rtsa ba
brgyad dang lo ma stong// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'o// sha gti mug/ zhe sdang rus/ 'dod chags khrag/ dug gsum ma spangs dag pa'i 'dod yon gtor ma'o// rlan gyis bsdus pa'i khrag

dang mAM sa dang/ ma dad pa'i khrag rnams sbyangs pa rak+tar rol ba'o// gnyis med sbyor ba'i byang chub sems ni gsang bar mchod pa'o// de dag thams cad bsdus te phul ba na sgra dang bcas pa ni stod tshig mchod
pa'o// de dag thams cad gnyis su med par mchod pa ni/ blta ba'i mchod pa'o// de ltar sangs rgyas mchod na dngos grub thob// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ mchod pa'i rim par bstan
pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas yang las kyi sems dpas/ gar gyi dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan gsang ba gar gyi bdag/ dbang gi lha tshogs thams cad la// de ltar
mchod cing bstod pa na// dngos grub las ni ji ltar 'thob// ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' nyon// de ltar mchod cing bstod pa na// dngos grub chen po de

lta bu// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// yon tan phrin las dngos grub thob// gzhan yang 'dod pa phun sum tshogs// thams cad byang chub chen po yi// yi ge gsum du 'dus pa'o// sbyangs kyin zos na sku
gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'thob// 'phros pas bcud bsdus slar bsdus dbyings su thim// thugs kar thim nas sku yi dbyig/ gsung mchog gsung gi dngos grub thob// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dngos
grub bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' des// pad+ma gar gyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o bde gshegs bdud rtsi mchog gi bdag/ dregs pa ma

dad nyon mongs lnga la zhen pa zag dang bcas// longs spyod rnam pa lnga po zag med bdud rtsir rol pa dang// thugs rje yongs su mdzad pa yis// sman dang 'bru rnams thams cad kun// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa
kun// sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi gsos su mdzad pa'i tshe// rjes su 'jug pa ji ltar bgyi// bdud rtsi mchog la bdag mnyan 'tshal// zhes gsol pas/ bdud rtsi mchog gis bka' stsal pa// e ma'o
las kyi sems dpa' che// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don gyi phyir// bdud rtsi'i don zhus ya mtshan che'o// bdud rtsi'i don 'di ngas bshad kyis/ las kyi sems dpa' yid la zung// nyon mongs pa yi bdud nyid

la// thugs rje chen po'i rtsi btang nas// khyab pa'i ye shes chen po yi// dbyings su dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi'i don// kun rdzob rtags su bsgrub bya na// kun rdzob kyis ni bsgrub pa de// srid gsum b+han d+ha bzang
'khor yug/ ye nas ma bcos rang bzhin snod// de yi nang du blugs pa'i sman// bdud rtsi rtsa ba lo ma rnams// dbyer med ngang du bsogs par bya// de la nges pa'i bsam pa yis// nges pa nyid
du bsgrub par bya'o// mi phyed rgyur ldan slob dpon gyis// thams cad ma lus don bya'i phyir// bdud rtsi dam pa bsgrub par bya'o// rin chen ri dang sman ljongs yul// rtsi sman 'khrungs pa'i sa phyogs

sam// nags tshal me tog rgyas par bsgrub// 'khor du bya ba'i rim pa yang// skyon drug rnam par spangs pa yi// nyi shu'am bcu 'am yang na lnga// khrims dang sdom pas bcings pa min// dang por ra ba'i tshes
brgyad la// der ni brtsams pa'i dus yin no// rtags kyi don nyid mthong ba'am// dus ni bcu drug nyid la'o// yo byad ma lus ldan gyur na// 'grub gyur 'di la the tshom med// ma tshogs pa ni 'grub thag

ring// de bas yo byad ldan par bya// bkra shis mtshan ldan b+han d+ha lnga// dam rdzas lnga dang sha lnga dang// phyi nang gsang ba'i rtsa brgyad sogs// dang por ra sA ya na kun// so so'i rigs dang sde phye la// sman gyi srung
ma bos mchod bstim// dam rdzas rnams kyi rtog pa gzhom// rigs kyi kha dog dar gyis dgab// mtshan ldan bkra shis gzungs thag gdags// de ni bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// bsgrub pa'i zhag grangs ci
tsam par// bar chad bgegs rnams bsal ba'i phyir// phyi nang gsang ba'i rgyu 'drul bsdams// 'bar ba mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor ro// nyon mongs bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// 'bum lnga'i bshags pa bya ba

ste// ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// khrol bu la ni 'khor lo ste// gdung bzhi ka ba brgyad btang ba'i// bzhi brgyad sgo dang bcas pa'o// phye ma'i dus na brgyad cha bzhi// ka ba 'khor lo pad+ma rin chen
sgo// gong bu'i dus na zla gam kha sprod sgo bzhir bcas// gzugs brnyan 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// rigs brgyas sbyang dang rigs lnga'am// gsang chen rigs gcig bsnyen pa yis// de ni khrol bu

sbyang ba ste// ye shes lnga yi 'phro 'dus phye ma sbyang// dgu pa'i sngags ni gong bu la'o// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hrIHtha// 'phro 'du 'ju 'dul dkyil 'khor ro// gtan pa lnga la mkha' lnga dbyings// rdung byed

lnga la gsang ba'i mtshan bris la// btsag pa'i 'tshags snod yab yum ste// srin mtheb thabs dang shes rab po// btag btsag bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// zla gam sgo shar bltas pa la// pad+ma 'dab

ma brgyad bris la// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ro// lta ba bla med gdeng du blta// spyod pa bla med gdeng du spyad// dam tshig bsrung ba bla med gdeng// phrin las bla med gdeng du bshad// bsgrub pa bla med
gdeng ni bsgrub pa'i gdeng// bdud rtsi chen po bum pa yis// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i dbang// 'dod pa de la rab sbyin pa// dbang chen bla na med pa'i gdeng// dngos grub bla na med pa'i
gdeng// bla na med pa'i gdeng brgyad kyis// bdud rtsi dam pa mchog bsgrubs pas// sangs rgyas mchod cing rang zos na// bdud rtsi dam pa bsgrub pa 'grub// dngos grub khyad par can yang thob// dam rdzas
sman sna re re yang// yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab cing// byin brlabs mthu byin de bzhin no// de yi nus mthus dpag las 'das// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bdud rtsi chen po bsgrub
pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' des/ pad+ma gar gyi bdag po la/ ma chags pa'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma sangs rgyas dbang gi

mchog/ ma dad chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// thams cad yi ge a 'tsher bsdus// tshe'u+u ba tshe gang mdzad pa'i tshe// rjes su 'jug pas ji ltar bgyi// tshe dpag med pa bdag nyan 'tshal// zhes gsol to// tshe yi

bdag pos bka' stsal pa// e ma'o las kyi sems dpa' che// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don gyi phyir// tshe mchog las zhus ya mtshan che'o// tshe yi las 'di bshad kyis sems dpas zung// 'gro drug tshe dang shes pa

kun// nyon mongs bdud kyis glags btsal nas// tshe nyams pa dang tshe 'thor dang// tshe bri ba dang tshe yar rnams// nr-i tshe la sogs 'thor ba na// drug gi gnas nas bkug nas su// khro bo 'chol pa'i sprul pas

kun bkang ste// tshe dpag med ni zhi tshogs la// de la bsnyen cing bsgrub slad phyag rgya'o// zhi ba'i las kyis ma 'grub na// tshe dpag med kyang khro bo ste// lha tshogs ma lus khro bor gsal// spros zhing khro bos kun
bkang ste// thams cad ma lus spros nas su// khro bo'i sprul pa ma lus pas// gzhom dang gtub cing bcom nas su// thams cad bsgral bcom tshe yi rang bzhin bkug/ bum pa'i tshe la bstim pa'o// yab yum

sbyor ba'i byang chub sems// yab kyi byang chub sems kyi tshe 'di dkar la dngas// yum gyi tshe ni dmar la dngas// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i tshe ni snum la 'dril// spro bsdu 'od kyi rang bzhin las// thams

cad tshe bkug de la bstim// de la yi ge 'phro 'dur gsal// oM b+h+rUM hUM b+h+rUM/ hAM b+h+rUM hrIHb+h+rUM yaM b+h+rUM tshe b+h+rUM/ oM b+h+rUM badzra A yu She hUM a/ rtsa ba'i lha re'i sngags gzhug tu// gdags shing de la bzlas pa'o// A yu ra gnya' na

shi bi du gnya' na a ba lo ki ti sa man ta/ s+pha ra Na rasmi b+ha ba ma hA ma Ni du ru du ru hr-i da dza la ni a b+h+rUM/ badzra A yu She hUM a/ dung dung badzra dung ya rA ga ho/ mug ta ho/ skyed pa dang ni dral ba dang// gzhom pa dang
ni dgug pa dang// bstim pa dang ni sba ba'o// phyag rgya dang ni dbang bskur ro// maN+Dal mchod pa rnam lnga yis// ting 'dzin gsal ba'i lha mos mchod// phyogs mtshams phyogs kyi rgyal po

bzhi// bar mtshams ma tang de bsgral lo// gsang mtshams khro bo rim pa bzhin// brgya byin dbang la las bcol lo// de nas maN+Dal rdo rje dbyings// ga dar byi dor thig rnams bya// tshom bu lnga la bum pa

re// yang ni mdzes pa'i dar gyis brgyan// kha dog dmar dang ser dang ljang// ma nyams ras kyis mgul pa bcing// 'bras bu ldan pa'i ro mchog shing gis kha brgyan no// snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang// 'bras
bu lnga sogs tshul bzhin bsags// der ni lha rnams bskyed bstim mchod// gzungs thag lnga dang ldan par bya// ga'u dag tu bsags pa'o// de nas dbang gi dkyil 'khor te// zla gam sgo dang bcas pa

ni// bum pa dag ni dgod bzhin dang// ga pur srad dang ri lu dang// phyag rgya'i rgya dang 'phel ba dag/ rgya gram bsdams pa 'phel bar gdags// dkar dmar 'bras rgyas de bzhin te// tshe yi las kyi sgrub pa

de// thams cad tshe yi bsgrub pa'o// bkra shis tshe dang gzi byin che// tshe ni bkug bstim phyag rgyas bsdams// de ltar bsgrub na tshe chen thob// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gzi byin
sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' des 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan dbang gi bdag/ dbang mchog 'bar
ba lha yi tshogs// rjes su 'jug pas ji ltar bskang// dbang gi lha la bdag nyan to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ las kyi sems dpa' legs
par nyon la yid la zung// dbang gi lha rnams bskang ba na// ma dad sems can rU tra de// snying rje chen pos bsgral nas su// thams cad bdud rtsir byin brlab lha rnams rol// de yis bde gshegs thugs dam
bskang// mAM sa rak+ta keng rus gtor mar 'bul// dug gsum gtams pas thugs dam bskang// de phyir rmad du byung ba'i gtor mas bskang// rA ga rak+ta chags pas bskang// thams cad gzugs dang gzugs
med de yis bskang// de ltar bskangs pas dngos grub 'thob// pany+tsa bdud rtsi chen pos bskang// rmad du byung ba'i gtor mas bskang// thugs rje chags pa'i rak+tas bskang// bya dang lug gi mdangs kyis
bskang// thams cad bskangs pas thams cad bzlog/ de phyir skong zlog chen po'o// sems can yid dang kun gzhi yis// dbang chen yab yum thugs dam bskang// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// rnam shes
brgyad dang yul brgyad dang// yid chos mi dge log pa rnams// dbyings kyi lha dang 'gro ba 'dul bas bskang// 'byung ba lnga dang sde bzhi yis// dkyil 'khor dgu yi thugs dam bskang// nad

dang sde'u bcas pa yis// khyi spyang tshogs kyi thugs dam bskang// 'di yi tshogs lhag tshogs rnams kyis// long ba rgyab 'brel thugs dam bskang// 'di yi yan lag sde bzhi yis// sgo bzhi'i khro bo'i thugs dam

bskang// 'di yi nang khrol ma lus kyis// 'bum phrag yangs pa'i thugs dam bskang// 'di'i re mig sgal tshigs 'dra yin nam nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// gser gyi seng ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad thugs dam bskang// mtshan ma
gsum dang rgyu mchog dang// mkha' la lding ba'i rig pa 'dis// dbang gi lha tshogs thugs dam bskang// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ lha rnams thugs dam bskang pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga
pa'o//// de nas yang las kyi sems dpas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ phyi rabs pa yi don slad du// dngos grub blang ba bdag mnyan
'tshal// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// phyi rabs pa yi don slad du// dngos grub blang ba 'di ltar bshad// gsang ba'i thabs dang shes rab la// thabs kyi yi ge 'phro 'du las// dngos

grub thabs ni sku gsung thugs// de dang ldan pa'i rtsal mchog des// byin gyis brlabs shing blang bar bya// thams cad byang chub sems su gnas// spros shing bsdus te dbyings la thim// oM dang AM dang hUM

gsum ni// sku gsung thugs su bsdus nas ni// de dang ldan par blang byas na// dngos grub thams cad des thob gsungs// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dngos grub blang ba'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// de
nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' des/ dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma gsang mchog gsang ba'i bdag/ gsang ba dbang gi lha tshogs la// phrin las bcol ba bdag nyan 'tshal// zhes
gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' nyon// gsang ba dbang gi lha rnams la// phrin las bcol ba 'di skad gsungs// zla gam dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// thabs dang

shes rab ldan byas te// sbyor ba'i phrin las lha rnams spro// spros shing bkug ste thams cad dbang du sdud// dbang du ma 'dus gang yang med// dbang gi rdzas kyis mchod cing phrin las bcol// ma dad pa las
dur khrod byung// dur khrod las ni dbang gi dkyil 'khor byas// dbang gi lha la phyag 'tshal nas// mchod cing bstod la phrin las bcol// dmigs pa ma lus dbang du sdud// zlum la 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor
du// zhi ba'i lha ni yab yum bcas// mchod bstod phrin las bcol te las bya'o// gru bzhi gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// rgyas pa'i rdzas dang lha rnams bzhugs// mchod bstod phrin las
bcol ba'o// gru gsum gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// drag po'i lha la de bzhin no// de yis phrin las 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ phrin las bcol ba'i le'u ste nyer
bdun pa'o//// de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ pad+ma gar gyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma pad+ma gar dbang lha// sems can las kyi dbang song na// phyi rabs pa yi don phyir du// drag
po sgrol ba bdag nyan 'tshal// zhes gsol pa dang/ dbang mchog rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' nyon// gdug pa bsgral ba'i las bstan pa// ma dad pa la rgyu gcig ste// ma dad pa dang

tshul bstun to// phyi ni gru bzhi gdengs pa la// nang ni zla gam 'bar ba bris// zla gam nang du dmigs pa ste// yan lag gsang gnas bcas par bri// dbang gi sngags kyis spyi nas gnan// khyi spyang sngags ni
yan lag la// mkha' 'khor sngags ni g.yas g.yon bskor// dpral bar rus la snying gar ming// mA ra ya ni 'doms su ste// sgo bzhir khro bo bzhi'i sngags dgod// de ltar bcas shing las bya ste// phyogs

bzhir brtul zhugs bzhi yi sngags// phyi nas che ba'i nga rgyal bskul// phyogs bzhir brtul zhugs chen por brdung// gdug pa'i mtshon cha'i char yang dbab// drag sngags bdun ni snying gar brdung// phur pa bla
dang bcas pas gdab// gdug pa'i mtshon dang tho ba lcags kyu dang// gu gul dang ni nyung dkar dang// ma bdun dang ni sme rdzas bdug pas brdeg/ sgrol sngags rnams ni spungs la brdeg/ pho nya dgug bstim

sngags kyis gtub// dum bur bsgral te lha la bstab// lhag ma la ni bro brdung ngo// de yis drag po'i las 'grub bo// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ drag pos sgrol ba'i las bstan pa'i le'u
ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpas dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma dbang mchog dbang gi bdag/ 'gro ba phyi rabs don slad du// bzlog pa'i las ni
bdag nyan 'tshal// zhes gsol pas// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ ye shes lha dang 'jig rten lha rnams ni// bzlog cing rbad nas las byas na// nye bar 'tshe ba
bzlog par 'gyur// zla gam gru gsum maN+Dal bya// gong bzhin mchod pa bstab pa ste// gdeng brgyad mi phyed ldan pa yis// tsa ra rog po'i mkhal dkar ram// dmar kham spu mdog khug pa yis// de la
dmigs pa'i rten bcas te// dmigs pa dgug gzhug de la bya// dang po dkyil 'khor rtsar drangs la// byin gyis brlabs shing ging dbang bskur// sems can chen po de la ni// 'bru lnga'i sa

bon gsal ba la// ngan song nas 'don so so'i rtsar// 'bru lnga'i yi ge dgod par bya// spyan dbye dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// de nas phung po ma bshig par la ni// lha rnams bskang zhing dmigs rnams bskyed

pa'o// ti ra'i ting nge 'dzin chen po yis// phung po de ni bslang bar bya// drag sngags sgrol sngags de yi ni// phung po srung byed de dang phral// khro bo'i stangs stabs chen po dang// phra men 'jol tshul chen po

dang// ma mo'i gar thabs dag gis zung// rol pa'i brtul zhugs chen pos gzhom// lha yi ngo bor gsal ba de// de la phung po spros nas ni// zla gam dbus la snying gzhag ste// phung po lnga ni tshom bu la// rnam

shes rnams ni bskor ba'o// de nas lha bstod mchod par bya// lha rnams so so'i thugs dam bskang// srog brjes zin par sha khrag dang// dug dang rdzas kyi mchod pa bzlog pa'o// de ltar bzlog na 'chi bdag

gshin rje nyid kyang bzlog/ ces gsungs pa la the tshom med// stabs dang spar dang sbyar ba'o// dbang gi dkyil 'khor dgu shes bya// de ltar skad cig dge spyad sangs rgyas rgyu// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog
rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bzlog pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o//// de nas yang las kyi pad+ma sems dpa'/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan dbang gi bdag/ ma dad pa yi
sems can de// lus sbyang ba dang sems sbyang ba// phyi rabs don du bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ las kyi sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ phyi rabs don du gnas

sbyang ba// ma dad pa yi sems can ltar// lus sbyang ba dang sems sbyang ba// gnyis su med par sprad cing ston// lus sbyang ba yi rim pa ni// rtsa bdun zhag grangs tshun chad du// las kyi dge ba'i stongs su
ste// gnas pa zin te myur bar thon// de nas gnas spar rgyas gdab cing// de yang ting 'dzin rab kyis zhugs// de la sbyangs nas 'byongs par gsungs// rgyas pa'i rim pa bstan pa yang// 'dus sbyang pa yi
rim pa ni// dang por sngags dang gtsang mas dkru// de nas dri zhim gtsang mas byug/ dbang bskur bstod dang mchod pa ste// phung po lha la mchod par 'bul// go bgo gnas la lha rnams dgod// spyan drang

mchod cing bstod de sbyang bar gsol ba gdab// mi snang lha yi ngo bor thim// rus pa sku gdung mchod rten de// dus gsum mchod pa'i rten du bzhugs pa'o// spyan drang rab bskyed mchod pa de bzhin bya// phung po
rdzas su bya ba ni// dang por khrus byad blta ba bya// de nas dbang dang lha gnyis bskyed pa'o// de la hu lu'i 'bru yi 'phro 'dus sbyang// phung po lha yi gzhug gnas te// dur khrod lnga pos mchod par

'bul// sems ni gnyis med ngang du spar// dug lnga ma spangs gnas su sbyang// sA ts+tshar phyi rabs don du sbyang// gnyis med ngang du mchod cing sbyang// dngos grub blangs shing de'i phung po 'byongs pa'o// rta mchog
rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ lus sbyong ba'i le'u ste sum cu tham pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal pos gsungs/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ sems sbyangs pa yi rim pa ni// ma dad chen po sbyangs pa ltar// phyi
rabs don du sbyang ba ni// lha rnams mchod cing bstod bskul nas// de nas 'phro 'dus sems kyi ngang du gsal// ting 'dzin chen po ldan pa des// drug gi gnas nas bkug nas su// snga ma'i rten la bstim

par bya// phung po bdag po bskul nas su// sdig pa sbyang zhing lha ngo bstan// bstim dang dbang bskur sdig pa bshags// 'og min bla med gnas mchog na// yab yum gnyis med phyag rgya nas// sku gsung thugs

kyi rdo rje che// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phangs// rdo rje dbyings kyi gral du dgod// yi ge dpa' bo 'bru lnga yi// dug lnga'i yi ge ma spangs bcom// rnam shes rgyal ba'i sras su byas// dbang bskur gzhan don
gsol ba btab// sbyang dang bstod dang sngags pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sems sbyangs pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ dbang gi rgyal
po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dbang mchog gsang ba'i bdag/ sngon 'gro'i las ni ji ltar lags// dbang gi sngon 'gro bdag nyan 'tshal// zhes gsol to// dbang chen gsang bas bka' stsal pa/

las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ las kyi sngon 'gro bshad par bya// las kyi lha ru gsol ba des// dang po sa yi lha mor sbran// phyag rgya lnga yi sa sbyang ngo// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang ba dang// ting nge

'dzin gyis sbyang ba'o// g.yar ba dang ni bslang ba'o// snang dang mi snang ngo bor brtag/ mchod bstod sa rin gus par dbul// brtag pa de ru gnas par bya// ro lnga bsal dang yon tan bstan// brtag pa dang

ni yon tan skyon// spang blang gnyis su shes par bya// de ru dkyil 'khor mnga' gsol brtsig/ mtha' dbus mnyam ste tshad ldan bya// las kyi phyag rgya gsal bar bya// chag chag rnam gsum rim par gdab// ba

byung lnga yis byug pa yis// phyi yi mchod pa dag tu shes// bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor bas ni// chag chag gdab cing las bya'o// dam rdzas bdud rtsi ye shes lnga// rak+ta'i chag chag gdab pa'i dgu// chag chag rnam
gsum gdab par bya// a mr-i las kyi sbyor ba'o// dam rdzas ye shes lnga ldan pas// gsang mchog bsgrub phyir chag chag gdab// a mr-i ta maN+Da la/ ye shes lha yi bzhugs gnas te// gnyis med
mnyam pa'i dbyings su gdab par bya'o// zla gam dmar po'i gzhal yas su// gnyis med sbyor ba'i ngo bo las// thugs rje chen po'i chags pa'i phul byung babs// dbang gi rgyal po yab yum bzhugs pa'i

gnas// rA ga pU dza sa ma ye/ mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs shing gdab pa'o// de nas yab yum gnyis su med pa'i mkha' dbyings nas// byang chub sems kyi thig le 'debs// bo d+hi tsit+ta maN+Dal// tshon gyi

rnam pa lnga po yang// yi ge dpa' bo 'bru lnga yis// rin chen phye mar brlabs shing rigs kyi ngo bor gsal// de yis dkyil 'khor bri ba'o// dang po phyi mtshams chen po ste// rgyal po bzhi la las bcol mchod
bstod bya// bar gyi dbang po las bcol bstod// mtshams su gnas pa'i las bya'o// de nas rdzas rnams dgram pa ste// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du shes so// de nas lha bkod spyan drangs bstim// byin brlab

bkod cing snyan bstun gsol// brtan par bzhugs shing 'dod don gsol// dang po bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen bya// de nas bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen po// de ltar las kyi rnam par bstan pa'o// rta mchog
rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sngon du 'gro ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang pad+ma las kyis sems dpa' des/ dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bsnyen pa'i las rnams
bstan du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig las kyi sems dpa' che// legs par nyon la yid la zung// bsnyen pa'i las rnams bstan pa ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon

phrin las// yi ge phreng ba 'phro 'du ste// yi ge de yi 'phro 'du las// sngags kyi phreng ba 'bru brgyad gsal// dang po 'phro 'dus lha rnams bskul// gnyis pa ma mo mkha' 'gro bskul// gsum pa las kyi mkha'

'gro bsnyen// zhi ba gnyis med ngang du bsnyen// 'phro 'du 'phro bas ma dad btul// de las phar mchod tshur dngos grub// tsha tsha'i tshul du 'phro 'du bya// de ni bsgrub pa chen po zhes// phrin las bsgrub pa zhes bya
ste// gnas pa gnyen po bsten ni bsnyen pa ste// 'phro 'du bsgrub pa chen por gsungs// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bsnyen bsgrub kyi le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpa'
des/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma dbang mchog las kyi gtso// gnan pa'i las rnams ba shad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon
cig las kyi sems dpa' nyon// mnan pa'i las rnams ngas bshad kyis// kho nar nges par yid la zung// ma trang chen po bsgral ba la// ma gos rtsod na nan pa ni/ las mthar phyin gyis gnan
pa'o// de bzhin gnan pa'i las dag ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni brgyad pa bri// dbus su yan lag nyid la gdang// mgo dang bcas pa'i gdong pa de// dbang po lnga dang ldan par bri// tha mar 'dzam bu gling gi
dbyibs// rgya gram rtse la 'bar ba'o// bkra mi shis pa'i thag pas bcing// gdug pa'i mtshon cha dang bcas pa// sha khrag rdzas dang bcas pa bsham// mon nam rabs chad thod par gzhug/ yang na ri gsum
'og tu gzhug/ rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang shing gcig gi/ de ni gnan pa'i las su shes// de ltar gnan na ldang mi 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las// gnan pa'i le'u ste so bzhi
pa'o//// de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ 'khor ba'i gdug pa ma lus dang// dregs chen
ma lus 'dul ba'i tshe// brtul zhugs spyod pa ji ltar bgyi// lta ba ji ltar blta bar bgyi// dam tshig ji ltar bsrung bar bgyi// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka'

stsal pa// las kyi sems dpa' zhu ba legs// the tshom thams cad gcad par bya'o// 'khor ba dag ni gdul ba'i tshe// brtul zhugs spyod pa 'di ltar spyad// lta ba blta ba 'di ltar blta// bdag nyid ye shes khro

bor brtag/ 'khor ba bsgral ba'i zhing du blta// dam tshig bsgral bar gsungs pa ste// dam tshig bsgral ba chen po'o// thogs rdug med pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// the tshom med pa'i bsgral ba de// brtul zhugs

chen po 'di ltar spyad// smyon pa'i chas su zhugs pa ni// las dang ma lus bgrod kyang bgrod// drag po'i las la smad mi bya// lam mi gzur la phyag mi btsal// phreng ba 'khar ba de bzhin gzung// khros pa'i cha
lugs chen po yis// 'gro 'dug stegs su byas nas ni// kha mngar med pa zas su bza'// gang dang 'phrad pa yang ni gnan cing brdeg par bya// bang yang ngal dub med par rgyug/ khros pa'i tshul gyis las
rnams bya// brtul zhugs bzhi yi chas su zhugs nas ni// phyogs bzhir gdug pa'i nga ro gdon// rta yi brtul zhugs chen po ni// brjid pa'i tshul du byas nas ni// mngar gsum mchongs shing nga ro
gdon// lag pa mdun dang rkang pa rgyab tu gdengs// ngal dub med par 'dug gam 'chag/ hrIHlas rta mchog 'bar ba'i tshogs// khro bo gdug pa'i nga ro gdengs// rta mgo can gyis khams gsum
bkang// 'phro 'dus gdug pa ma lus 'dul// rta mchog can yang char du 'bebs// gdug pa'i tshogs la brdeg cing rgyug/ 'di ni rta yi brtul zhugs yin// khyi yi brtul zhugs drag 'bar

te// brjid pa gdug pa'i nga ro can// g.yas pa lag gi 'du byed de// g.yas pa brgyab brkyang mchongs pa'i tshul// dzaHyis ye shes 'bar ba'i khyi// khro bo gdug pa'i nga ro gdengs// khyi mgo can gyis khams
gsum gang// gdug pa'i nga ro phyogs bcur sgrogs// phyogs skyong rgyal rnams 'dar khrag skyugs// ngal dub med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gdug pa ma lus 'joms pa'o// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po yi// drag
po brjid du ldan pa yis// srid pa'i gdug pa bsgral ba de// ku dang ye las bya mgo'i tshogs// 'bar ba 'phros pas khams gsum spros bkang ste// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab gshog
pa gdengs// sngon du rdo rje sder mos bcum// lding zhing rol pas rgyud drug sgrol la mkhas// gdug pa ma lus bsgral ba'o// phag gi brtul zhugs chen po ni// gti mug 'joms pa'i phag rgod gdug pa'i
sde// du ru las ni phag gi tshogs// khams gsum ma lus bkang byas te// thams cad 'joms shing thams cad za// gdug pa'i nga ro yongs su gdengs// sna la rta yi 'phro 'du 'khrungs// lag pa phag gi chang
bar ldan// phaT kyis lcags ni rab tu 'phro// hUM gi 'phro 'du stangs stabs byed// dub dang ngal med rgyug la dga'// khams gsum ma lus 'joms la dga'// mi bzad sprul pa'i khro bo sprin dpung bzhin du
spros// dpa' bo ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// thams cad 'joms shing gdug pa'i klu yi tshogs// dpa' dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ brtul zhugs bzhi
dka' thub smyon pa'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o//// de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' des/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ ma dad pa'i
sems can chen po de bsgral ba ni/ rtsa rnam pa du zhig yod/ gar gyi dbang gis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ legs par nyon la
yid la zung// ma dad sems can chen po la// rtsa ni nyi khri chig stong ste// de las sang sum brgya drug cu yod// de las bsdus na rtsa chen gsum// de las bsdu na rnam pa gnyis// gcig ni bla yi rtsa ru
gnas// gcig ni dbugs kyi rtsa yin no// gcig ni bla dang 'khyams te 'gro// gcig ni dbugs dang 'grogs te 'gro// rtsa chen gsum ni srog shing ste// phung po lnga ni 'khor lo brtsegs pa bzhin// sa bon yi
ge'i rang bzhin no// de las yan lag bzhi gyes te// sgo bzhi drag po'i 'jug pa'o// lug bzhi khug gnyis lkugs pa ste// gnas bzhir gzir cing sgo bzhir spung// rgyun lam gsum du

gyen thur blta// mthar byin lta bur byang chub sems// de la dus dang sbyar zhing brtag/ bla rtsa med na tsit+ta 'gas// dbugs de dag dang 'grogs pa de// de la drag dal yod pa'o// rigs ni rnam pa bzhi yin
te// ring la dal la 'jam la ring// tshangs pa lha yi rigs yin te// drag po myur ba srin po khro bo ste// gdug pa 'dul ba dbang phyug tshangs pa ste// gnyis min brtag par dka' ba dregs pa can gyi

rigs// de la dregs pa rnam pa dgu// zhe sdang rang bzhin bdud du smin// bdud ni ring la sngo ba'o// nga rgyal las ni btsan du smin// btsan ni thung la rtsub pa'o// gti mug rgyal po chen po ste// dal ba dang ni

sdod du bcas// 'phar dang sdod du thung ba dang// phrad la phra ba the brang ste// de ltar brtag cing rab tu brtag/ de ni ma dad sems can no// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ ma dad pa'i gnas
dang phyi rabs don du rtsa'i dmigs bstan pa'i le'u ste so drug pa'o//// de nas yang las kyi sems dpas// dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma dbang gi rgyal po che// bcom ldan gsang
