gsung thugs kyang sems can mya ngan 'das// sems can thams cad mya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas sems can mya ngan 'das// rgyu 'bras sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas byang chub
sems su 'das// byang chub sems las ma byung med// kun kyang byang chub sems nyid de// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas med// sangs rgyas nyid kyang med pa ste// sangs rgyas ming du btags pas

nor// ma nor ma bcos de nyid ngang// rang byung rang zhi bde ba la// ji ltar snang ba sems nyid de// sems nyid la ni dngos po med// dngos med dngos po de nyid don// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos

rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid sna tshogs cir snang yang// chos kun byang chub sems su gnas// lha rnams so so'i snying po sgra// de nyid byang chub sems chen po// byang chub sems su 'dus pa'o// rnam

par mi rtog ye nas skye med cing// gzung 'dzin skyon bral mtha' gnyis ma chags dbyings// ye nas mnyam nyid rang bzhin ji bzhin ngang// rnam rtog skyon bral smra bsam yul las 'das pa ste// de ni byang chub

sems chen po// yod pa dang ni med pa dang// rtag pa dang ni chad pa dang// dngos po dang ni mtshan ma dang// gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa brgyad// spros pa'i mtha' brgyad sems kyi sgo mo ste// de ltar gnas pa'ang
ni sems kyi las// sems kyi yul ni rnam shes brgyad// sems kyi 'bras bu sangs rgyas so// sems kyi rtsal spyod bsgrub pa'o// sems kyi gnya' gnon dam tshig go/ lta ba gdeng dang ldan par blta// bsgom pa
sems kyi srog shing yin// thams cad skyed dang thams cad sdud// thams cad gcig pa sems nyid do// de ltar byang chub sems chen po// yod par snang ba byang chub sems// chag par snang ba
byang chub sems// gnyis ka yang ni sems nyid do// gnyis med dang ni sems nyid do// sems nyid la yang dngos po med// gang du yang ma sbas pas mthong ba nyid do// brjod du rdul tsam yang med pas// kun

tu khyab pa nyid do// ma shes 'khrul pas sems can no// ci yang med pas shes rab bo// bgrod du med pas mthar thug go/ byang chub sems ni me long ltar// ma nor ma bcos de bzhin te// rang byung rang bzhin
de nyid do// skad cig ting 'dzin byang chub sems kyi don// rig pas mkha' la rlung gis sprin phyags ltar// sngon nas bsags pa'i bag chags sel// dper na mun khung sgron btegs ltar// mun nyid snang bar

gyur pa bzhin// byang chub sems kyi don rig pas// 'dzin rtog kun kyang byang chub sems su gsal// yod mtha' med mtha' de ru rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po zhes kyang bya// de ltar gnas de lta ba che// spyod pa
ma btsal yangs pa che// byang chub sems chen kun tu bzang// kun bzang yangs pa chos kyi dbyings// thams cad ma lus rdzogs pa che// de ltar gnas pa phun sum bde// sems kyi sangs rgyas bde ba
la// sprul pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas nyan// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ chos thams cad dbang gi zhing du yongs su dag pa dang sems su bstan pa'i le'u ste go gcig pa'o//// de
nas yang ni bshad bya ba// las kyi sems dpa' chen po nyon// thams cad dbang du bsdu ba ni// zla gam gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang gi lha rnams tshang bar dgod// dbang gi las kyis thams cad
'gugs shing sgrol// gdug pa shing gi phur pa dgod// tho ba lcags kyu dgra s+t+wa bsnams// gzhan yang dbang gi dal dgram la// de yi las kyis thams cad dgug/ spyan drang bzhugs dang phyag 'tshal
mchod// smon lam btab la 'dod don gsol// khugs pa'i lha rnams gsal ba dang// bstod bcol las la bsgo ba'o// dbang sdud las kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa yis// srid pa'i dbang chen rnams kyang
las la brtson// sum brgya drug cu bka' yi las la brtson// phrin las mnyan pas 'khor du grags// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ 'khor mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste go gnyis
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru ka la/ pad+ma las kyi sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan dbang mchog dbang gi rgyal// ma rungs gdug pa klu gnyan
'di// gdug pa che zhing ma rungs pa// 'byung po phal cher kun gyi rten// 'byung po kun gyi rten yin pas// 'di la gdul thabs ji ltar lags// dbang chen 'dus pas bka' stsol cig/ ces smras
so// de nas dbang gi rgyal po des// gsol ba'i don thugs su chud nas/ ting 'dzin 'bum phrag gi nang nas/ dbang sdud las kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'joms byed 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mi g.yo ba'i

ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzhan gyi rdzu 'phrul 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang// gdug pa spa bkong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rol pa khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang// sprul pa

dgye ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rol pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rtse gcig bsam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ khyab byed sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos nyid mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'khrugs pa med

pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'joms byed chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang// dka' thub drag po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ma nor rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin

dang/ gdal ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ thugs rjes mi gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sprul pa gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dang ba 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin la

sogs pa ste/ de'i nang nas klu rgyal rdzu 'phrul dbrog pa/ gdug pa can tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu klu de dag thams cad mdangs nyams// rdzu 'phrul
klu'i gdug pa thams cad chad de bya gyu med/ rdzu 'phrul thams cad phrogs te nyams par gyur to// de nas yang slar dran pa rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gdug pa klu'i bu 'di la/

'di lta bu'i las 'di byung ba ci/ zer nas yang lus 'di thams cad gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul mgo stong lnga brgya rang gis sbreng ba'o// de nas dbang gi rgyal po des/ ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ drag po'i

sgrol sngags 'di brjod do// oM nA ga duM phyur/ nA ga duM phyur/ a lo ka ta la pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga wAn ba su b+han d+ha pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga bAn g+h+ri ba ro sha pra be sha phaT/ oM ru ru spu ru ta sha ma rung ka ti bi tsa bruM shi laM

ru ru dra e h+ye hi sa ma ya ma tang pra be sha pra tang dza laM yaM ha ha hi hi hUM phaT/ oM ba hu bin d+ha nA ga bin du nA ga hir ya/ nA ga dung dung pra be sha phaT/ ha he hUM pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga wAn/ hrIHSh+t+r-IHpra be sha phaT b+ha ga bAn/

rag sha pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga bAn/ nA ga le nA ga le/ dum ba le dum ba le/ a ka le a ka le/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta le/ a kar ba in+d+ra pra be sha phaT/ dung pram dung pram/ pram pram phaT nA ga kar sha tIk+Sh+Na hu ya sa me ru ni
kar sha ya/ nA ga pram pram shag/ nA' ga ge ram sang pra ge ma ta nA ga hur pra be sha ya dza/ zhes brjod pas/ klu de dag thams cad bsgral te/ phung po zhabs dmar po brgyad kyi 'og tu dar gcig
bcug/ de nas slar yang ston te/ sbrul mgo nas bzung ste klad la bskor na dmyal thag bcad do// dar tsam du slar sos pas/ nyam thag par gyur nas da ci bsgral ba'i klu'i gzugs dang ro de gzhal yas khang
gi rgyan du bor ro// de nas klu rnams slar sos pa'i gzugs can klu rnams/ phyag bcu drug gis g.yas pa brgyad kyi dang por dga' bo gzung ngo// gnyis par nye dga' bo gzung ngo// gsum par klu'i rgyal po
stobs ldan gzung ngo// bzhi par legs ldan gzungango// lnga par sogs ma med gzung ngo// drug par mtha' yas so// bdun par dung bskyong ngo// brgyad par pad+ma'o// g.yon pa brgyad du/ dang po mgo dgu
pa'o// gnyis par mgo lnga pa'o// gsum par chu lha'o// bzhi par kar ko Ta'o// lnga pa ba ru Na'o// drug par klu gdol pa'o// bdun par klu mgo gsum pa'o// brgyad par gdol pa nag po'o// de rnams phyag
mtshan du bsnan pa'o// bar bar na yang klu bran kyang 'jus pa yin no// de nas yang klu rnams dmyal thag bcad cing dbang du bsdus te/ gshog pa g.yas g.yon gnyis su gdengs/ bar bar zla ba dang nyi ma

stong stong gis brgyan gshog pa'i bar re re nas/ gnam lcags kyi mchu dang/ lcags kyi sder mo byung/ gshog pa g.yas g.yon gyi rtse mo nas/ sprul pa'i bya khyung re re gtibs te yod pa/ byu ru'i rkang pa la lcags
kyi sder mor yod pa/ mig me dang chur yod pa/ de ltar sprul nas/ gdug pa'i klu rnams bzung zhig zos so// pags pas rgyal mtshan byas/ sbrul mgo thams cad bregs nas gshog pa la brgyan pa/ gti mug
dag par byas pa'o// de nas klu gnyan thams cad sdigs pa'i sngags ni dbang gi rgyal po'i sku dang gsung las 'thon to// oM nA ga pa sha her te shag tshal bu ram sad/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang klu

gnyan thams cad bsgral ba'i sngags 'di 'thon to// oM nA ga he sa pa ra ma duM ba le sad/ bra me sham sad/ nA ga he ram dun mu kha lo rbad/ mar ling sad na rbad ya/ de ni bsad pa'i sngags su gsungs so// de

nas yang klu gnyan de rnams gso ba'i sngags 'di 'thon to// nA ga pa sha yu ti ba la a/ klu rnams g.yos pa'o// de nas yang klu dang 'byung po tshar gcad pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM pa sha nA ga dril ma ta pa

shag ga na sa ma ya swA hA/ oM sa ta pa ra ti he ra sad shatha twah+ya ya/ thams cad tshar bcad bsrung ba'o// de ltar dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma dbang chen des/ gdug pa'i klu tshogs tshar bcad de bsgral nas/ la la
gdan du bor/ la la phyag mtshan du bsnams pa'o// la la rgyal mtshan du bzhugs pa'o// la la las la btsud pa'o// de nas gsos nas slar bkod pa'o// de ltar bsrung ba dang tshar bcad pa

dang/ sprul pa yan chad dbang du bsdus te/ klu rgyal 'bum gyis dbang gi sgo bsrungs pa'o// klu dang gnyan gyi sde rnams kyang shin tu ston pas gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas/ mgu ba dang rangs pas kun nas

khyab pas kun gyis ston pa la bltas te gnas so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ klu gnyan dbang du bsdus shing bsgral nas las la bsgo ba dang tshar bcad bsrung ba'i sngags gsungs pa'i le'u ste go gsum

pa'o//// de nas yang dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru ka la/ las kyi rgyal po dang/ pad+ma sems dpa' dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang gsum gyis zhus shing don gtan la dbab pa ste/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
gsol to// kye ma sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i yab// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i mchog/ bcom ldan yab las bdag nyan 'tshal// 'dus par chos kyi rnam grangs gsung// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom

ldan dbang mchog des// skye med chos kyi dbyings chen nas// 'gag pa med pa'i skur mtshon nas// sprul skus 'gro don mdzad pa'o// de nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje la sogs nyon// chos kyi

rnam grangs dbye bar bya// chos kyi rnam grangs dbye ba la// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// thugs kyi dgongs pa bsam mi khyab// thugs ni nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra// nam mkha'i dbyings la dpag tu
med// dpag med bsam las 'das pa'o// thugs ni dpag par dka' ba yin// sku dang gsung yang de bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yang// dpag par dka' bar gsungs pa ste// de bzhin
gsungs gi chos 'di la// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// de yi rnam pa bshad pa ste// dbye ba'i rnam grangs dpag dka' yang// bsdu na gcig las med par gsungs// bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la// ma
nor rtogs na blta ba yin// ma nor pa dang ma bcos pa'i// ngang la gnas na bsgom par bstan// lta ba ma nor gdeng du gzhag/ bsgom pa ma bcos ma yengs pa// phrin las rol pa ma 'gags pa'o// yon tan
zad med gter dang ldan// gsang sngags bsgrub par bstan pa ni// lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang// dbang dang dam tshig shes pa gces// sangs rgyas 'dod pas stong par bsgom// stong pa'i ngang las ye shes
skye// skye ba med pa'i chos nyid la// 'gag pa med pa'i ye shes shar// skye 'gag med pa'i chos kyi sku// chos kyi sku yang sems yin te// sems nyid ye shes shar ba'o// nam mkhas gar khyab sems nyid
de// sems kyis gar khyab nam mkha' yin// ci snang cir srid cir bsgoms kyang// sems la ma rdzogs ye shes med// thams cad sems nyid ngang du shar// lta ba nam mkha' 'dra ba la// spyod pa

yangs dog med par spyod// rdzogs khyab rang byung ye shes yin// gcig dang du ma'i sgra las 'das// sems nyid kun tu bzang po la// ji ltar brjod kyang g.yo ba med// de ltar rtogs na rdzogs pa'o// gsang ba

yang ni brjod pa yin// byang chub sems ni rmad du byung// rmad byung byang chub sems chen la// rig pa ye brdal chen po yin// sems nyid rang byung ye shes yin// rig pa'i ye shes klong brdal bas// brdal ba
chen po'i chos nyid gang// ngang la mi g.yo bsgom pa yin// de las bsgom du med pa ste// ngang las ma yengs gnas par bya// kun bzang bde chen lhun grub pa// rig pa'i ye shes sems nyid de// ma bsgom
bzhag na bsgom pa yin// ma btsal pa nyid rtsol nyid yin// de ltar rtogs na sangs rgyas yin// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste go bzhi pa'o//// de nas
yang ni gsol ba'i don// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// phyag na rdo rje las kyi rgyal// pad+ma sems dpa' la sogs nyon// chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa ni// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la goms par

bya'o// lam gyi 'bras bu 'thob pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bzung zhig/ skyon gyis ma gos pa 'thob pa'o// mngon par shes pa bsgom pa sgoms shig/ dngos grub thob cing nyes pa med pa'o// 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa bzung zhing rig par gyis shig/ gol sa med pa 'thob pa'o// gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rtog cing spyod la rig par byos shig/ 'bras bu re dogs med par 'thob pa'o// byang chub
phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la nye bar spyod cig/ 'gag pa med pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la spyod cig/ thabs dang shes rab la sogs pa bsgoms pas 'bras bu ma spangs gnyis

med pha rol phyin pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas chags med ye shes chen po 'thob/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bde ba'i ngang gi ye shes 'thob/ bzod pa'i pha rol phyin

pas mi g.yo ba'i ye shes 'thob/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bya ba nan tan ye shes 'thob/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gsal la rtog med ye shes 'thob/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas me

long lta bu'i ye shes 'thob/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes 'thob/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gsal la rtog med chos kyi ye shes 'thob/ thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa nyid
kyi ye shes 'thob/ snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pas gsal dag ye shes 'thob pa'o// pha rol phyin pa'i don shes na/ sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal mi dgos// chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa

gces// sngags kyi mdo las tshig gi sde// yan lag rnam grangs rig pa yis// gang la thogs pa med pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste go lnga
pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal po des/ ma dad pa dregs pa bsgral ba las// gdug pa'i 'khor tshogs ma rungs pa// bdud kyi sde tshogs mang po 'dus// mgo brnyan tshogs dang sde mang kun// sprul cing ma

rungs byung ba las// sgrol sngags drag po 'di rnams sku dang gsung thugs las 'thon to// oM ya ma kra ma her na 'dun sa da raM raM raM/ ba sha ru tri sa ma pra be sha phaT nan ya/ ka la ma e ne sad ram/ kha la dur ba

sad ru tri pra ma ya sa ma ya pa shaM ka ra phaT/ ya ma stam b+ha pra be sha phaT/ kA la ma dun dun pra ma ya/ ma du gra lings da ha sa d+h+rig rbad/ baM ril ha sa tsi ta bun ya/ sa to pra ma sha lam 'ur mA ra ya/ gam pa ri dza/

pra sha kham/ ling rbad ya/ bdud rigs bcu gsum de yis bsgral// de ma thag nas sngags 'di brjod/ oM nA ga bin du gra he nan/ twa sa ba so sa dan ya/ gr-i h+Na ba ro sha tsa ling/ stis sta ban d+ha ban khang raM sad/

nA ga ru ya pra sha saM/ ked du kra ma na sham khyer ya/ pra sha laM sad laM pra ro ling ya/ nA ga sa ma yaM du na pa ro sad lam ya/ dar me kra ma nA ga se se sa na yaM/ dum pa ling dum pa ling/ prad da tsha la khal te sad

lam/ nA ga shag tshal/ hi ra ya hir ya nan/ nA ga sad du ram/ praM yaM praM yaM/ mur tsa la mur tsa sa to nA ga praM ya/ bu di ri ram du/ ke nA ga u lu rbad/ nA ga mu+u ra sha ba laM khang/ nA ga sa du raM pa ya/ hes ba ra ma

ya na ma dun niSh+Tha l+yaM h+ya se ya/ praM yaM praM yaM/ mur praM ya/ tsa ta tsa ta mur gra ling nan/ dun ni dun nA shag nA ga ses hur sad/ de yis gdug pa'i klu gnyan bsgral// de ma thag nas sngags 'di 'thon// a tsa pa tsa

la sham ya ling/ yak+Sha kha tha kha tha sra ma yaM ya rbad na ling/ sa ma ya dur tri he sa brad ling ya/ mur tsa la yag sha rag sha staM b+ha ni/ tshal pa tshal pa/ rbad su rbad su/ kha 'dar kha 'dar/ mur gra ling ya/ de yis

gnod sbyin ma rungs bsgral// de ma thag nas sngags 'di 'thon// oM sad du pra ma lam ba/ sha nan pra saM ya kaM laM her ya/ tsi ta ka laM su+u ma kri kaM rbad ya/ kha la ru tri mur tsa kha la dun/ sha laM brag la yaM/ di ri di

ri/ ra tsa dra ya thum sa ya/ pra ka sha laM sad de ni sa rbad na ling/ de yis gza' dang skar ma bsgral ba yin// de ma thag nas sngags 'di 'thon// oM tri sha tsa pa la gug tsa ra ling/ ha ma ba sha dur yang pra bi sha laM

pa ya/ kha laM mur ti sa ni sad/ hri ling rbad/ gur la rbud ya/ duM pa shaM rbad/ taM sa du rbad ya/ i laM taM rbad/ pra ma tig d+hi raM rbad ya/ de yis 'byung po thams cad bsgral// de nas yang nyid kyi sku

dang gsung dang thugs las sngags 'di rnams 'thon to// pra sha ka ra sha tra sa dza/ mur praM laM sa du kha la dun dun tsi ri tsi ri/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ mur pa sha laM ya/ kha tsa lam pa rbad/ ra tsa a ti bal rbad rbad/ oM

sang ka ra du ya ma du ri ya/ zhes rgyal po'i rigs thams cad bsgral lo// de nas yang nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las sngags 'di rnams 'thon to// oM tsa tsa ba li gug ling/ tsag sha gur pa sha ya/ mar

pa sha nam pa ya/ se te barbad lam tsa ra ling ya/ ga ta ga te mur tsa ga sha rbad ya/ pra ma grur du ling ya/ sad du tsa lo ro pa sha rbad na ling ya/ kha ya da na du mu ra ya/ pra ta tsa ka waM he sa sad/ shu laM du ka ling ya/

tsa ro pa sha rbad ya/ mur ti kha tang ma rang kha hi/ sa tu me kha du mi du gang ba laM/ sa du sa ma ling ya/ ShuHkaM pra tang tsa laM ya/ tsi ta pra sha gugs ling/ sa to ru si ti ling rbad ya/ tsa ti mur tsa khra la rbad ya/ de ni

btsan gyi rigs thams cad bsgral ba'o// sgrol sngags de rnams kyis/ dregs pa de dag thams cad bsgral nas/ gya gyu med par byas so// de phyis kyang de bzhin du bsgral ba'o// sgrol ba'i sngags de thon pa yis/
ma rungs gdug tshogs thams cad bsgral// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ drag po sgrol ba'i sngags rnams thon pa'i le'u ste go drug pa'o//// de nas yang dbang gi rgyal po'i sku

gsung thugs las/ 'byung po tri dza mA ra ya dza/ ga ma b+ha ri dza/ pad+ma d+ha ra hrIHa mo ga hriH/ ha ya g+h+rI ba hrIH/ suM ban ni hrIH/ gaM da ni laM rbad/ b+han d+ha gr-i h+Na ro Sha Na ba shaM pa ri dza/ sa ma ya khug/ dum pa dum pa har re

hor re/ tsi le tsi le/ sur ba gur ba/ sham pa ri bag ka mngal hur ya/ ta le tu le/ ka ba ru bi 'gri ba hab/ de ni don gyis thon pa'o// 'di ni khyi brgyad kyi drag sngags 'thon pa'o// ku ku rak+sha hri kha la tshal

tshal chem rbad/ ku ku rak+sha ya kha la dum ling rbad/ ku ku rak+sha me ta me ta baM ril rbad/ ku ku rak+sha hrI dung dung ril rbad/ ku ku rak+sha hri kha long ka baM ril rbad/ ku ku rak+sha shaM ka ra baM ril rbad/ ku ku rak+sha hUM b+h+yo dum

pa le ril rbad/ ku ku rak+sha kha long ka ka ma la ril rbad/ de nas spyang brgyad kyi sngags 'thon te/ oM dza ya du khug ling rbad/ sho na ka ka ling ling du khug ling rbad/ tsa ka shag ku ku shon rbad/ mu ti ka ma ling hur

rbad/ se ta sa ta breng rbad/ kur sham baM ling rbad/ khu ye sha laM rbad/ mu ru kha sa tsam ling rbad/ de nas yang long ba rgyab sbrel sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi drag sngags 'thon te/ oM li baM ril rbad/ kha ro li rbad/ pi shaM

li rbad/ sum pa sme li rbad/ kar sha li rbad/ gur bi li rbad/ tsing he li rbad/ 'bu he li rbad/ shar gyi long ba brgyad kyi'o// oM rad kaM la rbad/ mu ka li rbad/ sum pa sha li rbad/ mu kha li rbad/ ke

tsa li rbad/ ga ga li rbad/ ga ga na su ga li rbad/ yur ta li rbad/ lho'i long ba brgyad kyi'o// ba da d+he li rbad/ mu kha li rbad/ kha pa li rbad/ sa pa li rbad/ kang ka li rbad/ kha kha li rbad/ sa ba tsa li rbad/ kang ki

li rbad/ nub kyi long ba brgyad kyi'o// karma ba ra li rbad/ trag tu li rbad/ sum pa li rbad/ pa tsa da na li rbad/ ha sa pi li rbad/ karma du ling rbad/ du mi li rbad/ mu kha tsa li rbad/ byang gi long ba brgyad kyi'o// de

nas yang dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad gser gyi seng ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad du sprul nas/ las la dbang ba'i dbang dpal gyis bskur te/ drag sngags 'di rnams kyi sgra brjod do// oM swi li rbad/ ru tri rbad/ gab li

rbad/ trang sa li rbad/ mu+u ra tsa rbad/ su kha ye rbad/ ha e rbad/ re tri rbad/ ha sa rbad/ shathaM rbad/ baM rba na rbad/ ti ri rbad/ kha ro rbad/ ma ke rbad/ ba traM rbad/ kha ta rbad/ ha sa li rbad/ ka ma li rbad/ si pa li

rbad/ ba ro rbad/ da lo rbad/ hrim rbad/ kar sha rbad/ tsa ka rbad/ mu ka rbad/ ra tim rbad/ ga ro rbad/ sha la ma ti rbad/ seng ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi sngags de rnams 'thon to// de nas yang khro bo mgo dgu brtsegs

la sogs pa bzhi'i sngags 'di rnams 'thon to// kro ta ti ri ling rbad/ kro d+ha khug ling rbad/ kro ta maM raM ti rbad/ kro d+ha kar sha ma baM ril rbad/ sgo ba mgo brtsegs pa khro bo'i sngags de rnams 'thon to// de ltar
yang drag sngags 'di rnams gsungs so// de nas yang gsang ba yum gzi ldan pad+ma can la sogs pa'i yum rnams kyis// ma dad pa chen po de'i yum dang/ 'khor gyi rig ma la sogs pa ma rungs pa gdug pa'i

mtshon thogs pa ma rungs pa'i sgra 'byin pa de dag bsgral ba'i phyir/ drag po sgrol ba'i sngags 'di rnams 'thon to// oM karma ni laM ma ma ha sa pra sha ya/ ka ta ke ta tsi ta ma ra li/ ha saM ba ro da ro ma ma dum pa

ling/ ha sa sa duM pa sha ling ya ya/ pa tsa rag sa ma ya/ sa du ba sa ram yaM kha li he ra rbad ya/ ma ma dum dum ling ya ya/ thum pa thum pa rbad/ mu long rngobs ya/ ka lam sa pa pra ka li rbad la/ mu ti ha sa laM tsa ta

tsa ti baM pa ri mug mug ha ra ya rngubs long ya/ sa ma ya da ru ni rbad ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ma ti mA ra ya/ kha li he ra rbad ya/ rug rug chem chem hi hi da kho kha rog su ni rbad mA ra ya nan/ gsang ba'i drag sngags

de rnams 'thon to// de nas yang ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi sngags 'di rnams 'thon to// oM 'bu bar 'bu bar 'bu ga nan shaTha ga ti tha pa ri sh+ni pa ro gulanaM khri hri sad da du gra gya num pa ni skyas da tha ya/
drag po'i sngags de rnams 'thon to// drag po'i sngags de nyid rnams kyis dgug pa dang dbab pa dang/ bcing pa dang gzhom pa dang dbab cing las gang yang 'grub par byed pa'o// zhes
gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ lha rnams kyi drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste go bdun pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal po kun 'dus bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma dbang chen
'dus pa'i gtso// sangs rgyas kun gyi yab chen po// gsung mchog dam pa'i lha sgrub pa// sangs rgyas kun 'dus gtso la bdag nyan 'tshal// zhes gsol pas/ dbang gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to// kye ma nyon cig gsang bdag thugs kyi sras// gsung mchog dam pa'i lha bsgrub pa// rtag tu bsgom par bya ba ni// legs par bshad kyis nges par zung// gsung mchog dam pa bsgrub pa ni// byang chub
lam ni nye bar bsgrub// bar du gcod pa shugs kyis bsgral// sngags dang phyag rgyas 'grub pa yin// tshig dang yi ges 'grub pa yin// glu dang bro yis 'grub pa yin// brtul zhugs chen pos 'grub pa
yin// gsungs pa'i sngags kyis 'grub pa yin// byang chub yan lag dag gis 'grub// 'grub thag nye la 'bras bu che// nyon cig sems dpa' gsang ba'i bdag/ dbang gi lha rnams bsgrub pa la// phun sum

tshogs pa ldan par bya// me tog chu gling rin chen gling// 'bru shing 'tshams la nyams dga'i gnas// gnam ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dra// sa ni pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'dra// de lta bu yi gnas su bsgrub// yang na

brag dmar zla gam 'dra// mdzes pa'i stegs bu de ru brtsig/ rin chen sna lnga'i phye mas bris// dbus kyi zla gam dmar po sgo spod la// tha ma pad+ma 'dab brgyad ste// de mtha' gru chad gru bzhi gnyis// sgo dang khyud

du ldan par bya// dod la mdzes la pho brang gsal// de la dbang gi lha dgod de// rten gyi gsung gi yi ge dgod// dang po mchod pa'i rdzas kyang dgram// byin brlab pa yang de bzhin bya// de nas ting 'dzin rnam

gsum rim bzhin bsgom// shUn+ya tA yi sgra brjod pas// stong pa nyid du gsal ba'o// d+harma d+hA tu'i sgra brjod pas// khyab pa'i snying rje gsal bar bskyed// de las rig pa byang chub sems// dmar la bkra ba'i hUM du

gsal// de la bskyed rdzogs tshig kyang brjod// hUM las 'byung ba'i yi ge chad// de las 'byung ba'i cha yang bsnyam// de las b+h+rUM dang maM chad pas// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom// nang ni dur khrod chen

po ste// gdug pa bsgral ba'i thong lpags mdzes// ka ba ka zhu ka gdan dang// gdung dang lcam dang dral dag dang// rgyal mtshan la sogs de bzhin te// dregs chen kun bsnol gdan tshogs dang// nyi zla pad+mar

bcas pa'o// de la dbang gi lha bskyed pa// de yi steng du hUM dmar re// pad+ma d+ha ra hri kro ta shrI he ru ka krang krang krang krang krang krang krang krang zhes brjod pas/ dbang chen pad+ma he ru ka/ sku byu ru'i sdong

bu 'dra ba/ phyag bcu drug pa dbu lnga pa/ zhabs dmar po brgyad du gtams pa/ zhe sdang rdo rje dang bcas pa'o// 'bar ba'i gshog pa bzhis brgyan pa/ gshog pa'i rtse gnyis la bya khyung re res mtshan pa/ de ltar

gsal ba'i dbu rgyan gyi khang bu lnga la/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la sems dpa' dang sems ma sgo ba dang bcas pas bskor ba/ rigs kyi tshom bu lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba/ khang bu lnga na rta mgo re re yod pa/

rta mgo ljang gu rngog ma le brgan dpral ba dkar zhur te/ dpral ba dkar zhur gyi nang na tshe dang bla'i ga'u re gtams pa/ rna ba gnyis mig gnyis dang bzhin/ tshe'i lha mo bzhi gsung snyan pa/ tshe dang dbang thang gi

sgra 'byung ba/ zla gam sgo gcig pa'i nang na bzhugs pa/ lha mo bzhi dang bcas pa gsal ba'o// dbyings kyi tshom bu lnga'i dkyil 'khor nas sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bzhugs pa'o// thugs ka na ye shes
sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la/ dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor na/ snying po sngags kyis bskor ba yum dang bcas pa ste/ de ni ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i

dkyil 'khor ni// phyag ni g.yas g.yon dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i khrag 'thung lnga bcu brgyad// dbus ni zlum po pho brang la// de dbus zla gam sgo gcig pa// zlum po'i 'khor lo tha ma rtsibs brgyad
de// phyi rol gru chad gru bzhi sgo dang bcas// de la khrag 'thung lha tshogs gsal// gsal le sing nge gsal ba'o// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas gshog pa g.yas g.yon dbus su ni// dbus ni

zlum por bskor ba la// tha ma zla gam pad+ma brgyad// gru chad bzhi po sgo dang bcas// yum bzhi phra men bskor ba'o// rdo rje khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor ro// lte ba ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor
ro// dbus su zlum pos bskor ba la// tha ma zla gam bzhi yis bskor// de la rtag pa'i rgyal po gzi brjid 'bar// 'khor bzhi gtso dang bcas pa dgod// ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// dur khrod chen

po'i dkyil 'khor te// dbus kyi zlum pos bskor ba las// thig bzhi btab pas ling tshe dgu// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga la ni// pho brang re res bskor ba'o// gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa ste// de la yi ge dgod

pa ni// pad+ma la ma mo brgyad kyis bskor ba'o// de ni dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// hUM mdzad chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// zhabs kyi 'og tu gsal ba ste// thig bzhi btab pas ling tshe dgu// nang du zla
gam re yis bskor// gru chad gru bzhi sgo dang bcas// de la khro bo bcu mnan pa// khro tshogs 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor te// sa le bar ni gsal ba'o// hUM mdzad chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// zhabs
kyi 'og tu gsal ba ste// dbang chen sku la dal brgyad do// gcig tu bsdus nas gcig tu gsal ba ni// rigs bsdus lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// yum gzi ldan pad+ma can gyis thugs ka nas 'dud

pa dang 'khril ba dang sbyor bar gnas pa ni/ gsang ba yab la sbyor ba'o// de ltar brtul zhugs chen po bzhi dang/ phra men ma go la ma kham rgya mo drug khyi spyang dang long ba dang khro bo mgo brtsegs kyis bskor

ba'o// rin po che'i khri rkang gi bar na dbang phyug ma gser gyi seng ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad gzhug bsnal du 'degs so// de ltar gsal ba la/ thugs ka na rten la hu lu yig 'bru bcu gsum gyis bskor nas gnas

pa'o// de la 'di skad brjod do// hUM sku bzhi gcig tu bsdus pas kun tu zhal// phyogs bzhi rigs bzhi 'bar ba'i skur bstan pas// spyi mthon sna lngar snang yang nam mkha'i rgyan du ston// rigs kyi dbang

rnams rdzogs pas thams cad ma lus sgrol// hUM mdzad khro bo chen po brgyad kyi snying// chad par bcug nas nang du bsres te gsol// byams dang snying rje ldan pa'i tshul mnga' ba// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags

pa bsnams// be con rnge'u chung dang shel gyi rnge'u chung 'dzin// thod rlon khrag dang nang du bsres te gsol// phyogs bzhi rgyun du hUM gi sgra sgrogs pas// rdo rje byin chen 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ gdu bu dpung
rgyan sbrul nag mi srun pa// hUM gi sgra sgrogs bskal pa'i me lce 'dra// sdigs mdzub rtse las bskal pa'i me 'bar bas// ma rig rmongs pa'i mun nag 'thib po sel// mi ldog sa la 'gro ba 'dren pa'i

rtags// thabs kyi zhags pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud// rdo rje rin chen las byung gshog pa ni// nyi ma stong gis brgyan pa'i the'u gshog can// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod phrin las kyis// thams cad bla med byang chub

gnas su sgrol// dpa' bo ting 'dzin rnon po stag gi chas// rno gdug zlog byed rgya bye lcags kyi chas// shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje 'chol ba'i chas// dbang gi bse khrab smug po gzi 'bar chas// dpa' brjid
mnyen lcug sbrul nag 'khril ba'i chas// dmar gsal dbang phyug za byed ting 'dzin mche ba'i chas// mthing ga le brgan shu ken dar gyi rgyan// gcan gzan rgyal po gtum pa gzig gi chas// phyogs bzhi

mtshams bzhi brgyad du yang// 'dul ba'i zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams brgyad du bgrad// snying gar mkhrig ma nub cing sgal tshigs khong du 'joms// sdug bsngal nyam thag 'bod sgrog skad chen 'byin// oM nA

sha s+t+waM b+ha ni/ ag sha sum b+ha ni/ gar ni sha hUM kA ra pra be sha phaT/ ga na da ga na ta hUM/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha kro d+ha ni kro d+ha ni hUM/ de ltar phyag rgya chen po gsal bar bskyed// hUM dbang gi rta gdong phrin las
mgyogs pa'i mthu// ye shes myur mgyogs shes rab rtsal gyi pha rol phyin// rtsal gyi rlabs kyis sa gsum cig car gnon// 'tsher skad gdangs su snyan pas gsang ba'i thugs dam bskul// rngam pa'i kha rtsal
tsha bas 'khor tshogs dbang du sdud// stobs drug 'gros su mgyogs pas rgyud drug thabs kyis 'dren// rol pa'i rta bro brdungs pas bdud bzhi thal bar rlog/ 'jig rten sgrol la mkhas pas mi mnyam thabs

kyis 'dren// de nas yum ni bskyed par bya// e h+ye hi sa ma ya s+t+waM e h+ye hi sa ma ya hUM/ ma hA shrI ga ma la sa ma ya hUM/ ma hA badzra shrI badzra ka ma la ya sa ma la s+t+waM/ oM a ka te pa te te ma hA ka ta ye swA hA/ zhes brjod

pas yum gzi ldan pad+ma can gyi skur bskyed do// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi phrin las kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor skyed pa'i le'u ste go brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang ni
gsungs pa ste// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drang ngo// skye med chos dbyings dag pa nas// zla gam dmar po dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// dbang chen yab yum gshegs su gsol// gnyis su med pa'i tshul
gyis bzhugs// chos dbyings dag pa'i pho brang nas// ye shes khyad par gzhal yas su// ye shes dgu brtsegs dkyil 'khor kun// gnas 'dir brtse phyir gshegs su gsol// ye shes chen po'i klong dkyil
nas// ma lus gshegs shing bzhugs su gsol// sa ma ya dza/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ pra be sha phaT/ A be sha a/ 'dod chags dag pas shes rab pha rol phyin// ma 'gags rol pa'i phyag rgya cir yang snang// bde
gshegs yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs rtog pa'i dra ba kun bcom nas// ye shes dgu yi don dang rab ldan pa// dbang gi rgyal po'i sku la bkod gnas tshul// rigs chen lha dgu dag la phyag

'tshal lo// gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul zhing// nyon mongs tha ba 'joms mdzad pa// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho// pra tIts+tsha ho// shrI na maH/ kun bzang mchod pas mnyes par bya// yang

dag don gyi sku yang bsil// d+hU pe puSh+pe A lo ke// gan+d+he la sogs lha mo bzhi// mchod pa dag pa'i tshul du 'bul// rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag stong// ra sA ya na la sogs rdzas// lha rnams kun la dbul bar

bya// dngas ma ma 'dres khu ba khrag/ sha chen la sogs mchod pa 'di// dbang gi lha la dbul bar bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'di// so sor ji ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du 'bul// oM AHhUM sku gsung thugs
kyi bde ba mchog tu bskyed par gyur cig/ sa ma ya sa ma ya dgyes pa chen po dam tshig mchog la rol cig/ ma trang kha ma trang kha gnod byed 'byung po tshogs ni bstab bo bzhes su gsol/ ka rug sha

ka rug sha bzhad pa'i gad rgyangs 'brug stong mang po ldir cig/ ha ha he ha ha he thugs dam bskang ba'i slad du phrin las grub par mdzod cig/ e h+ye hi e h+ye hi sdang ba'i dgra bo'i snying nas drongs shig ma sring

las kyi bdag/ sham pa ri sham pa ri khA hi 'jigs byed khro bo'i tshogs mang por sprul par gyur cig/ dkyil 'khor skyong ba'i bdag/ ha ro ya ha ro ya thabs kyi mchog tu dbul lo bzhes su gsol lo// sa ma ya

ho sa ma ya ho thugs dam yum la bskul lo thugs dam skongs shig/ ces bskul lo// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drangs shing bzhugs pa dang phyag 'tshal ba
dang/ mchod pa 'bul smon lam btab pa'i le'u ste go dgu pa'o//// de nas yang phrin las bcol zhing snyan 'bul gsol bar bya ba ste/ dus mtha' me ltar 'bar ba'i klong rum nas// za byed khrag 'thung
le brgan 'bar ba'i sku// dbang gi phrin las rta mgo ljang gu las// 'od kyi gzi mdangs nam mkha'i mdangs su che// spyan gyi gzi mdangs phrin las rnam pa bzhi// sdang mig log pa'i spyan dmar zlog pas
ni// nga dang bdag tu lta ba'i khro bo kun// phyogs med zil gyis mnan pa snyan bsnyun gsol// zur mig 'phred kyis gzigs thabs bstan pa ni// gsang ba yum gyi tshogs rnams ma lus kun// gdung ba'i
tshul gyis sku la 'khril pa dang// zla gam 'od kyi 'phro 'du 'bul ba dang// b+ha ga'i gnas su ling+ga gdab pa'i phyir// thogs med zil gyis mnan par snyan bsnyun gsol// ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i
gzigs thabs kyis// log 'dren gtan srid 'khyams pa'i yi dwags dang// gti mug yongs su rmongs pa'i byol song dang// sdug bsngal bzod par dka' ba'i dmyal tshogs gsum// thar pa yang dag gnas
su drang ba'i phyir// 'khor ba'i g.yul las bzlog par snyan bsnyun gsol// dgyes mdangs zhi ba'i gzigs thabs bstan pa ni// srid gsum rab 'byams 'jig rten ma lus kun// mnyam nyid dbyings su

zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir// zhe sdang gtum khro zhi bar snyan bsnyun gsol// khro rgyal spyan gyis bag chags ma lus kun// log par lta ba'i ling tog bsal ba'i phyir// pad+ma'i spyan gyis byin rlabs bskyed du

gsol// khro rgyal snyan gyi rdo rje 'khor byang las// gsan pa ma 'gags chos kyi sgra dbyangs kyis// nyon mongs rnam dag dbyings su dbang bsgyur zhing// dmigs pa ma chad sna tshogs sgra la sogs// sgra mtha' ji
bzhin bsgo bar snyan bsnyun gsol// gzhan gyi snyan dang thun mong ma lags te// thugs rje'i snyan gyis nyam thag sgra lags na// ye shes snyan gyis bskul ba'i dbyangs lags na// phyi nang
gsang ba'i snyan gsum rdzogs pa yis// ji snyed gdul dka' 'dul bar snyan bsnyun gsol// khro rgyal 'bar ba shangs kyi klong rum nas// dug lnga gsod pa'i mtshon cha ye shes sku// khams gsum sgrol ba'i

phrin las bcol ba ni// 'dod chags dbang bsgyur dri ma med pa'i sku// chags pa'i skyon rnams dag par snyan bsnyun gsol// zhe sdang dbang bsgyur skye shi med pa'i sku// sdug bsngal phung po gzhom par snyan bsnyun
gsol// gti mug dbang bsgyur ye shes 'khor lo'i sku// ma rig rmongs pa gsal bar snyan bsnyun gsol// nga rgyal dbang bsgyur yid bzhin rin chen sku// dregs pa'i nga rgyal gzhom par snyan bsnyun

gsol// sprin las dbang bsgyur thugs rje las kyi sku// skye shi rtsad nas gcod par snyan bsnyun gsol// khro rgyal rngam pa'i zhal gyi klong rum nas// hom lnga 'brel pa'i sbyin sreg chen por mdzod// za byed khro bo
dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// dug gsum za ba'i mgron du spyan 'dren na// rgyud drug gtor mar bzhes par snyan bsnyun gsol// pad+ma le brgan cir yang bsgyur ba'i ljags// zla gam 'phro 'du cir yang 'gyur

ba'i gsung// dri med rgyal po gsung rab mang po dag/ chu bo rgyun ltar 'bab bar snyan bsnyun gsol// thugs kyi khro bo mang po phra mo bsgoms pa yis// phra mo'i ting 'dzin ye shes he ru ka/ rdul gcig steng na
rdul snyed sku sprul pas// chos kyi dbyings kyis bsdus pa'i 'jig rten na// ma rig rmongs pas mdongs pa'i skye 'gro dang// rnal 'byor dam la gnas pa'i sgrub pa po// thog ma med pa'i dus nas 'khor bar
'khor// gzung 'dzin chags pa'i dbang gis bsags pa yis// rgyud drug bag chags ma lus ji snyed kun// thams cad gnas su dag par snyan bsnyun gsol// sku yi khro rgyal rngam byed bsnyen pa'i lha// thod

rus me ltar 'bar ba'i khro bo hUM sgra can// zhag chen thig le dmar chen tshom bus brgyan// sprul pa'i rgyan tshogs skar ltar 'khrugs pa yis// dug lnga skyon gyis myos pa'i skye bo rnams// gdug pa ma lus 'dul
bar snyan bsnyun gsol// thugs dam dbang gis log 'dren bstab pa'i phyir// dbu rgyan tshogs la snyan bsnyun gsol ba ni// dbang rnams rdzogs pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// rta mgrin sogs la snyan
bsnyun gsol ba ni// srin po 'dul ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// ye shes tshogs la snyan bsnyun gsol ba ni// mkhyen rab rdzogs pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// phyag mtshan rdzogs pa'i snyan bsnyun
gsol ba ni// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// gshog pa'i tshogs la snyan bsnyun gsol ba ni// klu chen 'dul ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// thod sprul tshogs la snyan gsan
gsol ba ni// gdug byed bzlog pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// khro rgyal tshogs la snyan bsnyun gsol ba ni// khro bo 'dul ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// gzi ldan tshogs la snyan bsnyun gsol ba

ni// yab yum sbyor ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// dpal chen tshogs la snyan bsnyun gsol ba ni// lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ snyan

bsnyun gsol ba dang bstod pa'i le'u ste brgya tham pa'o//// de nas yang dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru ka la/ bsnyen pa dbul bar gsungs pa ste// mgrin pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor gsung dag pa

pad+ma lce'u bcu drug gis mtshan pa de'i lte ba la gsung gi yi ge a dmar po// de'i mtha' mar hu lu 'bru bcu gsum gyis bskor bas yi ge'i phreng bar gnas pa'o// spyi bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la le'u tshe
sum cu so gnyis/ de'i dbus na thugs kyi yi ge oM dkar po/ tha ma hu lu yig 'bru bcu gsum gyis bskor ba'o// dar dkar gyi yol du bres pa la dngul gyi gzer chen lu gu rgyud du yod pa'o// rin chen skyogs

ni gtsang ma la// zil pa bzhin du yi ge gnas// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad dpal be'u chad zung dang bcas pa'o// yi ge hUM dmar la bkra bar gnas/ tha ma hu lu yig 'bru'i bskor// lte ba sprul

pa'i 'khor lo la// 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi ste/ de'i dbus su swA ser gnas pa la// yig 'bru bcu gsum sngar dang 'dra// me rlung las kyi 'khor lo la// gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra ba dan mtshan// dbus su yi ge hA

ljang ngo// sngags kyi 'bru rnams gong dang 'dra// de ltar gnas pa gsal ba la// oM hu lu hu lu phaT/ e A ra li hUM hrIH dza/ zhes brjod pas// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi thugs dam bskul ba'o// rta mchog

rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ hu lu'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang gcig pa'o//// de nas ston pa dbang gi rgyal po la// spobs pa dang ldan pa'i phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dbang chen dbang
gi bdag/ dbang gi bdag la bdag nyan 'tshal// 'gro ba phyi rabs don gyi phyir// dbang gi don rnams bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas thugs ni sras
chen po// khyod la sogs par dbang rnams bskur// lha dbang rim pas bskur bar bya// dbang chen 'dus pas dbang bskur bas// sems bskyed bsre dang brda yis bstan// legs pa nyes pa'i dgongs pa
brjod// snod min pa la bstan pa min// gsang sngags nyes dmigs 'di lta bas// da rung legs par gsol ba gdab// dad ldan shin tu ngang tshul bzang// lus dang srog la mi phangs
par// dka' thub dka' ba spyod pa ni// slob dpon dam pa de la ni// ba la be'u bzhin du 'breng// de lta bu yi slob ma la// dbang stegs rim par bcas nas su// sems bskyed pa dang rjes 'jug bya// khrus

dang gtsang sbras lus brgyan la// so shing dang ni gegs bsal lo// bar du lha tshon sta gon bya// dbang gi dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni brgyad pa la// dbus su zla gam sgo dang bcas// rtsibs

brgyad nang du zla gam re// gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa'o// de la dbang gi lha bkod la// rdzas dang rgyan rnams tshang bar bsag/ dbang gi bum pa dmar po ru// de ru gsal bar bskyed pa'o// le brgan dar gyi
gdugs su mtshan// ras dkar ma nyams yol dang chings// bkra shis pa yi rdzas su bsag/ zhal zas mang po de bzhin no// dang po bsnyen pa bya ba dang// bar bar gyur nas mchod pa dang// nub ni tha mar
dbang bskur ro// mdzes pa'i lus rgyan dris byug pa'i// slob ma gdan bting nub nas shar// sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis// shel gyi gtsag bu thogs nas ni// ma rig ling tog bsal ba ltar// de ring bu
yi rab rib bsal// maN+Dal pra be sha phaT// 'di yis lha rnams mthong bar 'gyur// phyag 'tshal gus pas lus btud la// hUM de ring phan chad bu khyod kyang// rgyal ba kun gyi sras yin pas// dkyil 'khor
bzang po 'di la ltos// lha dang slob dpon 'di dag la// smad pa dag tu ma byed cig/ de nas dam chu de blud la// khyed kyis legs par gsang bar byas// gal te de las nyams gyur na// dam chu de yis skyon
byas nas// mnar med pa yi dmyal bar 'gro// khyod kyis legs par bsrungs byas na// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras su 'gyur// zhes dam bsgrag pa'o// de nas lha rnams rim par dbang bskur ba ste/ e ma gsang
mchog gsang ba'i bdag/ rig pa bde chen rgyal ba'i yab// sangs rgyas kun 'dus rgyal po yi// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang bskur bas// rigs kyi dbang mchog thob par shog/ kro d+ha d+he ba a a/ thugs kar

sbas pa gsang ba'i yum// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i gzi ldan pad+ma can// gsang mdzod yum gyi dbang bskur bas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ pad+ma rA ga kro d+hI a a/ hUM dug lnga gnas su dag pa

yi// rigs mchog sangs rgyas chen po lngas// skal ldan khyod la dbang bskur bas// ye shes lnga yi dbang thob shog/ hUM badzra d+h+rika/ oM dzi na dzika/ swA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ oM A ro lika/ hA pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ oM hUM/ hUM bde chen

gsang ba yum gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas thugs dam dgyes skong ma// gsang ba yum gyi dbang bskur bas// shes rab ye shes dbang thob shog/ mUM d+hA twI shwa ri/ laM de Sha ra ti/ maM mo ha ra ti/ pyAM rA ga ra

ti/ tAM badzra ra ti a/ rtog pa'i tshogs dag bde ldan byang chub sems// don la sems dpa' brgyad kyi dbang bskur bas// rigs rnams kun gyi dbang bskur sbyin// tsit+ta pra ti a a/ hUM yul las dag pa byang

chub sems ma brgyad// mdzes pa'i sku mchog mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// byang chub sems ma brgyad kyi dbang bskur bas// mdzes ma brgyad kyi dbang mchog thob par shog/ tsit+ta ma la ya a a a/ chos sku nam

mkha' lta bu'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// 'gro ba'i don mdzad kun bzang yab yum sku// sangs rgyas 'di yi dbang bskur bas// bde chen gsang ba'i dbang thob shog/ d+harma dz+nyA na kA ya hUM a/ nyon mongs gnas

su dag pa las// sprul pa'i bcom ldan thub pa drug/ de ring khyod la dbang bskur bas// so sor 'dul mdzad dbang thob shog/ mu ni kriM swA hA/ mu ni truM swA hA/ mu ni sruM swA hA/ mu ni praM swA hA/ mu ni k+ShAM swA hA/ mu ni

ye swA hA/ hUM a A/ log rtog mtshan ma'i dngos po rnam dag nas// 'gro ba'i don du rig pa'i sgo ma bzhi// skal ldan skyes bu khyod la dbang bskur bas// zhi rgyas dbang drag dbang rnams thob par shog/ dzaHhUM baM
hoH/ hUM a/ hUM chos kyi dbyings las rgyal ba'i skur bzhengs nas// ye shes lnga las rta mgo lngar bstan te// sangs rgyas kun gyis bkur ba'i rgyal po mchog/ log rtog bdud rnams 'dul bas dbang thob

shog/ ha ya g+h+rI wa kro d+ha oM hUM a/ hUM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras chen po// ye shes sems dpas dbang bskur bas// gnyis med de yi dbang thob shog/ dz+nyA na tsit+ta maN+Da la hUM

a/ chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// gdug pa 'dul phyir dus la mi 'da' bas// bcom ldan he ru lnga yi dbang bskur bas// log pa'i gdug rtsub 'joms pa'i dbang thob shog/ kro d+ha ma hA maN+Da la

hUM a/ khro mchog thugs dam dgyes skong ma// kro tI shwa rI dgyes pa'i yum// gsang ba yum gyi dbang bskur bas// shes rab yum gyi dbang thob shog/ dz+nyA na kro tI maN+Da la hUM a/ tshogs brgyad gnas gyur gau rI khro

mo brgyad// rig pa rtags kyi phyag mtshan so sor 'dzin// khro mo rol pa'i dbang bskur bas// gnyis med don gyi dbang thob shog/ ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha hUM a/ yul brgyad gnas su dag pas phra men tshul du
'dzin// 'gugs 'dren las kyis dpal gyi thugs dam skong// phra men thogs med dbang rnams thob par shog/ he he he he he he he he hUM a/ rtag chad gnas su dag pa'i rta gdong sgo ma bzhi/ so sor 'dul skal
rnam bzhi rdzogs mdzad pa'i// sgo ma bzhi yi dbang bskur bas// ye shes bzhi yi dbang thob shog/ ba ma ta yi hUM a/ khams gsum rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ma rungs 'dul// g.yas pa rdo rje'i gshog

pa brgyad du gdengs// g.yon pa rin chen gshog pa brgyad du gdengs// steng dang 'og dang bar bar na// rdo rje the'u gshog re res brgyan// steng ma gnyis ni rdo rje'i rgyu las byung// gshog pa'i dang ru rtse mchan

la// dbang gi sprul pa chen po ste// bya khyung 'bar ba'i skur bstan pas// de ring khyod la dbang bskur bas// klu gnyan 'dul ba'i dbang thob shog/ tsit+ta badzra ga ru Da a// 'bar ba'i gshog pa bzhi po la// dra
ba mo dang glog 'gyu ma// bar bar skabs na nyi ma stong gis brgyan// khams gsum rgyal dang mi g.yo mgon// khro mchog 'bar ba'i skur bstan nas// tshom bu 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal// rdzu 'phrul klu

rnams dbang du sdud// rdo rje gshog pa'i dbang bskur bas// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i dbang thob shog/ kro ta ba pa hi a/ 'og ma gnyis ni rin po che yi rgyu las byung// bar bar skabs su zla ba stong
gis brgyan// tshom bu gsang ba'i lha mo'i tshogs// dbang mchog de yi dbang bskur bas// bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thob shog/ khams gsum rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor lha tshogs mang po kun// skal

dang ldan la dbang bskur bas// kun las rgyal ba'i dbang thob shog/ kro d+ha hUM a/ hUM ngan song gnas rnams yongs su spyod mdzad pa// gzi brjid rgyal po khro mchog mang po'i tshogs// bde gshegs gtso mchog
dbang bskur bas// dug gsum nad rnams 'joms pa'i dbang thob shog/ oM AHhUM swAhA/ hUM rig pa tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor nas// mi dge bcu rnams gnas su tshar bcad nas// pha rol phyin pa'i dbang mchog

'di bskur bas// bgrod med sa la phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ kro d+ha sid+d+hi a/ hUM dpal gyi sku mchog gnyis med rol pa'i stabs// dur khrod chas brgyad gsang ba'i ngang du rol// dur khrod chen po'i dbang
mchog 'di bskur bas// ta na ga Na rol pa rtags chen dbang thob shog/ hUM kro ta hu lu hUM phaT/ hUM bde gshegs sku la dkyil 'khor dgu gsal bas// ye shes rigs 'dus gsang ba'i dbang dang ldan// dbang

chen dbang mchog de yi dbang bskur bas// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur thob par shog/ dz+nyA na d+harma maN+Dal hUM a/ hUM 'dod pas chags pas nyon mongs dug gsum rgyu// de dag 'dul phyir dka' thub rta yi
dbu// chags pa'i nad spangs sangs rgyas rigs kyi dbang// khyod la bskur bas thams cad 'joms pa'i dbang thob shog/ ga nA d+h+r-ika a a// nyon mongs gti mug gnas su dag bya'i
phyir// brtul zhugs gdug pa phag gi dbu// bde gshegs zhing khams bskyang ba dang// sra snyi med par 'joms pa'i dbang thob shog/ ba ra hi ba ra a/ nyon mongs nga rgyal zhe sdang gnas su dag

bya'i phyir// brtul zhugs khyi yi mgo can sprul pa'i mchog/ rin chen rigs kyi zhing khams bskyang ba dang// rgyas pa'i las kyis bdud dpung 'joms pa'i dbang thob shog/ ku ku rak+sha dz+nyA na gar+b+ha hUM a/ nyon
mongs phrag dog gnas su dag bya'i phyir// brtul zhugs bya yi mgo can sprul pa'i mchog/ las kyi rigs kyi zhing khams bskyang ba dang// brtul zhugs drag pos log 'dren 'joms pa'i dbang thob shog/ trag

rak+sha dz+nyA na karma hUM a/ mi mthun gnyen pos gzhom pa'i phyir// brtul zhugs bzhi yi dbang bskur bas// sa le de ni rgod pa dang// brtul zhugs dbang ni thob par shog/ tshogs brgyad gnas su dag nas mthun

pa'i sku ru sbyor// phra men ro sha stobs kyi pha rol phyin// gdug pa 'dul phyir spyang mo'i tshogs dang rol// 'gugs 'dren phra men dbang mchog thob par shog/ dza dza ma hUM/ nyon mongs dug gsum nad kyis

gdungs pa yi// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba dang// las kyi mtha' rnams grub par bya ba'i phyir// mkha' 'gro dmus long tshogs kyi dbang bskur bas// rgyab 'brel sum cu rtsa gnyis dbang thob shog/ li tsa li

dza hUM a/ mi 'jigs sku ni stobs dang ldan// gsung dang thugs ni phrin las mdzad// gser gyi seng ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad dbang bskur bas// bdud dpung 'joms pa'i dbang thob shog/ sing ha dzam b+ha la ka ra ma

ne hUM hUM// hUM ye shes dgu yi don ldan zhing// theg pa dgu yi bye brag tshul// mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig po// dbang mchog de yi dbang thob shog/ dz+nyA na sa ma ya a/ hUM de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i

yum// bkra shis dam pa'i mdzod 'dzin ma// gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i dbang bskur bas// pad+ma rigs kyi dbang dang dngos grub thob par shog/ ma ma a sha ni hUM sid+d+hi sid+d+hi a/ hUM dbang chen thugs kyi dkyil nas

ni// thugs las bkye ba'i pho nya mo// 'thon ni spyan gyi mthongs nas 'thon// phrin las brtul zhugs thogs pa med// rtsa khro ma mo bcu gsum yin// khros na rU tra nag po sgrol// sgrub pa po la dbang dang dngos

grub 'bebs// bdud kyi dpung rnams 'joms pa'i mthu mo che// ma mo rtsa khro de yi dbang bskur bas// stong phrag brgyad cu 'dul ba'i dbang thob shog/ ma ma khri mu karma hUM a/ hUM drag po'i las rnams byed pa'i
mchog/ gdan gyi ma mo chen mo ste// dbang gi zhabs kyi bar nas bton// khrag gi ma mo bco brgyad byung// las rnams thogs med byed pa'i mchog/ dbang mchog de yi dbang bskur bas// 'joms byed ma mo'i
dbang thob shog/ ma ma nr-i ma he hUM dza/ hUM dbu yi ral pa'i bar rtse nas// 'joms pa'i ma mo tsa ti ste// gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul ba// sprul pa'i ma mo'i dbang thob shog/ na mo saM hUM a/ ye

shes dbyings las grub pa mo// rigs mchog gsang ba 'dzin pa ste// ma mo de yi dbang bskur bas// phrin las 'gro don byed par shog/ ma ti ka laM dza/ las kyi sgo ma chen mo ni// dbyings nas grub par byed pa
mo// dbang mchog de yi dbang bskur bas// phrin las rgya mtsho byed par shog/ ka ra sha hUM a/ sku las sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// 'bum phrag g.yas kyi mkha' 'gro ma// 'bum phrag g.yon gyi mkha' 'gro
ma// mkha' 'gro mi bzad dbang bskur bas// rig pa mthu yi dbang thob shog/ A ra yi b+hi da ta ba hUM a/ zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste brgya dang gnyis
pa'o//// de nas mngon par shes pa bzhi'i dbang gsungs so// mngon shes dag dang ldan pa yi// mig ni rnam par dag pa ste// ra ri khal khol med pa dang// rnam dag kun tu mthong ba yi// mngon par shes

pa'i dbang thob shog/ a A ho// snyan ni mngon par shes pa ste// thams cad sgra dang gang de thos pa dang// bden pa gzhan myong thos pa'i dbang// rnam dag dbang ni thob par shog/ sku yi mngon shes bsam
yas te// bying ba med cing rmug pa med// gang la thogs pa med pa ste// mngon shes dbang ni thob par shog/ a thugs ni mngon shes ldan pa ste// pha rol gzhan gyi sems shes dang// sangs rgyas rnams

kyi thugs shes pa// thugs kyi mngon shes dbang thob shog/ tsit+ta a/ rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi dbang bskur bas// thogs rdug med pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub yan lag bdun gyi dbang bskur bas// rtsa ba byang
chub sems la 'dun par shog/ yan lag brgyad kyi dbang bskur bas// 'phags lam brgyad kyi dbang thob shog/ pha rol phyin bcu'i dbang bskur bas// ma spangs mya ngan 'das pa'i dbang thob shog/ gsung
rab yan lag bcu gnyis dbang bskur bas// gsung dbyangs dag pa sangs rgyas dbang thob shog/ bde gshegs zhal nas gsungs pa yi// ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos ni bco brgyad dbang// de ring khyod la

dbang bskur bas// mngon par sangs rgyas dbang thob shog/ byang chub phyogs ni bden pa'i chos// sum cu rtsa bdun dbang bskur bas// byang chub lam de ma gol bar// byang chub sems kyi dbang thob shog/ b+ho
d+hi tsit+ta sa ma ya a a/ zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gsung 'gag pa med pa'i dbang gi le'u ste brgya dang gsum pa'o//// de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang/ gsang ba'i dbang
mchog bskur ba ste// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// lhag pa byang chub sems kyi dbang// mtshan ldan de dang de la blang// sangs rgyas dam pa de yis ni// brjod par bya ba 'di dag
go/ gsang ba kun gyi spyod yul min// theg pa chen po'i rigs yin nam// dka' thub dka' spyad spyod nus sam// bstan na rtogs pa mi za'am// b+ha gar 'o byed mi rtog gam// gsang ba gzhan la mi spel
lam// des na da dung bshol bar byos// gal te theg pa'i snod yin na// bu yi rtog pa 'di ru smros// zhes so// de nas de ru smras pa ni// bdag ni theg pa chen po'i snod// dka' thub dka' spyod spyad par
'os// b+ha gar 'o byed mi rtog dang// gsang ba gzhan la bdag mi spel// de ring dam pa bdag la gsol// zhes smras so// de nas mnyam gzhag ting 'dzin des// thabs dang shes rab 'brel par

byed// dga' ba nyi shu rtsa gcig gzung// gtsang ma'i snod kyis dbang bskur ba'o// gzung thabs dang ni bskur thabs so// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi le'u
ste brgya dang bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes dpal rta'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho rta mchog dbang chen 'dus// dpag tu med pa'i tshe yi bdag/ tshe yi bdag las bdag nyan

'tshal// tshe yi bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// de nas dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med// de yi don ni bshad par bya tshe/ zhes bya ba srog la bya// srog ces bya ba

tshe la bya// de yi don dang ldan pa na// dbang dang dngos grub de ga yin// dbang la rnam pa gsum du bshad// tshe la rnam pa gsum du bshad// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bshad// tshe la rnam pa gsum yod

de// dang po rdzas la bsnyen pa yin// de nas phye ma bsgrub pa yin// de nas ril bu gong bu yin// de la tshe bsgrub bya ba ste// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dbye bar bya// dang po rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
bsnyen// de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dal du bsgrub// de nas rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor du// gong bur bsgrub cing dbang dang dngos grub blang// de nas dpal ldan rta yi rgyal po dgod// mtha' ma phyogs

bzhir sangs rgyas so// mtha' ma lha mo brgyad du bskor// sgo ba dag dang bcas pa'o// bum pa lnga'am dril ba gcig/ mngar dang bu ram sbrang rtsi dang// rtsi bcud mar dang 'bras bu dang// bkra shis pa yi rdzas
rnams dang// dkar po bum pa'i mgul chings la// le brgan kha bcad dril ba yin// 'brang rgyas lnga dang bcas pa bsham/ dang po so sor khrol bur bsgrub// gnyis pa la ni ril bu tshom bur bgo/ rigs
mthun dar gyis kha bcad do// gsum pa srang bcal ga 'ur dril// dang po srang dang tshad las bcad// bar chad bgegs rnams bzlog par bya// de ltar tshe dang 'brang rgyas dang// spyan gzigs
dngos grub zhal zas bskor// khrol bu phye ma gong bu bzhin// de la rtags kyi ltas kyang brtag/ dbral ba dang ni gzhom pa dang// dgug dang bstim dang bsrung bar bya// bskyed dang gnas dang bstim pa

yin// de ltar tshe yi lha rnams bsgrub// tshe mchog bdag po yab yum gsal// bskyed pa'i yi ge de bzhin bya// de nas las kyi gzhung btsug la// sngags kyi gzhug la A yu hUM dza ste/ bar du phebs dang tha mar

blang// oM A ro lig pyaM rA ga ra ti b+h+rUM badzra A yu She hUM aH/ hUM dbus phyogs rA ga dmar po'i gzhal yas su// rma bya bsnol ba'i gdan steng dang// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng du// bcom ldan tshe mchog snang mtha' tshe
dpag med// sku mdog dmar po rA ga'i 'od kyis mdzes// yum chen na bza' dkar mo gnyis// dbang mchog rol pa'i tshul du bzhugs// bcom ldan yab kyi thugs ka nas// rin chen tshe yi 'od du
'bar// mu tig dkar po lta bur 'dril// bcom ldan yum gyi mkha' dbyings nas// yum gyi tshe yi rang bzhin ni// rA ga dmar po'i 'od du 'khyil// dbang mchog dbu yi gtsug rum na// rta mchog zhur po'i nang

shed na// rin chen tshe yi za ma tog/ dar dkar 'od kyi yol du bres// gzer ni dngul gyi gzer du btab// nang na tshe yi 'od du 'bar// bcom ldan dbang gi rgyal po yang// tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las ni

mdzod// rtag tu bsgrubs pa'i tshe lags kyi// rdo rje'i tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ oM pu ru pu ru ha sa d+he ba ma hA pu N+ye pun+ya dz+nyA na yu ti dza/ shar phyogs zla gam gdengs pa nas// bcom ldan rnam par
snang mdzad kyang// tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ lho phyogs zla gam gdengs pa nas// bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan yang// tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ nub phyogs zla gam

gdengs pa nas// bcom ldan rdo rje mi bskyod pa// tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ byang phyogs zla gam gdengs pa nas// bcom ldan don yod grub pa yang// tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod

cig/ b+h+rUM badzra A yu She hUM dza/ zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gsang ba tshe bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgya dang lnga pa'o//// de nas bkra shis pa tshe'i lha mo bskul bar bya ste/ hUM gzhal yas gru yi
mchan la ni// tshe yi lha mo chen mo ste// shar phyogs gangs ri dkar po'i zhing khams nas// dkar mo mdzes ma 'od kyi sked chings can// na bza' dkar mo shel ltar dag/ g.yu 'od sngon po'i mtha' chag
can// phyag g.yas dar dkar g.yab tu dor// g.yon pa dung gi bum pa bsnams// bum pa tshe dang ye shes gtams// shar nas 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ oM la s+ye sa ma ya b+h+rUM dzaHA yu She hUM

aH/ hUM lho phyogs baiDUr+ya sngon po'i zhing khams nas// sngon mo mdzes ma 'od kyi mtha' chag can// na bza' sngon mo 'od du 'bar// mdzes pa gser gyi rgyan spras pa// g.yas pa dar gyi g.yab dor ma// g.yon pa

mthing gi bum pa bsnams// bum pa nges par tshe yis gtams// lho nas 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ A+oM mA li sa ma ya b+h+rUM badzra A She hUM aH/ hUM nub phyogs pad+ma rA ga'i zhing khams nas// dmar mo 'od kyi

mtha' chag can// rA ga 'od kyi na bza' gsol// mtha' ma gser g.yu'i 'od kyis mdzes// g.yas pa le brgan g.yab dor ma// g.yon pa byu ru'i bum pa bsnams// bum pa tshe dang ye shes gtams// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs

pa'i las mdzod cig/ A+oM gIr ti sa ma ya b+h+rUM badzra A yu She hUM aH/ byang phyogs in+d+ra ljang gu'i zhing khams nas// ljang gu mdzes ma 'od kyi mtha' chag can// na bza' ljang gu mdzes pa la// byu ru'i 'od kyis tshom bus brgyan// g.yas pa

ljang gu dar gyi g.yab dor ma// g.yon pa g.yu yi bum pa bsnams// bum pa nges par tshe yis gtams// byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ oM nirti sa ma ya b+h+rUM badza A yu Sha hUM aH/ tshe yi lha mo chen mo

bzhi// bskor zhing tshe 'gugs 'di skad gsungs// hUM nga ni lA s+ye dkar mo ste// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs dam skong// ma bskangs bar du sku mi rgya// nga ni mi yi tshe g.yang 'gugs// sgrub pa po la dngos grub

'bebs// sangs rgyas kun la dngos grub bslang// tshe nyams pa yang slar la 'gugs// hUM nga ni mA le sngon mo ste// rin chen 'byung ldan thugs dam skong// ma bskangs bar du sku mi rgya// bde gshegs rnams la

dngos grub bslang// sgrub pa po la dngos grub 'bebs// tshe dang ye shes 'bebs par byed// hUM ba ni girti dmar mo ste// snang ba mtha' yas thugs dam skong// ma bskangs bar du sku mi rgya// sangs rgyas rnams

la dngos grub bslang// sgrub pa po la mi tshe 'gugs// tshe dang ye shes las kyang byed// hUM nga ni nIrti ljang gu ste// don yod grub pa'i thugs dam skong// ma bskangs bar du sku mi rgya// bde gshegs rnams la
dngos grub bslang// tshe dang ye shes 'gugs par byed// bum pa tshe yis gtams par bya// ye shes 'od du bskyil bar bya// hUM 'gugs pa'i lha mo lcags kyu ma// dkar mo mdzes ma thugs rje'i lcags kyu

bsnams// dri za'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe dang ye shes 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ badzra aM ku sha b+h+rUM badzra A yu She hUM a dza/ lho yi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// phyag rgya'i lha mo zhags pa ma// sngon mo mdzes

ma zhags pa 'dzin// gshin rje'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ badzra pA sha hUM b+h+rUM/ badzra A yu She hUM a/ nub kyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// phyag rgya'i lha mo

lcags sgrog ma// dmar mo mdzes ma chen mo ste// klu dbang lag nas tshe drongs shig/ tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig badzra s+pho Ta baM b+h+rUM badzra A yu She hUM a/ byang gi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// ljang gu

mdzes ma dril bu bsnams// gnod sbyin lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ badzra g+haN+De ho b+h+rUM badzra A yu She hUM a/ hUM bdag cag phyag rgya'i lha mo bzhi// bde gshegs rnams
kyi thugs dam bskul// 'jug pa rnams kyi nyams chag skong// phrin las 'gro don chen po mdzad// zhing khams bde ba'i gnas nas bskyod// mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams sgrog/ ces pa'o// khrol bu phye mar

btag pa dang// phye ma ril bur dril ba dang// ga'u'i nang du stsal ba dang// tshad dang srang la gdab pa dang// phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab dang// le brgan dar gyis gril ba dang// bum pa lnga yi dbus gnas
dang// g.yab pa dang ni 'gugs pa dang// bskyed pa dang ni spel ba dang// brtan pa dang ni mi 'phrog dang// gnas pa dang ni grangs rten dang// dral dang gzhom dang 'gugs pa yin// de ltar gsal nas yang

'gugs shing// hUM pho brang dbus kyi lte ba la// byu ru rA ga dmar po'i gzhal yas na// zla gam kha sprod gzhal yas na// bcom ldan tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med// lha mo yum dang bcas pa ste// bde gshegs

rgyal ba kun gyis bskor// sangs rgyas zhing khams bde ba'i gnas// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba ste// phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa rnams// kun kyang dbang gi lha ru ste// byu ru'i bum pa re re bsnams// tshe dang ye
shes gtams pa ste// sangs rgyas tshe yang ga 'ur gsol// bkra shis tshe yang bum par gsol// bde gshegs ye shes bum pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlab mdzod// bde bar gshegs pas dbang

bskur mdzod// tshe dang ye shes lha mo ni// d+hU pe ma dang puSh+pe ma// A lo ke dang gan+d+he mas// 'byung ba lnga yi bcud bsdus la// deng 'dir dngos grub stsal du gsol// lha mo chen mo 'gugs pa mo// bde gshegs
rnams la mchod 'bul ma// rgyal ba rgya mtsho mnyes mdzad ma// thugs dam gnyen po skul byed ma// sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'bul ma// dngos grub ma lus 'bebs pa'i bdag/ bde gshegs thugs dam
rgyud bskul nas// mnyes pa'i mchod pa phul nas ni// mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub stsol// tshe dang ye shes dngos grub stsol// bum pa tshe yis gtams du gsol// tshe rnams ril bu thig ler dril// zhes
bskul lo// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ tshe skul ba'i le'u ste brgya dang drug pa'o//// bar chad bgegs rnams zhi bya'i phyir// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams kyang bcad// 'das pa'i ma mo

rnams kyang bskul// dgug dang bstim pa'i las kyang bya// hUM bcom ldan pad+ma he ru ka/ khro mchog thabs kyi sku mnga' ste// mdzes pa'i na bza' dmar po gsol// pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI ma// snying po tshe yi yi ge
a// yi ge a dmar 'od du 'bar// tshe yi rang bzhin gnas pa'i rten// A yu dmar po tshe yis gtams// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku yang mnga'// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gsung yang mnga'// mkha' dang mnyam

pa'i thugs kyang mnga'// sku tshe stsol cig ri bzhin brtan// gsung tshe snyan zhing grags dang ldan// thugs tshe gsal zhing mi ldog mkhyen// sku gsung thugs kyi tshe g.yang stsol// bcom ldan rigs kyi khro bo

bzhi// na bza' chas brgyad ldan par bskyed// bum pa tshe dang bcud kyis gtams// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// rigs kyi yum bzhi gsang ba'i yum// A yu tshe yi dngos grub stsol// phyogs bzhi lha

yi zhing khams na// gau rI la sogs khro mo brgyad// sku mdog dmar po 'od 'phro ma// phyag g.yas le brgan g.yab re bsnams// g.yon pa byu ru'i bum pa bsnams// thugs ka zla gam re re na// A yu tshe yi sa

bon re// tshe yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// sangs rgyas dag gi byin rlabs ni// 'dir stsol tshe dang ye shes stsol// phra men chen mo brgyad rnams kyang// g.yas pa g.yab la g.yon pa bum// sku mdog dmar po

rgyan dang ldan// A yu tshe yi dngos grub stsol// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kyang// tshe dang ye shes 'dir stsol cig/ sngo dang dkar dang dmar dang ser// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs kun// kun kyang rA

ga'i 'od du 'gyur// tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ A+oM A yu dz+nyA na bin du b+h+rUM/ tshe b+h+rUM/ nr-i b+h+rUM/ yu ti b+h+rUM/ a b+h+rUM/ de nas ril bu gong bu la// dril la dbang gi rang bzhin du// gcig pa lha yi dkyil
'khor du// rigs gcig tu ni dril ba dang// de la tshe dang ye shes dril// hUM bcom ldan dbang chen dbang gi bdag/ tshe yi bdag la dbang gi bdag/ tshe dang ye shes bdag po ste// gong bu gcig la thugs

kyi dkyil 'khor du/ mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje mo/ bslad pas mi 'gyur dag pa'i chos/ sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang ni gzigs par dka'/ phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab pas/ rgya de kun gyis shig mi 'gyur/ tshe

ni chos kyi dbyings la bzhag/ phyag rgya gsal ba'i rang bzhin bdun/ dang po chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ gnyis pa nus pa sngags kyi rgya/ gsum pa sku dang ye shes rgya/ bzhi pa ye shes bzhi yi rgya/ lnga pa rigs lnga'i ye

shes rgya/ drug pa rgyal ba spyi yi rgya/ bdun pa ye shes byang chub rgya/ de ltar rgyas btab byas nas ni/ yang ni rgya de dbye bar bya/ de nas dngos grub thob par blang/ de nyid don dang/ de yis lhag ma

dbyings su bstims/ de ltar byas na tshe 'grub pa'o/ rten pa'i tshe dang mi 'phrog pa/ de yang gnyis su shes par bya/ rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ rigs dang rgya dang 'go ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bdun

pa'o//// de nas yang dbang gi rgyal bos bka' stsal pa/ g.yas g.yon phyag ni gdengs pa na/ gnon pa'i tshul du bya pa ni/ dbang chen nyid kyi phyag rgya yin/ srin lag gnyis dang mthe bong bsnol/ mdzub mo

mthe'u chung bsgreng ba ste/ gung mo sbyar la dbus su bsgreng/ de ni rta mgrin phyag rgya yin/ sor mo bcu po bsnol byas nas/ rtse lnga gnas su bsgreng ba ni/ rigs lnga spyi yi phyag rgya yin/ g.yas g.yon phyag ni dbus
su bsnol/ lus ni mi 'gyur drang bzhag nas/ mi g.yo ba yi tshul bzhag na/ ye shes sems dpa'i phyag rgya yin/ g.yas g.yon sor mo gnam la bsgreng/ brdeg pa'i tshul du byas na ni/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag

rgya yin/ sor mo lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol byas nas/ gshog pa'i tshul du byas pa ni/ khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yin/ mdzub gnyis hU~M gi rgya bcings pa/ hU~M mdzad chen po'i phyag rgya yin/ brkyang bskum
bgrad par gnas pa la/ g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs pa dang/ g.yon pa brdeg pa'i tshul bcas pa/ dur khrod chen po'i phyag rgya yin/ sor mo bcu po dam bsnol nas/ rigs drug lam ni dgag pa'i tshul/ ngan

song sbyong ba'i phyag rgya yin/ mtheb mo gnyis po dam bsnol nas/ brgyad po gyen la gdengs pa ni/ rigs 'dus lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya yin/ phyag rgya re la yi ge re/ yi ge re la 'od 'phro ba/ sngags dang

phyag rgya 'debs par grags/ gzhan yang 'jo tshul stangs stabs dang/ gar bsgyur ba dang gar byed pa/ phyag rgya'i mchod pa yin par bshad/ ces gsungs so/ rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sngags dang phyag rgya

spros pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes/ dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ e ma ho/ sangs rgyas kun 'dus rgyal po che/ rta zhes bya ba ji ltar lags/ mchog ces bya ba gang la
bgyi/ rol ba zhes pa gang la bgyi/ tan+t+ra zhes bya ba ji ltar lags/ kun 'dus rgyal pos bka' stsol cig kun 'dus mchog las bdag nyan 'tshal/ zhes gsol to/ dbang chen 'dus pas bka' stsal pa/

sprul sku phyag na rdo rje nyon/ rta zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa/ rta ni sems kyi rta pho la/ thams cad mkhyen pas mchog ces bya/ 'das dang ma 'das gnyis ka yin/ sems dang phyi mo gnyis med yin/ thams cad khro
bo'i rang bzhin yin/ thams cad zhi ba'i rang bzhin yin/ thams cad gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yin/ thams cad gnyis med rang bzhin yin/ kun kyang yin la gang yang min/ de phyir bshad par
dka' ba yin/ rol pa zhes pa bde gshegs kyi/ dgongs pa yin par rgyal pas gsungs/ chos nyid la yang chos nyid rol/ de phyir rol pa zhes su grags/ tan+t+ra zhes pa rgyud la ste/ bde gshegs dgongs pas
brgyud pa'o/ zhes gsungs so/ de nas yang gsol pa// kye ma dbang chen kun 'dus che// pad+ma zhes pa ji ltar lags// rigs zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags// zhing khams bgyi ba gang la bgyi// de yis don de
bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang chen 'dus pas bka' stsal pa// pad+ma zhes su grags pa ni// skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma ste// byang chub sems la bshad pa yin// gos pa med pas pad+ma ste// nam mkha'

dpe la bzhag pa yin// 'gyur ba med pas pad+ma ste// de yang nam mkha'i dpe la bzhag/ byas pas gos pa med pa ste// rin chen gser gyi dpe bzhin la// mdzes pas pad+mar byung ba ste// rin po che yi dpe la

bzhag/ gsal la dngos po med pa ste// me long bzhin gyi dpe la'o// de phyir pad+ma zhes su grags// rigs zhes bya bar bstan pa ni// dang po de las byung ba dang// bar du de yi bya ba byed// tha ma de yi rgyud

'dzin phyir// des na rigs zhes bya ba yin// zhing khams zhes ni bya ba'i don// snang ba mtha' yas zhing khams te// snang ba sems kyi snang ba yin// zhing ni ma rtogs chos nyid ngang du bsgral bas zhing// nyon
mongs rtsad bcad khams la bya// pad+ma kun 'dus rgyal po la// rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas la sogs te// kun gyis bskor bas pad+ma rigs kyi zhing khams yin// gsung rnam par dag pas snang ba mtha' yas/
bde gshegs gcig bsgom rgyal ba kun gyi ngang/ de ltar gsal bar zung zhig/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang ni bka' stsal pa// thugs las rgyal ba yab lnga yin// 'byung ba lnga las yum lnga byung// rnam par

shes pa'i tshogs brgyad las// de las byang chub sems dpa' brgyad// yul las sems ma brgyad du byung// gnas gyur khro mo brgyad dang phra men brgyad// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad las// ye shes kyi ni

khyi brgyad byung// rbad dang pho nyar bya ba dang// kun gyi gnyen por byung ba yin// kun gzhi 'od kyi thig le las// rta yi brtul zhugs byung ba yin// gti mug 'od kyi thig le las// phag gi brtul zhugs byung
ba yin// 'dod chags khrag gi thig le las// bya yi brtul zhugs byung ba yin// nga rgyal dag gi thig le las// khyi yi brtul zhugs byung ba yin// brtul zhugs chen po bzhi po 'dis// thams cad 'joms shing
dbang du sdud// sangs rgyas bde gshegs thugs dam skong// zhing khams yongs su dag pa'o// 'di ni brtul zhugs chen po yin// dmus long sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi sprul pa
yin// da ni las rnams byed pa'i mchog/ ma mo rnams ni rtsa dang thig le'o// de ltar gsal na las rnams thams cad gsal ba yin// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las// zhu lan dpe don dang
sprul pa 'phros pa'i le'u ste brgya dang dgu pa'o//// de nas dbang chen 'dus pa chen pos bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs nyon// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// dbus su pho brang zlum por
bskor// mtha' ma 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa// gru chad gru bzhi sgo dang bcas// mtha' ma me ris bskor ba ste// dbang chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro// dbus ni zla gam sgo gcig pa// tha ma pad+ma 'dab ma

brgyad// gru chad gru bzhi sgo btod pa// de mtha' gru bzhir byas pa ni// dbang chen gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro// dbus ni zlum po dang ldan pa// mtha' ma re cha dgur gsal ba// gru bzhi sgo dang khyud ldan
pa// dbang chen sku yi dkyil 'khor ro// gru bzhi lhan pa'i dkyil 'khor la// mtha' ma rin chen 'bur dod pa// de mtha' gru bzhi sgo dang bcas// dbang chen yon tan dkyil 'khor ro// dbus ni gru bzhi lham
pa la// grwa la zla gam re re bcad// zhal bzhi phyi la btod pa ni// dbang chen 'phrin las dkyil 'khor ro// dbus ni zla gam gru gsum la// tha ma zla gam bzhis bskor ba// dbang chen brtul zhugs dkyil
'khor ro// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lhag pa la// dbus su zla gam sgo sprod bya// tha ma gru gsum brgyad kyis bskor// gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa ni// khyi brgyad dkyil 'khor bstan pa yin// dbus ni gru gsum

'bar ba la// mtha' ma 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// rtsibs re'i nang du zla gam re// dbus su dbang chen 'dus pa ste// zla gam re la spyang mo re// gru chad gru bzhi sgo dang bcas// de ltar gsal ba'i dkyil

'khor ni// spyang brgyad dkyil 'khor bstan pa yin// dbus ni zlum po pho brang bcas// de yi phyi rim dag la ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni ldan pa la// tshom bu lnga ru bshad pa la// dbus ni dbang gi rgyal po

yin// shar gyi pho brang dag la ni// de la 'khor lo brgyad du bya// lho ru 'khor lo brgyad du bya// de bzhin nub dang byang la brgyad brgyad bya// tshom bu bzhi la 'khor lo rtsibs ni sum cu gnyis// de la long ba re

re dgod// sgo ba khro bo bzhi yis bya// dmus long gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// dbus su zlum po bskor ba la// tha ma rtsibs brgyad ldan pa dang// gru bzhi sgo dang sgo khyud ldan// gsang ba yum bzhi sprul pa
brgyad// de la bkod pa sgrub pa ste// yum bzhi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// khrag gi zla gam bco brgyad bya// khrag gi ma mo'i dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil

'khor gru gsum 'bar ba la// tha ma pad+ma zla gam bcu gsum bya// sgo dang sgo khyud bcas pa ste// dbus su dbang gi rgyal po dgod// zla gam re la rtsa khro ma mo re// sgo ba dang bcas de bzhin no// de ni rtsa khro ma

mo'i dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// 'khor lo rtsibs ni drug pa bya// dbus su zla gam re re bya// dbus su dbang gi rgyal po ste// zla gam re la kham rgya re// sgo ba dang bcas bkod pa

ni// kham rgya drug gi dkyil 'khor ro// gru bzhi lham pa'i dkyil 'khor la// dbus su zlum po tshom bu dang// tha ma zla gam drug bskor ba// go la drug gi dkyil 'khor yin// dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// tha
ma rin chen 'bar ba brgyad// sgo dang sgo khyud bcas pa ni// rgyal mo dza ti dkyil 'khor yin// thig bzhi btab pa'i re cha dgu// tha ma 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gsum// sgeg mo ral gcig dkyil 'khor
yin// dbus su zla gam 'bur ba la// phyogs bzhi gru gsum bzhi byas pa// mgo brtsegs khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor de rnams bstan pa ni// dmigs kyi dkyil 'khor bcu bdun yin// gong
gi dkyil 'khor dgu po ni// rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa yin// bdud rtsi chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang// dbang dang tshe la sogs pa yi// rtsal gyi dkyil 'khor brgyad cu yin// zhes gsungs so// dkyil

'khor de yi rim pa la// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// de bzhin rim par bgrang bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor sa gzhi brtag pa dang// las dang bya bas sbyang ba dang// ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang ba dang// ro lnga

bsal dang brtag par bya// ga dar dang ni byi dor dag/ chag chag dang ni thig gdab dang// tshon rnams byin brlabs bri ba yin// dge ba'i rim pa ma nor bya// pho brang nas ni dmar po dgye// de ltar rim par

ldan par bya// sku'am gsung dang phyag rgya thugs// de la bkod la rim pas dgod// de la gnyis med bstim par bya// de ltar las rnams rdzogs par bya// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dkyil 'khor spros pa'i
le'u ste brgya dang bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po des/ mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so// yang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// dman pa

rnams ni don dang 'phrad pa'i phyir// rgyan gyi dbang rnams bskur bar bya// bdud dang srin po dregs pa thams cad dang// gdug pa'i nad dang gcan gzan khro bo dang// 'byung po ma rungs gza' dang byad stems
dang// gdon dang ma mo sha za mkha' 'gro ma// zil gyis mnan cing mi tshugs bya ba'i phyir// gdug pa 'dul rtags rta mgo lngas dbang bskur// dbang gi rta mgo phrin las mgyogs pa'i

mthu// ye shes myur mgyogs shes par pha rol phyin// don las ma nyams gdug pa so sor 'dul// bdud dang srin po klu gnyan tshar bcad nas// ye shes chen po'i ngang du sbyor byed pa// rta mgo lnga yis dbang

bskur bas// thams cad dbang du bsdu ba'i dbang thob shog/ oM dz+nyA na hri ba ya kro bi sha ha ne hUM sum b+ha hUM a/ chos longs sprul sku'i dbang bskur mtshon pa'i phyir// thod pa tshar gsum gyis dbang bskur bar bya

ste// hUM dung chen rang bzhin sgyu ma'i khong seng la// yul drug dbang po stong gi rgyan du che// dkar la 'tsher bas sangs rgyas kun dang sbyor// chos kyi sku las ma g.yos dkar ba ste// sangs rgyas rtags chen skam

po ra ri ni// skal ldan khyod la de ring dbang bskur bas// skye med chos sku'i dbang gi thob par shog/ d+harmA d+hA tu A/ ra ri longs sku mtshon pa'i rtags// 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// de bzhin sangs rgyas

longs skur ldan// rdzogs pa'i rtags kyis dbang bskur bas// rdzogs nas 'gro don byed par shog/ d+harma ta ka na ma a hUM/ ji ltar mthun pas 'dul ba yi// so so rang rang las skal 'du// sprul sku 'bar bas

dbang bskur bas// mi 'jigs pa yi sku thob nas// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dbang thob shog/ d+harmA d+hA tu ma ga ta ya A hUM/ da ni rgyan gyi sbrul gyi dbang bskur bar bya ste/ hUM sbrul chen gdengs ka dpal gyi rgyan du

che// sku la rgyan du mdzes pa yab yum gnyis ka'i rgyan// klu rgyal 'bum gyis dbang gi sgo srung ste// bkra shis g.yung drung rgya las mi stongs par// sbrul chen brgyad kyi dbang bskur thob par shog/ na ya ha hUM
a/ thabs la mkhas pa'i ting 'dzin rol pa'i rtags// rno gdug zhen pa bzlog pa bdud kyi dpung bzhi 'joms// rgyal ba'i rtags su na bza' chen po gsol// 'jigs pa med pa'i rtags su rdo rje'i go ru
gtams// rdo rje go chas dbang bskur bas// cis kyang mi shigs dbang thob shog/ badzra ling ka ye hUM/ da ni gsung dag pa zhing lpags kyi dbang bskur te// gsung mchog thabs dang ldan pa'i rtags mtshon

pa// gsung rab yan lag don la ma nyams brdas mtshon nas// brjid chen zhing lpags dbang bskur bas// thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ baM tIk+Sh+Na maN+Da la a/ da ni glang chen pags pas dbang

bskur te// bde ba chen po'i sku mtshon phy-ir// brjid chen dbang sdud stobs dang ldan// sku yi phrin las rdzogs pa'i phyir// glang gi pags pas dbang bskur bas// stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ ha
ti baM ba sha hUM phaT/ de nas stag gi pags pas dbang bskur te// gdug la so sor ma lus 'dul ba yi// dpa' bar 'gro ba na bza' rgyan gyis bklubs// drag po'i las kyis ma lus 'joms pa

yi// stag gi pags pas dbang bskur bas// smon lam pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ baM ti byA gri ka bi ha hUM phaT/ da ni bse khrab smug pos dbang bskur ba// sra mkhregs rol pa'i rdzu 'phrul mnga' brnyes

pa// na bza' brjid 'bar rol ba sku yi rgyan du che// bse khrab smug po'i dbang gi bskur byas pas// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ he da re pa sha hUM/ rno gdug zlog byed lcags kyi dbang bskur
bas// 'bum bye sngon mo lcags kyi khrab// mi shigs mtshon gyis de la min// 'bum bye 'di yi dbang bskur bas// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ rat+na bu ne hUM/ de nas gzig lpags kyis
dbang bskur bar bya ste/ don phyir chags dang chags gzhan 'joms// gdug pa ma lus rtsar gcad phyir// gcan gzan rgyal po gtum pa gzig gi rgyal// rtags kyi thig le 'di yi dbang bskur bas// sbyin

pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ ba ra ni ra sa ya// de nas dar gyi rgyan gyis dbang bskur bar bya ste/ hUM mthing nag le brgan shu ken dar gyi rgyan// chos sku 'gyur med shes bya thogs med pa'i// mthing

nag le brgan dar gyi dbang bskur bas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ pra dz+nyA d+har ma d+hA tu A/ zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rgyan dang na bzas dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste brgya
dang bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang ston pas dbang bskur ba'i las 'di bka' stsal to// byang chub sems kyi pha rol phyin pa bcu'i dbang bskur ba/ mthar thug pa gsang ba byang chub sems kyi dbang
bskur ba/ sems bskyed sngon du 'gro ba pha rol phyin bcu'i dbang bskur ba dang gsum mo// mthar thug byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba ni// byang sems yab yum brdas bskul ba// bde ba skye ba'i bar ni

ma chad pa// 'dren dang bskul dang dga' ba nyi shu gcig/ sa yi don dang ldan pa'i dus// 'phrul gyis phyi ma blangs pa'i tshe// de la sbyin dang bskyed byas la// sbyin dkar gnyis med bgrod don dbang// nges par
ldan pas gsal byas la// gsal ba'i bskul ba 'di brjod na// nges pa'i don dang phrad par nges// nges par ldan pas gsal byas la// de bzhin gshegs kun ngo bor gyur// ring ba ma yin nye ba min// de la

gsal dbang 'di yis bskur// byang sems chos kyi sbyin pa gtong// de la rdzogs pas mthar thug gsal// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni tshul khrims ldan// tshul dang khrims
ni 'bras bu gnas// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni bzod pa'i dbang// sems kyi ngo bor kun kyang bzod// bzod pa sems kyi ngang la gnas// bzod pa'i

pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni brtson 'grus che// brtson la 'grus pa ye shes che// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni bsam pa gtan// bsam med ngang
la gnas te pha rol phyin// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni shes rab che// shes rab ye shes gting dpag don// gnyis med rol pa bde ba'i mchog/ shes rab pha rol phyin

pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni stobs po che// mi 'gyur chos nyid dag pa la// rtog med rtogs pa de nyid stobs dang ldan// stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ thabs dang shes rab 'brel
bas na// shes rab sngon du thabs song nas// byang chub sems ni thabs kyi don mthong ba// thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni smon pa'i lam// smon lam dag pa chos nyid

don// smon lam pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni snying rje che// snying rje'i lam mchog chos nyid don// snying rje pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ ma bgrod lam la pha rol phyin// ci la ma

g.yos thams cad snang// pha rol phyin bcu ye shes dbang thob shog/ b+ho d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha a a a hUM/ rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gsang ba shes rab ye shes kyi byang chub sems pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i

dbang gi le'u ste brgya dang bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma dbang chen kun 'dus che// dbang gi rgyal po dbang rgyal
che// dbang gi don rnams de ltar na// rdzogs pa'i dbang rnams bdag nyan 'tshal// kun 'dus rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// de nas dbang gi rgyal po des// gsol ba'i don thugs su chud nas/

'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spobs pa phyag na rdo rje nyon// rdzogs pa'i dbang rnams bshad par bya// dbang gi grangs ni de bzhin te// rdzogs pa'i dbang zhes bya ba ni// ye shes lnga yi dbang yin te// lnga la

ma 'dus gcig kyang med// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas lnga yang de nyid do// 'og min gnas kyang de nyid do// chos kyi sku yang de nyid do// bde gshegs kun bzang de nyid do// hUM byang chub

sems la g.yos pa med// gsal la dag pa chos kyi sku// snang la rang bzhin med pa ste// me long ye shes dbang thob shog/ chos rnams stong pa'i ngo bo la// ngang las ma g.yos ye shes mthong// stong pa gsal ba
