chos kyi sku// stong nyid ye shes dbang thob shog/ stong dang gsal bar snang ba dang// gnyis med ngang la gnas pa kun// ji ltar snang yang sems dang mnyam// mnyam nyid ye shes dbang thob
shog/ chos nyid ma g.yos dbu ma ste// mkhas rigs rnams ni so sor rtog/ gsal la ma 'dres byang chub sems nyid dang// sor rtog ye shes dbang thob shog/ chos rnams so sor gang bstan kyang// mnyam

nyid ngang la gnas pa yis// bya rtsol thams cad bsam med ngang du 'dus// bya ba nan tan ye shes dbang// de ltar ye shes rnam lnga'i dbang bskur bas// ye shes lnga yi dbang thob shog/ dbang rnams thams
cad der 'dus te// dus gsum bde gshegs kun gyi dbang// des dbang thams cad rdzogs pa yin// de ltar dbang bskur 'bras bu 'thob// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ ye shes lnga yi
dbang bskur ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal po kun 'dus des/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas chen po// sprul pa phyag na rdo rje

nyon// tshe dang dbang dang dngos grub ni// bar chod bgegs kyi glags med pas// de ma thag tu blang bar bya'o// tshe dang ye shes dngos grub rten// phun sum tshogs par bkram pa la// sid+d+hi dngos grub blang bar

bya'o// hUM sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs bsgrag pa yi// gsung mchog pad+ma rigs kyi dngos grub rnams// da ni blang ba'i dus la bab// bsnyen pa'i grangs kyang deng tshang ngo// sgrub pa'i dus kyang deng yol
lo// rigs mchog gsang ba'i lha rnams kyis// dngos grub mchog ni stsal re ran// dngos grub dam pa 'dir stsol cig/ bcom ldan dbang gi zhing khams na// zla gam gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// gsung
dbyangs snyan pa'i sangs rgyas dang// thugs rje'i byams mgon skyabs dag gis// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub stsol// 'gag med ye shes sgras mtshan pas// gsung

mchog pad+ma rigs kyi dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas sku yi dngos grub stsol// rnam par snang mdzad sku yi mchog/ rnam dag sku yi dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// rdo rje sems
dpa' thugs kyi mchog/ thugs kyi dngos grub 'dir stsol cig/ sangs rgyas yon tan dngos grub stsol// rin chen 'byung ldan yon tan mchog/ yon tan dngos grub stsal du gsol// sangs rgyas phrin las dngos
grub stsol// don yod grub pa phrin las mchog/ phrin las dngos grub stsal du gsol// rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bo nyid// bcom ldan dbang chen rgyal ba'i mchog/ rigs chen gsang ba'i bdag po ni// rigs bsdus
gsang chen 'dus pa yis// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// chos sku gsal la rtog med dngos grub stsol// hUM bde gshegs rgyal ba ma lus te// chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las skye ba med pa

las// skye ba gzugs sku phyag rgya chen por bzhug pa yi// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor yang// tshe dang ye shes dngos grub stsol// ye shes dbyings las 'bar ba'i skur bstan pa// rta mgrin rgyal po 'khor
bcas kyang// tshe dang ye shes tshogs pa'i dngos grub stsol// rigs pa thugs kyi gzhal yas su// nyi zla 'od kyi gdan steng na// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i gnas// 'phro 'du dgongs pa tshang lags

kyi// 'bum phrag ting 'dzin spyod pa'i dngos grub stsol// thugs mchog zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// 'bar ba'i cha lugs bzhugs pa ste// khrag 'thung rol pa'i phyag rgya 'bar ba'i tshogs// 'gro ba 'dul

ba'i lha dang lha mo'i tshogs// khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas zhi ba'i dngos grub stsol// tshe dang ye shes byang chub mchog gi dngos grub stsol// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun btul nas// bdud las
rgyal ba'i rgyal thabs bdud rtsi bsnams// mthu byin longs spyod dngos grub stsal du gsol// ngan song gnas rnams ma lus btul nas kyang// byang chub bde ba'i gnas la 'god mdzad pa// gnyis med bde
ba'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// dur khrod 'bar ba'i chas dang rab ldan pas// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor gdug pa 'dul// rig pa mthu yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// byang chub sems ni rig pa'i

gnas// hUM mdzad chas ldan dur khrod brgyad dang ldan// khrag 'thung rol pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// bka' yi pho nya thogs med gdug pa 'dul ba'i tshogs// myur mgyogs longs spyod dngos grub stsal du

gsol// ye shes bzhi las gdug pa'i sku sprul nas// phrin las rgya mtsho 'gro don mtha' ru phyin// rig pa'i brtul zhugs nyon mongs tha ba 'joms// rdzu 'phrul drag pos gang la de yi phrin las ston// don las
mi nyams byang chub snying por gnas// de ring brtul zhugs mthu yi dngos grub stsol// dbyings las 'bar ba'i skur bstan nas// mkha' 'gro mi bzad las kyi mtha' sdud pa// ci 'dod phun sum tshogs pa'i

dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye shes dbyings las bskyed pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// thugs kyi phrin las sna tshogs mi dmigs kyang// gdug pa 'dul phyir ma mo'i sku sprul nas// phrin las myur mgyogs pho nya mang po

'gugs// mthu dang rtsal gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// las las grub dang ma mo mkha' 'gro dang// 'jig rten nor dang longs spyod dang// tshe ring nad med bde skyid phun sum tshogs// gang la des 'dul tshe
yi dngos grub stsol// dag pa byang chub dngos grub thob// dgos pa gang la gang 'dod pa// nor bu rin chen dpe bzhin dngos grub stsol// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi lha rnams la
dngos grub slong ba'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dbang gi rgyal po kun 'dus kyis/ dbang gi lha rnams la/ skong ba'i las nyams chag bshags pa dang/ bskang ba 'di gsungs

so// 'dab chags kyi bya dmar sgro dang/ shel smug tshom kham dang/ de yis thugs dam bskang ba ste// nyams pa chag pa bskang ba dang/ dngos grub dam pa 'thob par 'gyur// rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i bdud
rtsi dang// rdo rje'i mda' ma phog pa'i mngal khrag dang// thig le zags pa'i khrag chan dang// sha khrag sbyar ba'i gtor ma dang// rgyu mchog dang ni mkha' lding dang// 'di yis thugs dam bskangs byas
pas// pad+ma rigs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ 'di yi yid dang kun gzhi yis// dbang chen yab yum thugs dam bskang// 'di yis gsang ba'i sbubs khrag gis// rta mgrin rgyal po'i thugs dam
bskang// 'di yi rtog tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis// rdo rje dbyings kyi thugs dam bskang// 'di yi gzugs kyi phung po yis// rnam par snang mdzad thugs dam bskang// 'di yi tshor ba'i phung po yis// rin chen
'byung gnas thugs dam bskang// 'di yi 'du shes phung po yis// snang ba mtha' yas thugs dam bskang// 'di yi 'du byed phung po yis// don yod grub pa'i thugs dam bskang// 'di yi rnam shes phung po

yis// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs dam bskang// 'di yi 'byung ba lnga rnams kyis// sangs rgyas yum lnga'i thugs dam bskang// 'di yi rnam shes tshogs brgyad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi thugs dam
bskang// 'di yi rnam shes yul brgyad kyis// sems ma brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang// 'di yi yid dang chos rnams kyis// kun bzang yab yum thugs dam bskang// 'di yi nyon mongs drug rnams
kyis// bcom ldan thub drug thugs dam bskang// 'di yi rtag chad bzhi rnams kyis// sgo ba yab yum thugs dam bskang// 'di yi 'od phung lnga po yis// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs dam bskang// 'di yi phung

lnga gnas gyur pas// khrag 'thung he ru lnga yi thugs dam bskang// 'di yi 'byung lnga gnas gyur pas// khrag 'thung yum lnga'i thugs dam bskang// 'di yi rnam shes tshogs brgyad gnas gyur pas// gau rI khro mo
brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang// 'di yi yul brgyad gnas gyur pas// sing ha phra men brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang// 'di yi rtag chad bzhi po gnas gyur pas// sgo ma bzhi yi thugs dam bskang// 'di yi
gzhung bu nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// gser gyi seng ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad thugs dam bskang// 'di yi rtsib ma g.yas g.yon gyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor thugs dam bskang// 'di yi gshog pa
g.yas g.yon gyis// khams gsum rnam rgyal thugs dam bskang// 'di yi mdangs chen bzhi po yis// gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i thugs dam bskang// 'di yi rtsa sgo rngubs chen gyis// dur khrod hUM mdzad chen

po'i thugs dam bskang// 'di yi lte ba sprul pa yis// ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor thugs dam bskang// 'di yi nang khrol sha khrag gis// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor thugs dam bskang// 'di yi bcud
ni bzhi po yis// brtul zhugs bzhi yi thugs dam bskang// 'di yi khrag bcud snying mchin gyis// rta yi brtul zhugs thugs dam bskang// 'di yi bcud rus rkang tshil gyis// khyi yi brtul zhugs thugs dam
bskang// 'di yi sems bcud klad pa yis// bya yi brtul zhugs thugs dam bskang// 'di yi sha bcud tshil bu yis// phag gi brtul zhugs thugs dam bskang// 'di yi nang khrol smad lnga yis// spyang mo brgyad
kyi thugs dam bskang// 'di yi mkhar bu brtsigs pa yis// long ba rgyab 'brel sum cu rtsa gnyis thugs dam bskang// 'di yi khrag mtsho dngas ma yis// mkha' 'gro ma tshogs thugs dam bskang// 'di yi yan
lag sde bzhi yis// mgo brtsegs khro bo'i thugs dam bskang// 'di yi dngas ma 'od chen dang// 'di yi tsit+ta srog sbug gis// rtsa khro ma mo bcu gsum thugs dam bskang// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol

pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi lha rnams thugs dam skong ba'i le'u ste brgya dang bco lnga pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ de nas dbang gi phur pa bshad par bya// yang dag sems kyi phur pa
de// gzhan du gdab pa'i gnas med pa// rang rig byang chub sems la gdab// byang chub sems kyi phur pa de// sems can ma lus dag la gdab// thabs kyi rdo rje phur pa de// b+ha ga yangs pa'i dkyil du

gdab// thugs las bskyed pa'i phur pa de// mtshan ma rdzas la brten te gdab// rU tra nag po'i snying la gdab// phur pa bskyed pa'i rim pa ni// rin chen byu ru'i phur pa de// stod ni khro bo'i rang bzhin la// dbu
la rta mgo ljang gu 'bar// smad ni zla gam dmar po ste// dbu la rigs lnga rta mgo la// khong stod dbang chen der gsal dang// phyag ni 'gro 'dul lha ru gsal// g.yas g.yon khams gsum rgyal por
bskyed// hUM mdzad dur khrod smad brgyan pa// phyag kyang zla gam phur pa 'dril// dug gsum gcad cing gsad pa dang// khams gsum gdar sha gcad pa'i phyir// phur pa gzi brjid bskyed cing gdab// gsal
ba gsum dang ldan par bya// dug lnga'i rtsa ba khrag yin pas// khrag ni 'dod chags chen po ste// 'dod chags rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// dbang gi phur pas gdab par bya// thugs kyi sprul pa he ru

bzhi// gsal bar bskyed cing gdab pa'o// dug lnga rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// sprul pa he ru bzhis kyang gdab// bsgral nas gdab dang slar gso ba'o// oM pad+ma kI la ya/ a mo kI la ya/ tsa tsa ma ma kI li kI

la ya/ sa ma ya tsit+ta la phaT rbad ya/ de yis thams cad sgrol bar 'gyur// lha dang klu yang de dang 'dra// de yi las kyis thams cad dbang du bsdus shing bsgral bar bstan pa'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/
dbang gi phur pa gdab cing las bya ba'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu drug pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal po des// sbyin sreg las rnams bstan pa ste// de nas yang ni bka' stsal pa// bsod nams tshogs ni
bsags pa dang// yang na dmigs pa gtan bcol las// de yi las su sbyin sreg bya// rigs bzhi yan lag shes pa des// me yi thab ni brtsig par bya// me thab bya ba'i las rim ni// zla gam gdengs pa'i

dkyil 'khor bya// de mtha' zlum por bskor ba'o// de mtha' gru gsum dag tu bya// tha ma gru bzhi lham par bya// rgya shug dkar po tsher ma can// de yi nang ni brdzangs pa la// de ru rdzas sna bzhi po dang// dbang

gi rdzas rnams bsog pa ste// dmigs pa brtan zhing las bya na// dbang drag rdzas ni ling+gar bsreg/ bsod nams tshogs su bya ba na// 'bras dkar chan dang tsan+dan dang// zho dang mar khu mar bcud dang// 'o ma

khre dang bcas pa ni// sbyin sreg bya ba'i lha la 'bul// bstod dang smon lam gdab par bya// de yi las rim sbyar bas shis// bya thabs dang ni tshigs rnams dang// sngags dang phyag rgya swA hA shAn ting

ngo// dmigs pa sgrol na dbang dang bam// mA ra ya khA hi raM dang bcas pa yin// de dang ldan par bsags nas su// ting 'dzin ldan pas sbyin sreg bya// hUM/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur

gshegs 'byung ba che// me lha'i rgyal po drang srong che// 'dir gshegs bsreg blug mchod pa bzhes// dbang gi phrin las 'grub par mdzod// baM ni ba ta de ba shAn ting ku ru shrI dza dza/ lha rdzas bzang po'i mchod pa
'di dag la// byin gyis brlabs te dbul lags na// thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol// phyi mchod dag pa rnam lnga ste// gtsang mar sbyar te 'bul lags kyi// thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su

gsol// bzhes nas de ring dgyes par mdzod// d+hU pe puSh+pe A lo ke gan d+he/ 'bras bu sman sbyar dag pa'i rdzas// dbang gi lha rnams mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// rdzu 'phrul dad pas 'bul lags na// thugs
rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol// a su de dan da pU tsa ya hUM/ dkar gsum mngar dang dag pa'i rdzas// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs nas// dad pas 'bul gyis bzhes su
gsol// bzhes nas phrin las 'grub par mdzod// a 'bra ba ling shAn ting ku ru swA hA/ hUM zla gam gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bcom ldan dbang chen kun 'dus la// dag pa'i sbyin sreg mchod pa
'bul// phrin las dam pa 'grub par mdzod// shrI pA baM ni sa ga na swA hA/ hom lnga 'brel ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gdug pa ma lus bsgral ba dang// byang chub lam la dgod pa'i phyir// sbyin sreg 'bar ba'i
mchod pa 'di// rta mgrin khro bo'i sku la mchod par 'bul// dmigs bya che ge kha raM khA hi// ho/ tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor du// bde gshegs rigs lnga yab yum sras 'khor bcas// dag pa'i mchod pa 'di

'bul gyi// phrin las bsgrub phyir bzhes su gsol// hUM oM aM swA hA/ shAn ting ku ru swA hA/ me ltar 'bar ba'i klong rum nas// hom lnga 'brel ba'i klong yangs su// khrag 'thung 'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshogs// dam

rdzas 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// drag po'i phrin las bsgrub phyir bzhes su gsol// kro d+ha shrI he ru ka ma hA mAM sa rak+ta pU tsa kha raM khA hi/ hUM g.yas g.yon thabs shes 'brel ba'i klong dkyil du// khams

gsum rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// dam rdzas sbyin sreg 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// dmigs pa brlag cing 'khor ba stongs par mdzod// s+t+waM b+ha gr-ih+Na kro d+ha mA ra ya khaM ra khA hi// rigs pa hom gyi dkyil

'khor du// hUM mdzad chen po'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// drag po'i sbyin sreg 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// dmigs pa gtan nas 'pho ba'i las mdzod cig/ ba liM pU dza rak+ta pany+tsa kha raM khA hi/ dur khrod 'bar
ba'i klong yangs su// khro bo 'bar tshogs mi bzad pas// rig pa ye shes me sbar bas// nyon mongs gdug pa gtan nas bsreg/ dam rdzas sbyin sreg mchod 'bul bas// phrin las rgya mtsho 'grub par
mdzod// oM rak+sha kro d+ha mA ra ya khA hi/ bde chen rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor du// dbang gi lha tshogs bcas pa la// dam rdzas sbyin sreg 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di 'bul bas// lha rnams mnyes shing gdug pa

'joms par shog/ shr-I trAMHa shaM pa ma ta hUM raM swA hA/ de ltar mchod pa phul ba dang// lhag ma ga go bsreg pa dang// drag po'i smon lam btab pa dang// phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs pa dang// thabs la dbang ba'i

bro yang brdung// de yis las kyi mtha' yang 'grub// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi sbyin sreg bya ba'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang ni bka' stsal pa// rU tra
nag po bsgral ba ltar// de la pho brang bca' ba dang// rU tra bsgral ba'i sha khrag de// bstab dang sbyin sreg bya ba'o// bstab pa 'di ltar dbang gi lha rnams la bstab po// ma dad chen po bsgral ba
'di// thugs dam gnyen po 'dis bskang ngo// 'di yi kun gzhi gnas chen 'di// dbang gi rgyal po nyid la bstab// 'di yi gtsug gi phud ka 'di// rta mgrin rgyal po nyid la bstab// 'di yi bcud dang 'od
tshogs rnams// rdo rje dbyings kyi zhal du bstab// 'di yi 'od chen dngas ma 'di// ye shes sems dpa' nyid la bstab// 'di yi sha khrag phung po 'di// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i zhal du bstab// 'di yi sprul chen

gzhung bu 'di// khams gsum rgyal po nyid la bstab// 'di yi zhabs ni g.yas g.yon ni// hUM mdzad chen po'i 'khor la bstab// 'di yi yid ni nag po 'di// ngan song sbyong ba'i lha la bstab// 'di yi dur khrod
nang khrol 'di// dur khrod chen po'i lha la bstab// gsang ba'i rigs can 'di dag ni// lhun gyis grub pa'i lha la bstab// 'di yi yan lag dpung bzhi yang// brtul zhugs chen po bzhi la bstab// 'di yi

nang khrol smad lnga ni// mkha' 'gro pho nya'i tshogs la bstab// sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang// dug gsum bsgral ba'i mchod pa 'di// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la bstab// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol

pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bstab pa'i las kyi rim pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas lhag ma ga go la/ bro brdung ba 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas rgyal ba rnams kyi bka'// gar gyi dbang phyug chen

po ste// rak+sha ma lus bsgral ba ste// phung po lhag ma ga go la// gdul bya'i bro gcig brdung ba ni// bro ni brtul zhugs chen po ste// rnam bzhi rdzogs pa'i bro brdungs pas// las rnams thams cad 'grub pa'i

bro// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung 'khrigs pa'i bro// bde gshegs rgyal bas dgongs pa'i bro// ma sring rgya mtsho gdung ba'i bro// ngan song 'khor ba 'joms pa'i bro// dug lnga gnas su dag pa'i bro// dug gsum

dbyings su brdung ba'i bro// sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'grub pa'i bro// nyon mongs gdung ba sel ba'i bro// rta yi bro ni nub nas brdung// khyi yi bro ni lho nas brdung// phag gi bro ni shar nas brdung// bya yi bro ni
byang nas brdung// bro ra chen po bzhi bcas nas// dang po bro yi gdangs bton pa// dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul// bar du bro yi gdangs bton pa// sgrub po dag la dngos grub 'bebs// tha mar bro
yi gdangs sgra yis// 'khor ba ngan song gtan nas grol// brdungs pas byang chub sems sprin 'khrigs// skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings rum du// blangs pas rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul// 'khor ba'i skyabs
ling chen po la// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rab mdar gnyer// ye shes dpag gi phan ka can// ru dpon ye shes lnga yis mdzod// kun tu bzang po'i mkha' dbyings su// khams gsum yang sgrol
chen po mdzod// lhag ma rjes shul dag la ni// brtul zhugs chen po'i bro brdungs pas// dug gsum rtsad nas gcod pa'i bro// rta yi brtul zhugs bro brdungs pas// srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// khro bo

rdo rje ga gon pas// rta skad rngam pa'i ngang las rol// shangs kyi rlung sgrom chen po nas// rdo rje mtshon cha'i char phab pas// dbang gi rta bro brdungs pa yis// dang po ga go gzhom par byas// bar mas lhag ma rol
par byas// tha mas gdug rtsub byang bar byas// lhag ma med par rdul du brlag/ dug gsum gnas su stongs par bya// rta yi dbu yi gtsug rum nas// de yi pho nya skar tshogs spros// mtshon cha skar ltar

'khrugs pa'i bro// drag po gtum po lhan ner mdzod// thugs ka'i yi ge hrIH 'phros pas// sprul sku dbang du sdud pa'i bro// lhag ma med par gdar sha gcod// lho nas khyi yi bro brdungs nas// brtul zhugs chen
po las kyi bro// drag po gtum po dbang du sdud// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi brgyad dag tu// sprul pa khyi yi bro brdungs pas// thams cad tshar bcad bde la bkod// bde gshegs rnams kyi thugs dam
bskang// 'khor ba ngan song yongs su bcom// byang nas bya yi bro brdungs pas// srid gsum khams gsum zil gyis mnan// klu la sogs pa'i gdug pa can// zas su za zhing rngam stabs byed// rgyu drug lings

su 'debs par byed// sprul pa yongs su lding bar byed// sprul pa mi bzad ma rungs pa// la la lding dang la la 'phur// la la gzan la stod pa'i tshul// la la ldir zhing la la 'jums// kha dog sna lnga 'bar ba
la// mi mthun gdug pa so sor 'dul// sprul pa bye ba las la 'gyed// gdug pa gtum po gtan nas 'joms// dbang gi bro gar yongs su ldir// lhag ma rjes shul med pa'i bro// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs
dam skong// bro gar yongs su gding bar bgyi// shar nas phag gi brtul zhugs byung// gti mug 'joms pa'i las la mkhas// blang dang dor med drag po ste// sra snyi med par 'joms pa'i bro// phag gi brtul

zhugs chen po yis// zas ni gtsang dme med par bza'// bang ni ngal dub med par rgyug/ tshems ni sra snyi med par 'joms// khron du ma gyur gang yang med// srid pa'i khron pa rkong re mkhas// nyon mongs tha
ba gtan nas 'joms// 'dod chags rgya mtsho gting nas skem// nga rgyal brag ri rtse nas bsnyil// phrag dog zug rngu gtan nas choms// gti mug mun pa gtan nas choms// zhe sdang rtsa me rum du sod// ces
gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ lhag ma'i rjes shul bro rdung ba'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal pos las 'di dag gsungs so// gsang ba'i dngos

grub bsgrub 'dod na// rta mgrin rta yi rgyal po la// sprul pa'i he ru bzhis bskor ba// de ni yang dag bsgrub par bya// de yi yon tan rdzogs pas ni// 'di yi mthu dang dngos grub thob// byang chub snying po 'grub
par the tshom med// rigs dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// phun sum tshogs pa'i sgrub po des// las kyi rim pa gzhung bzhin bya// dkyil 'khor zla gam sgo gcig pa// tha ma zla gam bzhis bskor ba// sgo dang

bcas par bya ba'o// chag chag thig dang gri ba dang// rdzas dang ldan par bsham pa'o// dug shing phur pa lnga bsags te// byin gyis brlab pa byas nas ni// zla gam lnga la dgod par bya// mthun pa'i phyi nang

gsang ba'i rdzas// bdud rtsi gtor ma bzhin du ste// ma dad pa de bsgral ba las// rdul la sogs pa'i chu gsum gyis// lha rnams sku yi khrus su gsol// byang chub sems dang dri chen dang// mAM sa dang ni rak+ta

dang// dri chu ra sA ya la sogs// bdud rtsi dam pa sman sbyar nas// lha rnams kun la dbul bar bya// ma dad pa de bsgral ba yi// dbus ni snying la tha ma rtsib ma ste// sha dang khrag gis brgyan pa dang// rgyu ma klad

pa dbang po dang// bcas pa lha rnams dag la 'bul// rU tra'i snying khrag dngas ma ste// khrag chen mchod pa sgreng bar bya// de ltar mchod pa bya ba'o// de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya// zhes gsungs so// rta

mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rta mgrin sgrub pa rdzas dang dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyi shu pa'o//// de nas las kyi gzhung bstan te/ de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin ni// chos rnams stong pa'i rang

bzhin bsgom// kun tu snang gi ting 'dzin ni// 'bras bu lam gyi gzhi ru gzhag/ thun mong ma yin khyab pa'i snying rje yin// de yi dran bskyed snying rje mchog/ snying rje lam du gzhag pa yin// de las rgyu shar ting
'dzin hUM// sems kyi 'bras bu bstan pa yin// hUM las 'byung ba e shar bas// 'byung ba'i gzhi mo nam mkha' yin// hUM las yi ge yaM shar bas// rten pa'i rlung zhes shar ba yin// hUM las yi ge baM shar

bas// chu yi 'byung ba sa bon brtan// hUM las yi ge suM shar bas// sra ba sa yi rten du gyur// hUM las yi ge raM shar bas// smin cing brtas par byas pa yin// hUM las yi ge keM shar bas// ri rab chen po byung ba
yin// b+h+rUM las ri rab gzhal yas khang// rA ga pad+ma dmar po ste// ra ti zhes pa brtsegs pa yin// b+h+rUM ni gzhal yas zla gam dmar// de dkyil dmigs pa'i rten mnan pa// bdud dang srin po la sogs
pa// nyi zla pad+ma brtsegs pa'i tshul// gsang ba'i gnas ni dkyil du'o// de'i steng yi ge hUM shar bas// dmar la bkra ba'i yi ge hUM// de las sa bon sngags brjod pas// rta mgrin rgyal por gyur

pa yin// de la rigs bzhi'i sngags brjod pas// he ru'i rgyal por gyur pa yin// de ltar rang bzhin gsal bar bsgom// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ de brjod rta mgrin rgyal por gyur// swA hA he ru ka kI la ya hUM

phaT/ a mo g+ha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ rat+na a mo g+ha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ karma a mo g+ha hUM phaT/ de ltar ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom/ rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rta mgrin he ru bzhi dang bcas pa
bsgom pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer gcig pa'o//// hUM dur khrod me ltar 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// chos dbyings dag pa lha yi gnas chen 'dir// rta mgrin rgyal po rta skad 'tsher zhing gshegs su
gsol// gdug pa 'dul phyir klu dbang gdan la bzhugs// chos dbyings dag pa lha yi gnas chen nas// dur khrod zla gam gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// sprul pa'i he ru khro bo rgyal po bzhi// dgyes shing
brtan par bzhugs nas ni// dbang drag phrin las rdzogs par mdzod// hrI e A ra li dzaHhUM/ dbang drag 'joms mdzad srin po 'dul ba'i lha// rta mgrin rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la// brkyang bskum srin
po gus pas phyag 'tshal na// thugs rje mchog gis bdag la dgongs su gsol// 'dul thabs drag po'i phrin las mi bzad rnam bzhi yis// dri za gshin rje klu dang gnod sbyin 'dul// phrin las dbang drag

drag po yis// mi bzad gdug pa 'dul mdzad mchog/ sprul pa he ru bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM mdzad hUM ste hUM gi rgyal po mchog/ lcang lor bcas pa'i pad+ma b+han d+ha la// tshe 'dzin mchog dang dmar chen dam

pas bkang// sbyor dang sgrol gyis thugs dam bskang lags kyis// rta mgrin rgyal po'i thugs dam bskang bar mdzod// sha chen mkha' lding shel sgong gzugs dang bcas// sman chen lnga dang tshe 'dzin byi na

se// rdo rje las kyi chu dang pany+tsa a mr-i ta// sbyor dang sgrol ba'i thugs dam mchog lags kyis// he ru bzhi yi thugs dam bskang bar mdzod// pad+ma zil tig dri dang rak+ta dang// rdo rje las kyi chu dang pany+tsa a mr-i

ta// sbyor dang sgrol gyis thugs dam bskang lags kyis// mkha' 'gro ma tshogs thugs dam bskang bar mdzod// pad+ma b+han d+ha lcang lor bcas bdud rtsi// dbang gi rgyal po khro bo rta mchog la// bla med dam rdzas
bdud rtsi'i mchod pa mchog/ gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis 'bul lags na// thugs rjes bzhes nas dbang gi dngos grub stsol// 'bar ba'i sprul pa mngon par shar ba ni// rigs kyi sprul pa khro bo bzhi rnams
la// rnam dag bdud rtsi'i dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rje cher dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// zhes sman mchod dam pa'o// yi ge 'bru gsum sku gsung thugs// byin rlabs dam

pa mdzad nas su// sku gsung thugs su mdzad du gsol// kA ya sid+d+hi oM/ wAka sid+d+hi AM/ tsit+ta sid+d+hi hUM/ hUM srid pa'i gcong snying zad par bya ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi chen po pany+tsa a mr-i ta// bla med sman gyi mchod pa
'bul lags na// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bzlog phyir bzhes su gsol// bla med mchog gi mchod pa dam pa sbyar ba 'di// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yi rab brgyan
nas// dam tshig gsang ba'i mchod par bzhes su gsol// zhes mchod pa dbul lo// de nas 'dod don smon lam btab// dngos grub blang dang phrin las bcol// nye bar bskul dang bsnyen pa bskyal// de

nas las kyi bya ba bya// tshogs kyi mchod pa bya ba dang// bskang ba dang ni bshags pa dang// las bcol ba dang gdab par bya// oM hrIHba sha kI la ya hUM phaT/ des ni dbang gi phur pas gdab// swA hA kI la ya
rbad/ a mo kI la ya rbad/ rad ka ta na kI la ya rbad/ kar sha a mo kI la ya hUM phaT/ de ltar gsal bas gdab pa'o// de nas bro de 'khor gsum brdung// de nas mchod pa dbul bar bya// bstod pa dang ni

las bya'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rta mgrin he ru bzhi dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bstod pa 'di gsungs so// hUM dmar nag zla gam gdengs pa'i

dkyil 'khor nas// dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma rta mgrin rgyal// rta mgrin rgyal po dregs pa 'dul ba'i lha// sku mdog dmar po me dpung 'bar ba 'dra// 'bar ba'i phyag gis gdug pa'i phyag mtshan 'dzin/ ral gri

sbrul zhags thod pa gri gug 'dzin// gdug pa'i zhabs kyis klu tshogs gdan du bting// na bza' 'bar ba sku yi rgyan du ston// glang chen ko rlon brjid chen sku yi rgyan// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi dag pa gsung gi
chas// stag gi pags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba thugs kyi chas// gdu bu dpung rgyan sbrul nag zil gnon chas// rdo rje'i gshog pa g.yas g.yon gdengs pa yis// thabs dang shes rab ldan de gdug pa zil gyis

gnon// rdo rje rtse mo bya khyung 'bar bas klu gnyan sgum bur 'thu// mtshe gtsigs rkan sgra drag pos bdud dpung zil gyis gnon// sprul pa mang po skar tshogs bkye bas pho nya mang po 'gugs// dbu yi gtsug na rta
mgo 'bar bas ngan song 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas// lhang lhang tser tser lan gsum sgra bsgrags pas// mya ngan 'das pa'i mtshams na tse re re// ngan song gnas rnams stongs shing ye shes don la
bskul// gsung rab mnyes pa sgra sgrogs shing// bde gshegs rnams kyi thugs dam bskul// 'khor ba gtan nas 'joms shing byang chub don la 'god// snyan pa'i sgra rnams bsgrags pas lha mo
dbyings su dgyes// ral pa dmar po bsigs pas bdud dpung zil gyis gnon// bdud bzhi bcom nas ye shes bzhi yi ngang la 'jog/ ngan song gnas rnams stongs te byang chub lam la 'god// dbang gi

rgyal po rta skad 'tsher ba khyod la bstod// sprul pa'i he ru khro bo'i rgyal po bzhi// rigs bzhi'i sprul pa khro bo bzhir sprul pa// phyogs bzhi dag na gnas pa ste// gdug pa 'dul phyir sku sprul pa// smug nag ral pa
'bar ba'i thod phreng can// na gza' 'bar ba gsum mnabs pa// phyag na gdug pa'i mtshon cha bsnams// g.yas pa dang po dgra s+t+wa lcags kyu dang// tha ma gdug pa'i phur pa 'dril// g.yon pa me dpung ba

dan no// gdug pa 'dul phyir drag po'i las la brtson// sprul pa mang po yang dag las la brtson// mi bzad rngam pa'i sgra sgrogs shing// bdud dpung 'joms pa'i rkan yang brdeb// srid pa yongs la phan pa'i
bya ra mdzad// sku ni 'jigs stabs 'bar ba'i sku// gsung ni gdug pa'i nga ro sgrogs// thugs ni dbang gis brnag pa'i phrin las mdzad// gshog pa'i bar bar lcags kyu 'bar bas gtams// sprul pa khro

chung 'bar bas ba spu'i bu ga gtams// ye shes mkha' 'gro mang po las la 'gyed// srid pa'i ri rab yang ni 'gram nas bsnyil// rgya mtsho chen po'i gzhung yang skems par byed// me ri me dpung 'bar ba'i klong

na bzhugs// dur khrod chas kyis sku la rgyan du byas// mche ba rnon pos skye shi rtsad nas gcod// spyan mig bzlog pa tsam gyis khams gsum bran du 'khol// thugs rje dbyings su 'dren cing 'khor ba bla med sa

la 'khod// rngam chen he ru bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rta mgrin dang 'khor he ru bzhi la bstod pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas yang

dbang gi rgyal pos/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// long ba rgyab 'brel ba sum cu rtsa gnyis dang// dmus long las kyi 'khor brgyad bya ba yod de/ long ba rgyab 'brel ba sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/ mkha' 'gro ma sum
cu rtsa gnyis kyi sprul pa yin/ dmus long las kyi 'khor ba brgyad bya ba ni/ dbang gi rgyal po'i thugs kyi sgo srung brgyad yin te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad las brgal nas/ rtse gcig ting 'dzin
dka' thub smyon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas so// khro bo brgyad yod pa lta bu ma yin te/ thub pa dmus long las/ rnam par shes pa'i gzugs gang yang med do// lus gol bag chags pa las/ phyag bzhi gdug
pa'i mtshon cha thogs pa'o// mig med pa la gar yang rgyu ba der thogs pa med pa'o// sna med pa las dri thams cad lus kyis tsher ba'o// lce med pa las drag po'i sgra khong nas smra ba'o// rna ba med

pa las sgra thams cad khong nas thos pa'o// dmus long de lta bu des las gang la yang thogs pa med par byed pa'o// de lta bu de bsgrub par bya ba ni/ dbus su rta mchog rgyal po de// le'u tshe brgyad la dmus long

brgyad/ lha dgu sa ru bsgrub par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thig bzhi btab pas ling tshe dgu// tshon ni rigs dang mthun par bya// sgo gcig pa ni shar du'o// de la bsnyen sgrub spyi ltar bya// dang po sngon du 'gro ba'i
las// rim pa rgyas par ldan par bya// de nas gzhung la 'jug pa ste// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim bzhin bsgom// de nas rig pa'i hUM de las// 'byung ba lnga po bskyed par bya// de las ri rab brtan par
bya// de las phyi rin chen gzhal yas khang// nang dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// dbus ni zla gam gdengs pa 'od dang bcas// tha ma me dpung me ri 'bar ba'o// de la rU tra gdan du bsam// nyi zla
pad+ma sum brtsegs so// de la yi ge gsal ba ni// dmar la bkra ba'i hUM zhig bsam// cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// sngags kyang brjod pas gsal ba ste// dbang chen 'dus pa'i sku ru gsal// de las sprul

pa'i bkye tshul bskyed// li gaM ga ta hUM phaT/ li tsa saM pa hUM/ li hUM ba ti hUM/ li dza a sa me hUM/ li bu sha hUM/ li kha du hUM/ li pra ma sha ra hUM/ li kha ma le hUM/ sngags de re re brjod pa yi// dmus long 'khor ba re re

bskyed// ling tshe brgyad la bkod pa'o// bcom ldan dbang chen he ru ka/ khro bo'i rgyal po hUM sgra can// che bas bstod pas dbang phyug yang che'i dpal// 'bar ba lha yi lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// gdug pa 'dul

phyir bskyed pa'i dmus long brgyad// srid pa dbang du sbud pa rngams pa'i khro bo che// gdug pa ma lus 'dul bas dmus long gya nom pa// dbang gi zhing khams chen po bskyang ba dang// bdud dang srin po klu
rnams tshar gcad dang// dngos grub dam pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// dbang chen kun 'dul bka' 'khor bskyang ba dang// dbang drag las kyi phrin las bsgrub mdzad pa// dmus long las kyi 'khor la phyag 'tshal
lo// de ni bskyed dang bstod pa'o// de nas spyan ni drang bya ste// mi dmigs chos dbyings dag pa las// pad+ma dbang chen gshegs su gsol// gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba dang// dngos grub mchog rnams stsal
ba'i phyir// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// yul drug rten dag gnas brgyad nas// gdug pa 'dul phyir long ba'i tshogs sprul nas// dbang drag phrin las 'grub par mdzad pa'i mchog/ tshom bu
'od kyi gnas su gshegs su gsol// 'bar ba'i zhing gi 'od ldan bshams pa la// dgyes shing rol te bzhugs su gsol// sa ma ya e h+ye hi dza/ rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi rgyal po
la dmus long las kyi 'khor tshogs spyan drang ba dang/ bskyed pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas phyag ni 'tshal bar bya/ 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// 'dod
chags rgyal po pad+ma he ru ka/ dbang mchog gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba// pad+ma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum 'khor ba ru las bzlog pa'i phyir// gdug pa'i tshogs chen sku sprul
pa// las kyi dmus long brgyad po'i tshul// 'bar ba tshogs chen bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// srid pa'i gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba dang// bka' yi phrin las ma lus bsgrub bya'i phyir// gsang ba mkha'

'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho// 'byung ba dag pa'i mchod pa dang// rol mo sgra yi mchod pa dang// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// dngos grub blang la lhag ma sbreng// smon lam gdab dang
phrin las bcol// chag nyams bshags la rig pa'i me tog dor// hu lu 'dzab kyi dgongs pa bya// grangs tshad bstod pas 'phrin las bcol// 'byor pa tshogs kyis mchod pa bya// dmigs pas dgug ste

bstab par bya// lhag ma btang ste mkha' 'gro mchod// 'bum lnga'i bshags pa brgya pa 'don// da ltar byas la sgrub pa pos// gnan pa dang ni 'phang ba dang// sreg pa'i las ni yang dag bya// mtha' bsdu ba yi

las su gsungs// bskang dang bzlog pa bya ba ni// las gzhung bsrang bar bya ba'o// drag po'i bskang dang bzlog pa bya ba ni// drag po'i las gsum bstud la bya ba yin// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i

tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi rgyal po la dmus long dang bcas pa'i las kyi rim pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer lnga pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru kas gsungs pa/ bcom ldan dbang chen zhabs brgyad

kyi// 'og na khro bcu yod pa ste// phyogs mtshams brgyad du khro bo brgyad// bsnol nas gan rkyal la sogs pa'o// stobs po che dang hUM kA ra// dbus su gan rkyal kha sbub bo// zhabs brgyad long bu man chad

de// khong du nub nas mnan pa'o// de nas dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru kas// khro brgyad 'bar ba mi bzad skur bstan pa// 'og min dur khrod 'bar ba'i gdan// steng du rdo rje 'bar ba'i gur// bar du rin

chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// dkyil 'khor thod pa 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// khro bo chen po brgyad ni gnas pa ste// de yang bsgrub par bya ba ste// dbang gi rgyal po kun 'dus te// khro bo bcu yis bskor
ba bsgrub// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// dbus su zlum po zla gam bcas// mtha' ma 'khor lo rtsibs bcu par// gru bzhi 'bur dang sgo bcas bri// las kyi rim pa de bzhin bya// sku'am

gsung ste phyag rgya thugs// 'khor lo bcu la dgod par bya// de la rdzas ni de bzhin gzhag/ rnam gsum rim gyi ting 'dzin bsgom// 'bras bu lam dang rgyu ru bshad// 'byung ba rim bzhin bskyed pa'o// de las
gzhal yas gsal bar bsgom// me 'bar ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// phyi dang nang med kun tu nang// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu la// gru chad bar khyams gru bzhi ldan// de ltar gsal ba'i

ting 'dzin bsgom// de yi dkyil du lha rnams so// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra/ oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya/ badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da/ badzra kro ta ya mAn ta ka/ badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa le/ badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI

wa/ badzra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta/ badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya/ badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ 'khor lo bcu la hUM dgod de// rim pa ltar du shes par bya// hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ dbus su
hUM dmar la bkra ba yin par gsungs/ hUM las sngags de brjod pa yis// 'bar ba'i khro bor gyur pa'o// de ltar gzhal yas khang gi nang na ni/ rang ngo bzhugs pa'i gzugs dag pa bskyed pa dang/ lha'i ting

'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor lo zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer drug pa'o//// de nas lha rnams spyan drang ba// rnam par mi
rtog chos dbyings dag pa nas// dbang chen rgyal po kun 'dus gshegs su gsol// gnyis med rig pa thugs kyi gnas chen nas// hUM mdzad khro bo 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// gnyis med rol pa chub
pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// sgo ba mgo brtsegs dag kyang gshegs su gsol// kro d+ha sa ma ya gri dza/ bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi yab chen po// dbang mchog kun 'dul
bzang po che ba'i lha// che bas che bar bstod pa'i dbang phyug yang che dpal// 'bar ba lha yi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// srid gsum gdug pa ma lus kun 'joms pa// gdug pa 'dul mdzad ye shes lha yi

lha// stobs kyi rim pa'i khro bo hUM sgra can// hUM mdzad khro bo bcu la phyag 'tshal lo// theg pa dgu la gnas shing sa dgu rim gyis sbyor// pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs shing mtha' gnyis mi spang ngang la gnas// sgo ba
mgo brtsegs bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas mchod pa rim pas 'bul// smon lam gdab dang 'dod gsol bya// lha yi bsnyen pa grangs su bskyal// gang 'dod dbang drag las dang sbyar// de nas lha rnams
bstod// hUM khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i skur bstan pa// dbu lnga phyag ni bcu drug ste// 'bar ba'i zhabs ni brgyad du gtams// gshog pa g.yas g.yon gnyis su gdengs// gsho rtse bya khyung 'bar

ba'o// nyi ma zla bas 'bar bar brgyan// dpal gyi chas brgyad sku la brgyan// 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan mang po rnams// dbu steng sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan// dbu lnga rta mgo 'bar ba lnga// tshon gang 'od kyi 'bru

dang bcas// dbang gi rgyal po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM khro bo chen po hUM chen 'bar// brjid pa'i stabs dang 'degs pa'i stobs// mi bzad gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa// khro chen hUM kA ra la bstod// hUM

nyon longs kun las rnam par rgyal// rgyal ba rgyal ba'i rtags brnyes pa// chos dbyings dag dang mnyam par sbyor// bdud 'dul rnam par rgyal la bstod// rdzu 'phrul ngang la mnga' brnyes shing// rtags kyi chos
dbyings dbyug pa yis// nyon mongs dra ba 'joms mdzad pa// 'bar ba dbyug sngon can la bstod// chos dbyings dag pa'i ngang nyid las// lhag pa'i ye shes skur bstan pas// log par lta ba'i gshin rje
sgrol// de gshed gshin rje'i gshed la bstod// chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngang nyid las// g.yo ba med pa mi g.yo mgon// de sprul bdud dang srin po tshar gcod pa// khro mchog mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal
bstod// 'dod chags gnas su dag byed pa// theg pa'i rta la rab brgyud nas// mchog tu klu dang gnyen po 'dul// rta mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal bstod// dag pa'i don mchog mtshon pa yis// mnyam nyid
ngang gis thams cad 'joms// de phyir gzhan gyis mi thub ste// gzhan gyis mi thub pa la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos dbyings dag pa'i bdud rtsi yis// nyon mongs ma lus gnas su bcom// 'khor ba'i bdud
la ye shes rtsi gtong ba// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba de la bstod// khams gsum nyon mongs kun las rnam par rgyal// de don ma nor dbyings su sdud byed pa// de yi don gyis dug gsum gnas su stongs par
byed// khro chen khams gsum rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes stobs dang ldan pa yis// nyon mongs dra ba gcod byed pa// de las ma g.yos stobs po che// 'joms byed stobs po che la phyag 'tshal

bstod// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ lha la bstod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer bdun pa'o//// de nas drag po gsang ba'i sngags bstan pa/ oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHhUM ya rbad phaT/ gardza gardza

hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da hUM phaT/ b+hin da b+hin da hUM phaT/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ ces pas rim par

gdab par bya/ spyi dril la gdab pa ni/ oM badzra kro d+ha pa ra bi d+h+wan+sa ga ga na sa ma ya phaT rbad/ spyir dril bas gdab pa'o// gdab nas lhag ma bstab par bya// de yi lhag ma'i rjes shul la// yi

ge nyi shu'i 'phro 'du las// khro bcu rnams spros bro brdungs pas// yang sprul khro chung tshon gang gis// drag po'i las byed bro brdung ngo// de nas mnan gzir bya ba yis// yi ge sngags kyi 'khor lo dgod// de ltar
bsam pa'i las rnams rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sngags kyi gdab pa dang bros mnan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer brgyad pa'o//// de nas dpal gyis bka' stsal pa// de
nas rigs 'dus gsang ba yis// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// thams cad rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor te// sgrub pa chen po byed pa dang// drag brdal drag po byed pa na// rigs 'dus gsang ba'i

dkyil 'khor gsungs// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// dbus su pho brang zlum po bskor// thig bzhi btab pas ling tshe dgu// ling tshe dgu la pho brang dgu// dbus su pad+ma zla gam brgyad// shar gyi ling tshe

dag la ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor te// tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor ro// lho yi le'u tshe dag la 'gro ba 'dul ba ste// dbus su zla gam mtha' ma 'khor lo brgyad// nub tu rta mgrin dbang gi ste// zla

gam kha sprod dag dang ldan// byang du khams gsum rnam rgyal te// zlum po pad+ma 'dab brgyad do// shar lho'i ling tshe dag la ni// ngan song sbyong ba'i ngal ba ste// gru gsum zla gam bzhis bskor ba'o// lho nub ling

tshe dag la ni// hUM mdzad chen po'i dkyil 'khor te// le tshe dgu dang ldan pa'o// nub byang le tshe dag la ni// dur khrod chen po'i dal ba ste// gru gsum mtha' ma zlum po bzhi// byang shar zla gam sgo gcig pa// ye

shes sems dpa'i dal ba ste// tha ma gru bzhi sgo yis bskor// le tshe re yi mtha' ma yang// gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa'o// gru chad kun la khyud ni 'jug/ de la lha rnams gsal ba ste// de ltar gsal bar bris
bsgom nas// dbang gi byin rlabs chen po 'byung// dbang bskur dngos grub blang ba yang// de ltar byas na dngos grub thob// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi rigs thams cad
'dus pa'i dal gyi le'u ste brgya dang nyer dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' la sogs khyod rnams nyon// byang chub 'bras bu thob 'dod pas// dge

ba'i las su bstan pa ni// rtag tu mchod pa byed pa'i rten// mchod pa dad cing gus byas nas// yid 'ong mdzes pa sa gzhi la// ba yi rnam lnga'i go ma ye na// spos kyi chu yis chag chag btang// mchod rten pad+ma
brtsegs pa yi// rin chen sna tshogs grub pa'i gzhal yas khang// de la pad+ma rigs kyi lha rnams bskyed// dus rnams rtag par bzhugs par bsgom pa'o// spyan drangs pas yang de la

bstim// mchod pa rnam pa lnga po dang// rmad du byung ba gsum mchod nas// de nas snyan pa'i sgra bsgrags shing// 'gro ba rgyud lnga'i 'khor los 'khor ba ru// sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gzir ba'i 'gro gzigs
nas// thugs rjes sdug bsngal ma lus 'joms mdzad pa// thugs rje'i bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sems can smin cing grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir// chos nyid de bzhin nyid la bzhugs gyur
nas// chags pas ma gos pad+ma ltar dag pa'i// 'dod chags dag pa'i bdag nyid khyod la bstod// sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa la// thugs rjes thabs dang shes rab grur bzhag nas// zhi ba rin
chen rgya mtsho'i gling bskyod pa// kun gyi ded dpon chen po khyod la 'dud// sems can bkren pa chos kyis phongs gyur pas// ma rig mun 'thibs nang du song ba rnams// 'phags pa'i nor bdun dag gis chim
mdzad pa// ye shes sgron ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sems can las kyi chu bos bdas pa rnams// dam chos bdud rtsi'i zam pas sgrol mdzad cing// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad la 'god mdzad

pa// thugs rje'i bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod rten de rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i thugs rje ye shes kyi rang bzhin du bsams la/ de'i bum pa'i nang du gnas pa'i snying po dang// mchod
rten chen po des las 'od zer du ma grangs med cing bgrang du med pas/ 'khrul pa'i sems can thams cad kyis// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa yis// tshogs rnams thams cad byang byas nas// de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad thugs// ye shes 'od zer tshul gyis bsdus byas nas// mchod rten de la thim pa yis// mchod rten chen po de nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// chos sku longs sku sprul

pa'i sku// ngo bo nyid du bsgom byas la// de la mchod pa kun mchod la// rten dang 'brel ba'i snying po bzlas// rigs kyi bstod pa kun byas la// de ma thag nas tshig 'di brjod// bcom ldan 'das te de bzhin

gshegs// dgra bcom yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// rig pa zhabs ldan bde bar gshegs// skyes bu 'dul dang kha lo sgyur// lha dang mi yi ston pa'i mchog/ ngo mtshar cho 'phrul zung ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas sku
gsung lhun grub pa// deng 'dir bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag gi sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung phyir// bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pham par bgyi ba dang// sems can las dang nyon mongs
rtog pa bsal bar bgyi// de las bdag cag rnams la ni// bskyab cing snang ba mdzad du gsol// de brjod la ni smon lam btab// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ mchod pa'i
rten gyi le'u ste brgya dang sum cu pa'o//// de nas rab tu gnas par bya// thugs rje ldan pa'i ston pa yis// 'gro ba bde la dgod pa'i phyir// sku gdung dang ni ring bsrel dang// mchod pa'i rten ni

bzhengs par gsungs// sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang// smin pa dang ni grol ba'i phyir// mchod rten chen po bzhi yang bzheng// lhag pa dang ni zung 'jug dang// sku dang ye shes thob pa'i phyir// mchod rten bzhi

yang bzhengs par bya// sgrib gnyis byang nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs// de yi phyir yang bzhengs par bya// las dang nyon mongs sgrib byang nas// 'bras bu byang chub thob pa'i phyir// de yang gzugs sku bzhengs par

bya// bdud kyi bya ra ba dang gnod sbyin mdun sa dang// gdug pa klu gnyan 'byung po'i rgyun lam de// thugs rje zhi ba'i phyir yang dgod par bya// thugs rjes de la mchod rten bzhengs pa ni// rgyu yi mchod rten

'bras bu'i mchod rten no// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'brel bar snang bas mchod rten rang bzhin yin// shar du zhi ba'i rdo rje rigs kyi mchod rten bzhengs par bya// mchod rten zlum po rdo rje brtsegs pa'i ka ba

can// 'khor lo dang ldan rin chen lngas spras nas// 'khor lo dang ni gdug can dang// byu ru dang ni skyabs mdzad pa// dar dpyangs dang ni rin chen 'phreng// mi 'gyur lcags thag bzhi la'o// rin chen rigs

kyi zhing khams su// rin chen mchod rten sngon po la// gru bzhi pa la rin chen brtsegs// ka ba rin po che dang ldan// sgo ni rin chen nor bu'i dbyibs// nub phyogs pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten la// pad+ma stong

dang ldan par bya// zhabs ni zla gam tshul du gnas// rdo rje ka ba rin chen sgo// dmar po rgyan dang ldan pa'o// byang phyogs las kyi rigs kyi mchod rten te// ljang gu gru gsum 'bur dang bcas// rgya gram

brtsegs pa'i tshul du gnas// rin chen sna lnga'i rgyan dang ka bas mtshan// dbus su gser gyi mchod rten bkra shis sgo mang la// 'khor lo 'bar ba rdo rjes spras// snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs dril bu dang// byu ru dang ni
ye shes dang// 'khor lo thugs dam mchod rten te// 'khor lo mi 'gyur chos sgra bskor// dar dpyangs g.yas dang g.yon du ste// g.yas pa chos sku 'gyur ba med// g.yon pa shes bya thogs pa med// de ltar

mchod pa'i rten bzhengs pa// de la mchod pa rnams kyis ni// shar phyogs byams pa brtsegs pa'i mchod rten dang// snying rje rin chen brtsegs pa'i mchod rten dang// dga' ba pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten
dang// btang snyoms don kun 'grub pa'i mchod rten ni// phyi yi tshad med mchod rten yin// mchod rten rgyu ni chos kyi dbyings nyid de// byin gyis brlabs dang ldan par bya// sa gzhi chos kyi

dbyings su brlab// khri 'phang dge ba bcu dang ldan par byin gyis brlab// bang rim bzhi ni dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi/ dbang po lnga/ bum gdan stobs lnga
dang/ bum pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun/ bre ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang/ de la sogs pa bskyed pa'o// yid kyi mchod rten ting 'dzin sku// nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mtsho 'jing dag

na// byang chub sems kyi mchod rten bris// de la ting 'dzin yid kyi mchod pas mchod// yang na mchod pa'i rten bshad pa// khri 'phang ye shes bzhi ru ste// gyen du khri 'phang rnam thar gsum// chags med pad+ma'i

gdan steng du// bum pa zlum po chos kyi rtse// gser gyi bre phul 'od zer 'phro// srog shing drang srong bla na med// dag pa rnam lnga'i mchod pas mchod// rang byung grub pa'i mchod rten brgyad la// byams ldan gter
gyi mchod rten dang// thar legs yongs rdzogs mchod rten dang// sprul pa'i mchod rten dam pa dang// yid bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i mchod rten dang// dpe med bsam las 'das pa'i mchod rten dang// yon

tan brtsegs pa'i mchod rten dang// rmad grags chos nyid mchod rten dang// khams gsum bde rgyas sgron ma'i mchod rten no// de ni rang byung mchod rten brgyad// sprul pa'i mchod rten yang na bshad// grangs
dang dpag las 'das pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i zhing khams na// sku yi mchod rten bsam las 'das// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i mchod pas mchod// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams nas// shes rab spyan dang rdzu
'phrul snyan// sku yi sangs rgyas kun gyis bskor// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams na// gsung gi mchod rten bsam las 'das// gsung gi mchod rten thams cad kyang// tshangs pa'i sgra skad phun sum
tshogs// 'gro ba drug la gsal mdzad pa// sgra dang dbyangs dang sde yis mchod// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams na// thugs kyi mchod rten bsam las 'das// mkhyen pa'i ye shes gsal ba yis// ma rig mun
pa sel bar mdzad// dmigs pa med pa'i mchod pas mchod// de ltar dbye dang bya ba ste// bskyed dang spyan drang bstim pa dang// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa 'bul// bstod de 'dod yon gsol ba'o// zhes
gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ mchod rten gyi dbye ba bstan pa dang ngo bo bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang so gcig pa'o//// de nas yang ni las gsungs pa// mchod rten gzhal yas bskyed pa
dang// lha rnams bskyed pa bstan pa yin// rdo rje rigs kyi mchod rten du// khog par gzhal yas bsgom par bya// tshom bu lnga yi gzhal yas la// rin chen dra bas brgyan pa dang// rdo rje ka bas
mtshan pa'o// ka ba gdung dang bre phul re mig brgyan// 'khor lo rin chen 'od 'bar ba'o// dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' yin// tha ma rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas yin// de la rang rang sems dpar ldan// de la

mchod dang las bya'o// rigs dang mthun pa'i mchod pa'o// rin chen rigs kyi mchod rten du// ka gdung bre phul re mig bzhi// tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor la// dbus su rin chen 'byung ldan la// rigs bzhi
sangs rgyas dag gis bskor// sems dpa' sems ma 'khor dang bcas// de la rigs mthun mchod pas mchod// pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten la// tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor yin// dbus su snang ba mtha'
yas la// phyogs bzhi rigs bzhi sangs rgyas yin// rang rang sems dpas bskor ba'o// byang phyogs las kyi rigs kyi mchod rten du// tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor la// dbus su don yod grub pa yin// tha ma
rigs bzhi sangs rgyas te// rang rang sems dpa' dag dang ldan// de ltar rigs kyi mchod pas mchod// sngags dang phyag rgya gong bzhin no// sku yi mchod rten chen po ni// dbus su rnam par snang mdzad
la// sems dpa' sems mas bskor ba'o// gsung gi mchod rten chen po ni// dbus su snang ba mtha' yas la// sems dpa' sems mas bskor ba'o// thugs kyi mchod rten chen po ni// dbus su rdo rje sems
dpa' la// sems dpa' sems mas bskor ba'o// de la mchod dang 'dod don gsol// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ mchod rten lha bskyed pa'i le'u ste brgya dang so gnyis

pa'o//// de nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// gnyis med dag pa'i zhing khams nas// rang byung mchod rten chen po brgyad// 'gro ba'i don du spyan drangs te// gzugs brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis brlabs

shing gshegs su gsol// gsal la dag pa'i gnas mchog nas// sprul pa'i mchod rten brgyad po yang// 'gro ba'i don du spyan drangs te// gzugs brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis brlabs shing gshegs su gsol// rnam

par dag pa'i zhing khams nas// sku'i mchod rten bsam las 'das// shes rab rtsal dang rdzu 'phrul ldan// sku yi sangs rgyas kun gyis bskor// 'gro ba'i don du spyan drangs te// gzugs brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis
brlabs shing gshegs su gsol// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams nas// gsung gi mchod rten bsam las 'das// sgra dang dbyangs dang sde yi sde// mkhyen pa'i ye shes gsal ba yis// ma rig mun pa kun sel ba//
dmigs pa med pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom// 'gro ba'i don du spyan drangs te// gzugs brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis brlabs shing gshegs su gsol// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams
nas// thugs kyi mchod rten bsam las 'das// mkhyen pa'i ye shes gsal ba yis// ma rig mun pa sel mdzad pa// dmigs pa med pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom// 'gro ba'i don du spyan drangs nas// gzugs
brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol// yid kyi mchod rten ting 'dzin sku// nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mtsho'i 'jing// byang chub sems kyi mchod rten gri// ma lus bzhugs
pa thams cad kyang// ting 'dzin gsal ba'i byin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba'i don la gshegs nas kyang// gzugs brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol// rigs kyi mchod rten
chen po lnga/ rang byung rten pa'i gnas yin te// 'gro ba'i don du spyan drangs nas// gzugs brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol// yang dag don du dag mod kyang// 'gro ba

rnams kyi don slad du// phyag dang zhabs gnyis bsil nas kyang// rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// oM a ha ra a ha ra sarba bi ta ra su tsi te ga ga na sa ma ye swA hA/ d+hu pe puSh+pe A lo ke/ gan d+he/ de ltar

mchod dang bstod pa bya// sngags kyi rim pa bzla bar bya// phyag rgya yang ni de bzhin gshegs// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ mchod pa'i rten spyan drangs pa'i le'u ste brgya dang so gsum

pa'o//// de nas gzungs sngags 'thon pa ste// na maHsa man+ta/ bud d+hA nA na/ gar+b+he d+har ma d+hA tu swA hA/ sa gzhi chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so// lag pa thal mo khong stong sbyar// sngags

pa'i phyag rgya de yis ni// byin gyis brlab par bya ba'o// lag pa thal mo khong stong sbyar// sor mo rnams ni phyir bkyed de// pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'dra bar bya// na maHsa man+ta shu n+yA ta dz+nyA na swA hA/ rmad khri byin gyis brlab

pa'o// lag pa thal mo sbyar ba phyir bkyed de// mthe'u chung gnyis ni nang du bkug/ mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo ru// mdzub mo gnyis ni bkug la sbyar// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na ta thA ga ta smi ti swA hA/ hri ba a bud

ga ga na sa ma ya swA hA/ dran pa nyer bar gzhag pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa khong stong thal mo sbyar// mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng tshogs ni gsum pa dgug/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ a ti su ga ta sa man+ta pra ti bi shud+d+hA+e

swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa so so yang dag pa rig pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin no// bum rten stobs lnga dang/ bum pa
byang chub yan lag bdun dang/ 'khor lo de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ de la sogs pa 'bras bu'i

chos nyid dbyings su byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni/ stobs bcu'i sngags dang phyag rgyar 'dus te/ lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar te/ mthe bong gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis nang du bcug la/

gcig dang sgrang la 'di ni stobs bcu'i phyag rgya ste/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na da sha pa la ka ta ra sa hUM sa dza swA hA/ tog dkar byin gyis brlab pa ni/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa la// gung mo gnyis bsgrengs te/

tshigs dbus mar dgug/ mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis so sor bsgrengs te/ rdo rje rtse lnga par byas la/ namaHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na d+harma ka ya swA hA/ dar dpyangs mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlab pa ni/ lag

gnyis thal mo khong stong sbyar// mdzub mo gnyis dgug mthe bong nang du bzung/ srin lag gnyis kyang mthe bong bar du mdzub mo btegs pa'i bar du bzung/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ sarba d+harma sa man+ta pra ba ta thA

ga ta ma nu ga ta swA hA/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de ltar gsal bar byas pa dang// dbang bskur spyan drangs zhal sro dang// lha yi spyan ni dbye bya'o// bskor ba

bya dang sgra snyan bsgrag/ dar gyi lda ldi phyang 'phrul gdags// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste brgya dang so bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje rang gi stan
las langs te/ dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can tshe yi dus byas nas// ngan song gnas su+u 'khyam pa la// de la drang thabs ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad
du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ dbang chen kun 'dus bka' stsal pa// sems can las kyi 'khyams pa de// 'khor ba ngan song gnas nas drang ba ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan pas drangs// nyon cig rdo rje
sems dpa' che// sems can tshe yi dus byas te// ngan song 'khor ba'i gting na ni// rtog pa'i dra bas bcings nas 'khor ba'i snyi yis bzung// tshul bzhin chos nyid ngang du bsgral dgos pas// de nas sems
can byin brlab ste// gnyen po rang las byung ba yin// mig la yi ge raM dgod pas// ye shes me yi dkyil 'khor gyur// ye shes me dang byang chub sems kyis mes// sems can mtshan ma'i bag chags bsreg
par mdzad// sna las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyur// bdag gi ting 'dzin ye shes rlung// skye mched chos kyi rlung gis ni// 'gag med de dag stong par bsgom// lce stengs kha nas chu'i
dal byung// ting 'dzin ye shes chu bo dang// byang chub sems kyi chu bo yis// bag chags de dag bkrus par bsgom// de nas b+h+rUM zhes rab brjod pas// sems can phung po rin po che'i// gzhal

yas khang du gyur pa'o// gzhal yas khang ni de nang du// ting hUM zhes ni brjod pa yis// sems can ti yig dud kar 'dug/ thugs rje ti yig dud kas sbyangs// dud ka'i ti nyid yi ge hUM du gyur// de las dpa'

bo 'bru lnga byung// spyi bo'i gtsug tu oM yin te// lce la yi ge aM gis mtshan// snying gar hUM ni dgod pa ste// lte bar yi ge swA yin no// rkang pa'i mthil du ha ljang bsgom// swA hAs bsdus pa yin pa'o// swA hUM hUM hUM

oM aM/ tshig bshad 'di yis bag chags sbyang// oM las ye shes nam mkhar gyur// khyod kyi bag chags des sbyang ngo// oM las ye shes chu sbyar bas// khyod kyi bag chags des bkru'o// hUM las ye shes sa byung

bas// khyod kyis lnga phung des brtan no// swA las ye shes me byung bas// khyod kyi bag chags des bsreg go/ ha las ye shes rlung byung bas// khyod kyi sgrib pa des bsal lo// rkang mthil yi ge ha bsgom

pas// don yod grub pa yab yum bskyed// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// phrag dog rigs kyi sgo bcad do// mi rnams kun gyi gnas stongs so// las kyi rigs kyi thugs

dam skong// don yod gnas su s+pha ra na phaT// lte bar yi ge swa bsgom pas// rin chen 'byung gnas yab yum bskyed// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// phyag rgya chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// nga rgyal rigs kyis

sgo bcad pas// lha ma yin gyi gnas kyang stongs// rin chen rigs kyi thugs dam skong// 'byung ldan gnas su swa s+pha ra na phaT// snying gar yi ge hUM bsgom pas// rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum bskyed// phyag rgya

chen po bzhi dang ldan// phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// zhe sdang rigs kyi sgo bcad nas// dmyal ba rnams kyi gnas stongs so// rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam skong// sems dpa'i gnas su s+pha ra na phaT// lce

steng yi ge oM bsgom pas// snang ba mtha' yas yab yum bskyed// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// 'dod chags rigs kyi sgo bcad pas// yi dwags rnams kyi gnas stongs

so// pad+ma rigs kyi thugs dam skong// mtha' yas gnas su s+pha ra na phaT/ spyi bor yi ge oM bsgom pas// rnam par snang mdzad yab yum bskyed// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs

kyis// gti mug rigs kyi sgo bcad pas// byol song rnams kyi gnas stongs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam skong// snang mdzad gnas su s+pha ra na phaT// de skad brjod pa'i sgo nas ni// tshon gyi gru gu
bsgongs pa bzhin// chos kyi sku ru gyur pa'o// de nas phung po sbyang ba dang// rnam shes tshogs brgyad sbyang ba yi// don kyi 'di rnams brjod par gsungs// hUM sems can chen po khyod nyon

cig/ khyod kyi lnga phung yan lag ni// gzugs kyi phung po snang mdzad do// tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan te// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas yin// 'du byed don yod grub pa la// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa'

yin// phung po lnga yang mngon sangs rgyas// snyigs ma lnga yang bde ldan gnas// shi ba bya ba ming yang med// mi 'gyur brtan nas gser bzhin no// sems can chen po khyod nyon cig/ khyod kyi gzugs kyi yan

lag la// 'byung ba chen po lnga gnas te// khyod kyi sha ni sa yin te// sa ni yum chen sangs rgyas spyan// khyod kyi drod ni me yin te// me ni yum chen gos dkar mo// khyod kyi khrag ni chu yin te// chu ni yum chen mA ma

ki/ khyod kyi dbugs ni rlung yin te// rlung ni yum chen dam tshig sgrol// khyod kyi sems ni nam mkha' yin// nam mkha' kun tu bzang mo yin// 'byung ba lnga yang mngon sangs rgyas// snyigs ma lnga yang bde ldan

gnas// shi ba bya ba'i ming yang med// mi 'gyur brtan pas gser bzhin no// sems can chen po khyod nyon cig/ khyod kyi rnam shes tshogs brgyad la// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dgod do// rna ba phyag na rdo
rje la/ mig ni sa yi snying po yin// sna ni nam mkha'i snying po yin// lce ni spyan ras gzigs dbang ste// mgrin pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu yin// nyon mongs yid ni sgrib sel yin// rnam shes yid ni byams pa

yin// kun gzhi kun tu bzang po yin// de yi yul brgyad lha mo brgyad// rnam shes brgyad kyang mngon sangs rgyas// shi ba bya ba ming yang med// mi 'gyur brtan pas gser bzhin no// sems can chen po khyod
nyon cig/ khyod kyi yan lag sgo bzhi ni// khro bo chen po bzhi yin te// lag pa g.yas pa stobs po che// lag pa g.yon pa gshin rje gshed// rkang pa g.yas pa rta mchog dpal// rkang pa g.yon pa bdud rtsi
'khyil// de yi yum bzhi khro mo bzhi// mi pham ma dang khro gnyer ma// ral gcig ma dang ro langs ma// yan lag bzhi yang mngon sangs rgyas// shi ba bya ba ming yang med// mi 'gyur brtan pas gser bzhin

no// de nas spyod pa'i skye 'gag dang// chos nyid rnam dag don gyi phyir// sems can thams cad bsad pa'i rgyu// ma skyes phyir yang bsad pa'o// sems can thams cad za ba'i rgyu// gdod nas snying po byang chub
lung// sems can thams cad gtub pa'i rgyu// skye med byang chub sems su bsdu// sems can thams cad bza' ba'i rgyu// gnyis med byang chub sems su bstim// tsit+ta sbubs nas rak+ta gzhibs// byang chub
sems kyi don dang ldan// rA ga chags pa'i rgyu ni khrag yin te// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i bag chags sbyang ba'o// ha ha zhes ni tsit+ta'i rak+ta gzhibs// raM ni me ste chags pa'i rgyu ni khrag yin

te// 'khor ba'i ra ba ma lus bsreg par bya'o// rak+ta chags pa'i rgyu ni khrag yin te// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho ma lus skem par bya'o// tsit+ta mthor to kha phye ste// snang gsal sdong bu gcig bsam mo// a dkar lta

bu'i byang chub sems// lus kyi sdong bur sems gnas te// dzaHhUM baM hoHthugs kar thim// rtse mo byung rgyal bde chen po// ljon shing dmar po thugs kar gnas// nyi ma stong zhes che snyam ste// de nas gzi mdangs

'dus pa'i thig le che// rtag pa chen po dag la gang gnas pa// rtag pa chen po longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// thig le chen po kun nas thams cad gnas// mkhas pas btsal kyang rnyed par ga la gyur// mi 'gyur

yum gyi gzhal yas su// skal ba ldan pa khyod nyid kyi// rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed par bya'o// pha rol phyin pa bcu rdzogs shes rab dbyings kyi bzhu// dam tshig snying rjer 'brel ba'i shul phor zhing// dam

tshig rgyan gyi mchog la rin chen gser// ka la ping ka la yi rgyud phreng la// mtha' gnyis bral ba'i ye shes smyug ma la// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i me la sros// nyon mongs dug gsum 'joms pa'i chu

phyung la// ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sgo bzhi de la bskyon// rno dbal ting 'dzin mde'u yin// sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa yar gsum gyis// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rtog pa bcom// sku las bskyed pa'i rgyal ba'i

sras su bsgom// mi 'gyur yum gyi mkha' dbyings rnam dag pas// rgyal ba'i sras su ma lus bskyed par bya'o// rgyal ba dgongs pa kun 'dus pa// dbang yang de nyid nyid du rdzogs// 'gro don thabs kyi bskul
ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// yang bzhu yang btul gser dpe bzhin// bzhu btul ting 'dzin rtsal yang sbyang// de la nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// chos nyid la yang chos nyid rol// dkyil

'khor la yang dkyil 'khor thim// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ nyon mongs 'khor ba'i gnas nas drang zhing don la dgod pa'i le'u ste brgya dang so lnga pa'o//// bcom ldan dbang chen
kun 'dus la// phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa// e ma ho dbang chen kun 'dus gtso// bdag la log par bdag tu 'dzin cing blta// de dag mnan nam dad gzhug na// las kyi rim pa ji ltar lags// kun
'dus mchog gis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal po des gsol ba'i don thugs su chud nas/ pad+ma'i rgyal po he ru kas/ gzigs thabs chen po nub tu mdzad// ye shes rgyu nyid dag pa
la// nga dang bdag tu rtog pa yis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu ru 'gyur// khams gsum 'di dag bsgral ba'i zhing// dbang du bsdu ba'i las mdzad do// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis

rlobs// khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i zhing// ta na chen po bya ba'i phyir// bde gshegs mang po kun 'dus shing// byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgya dral te// bdud dang gshin rje

'khor bcas kun// gnyis med rol pa'i phyag rgya yis// dus la bab po sa ma ya// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po ste// rtse rgyal brten pa'i gnas chen der// bo de tsit+ta'i dbyings nyid du// khams gsum 'khor
ba kun bsdu ba'o// oM ma hA de ba ma traM ka ru dra/ ang+ku sha dza/ de ltar bkug pas ma dad ste// dam bdar legs pa nyes pa brjod// thar pa'i lam 'byed dkyil 'khor 'dir// brod pa can rnams 'ong ba

ltar// skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu// deng 'dir 'ongs pa legs te 'ong// oM badza g+hu h+ye tri sh+ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de yis phyag rgya brda' yang bstan// shar phyogs lam sgo'i 'jig rten na// yang dag thar lam spyod pa

yi// 'byung po gtum po nga rgyal can// khyod ni sgrub pa kun la sgrib// yang dag shes rab ye shes kyi// rtsa khungs rtag chad bdag las byung// bdag 'dzin bdag tu rtog pa ni// bdag med stong pa'i tho bas
gzhom// bdag po thabs stobs brtson 'grus kyis// gnas ngan lan pa'i ded dpon byed// de nyid bdag rtogs yin pas na// bdag med stong pa'i stobs kyis gzhom// Ad ma na ti ma hA shu n+ya ta badzra mu ka

ra a ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ sarba pA sa ga ra he ru ga pra be sha ma tra da ka ru dra hUM phaT/ a kar+sha ru dra hUM phaT/ kha traM kha ru dra hUM phaT/ oM tra sa tri mu tsa la/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da hUM phaT/ sarba su ka sarba karma sarba kle sha ts+tshin da ts+tshin da

hUM phaT/ sarba pa ti tsi tran/ bang+ga ts+tshin da ts+tshin da hUM phaT/ dregs pa can thams cad dus gcig tu sgra de'i 'dus pa'o// de yis ma traM bsgral pa'o// chos can gyi ni go gos te// dbang chen stobs kyang che
ba'o// bdag stong mtshon cha rnon po yis// gdab pa dag kyang de yis thebs// chos kun dag tu rang gi ngo bos stong// rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos kun rnam par 'jig/ srid pa ji bzhin ye nas stongs pa
yin// 'phags pa thams cad bdag la gson// 'byung po mang po kun nyon cig/ rdo rje rnon po 'jam dpal gyi// shes rab dang ni snying rje dang// thabs la mkhas pa'i byin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba thams cad
sbyang bar mdzad// 'tsho ba'i bdag po tshe dang srog/ gson pa dag kyang bar gcod pa'i// bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas la// gzhoms shing bsad pa'i gnyen po ni// 'jam dpal sprul pa khros pa'i
mchog/ srid gsum mthar byed rngam pa des// kha T+rAM thod dbyug mi bzad pa// gshin rje bcom nas gsad par bya// ro yang 'dzam bu'i gling du bor// sa gzhi dur khrod brgyad po yis// bdag po

dregs pa bsnol ba yi// ro yi nyal thabs gan rkyal te// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar thug pa med// de yang mkhrig gnyis bsnol ba'o// spyang ki dang ni kang ka byang// lag pa g.yon

pa'i mkhrig ma la// khyi gnyis dang ni bya rgod de// thal ba'i mdog la lus bsgreng ba'o// oM shrI pad+ma he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+tAM sa ma ya mu tra ba b+han tsakra ha na ha na hUM phaT/ mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po'i ngang// mtshon

pa'i bar du tshe dang srog/ bde bar gshegs pas bskyab tu gsol// 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'dir 'byung ngo// ma traM chen po de bred nas// shi bas thon pa'i tshig tu bstan// pad+ma'i rgyal po he ru kas// 'di
skad thugs las thon pa'o// skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'chi ba yin// sdig pa'i rkyen gyis bcom pas 'chi// bdag dang dngos po'i blta bas 'jigs// nga yi bstan pa bde la gzung// 'on kyang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal

bral// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cig/ sa ma ya ke sha tsit+ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ de yis zil gyis gnan par bya// de nas yang ni 'di skad do// gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis bcad// sems kyi bdag pos bcad

dam ci// gzugs 'dzin rkang lag bsnol ba yis// yul las 'das pa'i sgo phye zhig/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ma traM ka ru tra sarba te tso spyan drang/ de yis khog pa dral bar bya// dregs pa ma rungs lha chen khyod// sems

kyi sgo kun deng dbye'o// rdo rje 'bar ba'i spu gri yis// gnas ni sgo kun des phye nas// sems kyi bdag po bzhugs par bya// pra be sha phaT// kho yi shes pa yi ges te// de la thabs kyis drang ba yin// khams

gsum nas byung sems can rnams// rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis// 'od zer tshul du bsdus nas ni// de dag bdag gi gzugs la bzung// yi ge de ni tshur 'dus thim/ oM pradz+nyA ke sha tsit+ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ shes pa
gnyis med gyur pa yis// yang dag bsgral la med par bstan// chos nyid skye 'gag med pa la// bde bar gshegs pa 'phro ba zhes// dbyings su bcug pas gnyis su med// kun kyang mnyam nyid ngo bo

nyid// thams cad snying po byang chub pas// ma skyes pas kyang 'gag par 'jig/ bdag nyid ye nas mnyam pa'i sku// thugs rje chen por cir ma mdzad// dbang phyug chen po he ru kas// dur khrod brgyad kyi ma mo

bsdus// gnas bsrung pa dang las bcol bya// dregs pa chen po'i gzhal yas su// sgrub pa chen po gang bsgrub pa// dur khrod brgyad kyi ma mo kun// khrag 'thung dam tshig ji bzhin du// byin dang dngos grub
'bebs par byed// de ltar las rim bstan pa yis// ma dad pa yang ngang la btsud// lhag ma med par de bkod do// de ltar gnas rnams bstan pa'o// rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ ma traM chen

po mnan pa dang gnas dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang so drug pa'o//// de nas yang ston pa dbang chen kun 'dul gyis// phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i// 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to// thams cad kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin te// kun ni kun gyi mchog yin no// kun ni kun gyi ngo bo yin// kun zhes ma la 'brel ba yin// kun zhes nyung la 'dus pa yin// tu ni yongs su ma chad
pa// bzang po bcos med rang la bya// byang chub sems ni klong brdal bas// kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin la// sangs rgyas med cing sems can med// 'khor ba med cing mya ngan med// mtho ris med cing ngan

song med// rdzogs khyab rang byung ye shes la// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar langs kyang// 'di la gzung zhing gcad du med// rtog med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku// gzung du med cing 'ja' tshon 'dra// gsang ba'i
dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// rdzogs pa chen po'i man ngag gis// byang chub sems las ma yengs na// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di la rdzogs// dkyil 'khor nges don 'di bsgoms pas// rgyud drug sems
can thams cad kun// sangs ma rgyas pa gcig kyang med// thams cad byang chub sems su 'dus// nam mkha' gar khyab chos kyi khyab// chos kyi gar khyab sems yin pas// phyi nang gnyis ka sems su

bsgral// sems ni ye nas mya ngan 'das// skye shi gnyis kyi rgyu las bsgral// yod med gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// ji ltar snang yang gzung du med// med pa ma yin snying po'i don// 'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan

'das// gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// blo ldan rab tu skal ldan pas// 'di ni bsgral ba'i lung zhes bya// 'di zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i sras// 'khor ba ngan song blta bas gsal// rnam par rtog pa dgongs pas
bcom// rang rig ye shes lung gis bstan// rnam par mi rtog chos nyid gnas// de ltar don de rtogs pa yis// ma spangs gnas su dag pa yin// ma bgrod gnas su phyin pa yin// phyi yi gnas dang 'phrad pa
yin// 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ blta ba gnas chen bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang so bdun pa'o//// de nas kun 'dus mchog gi bka' stsal pa/

yi ge rnam par spros pa ste// sgra dang dbyangs kyi yi ge bstan// AHka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o
au// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug ni// a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ aM aH de ltar yi ge rnam par spros// phyi mo'i yi ge bstan pa dang// sgra yi yi ge bstan pa

dang// dbyangs kyi yi ge bstan pa dang// ma ning yi ge la sogs pa'o// yi ge dbye ba bstan pa yin// sde dang tshan du dbye ba yin// de la sde tshan lngar dbye yin// sde dang grangs ni bstan pa dang// sngags rnams

rab tu bsdu ba yin// sngags kyi rim pa bstan pa ni// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du yin// rig sngags gsang sngags gzungs sngags dang// snying po phyag rgya la sogs gsungs// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/

dbyangs dang sgra yig bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang so brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nas mchod pa'i rim pa 'di gsungs so// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang// ting nge

'dzin gyi mchod pa dang// rol mo cha byad sgra yi mchod pa dang// nang gi lha mo bzhi yi mchod pa dang/ phyi yi lha mo'i mchod pa dang// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yi mchod pa dang// rang rig mtha' dbus med pa
yis// ye shes bzhi 'phro 'khor lo'i tshul// tshogs chen dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' ni// rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo dang// 'khor gyi khro bo khro mo dang// sgo ma la sogs
gshegs su gsol// zhes spyan drangs pa'o// bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// bsod nams can du deng bdag gyur// byin gyis brlab phyir gshegs su gsol// mchod pa dam pa bzhes su

gsol// shrI badzra aM gu sha dzaH/ shrI badza bA sha hUM/ shrI badzra s+pho Ta baM/ shrI badzra gaN+De ho/ thugs rje'i lcags kyus thugs rje'i rgyud bskul zhing// byams pa'i zhags pas gnas nas spyan 'dren gyi// lcags sgrog bka'

yi pho nyas gnas bskyod la// bder gshegs bzhugs shing rnam grol dgyes pa bskyed// shrI badzra lA s+ye hUM/ shrI badzra mA le traM/ shrI badzra gAr ti hrI/ shrI badzra nIrti a/ dung mdog sgeg mo rdo rje'i spyan// sems dpa'

sngon mo ye shes 'bebs// me long lta bu'i ye shes la// badzra lA s+ye mchod pa rol// yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'bar ma// 'jam dpal rnon po'i dngos grub 'dzin// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la// badzra mA le

mchod pa rol// pad+ma'i dbyangs mkhan rma bya'i mgrin// spyan ras gzigs kyi dngos grub 'dzin// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la// badzra gIrti mchod pa rol// gar mkhan 'gying ma gzi ldan ma// las kyi 'khor lo

rnam par 'joms// bya ba nan tan ye shes la// badzra nirti mchod pa rol// nang gi mchod pa dam pa ni// ye shes bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor// a la la ste bzhes su gsol// shrI badzra d+hu pe d+hu/ shrI badzra puSh+pe pu/ shrI

badzra A lo ke hrI/ shrI badzra g+han+d+he gan/ spros kyi sprin lding bdug pa mo// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gdug pas 'gengs// byams pa'i thabs dang shes rab la// badzra d+hu pe mchod pa rol// ut+pal mthing

ka me tog 'thor// zla gam rin chen 'phro 'dur gsal// snying rje thabs dang shes rab la// badzra puSh+pe mchod pa rol// dbang gi phyag na sgron me bsnams// chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'bar ba 'dzin// dga' ba thabs

dang shes rab la// badzra A lo ke yi mchod pa rol// tsan+dan bdud rtsi char 'bebs ma// dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i thig le 'bebs// btang snyoms thabs dang shes rab la// badzra gan+d+he mchod pa rol// phyi yi
mchod pa dam pa 'di// tshad med bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor// a la la ste mchod pa 'bul// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cig/ byang chub sems dang ma chags pa'i// gnyis su med par tshim gyur

nas// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par ldan/ 'dod yon lnga po thams cad dang// sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kun// sna tshogs ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi// chos dbyings dag pa'i ye shes te// rdo rje lha mo
gzugs mdzes ma// 'dod yon phyag na bsnams pa ste// rkang pas stabs byed lag gar 'gyur// snyan pa'i glu dbyangs blangs nas ni// dkyil 'khor lha la mchod par 'bul// thams cad ma lus sgra rnams

ni// grags stong ngo bo nyid kyis gzhi// me long lta bu'i ye shes te// rdo rje lha mo 'jam ma'i sgra// 'dod yon phyag na bsnams pa ni// rkang pas stabs byed lag gar bsgyur// snyan pa'i glu dbyangs blangs nas

ni// dkyil 'khor lha la mchod par 'bul// bde ba tshims byed bsod nams mchog/ tshims stong ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te// rdo rje lha mo dri mchog ma// 'dod yon phyag na bsnams pa

ste// rkang pa stabs byed lag gar bsgyur// snyan pa'i glu dbyangs blangs nas ni// dkyil 'khor lha la mchod par 'bul// bde ba ro yi tshims byed ma// tshims stong ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
te// rdo rje lha mo bde ba mo// 'dod yon phyogs na bsnams pa ni// rkang pas stabs byed lag gar bsgyur// snyan pa'i glu dbyangs du mas bstod// dkyil 'khor lha la mchod par dbul// bde mchog dkyil

'khor yang byed ma// rdo rje lha mo reg bya ste// 'dod yon phyag na bsnams pa ni// rkang pas stabs byed lag gar bsgyur// snyan pa'i glu dbyangs blangs nas ni// dkyil 'khor lha la mchod par 'bul// rta mchog

rol pa'i tan+t+ra las// dbang gi rdo rje dbyings dang lha rnams la// byang chub rdo rje lcam dral lha mo bcu gnyis kyi mchod pa 'bul ba'i le'u ste brgya dang so dgu pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal po des/ 'gro ba
'dul ba'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor la mchod pa 'bul ba 'di gsungs so// dbang phyug chen po yab yum dang// byang chub rdo rje lcam dral dang// khro bo'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang// ma mo mkha' 'gro
tshogs chen dang// lha dang lha min rnal 'byor pas// thugs dang 'thad pa'i gnas chen 'dir// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol// dam tshig bzhin la ci bder gshegs su gsol// gzugs dang sgra dang
dri dang ro// reg bya chos la sogs pa yi// 'dod yon lnga yi mchod pa 'di// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'bul// a la la ste bzhes su gsol// a la la ste dgyes par mdzod// bstod pa dang ni gshegs
pa dang// 'gugs dang 'dren dang bsgral dang gtub// bai DUr sngon po'i ri rab rin chen la// nyi ma stong gi 'od zer brdal ba ltar// sems dpa' sngon po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du// dpal dang gzi brjid

'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od phung stug po sprin ltar gtibs pa yi// 'jigs byed rngam stabs brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// za byed bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar ba ste// gdug pa thams cad rdo rje'i zhal du
'dren// mi bzad mche bas brgyan pa'i zhal gdangs shing// khams gsum za bar byed pa'i rkan sgra can// nyi zla 'bar ba'i spyan gyi sdang mig gis// bgegs dpung sreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// de
nas mchod pa dbul ba ni// lha rnams mnyes par bya ba yin// de nas dbang gi lha rnams la// tshogs kyi mchod pa dbul ba ni// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal dang
ldan// tshogs kyi slob dpon gshegs su gsol// sku yi bsod nams tshogs kyis brgyan// gsung ni sprul pa tshogs kyis brgyan// thugs ni ye shes tshogs kyis brgyan// dbu ni ral pa'i tshogs kyis

brgyan// spyan ni nyi zla tshogs kyis brgyan// zhal ni hom lnga'i ro yis brgyan// tshems ni rngom brjid tshogs kyis brgyan// phyag ni phra men tshogs kyis brgyan// zhabs ni khro bo'i tshogs kyis brgyan// tshogs chen

sprin gyi dkyil 'khor du// sna tshogs lhag la rol cing gshegs su gsol// sna tshogs rol cing gshegs nas kyang// dbu ni ral pa'i tshogs la rol// snyan ni dung chen sgra la rol// spyan ni nyi zla tshogs la

rol// shangs ni rlung sgrom dri la ro// ljags ni hom lnga'i ro la rol// tshems ni bdud bzhi'i snying la rol// zhabs ni khro bo'i tshogs la rol// gsung ni ma sring tshogs la rol// tshogs chen tshogs pa'i dkyil
'khor du// lha tshogs mdun mar sdud cing gshegs// thugs rje'i lcags kyus thugs kyi rgyud bskul zhing// byams pa'i zhags pas gnas nas spyan yang 'dren// lcags sgrog gnas nas pho nyas gnas bskyod
la// bde gshegs dgyes pa bskyed cing bzhugs su gsol// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg bya chos la sogs pa yi// 'dod yon lnga yi mchod pa 'di// bde bar gshegs la dbul
lags na// dgyes pa'i don la gshegs su gsol// de nas bstod pa bya ba ste// hUM// dbang drag me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// khro bo'i rgyal po za byed hUM sgra can// dbu lnga phyag kyang bcu drug

ste// 'bar ba'i gshog pa bzhi yi brgyan// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du bgrang// dpal gyi chas brgyad sku+u la rab tu rdzogs// gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs phyag na bsnams// rta skad rngam pa'i hUM sgra tse re
re// gdug pa'i 'khor rnams mang po las la 'gyed// dbang mchog 'bar ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ tshogs kyi mchod pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bzhi bcu pa'o//// de
nas dbang gi rgyal po des/ rol mo sgra yi mchod pa gsungs// de nas yang ni las gsungs pa// gsang ba'i mchod pa'i las bya'o// dkar dmar sems kyi 'phro 'du las// byang chub sems su byin brlabs

nas// lha la mchod cing las rnams bcol// gsang ba byang chub sems kyi mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la// dgyes mnyam mchog gi mchod pa ste// gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa ste// rgyu nyid

dag pa'i ngo bo bstan// dag pa'i don gyis de nyid don// chos nyid la yang chos nyid rol// dkyil 'khor la yang dkyil 'khor thim// sprul pa chos nyid ngang du rol// dus gsum dag pa'i rang bzhin la// sku

gsung thugs kyi ngo bor snang// chos dbyings dag pa'i ngo bo ni// dug gsum dag pa'i 'bras bu la// mnyam pa nyid du gsal ba'o// mnyam nyid bde ba'i mchod pa ni// chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pa'o// phyi
nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yis// lha rnams mnyes shing dngos grub 'bebs// gsang ba byang chub sems kyi mchod pa yis// dag pa'i 'bras bu de nyid do// dbyings la ye shes shar ba yin// dbyings dang ye
shes gnyis med chos kyi sku// slar yang mi gnas mya ngan 'das// stong pa'i ngang las bde mnyam pa// rtog med 'gag med mnyam pa'i dbyings// de ltar rtogs mchod dag pa ni// de nyid mngon sangs rgyas
pa'o// sangs rgyas pas kyang sangs rgyas ming yang med// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gsang ba'i mchod pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas bstod pa'i
las gsungs te// e ma ho sangs rgyas ston pas gsungs// che ba'i sgo nas nyid la bstod// hUM// zla gam dbang gi gzhal yas nas// bcom ldan dbang mchog pad+ma he ru kas// dbu lnga ye shes rdzogs pa'i
