yin// chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod pa yin// mi 'gyur dag pa'i dbyings su spyad// dag pa lha yi spyod pa yin// ci spyod chos kyi dbyings su spyad// dor ba med pa'i dbyings su spyad// spyod pa ma nor spyad pa
yin// 'bras bu byang chub ngang du gnas// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ spyod pa ma nor gdeng dang ldan pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang go gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das

dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru ka'i sku las/ sku'i ba spu'i bu ga re re nas/ 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab pa bkye ste/ thams cad bde ba'i sprul pa 'od zer dkar po dang/ dmar po dang ser po dang/ mthing ga dang
ljang gu la sogs pa 'phros pa las/ de las de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams thams cad khyab pa'i sprul pa 'phros/ mkha' 'gro mang po 'od zer las sprul nas/ sku'i gnas bcu nas/ sku las sprul
pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ gzugs ni ji snyed par ston pa/ la la 'od du rgyu ba/ la la sems can gdug pa'i gzugs can/ la la thag pa gzings pa lta bu dang/ de la sogs pa mang po 'thon nas/ dbang gi zhing

yongs su sbyong ba'o// de nas mkha' 'gro ma de rnams sha la rngam pa dang/ khrag la rngub pa'i tshul/ keng rus 'cha' ba'i tshul 'dzin pa ste/ de las snying po 'di 'thon to// e e e e e e/ a ar li yag sha staM

he sha hu lu ka ta ma he b+h+yo/ de lta bu'i snying po thon te gnas la 'khod do// de nas g.yas kyi ba spu 'bum phrag las 'bum phrag g.yas kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang g.yon gyi ba spu 'bum phrag las/ 'bum phrag g.yon gyi

mkha' 'gro ma 'thon no// de rnams la khwa dang 'ug pa dang bzhad dang/ kang ka dang ce spyang gi 'bu srin grol ma dang me 'brug dang/ chu glang dang/ ba glang dang/ rnga mo bong bu'i gzugs kyi cha tshul mthun par

'dzin te/ sha la rngam pa dang/ khrag la rngub pa dang/ rus pa 'cha' ba la sogs pa'i tshul 'dzin te/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'o// lhag ma bdun gyi phud nyul ba ni/ dbang mo la sogs pa rnams dur khrod bsil

ba'i tshal du dbang gi sku las 'thon te/ sems can mi mthun pa'i gzugs sna tshogs par tshul dang mthun par thon te/ de ltar 'thon nas thams cad las byed pa'o// de rnams ni sku'i mkha' 'gro ma 'bum phrag

g.yas g.yon gyi mkha' 'gro ma dang dbang mo ste/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro'o// ma dad pa'i bu mo dang sring mo la sogs pa/ de rnams ni las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'o// ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro mas/ las kyi mkha' 'gro
ma las la 'gyed pa'o// 'das dang ma 'das mkha' 'gro ma gnyis so// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ mkha' 'gro ma'i las kyi le'u ste brgya dang go bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan

'das dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru ka des/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' dang/ las kyi rgyal po gsum la sogs pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// thams
cad dbang gi zhing du dag go/ thams cad bden pas rab tu grol lo// thams cad mya ngan las 'das so// thams cad pha rol phyin to// thams cad bde ba la bkod do// 'khor ba don dam mya ngan
'das// sems ni sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das// yul ni chos su mya ngan 'das// sems can sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das// kun rdzob don dam mya ngan 'das// phung po rigs su mya ngan 'das// khams ni dbyings su
mya ngan 'das// skye med don dam mya ngan 'das// 'byung ba dbyings su mya ngan 'das// rnam shes ye shes mya ngan 'das// nyon mongs mnyam du mya ngan 'das// rtag chad ma nor thig ler

gnas// thig le chos sku mya ngan 'das// mya ngan thams cad mya ngan 'das// rnam rtog ye shes mya ngan 'das// sdug bsngal chos nyid mya ngan 'das// mya ngan thams cad dbyings su 'das// thams cad kun bzang
ngang du gnas// mya ngan 'das pa'i don rtogs nas// skye shi gnyis kyi rgyud las brgal// yod med gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// thams cad chos dbyings mnyam gnas pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol
pa'i tan+t+ra las/ thams cad mya ngan 'das par bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang go lnga pa'o//// de las yang ni bka' stsal pa// thams cad byang chub sems kyi ngang// thams cad dbang gi rgyal po'i
lung// thams cad dbang gi rgyal po'i dbang// thams cad dbang gi rgyal po'i tshe// thams cad dbang gi phrin las yin// ji ltar snang ba thams cad kyang// byang chub sems su 'dus pa'o// rtogs pa mngon
gyur blta ba'i lung// dbyings su spyad pa spyod pa'i lung// thams cad bsdus pa dbang gi dbang// mi 'gyur brtan pa tshe yi lung// gdeng gyur bsrung ba dam tshig lung// drag po bsgral ba phrin las
lung// gzhal yas gsal ba dkyil 'khor lung// bkod pa gsal ba lha yi lung// gol sa med pa don dam lung// bden pa thob pa rtsol ba'i lung// gnyis su med pa rtogs pa'i lung// thams cad gcig
pas sems kyi lung// lung chen zab mor snang ba'o// ji ltar bden pa thob pas dbang mchog dam pa yin// thams cad byang chub sems la gnas// sems kyi don rtogs rdo rje che// rtogs pas mngon du bsgral
gyur phrin las yin// ting 'dzin 'phro 'du gsal bas don byed pa// ting 'dzin 'phro 'du phrin las mchog/ ma dad bdud kyi sde btul pa// log pa 'joms pa'i phrin las yin// thams cad thugs rjes bsgral
ba rnams// thugs rjes gzhan sgrol phrin las yin// don rtogs 'bras bu thob pa ni// rtogs pa bdag bsgral phrin las yin// thams cad dbang bsdus bsgral ba ni// dbang sdud las kyi phrin las

yin// thams cad byang chub sems kyi tshe// thams cad bden pa'i phrin las yin// de ltar phrin las rgya mtsho yis// 'gro don mtha' ru phyin pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi
chos thams cad lung dang/ sems dang tshe dang/ phrin las su bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang go drug pa'o//// de nas dbang chen 'dus pas/ chos thams cad sems yin pas/ sems las rtogs pa'i don
rang grol bsgom pa bde bar bstan pa'o// gsal la rtog med ye shes bsgom// snang stong gnyis kyi gol sa bcad// mi g.yo ba yi ting 'dzin bsgom// rnam par 'phro ba'i gol sa bcad// shes bya
rigs bcad bsgom pa bsgom// ma bdal gol sa gcad par bya// lta ba ma nor bsgom pa bsgom// bsgom du med pa'i goms pa la// yeng du med pa'i ting 'dzin bya// de yi ngang la bsgom pa la// dmigs pa phra
mo'i gol sa bcad// sgom pa ma nor gdeng la mnos// bsam gtan pa yi sgom pa ni// mar me rlung gis ma bskyod bzhin// ltem me mer re gnas par bya'o// rnam par 'phro ba bcad pa yin// byang chub sems

ni rtsa bas te// gzhi ni gcig tu ma nges pas// thams cad phyogs kyi bdag nyid yin// rtogs par gyur pa lta ba yin// de yi ngang la gnas pa bsgom pa yin// de ltar gyur pa sgom pa ste// kun gyi ngo bo byang chub
sems// rig pa rang snang gsal ba'o// de ltar bsgoms pas bsgom par bya// sgom pa cir bsgom had po che// de la gnas shing mi yengs pa// gseb lam gsang ba'i bsgom pa yin// sgom pa de yi don rtogs
pas// thams cad sems ni gcig gi ngang// gcig las ma g.yos tha dad snang// snang ba nyid la dngos po med// dngos med ngang la de gnas pa'o// de ltar bsgom pa'i byin rlabs kyis// de ma thag tu sangs
rgyas pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sgom pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang go bdun pa'o//// de nas dbang chen kun 'dus kyis// phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rnams la/
chos thams cad sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lngar 'dus pas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi dbang bskur ba 'di gsungs so// pad+ma brgyad dang ldan pa la/ dbus su yi ge hUM dmar la bkra ba

la/ tha ma oM dang swA dang hUM dang aM dang has bskor ba'o// dbang bskur ba ste/ hUM/ gsung dbyangs snyan pas 'khor ba'i gnas nas sgrol// skyon gyis ma gos chags med pad+ma ste// gsung gi yi ge hUM dmar la
sogs 'di yi dbang bskur bas// 'dod chags dag pas so so mngon par byang chub dbang thob shog/ pad+ma maN+Dal oM hUM a/ gser gyi 'khor lo de thogs nas// hUM/ chos sku spros med bde chen thig le

che// 'gro ba'i don mdzad longs sku sprul sku 'dzin// gti mug rnam dag sku mchog kun la khyab// nyon mongs rtsad gcod stong nyid mngon par byang chub dbang thob shog/ tsakra kA ya maN+Da la aM a/ thugs kyi mtshan

ma rdo rje de thogs la// hUM/ rtags kyi rdo rje dbyings su cher 'bar ba// thugs mchog 'bar ba rdo rje rtags kyi hUM// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku rnams mtshon byed pa// zhe sdang rtsad bcad me long ye shes te// mngon par
byang chub dbang thob shog/ tsit+ta maN+Dal hUM/ rin chen 'bar ba thogs la/ hUM// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin mdzad pa// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen mdzod// phongs pa rnams kyi re ba skong

mdzad de// nga rgyal gnas dag mnyam nyid ye shes te// mngon par byang chub dbang thob shog/ rat+na maN+Da la swA hUM a/ de nas rgya gram thogs la/ phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba'i don mdzad de// thams cad byang chub

gnas su sgrol zhing bde chen dbyings la 'god// las kyi rigs mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum// phrag dog rang grol bya ba grub pa'i ye shes de// mngon par byang chub dbang thob shog/ oM karma maN+Da la hA hUM
a/ de ltar sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga'i dbang bskur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur thob pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sku gsung thugs yon tan

phrin las lnga'i dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste brgya dang go brgyad pa'o//// de nas myur mgyogs dbang gi mthus// tshe yi sgrub pa yid kyis bsgrub// dang po tshe yi rten gnas la// sprul pa bkye zhing dral zhing
bcom// tshe bkug rten chen de la bstim// gzhal yas bskyed dang tshe dpag med// yum dang lha mo bzhis bskor bsgrub// dgug cing bstim la tshe de yang// gang gnas de la bskur zhing bstim// aM A ro lig

pyAM rA ga ra ti/ dzaHhUM baM hoH// b+h+rUM badzra ang+ku sha dzaHhUM a/ pA sha hUM s+pho Ta baM/ g+haN+De hoH oM badzra A yur+dz+nyA na bin+du b+h+rUM/ tshe b+h+rUM yu b+h+rUM Ni b+h+rUM a b+h+rUM/ hUM pad+ma rA ga'i gzhal yas nas// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas dang// yum

chen gos dkar mo dang gnyis// gnyis med rol ba'i tshe yi gnas// yab kyi tshe ni dkar la dngas// yum gyi tshe ni dmar la dngas// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i tshe ni snum la 'dril// tshe dang ye shes dbang gi

gnas// rtse gcig bsgrub pa'i tshe lags kyi// tshe yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// phyag rgya'i lha mo chen mo bzhi// 'gugs dang 'dren dang 'bebs dang stsol ba'i las mdzad ma// bcom ldan tshe mchog 'gugs
pa'i las mdzod cig/ shar phyogs dung gi gzhal yas nas// dkar mo zhi ba mgyogs pa'i las mdzad ma// tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ sa ma ya de bI ang+ku sha dza// lho phyogs rin chen gzhal

yas nas// sngon mo rgyas pa'i las mdzad ma// tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ sa ma ya de bI pA sha hUM/ nub phyogs rA ga'i gzhal yas nas// dmar mo dbang gi las mdzad ma// tshe dang ye shes

'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ de bI dza s+pho Ta baM/ byang phyogs in+d+ra nI la'i zhing khams nas// ljang gu drag po'i las mdzad ma// tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ sa ma ya de bI dza g+haN+De hoH tshe 'gugs
shing gang la gnas pa de la bstim pa'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ tshe'i le'u ste brgya dang go dgu pa'o//// de nas dbang chen kun 'dus des// nar mar mchod pa bya ba'i rten// rin

chen rgyu'am sa gzhi la// pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten la// khru gang rab tu brtsigs par bya// de la dbang gi lha bkod de// bsnyen nas mchod pa byas nas su// rtag tu bskor ba bya zhing phyag 'tshal na// 'khor
ba ngan song las brgal nas// pad+ma rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob// sa la sogs par phyag rgya byas// rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur// sku'am 'bur du brkos pa'o// de la bsnyen bkur mchod byas na// the

tshom med par rgyal ba'i sku yang 'thob// gzhan yang mchod pa'i rim pa ni// rtag tu dbang gi lha bsgom zhing// spyan drangs mchod dang bstod pa dang// de la gus pa phul byas na// 'bras bu nges par thob par

'gyur// bza' ba dang ni btung ba dang// myang ba dang ni bgo ba yis// dbang gi lha la de bzhin bya// de ltar ting 'dzin de ldan na// 'bras bu dbang dang dngos grub 'thob// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol
ba'i tan+t+ra las/ mchod pa dang ting 'dzin gyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyis brgya tham pa'o//// de nas sgo ba khro bo ma rungs pa'i// las kyi rnam pa 'di rnams bshad// gsang ba'i las su bstan pa
las// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba la// sgo ba yab yum de bshad do// byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs las// phyogs bzhi dag tu spros pa las// khro bo lus gcig 'bar ba la// mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i cha

byad byung// gcig ni snang la rang bzhin med// brgyad ni ye shes 'od dang ldan// de yi steng du dbu re byung// dbu ni khro bo 'bar ba ste// kun kyang dkar la gtsigs par byung// phyag mtshan kun kyang lcags kyu
bsnams// pags pa gsum gyi chas ldan pa// shar gyi sgo la gnas pa'o// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer las// khro bo'i lus la mgo bdun brtsegs// ser la ag tshom 'bar ba ste// phyag mtshan zhags pa re re

bsnams// pags pa dur khrod chas dang ldan// sprul pas ba spu bltams pa ste// zhing chung gdan la bgrad pa'o// gzhal yas lho sgo'i phyogs na gnas// byang chub sems kyi sprin spros pas// khro bo'i lus la zhal
bgrad pa// dmar po ral pa 'gyeng ba ste// mgo lnga brtsegs pa dur khrod chas// lcags sgrog re re bsnams pa ste// zhing gi gdan la yang dag gnas// gzhal yas nub phyogs sgo la gnas// byang chub sems

kyi sprin spros pas// khro bo'i lus la mgo gsum brtsegs// ljang gu'i mdog la mche ba can// dur khrod chas dang ldan pa'o// zhing chung gdan la bzhugs pa ste// gzhal yas byang sgo phyogs la gnas// de ltar sgo
ba bzhi ru gnas// rnam bzhi'i las kun rdzogs par byed// s+pho Ta baM pA sha sha dza mir sha ya/ de ltar sngags brjod pas las la bskul ba'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sgo
ba mgo brtsegs don gyi le'u ste nyis brgya gcig pa'o//// de nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la gnas pa la/ de'i don gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i

don 'di gsungs so// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ e a ra li hUM hrI:dza oM AHhUM/ zhes pa de dag gsungs pa de/ de yi las rnams bshad pa ni// oM ni ye shes kun gyi snying// phyi mo yi ge phreng ba ste// gsal ba'i phreng
bas gsungs pa ste// rig sngags dang ni gsang sngags dang// snying po dang ni gzungs sngags so// yab kyi gsang sngags dam par gsungs// yum gyi rig sngags dam par ro// gnyis med dril ba'i snying po

ni// mi 'gyur ba yi gzungs sngags so// kun la spros dang phyag bya'o// de ltar yi ge de rtogs na// sngags rnams thams cad grangs cha 'gro// bde gshegs kun gyi snying po ste// thams cad de la gnas pa'o// de
yis las rnams byas pa na// byin rlabs chen po de las 'byung// byin rlabs sngags dang phyag rgya yin// rgyal ba gcig 'grub kun kyang 'grub// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa ste// thams cad gcig par
kun gyis mkhyen// des na dgongs pa gcig pa'o// de ltar snying po de brjod pas// sngags las 'od zer 'phros pa yis// de bzhin gshegs kun thugs bskul nas// bde gshegs rgyal ba kun 'dus
te// gsang ba'i dngos grub de la 'bebs// ye shes chen po rab tu gsang// byang chub chen po rab tu gsang// sangs rgyas dngos grub rab tu gsang// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog/ de dag la ni rab tu
gsang// sngags kyi dngos grub dam pa 'bebs// dngos grub dam pa 'dir stsal bas// gang 'dod bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// gsang sngags gsang bar sgrub pa ste// gsang ba'i mchog ste snying po'i

don// snying po dam pa gzungs dang ldan// de don rgyal ba'i snying po yin// de ltar byin rlabs de 'byung bas// sngags dang snying po'i don la rab tu 'bad// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ snying
po sngags dang rig sngags gzungs sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyis brgya gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang chen kun 'dus des/ de nas ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma 'thon nas/ las kyi mkha'
'gro ma las la gtang ba 'di gsungs so// mkha' 'gro ma rnams dbang du bsdus nas/ gsang ba'i dam phog ste/ las bcol ba'o// dbang mo dang/ srin mo dang/ sha za ma dang/ mon gru ma dang/ skem byed ma
dang/ gtor len ma dang/ bya rog gdong dang/ 'ug pa gdong dang/ khyi gdong dang/ spyang mo gdong dang/ gcan gzan gdug pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma dang/ ro langs ma dang/ 'bar ma dang/ bla

rkun ma dang/ mi bzad ma rnams dbang du bsdus te/ oM ra tri kha la he tri sha ya sham ga~M ga~M he phaT/ ces brjod cing las kun byed par dbang bskur te/ dbang gi las thams cad byed par dam bcas so// de nas

yang gtor ma sbyin pa'i sngags 'di dag gsungs so// oM rag sh+na kani ni ma me sha ba liM pU dza ho/ de yis gtor ma sbyin pa'o// oM karma da sha sa ma ya ni b+h+yo/ des ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams la las bcol ba'o// ya

tra ra pa ni in sh+nal+ya b+h+ye ha b+h+yo/ i dan s+yaM maM bya/ dam sbyin pa'o// de nas mkha' 'gro ma de dag so so rang rang gi las dang 'dul skal la bkod do// de nas e ka ma dang/ ral pa ma dang/ khrag mdog ma dang/
de rnams kyang gong du bstan pa de bzhin las rnams thams cad 'grub par byed pa'o// de ltar ji ltar bsgo zhing kun kyang byed/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis dbang gis las thams cad 'grub par byed

pa'o// gzhan yang pho nya dang/ mgo brnyan dang/ sprul pa dang/ yang sprul dang/ sum sprul du byed pas las byed pa'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ las kyi mkha' 'gro ma las la bsgo ba'i le'u ste nyis brgya

gsum pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal po dbang chen kun 'dus des/ ma rungs pa'i dregs pa bdud dang srin po dang/ rU tra ma rung pa ma traM ka/ ma trang rU tra/ a kar rU tra/ dri za dang/ me lha dang/ gshin
rje dang/ lang+ga dang/ gdug pa ma rungs pa dang/ bstan pa la gnod pa 'khor ba'i rU tra de dag thams cad bsgral/ phung po dur khrod gzhal yas su byas pa/ ga go gdan du bor/ ma rungs pa'i gnas

bcom// sha zos khrag 'thung rus pa 'chos/ 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba de rnams bsgral kyang/ da dung gya gyu dang/ lhag ma la zhen pa de dag/ ngan song 'khor ba'i gzhi 'dzin pa/ lta ba log pa de dag/ gnas

yang dag par mdzad pa'i phyir/ sbyang ba phrin las kyi gnas 'di gsungs so// sems can de dag kun gyi/ dug gsum sbyang ba'i slad du// ma dad chen po khyod lus la// dug gsum zhe sdang me ltar 'bar// me yi

snying po raM yin te// ye shes chen po'i me byung bas// drod kyi kun rtog dug gsum bsreg raM// ma dad chen po khyod lus la// dug gsum nga rgyal rlung du 'tshub// ye shes chen po'i rlung byung bas// dug gsum nga
rgyal 'bud par bya'o yaM// ma dad chen po khyod lus la// dug gsum 'dod chags chu ltar 'brub// ye shes chen po'i chu byung bas// dug gsum 'dod chags bkru bar bya'o khaM// ngan song phung po gsum po
la// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i gnas bkod pas// rgyud lnga 'khor ba'i rgyun lam bcad// de dag rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed// kun tu bzang po'i ngang nyid la// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med
pas// gnyis med don gyi lus la dgod// sems ni mi ldog dbyings su bsgral// phung po rang grol sangs rgyas rnams// 'byung ba'i yul ni de bzhin no// tsit+ta rgyal ba'i gnas su ste// 'og min bla med gnas

mchog na// yab yum phyag rgya dbyings rgya nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// rdo rje dbyings kyi gral du dgod// a a yaM s+pha ra Na phaT/ btab bas/ yab yum gnas su rdo rje sems dpar bskyed// sems
dpa' 'phrul dgu gsal ba la// rnam gsum dbang yang bskur bar bya// dang po chos kyi gzugs brnyan yin// gnyis pa lhag par byang chub dbang// gsum pa bdud rtsi chen po yin// de ltar dbang bskur don

du bya// gzhan yang mos pa tshig gis bstod// spar ba bla med pa la ste// bstod pa 'og min pa la bstod// smon lam rdzogs pa chen por gdab// hUM/ pho brang pad+ma'i gdan steng na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha
rnams kyis// spar dang bstod pa'i las mdzad la// nyon mongs 'khor ba zhi bar mdzod// ces bstod do// de nas rgyud dang lung dag dang// man ngag la sogs smon lam btab// de ltar de yi byin rlabs
kyis// 'bras bu mtho ris 'thob pa'o// gsang ba'i rdzogs pa'i sa la dgod// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ ma dad pa 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral ba de gnas bde ba la dgod pa gsang

ba'i le'u ste nyis brgya bzhi pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i las sbas pa'i thig le pha rol phyin pa'i gnas dam pa thob pa// spyod pa bcu gnas su dag/ mchog ma bgrod bde ba thob pa'i// las kyi rnam pa 'di rnams

gsungs so// las kyi rgyal dang phyag na rdo rje dang// pad+ma sems dpa' khyed rnams nyon// byang chub lam la dgod pa'i phyir// chos kyi spyod pa bcu yang spyod// rnam dkar dge ba la 'dun phyir// sbyin pa rnam
gnyis rtag tu thong// brjod du med pa'i don rtogs kyang// sgrib pa sa lam rim par sbyong// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan med kyang// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams la mchod// kun gzhi chos kyi

mdzod yin yang// chos kyi sgo dang rnam grangs la// rim pa de la spyod par gyis// gtsang dang dme ba gnyis med kyang// byang chub chu rgyun khrus rnams kyis// skye ba med pa'i don rtogs kyang// sbyin pa rnam bzhi
rtag tu thong// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med kyang// rtsol ba drag pos brtson 'grus skyed// ces gsungs so// de nas yang bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' la sogs khyod rnams nyon// theg pa'i rim pa
bsam yas kyang// rtogs pa'i don la gcig las med// chos kyi 'bras bu bsam yas kyang// rtogs na byang chub sems las med// gnas kyi bye brag bsam yas kyang// rtogs na bgrod med
gnas las med// chos kyi sgo mo bsam yas kyang// rtogs na 'jug sgo gcig las med// thams cad byang chub sems chen po// de la rtag tu sgom par gyis// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/
'jug sgo bstan pa'i le'u ste nyis brgya lnga pa'o//// de nas dbang chen 'dus pa des// pad+ma sems dpa' la sogs nyon// thams cad sems nyid yin pa la// byang chub sems zhes bshad pa yang// chos

kyi sgo mo de gsungs kyang// gnyen po nyid du gsungs pa yin// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong yang// rtsa ba nyon mongs lnga ru 'dus// de las rtsa ba gsum du 'dus// nyon mongs rtsa ba 'dod chags yin// de
nyid 'dul ba'i gnyen po ni// 'dul ba nyi khri chig stong yin// dag byed gnyen po gcig las med// nyon mongs dug sdong chen po zhe sdang yin// de yi 'dul ba'i gnyen po ni// mdo sde nyi khri chig stong
yin// cig car gnyen po gcig las med// nyon mongs dug sdong gti mug yin// de yi 'dul ba'i gnyen po ni// mngon pa nyi khri chig stong gsungs// spyod byed gnyen po gcig las med// de ltar rtogs pas

de dag na// sdug bsngal chos nyid nyid du'o// nyon mongs lnga yang ye shes lnga// ye shes lnga yang de nyid don// thams cad gnyis med don du bshad// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o// sku dang thig le
gnyis med pa'o// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'o// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pa'o// 'di dang pha rol gnyis med pa'o// skye dang 'gag pa gnyis med pa'o// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol

pa'i tan+t+ra las/ 'khor rnams la chos gnyen po dang gnyis su med pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste nyis brgya drug pa'o//// de nas pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ las kyi rgyal po rnams
kyis/ dbang gi rgyal po la mgrin gcig tu bstod do// e ma ho dbang gi rgyal po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi yab chen po// thams cad kun bzang yangs pa'i gnas// sangs rgyas gtso mchog khyod la bstod// e
ma ho/ bde bar gshegs pa mang po'i sras// sangs rgyas kun 'dus kun mkhyen dpal// thams cad kun gyi mdzod 'dzin pa// ston pa'i sgron ma khyod la bstod// e ma ho bde gshegs thugs rje che// chos kyi
char chen 'bebs mdzad pa// thams cad gnas su 'dren mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas thugs rje gtso la bstod// e ma ho bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// sems can kun gyi skyabs mdzad cing// phongs pa
rnams kyi re ba skong// thugs rje mgon skyabs khyod la bstod// e ma ho pad+ma mdzod 'dzin cing// longs spyod don dam gter 'dzin cing// dgos 'dod thams cad skong mdzad pa// nor bu rin
chen khyod la bstod// e ma ho thugs rje che ldan cing// ma rig rmongs pa'i mun pa sel// thams cad thugs rje 'od kyis 'dren mdzad pa// ston pa'i sgron ma khyod la bstod// e ma ho thugs rje mgon skyabs
ldan// thams cad nye ba'i mgon skyabs mdzad// skyabs chen dam pa gdugs kyi mchog/ thugs rje'i mgon skyabs khyod la bstod// e ma ho 'dod chags chags pa che// chags pas chags pa'i nad rnams

sel// chags pa dag pa ye shes mchog/ dag pa'i gtso mchog khyod la bstod// e ma ho sangs rgyas ston pa'i mchog/ ma rig nad kyis zin pa la// dam chos bdud rtsis 'tsho byed pa// sman gyi rgyal po khyod la
bstod// sangs rgyas ston pa thugs rje'i bdag/ byams mgon thugs rje ldan pa'i mchog/ thams cad lam gnas bder 'god pa/ byams mgon thugs rje'i bdag la bstod// ces mgrin gcig tu bstod
pa'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ 'khor rnams bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal pos gsungs pa la yi rangs nas bstod pa'i le'u ste nyis brgya bdun pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal

pa// pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' dang/ las kyi rgyal po dang/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor khyed rnams kyis/ nga'i rgyud 'di zung zhig/ 'chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kha ton du gyis shig/ thub par gyis

shig/ dar zhing rgyas par gyis shig/ yongs su sgrogs shig/ shod cig/ ston cig/ rgyud 'di bdud rtsi dam pa yin no// 'di ni dngos grub dam pa yin no// 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// rgyud ni thabs dang
shes rab dang// dbyings dang ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i gdeng 'di bzung bas mchog tu gyur pas rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud ces bya bar zung zhig/ 'di las dgos pa thams cad 'byung bas/ nor bu rin po che'i
rgyud ces bya bar zung zhig/ rtog pa thams cad sel bar byed pas/ rtog pa sel ba'i rgyud ces bya bar zung zhig/ thams cad sgrol bar byed pas/ sgrol byed chen po'i rgyud ces bya bar yang zung zhig/ ces
gdams so// de nas pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' dang/ las kyi rgyal po dang/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs par gyur nas/ mig mi 'dzum

par bltas te gnas pa'o// de nas 'khor de rnams rang rang gi sa la 'khod do// rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las/ rgyud yongs su bzung zhing gtad pa'i le'u ste nyis brgya brgyad pa'o//// rta mchog rol pa'i
rgyud chen po rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad las bod skad du bsgyur ba'i lots+tsha ba ni/ rak+Shi sid+d+hi dang/ lce ku ku rA dzas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//// rgya gar skad

du/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta gu Na karma g+hu h+ya A dz+nyA sam+ma ta ba sha puSh+ta pra ha ya la li ta ma hA tan tra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs dang/ yon tan dang/
phrin las gsang bar bka' bgros pa/ dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po/ lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan gsang ba'i bdag nyid che mchog dbang mchog dam pa so so ma yin pa'i rang bzhin te/ mtha' dbus med pa'i 'og min gyi gnas/ drag

po mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang kun tu zla gam du gyur pa/ gzhi tshad med pa ye shes kyi 'khor lo las grub pa/ rgyu rin po che sna tshogs 'bar ba/ 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i rgyan mang pos bklubs pa/

nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa/ pho brang lhun gyis grub pa/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin/ sprul pa me 'brug dang rlung 'brug gis dus bzhir phye ba/ thug chom dang 'ur sgras 'dir cing sgra 'byin pa/ khro bo mang

po'i yul du gyur pa/ gsang ba thams cad kyi mdzod du gyur pa/ drag shul sngags kyi rgyab/ dbang chen shugs kyis bsgral bas/ khams gsum dbang du bsdus te/ lha chen po brgyad kyi rtsig rmang byas pa/ phyogs

skyong bcu bzhis brtsig par brtsigs pa/ klu chen po brgyad kyis gdung phyam du bres pa/ gza' chen po brgyad kyis bad dang dral mar byas pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bsib byas pa/ thod rus kyi bar khyams

la/ gnam lcags kyi gzer gyis brgyan pa/ nyi ma dang zla bas spras pa/ zhing chen bla bre dang 'phan gdugs kyis brgyan pa/ nya chen gyi 'phan dang/ sbrul chen za ra tshags su gnas pa/ chu srin gyi sgo dang/ me ri

dmar nag sprin ltar gtibs pa/ dbus kyi pho brang la skar ma rgyal gyi 'od zer gdugs su bskor ba de na/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas gar gyi dbang phyug chen po/ thugs chags pa chen por gyur pa/ sku

gsung thugs yon tan phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ kun tu zhal pad+ma dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ las kyi rigs su gyur pa dang/ grangs dang/ phyag rgya dang/ kha dog la
sogs pa'i ngo bor bzhugs so// de yang rigs kyi yab dang/ yum dang/ sems dpa' dang/ sems ma dang/ khro bo dang/ khro mor bcas pa bzhugs so// de yang kun nas nyon mongs pa mtshan mar bcas pas
rol par mdzad/ che ba'i che mchog dbang mchog dam pa des/ phrin las rnam pa bzhis don mdzad de/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskor nas bzhugs pa ni/ rol pa chen po mi bskyod pa

dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ mi 'khrugs pa dang/ bde chen rdo rje 'dzin tha mi dad pa'i phyi rim na/ kun rig chos kyi rje dang/ rnam par snang mdzad gangs chen mtsho khyab snang mdzad dang/ kun tu zhal dang/
mngon par byang chub dang/ nye bar gyur pa'i phyi rim na/ rol pa chen po dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang/ rin chen 'byung gnas dang/ nam mkha' mdzod dang/ rin chen dra ba dang/ rol pa rin chen tog dang/
byin brlabs theg pa'i 'khor rnams ni/ rol pa chen po 'od dpag med dang/ tshe mtha' yas dang/ chos kyi dpal dang/ chags med mya ngan 'joms pa/ thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor rnams ni// las mchog rdo rje

gar dang don yod grub// rdo rje dbang sdud rdo rje gnod sbyin dang// rdo rje brtson 'grus shugs kyis rol par mdzad// gzhan yang thugs rje'i 'khor rnams ni// mtshan dang dpe byad kun las 'phro// rngam zhing

gtum dang zhi ba'i sku// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum tshul du byung// 'khor lo tshogs chen byin rlabs yin// ye shes chen po'i byin rlabs las// thams cad rol bar mdzad pa ni// sa yi snying po nam mkha'i snying po

dang// spyan ras gzigs dbang lag na rdo rje dang// 'jam dpal gzhon nu byams pa mai tri dang// sgrib pa sel dang kun tu bzang po dang// sgeg mo phreng dang dbyangs dang gar mkhan ma// spos dang me tog mar

me dri chab ma// gzhan yang rol pa chen po'i 'khor rnams ni// rnam rgyal gshin rje rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bur bcas// dkyil nyid 'khor yin 'khor nyid dkyil yin

phyir// gzhan yang rol pa'i 'khor rnams ni// zag med long ba rgyab 'brel brgyad// dmus long 'khor ba drug cu// lcags spyang brgyad dang ye shes khyi// bcu drug dregs pa rol par mdzad// theg dgu rnam thar

brgyad dang ni// ye shes drug dang sku gsung thugs// rtags su sgo ba chen po bzhi// yon tan ye shes drug ldan pas// kham rgya chen mo drug gi tshogs// rnam shes tshogs brgyad dag pa'i dbyings// dkyil 'khor
brgyad kyi bdag nyid che// rta mgrin dbang dang rdo rje dbyings// bde chen dkyil 'khor yin pa'i phyir// ye shes sems dpa' gzi ldan ma// dbyings las rig pa shar bas man ngag mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil
'khor rim pa gnyis// shes rab rig pa mdzod kyi dbyings// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor rim pa gnyis// mi nub rgyal mtshan 'khor lo che// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// dkar mo'i tshogs dang rkun mo'i
tshogs// sbos mo'i tshogs dang gtum mo'i tshogs// rmongs mo'i tshogs dang thal mo'i tshogs// sme sha can dang ma tshogs ma// seng gdong tshogs dang rta gdong tshogs// wa gdong tshogs dang khyi

gdong tshogs// gzhad gdong tshogs dang dur bya'i tshogs// bya rog gdong dang 'ug gdong tshogs// 'jigs pa'i phyag mtshan bcu drug che// skye bzhi las bzhi sgrol mdzad gshog bzhir ldan// dra ba can dang glog

'gyu ma// sder mo can dang ma mo de// phyi nang gsang ba mthar thug gi// pad+ma las byung skye med pa// stong rtsa gnyis kyi sangs rgyas kyang// nyi stong rtsa gnyis thabs kyi rgyud// zla stong rtsa gnyis shes rab
rgyud// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// dug lnga dngos po rol bar mdzad// sa bcu dus gcig zil gnon pas// pha rol phyin bcu rab tu rdzogs// stobs bcu thogs med rab ldan pas// khro rgyal
gzir nas phrin las bzhi// lhun gyis grub pa'i gnon bzlog gis// tshar gcod mdzad pa'i ngo mtshar ni// mtshungs med che ba'i khyad par rab bstan phyir// nga rgyal dpung bsnyol bdud kyi dpung bcom
nas// 'jig rten 'das pa'i bde ba chen po brgyad// che ba'i rtags dang dbang phyug yang ches gnon// smon lam dbang dang thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// 'jig rten drug dang dus bzhi phyogs bcu

na// gzugs khams ma lus dbang du bsdu ba dang// dregs pa'i lha brgyad nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir// lha brgyad bzung nas gzhal yas rmang du bting// gti mug ma lus ye shes bskyed pa dang// byol song klu
rnams dge la gzud pa'i phyir// klu brgyad bzung nas gzhal yas gdung du bres// 'dod khams ma lus dbang du bsdu ba dang// phyogs mtshams srin po'i dregs pa gzhom pa'i phyir// rgyal chen phyogs skyong
bzung nas rtsig par brtsigs// sku bzhi dpal brgyad tshang bar bya ba'i phyir// rgyal chen rigs bzhi bzung nas ka bar btsugs// theg pa'i rim pa dgu las spags pa'i phyir// glang chen ka la 'ging gis ka

rten byas// gling bzhi'i mi rnams dgos 'dod bskang ba dang/ tshig chad dam brtag/ gza' brgyad rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad rnams// gdan dang mig tshags byas pas dus bzhi 'gyur ldog med// 'jig rten thams

cad zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// seng ge ka la sha yis ka zhu byas// 'khor ba'i gcong snying gtan nas spyad pa'i phyir// seng ge'i kha nas bdud rtsi'i 'o ma 'dzag/ dkyil 'khor thams cad bdud rtsir gyur pa
yis// phyi rol snod kyi khams dang nam mkha' dang// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang ri// nags tshal la sogs kun la thims// bcud kyi khams kyi sems can dang// sems dang sems las byung ba
dang// g.yo ba dang ni 'gul ba dang// dmyal ba yi dwags byol song dang// mi dang lha dang lha min dang// lha ris so so'i khams dang ni// bsam gtan bzhi dang tshad med dang// gzugs med

khams dang mu stegs khams// bdud chen po dang lha dang klu// gnod sbyin srin po nam mkha' lding// mi'am ci dang rU tra dang// rU tra can la sogs pa rnams// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyis// rang

dbang med par 'khor du 'dus// dbang phyug dregs pa'i chung ma rnams// dbang mo nyi shu dang ni brgyad// ji snyed de snyed 'khod pa yi// phra men ma yi tshogs bcas dang// ma dang bu mo chung ma dang// bran dang

g.yog dang yang g.yog dang// bdag dang gzhan pa'i shes pa'i rgyud// thams cad ma lus zhi ba dang// dbang dang rgyas dang drag po dang// dgug dang bcing dang gtang ba dang// dgrol dang drang dang rengs pa
dang// rmugs pa dang ni dbral ba dang// bza' dang btung dang bca' ba dang// bsad dang mnan dang sbar ba dang// 'pham dang rgyal la sogs byed cing// thams cad rol pa'i 'gral du 'khod// de nas gzi
ldan pad+ma can// kun tu bzang mo zhes bya ba// dbang mchog dam pa'i sku la 'khril te bzhugs// snod bcud khams rnams ma lus kun// pad+mar gyur pa skye ba'i rgyud// chags med mkha' ru rnam dag
go/ rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan tra las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang mchog dam pa'i rdo rje'i sku des/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
bcu na/ dus bzhi'i rgyal ba rnams dang/ dus bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa thams cad la gzigs so// rnam par gzigs so// kun tu gzigs so// gzigs nas smra bsam las 'das pa de bzhin nyid kyi
ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs te/ cang mi dgongs/ de nas cang mi mdzad/ rnam par mi mdzad mi gsung/ rnam par mi gsung/ rnam par mi rol/ kun tu mi rol/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu dang/
dus bzhi dang/ khams gsum dag na/ sa dang sa'i khyad par dang/ dkyil 'khor du gyur pa thams cad la/ rnam par mi gzigs kun tu mi gzigs/ gzigs shing dgongs pa yang mi 'gog/ mi 'gog pa yang
mi gnas so// rnam par mi 'gog mi gnas so// de nas ting 'dzin de la zhugs ma thag tu/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang/ snod kyi khams de dag dang/ sa'i khyad par thams cad dper na nam mkha' lta

bu ste/ ji lta bu'i ngo bor yang gdags su med do// de ltar na don dam pa byang chub kyi sems de yang/ chos thams cad las kyang 'das la/ smra bsam las kyang 'das so// de ltar sku'i ngang du brjod du med pa de
la mnal bzhin du/ thams cad kyi yum gzi ldan pad+ma can kun tu bzang mo zhes bya ba des/ stong pa nyid kyi ngang las glu 'dis bskul// oM snang stong stong pa rdo rje chos kyi sku// smra bsam las 'das

don dam byang chub sems// stong nyid ngang las mi 'da'i dam tshig gis// snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo bstan du gsol// de skad ces ni bskul ba dang// rkyen du gyur pas thugs chud nas// stong pa nyid kyi ting

'dzin las// rig pa'i ye shes nyi lta bu'i// snying rje kun tu khyab gdal te// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor khyab par mdzad// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// snod dang bcud du gyur pa la// snying rje chen pos kun

khyab mdzad// ri nyil snying rje byang chub sems kyis kyang// stong pa nyid kyi ngang las kun tu khyab par gnas// de tshe dbang mchog dam pa sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid des// ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas

kyang// snying rje 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la rab tu zhugs te/ kun tu snang bas khyab par mdzad pa ni// ting nge 'dzin de rtse gcig mthu yin no// gzi ldan pad+ma can des kun tu bzang mo'i glu 'di blangs// ma

ltar byams pa'i thugs rje yongs la khyab// mkha' ltar go 'byed cho 'phrul gnas pa la// longs spyod rdzogs sku thugs rje sprul pa'i sku// 'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol// a la la ho// de skad

ces ni gsol btab pas// dbang chog dam pa rdo rje'i sku des ni// chos rnams byang chub sems la shar bar mkhyen// mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas rdo rje'i sku mngon phyung// dper na nyi ma mkha' la sprin

med shar ba 'dra// rdo rje'i sku las 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba ni// nyi ma stong gi 'od zer dus gcig shar lta bu'i// dbang mchog dam pa rdo rje'i sku des ni// ting 'dzin de las langs nas kyang// 'dod chags rdo

rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so// gzi ldan pad+ma can la gzigs te 'dzum par mdzad// gzi ldan pad+ma can gyi 'gying tshul gyis// spyan gyi gzigs thabs zim bag tshul du dgongs// lan

grangs brgya stong phyag kyang 'tshal// g.yel ba slong ba'i glu 'dis rnam par bskul// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i sku// rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis rol pa mdzad// dga' mchog rdo rje byang chub sems chen des// 'dzum

zhing 'khyil la pad+ma'i gnas su phob// ho dkar la 'tsher ba'i byang chub sems sprin de// dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin du// gnyis mnyam 'phros pa'i byin rlabs las// ye shes lha tshogs sprul sku bsam yas 'thon// ma rig mun pas

mdongs pa'i don gyi phyir// dgon dung gnas nas byang chub myu gu bskyed// zhi ba 'gog pa'i sa las rnam par slongs// de skad ces ni glu blangs pas// gnyis med rol cing rnam par rol// brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad
dang// 'dzum pa mdzad dang 'dor ba dang// bskum dang bsgyings dang spyan mdzes blta// smin ring bskyed cing 'gyur ba dang// rdo rje phur pas g.yan pa slong// 'dor zhing bskum dang 'jo sgeg

dang// rnam par rol pa'i gar gyis kyang// nam mkha'i khams kun khyab mdzad do// rnam par rol pa nges 'byung bas// byang chub sems ni zhi zhing 'khyil// rol pa'i char ni mngon phab pas// 'jig rten drug
gi phyogs bcu na// snod kyi khams dang bcud khams ni// ma lus gyur pa thams cad na// byang chub sems kyi rol pa las// sgeg dang 'khyud dang sdom pa dang// sbyor dang bstim dang mnyes pa dang// kun du
rab tu rgyas par byas// yang dag bde la rab gnas so// de tshe thugs mchog rnam dag las// mkha' klong rnam par dag pa nas// rig pa'i byang chub sems chen po// 'od zer 'byams klas shar ba de// gsung

gi yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs// rgyun mi 'chad par rab snang ngo// yig 'bru de nyid phyag mtshan te// thugs kyi mtshan ma dam tshig rgya// gyur pas 'phros shing 'dus pa'i tshul// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po
ni// rgyal ba yab yum sems dpa' dang// sems ma rnams su 'khod pa dang// thub pa rnams dang 'joms pa'i tshogs// sku ru gsal bar gyur pa ni// rang rang dam tshig phyag rgya byas// dbang chen la ni mdun
gyis bltas// rdo rje rol pa'i gral du 'khod// de dag re re la yang sangs rgyas 'khor// sangs rgyas zhabs 'bring dang bcas pa// 'byams klas nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam pa// lhun gyis grub pa rab snang

ngo// yang dag 'od zer re re las// he ru ka ni mang po'i tshogs// shar ro rab tu snang shar ro// he ru ka ni re re las// sangs rgyas 'bum phrag so so'i 'khor// zhabs 'bring dang bcas lhun gyis grub// he ru
ka yi tshogs dag las// rig pa'i nyi ma'i char babs te// mun nag klong kun gsal bar mdzad// chos kyi glu dang gar mdzad cing// chos kyi char 'bebs mchod pa che// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// chos

kyi mchod pa rmad du byung// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// rol pa'i cho 'phrul ling long phyed// de tshe sangs rgyas mang po'i tshogs// he ru ka yi 'od phreng des// bdud dang rU tra srin po dang// gnod sbyin dang

ni dbang phyug dang// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad sogs// rang rang nga rgyal mthu ston pa// zhi zhing rab tu dul bar 'gyur// rang rang dag gi dbang phrogs nas// sangs rgyas bstan la dad gyur te// 'dus so kun
tu rab tu 'dus// de yi byang chub sems chen po'i// 'od zer kun tu khyab de la// 'du shes med dang 'gog gnas pa'i// mur stug sa bon mes tshig 'drar// dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems// rin chen chu des
dbang bskur bas// byang chub sems la dbang thob ste// 'gro ba'i don byed nus par gyur// sa dang sa yi khyad par gnas pa rnams// sa la skyo sems rab skyes pa// las kyi tshe bka' byang chub
sems// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di nyid 'dod// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// e ma'o ngo mtshar rab tu che// skrag cing rab tu dngangs gyur nas// shin tu skrag ste gsol btab pa// e ma'o e ma'o

ya mtshan che// bcom ldan 'das pa ya mtshan che// gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che// bdag cag 'khor tshogs 'dus pa rnams// dri med dag pa ya mtshan che// 'od zer 'phro 'du ya mtshan che// byang chub sprin

yang ya mtshan che/ bkag kyang// sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che// sprul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che// khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che// byin rlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che// dgon dung spangs pa ya mtshan che// 'gog pa
gso ba ya mtshan che// bdag cag 'khor tshogs 'dus pa rnams// dam tshig can du byin rlabs mdzod// bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// rdo rje rol pa'i tshig tu 'khod// de skad ces gsol ba btab pas// bcom

ldan 'das dbang mchog dam pa chags pa chen po rdo rje'i sku des/ sku gsung thugs gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas/ 'khor rnam par sbyong ba rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mi zad brgyan gyi 'khor lo mthar phyin pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ gsung mi zad pa rgyan yi 'khor lo mthar phyin pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ thugs mi zad

pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo mthar phyin pa phyag na rdo rjes bskul ba rig nas/ btsun mo kun tu bzang mo gzi ldan pad+ma can dang sbyor zhing/ tshig chad dam/ rang gi stan las rab tu langs te/ byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma

gnas lngar btags pas/ lce pad+ma'i steng du las kyi rdo rje bzhag ste/ brkyang phyag 'tshal nas/ seng ge'i lta stangs kyis ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas/ don bsdus par gsol ba btab pa/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug
chen po yab yum dgongs su gsol/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs ma lus dgongs su gsol// dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra 'di// chos kyi rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pas/ sku
gsung thugs kyi sangs rgyas de gsum/ sku rdo rje'i bka'/ gsung pad+ma'i bka'/ thugs rin po che'i bka'// kal par byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ thugs gsang ba'i mkha' la/ byang chub kyi sems spros pas/
'khor lo dang/ pad+ma dang/ rdo rje lag tu lhan gyis bzhag ste/ dbang bskur bas ming yang 'gro ba kun gyi dpal du gyur pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur par btags/ snying rje phyogs ris med pas/ spyan
ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug btags/ gsang sngags kyi mdzod du gyur pas/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjer btags te/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbang thob par 'gyur ro// smra ba'i seng ge'i smra

ba'i seng ge zhes ming btags te/ chos kyi smra ba'i dbang thob bo// de nas las kyi 'khor lo bcu gnyis yod pas/ 'khor rnams snod du rung bar byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo bcu gnyis rab tu
bskor te/ cho 'phrul 'di dag rnam par bstan te/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur/

kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// de nas byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs gnas lngar reg par byas/ hUM badzra sa ma ya gu h+ya sa ma ya/

kro d+ha sa ma ya/ rdo rje rol pa bsdus pa yis// 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor tshogs rnams// gong 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du gnos// skal bzang dam tshig chen po ste// de las 'das nas
brlag par 'gyur// de skad ces ni bka' bsgo bas// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams sems rang byas// dam tshig thob nas gral 'khod do// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ni// dbang thob las mdzod chen po
des// bcom ldan 'das la gtsug gi phyag/ rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas ni// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// mnyes nas gsol ba rab tu btab// 'di ltar rmad byung ngo mtshar che// sangs rgyas
rnams kyi dbang phyug che// mngon spyod ya mtshan ston par spyod// bka' yi 'khor lo dam pa de// smra brjod yul las rab 'das kyang// ngag gi lam nas rab 'don cing// dpes mtshon tshig gi lde mig
gis// yi ge ming dang tshig tshogs kyis// gsal bar mtshon te go bar mdzod// a la la ho go bar mdzod// ston pa dbang phyug dam pa des// gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas kyang// brjod du med pa'i ting
'dzin la// snyoms par zhugs nas mi gsung bzhugs// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis// smra ba'i seng ge chen po la// logs su btud nas phyag 'tshal nas// rmad byung mchod pa sna tshogs byas// gsol
btab smra ba'i seng ge khyod// bdag cag zhu'o gnang skabs phyes// smra ba'i seng ge gsang bdag gis// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyod nyon cig/ bdag la zhus shig spobs par byos// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs
rnams kyis kyang// smra ba'i seng ge gsang bdag khyod// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yab kyang lags// byang chub sems dpa'i rje btsan lags// chos rnams thams cad mdzod lags na// bcom ldan gsang mchog
dam pa des// gsang sngags lam rnams mi ston pa// rgyu dang rkyen ni gang lags pa// bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol// legs par tshig tu bstan du gsol// smra ba'i seng ges bka' stsal

pa// oM AHhUM a la la ho// sangs rgyas rnams ni cang mi gsung// ma gsungs pa nyid rgya cher bshad// bshad du med pa'i don de ni// rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bshad de// da ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang// rnal
'byor brjod par mi mdzad de// bka' mi stsal bar dgongs pa'o// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig/ byang chub dam pa'i snying po ni// smra bsam las 'das brjod med pas// tshig tu brjod pa legs
ma yin// tshig tu smra ba'i dus nyid ni// gol ba yin par bdag nyid ni// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad// da ltar nyid kyang der dgongs pas// ma gsungs mi gsung gsung du med// de yang sems
dpa'i snying po ni// spros dang bral ba ma yin kyang// kun rdzob bden pa'i dbang tsam du// mtshan ma tshig gi rnal 'byor rnams// don dam rtogs dka' bkri ba'i phyir// rgyal bas tshig gi sgo gsungs

yin// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis zhus pa// smra ba'i seng ge de ltar na// bdag cag ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pa// tshig gi rjes 'breng don dang yang// gsang ba'i lam brjod gsal byed pa// smra ba'i seng ge chen

po khyod// dbang bskur bas na zhu bar spobs// bcom ldan dbang mchog dam pa la'ang// zhus shig smra ba'i seng ge khyod// smra ba'i seng ge gsang bdag gis// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams rnam rtog mkhyen// bcom

ldan dbang mchog dam pa la// phyag 'tshal rmad byung mchod pas mchod// rdo rje'i tshig tu 'di skad gsol// e ma'o ston pa ngo mtshar khyod// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// byang chub sems kyi mtshan

nyid ni// tshig tu brjod pa ma lags kyang// mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang rnal 'byor pa// don la rtsing zhing tshig la zhib// tshig gis bsam pa rang bya'i phyir// snying po byang chub don 'di la// dpes mtshon tshig gi lde
mig gis// gsang ba'i de nyid bstan du gsol// gsol ba btab pas gsang bdag po'i// zhus mkhyen 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis ni// sems kyi rtog pa mkhyen pa yang// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor rjes 'brang

ba// tshig la dka' ba thugs chud nas// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i dbu// kun tu zhal du rab gzigs te// ye shes rdo rje rtse lnga pa// yang nas yang du gsor byed cing// thams cad pad+mar gyur pa yi// rmad byung

chos kyi sgra chen bsgrags// oM AHhUM swA hA/ b+ho d+hi tsit+ta gu+u h+ya sa ma ya a/ 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po yang// rab tu dngangs shing brgyal bar gyur// thams cad ma lus smos ci
dgos// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces// bka' stsal rigs kyi bu rnams nyon// tshig brjod thams cad kun rdzob bden pa yin// ji srid brjod du med pa'i chos gang ni// de ni don dam

bden pa'o// tshig dang yi ge la 'das pa ni chos sku'o// tshig dang yi ge brjod du rung ba ni gzugs kyi sku'o// sngags kyi lta ba spyod pa de nyid yin// chos kyi sku gang yin pa de// sngags kyi blta bar shes par

bya// de nyid sgyu ma'i tshul du gnas pa dang// 'bras bu'i tshul du kun rdzob bden pa dang// gzugs kyi skur snang me long lta bu'i tshul// ji ltar spyad dang spyod du rung ba ni// spyod pa rnal 'byor can gyi lta ba'o// de
skad ces ni bka' stsal nas// a la la yi sgra brjod do// smra ba'i seng ges dri ba dris// de ltar lags na bcom ldan 'das// sngags kyi lta bar blo gnas gang// spyod pa 'ba' zhig blo gnas gang// dbang
mchog dam pas bka' stsal pa// smra ba'i seng ge gsang bdag khyod// 'di don zhu bar spobs pa legs// sngags kyi lta ba sangs rgyas kyis// mnyam pa'i don rtogs spyod yul yin// ci phyir zhe na kun rdzob
bden pa yin// bden pa gnyis su dbyer med phyir// kun rdzob bden pa ga la yod// blta dang spyod la blo gnas shing// rnal 'byor sa thob sa gnyis yin// ci phyir zhe na rnal 'byor mnyam nyid de// bden pa

rnam gnyis tshul 'dod de// mi bskyed tshul du blor chud la// kun rdzob mtshan ma thabs kyis su// phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul du ni// med pa ma yin mtshan med pa'i// rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir// slob pa'i
rnal 'byor gnyis brten nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa goms pas// che chung gis ni grub pa yin// bstan pa bden pa gnyis la gnas// sgra yi rjes 'brang rnal 'byor ni// don la rang rgyud spyod la gnas// ci

phyir zhe na log pa yi// kun rdzob 'ba' zhig blo rtog gis// yang dag pa yi kun rdzob ni// lha yi dkyil 'khor mthong med phyir// smra ba'i seng ge de bas na// log pa'i kun rdzob so so'i skye bo yis// de lta bu yi
chos la brten nas kyang// yang dag pa yi kun rdzob kyis// bden pa'i lha dang lha mo yi// chos rnams dkyil 'khor du shes bya'o// yang dag kun rdzob bden rtogs nas// don dam bden pa khong chud nas// de
ni rig pa'i skyes bur grags// smra ba'i seng ge de bas na// yang dag kun rdzob la brten nas// don dam bden pa rtogs par bya'o// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra
las// lta spyod rnam gnyis kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das snying po byang chub la dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs nas kyang
'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chos rnams thams cad byang chub sems su 'dus// byang chub sems su snang bar shes par gyis// ci phyir zhe na chos rnams thams
cad ni// lus dang ngag dang sems su 'dus pas na// lus dang ngag dang sems nyid chos kyi rnam par snang// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis lus dang ngag dang sems dag ni bdag cag rnams kyi ci ltar

'tshal bar bgyi// dbang mchog dam pas bka' stsal pa// lus dang ngag dang sems kyi mtshan nyid ni// sems kyang lus dang ngag gi rnam pa lta bu'o// ngag kyang lus dang sems kyi rnam pa lta bu'o// lus kyang

tshig brjod sems kyi rnam pa lta bu'o// rang rang lus dang ngag dang sems rtogs shig/ 'on tang byang chub sems yin bskyed par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma ho dngos po dang bral bas// phung po khams dang skye mched dang// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spang// chos bdag med pa mnyam

nyid pas// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pas// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun skye ba med pa la// skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// skye dang mi skye med pa ste// byang chub

tshul du bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang me long lta bur gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma ho ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs
rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun 'gag pa med pa las// 'gag pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// 'gags dang mi 'gag med pa ste// byang chub la ni bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos
mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun gnas pa med pa

las// gnas pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// gnas dang mi gnas med pa ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos thams cad so sor kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun dmigs su med pa las// dmigs pa 'di ni rab tu
bsgrags// dmigs dang mi dmigs med pa ste// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos thams cad bya ba nan tan du zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun spros pa med pa las// spros dang bsdu bar rab tu bsgrags// spro bsdu

yod dang med pa ni// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas smra ba'i seng ge gsang ba'i bdag po des// a la la zhes sgra phyung ste// byang chub sems la bstod pa// e ma'o stong nyid byang chub
sems// e ma'o dag pa dri ma med// e ma'o mi sgrib gsal ba che// e ma'o mnyam nyid dbyer med chos// e ma'o so so rang rig sems// e ma'o byar med lhun gyis grub// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal
lo// zhes bstod do// bcom ldan 'das kyang byang chub sems// byang chub nyid kyang thugs chud pa'o// bdag cag rig 'dzin tshogs pa rnams// byang chub sems la smon par 'tshal// 'jug dang ldang dang gnas
pa ste// rang rang sems ni g.yo bar bgyi// reg par bgyi zhing nye bar bgyi// nyams su myong bar 'tshal lags na// snying rje chen pos dgongs su gsol// bde bar gshegs pa dgongs su gsol// de skad
tshig tu gsol btab pas// bcom ldan snying pos 'di skad gsungs// e ma'o ye nas rnam dag chos// sna tshogs snang la rtog pa snang// ngo bo nyid ni brjod du med// snod ma yin la bstan par dka'o// e
ma'o// srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin las// bdag tu rtogs pa'i srid rtse'i nyes dmigs kyis// yun ring dus nas 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba rnams// mi mthun bde sdug gnas rnams so sor
bzung// log rtog nor ba'i sems kyi kun rtog kyang// rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa rdul tsam med// ye nas don gyi sangs rgyas min mod kyang// rmongs pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba'i 'khor lor

'khyams// log rtog nyid kyang dngos med byang chub sems// 'khrul 'khor nyid kyang mi zad rgyan du che// snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas su gsal// phung po lnga nyid mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku// srid rtse'i nyes

dmigs byang chub snying por gsal// phyi nang snod bcud byang chub ngang du gsal// zhes gsungs pas/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi ngang du gnas so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po dbang rgyas rta mchog
rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ byang chub sems kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das snying po rdo rje rtse gcig pad+mar gnas pa des/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dkyil 'khor 'byung bar
bzhad nas ni// shes rab thabs su rol pa mdzad// rdo rje rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// dkyil 'khor gyi ni don 'di gsungs// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon
cig/ gsang sngags byin rlabs bsam yas las// dkyil 'khor bsam yas brjod mi lang// mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yin te// rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor dang// ting 'dzin gsal ba'i dkyil
'khor dang// bkri drang rdul tshon dkyil 'khor dang// gsum po dag tu rgyal bas gsungs// zhes ched du gleng ngo// smra ba'i seng ge gsang bdag gis// bcom ldan 'das so bdag cag rnams// dkyil 'khor
gsum du mthong lags so// de nas 'di skad gsol ba btab// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi 'byung gnas gtso// rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kun ye nas sangs rgyas
pa'i// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// rang bzhin lhun grub bzang po'i don// bcom ldan snying pos bshad du gsol// a la la ho// pad+ma'i snying po bcom ldan 'das// rang bzhin don dam dkyil 'khor
ni// spros dang bral ba 'di gsungs so// e ma'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// bla na med pa rtogs gyur pa// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang// de ni dkyil 'khor snying po yin// zhes gsungs
so// yang ni 'di skad rab gsungs te// rang bzhin don dam dkyil 'khor 'di// lhun gyis grub pa bsdus te gsungs// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// phung po lnga don
sangs rgyas lnga// 'byung ba lnga don dbyings phyug yum// khams dang skye mched mang po kun// sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor yin// de bas srid gsum dkyil 'khor che// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gzugs

rnams kun// rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin yin// tshor ba rin chen rang bzhin yin// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te// 'du byed don yod grub pa'o// rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems// sra bas sangs rgyas spyan

yin te// chu yi khams ni ma ma kI// me khams na bza' dkar mo ste// rlung khams dam tshig sgrol ma la// nam mkha' kun tu bzang mo'o// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// mig ni sa yi snying po la// rna ba

phyag na rdo rje'o// sna ni nam mkha'i snying po'o// lce ni spyan ras gzigs dbang yin// gzugs mdzes lA s+ye'i rang bzhin la// dri ru gyur pa mA l+ye'o// sgra yi tshogs ni nir ti'o// ro ru gyur pa gIrti yin// mig gi

dbang po gang yin pa// byams pa mai tri'i rang bzhin yin// rna ba'i dbang po sgrib pa sel// sna yi dbang po 'jam dpal nyid// lce yi dbang po kun tu bzang// rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par dpyad// sngon 'das dus
su rnam par grags// sngon 'das dpyid ni spos me ma// da ltar dbyar ni me tog ma// 'byon ma rag ston A lo ke// ma 'ongs dgun ni gan+de yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// reg
shes gshin rje 'joms pa yin// reg bya rnam par rgyal ba ste// reg par byed pa rta mchog dpal// reg pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// gsum 'dus reg pa'i mtshan nyid yin// mi rtag pa dang stong pa
dang// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam pa bzhi// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// phyin ci ma log lha mo bzhi// bcom ldan snying pos rab tu gsungs// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// chos rnams kun
la nges rtogs pa// kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin yin// 'dus byas ma byas chos rnams kun// yid kyi rnam shes yul yin pas// kun tu bzang mo yin par grags// de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ chos

dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pas// ji snyed snang grag yod pa'i chos// kun kyang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin pas// rnam grangs yin par bde gshegs gsungs// zhes ched du
brjod pas ched du gleng ngo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying pos/ rang bzhin kun rdzob kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// kun nas mtshan ma'i gnas chen yang// 'og min bla med gnas mchog

gam// lcang lo can dang bde ba can/ pad+ma can la sogs pa yi// rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor de// mtshan ma'i ngang rol rnal 'byor snang// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// mkha' 'am yid kyi nam mkha' la// bde
gshegs snying po hUM bsgoms te// 'byung chen brtsegs pa lhun gyis grub// dbus ni khams gsum dbang sdud pa'i// lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang// thod rus bar khyams nyi zlas brgyan// me ri'i bar

khyams byin rlabs che// sgo ni chu srin khar gyur pas// sgo gtan 'pho ba'i gzhal yas khang// rgyal chen ka bas rnam par mdzes// pho brang de yi rgyan mchog kyang// sgo bzhi sgo khyud rnams kyis brgyan// rta

babs brgyad dang yang dag ldan// dbus na rin chen khri rkang brgyan// de steng pad+ma mkha' stong ldan// lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug/ phyogs bcu 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrugs// nyi zla nor bu rin chen
'bar// nor bu'i do shal rgyal mtshan dang// za ra tshags su rnam par gnas// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ ma btsal ye nas lhun gyis grub// rta babs rnams kyi tsong tsong la// gser gyi dril bu
'bar ba dag/ dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan yang brjod// rta mchog 'bar ba'i bsod nams kyis// rgyu las grub pa rgyal bas gsungs// gzhal yas de nang lhun grub pa'i// rin chen khri rkang phyogs bcur
'od 'bar ba'i// brgyad du bstan pa he ru ka/ bsnyen bkur mchod phyir mnyes byed pa// gser gyi seng ge rgyan gsum pa// drug bzhi rtsa 'phags bzhi ste nyi shu brgyad// thugs rje che bas nyi shu
brgyad// 'jigs pa spangs pas seng ge nyi shu brgyad// sprul sku mthon pas dbang mo nyi shu brgyad// kun tu 'od kyi sa la rab gnas pas// rin chen khri rkang 'degs pa'i stobs dang ldan// dgon gnas dben
gnas gzhan gyis mthong bar dka'// rang gab sbas pa chos nyid lung// lung gi sgra dbyangs thun mong ma yin pas// mngon du phyung ba'i thugs rje shar ba ni// khams gsum don mdzad ye shes rtsal dang
ldan// ma bdun tshogs pas nus mthur ldan// phrin las rnam thar brgyad kyi ka ba 'degs// rtsal gyi shugs dang rab ldan pas// rgya khyon kun shong yangs pa yin// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung he ru ka/ bzhugs

gnas mi 'gyur chos kyi sku// de ni kun tu 'od kyi lung// pad+ma le brgan phyogs bcur 'od// sangs rgyas thams cad skye bzhi'i tshul// chags par gyur pa med pas pad+ma ste// che ba'i yon tan ma lus lung du
ston// mkha' dbyings yang dag dri med pad+mar bstan// ma chags pad+ma can gyi lung// stong zhing gsal bas zhabs gang 'phags// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa ni// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen
yang// thabs dang shes rab ye 'brel bas// spros med ngang gis zlum pa yin// ma skyes pa ni chos kyi lung// 'od chen gsal bar 'tsher bas na// yang gsang sbas pa ye shes lung// 'phro 'du khyad par gyur

pas sdug bsngal gsos su gyur// shes rab rigs kyi lha mo gsang ba'i yum du bstan// de steng rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po ni// yongs su mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyen po rkyen dang
bral bas mi 'gyur chos kyi lung// gsang ba'i thugs kar sbas te bde chen dbyings nas rol pas bde ba longs spyod lung// dbu gsum zhabs gnyis brkyang bar mdzad pas thugs rje sprul pa'i lung// rigs
gnyis lung gi brgyud pas ting 'dzin rnam gnyis thabs kyi rgyud// de yang gtso dang gzungs su 'brel// sku mdog mthing ga rab tu bstan// mthing nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// lha mchog de yi spyan snga

na// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che// gser mdog lta bu rnam par dngas// rang rtags 'khor lo zur brgyad 'dzin// g.yas na rin chen 'byung ldan gtso// baiDUr sngon po'i mdog 'dra la// rang rtags rin chen

zur brgyad 'dzin// rgyab phyogs snang ba mtha' yas gtso// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra la// rang rtags pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'dzin// g.yon du don yod grub pa ste// rin chen ma rgad mdog 'dra la// rang rtags ral
gri de bzhin no// kun kyang zhi ba'i cha lugs te// thor tshugs rigs lngas dbu la brgyan// rdzogs pa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// do shal dpung rgyan se mo de// phyag gdub snyan chas sku la

mdzes// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag rdzogs// de dag gi ni g.yon phyogs na// kun tu bzang dang lo tsa na// mA ma gos dkar sgrol ma rnams// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa rang rtags dril bu

'dzin// cha lugs gzhan yang yang dang 'dra// phyi yi gong ra mdzes pa la// lag na rdo rje ljang skya rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin// sa snying ljang sngon rin chen myu gu 'dzin// rgyab tu nam mkha'i snying po mthing nag ral gri
'dzin// g.yon na spyan ras gzigs dbang dmar skya pad+ma 'dzin// thor tshugs ye shes sems dpas brgyan// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// rgyan dang cha lugs kun gyis brgyan// de dag gi ni g.yon

rol na// sgeg mo phreng dang dbyangs dang gar// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa gar dang me long phreng// pi wang 'dzin cing cha lugs rgyan// gtso bo nyid dang mthun pa'o// mdzes pa'i gru chad

rnams la ni// byams pa dkar po klu shing 'dzin// sgrib sel mthing nag 'khor lo 'dzin// 'jam dpal dmar skya ut+pal 'dzin// kun bzang ljang ser snye ma 'dzin// shar lho lho nub nub byang dang// byang shar
mtshams kyi gru chad la// 'khor bar 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod// de dag gi ni g.yon rol na// spos dang me tog mar me dri// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa rang rtags 'dzin pa ste// cha
lugs gtso dang mthun par gnas// gshin rje mthing ga mi mgo gdengs// shar gyi sgor ni rnam par gnas// rnam rgyal ser nag rdo rje 'dzin// lho yi sgo ni rnam par gnas// rta mchog dmar nag thod sbrul
bsnams// nub kyi sgor ni rnam par gnas// bdud rtsi ljang nag rgya gram 'dzin// byang gi sgor ni rnam par gnas// dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// rnam par gtsigs pa 'jigs 'jigs lta// me dpung
'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra cher sgrogs// 'joms ma bzhi yang sku la 'khril// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang// dril bu thogs shing rab tu rngam// cha lugs 'joms pa dag dang
'dra// sgo bzhi dag tu lhun gyis grub// thod rus bar khyams mdzes pa la// sprul sku thub pa chen po drug/ cis 'dul thabs kyi skur ston pas// cha lugs ma nges 'dul bar ston// mdzes pa'i bar khyams de
nyid la// mdud dang rgyab kyi phyogs rol du// byed pa po dang bya ba mo// ting nge 'dzin du ldan par gnas// de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// lha yi tshogs mchog de
dag gi/ thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' gnas// tshon gang 'od dang bcas pa'o// ljags la rang rtags yi ge rnams// rang rtags phyag rgya'i steng du gsal// de lta'i sku mchog re re la// tshul
dgu dag tu ldan pa ste// mnyen dang lcug dang 'khril ba ste// ldem bag chags dang gzhon tshul dang// gsal dang 'tsher dang lhun sdug dang// gzi byin 'bar bar rab tu gnas// me ri bar khyams dmar nag
ni// lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las mdzad// de lta'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor la// phyi rabs sngags 'chang rnal 'byor pas// spyan drang mchod pa dbul bar bya// zhes gsungs pas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin

gyi dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub pa'o// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ rang rig pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ gsang sngags rgya mtsho thugs rje bsam gyis mi khyab

pa dang/ sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu+u na 'gro ba thams cad la chos ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang lhun gyis grub po// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog

rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying por gnas pa des/ mi g.yo ba 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin

gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// chos rnams thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur ro// ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin gyis ji ltar 'dod bzhin dbang bsgyur ro// gsang sngags rmad
byung rgyal po la// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyang// mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yod de// bsgom pa ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dang// bskyed dang lhag pa'i ting 'dzin no// thog mar rnal 'byor bdag

bsgoms te// dkyil 'khor yin par rgyal bas gsungs// de yang ji ltar bsgom zhe na// ting 'dzin la yang rnam pa gsum// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin// stong pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin// gnyis pa kun snang

nam mkha' dang// snying rje'i yul gyis khyab pa'i phyir// mtshams sbyor chen po'i ting 'dzin bsgom// gsum pa rang gi sa bon te// rab tu drag po'i yi ge a// de las phra mo'i a 'phros 'dus// spros shing bsdus
kyang 'phel 'grib med// de las bdag nyid chen po ni// thams cad rdzogs par bskyed par bya'o// rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur bas// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// de bzhin nyid la gsal

bas na// bdag nyid chen po g.yon du ste// mkha' dbyings rdo rje pad+mar gnas// de ni bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// bskyed pa yi ni dkyil 'khor na// lha tshogs bdag gi sras su bskyed// de ni bskyed pa'i
dkyil 'khor yin// de bas ji ltar bskyed ce na// thog mar yab yum mkha' gsang gnyis// rdo rje pad+mar byin gyis brlabs// gnyis med 'khril bar dgyes pa las// b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling+ga

la// spros bsdus dbyings su 'khyil ba las// dbang chen sa bon 'bru lngar gyur// e yaM baM suM b+h+rUM/ e las nam mkha'/ yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ baM las rgya mtsho/ suM las gser gyi sa gzhi/ b+h+rUM las rin
po che'i gzhal yas khang/ dbyibs dang kha dog bsam yas mchog/ 'khor lo gdan dang rol mo'i tshogs// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'o// de ru lha tshogs bskyed pa ni// brtan 'byung nam mkha'i ye

shes a// 'phel med 'grub med gnas pa la// gnyis med dgyes pa'i 'phro 'du las// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'od du shar// ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ ta tha da d+ha na/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la sha
Sha sa ha k+ShaH/ a i I/ u U/ e ai/ o/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// spro bsdus gsal bar gyur pa las// thugs mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'bar// de las mngon rdzogs skur gsal ba// ta

la sogs pa'i yi ge lnga// phung po lnga yi sa bon yin// Tha la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga// bskyed pa'i sa bon yin par gsungs// ka sogs lnga ni rnam shes lnga// tsa sogs lnga ni dbang po lnga// pa sogs lnga ni skye mched
lnga// ya sogs bzhi ni dus bzhir grags/ sha sogs bzhi ni 'joms ma bzhi// i sogs drug ni thub pa drug/ k+Sha ni yid kyi rnam shes khams// a ni chos kyi khams su bshad// so so'i thugs mtshan gsal

bar las// sa bon rnams kyis mngon sum bskyed/ hUM badzra d+h+r-ikra/ oM dzi na dzika/ swa rat+na d+h+r-i kra/ AM A ro l-ika/ ha pradz+nyA d+h+r-ikra/ mUM d+hA trI shwa ri/ lAM dwe Sha ra ti/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ pAM rA ga ra ti/ tAM badzra ra ti/ k+ShiM hi ra dzA ya/

trAM A gar+b+ha ya/ hrIM pad+ma ba da ma/ dziM ku ru pA Na/ hUM la s+ye/ traM mA le/ hrIM gI ti/ aM n-I ti/ mai d+ha ra Ne swA hA/ th+l+hiM nis+sa raM b+hA ya swA hA/ hUM swA rA dzA ya/ mUM shrI aM rA gA ya/ dzad+hu pa/ hUM puSh+pa/ baM di pa/ ho g+han+d+he/ hUM ya mAn ta kr-ita phaT/ hUM pradz+nyA ta

kr-ita phaT/ hUM pad+man+ta kr-ita phaT/ hUM big+h+nAM ta kr-ita phaT/ dza badzra kro d+hI/ hUM rat+na kro d+hI/ baM pad+ma kro d+h+wi/ ho karma kro d+hI/ hUM badzra tsit+ta/ a badzra tsit+ta/ mu ne kriM/ mu ne truM/ mu ne sruM/ mu ne sraM/ mu ne k+ShaM/ mu

ne ye/ de ltar so so'i snying po las// mngon rdzogs skur ni gsal ba dang/ ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur te// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// oM badzra ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM A dar+sha

dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM sa man+tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM mA ha pra ti pra t+ya be k+Sha Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM mahA kri t+yA a nu ra dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya

badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA wAka badzra swa b+hA wa/ At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM

sarba ta thA ta ga ta ma hA pU dza badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// de ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku mdog phyag mtshan so so rnams// thor tshugs la sogs bzhugs tshul dang// rang bzhin kun rdzob bzhugs
tshul dang// bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin 'di// rnal 'byor rig pa'i rtsal yin te// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// yang na gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor la'o// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil
'khor ni// yongs su bsgom par bya ba ni// de ltar gsal ba'i rnam pa kun// yum gyi mkha' la gsal bar bsgom// rnal 'byor rig pa'i khyad par yin// zhes gsungs pas// rol pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams

kyis/ chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur ba mthong ngo// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rim pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste lnga

pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po des/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ las dang po'i rnal 'byor pa yid ches par bya ba'i phyir/
'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rol pa 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bur shes// ci'i phyir zhe na de las ma 'das phyir// de bas gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad par bya
yis nyon// 'di ni gzugs brnyan sgyu ma'i rnam grangs yin// ma rig rmongs pa'i 'gro rnams la// mtshon pas gsal ba'i don bstan phyir// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// dar ram ras sam gro
ga la// kha dog lnga yi gzugs bris na// dngos grub rten du gyur bar bshad// ra'am ba so'i 'bur btod dang// rdo dang shing dang rtsig logs dang// gser dngul la sogs lugs blugs la// yan lag ma
nyams gzugs mdzes byas// dngos grub rten du gyur bar bshad// mnyen dang lcug dang smin pa dang// phyag rgya'i gzugs su legs byas na// de yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur// sa stegs dkyil 'khor

dbyibs legs mdzes pa la// tshon rtsi lnga yis legs bris na// de yang dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten// re zhig las ni dang po pas// sa stegs dkyil 'khor bya bar shis// 'di ni gnas kyi mtshan nyid de// skyon
yon bye brag shes par bya// gangs ri brag dkar 'dab chen ni// zhi ba bsgrub pa'i gnas su shis// brag chen rdo rjes gtams pa ste// gcan gzan khro bo'i gnas skyi g.ya'// mngon spyod chen po bsgrub pa'i
gnas// dur khrod gnas dang ngam grog dang// sum mdo grong gling dbang sdud gnas// nags tshal mang po gtibs pa dang// shin tu btsan dang 'jigs pa'i dogs// 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i gnas

yin no// mtsho gling rgya mtsho ne'u seng can// las rnams kun la der shes so// gzhan yang spang bar bya ba ni// gshin rje'i mdung rtse srin mo ngus pa'i mchi ma dang// gnod sbyin sbar rjes 'byung po'i 'du sa

dang// gdug pa'i klu srin 'byung po rgyu ba'i lam// sbrul gdug 'ong sa kha na ma tho ba'i// nyen dang 'brel dang mdun sar mi 'gro'o// wa yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// lo yis bsring ste spang bar bya// de nas
bslang ba'i las rnams kyang// mngon dang mi mngon bdag po la// rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir// ser sna spang ba'i las kyis ni// rin dang bden pas bsgos la bslang// de nas slob dpon bdag nyid

kyang// rdo rje dril bu rab ldan zhing// rtse gsum 'gros kyis kun tu bskor// khros pa'i hUM gis nga rgyal bya// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// dengs shig gces su bsgo nas kyang// khro bor byin brlab

gdab par bya// de nas dbang gyur lha mo ni// bskyed dang spyan drang gnyis med par// mchod bstod tshul bzhin byas nas ni// bdud btul mngon par rdzogs pa'i tshe// rU tra'i tshogs kyis rgol ba las// dge ba

las kyi 'go drangs te// spyan ldan de la dpang po bcol// mtshan mas mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir// sa yi ro lnga brtag par bya// dge ba'i rtags ni dngos grub myur// shis par ma gyur spo bar bya// yang na sbyin

sreg bya bar bstan// gnas der bsod nams gter ldan phyir// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang// spos lnga 'bru lnga snying po lnga// ga'u'i nang du blugs nas ni// sa gter sbas na bkra shis so// dag pa'i bdud rtsi

rnam lnga yis// rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar nas ni// gru bzhi dbyibs legs skyang nul bya// de nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyi// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang bar bya// ting nge 'dzin gyis nges par sbyang// tshon thig rnam

pa lnga po la// sangs rgyas lnga yi byin rlabs te// sprul pa'i 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad// spos sam lce bog nag po yi// dud pa rgyun mi 'chad par gtang// khros pas drag po'i sngags bzlas so// na mo big kra ma la

bi da ma la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dza la pra dza la/ kI li kI li/ ha na ha na/ hUM phaT/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskul// skud pa gsar pa gtsang ma la// gsang ba'i lcang lor

'khyil langs sam// rdo rje'i rgyun thag la sogs la// yum gyi grangs dang mthun par bsgril// rdo rje rtse lnga'i lu gu rgyud// byang chub sems su byin gyis brlab// thig g.yog las kyi sems ma ste// mtshan ldan
byin brlab phyag rgyar bcas// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnam thig gdab// sa thig gdab pa 'dul ba'i dbang// maN+Dal tshad ni nges pa med// de yi sngags ni 'di brjod do// oM dz+nyA na tsakra su tra

ma ti kra ma// tshon dbye ba ni 'di lta ste// dkar dang dmar dang ser dang ljang// tha ma lcags ri nag pos bskor// gtso bo gzugs su rdzogs par bri// 'khor rnams phyag rgya dag dang bri// rgyan rnams mang po bri

bar bya// dbyangs dang gar dang mchod pa che// rol mo'i yo byad ji snyed pa// mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyan du byas// gser dngul las byas bum pa la// ras dkri me tog 'bras bus brgyan// bdud rtsi lnga yis
dgang byas pa// sman dang rin chen 'bru sna lngas// gang ba brgyad dam bcu drug bzhag/ rnam rgyal bum pa de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor bdag pos sngags pa yi// dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya// rmad du

byung ba'i gtor ma dgram// 'di ni lus kyi 'phen sdud kyi// spyi ru bsdus te bshad pa'o// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i
le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phra mo sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di gsungs so// sngags pa ting 'dzin mnyam bzhag ste// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsal
bar bsgom// gsal ba gnyis med dkyil 'khor du// rang bzhin kun rdzob spyan drang dang// dbab dang gzhug dang brtan pa dang// mi g.yo dam tshig zil gnan dang// phyag 'tshal mchod pa rdzogs pa
dang// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// 'jug dang dngos grub gsal ba dang// dbang bskur ba yi las rnams bya// sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de bas

snying po phra bar bsgom// pad+ma ye shes can dag gis// pad+ma snying gi dbus su bsgom// pad+ma snying ga'i dbus gnas pas// pad+ma'i sngags don bsgom par bya// 'khor lo ye shes can rnams kyis// 'khor lo snying gi

dbus su bsgom// 'khor lo snying ga dbus gnas pas// 'khor lo'i sngags don bsgom par bya// rdo rje ye shes spyan rnams kyis// rdo rje snying ga dbus su bsgom// rdo rje snying ga dbus gnas pas// rdo rje'i
sngags don bsgom par bya// rin chen ye shes can rnams kyis// rin chen snying ga'i dbus su bsgom// rin chen snying ga'i dbus gnas pas// rin chen sngags don bsgom par bya// rgya gram ye shes can rnams

kyis// rgya gram snying ga dbus su bsgom// rgya gram snying ga dbus gnas pas// rgya gram sngags don bsgom par bya// snying po ma nges 'phro 'du yis// sems can las las skye ba bzhin// dbyings las ye shes skye

bas na// mi rtog ye shes chos sku thob// chos can mtshan ma las skyes pa'i// chos nyid ngang las skye bas gnas/ rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ ting nge 'dzin

phra bar sbyong ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po rdo rjer gnas pa des/ rgyal bar sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas sems can
gnyis med pas// khams gsum sems can 'jigs tshogs kyi// snyoms par 'jag mi'i srin bu yin// thig le chen po'i ngang 'dus pas// ma bgrod pa ru mtha' ru phyin// ma bsgrubs lhun gyis grub ste
mnyam// so so ma yin dbyer med pas// dbang bskur slob dpon gong na med// dbang nod slob ma 'og na med// thig le chen po gcig gi ngang// thams cad sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub// 'byung ba chen po
bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// chub par gnas pas bcom ldan 'das// 'di ni ye rgya spyi yi dbang// ma rig rmongs la zhen pa rnams// khyad par rim par bgrod pa'i lam// snying por
gnas pas byang chub ste// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// sangs rgyas sems can rang bzhin gcig/ de yang 'di don 'di la dbang// sems thabs gang gis dbang ba dang// don ched ci la dbang ba
dang// dbang gi rnam grangs bstan pa dang// dbang rtags ci 'chang bstan pa dang// dbang yul ci la bsgyur ba dang// dbang gi dus tshod bstan pa dang// dbang gi tshad kyang bstan pa dang// dbang gi

skur thabs bstan pa dang// dbang gi khyad par bstan pa dang// dbang gi man ngag bstan pa dang// dbang gi drod tshad bstan pa dang// rnam pa bcu gcig bka' stsal to// de bas phyi nang gsang ba yi// dbang

gi rim pa shes par bya// gsang ba'i dbang gi mdor bstan pa// lha sbyin brda' sprod bum pa'i dbang// bag btsun skra bzang dbu rgyan dbang// pad+mar rdor bcug rdo rje'i dbang// rdo rje pad bskyod dril bu'i
dbang// pad+mar byang chub sems lces lon// 'di ni dam tshig gsum yin no// rdo rje'i lces len brtul zhugs mchog/ de yi 'bras bu de dag ni// dga' dang dga' med rab tu dga'// rab tu bsngags pas
yon tan thob// sems bskyed pa dang 'jigs pa med// rnam rtog spang dang ting 'dzin thob// shes bya kun la thogs med pa'i// tshad med bzhi la rab gnas na// 'di ni mi ltung sangs rgyas yin// sdug
bsngal thams cad byang bar 'gyur// de bas phyi nang gsang ba yi// mthar thug tshul du rim par bgrod// theg pa ji snyed gcig gsungs kyang// dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob na// shes bzhin dbang med rnal
'byor rlom sems can// kha cig ya ma brla dang gsob 'dra la// don dang mthun pa'i skyes bu dbang chen la// rtags dang 'brel pas dbang bskur shin tu rigs// dbang med kha cig rang dbang
zos gyur na// thug thub khong langs shes thob tshod bzhag nas// che bzhi med bzhin yod pa'i las spyod pa// ngan song gsum gyi sa bon de yin pas// srid lam 'khyams shing chos lam ring bar snang// bka'
la brten nas dbang med bka' brkus pa// dbang lung tshad mar gyur pa'i skyes bu yis// bskur yang mi thob dbul mo'i gter dang 'dra// thob par mi 'gyur chags mi 'gyur// 'bras bu med cing brlag par

'gyur// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ khyad par dbang gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po rdo rje rtse gcig tu gnas pa des/ mi

'da' ba rdo rje rgyan gyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'da' dka' thugs kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// bsdam par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// srog gi phyir yang mi gtang ngo// sna tshogs dngos por snang ba
yang// dngos po med pa'i skur gsal bas// rtogs pa'i don las mi 'da' 'o// sgra mtha' sna tshogs grags pa yang// smra ba med pa'i gsung yin pas// rig pa'i don las mi 'da' 'o// bstan du med pa'i
bsam pa ni// de ni thugs kyi rang bzhin te// de las 'da' bar mi bya'o// sku gsung thugs las ma g.yos kyang// che ba'i yon tan sna tshogs 'byung// 'on kyang zad med 'phel ba med// yon tan dam tshig
yin par grags// de las 'da' bar yang mi bya// rtsol ba med pa'i las gang yin// de ni thabs kyi spyod pa las// phrin las dam tshig 'da' dka' 'o// lnga po de la gang gnas pa// rnal 'byor skal ldan dam

pa'o// bsgrub pa'i dam tshig chen po ni// byang chub sems dang sha rnams dang// khrag dang dri chu dri chen po// dbang po lnga dang bcas pa ni// bde gshegs lnga yi thugs dam ni// bsgrub la gnas pas mi spang
ste// 'da' bar bya ba ma yin no// brtul zhugs dam tshig chen po ni// dka' thub sdom la gnas pa'i phyir// bdud rtsi dam tshig rkyen dang bcas// thogs pa med pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// spang len med par
