rol par bya// bsten pa'i dam tshig chen po ni// lha dang rdzas dang tshe la sogs// snying po yig 'brur bcas pa rnams// gnyis su med par rtogs byas nas// mnyam pa chen po'i dbyings su gzhag/ spyad par bya

ba'i dam tshig ni// pad+ma can dang dung can dang// ban glang can dang ri mo can// bu mo mig ring la sogs kun// phrad par gyur pa sbyar ba yin// mthong ba tsam gyi dam tshig ste// dbang po yul dang shes mtshon
ldan// grub par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// nyon mongs lnga po gnas su dag/ sku dang ye shes ldan sbyor zhing// thams cad lha yi phyag rgyar gsal// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'khor ba'i chos lnga

ma spangs shing// spyad pas grol te mya ngan 'das// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// dang du glang ba'i dam tshig ni// tan gaN la sogs spyad par yang// 'das pa'i sangs

rgyas rnams kyi bka'// ma byin par yang blang ba dang// mi tshangs pa yang spyad bya zhing// lha dang slob dpon mched la sogs// spangs shing nyams pa bsgral bar bya// de la rdzun gyi tshig smra zhing// brlang po'i ngag

gis gzhir btab po// glu bro gsang ba'i dam tshig ni// dbyings nyid gsang ba'i sa gzhi la// bud+d+ha khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// gti mug gnas su 'joms pa ste// 'da' dka' sku yi dam tshig go/ me long gsal

ba'i sa gzhi la// rdo rje khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// zhe sdang gnas su 'joms pa ste// 'da' dka' thugs kyi dam tshig go/ mnyam pa chen po'i sa gzhi la// rin chen khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// nga rgyal gnas su

'joms pa ste// yon tan lhun grub dam tshig go/ so sor rtog pa'i sa gzhi la// pad+ma khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// 'dod chags gnas su 'joms pa ste// sgra mtha' chub pa'i dam tshig go/ nan tan chen po'i sa
gzhi la// karma khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// phrag dog gnas su 'joms pa ste// phrin las dam tshig 'da' dka' 'o// stong nyid ye shes sa gzhi la// dbang chen khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// dug lnga gnas su

'joms pa ste// sku lnga lhun sbyor dam tshig go/ dbyings phyug lnga yi sa gzhi la// ye shes drug gi bro brdungs shing// dug lnga 'joms pa'i glu blangs pas// sdug bsngal chu bo'i gzhung bskams nas// 'khor ba'i rgya
mtsho gting bskams te// sku gsung thugs su rgyas btab nas// bde ba chen por rnam sbyar te// dmyal sogs me dpung gnas su bsad// 'di ni dpal yi bro bo che// thos pa tsam gyis rtogs pa dang// brdungs

pa tsam gyi thugs dam skong// 'di ni glu bro'i dam tshig ste// thams cad chos sku brdal ba che// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ 'da' dka' dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu
pa'o//// de nas bcom lda 'das rdo rje rtse gcig pad+mar gnas pa des/ de bzhin nyid la dmigs nas/ cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de'i tshe rigs lnga rgya mtsho bde gshegs 'khor rnams
kyis// 'dul thabs sna tshogs 'gro ba 'dul bar 'gyur// sku yi don mdzad sdig spong so sor 'dul ba ni// dmyal ba'i gshed po'i gzugs la yi dwags kha 'bar gzugs// byol song seng ge mi yi 'jig rten
du// 'khor los sgyur rgyal lha yi gzugs su bstan// lha min thags bzang lha la brgya byin no// tshangs ris tshangs chen chags bral dgra bcom mo// rang rgyal bse ru sa bcu'i byang chub sems

dpa' la// rnam snang tshul dang ji ltar 'dul 'dul bstan// mthun byas sna tshogs 'gro ba ji ltar 'dul ba bzhi// chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rab tu bskor ba ni// sde snod gsum dang la lar gsung rab bcu

gnyis bskor// la lar brgyad khri bzhi stong bskor// gti mug rmongs pa'i sems can la// sangs rgyas 'khor los 'khor lo bskor// zhe sdang can la rdo rje ste// nga rgyal can la rin po che// 'khor lo bla na med pa

bskor// 'dod pas 'chel la pad+ma yis// phrag dog can la las sna tshogs// 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor// 'gro drug so so'i skad rnams ji tsam par// de snyed sgra skad tha dad ston par mdzad// gsung gcig
dag gis gsung mod kyang// du ma nyid du so sor go/ la lar lhums gshegs lhums nas bltams shing gzhon nu rol par ston// la lar khab bzhes khab nas rab byung dka' thub dka' ba spyod// la lar
byang chub sems bskyed bdud bzhi btul dang rdo rje'i gdan la gshegs// la lar byang chub shing drung bzhugs dang la lar bskul ba'i sa la gshegs// la lar rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum dag tu 'khor lo

bskor// la lar cho 'phrul ston dang mya ngan 'das dang sku gdung ring bsrel ston// la lar glegs bam ston dang phyi rol 'byung dang chos mthun sgra skad 'byung// la lar mu stegs tshul dang bsam gtan bsgom

dang sa bcu rim gyis la lar 'byung// la lar spyan lnga rnam dag la lar mngon shes pha rol phyin// khyab 'jug dbang phyug che dang la lar 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshul// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul zhing byin rlabs cho

'phrul de ltar ston// de tshe 'gro ba thams cad las kyi stobs kyi dbang gyur pa// log lta'i shugs bsnyems ma gtogs gzhan rnams sangs rgyas bstan la dad par 'gyur// byang chub spyod sgo ji snyed de snyed
'bras bu bde la bkod/ rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ thugs rje 'dul ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs so so'i bde bar gshegs pa la
sogs pa dgongs pa gcig tu gyur te/ log pa'i lam dngos po la/ mngon par 'chal ba/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi mthus bsnyems pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma dad pas 'jig rten gyi khams phung bar byed
pa rnams/ zhi bas phan pa'i skabs la ma bab ste/ rol pa'i mdzad spyod kyis 'dul bar gzigs nas/ bde bar gshegs pas bka'i 'gro ba mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi snying pos 'gros pa/
kye ma 'dus pa'i tshogs chen dag/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ltar// da lta'i dus 'dir 'byung ba ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// bdag nyid chen po rtog pa yi// khro bo'i tshul du
sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu khro drag gtum par gyur// 'o dod 'bod par ltung bar gyur// mi bzod sdug bsngal mtha' la zhen// ji lta ba yi thabs kyis gdul// zhes gsungs
so// gti mug tshogs kyis bgros pa ni// shin tu gtum pa'i sems can 'di// der bzhag bag chags ngan pa yis// bdud 'phel rig 'dzin rgyun gcod cing// ston pa'i gsung rab 'jig par 'gyur// las
kyi mun pas 'gro ba 'khyams// dug nad rims nad phra men ma// gnod sbyin gdon dang log 'dren gnod// srid gsum 'jig cing dam tshig 'dral// ji lta bu yi thabs kyis gdul// zhes bgros so// bde

gshegs nga rgyal chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa ni// 'das dus sngon byung rU tra des// da ltar 'di 'tsher byung ba yi// dug gsum brtsegs pa'i ri bo 'di// rgyal ba 'das pa sbyor ba yis// ji ltar 'tshams pa
bzhin du 'os// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas kyang// mngon spyod rol pa'i thabs chen gyis// 'khor ba bsgral ba'i dus la bab// ces bgros so// bde gshegs chags pa chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa
ni// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang// 'jig rten gsum dag bsreg
byed na// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// zhes bgros so// bde gshegs phrag dog chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa ni// rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo la// log
rtog phyin ci log gis bcings// dngos po rang dgar zhen pa yi// gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba dang// dam tshig la sdang rnam gcad phyir// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar mdzod// ces bgros so// rgyud thams
cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bka' mol ba mdzad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje des// 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas// rigs lnga
bde bar gshegs pa rdo rje rtse gcig pad+mar gnas pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bde bar gshegs pa dka' thub can gyi sems can 'di// rgyu rkyen gang yin 'bras bu cir smin rigs sde gang du
gtogs// las skal ci byed btul dang ma btul skyon yon ci ltar thob// bde gshegs bka' stsal log pa'i sems can chen po 'di// gzung 'dzin rtog ngan rgyu yin log par spyad pas rkyen// 'bras bu dug
lnga smin cing 'khor ba'i rigs chen 'di// gdol pa'i 'byung por gtogs shing las skal chags sdang spyod// ma btul lha mi'i srid brlags kha lo log par bsgyur// sangs rgyas zhing khams stongs
shing 'khor ba dman la ngan// sangs rgyas dman ris lus nas don la mi phan skyon// btul na yon tan dug gsum rtsad gcod 'khor ba chos nyid 'gyur// zhing khams dag pas yon tan chen po 'thob// ces
gsungs pas/ gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes shin tu bskul te// e ma'o bde bar gshegs pa rnams// thugs rje chen po'i mnga' bdag can// dus la bab pa'i bskal chen 'dir// las la bab
pa'i thugs rje yis// rnam par smin pa'i 'byung po 'di// bsgral bar gyur ni thugs rje'i mchog/ ces nye bar bskul bas// sprul pa'i cho 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad de// ye shes sprin dmar char sprin
bzhin// 'bar ba'i phyag rgya sna tshogs bzhengs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// bden pa'i gzhung gis 'dul bar gzas// rU tra nag pos se gol brdeg/ bdag nyid mi 'dul ngo mtshar che// go'u ta

ma khyod kyis bdag mi 'dul// rang rang dka' thub bde la gnos// de skad zer te ma nyan no// de nas khro bo chen po rnams// khro bo'i 'khor rnams bsdu ba'i phyir// rdo rje rta yi tshogs su sprul// khro bo rta mchog
tshogs mchog la// rU tra thul bar bka' bsgo bas// dpal gyi rgyal po rta mgrin gyis// tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs lta bu yis// srin po ma srin dbang bsdus nas// 'dul ba 'drid par byas na yang// kho ma
nyan te ma thul lo// de nas chos dbyings pho brang du// ye shes sprin tshogs char sprin bzhin// gtibs nas gzugs sku rags par bzhengs// snang srid ye shes spyan gyis gzigs// rU tra srog chags skyams
lings su// gzigs nas kun rdzob sgyu ma'i tshul// mthun par mdzad de rnam par rol// rdo rje rta gdong tshogs rnams la// song zhig rab tu kun tu song// 'jig rten khams na bdud kyi tshogs// srog chags
skyams lings byed pa la// so tshugs zhes ni bka' bsgo nas// rta mgrin rgyal pos 'jig rten du// cho 'phrul bstan nas 'jig rten du// gnam lcags yod pa'i ri yi rtse// ma la ya las so btsugs so// de

ltar yum ral gcig ma dang// pad+ma bri gu+u ra gnyis mnyes// dpal chen pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis// 'jig rten khams su kun rdzob byis pa'i spyod mthun byas// cho 'phrul zhabs kyis bcags te srin po'i

gling khams byon// nyon mongs 'dam rdzab zhe sdang rdzong zhen dang// 'dod pa'i mtsho la chags phyir khrag gi rgya mtshos bskor ba bdud rtsir rol// mi gtsang 'dam rdzab bskor ba'i dri chen bdud rtsir rol// go ro
tsa na rkang tshogs bcud 'khyil zil mngar bdud rtsir rol// chu ser rnag sogs dri chu'i rgya mtsho bdud rtsir rol// 'bu dang 'bu chen lcags kyi sbrang ma sogs// bsgral ba'i sha rus mAM sa'i bdud
rtsir rol// srin po'i bu mo'i tshogs dang rkun mo'i tshogs dag la// thabs kyi ga Nas sras rnams 'phags pa'i lus// sems can mgo rtags mang po'i tshogs su byung// 'khor rnams 'dul phyir phra men tshogs

su bstan// srin po'i sgo srung grong khyer phyi rol na// rta gdong phag gdong bya gdong khyi gdong rnams// shar lho nub byang dag na gnas pa la// brtul zhugs chen po bzhi yang mdzad// dbus kyi keng rus grong khyer

na// thod brtsigs nang na srin mo ral gcig gnas// bam gyi khri la dung khrag 'thung// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis// srin po'i gzugs su sprul nas byon// dung phor tsho zhal bstabs te gsol// gzhan yang
brtab ste yid ma ches// bzang zhing mdangs chen 'bar ba mthong// bdag gi gtso bo de bas gzi byin che// de skad ces pas srin skad brjod// ru lu gsungs nas ga Na mdzad// srin mo de las ma thar ro// de

nas rta mchog tshogs dag gis// srin po byung ba'i mtshan ma gzigs// rdo rje bya gdong sgron chen mdzad// 'dur chen rta 'gros stabs kyis gshegs// dgos tshul 'dur glu blangs nas spran// de dus pad+ma gar

dbang gis// lhag pa'i byang chub sems 'phro 'du// yi ge AM gi tshogs sprul nas// b+ha ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// 'khyil zhing gsal te byin gyis brlabs// srin mo'i mkha' la rab tu bzhag/ yi ge 'khor

lo tshogs chen pa// dbyings kyi ngang du mi dmigs gyur// srin mo rang gi gnas su phyin// longs spyod mi snang 'khor rnams byer// sngon ma mthong ba'i phra men ma// tshogs kyis bskor te yid mi dga'// rtog pa
skyes te e ma'o// bdag gi gnas 'di ji lta bu// srin mos mdun bsu e ma'o// de lta bu yi tshig ni ma gsungs shig/ khyod kyi dgongs pa bdag gis bsgrub// 'khor la ma gsungs lhums mi bde// rigs

shig 'tshob na ci zhig 'khrungs// srin mo'i gzugs mthong skrag ldan ma// bdag gi rigs 'dzin nges 'byung snyam// 'dod sbyar zhi ba'i skabs su ni// srin mor rU tra skye tshul du// rU tras skad ni thengs gsum
phyung// dpal rngam skad phyung srin tshogs brgyal// brgyal sangs bltas nas 'jigs med pa// bdud kyi rgyal po bdud kyi bdag/ 'bar ba'i zhal gyis kun tu gzigs// srin mo la brten tshul gyis

kyang// srin mo kro d+hI shU rir 'gyur// mtshan yang rdo rje srin mor gsol// srin mo sems brtas nga rgyal skyes// srin po'i bskul byas ru lu'i sgra// cho 'phrul grangs med dran pa las// de dag re re la yang sprul pa
'phros// srin mo dag gis srin skad bzlas// oM dang hUM bar ru lu bcug/ dpal chen khro bo'i srog snying bzlas// srin skad brjod cing nga rgyal skyes// lus chen bsam gyis mi khyab la// rkang pa mi
yul mgo ni srid rtser reg/ nad kyi bskal pa kha nas gtong// 'jigs byed chen po phyag rgya'i sku// cir yang ma nges gzugs su sprul// ngag gis ngag phrogs glen pa 'dra// lce med smra ba'i stobs dang
bral// 'bros par gzas na gar dbang gis// sa ma ya ho dam tshig bskul// srin pos sngon dus bka' nos shing// tha tshig bstan pa rjes dran pas// rang srog ma bzod mdun gyis bltas// gar dbang kha T+wAM

phyag rgya bstan// gangs ri rgyud chad bzhin du 'gyel// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgyas bzung// sked bzung zhal du mid pas su// rU tras sngon dus gsang ba'i bka'// spyad nor nyon mongs thag pas bcings// dug lnga

ma chom sa gzhi lta bu de// ngo gcig sbyangs pas chos kyi pho brang mthong// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// chos rnams thams cad ye shes te// skye ba bye ma snyed grangs mnyam// lus blangs sdig spyad kun kyang
dran// lta log kun shes dge sdig gi/ las rnams dag ni mi bslu ba'o// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// 'dus nas thabs cig bgros gyur pa// de dag kun kyang nyams su myong// de ma thag tu
bcom ldan gyis// snam du bton pas kho mi dga'// gdung ba skyes nas dus te zhus// e ma'o dpa' bo thugs rje chung// shin tu dben pa'i gnas shig nas// snam du bton pa thugs rje chung// gal te bka'
las 'da' gyur na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying// rul myag nas ni tshig par gyur// ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams// 'bangs su 'bul lo bka' la thogs// dbus su mchis pa'i skal med kyi// nyid kyi
dkyil 'khor mtha' la zhog/ phud pa 'tshal ba'i skal med kyi// lhag ma kha chus bron la stsol// 'bangs la nan tan ma chung zhig/ zhes te smengs su gsol btab pa// thugs rje chen po bcom ldan rdo rje
sems// dri med dung mdog mchog tu gzugs bzang ba// rnam dag 'od gsal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes// ji ltar mkha' la 'od stong shar ba bzhin// srid pa gsum gyi sa mkhan ston par grags// khams
gsum 'gro ba kun gyi bshes gnyen po// byams mgon thugs rje'i lha khyod dgongs su gsol// bdag cag thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas// lam stor lam nor srid pa'i 'khor lor 'khyams// sngon tshe las
log sdig pa spyad pas nongs// sdig pa'i las rnams ci spyad rab gnong 'gyod// dpa' bo chen po khyod la skyabs su mchi// gar gyi dbang phyug gsan cing dgongs su gsol// dar cing drag pa'i las dbang de
btsan pas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor byings gyur te// zhe sdang 'bar ba'i mes ni rang rgyud bsregs// gti mug mun pa 'thibs pos shes rab mdongs// nga rgyal chen po'i ri bos ngan
'gror mnan// phrag dog rlung dmar 'tshubs mas 'khor bar g.yengs// bdag tu blta ba'i mdud pa dam pos bcings// 'dod pa'i me mdag 'dra ba'i 'obs su chud// sdug bsngal drag po mi bzad char ltar
'bab// 'di 'dra'i sdug bsngal chen po bzod dka' zhing// sdig pa'i las dbang drag po me 'bar bas// rnam shes dbang po'i myu gu gdungs gyur te// phung po sgyu ma'i lus kyis mi bzod na// byams
mgon thugs rje can gyis bzod lags sam// bdag cag don slad lus 'di bzhes su gsol// gzi byin rgyal po'i mnga' bdag dgongs su gsol// bdag 'dra blun rmongs las ngan sdig po che// las kyi

dbang gis 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes// skyes pas 'gyod do las la yi re chad// yi chad 'gyod kyang las dbang bcos su med// las kyi shugs ni chu bo'i klung dang 'dra// las dbang chu klung 'phral du ga la
bzlog/ rnam smin thams cad rang gi las las byung// 'di ltar las kyi rlung dmar 'dis btab pas// bskal pa grangs med bar du bdag cag rnams// 'khor ba'i btson ra mun par 'khyams lags

na// khyed kyi thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa kun byang nas// ma ltar byams pa'i zhabs drung da lta 'khod// skyob pa dpa' bo chen pos dgongs su gsol// nyi ltar 'od 'bar
zla ltar mdangs gsal ba'i// thugs rje'i zhal nyid blta bar 'tshal lags na// thog ma med nas ma rig ling tog gis// mdongs pa'i chu bur mig gis ma mthong na// 'gro ba'i mgon skyabs de snga ga la
bzhugs// las dbang drag po shin tu skyi g.ya' bas// shin tu skrag cing skyi g.ya' rab 'jigs nas// dung dung gdung ba'i smre sngags 'di bton cing// nyam thag phongs pa'i 'o 'dod 'bod lags na// byams
mgon thugs rjes dus 'dir ma gzigs na// nam zhig 'chi 'pho lus sems 'bral ba'i tshe// dge bshes grogs dang bral te gshin rjes khrid// de tshe 'jig rten nye dus mi stongs te// las kyi dbang gis
bdag nyid gcig pur 'khrid// dus der bdag la mgon skyabs ma mchis na// gang gis phyi bshol dus las ma g.yel bar// da lta nyid du btud de mngon spyod mdzod// las kyis mnar ba'i skye bo bdag 'dra
ba// khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas nas ma thar te// bskal pa dpag med skye ba ji snyed du// gdos bcas lus blangs grangs med zhig gyur te// sha rus bsags na 'jig rten gtos dang mnyam// rnag khrag
bsags na rgya mtsho chen po tsam// las 'phro bsags na bsam 'das brjod mi lang// khams gsum bgrang zhing skye shi'i kha brgyud kyang// byas pa'i las la don med chud re zos// skye ba grangs

med ji snyed de tsam las// skye ba tshe gcig kho na tsam gyi las// bla med byang chub don du rab spyad na// de tsam byas pa'i las la don yod na// las kyi dbang btsan nyon mongs stobs che bas// sha rus dra ba'i
lus blangs 'khor bar 'khyams// sdug bsngal bzod dka' 'khor ba'i btson rar tshud// mi bzad sdug bsngal drag po 'di lta bu// nyes byas thams cad rang gi las las byung// thugs rje chen pos las dbang
rgyun bcad de// nyon mongs las kyi rlung 'di bzlog tu gsol// ma rig log pa'i las kyi dbang btsan te// mi shes mun pa'i nang du gtan 'khyams na// ye shes sgron me'i zer gyis mi stongs sam// nyes byas
las kyi 'bras bu mi bzod na// thugs rje chen po'i phrin las mi mdzad dam// dug gsum bzod dka'i nad kyis gdungs lags na// thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sman gyis mi gso'am// phyin ci log gi g.yang
sar ltung lags na// thugs rje myur mgyogs phyag gis mi 'dzin nam// las kyi sdug bsngal rnam smin mer 'bar na// thugs rje bsil ba'i chu rgyun mi 'bebs sam// sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i 'dam du byings
gyur na// thabs mkhas thugs rje'i lcags kyus mi 'dren nam// khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas su sbyangs sbyangs nas// nam zhig rang rig 'bras bu thob pa'i tshe// 'phags pa'i thugs rjes ci 'tshal don ma
mchis// bdag cag las 'phro'i dbang btsan bzhag lags na// thugs rje che zhes su la ci zhig bgyi// dpal bo khyod la thugs rje'i stobs mnga' na// yal yol btang snyoms le lo ma mdzad par// snying nas
da gzigs thugs rje rgyal ba'i lha// dpa' bo chen po khyod la bzod par gsol// mi bsgrib tshangs pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// a la la ho// zhes gsol ba btab pas/ bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa'

pad+ma'i snying por gnas pa des// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad lhun gyis grub pas sangs rgyas sras su bskyed pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcur/ hUM hUM hUM zhes lan drug gsungs pas/

rigs gnyis lung gi brgyud pa'i phyir// phyi nang snod bcud lung las gyur pa yin// ye shes rnam gnyis don gyi rgyud// sprul sku rnam gnyis thabs kyi rgyud// phrin las rnam gnyis thugs rje'i rgyud// drug las

bdun byung hUM gi rang bzhin las// cho ga gsum ldan 'phro 'du gsal ba yis// 'od zer bdun gyis rgyud bskul sdig sbyangs te// dur khrod bdag po gsang ba nyid du skye// de skad ces gsungs pas/ phyogs bzhi
mtshams bzhi rin po che'i ka ba dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong pas kyang dpags pa/ ka ba re re la yang/ sprin med pa'i nyi ma bdun bdun gyis brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
bcu thams cad du// skye gnas bzhi las skyes pa'i sems can/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang/ rigs dman dang/ rigs med pa thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags thams cad 'od zer 'bar
ba des bcoms btags nas// bla na med pa'i byang chub la 'god par byas so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// thabs dang shes rab che ba'i rtags// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'od
zer der// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'di skad gsungs// bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin// khams gsum dbang gi sku gsung thugs// srid pa gsum gyi bdag po yin// dbang gi khro bo chen po yin// zhes
gsungs nas/ khams gsum dang srid gsum du rtog pa thams cad/ dug gsum brtsegs pa'i dbang gis/ gcig la gcig 'phya ba dang/ bstings pa dang/ mi dge bcu spyad pas/ ngan song gsum du grangs
med par skyes so// lha dang mir skyes na yang/ dka' thub dang sdom pa dang rang rang gi legs pa thob tu re ba'i dam tshig gnyan po dag las nyams par gyur pas/ khams gsum srid pa gsum du gtogs
pa thams cad las kyi dbang gis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// rab tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs nas// hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod pas 'khor thams cad rang rang gi thugs kar 'dus pas/ gnyis su

med pa'i dbyings su mi snang bar mdzad do// gnas kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa thams cad kyang/ nyid kyi sku la bsdus te mi snang bar mdzad do// de nas pad+ma shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tan ta ka ha na da ha pa

tsa hUM hUM phaT/ ces sgra brjod cing/ khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khros pa'i skur mngon par 'du mdzad de/ dbu lnga las bzhi phyogs bzhir 'bar ba'i gzugs kyis blta ba/ dbu dbus

ma zhi ba'i zhal spyan gsum pa kun thal byung ba'o// sku'i lte ba e gru gsum gyi 'byung gnas las/ rdo rje dang rin po che las byung ba'i gshog pa bzhi yang 'thon te/ phyog bcu drug rol pa'i tshul du 'thon to// sgeg

pa chen po yin pas zhabs brgyad kyang chas brgyad dang ldan par snang ba'i thugs ka nas/ rig pa'i yi ge hUM rin po che sna lnga lta bur ldan pa'i/ 'byung ba lnga dang/ yum lnga dang/ ye shes lnga dang/ gdul bya'i phrin

las rnam pa lnga ru sbyor ba'i tshul/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i tshul/ dbang chen yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor ni/ 'di ni rig pa hUM gi sgra/ 'byung ba re re la yang rgyal po re re ste// 'jig rten chags tshul 'byung
ba ni// chu zheng rngams su bstan pa yang// grangs dang tshad ni brjod du med// rlung mtsho nam mkha'i mtha' dbus su// rlung gi sha ba ljang gu la// lus kyi gtos ni mkha' dang mnyam// kha ni nub
byang mtshams su blta// rkang lag bzhi ni mthur du btsugs// rlung phur zur drug rab tu snang// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// srid gsum g.yo 'gul thams cad dang// skye shi las skyes sems can

rnams// thams cad rlung gis bskyed pa yin// 'di ni yi ge hUM gis sgra// rlung mtsho mkha' mnyam rlung gi skye mched kyis// nyi ma me shel spyan mig g.yas su byung// rlung nyid grang ba zla mig g.yon du 'byung// rlung

gi sha ba ru bcu gyen du bsgreng ba ni// ba dan lce dgu 'thor rlung shugs kyis bar snang khyab par 'bud// rna ba rdzu 'phrul nang nas rlung sngon drug drug 'byung// rab tu drag po skad chen dgu dgu byung ba

yang// 'jig rten khams 'dir rtsib ma rdo rje'i gur phub pa// bskal pa rdo rje rgya gram gnas pa rlung yin te// rdzi ni lang tsho rtse raM par+Na sha wa ri// drag po dpal gyi gzer gyis rgyun mi 'chad// zhe sdang 'bar ba'i

rdo rje char bzhin 'bebs// me 'brug dmar po bri ti hi// briSh+Na ka la sha lnga rA ga sa mun dza// bsreg par dpal chen gdug pa'i 'od zer 'phro// phyogs rer zhing brgya brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas// nam mkhar khyab
par rgyug pa'i zhal// rdo rje dmar mo'i lce yang 'bebs// mjug ma me ri sprin mnabs nas// nam mkha' stong pa'i mtha' nas g.yo// mche ba zang yag log rtogs khams gsum gzir// lha min grong khyer
'joms shing 'jig rten dus// rdo rje 'bar ba'i gur phub nas// drag shul ches sgras 'chi bdag klad pa 'gems// 'di ni me 'brug rlung 'brug gi// rigs pa gsungs pa'i sgra yin no// ye nas kun bzang
chos dbyings gdal ba la// 'od zer 'bum du 'phros te 'od zer dkyil 'khor grub// rgyud drug gnas pa'i sems can rnam rtog sbyangs// nam mkha'i rang bzhin kun tu bzang mo ste// 'di ni nam mkha' kun

bzang rig pa'i bka'// kun bzang chos dbyings ye nas gdal ba la// mtshan ma'i spyod yul sna tshogs cir snang yang// mnyam pa chen po ro gcig ste// rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khyil zhing 'phro// dam tshig sgrol

ma rlung gi sgra// ye nas lhun grub brdal ba la// mnyam pa chen por chos kun gcig/ spyod yul sna tshogs cir snang yang// mnyam pa chen por ro gcig ste// chu yi dkyil 'khor 'khyil zhing 'phro// mA ma ki ni chu

yi sgra// chos dbyings kun tu bzang mo las// ye nas dngos med stong pa'i ngang// pad ltar 'bar zhing bag chags bsreg/ kun la khyab par ro gcig ste// me yi dkyil 'khor lta bu 'phro// na bza' dkar mo me
yi sgra// chos dbyings gnas pa brten pa'i stobs// 'degs byed rdo rje lta bu'i ngang// gnas pa med par ye gnas pa// sa yi dkyil 'khor lta bur 'khyil// sangs rgyas spyan ni sa yi sgra// de skad

zhes ni dbang chen yum lngar brtsegs pa'i sgra byung ngo// de nas yi ge hUM las 'od zer 'bum du 'phros nas/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'phros te// rnam par rol par gyur to// de'i tshe 'jig
rten drug gi phyogs bcu ni g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// tshig rab tu tshig/ kun tu rab tu tshig go/ 'thor rab tu 'thor/ kun tu rab

tu 'thor ro// de'i khams gsum gyi srid pa brlag par byed pa/ lha chen po brgyad bsgral ba'i phyir/ khro bo chen po brgyad zhabs 'og tu bting ste/ dbang chen shugs kyi sgra drag po'i sngags gzer gyis brgyab ste/

hUM kA ra pra be sha phaT/ nI la raN+Da pra be sha phaT/ ya mAn+ta ka pra be sha phaT/ Ar+ya a tsa la pra be sha phaT/ pad+ma kuN+Da li pra be sha phaT/ Tak+ki rA dza pra be sha phaT/ ma hA ba la pra be sha phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li pra be sha phaT/

nA sha staM b+ha ni nA sha s+t+waM b+ha ni/ yak+sha suM b+ha ni/ yak+sha suM b+ha ni/ zhes gsungs nas/ khro bo chen po brgyad gzir cing mnan pas/ gdug pa'i mchi ma 'dzag cing/ 'bod grogs kyi sgra bton pas/ lha chen po brgyad ni

nga rgyal bcag/ bdud kyi rgyal po rnams kyis ni shugs ring 'byin/ klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis ye shes bskyed/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i sku bzhi dang dpal brgyad phrogs/ gza' dang rgyu skar rnams ni dus bzhi las

'gyur ldog med pa ste/ de yang yon tan dang khyad par lags so// de nas dbang du bsdu zhing gnan gzir bya ba'i phyir/ ma hA de wa pra be sha ya phaT/ de ba ka pA la b+h+rUM/ zhes brjod pas lha thams cad brgyal bar
gyur te/ gzugs khams kyi gtso bo ma hA de wa dang khyab 'jug 'khor lo can dang/ b+h+r-iM gi ri ti dga' byed dbang phyug dang// gzhon nu smin drug tshogs kyi bdag/ legs ldan stobs bzang la sogs

pa// gzhal yas khang gi rmang du bting// 'di ni bsdus te byin rlabs yin// nA ga pra be sha phaT/ nA ga ka pA la b+h+rUM/ nA ga ka pA la b+h+rUM/ nA ga ka pA la b+h+rUM/ mtha' yas 'jog po stobs kyi rgyu// nor rgyas dung skyong

pad+ma dang// chu lha la sogs klu yi 'khor// gzhal yas khang gi gdung du bres/ rak+sha pra be sha phaT/ rak+sha ka pA la b+h+rUM// brgya byin me lha gshin rje dang// bden bral chu bdag rlung gi lha// gnod sbyin dbang ldan sa

yi lha// nyi ma zla ba la sogs 'khor// bsgral nas gzhal yas brtsig par brtsigs/ rA dza pra be sha phaT/ rA dza pra be sha b+h+rUM/ rA dza ka pA la b+h+rUM/ yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po// mig mi bzang dang rnam thos
sras// gan bub bsres nas bsgral bar bya// ka ba dang ni rgyal mtshan btsugs// 'dod pa'i yon tan kun ldan pa'i// rin chen sna bdun dbrog pa'i phyir// tsakra brti pra be sha ya phaT/ 'khor

los sgyur rgyal bsgral nas ni// pags pas dbang gi bla bre byas// phung po tshogs kyi mchod par rol// 'khor los sgyur rgyal dbang phrogs so// Ar+ya tri ti pra be sha phaT/ sUr+ya pra be sha phaT/ sUr+ya ka pA la b+h+rUM/ nyi

ma dang ni zla ba dang// dmag dpon gza' lhag phur bu dang// pa wa sangs dang spen pa dang// rA hu+u la ste gza' yi tshogs// bsgral nas bad dang dral ma byas// smin drug dang ni snar ma dang// mgo dang lag

dang nab so dang// rgyal la sogs pa shar phyogs bsgral// mchu dang gre dang dbo dang ni// me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang// sa ga lho phyogs rnam par bsgral// lha mtshams snron dang snrubs dang ni// chu stod chu smad gro

bzhin dang// byi zhun rnams ni nub tu bsgral// mon bre dang ni mon gru dang// khrums stod dang ni khrums smad dang// nam gru tha skar bra nye rnams// byang gi phyogs su rnam par bsgral// de wa ir ya pra be sha phaT/ r

ak+sha ir ya pra be sha phaT/ rA dza ir+ya pra be sha phaT/ nA ga ir ya pra be sha phaT/ sUr+ya ir+ya pra be sha phaT/ gra ha d+hu/ gra ha d+hu/ lha rnams lus bsgral ba'i phyir// Tak+ki ni hUM ta keM ta keM phaT/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha choms/ tik+Sh+NA

tik+Sh+NA chod/ gardza gardza hUM/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha phaT/ phyogs skyong thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir/ kro ta kro ta raM/ ha la ha la khaM/ rag+sha rag+sha hUM/ ha na ha na phaT/ rgyal chen 'khor los sgyur ba rnams/ ke tu ke tu traM/ rgyal

mtshan dag tu btsugs gyur to// klu rnams ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir/ nA ga bin du nA ga id+ya nA ga dung dung dza/ dung dung rak+sha/ phud phud nA ga le nA ga le/ a ga le/ a ga le/ duM pa le/ duM pa le/ ta pa le/ ta pa

le/ hu ya/ hu ya/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/ ro Sha na ro Sha na/ A kar+Sha ya nA sha ya hUM phaT swA hA/ de skad ces brjod pas/ dbus khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i gzhal yas khang/ thod rus 'bar ba'i bar khyams dang/ me ri

'bar ba'i khyams dang/ chu srin gyi ni sgo bzhi dang/ thug pa med pa'i gzhal yas khang de na/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/ 'jigs byed kyi rgyal mtshan mang pos brgyan pa/ lhun gyis grub par gyur to// rgyud thams
cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ khams gsum dbang du bsdus shing bdud btul ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gar gyi dbang phyug lha mchog dam pa

des/ gdan lnga rim par brtsigs pa la snyoms par zhugs te/ dpal gyi gzi brjid glu tshangs pa'i mgur bzhengs nas lung bstan/ kha T+wAM ga'i phyag rgya yang bstan/ dam tshig bsgrags/ de dag gi rgyal po rnams phyir

mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod/ rU tra nyid ni rdo rje rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar lung bstan/ rU tra'i 'khor nye gnas rnams/ slas dang byi mor bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs/ bran pho dang bran mo
rnams ni bka' la btags te/ dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' skor la bzhag go/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bdag cag gi srog gi snying po ni/ ru lu ru lu zhes bgyi ba lags te// las la myur ba dngos grub tu gyur pa
dang/ ma ltar nye zhing sring ltar gdung ba dang/ mdza' mo ltar yid gcugs pa dang/ bran mo khol mor las bgyid do zhes smras pas/ 'khor gyi gtso bo dug lnga'i bdag po ma hA de wa la sogs rnams ni/ lus

phul bas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa byang zhing/ bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs/ rna bas chos thos pas shes bya'i rgyud bkrol zhing/ shes bya'i sgrib pa byang ste/ ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byed pas/ byang chub
sems dpa'i sa la bzhag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan rnam pa bzhi'i steng/ thabs dang shes rab kyi gdan 'og/ sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de la hUM hUM zhes dbang du bsdus shing/
gar mdzad cing bzhugs par grags so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas lhun gyis grub pa'i bcom ldan 'das/

gar gyi dbang phyug de dkyil 'khor chen po brgyad dang ldan par bzhugs so// de nas dbus rdo rje dbyings kyi lha tshogs rnams kyis gsungs pa/ chos dbyings yon tan 'byung gnas gzhal med khang// rgyal ba'i
dkyil 'khor 'khor bcas rigs lnga'i cod pan 'dzin// rigs kyi dbang rnams ma lus thams cad sgrol// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog ril pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rdo rje
dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas des/ thams cad rgyan gyi rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs
so// dbang lnga yum dang bcas pa'i rigs lnga sku dang ldan// shes rab thabs dang yab yum 'du 'bral med// dug gsum gcig tu bsgral bar tshar gsum rgyan du rol// khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad phyir

rgyan du che// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbu rdo rje dbyings kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das lhun

gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas des/ rdzu 'phrul myur du bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad gsungs so// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pas gsung rab rgya mtsho sgrog/ mi sgrib ye nas
gsal bas go 'phang 'dzegs par mtho// mi ldog yul las sgrol bas stabs drug 'gros su mgyogs// gar yang thogs pa med pas byin rlabs shugs dang ldan// 'tsher skad gdangs su snyan

pas mi srin spro ba bskyed// ral pa dmar po'i dbus nas dbu byung ba// dpral ba zhur po brjid pa'i khyad par dang/ rta mgrin me ltar 'bar ba'i khyad par ni// don dang mthun pa'i bye brag 'di 'dra ste// ljang gu
me 'bar rta mgo'i rang bzhin ni// 'gyur med ye shes chos sku ji bzhin gsal// byams pa'i mdangs kyis khams gsum khyad par gzigs// rngog ma le brgan 'bar ba'i khyad par ni// stug po bkod pa'i

zhing khams rab 'byams nas// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed khro bo kun// zhing khams mtha' klas ma lus dbang du sdud// shes rab thabs dang 'brel ba'i rta skad ni// grub pa'i dbyangs dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs

yin te// grub pa'i dbyangs ni rgyal ba'i zhing khams sgrog/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni ri rab rtse la 'tsher// 'tsher skad gdangs su snyan pa'i khyad par ni// rgyud drug mdud pas bcings pa mthar lam ston// spyan

mig glog ltar 'gyu ba'i khyad par ni// sha khrag rlon pa za ba'i srin po 'joms// 'tsher bag yid la gdungs pa'i rta skad ni// mtha' nas rmongs pa'i mun pa sel bar byed// ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad

kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas des/ kun tu gzigs shing kun tu rol pa
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad gsungs so// rgyud dang dbyibs dang grangs dang gzigs thabs rtogs pa'i don// gang byung rgyu ni hUM las dpal chen khro bo'i dkyil 'khor

bskyed// gang skyes gnas ni sna yi dbugs ring dro ba las// phyag rgya'i tshul du phyag rgya 'byung// shangs kyi rlung sgrom yangs pas ye shes dbugs sgrom nas// gsang ba'i 'tshubs ma langs pas sdug bsngal gcong

rnying sbyong// rgya yangs ma chad bag chags tshar gcod de// de yang 'khor ba lugs las bzlog pa yi// rlung dmar dug lnga'i dbyings su sgrel// zlum dang dkar dang gzang ring dang// rno dang ldang ba'i tshems dang

ni// zhal du btang bas byang chub sems// ma skyes chos nyid kun la rol// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po yi// cir yang 'gyur ba'i hom khung ste// hom lngar 'brel bas zhal zhes bya// 'khor ba yongs su smin pa
rang// las dang nyon mongs dbang btsan pas// dge dang mi dge lung ma bstan// de dag smin pas smin mar bshad// 'jo sgeg cir yang 'gyur ba dang// rjod byed gnyis ka'i rten gyur pas// 'phyar ba'i phyir
na ljags zhes bya// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ kun tu rol pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das lhun gyis grub pa'i

sangs rgyas des// ye shes la rol cing ye shes la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di gsungs so// yig 'bru'i rgyu ni bde gshegs thugs kyi rgyu// rdo rje myu gu ting 'dzin

dmigs pa'i rten// 'od zer 'phro 'du nyon mongs rnam rtog 'joms// rig byed ye shes phyag rgya dang// yig 'bru sa bon phyag rgya dang// phyag rgya che ba'i phyag rgya'o// rig pa la yang rnam gsum ste// blta ba rig

pa dang ni rgyud kyi rig/ las kyi rig pa gsum du bshad// de nas ye shes rol pa ni// snying po phyag mtshan phra mo dag/ brtan par gyur nas mkha' la nub// ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang
rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas des/ chos thams cad dur khrod rol pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di gsungs so// shar du rol pa'i phyag bzhi ni// khro chen snying 'byin kha T+wAM 'bar ba bsnams// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa rol// lho ru rol pa'i

phyag bzhi ni// khro chen thod rlon khrag gis bkang dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud// rdo rje be con dang ni rnge'u chung 'dzin pas rol// nub tu rol pa'i phyag bzhi ni// me yi zhags pa dang ni khyung gi khra// sdigs mdzub rtse la ye

shes me chen 'bar// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga ni rab tu 'khrol// byang du rol pa'i phyag bzhi ni// rdo rje rtse dgu dang rtse lnga dang// rtse gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdegs/ rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta
mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des/ khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// ye nas skye med skye ba'i cho 'phrul ston// ye shes lnga yi yon tan khyad par ni// rin po che dang 'dra bas sangs rgyas stong gis brgyan// dper na

klu nag 'dra ste thabs dang shes rab kyi// lte ba e ste gru gsum sku gsung thugs// sprul pas don mdzad pho nya thams cad ston// gsang ba'i yum bzhi sku la 'khril ba ni// rdo rje dra ba mo dang rin chen glog

'gyu ma// khyung gshog a mo de dang the'u gshog sder mo can// sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi thugs rje shar// thabs mchog nyis stong rtsa gnyis g.yas nas brkyang// shes rab zla stong rtsa gnyis g.yon nas
brkyang// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pas byin rlabs che// sprul pa'i phreng ba dus gsum rgyun mi 'chad// ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/

gshog pa khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des/ sna tshogs rnam par rol pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// dpa' rtags stag gis steng phyogs 'dul zhabs brgyan// rgya bye'u lcags kyis shar lho'i zhabs brgyan te// rdo rje 'chol pas lho phyogs zhabs brkyangs

brgyan// bse khrab smug pos lho nub brkyangs pa brgyan// gcan gzan gzig gis byang shar brkyangs pa brgyan// shu ken dar gyis byang phyogs zhabs brkyangs brgyan// mche ba dmar pos nub byang brkyangs pa
brgyan// sbrul nag 'khyil bas 'og phyogs 'dul ba brgyan// khro brgyad gzir nas rol pa ni// dung chen bcom zhing sgal tshigs mnan pa dang// brang mnan ldan pa bcom pa dang// 'khor nyid sku la sbas pa
dang// sku nyid 'khor la sbas pa yi// rol pas gzhal yas khang du bstan// rol pas hUM mdzad hUM gi rgya// sa bcu zil gnon stobs bcu'i dbang dang ldan// de bas sna tshogs rol pa yin// zhes gsungs

so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ zhabs khro chen brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das de/ dam tshig rgyan du rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// dper na dam tshig mchog rab ni// kun tu bzang mo yin pa'i phyir// ji snyed bud med

yod pa la// gsung gi rdo rje mi smad do// gtso la rab tu gtugs pa la// drang du smra ba gang byed pa// 'gegs pa'i tshig gis brgyan nas su// sri zhu'i sems kyi gdung ba la// ye shes tshogs kyis rab bskor
nas// mnyam pa'i dbyings nyid ye shes te// gnyis ka'i nges par mnyam na ni// stong gsum dbang por gdon mi za// 'jig rten khams na rgyal po bzhin// dus kun du ni gnas dang rten// ci phyir zhe na 'jig

rte na gyi// dus bzhi dang ni 'jig rten drug/ phyogs bcur gyur pa thams cad na// dam tshig la brten kun tu bzang// phyi nang gsang ba mthar phyin pa'i// thams cad pad+ma yin pas na// skye ba'i cho 'phrul pad+ma

yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ yum pad+ma gzi ldan ma pad+ma can gyi le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das lhun gyis grub pa'i
sangs rgyas des// sred byed rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di gsungs so// dmar po thugs rje chags pa dbang gi me lce 'dis// thams cad ma lus
sreg byed pas/ thugs rje chags pas bags chags bsreg par mdzad// gdug pa'i tshogs 'joms nyon mongs dug gsum bsreg/ lhun gyis grub pas kun tu 'joms pa yin// ci phyir zhe na phyogs bcu dus
bzhi yi// snyigs ma lngar ldan dus kyi tha ma la// srid gsum 'khor ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba// ye shes 'gro bas kun tu bsreg cing rol// rnam smin las ma zad pa'i sems can dag/ sangs rgyas
rnams la las kyang mang po mnga'// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas

yang bcom ldan 'das lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas de/ dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas he ru ka khro bo thabs kyi drag po bsgral ba'i sngags gsungs

so// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ e A' ra li hUM hri dzaH// nye ba'i snying po zhes bya ba// 'di dag bzhi 'bum bzlas gyur na// las rnams bya ba thams cad 'grub// ces gsungs pas/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo

rjes 'di skad ces bskul to// bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi chos rgya mtsho lta bu 'di/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge zhing don bzang ba dri ma med par dag pa 'di la/ phyi rabs kyi rnal
'byor pa rnams rjes su bsgrub cing dang du len na/ bgegs rnams kyi dbang du mi 'gyur ram/ bar ma dor ltung bar mi 'gyur ram/ zhes sgra bsgrags pas/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan nas 'di
skad ces gsungs so// phyi rabs rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// gsang sngags bsgrub cing rig 'dzin pa// thams cad sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras// de la bar gcod 'byung ba na// bar gcod dngos grub dus gcig

'byung// dang po klu yi bu mo rnams// rgyan gyis brgyan cing mdzes byas nas// rnal 'byor drod nyul 'ong srid kyis// de la chags pa ma bskyed dang// bar bar phra men ma yi tshogs// mi yi thod pa mang pos
brgyan// mi sdug 'bru tshugs blta ba'i tshul// bdag la mi nyan bsad bcad zer// byung bar gyur na ma 'jigs par// dbang chen gar gyi skur sgoms shig/ 'khor du gyur pa de rnams kyis// rang dbang med
par phyag byed kyi// dngos grub dang po'i rtags su sbyar// de 'og gnod sbyin tshul ston cing// ral pa 'bar ba mi mgos brgyan// mi yi rgyu mas sker 'dogs shing// sbrul nag mang po dag gis brgyan// lus
la zang zing dam dkris te// tsig tsig chom chom dag tu sdom// 'ong srid de la ma 'jigs shig/ gar gyi dbang phyug skur bsgoms na// gnod sbyin rnams dang grul bum gyi// dbang por gyur te

dngos grub rtags// gnyis pa yin par shes par bya// de 'og bar snang la gnas pa'i// lha yi khro bo rnams byung ste// 'brug sgra drag po'i sgra sgrogs shing// bar snang la gshegs sgrogs pa dag/ sbrul nag kha nas

me dug skyug/ a la la zhes sgra 'byin cing// mig kyang g.yas g.yon nyi mar bsgyur// 'bar ba'i gzugs kyis blta ba dang// rang gi khog pa kha phye nas// mi ro gsar rnying bdag la ston// pho mo'i mtshan ma za
ba'i khar// thams cad bskyur nas mche ba brdar// rkang pa phur gyur bdag la 'debs// mi mgo lags pa rlon pas g.yogs// lag pas rdo rjes brdeg pa dag/ byung bar gyur na ma 'jigs par// gar gyi
dbang phyug skur bsgoms na// dngos grub rtags gyur gsum pa yin// de ltar thams cad dngos grub 'gyur// bar gcod nyams len dus gcig 'byung// gsang ba'i bdag pos shes rab gyis// zhes
gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ thams cad dngos grub tu gyur pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po

lag na rdo rje la bos te/ gong du bstan pa de bas na// bcom ldan pad+ma he ru ka'i// sku gsung thugs kyi cho 'phrul ni// cir yang ston cing cir yang snang// gcig tu nges pa med pa'i phyir// sku che gsung che thugs

che bas// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las cis kyang ma bsgribs pas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar bstan// sku la'ang rnam pa gsum du bshad// chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs// sprul

sku sna tshogs 'dul ba'o// gsung la rnam pa gsum du bshad// tshig gi gsung dang rig pa'i gsung// don gyi gsung ste rnam gsum mo// thugs kyi che ba yang ni rnam gsum ste// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i thugs dang
mya ngan 'das pa'i thugs// gnyis su med pa'i thugs dang gsum// de ltar dgongs pa'i khyad par ni// 'gro ba mtha' dag 'dul don du// rnam par thar pa'i dbu gsum bstan// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar

dbus mthing ga/ ye shes drug gi phyag mtshan ni// g.yas pa rdo rje rnge'u chung dang// mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pas rol// dril bu rgyu zhags thod rlon g.yon gyis 'dzin// bskal pa'i me ri sbrul nag thod rlon phreng

bas brgyan// nyid kyis nyid la che ba'i rngam tshig 'di smras so// nga ni khro bo rnam par rgyal// skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings su// mtshan ma med pa'i chos bshad pas// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so// longs spyod
rdzogs sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis// seng ge glang chen khri steng na// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la// yod dang med pa'i chos kyang bstan// me long lta bu'i ye shes so// sprul pa'i 'gro don
byed pa'i skus// 'jig rten phal pa'i sa rnams su// dngos po mtshan ma'i chos bstan pas// bya ba nan tan ye shes so// zhes gsungs nas/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i

sangs rgyas rnams// gar gyi dbang phyug yin pa'i phyir// nam mkha'i rang bzhin phyag rgya rngam// cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs rngam// zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan mchog rngam// tsham rngams chen po'i stobs

rngam ste// 'di ni sku yi rngam yin no// de yang kun rdzob tu rang bzhin med pa/ nam mkha' la sprin dngas pa'i tshul dang/ lha dang 'phags pa dang/ tshangs pa dang/ smon lam cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs

kyi tshul dang/ srid pa'i 'khor lo zil gyis gnon pa/ dri med nyi zla pad+ma 'od kyi rtags te/ gdan khri'i tshul du bshad/ hom lnga 'bral bar 'byung ba'i zhal rngam/ zla kham cir yang 'gyur ba'i zhal rngam/ skye bzhi

rtsad nas gcod pa'i tshems rngam/ 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs rngam/ 'di ni gsung rngam bzhi ste/ de yang zhal ye shes kyi phyag rgya las ro rnam pa lnga'i bsreg khung du/ ro rnam pa lngas 'tshams pa'i mchod pas

'brel ba'i tshul dang/ gsung dbang tshul gyi 'dus byas dang/ rang bzhin zur ma 'dres pas ston pa'i tshul dang/ che ba ye shes kyi phyag rgyas dug lnga rnam shes kyi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshul dang/ 'brug ltar bsgrag

pa'i yan lag bcu drug gis dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i mdo sde go bar sgrogs shig/ zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang brgyad du bstan/ ting 'dzin nam mkha'i rgyan gyi skar tshogs lta bur rngam/ phrin las rgya mtsho rgyan

gyi rlabs lta bur rngam/ yon tan mi zad rgyan gyi rtsi shing lta bur rngam/ mdzad pa'i rol mo rgyan gyi gar thabs lta bur rngam/ 'di ni thugs kyi rngam bzhi'o// de la rgyan chen po bzhi ni/ rang bzhin dang rgyan

du dbye'o// lhag mthong gi rang bzhin las// lhag mthong rgyan ma g.yos pa'i tshul dang/ zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin las/ zhi gnas kyi rgyan khyab par 'byung ba'i tshul dang/ zhi gnas can gyis rang bzhin bzod pa

las/ lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang/ zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin ma god mi zad pa las/ lhag mthong gis cir yang 'gyur zhing dga' ba bskyed pa'i tshul lo// rU tra bcom pa'i gnas rngam/
zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan rngam/ khams gsum bsgral ba'i zhing rngam/ rtog 'joms byed pa'i brtul zhugs rngam/ yon tan rngom brjid bzhir grags so// de yang gnas khyad par can bkra shis shing/ cis
kyang mi tshugs pa'i tshul dang/ gdan khyad par can zil gyis mnan pa'i tshul dang/ zhing khyad par can khams gsum yongs su sgrol ba'i tshul dang/ spyod pa khyad par can srid gsum dus gcig tu

'joms pa'i tshul lo// de ltar rngam sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan no// de la sku che yan lag rags pas brjid che/ grangs mang rkyen dang 'tshams pas brjid che/ bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid che// khyad

zhugs bla ma yin pas brjid che/ de yang chos kyi sku dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas che/ thugs rje dang phrin las kyi sgo nas yid dang 'thad/ mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul par grags/ 'du byed mnyam
par 'byung ba'i sgo nas grangs mang/ smon lam sgo nas rigs dang mthun/ spyod lam gyi sgo nas bkur bar 'os/ rigs btsun pa'i sgo nas gtso bor mthong/ rang bzhin grub pa'i sgo nas khyad zhugs/ phrin las

kyi sgo nas yid dang 'thad// gsung gi brjid bzhir grags pa/ gdangs chen stong gsum gang bas brjid che/ tshig myur the tshom gcod pas brjid che/ don la nyi tsher ston pas brjid che/ khyad zhugs yon tan
ston pas brjid che/ de yang khyab pas gdangs che/ sgra tha dad pas stong gsum khengs/ skad kyi dbyangs kun gyis go bas myur/ dgongs pa gcig gis the tshom chod/ kun la byams pas gzigs pas don du dril
nas gsung shes pas khyad par zhugs/ sngags kyi sgo nas kun kyang 'dul bas yon tan ston pa'o// thugs kyi brjid pa bzhir grags pa// yangs pa re dogs med pas brjid// gsal bas mtha' gnyis spangs
pas brjid// thugs rje'i thugs dam mthar phyin brjid// ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid// de yang gnyis su med pas yang// mtha' mi dmigs pas re dogs med// lhag mthong gis dbu mar
gsal/ zhi gnas kyis mi 'gyur ba'i mtha' spangs// thugs rje rgyun mi 'chad pas 'khor ba stong gi bar du bzhugs// shes rab kyis ma rmongs pas ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul// yon tan brjid bzhir grags pa
dang// med pa zad mi shes pas brjid// gcig la 'dod dgur gyur pas brjid// gnod sbyor pham par mdzad pas brjid// thabs mkhas skyon gyis ma gos brjid// de yang bdag tu mi 'dzin pas zad mi
shes pa dang/ ye shes kyi sgo nas gcig la bsam pa'i dbang du 'dod dgur ston/ sems bskyed kyi sgo nas gnod pa sbyor/ bsod nams thams cad sems can la bsngo/ shes bya'i sgo nas thabs la
mkhas// spyod pa'i sgo nas skyon ma gos// phrin las brjid pa bzhir grags pa'i// mi bsnyengs nyams bag rol pas brjid// 'khor ba yun ring mi bsnyengs brjid// mgon skyabs rgyun du mdzad pas
brjid// dgongs pa'i don rnams grub pas brjid// de yang sgyu mar ston pa dang// rang bzhin gyis bde blag tu rol pa dang/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du smon lam gyis bzhugs pa dang/ bya rgyu med
pas mi bsnyengs pa dang/ mthu che bas mgon skyabs mdzad pa dang// dam bcas pas 'gro don rgyun du mdzad pa dang// ye shes rtse gcig gi don la dgongs pa dang// nan tan gyi sgo nas bya ba grub pa'o// de

ltar dbang chen he ru ka'i// yon tan sum cu rtsa drug gis// dug gsum sku gsung thugs su sbyangs// sdug bsngal bde ba chen por spyad// dbyings las ye shes chen po ste// ngan 'gro mtho ris skyas btab pas//
dmyal tshogs dong sprug chen por mdzad// rgyal ba gang gi thugs rjes kyang// 'di la rdul tsam bskyang du med// srid gsum dbang du bsdus nas ni// khams gsum dus gcig dbyings su thim// thig le chos

skur ye gnas pa// dbang chen zhes kyang de la bsngags// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ khro bo rngam brjid khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i le'u ste nyi shu
lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las kun tu rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' bsgo ba'i phyir/ gsang

ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang dbyings las thabs mchog sprul pa'i phyir/ tshar gsum can gyi rnge'u chung gis// lcang lo can gyi pho brang bcom// snang mdzad chen po a la la// gnod sbyin chen po a la la// chos kyi
dbyings nyid a la la// sangs rgyas bden tshig a la la// tshar gsum can gyi rnge'u chung gis// 'jig rten phal pa'i sar brdungs pas// mtshan ma dngos po'i chos rnams las// yod med chos la spyod par
shog/ tshar gsum can gyi rnge'u chung gis// 'og min gnas kyi sar brdungs pas// yod med chos la spyod pa rnams// rang bzhin med pa'i don rtogs shog/ de skad ces ni gsungs pa ni// stong gsum 'jig
rten khams thams cad// de ltar ma gyur gcig kyang med// bka' bsgos shing byin gyis brlabs pas/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ snang ba kun rdzob tshul gnas pas// rnga yi don gzhung gang

lags pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// zhus pa'i lan ni gsungs pa la// dang po rgyu dang rang bzhin dang// don dang bsgom pa grangs dang ni// bsnyen par bya dang thabs la sogs// rgyu ni phyi nang

gsang ba gsum// b+ha ga yangs pa'i sdong po dang// b+han d+ha ltag sprod rnga shing dang// tsan+dan dkar po'i shing sogs la'o// lcag dang skad dang rnga'i rang bzhin// dbyings dang ye shes rig pa'i sgra// rang bzhin don
du shes par byos// don la rnam pa gnyis yod de// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i gzi ldan ma'i// b+ha ga mi gnas ye shes yin// lta bar bsgom dang lha yi sku// sprul par bsgom pa bsgom pa'i

don// sgrub pa las kyi rnga dang gsang ba yum gyi rnga// rol mo dbyangs kyi rnga ste grangs yin no// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu bsnyen pa'i thabs// 'di ni brdung ba'i thabs yin

no// dpal chen rngam pa'i rdung thabs ni// rdo rje nam gyi cha phyed na// dkyil 'khor steng du bdag 'dug ste// steng gi'i phyag rgya bcas nas kyang// mtshan ma chen pos de la gdab// mdun du b+han d+ha srub med

bzhag/ steng du rnga bzhag lcag gis brdung// 'on kyang dngos grub mod la thob// de nas brdung ba'i thabs mchog ni// rnga ni gar gyi dbang phyug ste// rnga lcag gzi ldan pad+mo can// rnga skad rdo rje gshog pa mo// gzi

ldan pad+mar gyur nas kyang// mi brdung mi bskyod dbyings su gzhag/ dur khrod ma mo'i rdung thabs ni// rnga ni thabs kyi rang bzhin la// lcag ni shes rab yum gyi ngang// yab yum 'brel ba'i gar thabs kyis// rnga

skad zab mo'i dbyangs blangs pas// thugs dam ma lus yongs su bskang// nam tshod skya rengs dang po la// dkyil 'khor steng du bdag 'dug la// g.yas kyi mthe bong mthe'u chung sbyar// kha T+wAM phyag rgya bcas

nas kyang// srin lag kha la rnga bsar te// nyi ma shar gyi bar du ni// rnga skad mi grag dal bur brdung// ma mo rnams ni bran bzhin 'khol// rbod gtong pho nya'i rdung thabs ni// mchog chen brkos pa'i rtsib rus

la// mchog chen nyid kyi lpags kyis g.yogs// mchog chen phur pas lan dgu drag tu brdung// nyi tshod grib so si li li// dus kyi nyu le sha ra ra// pho nya las byed khrigs se khrig/ g.yas kyis rnga lcag bzung

nas su// grul bum skad ltar ku co 'don// thengs dgu drag tu brdungs nas ni// las bdag ma lus 'dur gam chad// phra men ko'u ri 'tshogs pa'i rdung thabs ni// las kyi gzhug gu zung ni ltag sprod la// tsa

ra shel sgong shun gyis g.yogs nas kyang// bcu drug phyag rgya rol pa yis// khams gsum srid gsum dbang du sdud// tshangs pa'i the'u brang dmyal thag gcod// rnga ni thabs kyi rang bzhin la// lcag ni shes rab
yum gyi tshul// rnga skad byang chub sems kyi ngang// dpal gyi rnga skad thengs gcig gis// dpal chen yab yum thugs dam bskul// dpal gyi rnga skad thengs gnyis kyis// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i re ba

bskong// dbang phyug chen po dbang du sdud// tshangs pa'i ri la rnga brdungs pas// gzugs khams lha tshogs dbang du bsdus// lnga yis ri rab rtse mo la// lha yi dbang po brgya byin yang// longs spyod lnga dang ldan
par 'gyur// drug gis 'jig rten khams su sgra bsgrags pas// mi yi gnas su thim par 'gyur// thugs rje thabs kyi rol pa mdzad// phyogs skyong zil gyis mnan pa'i rdung thabs dang// dngos
grub nye bar len pa'i rdung thabs ni// gri na mgrin sngon can du bregs nas ni// mgrin sngon nyid kyi lpags kyis g.yogs nas kyang// zhing gi gzar bus lan gsum brdungs nas ni// nyi ma shar gyi zer ka
la// dkyil 'khor steng du bdag 'dug la// g.yon gyi mthe bong gnam du bsgreng// rnga skad grangs su bcad pa ni// drug cu rtsa gnyis drag tu brdung// ma mo bcu drug dngos grub thob// ces gsungs

so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ 'og min gyi gnas dang/ lcang lo can gyi gnas dang/ ri rab rtse mo'i gnas dang/ 'jig rten phal pa'i sa rnams su tshar gsum pa'i rnga

brdung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas des/ sprul pa'i phreng ba rgyun du 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje rtse

gcig pad+mar gnas pa'i snying po 'di thugs las phyung ngo// bud+d+ha badzra oM/ satwa badzra hUM/ ran+ta badzra twAM/ d+harma badzra hrIH/ karma badzra hA/ gu h+ya badzra phaT// 'di ni brjod ma thag tu yang// kham rgya chen po drug tu

gyur// rdzogs pa a nu yo ga'i gzhung// gsang ba'i mkha' la rnam par 'khril// shrI khA hi/ shrI khA hi/ oM shrI khA hi hUM/ shrI khA he trAM/ shrI khA hi hrIH/ shrI khA hi hA// de skad lan grangs brgyad gsungs pas// long ba rgyab

sbrel brgyad rnams rdzogs// shrI khA hi hUM/ shrI khA hi hUM// drug cu rtsa gnyis phyung bas kyang// dmus long 'khor ba rab tu rdzogs// thod rus bar khyams rnams su 'khod// rdzogs pa a nu yo ga'i lung// tip+ta tsakra shwa

na mu kha kha long kha// 'di ni phyung ma thag tu yang// lcags kyi khyi spyang brgyad du bstan// ku ku ra tsa rak+sha kha long kha/ hUM phaT/ 'di ni phyung ma thag tu yang// ye shes sprul pa'i khyi bcur bstan// me ri sprin ltar

'khrigs pa'i bar khyams tha ma la// khyi spyang rol pa rngams par 'khod// hUM hUM phaT/ trAM hUM phaT/ hrIHhUM phaT/ hA hUM phaT/ 'di ni phyung ma thag tu yang// mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig dang// mgo brgyad phyag

brgyad rol pa dang// mgo drug lag drug rkang drug dang// mgo gsum lag gsum rkang gsum po// shar lho nub byang sgo bzhi ru// snying rje chen po bzhi yis rol// sprul par rol pa de rnams ni// rdzogs pa a nu

yo ga'i gzhung// ba spu pho nya'i lung du bstan// de dag rol pa'i byin rlabs las// steng 'og phyogs mtshams ma lus pa'i// thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems// rang bzhin me dang rlung yin te// dper na
srid pa'i rgyal po me chu shag bzang dang// na za'i rgyal mo ku mA ra// de gnyis yongs su 'thabs pa'i sgra// 'brug tu grags pa dang 'dra bar/ 'khor ba dong sprug bag chags bsreg/ me 'brug rlung

'brug phyag rgyar gsal// rab tu rdzogs pa'i tshul du byung// dzi na lang to tse raM/ yak+sha ku ban dza hUM/ zhes gsungs pas/ ba spu thams cad pad+ma'i 'od zer du gyur to// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta

mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sprul pa bton pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas des/ rab tu che la rngam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu zhugs nas/
'joms par byed pa 'di gsungs so// oM hu lu hu lu raM dz+wa la/ badzra e A ra li dza/ zhes gsungs te/ 'khor thams cad rngam zhing kun rol par gsungs so// dpal chen po nyid kyis zhe sdang can dang 'dod
chags can dang/ gti mug can la sogs pa 'dul bar zhal gyis bzhes pas/ sdigs mdzub nam mkhar 'phyar ba yang// bskal pa'i me dbal me lce 'bar// stong gsum 'jig rten khams thams cad// me
yi dkyil 'khor 'bar mdzad nas// gsung ni drag por bka' stsal pas// khro mdzub phyag rgya 'di bstan pas// a la la yi thog thog 'khrugs// bdud dang srin po ma lus kun// bgegs dang log 'dren

gzhan ma rnams// klu dang lang ka'i snying nas 'dren// thams cad ma lus dbang du sdus// k+She tra pA la te dzo pra be sha mi bru chu thub// shAM ti ba shaM ku ru hUM// sgrol sngags drag pos drag tu bsgral// pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru

ka/ ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tA na ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT// bskal pa'i thog thog dbab pa'i phyir// hUM dbang chen rgyal po thog thog 'bebs/ hUM dang phaT kyi srid gsum 'khor ba 'jigs// hUM mdzad hUM gi byin rlabs

bsam mi khyab// rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skem// rdo rje'i mtsho mde'u gnam lcags thu lum 'dril// gsang sngags log par lta ba'i bdud rnams 'joms// rdo rje'i sor phran thog thog 'khrug/ 'dren pa'i

snying po'i tsit+ta dbyung// ye shes rngam pa'i thugs rje a la la/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha choms/ gardza gardza hUM tsit+ta phaT/ tsit+ta drongs/ ha la phaT/ kro d+ha raM/ nA ga bin du/ nA ga it+ya/ ma hA rak+sha/ zhes gsungs so// phra men gyi me

sbrul mang po yang byung ste/ kha nas ma hA rak+sha zhes bzlas so// lang ka'i rjes shul thams cad kun/ tshogs brgyad dur khrod brgyad du bsgral te bka' dang mthun pa'i gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs
so// 'khor ba rtsad bcad nas mi 'khor ba'i dbyings su bkod/ nang khrol thams cad gsang ba'i rdzas kyi mchod par gyur/ klu dang lang ka bcad cing gtubs te/ dkyil 'khor lnga ru byin gyis brlabs/ zhi ba
dang rgyas pa dang/ dbang dang/ drag po dang/ cir yang 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// nga rgyal can gyi spyi bo mnan// zhe sdang can gyi snying ga mnan// phrag dog can gyi lag pa mnan// gti mug can

kha bub tu mnan// 'dod chags can gan rkyal du mnan no// de'i tshe 'khor gyi lha mo mang pos bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// khro rgyal khyod kyi dbu ni ci 'dra

na// grub pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen lnga ye shes lnga// khro rgyal khyed kyi rta mgo ci 'dra ste// dbang mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i rta skad can// khro rgyal khyod kyi zar bu ci 'dra ste// lang ka za byed khro rgyal 'bum du

sprul// khro rgyal khyod kyi smin ma ci 'dra ste// smin ma ma chags pad+ma yum gyi tshul// khro rgyal khyod kyi spyan ni ci 'dra ste// chags med thugs rjes pad+ma can du ston// khro rgyal khyod kyi snying ni ci 'dra ste// thugs rje byang

chub sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed// shangs kyi rlung sgrom dug gsum rtsad nas bcad// zhal gyi hom lnga 'brel bas rgyud lnga sgrol bar byed// rno dbal mche bas skye bzhi rtsad nas gcod// pad+ma le brgan ljags kyis
gsung rab rgya mtsho 'chad// rol pa'i phyag gis 'gro ba 'dul la mkhas// gshog bzhi brkyangs pas phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad// zhabs brgyad rol pas gzir gnon mdzad pa'i tshul// sku lus dpal gyi ri bo

la// ye shes dpal gyi nyi stong brdal// ye shes lha mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod do// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po/ dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ lang ka btul ba'i le'u ste nyi shu
brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des/ zhe sdang chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad ces
gsungs so// gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang// thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas// bdud dang dbang phyug dregs pa des// 'jig rten khams kun za byed par// 'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung gis// shor
ba gzhon nu la sogs pa'i// bdud dang gshin rje dregs pa de// thugs rje tshad med bzhis bsgral nas// phung po'i nyal thabs gan rkyal te// srin mo za ra yag mor bcas// drag po'i sngags kyi bsgral bar

byas/ ka da ri ri sha/ pra be sha ni hUM hUM pra be sha ya phaT/ rat+na bi lag sha na ma ra ta pa ga ling ga ta/ ti ling gi ling/ sarba pu ri mug rat+na ban d+ha k+ti ka/ ka la bi la/ mu kha sha sha da ra ga ti sha/ pra dun dun/ su sha

ra ga sha/ ro bin dung/ bi mar na ta ka/ sgrol sngags drag pos bsgral nas ni// 'dzam gling lho yi gling khams su// ro las sa gzhir gyur pas na// ro yi srung ma chen mo ni// ma mo chen mo brgyad bzhag go/ de yi
gnas rten chen po yang// rang byung re re bzhag nas ni// dur khrod chen po yin pa'i phyir// tshangs pa'i gzhal yas khang zhes bya// zhes gsungs pas/ gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ 'o na ci/

che btsan 'gran gyi zla med gar gyi dbang phyug che/ gsang sngags kyi chos 'di ltar byin rlabs che ba 'di ltar bdud 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin na/ ma mo'i ming ni gang/ dur khrod kyi ming ni gang/ mchod rten gyi

ming ni gang/ tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ji lta bu/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni ji ltar rtogs par bgyi/ zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang bdag rdo rje gsang chen po// rU

tra'i mgo ni lho nub mtshams// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// lag pa gnyis ni g.yas g.yon gdengs// kun kyang thug pa med par brkyang// de bas 'dzam gling sa 'di kun// bkra shis ya mtshan thugs

rjer ldan// chos dang rdzu 'phrul 'byung ba'i gnas// cho 'phrul 'byung bar ngas gsung gis// rU tra'i lus ni 'dzam bu'i gling// snying ni ma ga d+hA yi ljongs// dur khrod ming ni bsil ba'i tshal// gzi ldan ma dang

go'u ris srung// rang byung mchod rten bde byed rten// mkhas dang snying stobs gnyis kar ldan// rU tra'i mgo ni lho yi phyogs// dur khrod sing ga gling phran te// gshog pa mo dang tso'u ris srung// mthong thos

'phrul dang ldan pa mnga'// mchod rten ri bo ta la'o// rU tra'i lag pa g.yas shar lho'i// mtshams te dur khraud bal yul yin// glog 'gyu ma dang pu kas srung// longs spyod dag dang ldan pa yin// mchod rten kha

shor bya ri kha// lag g.yon lho nub mtshams te dur khrod sA la'i yul// sder mo can dang be tAs srung// mthu dbang che ba de na gnas// rang byung mchod rten go ma sa la yin// rkang g.yas byang shar mtshams su

te// dur khrod ming ni li yi yul// dra ba mo dang tsan d+has srung// me chu 'grub pa de na gnas// mchod rten ming ni ge'u ti shan// rkang g.yon nub byang mtshams te dur khrod kha che'i yul// the'u gshog ma dang pra

mos srung// de na bde skyid phun sum tshogs// mchod rten ming ni ka ni ka/ pho mtshan steng phyogs dur khrod u rgyan yul// mgyogs byed ma dang g+hasmas srung// gzi yi mchod rten chen po ste// dngos grub thob pa de

na mang// rU tra'i nang khrol dur khrod za hor yul// lang ka pu rangs srin po'i gnas// a mo de dang sma shas srung// srin po srin mo sha za dang// 'byor pa longs spyod kun dang ldan// mchod rten bde byed gzhon

nu'o// tshangs pa'i gzhal yas khang bstan pa// nyan thos mdo sde kri yA dang// theg pa chen po yo ga dang// gsang ba yi ni theg pa gsum// gzhung dang mthun pa'i gzhal yas khang// srin mo rak+mo yag+mo
bsgral// de yi khog sbubs skye mched las// gzhal yas khang gi rgyu yin te// sgo bzhi rta babs mu khyud bcas// drag po khro bo khyams la sogs// tshangs pa'i gdung chen zhig gshag gtams// yang
na tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ni// theg mchog a nu yo ga'i gzhung// yang na tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ni// theg rgyal a ti yo ga'i tshul// khyab dang gnas dang 'byung la sogs// rnam pa gsum po'i gzhal yas
khang// snod bcud 'byung ba'i yul du gsal// b+ha ga dgyes pa'i nang du bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa ste// nam mkha' lta bur rab rtogs na// gzhal yas khang zhes bya ba yin// de bas phyi rabs rnal
'byor pas// dpal gyi thugs rje'i byin gyis brlabs// ta nas btul nas bsgral ba'i phyir// sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis

brlabs// phyi rabs sngags 'chang sgrub pa pos// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// bka' bzhin bskyed nas byin brlabs pas// sngags mchog bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i phyir// bsgrub pa'i rgyu dang dam rdzas

kun// sangs rgyas bsgrub pa'i rgyu dang gzhi// dam tshig dam pa bsgrub pa'i rdzas// 'bras bu chen po lnga yin pas// bdud dang gshin rje la sogs dang// mchog gi dbang po'i 'byor tshogs la// le lo spang ba'i
brtson 'grus kyis// bar chod med par 'bad la bsgral// rnam shes hUM du gyur byas te// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur nas// yang dag sa gsum 'das par byas// de ltar ta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dur
khrod bdag po btul nas ni// 'khor bcas ma lus dbang du bsdus// srid pa yongs sgrol chen por mdzad// sa nas sa yi rim pa bzhin// mi ldog dbyings su thim par bya// bdud dang srin po ma lus

kun// sngon gyi rgyal bas gsungs pa bzhin// btul nas yang dag sgrol mdzad pa// 'di ni sgrol ba'i phrin las so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las shor ba gzhon nu la
sogs pa btul zhing/ gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi don du/ gnyis su med par sbyor ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phyi rabs rnal 'byor skal ldan rnams la 'di gsungs so// lus ngag yid gsum phyag rgya chen po ste// dbyings nas gsang ba'i yum bskyed snying pos bskul/ a ka

te bi ka te ma tang ka te swA hA/ mnyam pas mnyam pa'i phyag rgya gsal// gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i phyir/ rdorje pad+ma ldan byas pa// thabs kyi phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul la// gzi ldan gsang bar e gru gsum// nyi ma
pad+ma shes rab ldan// so sor gsang ba'i brdas mtshon te// oM dang mUM gyi 'phro 'du las// byin rlab rnam par 'phro ba yis// 'dab brgyad pad+ma nyi mar bcas// de dbus gsang ba'i rdo rje ste// hUM
gis gsor zhing ha yis bskyod// yang nas yang du bskyod pa ni// sku gsung dbyings su bskul ba'o// hUM ni thugs sems lus ngag rgyu// go ro tsa na dbyings nas ston// srog dag gsang ba'i dbyings su

drangs// ljags kyi dbang por bskyil ba dang// nA sa'i dbyings nas klad par bskul// tshor ba myong nas sgal rtsar brgyud// gsang ba'i rdo rje'i lam du sbyangs// b+ha ga yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// nyi ma zla ba

pad+ma dang// rdo rje la sogs 'dres pa dang// sbyor ba'i byang chub rab spros pas// phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas thugs dam bskul// mtha' yas sems can las don byas// slar 'dus phyag rgya'i skur gyur pas// ye

shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba'o// de yang thabs dang shes rab las// byang chub sems ni lce la bzhag/ rdzas la tshe yi dngos grub blang// 'di ni sbyor ba'i lung du grags// kun rdzob phyag rgya'i skur gsal
ba// gnyis med byang sems 'od zer las// dong tse tsam gyi zla dkyil na// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang dmar// nyung 'bru tsam gyi go mnabs pa// g.yas pas yid bzhin nor bu bsnams// g.yon na tshe yi
za ma tog/ de ltar dkyil 'khor lhun grub pas// sprul pas bdag gzhan don byas pas// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya'i sku// sbyor ba chen pos bskyed pa'o// bsnyen pa bzhi 'bum bton nas kyang// tshe yi rig

'dzin thob 'dod na// zhag ni sum cu phrag bzhi'am// phrag drug phrag brgyad dag gis bsgrub// ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sbyor ba chos nyid kyi le'u
ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das che btsan 'gran gyi zla med gar gyi dbang phyug de la/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin srin po dang// lha ma
yin dang/ dri za dang/ lto 'phye dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci la sogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das dbang mchog dam pa de la/ glu drug blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi

'khor rnams kyis kyang/ tshig dang don dang ldan pa'i glu drug blangs te/ de dag gi bring nge ba dang dung nge ba dang/ sha ta pa dang gar d+ha ba/ cang ka de'u pang ka de'u ste/ de tshe glu drug blangs pas don drug

'grub// breng nge ba yi glu blangs pas// 'jig rten sgron ma thams cad la// dam chos 'khor lo bskor tshul gyis// tshangs pa lha yi dkyil 'khor nas// sku yi dngos grub chen po thob// dung nge ba yi glu blangs
pas// 'jig rten sgron ma thams cad la// mtho ris chos bzang lha yi mdun sa nas// nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang// sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad sogs// brgya byin lha yi dbang po yi/ gsung gi

dngos grub chen po thob// sha ta pa yi glu blangs pas// dpal dang ldan pa'i rgyal chen bzhi// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// sgra skad rtogs pa ma lus kun// lha yi gsung du rtogs par gyur// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
shes kyis// dran byed rnam shes ma lus kun// lha yi thugs su rtogs par gyur// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// gzugs mdzes sna tshogs ma lus kun// mtshan dang dpe byad thob par gyur// bya ba nan tan

ye shes kyis// gzugs mi sdug dang las ngan rnams// yi ge bcu spangs dge ba'i don// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi// yon tan chen po'i dngos grub thob// gar d+ha ba yi glu blangs pas// dbang po rdo rje

'chang rgyal te// lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ de la sogs pa'i phyogs skyong ba// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// thams cad dbyings su rtogs gyur nas// dbyings kyi don la rab rtogs te// ma sring rgya mtsho

dam la btags// srid pa gsum gyi bro sgra dir// rang bzhin med pa'i bro brdungs pas// phyogs skyong chen po bcu rnams kyi// yon tan chen po'i dngos grub thob// cang ka de'u'i glu blangs pas// ma mo bdun dang
srin mo bzhi// nag mo chen mo ral gcig sogs// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis// khams gsum dbyings su sgrol bas na// don ni lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir// srid gsum dbang sdud mthu mo che// dregs pa'i
yul bdag dbang du sdud// pang ka de'u'i glu blangs pas// gzhon nu'i sku mchog rdzu 'phrul dbang gi 'phags// glang chen brjid pas lha dbang g.yul du bstod// dmag grags chen mo dge bsnyen chen mo

dang// lha sras gzhon nu klu sras gzhon nu dang// drang srong gzhon nu rig 'dzin gzhon nu dang// byin shugs brtan pa'i gzhon nu lnga brgya spun// gnod sbyin gzhon nu tirti ka la sogs// gnod sbyin grul bum

srin po mi'am ci// 'byung po sha za yul bdag 'dre la sogs// dngos grub rlabs chen 'khrigs pa thob// de nas de'i tshe pad+ma gar gyi bro drug ni// bdud bzhi thal bar brlag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba spyi nas 'dren

pa'i bro// 'di ni sdug bsngal nad sel bro// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni// 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal du shar// khrag 'thung thugs dam rgyud kyang bskul// gri bA mgrin sngon snying la brdung// klu tshogs mang po
dbang du sdud// dbang phyug chen po'i mkha' la brdung// gsang ba'i thugs dam dbyings nas bskul// glu yi rdzu 'phrul a la la// dngos grub rlabs chen a la la// zhes dpal chen po gar gyi dbang phyug gi
brjid glu'o// pi wang gi sgra lta bur blangs so// sdug bsngal nad sel thugs rje'i bro// dug lnga rnag khrag 'byin pa'i bro// ma rig mun pa gtibs par brdung// pad+ma dbang chen khrag 'thung
gis// 'khor ba skyams lings chen po mdzad// sdug bsngal gcod 'byin nad la brdung// ma srin rgya mtsho dam la btags// tha tshig gnyan po 'da' mi byed// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying// rul myags

nas ni tshigs 'gyur pas// srog gi snying po da gsungs shig/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM dza// 'di las bdag cag mi 'da' 'o// bde ba chen po a la la// zhes gsol to// gling bu'i sgra ltar glu blangs so// thugs
dam dbyings nas bskul ba'i bro// rnam dag pad+ma rdo rje'i bdag/ ma gos pad+ma'i tshul ston pa// dregs pa la sogs 'joms mdzad pa'i// chos dbyings rnam dag skyon bral bas// bcu gcig 'od la thugs rje

shar// pad+ma'i spyan la gzigs nas kyang// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis// thugs rje phrin las chen po yis// khro bo brgyad la gzir mnan mdzad// 'bod sgrogs mang po di ri ri// gdung ba'i mchi ma sha

ra ra// rU tra thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// skye med dngos grub a la la// zhes gsungs so// hwa shang gi sgra ltar blangs so// ye shes rgyan gyi bro bo che// oM gtsug phud 'khor lo rtsibs

brgyad 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan snang mdzad che// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// 'khor lo snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// hUM dpral bar rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// cho ga gsum
ldan sems dpa' che// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// rdo rje snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// sbA las rin 'byung zur brgyad 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan rin chen
'bar// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// rin chen snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa'o// AM las pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan snang mtha' yas// yab yum gnyis med sbyor

ba las// pad+ma snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa'o// hA las rdo rje rgya gram 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan don yod grub// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// rgya gram snying gi dbus su bsgom// de
la rang bzhin med pa'o// sku gsung yon tan phrin las lnga// rigs lnga dpal gyi glu blangs pas// gsang ba yum gyi bro brdung zhing// dpa' bo 'bru lngas dbang bskur bas// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya'i
sku// lus pa med pa chos kyi dbyings// hrIH/ rta mgrin gtsug na nor bu 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan ha ya grI// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// nor bu snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med
pa'o// hUM/ g.yas pa brgyad na lcags kyu 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan phra men ma// gtso dang gnyis med 'khril ba las// lcags kyu snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa'o// g.yon pa

brgyad na mtshon cha 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan badzra ste// gtso dang gnyis med 'khril ba las// mtshon cha snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa'o// kruM/ zhabs brgyad za byed chas brgyad 'bar// cho
ga gsum ldan yum gyi mkha'// gtso dang gnyis med 'khril ba las// chas brgyad snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa'o// phaT/ sku gsung thugs las sprul pa yi// sgo skyong khro bo mgo dgu

brtsegs// kham rgya ma dang long ba'i tshogs// dmus long tshogs dang khyi spyang tshogs// dpal chen sku la rab tu 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan sprul pa'i tshogs// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// 'khor rnams

snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pa ste// 'di ni ye shes rgyan gyi glu// rgyan nyid ye shes glu blangs pas// bdag nyid phyag rgya rtags mchog 'bar// oM/ 'khor lo ye shes can rnams ni// 'khor lo

rdo rjer bsgom byas nas// de nyid chos sku nam mkhar che ho// hUM/ ye shes rdo rje can rnams ni// rdo rje rdo rjer bsgoms byas nas// de nyid chos nyid ngang la rdzogs// ho/ rin chen ye shes can rnams ni// rin chen

rdo rjer bsgom byas nas// de nyid longs spyod lhun gyis grub ho// pad+ma ye shes spyan rnams ni// pad+ma rdo rjer bsgom byas te// de nyid brtan par 'gyur ba med ho// rgya gram rin chen can rnams ni// rgya gram rdo rjer

bsgom byas nas// de nyid sprul sku ngo mtshar che ho// rgyan nyid ye shes glu blangs pas// bskul dang don byas 'dus pa dang// thams cad sku ste gnyis med sku// stong pa chen po'i ngang la bzhag ho// zhes gar d+ha

ba'i sgra ltar blangs so// 'di ni ma mo 'khrugs pa'i bro bo che// bdud bzhi thal bar rlog pa'i bro// lang ka srin po'i snying la brdung// 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// khams gsum kun gyi dbang phyug

ma// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi blu blangs pas// srid pa gsum gyi las thams cad// gar dang dbyangs kyis mchod nas kyang// dpal chen 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// phra men 'dus pa'i glu blangs shing// srin po
bsgral ba'i bro brdungs pas// dpal dang ma mo'i thugs dam skong// ye shes 'khrugs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// khro bo chen po'i bro brdungs te// ma mo bsten pa'i glu blangs pas// dpal gyi gtsug 'byam a la

la// zhes cang te'u'i sgra ltar blangs so// lang ka bsgral ba'i bro bo che// bdud bzhi thal bar rlog pa'i bro// lang ka srin po'i snying la brdung// bdud kyi mig 'bras thang la rlog/ snying khrag dron mo kha ru
skyugs// dug lnga brtsegs pa'i ri bo la// 'di ni lang ka bsgral ba'i bro// rus pa thal chen khra la la// rol pa'i rta bro chems se chem// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra skad 'khrugs// khams gsum dngos grub

a la la// de skad pang ka de'u'i glu ltar blangs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ tshangs pa dbyangs kyi glu drug gi le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom

ldan 'das kyis dngos po thams cad sreg pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsung mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo las byung ba/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la bos te/ sems dpa' chen po/
ngas sngon lang ka srin po la sogs pa'i/ ro'am bem por gyur pa rnams// bsregs nas dngos med stong pa'i ngang// de bas khyod la sogs pa yi// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rdzas bsgrub pas// ro bsreg thal ba
bsgrub pa'i phyir// phun sum tshogs pa lnga ldan zhing// rtags pa'i gnas su maN+Dal bya// dang po sa blangs byin gyis brlab// 'dom gang gru bzhi khyud skor bcas// zla gam dmar po dbang gi gzhal yas
su// rak+ta chags pa rdzas kyi myul byugs dang// srid gsum dbang sdud dmar gyi go ma ye// dbang phyug chen po 'khor bcas bzhugs pa'i gnas// shes rab pha rol chen po bzhugs pa'i thugs ka nas// rak+ta

bsgral ba chu bo'i rgyun ltar 'bab// rak+ta maN+Dal/ de nas mtshan dang ldan pa'i yum// dur khrod bka' dang mthun pa yis// gsang ba'i thig skud bkal ba yang// khrus byas dar ldan rgyan gyis bklub// spyi bor

bzhag la dbang bskur bya// chags pa chen por mchod pa yang// thugs las sprul pa pad+ma rA ga yis// 'chi bdag gdug pa lang ka'i tshogs bcom ste// rgyu phreng khrag dang bcas pa'i thig le yis// thabs dang
shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i gtsug/ chags pas dbang bskur 'khor ba zil gyis gnon// kun bzang yangs pa'i mkha' la thig 'debs so// rak+ta puts+tsha me/ lan gsum bzlas te gzi ldan du// gyur
par dmigs te dbye bar bya// zla gam kha sprod zlum po lnga'i// dkyil 'khor e zhal gru gsum la// gru gang mtha' bskor 'phang du brtsig/ sa tshon mgar ba'i so dog gam// yang na snum chen bsregs pa'i
sa// nag po'i sa la e zhal bri// mU la rak+ta zla gam sku// 'od phyung mtha' bskor bu yug rnams// dmar po yon tan dbang du sdud// de yi dbus su sngags kyi rdzas// dmar po dpal dang ldan pa'i
rdzas// bshul la sogs pa'i snum par sngo// de yi dbus su yangs par bsham// 'gram mam steng du sngags kyi rdzas// thod pa rnam gnyis bcud dang ldan// 'phro 'du dmigs pa'i rten du bzhag/ mtha' skor me
ri dmar po la// phur pa dang ni rdzas rnams dgram// me sngags btab ste gzhag par bya// gsang ba'i gzugs thag dmar pos bcings// de nas thal ba bsgrub pa'i phyir// zla gam steng du

longs spyod dgram// bam gyi ri bo'i sa phyogs su// ma mo'i gom pa drug cu yis// rdo rje'i 'gros su song nas kyang// rdo rje'i dpung gis sa phyogs su// bcu drug rol pa'i pho nya dgye// hrIH/ dbang chen dpal

gyi thugs ka nas// bcu drug rol pa'i pho nya mo// zangs kyi 'phar ba rkang gcig de// kha brgyad zla gam tshogs la rol// mig brgyad sdang mig zhe la gnon// spu tog lcags kyu dmar po la// dung gi tsha tsha dkar

po 'phro// mche ba zang yag 'bar ba la// ma mo bcu drug rol pa nyid// nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba las// ta kr-ita rgyal mo rol pa nyid// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs ma// gang la bya ba'i gnas dag tu// the
tshom med par dmyal thag gcod// dzaHdzaH/ zhes bskul lo// de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs mthong nas kyang// dbang chen gar gyi dbang phyug che// bkra shis rta bro ji ltar

bskor// phyung nas shul du ji ltar dmigs// byang shar mtshams su ji ltar bshig/ rol pa mdzad na ci ltar mdzad// snying dang b+han d+ha gang gi rten// dbang po lnga ni gang la gzhag/ rkang lag rgyu+u phreng gang la
gzhag/ shun dang thod pa gang la gzhag/ bdud rtsi'i char ni ji ltar dbab// de skad ces ni zhus pas na// gar dbang gsung gis bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs// yi ge hUM gi rta bros

'cham// khro bo rdzas la dmigs nas gdab// dur khrod las dag spyan drangs te// he yi steng du gzhag par bya// b+han d+ha dbang po lnga yi rten phral nas// zla gam dbus su gzhag par bya// gzi brjid ldan pa'i lha
