mo lnga'i// rten du dbang po lnga yang gzhag/ re'u cha la ni nang khrol te// sgo bzhi la ni rkang lag stai// bar khyams la ni sgal tshigs gzhag/ me ri la ni rgyu phreng ngo// shun gyi g.yab dang rlung gi phyogs// sna tshogs
yam shing rdzas la gzhag/ de skad gsungs ma thag tu ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang la sogs pa'i// rol pa'i 'khor tshogs mang po yis// lu gu rgyud kyi bros bskor te// gar gyi dbang phyug chen po yi// byin
rlabs yongs su rdzogs pa yi// thugs dam bskul phyir 'di gsungs so// gar dbang nyid du bdag cag rnams// bdag nyid chen po'i dbang thob phyir// rgyu drug gnas pa'i sems can rnams// dpa' bo 'bru

lngas dbang bskur gyis// ngan song gsum gyi phung po la// 'khor ba'i lam lnga dgag pa'i phyir// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i phra bkod pas// rgyu drug 'bros khung gcod pa'i rgya// lus ngag sems kyi sa gzhi la// yig
'bru 'khrigs pa'i bro brdungs pas// dug gsum rdul phran bzhin du bshig/ phung po khams dang skye mched tshogs// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// sku gsung thugs su dag sbyor bas// phyag rgya
chen por bdag gyur cig/ tshon lnga rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor du// khams gsum 'khor ba'i bro brdungs pas// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por bshad// thig le gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje las kyi bro

brdungs pas// dbang phyug gar gyi rgyal por gyur// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dpa' bo rdo rje'i bro brdungs pas// dgra bo kun gyi klad pa brngub// ma tshogs 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor su// rkang

pa phur pa'i bro brdungs pas// bgegs dang 'byung po'i snying la brdung// ging chen 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'khor lo thabs kyi bro brdungs pas// ma sring rnams kyi snying la brdung// pho nya 'dus pa'i dkyil

'khor du// rkang pa rgyan gyi bro brdungs pas// rgyab nyan rkun bu'i snying la brdung// kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings su// tsit+ta 'bar ba'i bro brdungs pas// mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings la brdung// gsang ba yum
gyi b+ha ga la// las kyi ling+ga'i bro brdungs pas// bag chags gdug pa'i tshogs la brdung// 'khor chen 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// nyung dkar gser gyi bro brdungs pas// bka' las 'das pa'i snying la

brdung// za byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje mche ba'i tshems brdar bas// bka' las 'das pa'i snying la brdung// ha ha ru lu ha ha ru lu hUM phaT/ rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i
tan+t+ra las/ ngan song gnas kyi bro'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang brtson 'grus chung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir/ shar phyogs su mi'am ci'i 'khor rta mgo can 'dul ba'i phyir 'di

gsungs so// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// gtum chen rngam pa'i sgra sgrogs shing// dbang chen rta skad tse re re// dpa' bo'i 'brug sgra 'u ru ru// dpal gyi rnga sgra di ri ri// rol pa'i rta bro chems se
chem// gsang ba'i bshug pa kyu ru ru// rngam pa'i glog 'bar ljibs se ljib// rdo rje'i thog 'beb lams se lam// hUM gi dbang bskur khams gsum g.yo// phaT kyi sku sprul 'jig rten khyab// raM gyi me
'bar thams cad bsregs// gcan gzan mu kha sprin ltar gtibs// kang ka 'dab chags skar ltar 'khrugs// sngon gyi thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings su// khams gsum

yongs sgrol mdzad pa'i phyir// za byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// rus pa'i phung po spungs pa las// gcan gzan chen po'i bro brdungs pas// bdag tu blta ba'i nga rgyal bcom// khrag 'thung chen po'i dkyil
'khor du// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho 'khyil ba la// ma tshogs mkha' 'gro'i bro brdungs pas// 'dod chags ngo bo rtsad nas bcom// rngam chen 'khrugs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// sha chen phung po spungs pa
la// sder chags 'dus pa'i bro brdungs pas// bdag tu rtog pa'i zhe sdang bcom// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// dug gsum gzhom pa'i las byas pas// sngon gyi dam tshig chen por skong// ma bdun
mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// tan gaN sprul pa'i las byas pas// rnal 'byor bskang ba'i phrin las rdzogs// dbang chen gar gyi dkyil 'khor du// bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i las byas pas// khams gsum

bsgral ba'i cho ga rdzogs// phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// bka' 'das bsgral ba'i las byas pas// rU tra mnan pa'i cho ga rdzogs// ha ya grI wa hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi

rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rta bro'i le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o//// 'du shes chung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po'i brtul zhugs kyi ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad gsungs so// khrag 'thung chen po'i brtul zhugs ni// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// bdag nyid chen por bsgom byas te// dbu ni rta mchog tshogs la
rol// thugs ni skye med dbyings la rol// phyag ni phra men tshogs la rol// gshog pa gti mug klu la rol// zhabs ni khro chen brgyad la rol// sku ni rngam brjid chas la rol// rdo rje gsang ba'i yum la

rol// gsung ni pho nya'i tshogs la rol// 'khor ba'i skyams lings chen po la// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ram dar gnyer// khong snying yum gyi b+ha ga la// khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad pa las// ye shes lnga

yi ru dpon mdzad// khro bo rdo rje'i go tshags sdoms// sprul pa'i pho nyas dang du tshugs// dug gsum dpal gyi mda' mkha' 'grim/ rdo rje mtshon gyi char pa phob// lus ni rdul phran bzhin du rlogs// sems ni

yum gyi mkha' la stob// ha ha ru lu hUM phaT/ ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro'i le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang

bcom ldan 'das kyis zhe sdang can rnams dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir/ byams pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sgo srung srin po'i 'khor khyi'i mgo can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir 'di

gsungs so// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po ni// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// dpal gyi khyi brgyad las la dgye// tshems ni sra snyi med par rno// skad ni phyi nang med
par zug/ de phyir bdud kyi mel tshe ba// bang ni ngal dub med par mgyogs// de phyir ye shes sprul pa'i khyi// zas su gtsang sme med par 'thung// de phyir khrag dang dri chu 'thung// shar gyi phyogs

nas rgyug pa ni// 'brug sgra ldir bas lha chen 'dul// lho yi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// glog dmar ljags kyis gshin rje sgrol// nub kyi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// rdo rje khyung gshog klu 'brug 'dul// byang gi phyogs
nas rgyug pa ni// gnod sbyin pho mo'i sgal rtsib 'joms// shar lho mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// drang srong bdud 'dul bcar la 'debs// lho nub mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// za byed srin po'i don snying

'dren// nub byang mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// rlung lha sngon mo'i ba dan bskyod// byang shar mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// bgegs chen pho mo'i sha la rol// steng gi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// nyi zla gza' skar kha long

kha// 'og gi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// sa bdag pho mo thibs kyis gnon// kun kyang mi bzad ci 'dra na// mche ba rgya zor 'gugs pa 'dra// spyan ni nyi zla zhun ma 'dra// ral pa nyi zer 'dzings pa 'dra// sder mo

gnam lcags zhun ma 'dra// khyod kyi phrin las dus la bab// ku ku ra tsa kha long la hUM phaT/ ces bskul lo// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las// khyi'i brtul

zhugs kyi bro'i le'u ste sum cu lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gti mug can 'dul ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ srin po'i 'khor lho

phyogs grul bum gyi sgo ba phag gdong can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir 'di gsungs so// phag gi brtul zhugs chen pos ni// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// blang dor med par mnyam pa la// phyogs bcu zas su za

ba'i phyir// 'bar ba'i khron brko nga re mkhas// khron du ma gyur gang yang med// sku ni 'bar ba'i cha lugs la// gnam lcags ngur mo'i gzer gyis brgyan// zhal ni phag gdong mche bar sprul// gsung ni grul

bum phyogs su sgrogs// tshems ni sra snyi med par rno// shangs ni nyon mongs thal bar rlog/ rbad nas khros pas bro brdung tshe// srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// dmyal tshogs me dpung rtsad nas gcod// du ru

du ru tshal pa tshal pa hUM phaT/ ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ phag gi brtul zhugs kyi le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
'dod chags bya'i brtul zhugs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nub phyogs srin po'i 'khor/ klu 'bab bzang gi grong khyer gyi sgo srung/ bya mgo can dang 'dod chags can gdul ba'i phyir
'di gsungs so// rdo rje gshog pa'i byin rlabs las// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po ni// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// rdo rje'i gshog chen gdengs pa'i tshe// khams gsum khyab par gzan la

tshol// rdo rje'i sder chen bcum pa'i tshe// rgyud drug sems can sbar mor 'dzud// rdo rje'i mche sder chen po gdengs pa'i tshe// rgyud drug cig char ril mid mdzad// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po ni// zhing bcu bsgral
ba'i lhag rol la// dkar po'i tshogs dang dmar po'i tshogs// dbyar gyi char sprin 'khrigs pa bzhin// lding zhing 'bab la 'babs shing 'jom// gtan nas len pa'i las mdzod cig/ ma ma ko tak+sha ya/ ma ma

ko tak+sha ya/ ha ha ru lu ha ha ru lu hUM phaT/ ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bya'i brtul zhugs kyi bro'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o//// de nas gsang
ba'i bdag pos 'jig rten drug gi byang shar mtshams su/ dur khrod gsang ba bkrol te rol pa'i phyir// gar dbang lha mchog pad+ma he ru ka/ 'og min gnas mchog dam pa'i dur khrod nas// 'og min lcang lo
can gyi pho brang du// thugs rje chen po mnga' bas dgongs su gsol// dur khrod gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i klong// rgya gram khrag gi rba rlabs 'khyil// keng thod gsar

rnying gshag tu gtams// keng rus gzhibs pa'i drag shul gyi// dbang chen thog thog ser chen 'bebs// hUM gi sgra skad 'brug stong ldir// ta kr-ita rgyal po dug gsum 'joms// rol cig dkrugs shig pho nya'i

tshogs// bam gyi ri bo spungs pa la// las bdag 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn sarba DAk+ki ni s+t+waM/ zhes gsungs pas// che btsan 'gran gyi zla med gar gyi dbang phyug chen pos rnam par

rol par mdzad de/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ snyigs ma lnga la babs pa'i sems can rnams/ dug gsum dbang gi rU tra'i rjes bsrung ba/ da lta'i gdug pa can rnams bsgral ba'i bag chags mnan pa dang/ phyi

ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus kyi zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phyir/ bsgral ba'i phung po'i lhag ma la/ sgrol ba'i dus dang dus su/ gnas kyi bro brgyad brdung bar bya/ zhes gsungs te/ dug gsum gyi gnas mgo la lang ka mnan

pa'i bro brdungs te/ hUM rU tra bsgral ba'i phung po la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i dbu gtsug tu// mthing nag grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// hrIHlas grub pa'i rta mgo lnga// hUM gi 'brug
stong ldi ri ri// de yi byin rlabs chen po las// lang ka mnan pa'i bro brdung 'tshal// rta sder chen pos stong gsum g.yos// rta skad rngam pas thugs dam bskul// bka' bzhin las la gshegs su gsol// e

h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn hriM hriM/ zhes drag tu bskor zhing bzhugs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ lang ka mnan pa'i bro'i le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o//// de

nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tsit+ta ni 'khor ba'i 'khor lo yin pas/ tsit+ta dkyil 'khor la bro brdung zhes gsungs te/ hUM lang ka bsgral ba'i phung po la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams shing// khrag 'thung 'bar

ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// hUM las grub pa'i dpal be'u lngas// ye shes lnga yi phyag rgya 'khrugs// de yi byin rlabs chen po las// rigs lnga'i khrag 'thung sprin ltar 'khrigs// tsit+ta 'khor ba'i ri dwags la// ye

shes lnga yi khyi bkye ste// dus gsum sangs rgyas ra mdar gnyer// glo snying yum gyi b+ha ga la// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i lings 'debs so// ye shes brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du// dur khrod brgyad kyi yul phyung

ste// 'khor ba rgyun gcod thugs rje'i bro// srin po bsgral ba'i snying la brdung// dz+nyA na sid+d+hi s+pha ra Na yaM/ zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ tsit+ta 'khor ba bro'i

le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad dag par bya ba'i phyir/ dur khrod brgyad du rol te/ hUM rU tra bsgral ba'i rnam shes la/ lu gu rgyud du sbrel

bsdams te// mtshungs med che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// nga rgyal mthu bsnyems bdud kyi dpung bcom nas// 'jig rten 'das pa'i de ba chen po brgyad// che ba'i drag dang ldan pas dbang phyug yang che

gnon// drag shul chen pos 'dul bar bka' stsal pa// hUM dang kA yi 'phro 'du las/ khro bo mthing nag sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skal ltar 'khrugs// hUM kA ra yi phyag rgyar gsal// nyi zla bsgral

ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// rU tra thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen brdal ba la// rlung nag 'tshubs ma phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo

rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// hUM dang Ar+ya'i 'phro 'du las// khro bo ljang sngon sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// mi g.yo mgon po'i phyag rgyar gsal// srin po bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta
kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// rU tra thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen brdal ba la// rlung nag 'tshubs ma phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug

'tshubs// ya dang ma yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo mthing ga sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// gshin rje gshed po'i phyag rgyar gsal// gshin rje bsgral ba'i rnam shes la/ ta kr-ita chen po
dog la gshegs// rU tra thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen brdal ba la// rlung nag 'tshubs ma phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od phung rdo rje'i bu yug

'tshubs// nI dang la yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo ljang sngon sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// dbyug pa sngon po'i phyag rgyar gsal// drang srong bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog

la gshegs// rU tra thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen gdal ba la// rlung nag 'tshubs ma phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// bad dang ma yi

'phro 'du las// khro bo dud kha sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// pad+ma 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// chu bdag bsgral ba'i rnam shes la/ ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// rU tra thal bar

rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen brdal ba las// rlung nag 'tshubs ma phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// TA dang ki yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo dmar skya

sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// TA ki rA dza'i phyag rgyar gsal// rlung lha bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// rU tra thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar

'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen brdal ba la// rlung nag 'tshubs ma phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// a dang mr-i yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo ljang nag sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon

gang skar ltar 'khrugs// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// gnod sbyin bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// rU tra thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus

pa thal chen brdal ba la// rlung nag 'tshubs ma phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// ma dang hA yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo ser nag sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar
'khrugs// ma hA ba la'i phyag rgyar gsal// bgegs chen bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// rU tra thal bar rlog pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen brdal ba las// rlung nag 'tshubs ma

phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// ha na ha na rgyob/ gardza gardza sgrogs/ da ha da ha sregs/ pa tsa pa tsa chos/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha chings/ hu lu hu lu zhugs/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha phug/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha chod/

tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha gnas/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta spor/ zhes gsungs shing drag por rol lo/ rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ ta kr-ita brgyad kyi bro'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis/ bsgral ba'i zhing bcu'i phung po dang/ khams dang skye mched kyi don la rol cing sbyang ba'i phyir/ zhabs kyi chas brgyad bro brdungs te/ hUM srin po rU tra bsgral ba'i phung khams skye
mched la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams te// mi gnas ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lha chen mgo bcad dur khrod brgyad du sprul// zhe sdang gdug pa'i tshogs brgyad gnas su bsgral// phyogs bzhi

mtshams brgyad dregs pa 'dul ba'i phyir// zhabs kyi chas brgyad rnam shes brgyad du sprul// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi 'phro 'du dang// phra men mu kha brgyad kyi 'jo tshul dang// ta kr-ita brgyad kyi thugs
dam bskang ba'i phyir// gar dang brda yis mtshon nas spyan 'dren na// dam tshig gsang ba'i bro la gshegs su gsol// dpa' bo ting 'dzin stag gi chas mchog gis// dregs pa'i mgo bcad b+han+da gsang ba'i

bro// gnod gdug zlog byed rgya bye'u'i chas mchog gis// rtog 'joms spyod pa brtul zhugs chen po'i bro// shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje'i chas mchog gis// mi 'gyur g.yung drung skyid rtags dpal gyi bro// dbang
gi bse khrab gzi 'bar chas mchog gis// khams gsum dbang sdud raka ta chags pa'i bro// dpa' brjid mnyen lcug sprul nag chas mchog gis// mkha' dbyings rnam dag gsang ba yum gyi bro// dbang phyug
dmar gsal mche ba'i chas mchog gis// sdug bsngal nad sel zug rngu gcod pa'i bro// shu ken smad g.yogs dar gyi chas mchog gis// dur khrod gnas su ma mo mnyes pa'i bro// gcan gzan rgyal po gzig
gi chas mchog gis// 'dul sbyor drag po las kyi tshar gcod bro// 'dul byed zhabs kyis thams cad zil gyis gnon// dzaHhUM baM hoHspyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// ngag gi dbang phyug thugs dam bskang ba'i

phyir// dbang chen sum lngar bskyed pa'i sa gzhi la// nga rgyal dbang du sdud pa'i bro grwa btsugs// dregs pa gzhom phyir gzir gnon stobs kyi tshul// srid gsum ma lus dbyings su bsgral ba dang// lha chen khyab

'jug zil gyis mnan pa dang// gsang ba'i rU tra thal bar rlaug pa'i phyir// phung po khams dang skye mched don la gshegs su gsol// rak+sha rU tra ma hA tsit+ta dza dza/ ces drag tu bskor ro// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal

po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ phung po khams dang skye mched la zhabs kyi chas brgyad kyi bro'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o//// de ma thag tu lha mo za byed bzhis// yan lag bzhi la bro brdungs

pa// hUM srin po rU tra bsgral ba'i yan lag la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// thogs med las kyis dbang sdud a mo de// yan lag chen po gser gyi sa gzhi la// lcags kyu dmar pos 'khor ba'i nad khrag
'byin// a mo de ba 'dir gshegs aM ku sha/ yon tan lhun grub cir yang sprul pa'i sku// dur khrod gsang ba'i ma mo glog 'gyu ma// rdo rje zhags pas khams gsum cig car bcings// lha mo glog
'gyu 'dir gshegs pA sha hUM// gsung gis thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i yum// rdo rje'i dra ba bka' yi rjes gcod ma// lcags sgrog dmar pos rgyud drug cig car bsdam// rdo rje dra ba 'dir gshegs s+pho

Ta baM// sku mchog mi bzad 'bar ba'i sku gcig ma// rdo rje sder mo ral pa'i cod pan can// rdo rje dril bus ma lus dgyes pa bskyed// dur khrod sgra yi tshogs 'gyur g+haN+De hoH// zhes gsungs te drag por rol
lo// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ yan lag bzhi la lha mo za byed bzhi'i bro brdungs pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o//// de ma thag tu nang khrol la/

ngan song gnas su sbyong ba'i phyir bro gra btsugs pa la/ hUM srin po rU tra bsgral ba'i nang khrol la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// sdug bsngal yongs sgrol mdzad pa'i phrin las kyis// ngan song gting nas sbyong

ba'i bro brdung 'tshal// mkha' lding shugs kyis bsgral ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ phra men mgo brnyan tshogs kyi rkan sgra yis// khams gsum 'khor ba sdangs pa'i glu blangs te// lhag phud med pa'i nang khrol spungs

pa la// bya rog 'ug pa bzhad dang khwa la sogs// stag dang seng ki spyang gi 'jigs pa'i gdong rnams ni// la la lding zhing la la 'bab// la la 'joms shing la la 'thog/ ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs pa// zhing bcu

gnas nas sbyang phyir gshegs su gsol// dzaHdzaHzhes gsungs pas/ phra men ma rnams kyis nang khrol kha phye nas/ sdang mig tu blta zhing gtum bag gis drag tu bskor ro// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas
rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ nang khrol ngan song gnas kyi bro'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o//// de ma thag tu g.yang gzhi la// ma mo 'khrugs pa'i bro brdungs pas// hUM srin po rU tra
bsgral ba'i phung po la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// sha khrag dmar la dgyes pa'i ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// gsad pa'i go bsrung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor skyong// ma bdun las la 'khrugs pa'i
dkyil 'khor du// 'khor ba'i gting skems zhing bcu'i nang khrol la// dug gsum gdug pa'i shugs kyis 'dir gshegs shig/ gsang ba'i shun chen brdal ba'i sa gzhi la// phyogs skyong rgyal mo las la

'khrugs pa'i bro// srin mo smug nag thugs rje chags pa'i bro// gling bzhi kun 'byams rab tu rngams pa'i bro// brtan ma bcu gnyis ma chen 'khrugs pa'i bro// gsang ba shun gyi bro grwa 'dir gshegs la// khyi
phag bya dang rdo rje rta'i brtul zhugs kyis// nga dang bdag tu blta ba'i mun khang shig/ rU tra'i gnas bcom sha za'i maN+Dal la// sha zan stong gi chun lag dengs se deng// rak+ta dmar gyi rba klong

'khyil ba la// khrag 'thung stong gi rkan sgra chil li li// rus pa tshogs kyi mkhar du gtams pa la// mche ba dung gi so sgra thibs se thib// g.yang gzhi sprin gyi ba dan lhubs se lhub// 'di 'dra'i dur khrod gsang

ba'i sa gzhi la// dbang chen 'khrugs pa'i bro sgra dir ri ri// skyes bu ging chen 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la// ma mo las la 'khrugs pa'i bro brdungs pas// bdud dang srin po'i mig 'bras thang la lhung// gti mug klu

dbang snying khrag khong nas skyug/ lang ka gdon gyi kha so sil bur rlogs// rak+sha rU tra ha ha ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ ces gsungs te drag tu bskor ro// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra
las/ g.yang gzhi la ma mo 'khrugs pa'i bro brdungs pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o//// de ma thag tu rkang bzhi la// khro bo gzir gnon bro brdungs te// hUM srin po rU tra bsgral ba'i phung po

la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ rkang lag rdo rje phur pa'i bro// ya ga can gyi snying la brdung// khro bo rdo rje'i thugs ka nas// khro mo 'bar ba'i thugs ka ru// sum b+ha ni yi sgra bsgrags pas// sngags dang

phyag rgya rol pa'i bro// zhe sdang can gyi snying la brdung// bskal pa'i mthar ni mi ldang phyir// brjid pa'i stabs dang sngags kyis 'cham/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ g+h+r-i h+Na g+h+r-i h+Na hUM/ g+h+r-i h+Na pa ya g+h+r-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya
ho/ b+ha ga wAn/ bid+yA rA dza nan/ zhes gsungs te mnan no// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ khro bo gzir gnon gyi bro'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o////
de nas yang ngo mtshar skyes nas kyang// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis// gar dbang che la zhu ba zhus// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// bdud rtsi'i char dbab ci ltar 'bebs// de nas thal ba'i
sa bon mchog/ de yi 'phrod du gang dang gang// de skad ces ni zhus pa dang// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu ru// thams cad rol par byin gyis brlab// dug lnga 'joms pa'i bdud rtsi

mchog/ ye shes chen por byin gyis brlab// thal ba'i sa bon 'phrod du ni// 'brug rus byi la ban glang dang// rnga mo mkha' lding la sogs pa'i// 'bras bu lnga po gsar rnying dang// mar la sogs pa byug la

stsal// de nas bsgrub pa bya ba ni// dngos med bsreg dang bdud rtsir bsgrub/ 'di mtshams dpe 'khrugs shig yod 'dra yang bsdur gzhi ma rnyed/ ces gsungs pas/ gzi ldan pad ma can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol
to// bka' gsang rmad byung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gar dbang lha mchog pad+ma he ru ka/ srid gsum 'joms mdzad bskal pa'i me dpung ni// sdigs mdzub rtse la bskal pa'i me stag

'phro// khams gsum dbang sdud khrag gi rgya mtsho ni// he brdal gru gsum zhal nas 'bab cing 'khyil// che ba rmad byung sku gsum lhun gyis grub// gdug pa'i tshogs 'joms me dpung spu gri'i so// sha chen tshogs

la rol cing bzhugs su gsol// pU tsa me g+ha sa ma ya hUM/ zhes gsungs nas gar gyi dbang phyug gis/ khams gsum dbang sdud khrag gi rgya mtsho nas rnam par rtog pa mkhyen pas yum gzi ldan pad+ma can dang/

gsung gi sgras spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ che btsan 'gran gyi zla med gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba la mchod pa phul ba na/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mnyes par 'gyur ro// me'i lha'i rgyal
po yang mnyes par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs pa la/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ the tshom skyes nas/ mkhyen bzhin du phyi rabs rnal 'byor pa'i rtog pa bsal

ba'i phyir/ gar gyi dbang phyug ci'i phyir zhes zhus pas/ nyon cig spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ sdigs mdzub rtse la bskal pa'i me stag 'phro ba ma mthong ngam/ lhun grub sangs rgyas phrin las ma mthong ngam// de

skad gsungs pa'i byin rlabs kyis// mthong bar gyur nas 'di skad smras// e ma'o// lhun grub sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas phrin las ya mtshan che// khro bo sdigs mdzub ya mtshan che// bskal pa'i me chen ya

mtshan che// zhes gsol pas/ gar gyi dbang phyug chen po yis// de bas spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang// phyi ma'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis kyang// lhun grub sangs rgyas grub 'dod pas// mtshan dang ldan pa'i shes

rab bstan// 'gro na stabs sdug 'dug tshul shis// bsten na lta nyer gyur pa yi// gzungs ma'i mtshan yang brtag par bya// pad+ma nI dang hasti nI// shang+ga nI dang tsi tra ni// de yang pad+ma can dang dung can dang// ban

glang can dang ri mo can// de lta'i bu mo bsten par bya// bsnyen pa bzhi khri bton nas kyang// mtshan dang ldan pa'i shes rab can// mchod cing bstan pa'i las bya'i phyir// ting 'dzin mchod pas tshims byas

nas// de nas rdzas kyi mchod pas mchod// ces gsungs pas/ rol pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams rang rang ngo mtshar du gyur nas kun tu bzang mo gzi ldan pad+ma can gyis mchod par yongs su rol par bya ba'i phyir/

lang ka srin po la sogs pa'i 'khor bsgral ba'i zhing bcu'i tsit+ta blangs te/ tsit+ta dpal be'u thugs kyi rang bzhin 'di/ chos nyid lta bu'i rang bzhin la// ye shes sgyu ma lta bur rol pa'i phyir// gar gyi dbang phyug
yum dang bcas pa la// bla na med pa'i dam rdzas mchod par 'bul// zhes bskul lo// mtshanadang rus pa blangs te phul ba ni// yid bzhin rin chen lta bu char gyi rgyun// pho brang yid 'ong 'bar
ba'i dur khrod na// phyin ci log bzhi 'joms pa'i dbang phyug la// sku gsum che bar brjid pa'i rdzas mchog 'di// dpal chen 'bar ba'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// rna ba mchod par 'bul ba ni// gsung gi rang

bzhin ma 'gags so sor gsan// sna tshogs sgra ltar snang ba brjod du med// stong nyid stong la rol pas stong pa'i dbyings// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i dngos dang dngos med pa'i// cir yang thabs kyis 'dul la
mchod pa 'bul// de la bskul ma btab pa ni// glog 'gyu'i sprul pas dgyes pa'i phyir// nyon mongs sdug bsngal chu bo'i rgyun gcod dang// rdul phran rdul gyi mi gos chags pa'i mchog/ bdag rtog las la

dbang bsgyur sprul pa'i sku// srin po'i tshogs la rol mdzad sdig pa'i tshul// za byed gsod la dgyes pa'i pho nya ste// mi gnas don gyi lha mo glog 'gyu ma// mig gi dbang po mchod pa 'bul ba ni// thams cad
skye med yum gyi rang bzhin la// me long lta bur gsal cing dbyer med pa'i// yon tan lhun grub 'byung gnas chen po'i sku// gnyis med rtog bral yid kyi mchod pa 'bul// smra byed lce yi mchod pa 'bul ba

ni// sna tshogs ro ltar gzung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// 'jig rten bsreg phyir thugs rje'i me sbar te// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gting sbyong ba// gar dbang lha mchog rta yi rgyal po'i sku// dbang po ro la

sbyor ba'i mchod pa 'bul// snom byed sna yi mchod pa 'bul ba ni/ 'di nas tshig chad dang go rim 'khrugs pa zhig yod 'dra// gab pa sbas pa yum mchog gzi dang ldan// khro rgyal kun gyi rang bzhin thugs la gnas// mtshan dang

dpe byad rgyan gyis rab tu bsgyings// mkha' dbyings pad+ma dmar la mtshar ba'i klong// rdo rje dmar po'i 'phro 'du char bzhin 'bebs// yang gsang rmad 'byung sku la mchod pa 'bul// rak+ta khrag gi mchod pa

'bul ba ni// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dgyes te rmad// rdo rje sgeg mo phrin las rdzogs pa'i sku// ye shes sku 'chang sder mos log rtog 'joms// chags med yid kyis sbyor la rab brtson zhing// ma bkag

cir yang sa ler mkhyen pa'i spyan// log rtog phyin ci log gi rgyu sbyong ba// bde chen ngang la gnas pa'i dra ba can// khro gtum gdug pa gzhan lta ma yin te// ma chags mi gnas dur khrod 'bar ba'i sku// gu h+ya

gsang ba'i lha mo ut+pal mdog/ dug gsum ma spangs sku gsum lhun grub pa'i// khro gtum nga rgyal sku la mchod pa 'bul// rkang dang skra dang tshil dang sha// ba su ta yi rdzas mchog ni// gcig tu bcas nas
dbul bar bya// khro rgyal ba spu pho nya'i lung// khams gsum dbang sdud khrag gi lan phran can// dug gsum zil gnon mgyogs pa'i bka' sdod ma// ta kr-ita khro bo brgyad la sbyor bar
brtson// thun mong gnyen po'i rkyen dang bral// srid gsum 'joms pa a mo de wa dang// dug gsum ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin la// gnyis med sbyor ba'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// pho nya mchod pa'i sbyin

bsreg ni// gtor ma'i mchod pa kun tu thim// khro bo mgo dgu brtsegs pa rkang gcig po// zhal nas bskal pa'i me 'bar stong gsum bsreg/ shangs nas rdo rje rtse lnga'i 'thor rlung bskyil// spyan mig gru gsum

dmyal tshogs gting nas sbyong// skye ba rnam bzhi 'gro ba rigs drug kun// khro rgyal khyod kyi dbang du mi 'du med// rU tra bshas bcom dmar chen khrag dang bcas// ta kr-ita rgyal po 'dod pa'i longs spyod

ldan// khro rgyal khyed kyi dbang du mi 'du med// nan tan mchod pa bzhes shing rol du gsol// gtun khung chen po rngam pa la// de nas bgegs chen 'dul ba'i phyir// rtse 'jo'i bro glu 'di skad len// rtse

'jo thabs kyi bro brdungs pas// khrag 'thung 'bar ba gshegs su gsol// phrin las gsang ba'i bro gar 'di// gad rgyangs dur khrod sgra yi bro// dgyes pa chen po'i tshogs la brdung// bro dang glu yi brdas mtshon

te// 'bras bu byang chub sems kyi glu// phra men longs spyod chen po la// rtse 'jo'i thabs kyis rol cing gshegs su gsol// gar dbang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal

lo// mi skye mi 'gag mkha' dbyings rnam dag na// pad+ma khrag 'thung rol pa'i rta bro brdung// ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ de skad ces bskor nas/ dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir 'di gsungs so// dgod dang gshed dang
'jigs pa'i zhal gdangs shing// tsit+ta ye shes dbus su hUM gi gnas// kun tu bzang mo yum gyi mkha' la bsdu// mi gnas ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'jig tshogs yongs sgrol tsit+ta rdza ltar

lhags// srid gsum dbang sdud khrag gi rgya mtsho la// dug gsum nad kyi rba rlabs drag po 'khrugs// nyon mongs sbyang phyir thugs rje'i dbyings nas 'phro// zhe sdang chen po 'dir gshegs aM ku sha/ yon tan
lhun grub dga' ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// re ba kun skong yid bzhin 'bar ba'i sku// gser mdog sdug la mdzes pa'i cha lugs can// drag shul spyod pas dgyes par rol pa'i tshogs// zhing bcu gtan nas

bsgral phyir snyems pa'i mchog/ nga rgyal log rtog 'joms pa 'dir gshegs pA sha hUM// dbang chen zla gam dkar dmar 'phro ba'i gnas// me ri tug chom sgra skad bsam mi khyab// nyid kyi sku la longs spyod
rdzogs mnga' ba// gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel mdzad pad+ma'i sku// smra bsam brjod med gser gyi sa gzhi la// zhi bas dbang sdud pad+ma he ru ka/ 'gro drug sgrol bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal
lo// thugs rje chen pos ngan 'gro sgrol la mkhas// 'dod chags chen po 'dir gshegs s+pho Ta baM// drag po 'dul bar 'dul ba'i cha lugs 'chang// sku mdog in+d+ra nI la brjid pa'i dbu// 'jigs pa'i

mtshon thogs rgyu 'phreng khrag rngams dang// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi 'jigs pa'i sham thabs can// phrag dog rgyal po 'dir gshegs g+haN+De hoH// sprul pa'i tshogs gyur 'di dag ni// dbang drag 'joms pa'i phrin

las cir yang mdzad// khro gtum rngams pa gzhan ltar ma yin te// srid pa yang bsgral thal ba'i tshom bu 'di// gti mug chen po'i sku la rgyan du snang// zhing bcu 'dul phyir ma lus rol cing bzhes// rak+ta pU tsa

s+pha ra Na hUM dzaHdzaHzhes gsungs shing bskul lo// de nas spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis// gar dbang che la zhu ba zhus// bdud rtsi bab pa'i snod ni gang// thal ba blugs pa'i thabs ni gang// thugs dam

bskul ba'i thabs ni gang// phrin las mdzad pa'i thabs ni gang// thabs dang shes rab rol pa gang// dngos grub blang ba'i thabs ni gang// dngos grub dbye ba'i thabs ni gang// nyung na spogs pa'i thabs ni

gang// gang bar gyur na yon tan gang// zhes zhus pas/ dbang chen nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// pa tra can gyi snod gang du// rus pa btags pa'i phye blugs nas// thugs dam bskul phyir 'di skad do// skye med
dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su// 'bras bu ma nor byang chub sems kyi dbyings// keng thod sna tshogs bsags pa'i ri rab la// 'khor ba rgyud sbyangs ye shes me sbar te// rus pa thal chen tshom bu skar

ltar 'khrugs// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// gu h+ya gsang ba'i phyag rgyas blangs nas kyang// skye shi ye nas med pa'i rtags su grub// de ni snod dang sgrub pa'i thabs// thugs dam gzhung bzhin

bskul ba ni// bde gshegs bskul ba'i sa gnas pas// bkur sti bskyed phyir 'di skad bskul// rnam dag pad+ma'i lte ba zlum po la// dug lnga ye shes lnga nyid sbyor ba yis// nga rgyal btsan thabs dbang chen
brjid pa'i sku// drag shul rngams pas bskal pa'i 'brug chen can// che bas che la gnas shing cher bsnyems pa'i// khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs byed zhabs kyis gnon// thugs rje thabs kyis gdug pa tshar gcod

phyir// dbu mang phyag cha 'jigs pa'i kha T+wAM gis// log 'dren phyin ci log gi dngos po 'joms// rus pa thal chen 'phro 'du'i dkyil 'khor du// khrag dang zhag gi rba rlabs ci li li// ting 'dzin mche ba rno
dbal zang yag gis// nga dang bdag tu lta ba'i dngos po gcod// dbang gi zla gam mtsho ltar 'khyil ba la// 'gyur med keng rus dkar po rdza ltar lhags// gnam lcags thog thog 'bar ba'i
'brug 'khrugs pas// dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskang ba dang// rnal 'byor dngos grub dam pa blang ba'i phyir// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyor ba las// mkha' la byang chub sems sprin bsnol ba

dang// zla gam ljags kyi gzi byin bskyed pa dang// rus pa rtags kyi thal ba bsgrub pa'i phyir// gnyis med sbyor ba'i phrin las mdzad du gsol// thal ba blugs nas snod bzhag pa// rab dgyes mkha' la sbyor

ba'i dur khrod na// dbang bdag rgyal po sku mdog le brgan zhal// dbu mang phyag cha 'jigs pa'i mtshon thogs shing// nga rgyal dregs pa 'dud kyi dpung 'joms pa// dbang chen 'bar ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal

lo// gnyis med thugs kyi ga'u kha 'byed cing// gsung rab rgya mtsho lta bu'i sgra sgrogs pas// rdo rje gzi ldan bka' yi dbyings phyug dang// gnyis med sbyor ba'i mkha' dbyings dag pa 'dir// 'du 'bral med
cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// bde gshegs phrin las bskul ba ni// rnam dag pad+ma 'khyil ba'i gzhal yas su// 'bras bu sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba'i phyir// ma chags yum gyi mkha' dbyings yangs pa

na// rus pa tshogs kyi thal chen ri ltar spungs// byin gyis brlab cing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// thal ba bdud rtsir sbyor ba'i phrin las mdzod// thabs dang shes rab rol pa ni// yang gsang thugs kyi
dkyil 'khor chen po ni// mi g.yo rta mchog rol pa'i dbu rgyan can// srid gsum sgrol mdzad ma rig mtsho skems pa// dbang phyug yang cher dpal gyi mchod pa 'bul// in+d+ra ni la'i mdog 'dra 'bar

ba'i spyan// sdug bsngal gcod snying zug rngu'i shing bsreg pa/ rdzu 'phrul myur mgyogs dur khrod glog 'gyu ma/ shes rab pha rol phyin ma'i b+ha ga la// gsang ba'i ling+ga thogs med bskyod pa yis// tshim gyur mchod

sprin char gyi rgyun bzhin 'bebs// de nyid byang chub sems dpa' dbang chen gtso// shes dang shes bya'i bag chags sbyang ba dang// rnal 'byor dam can tha tshig bsgo ba'i phyir// gnyis med rak+ta chags pa mkha'
la gdab// chags pas sgrol byed pad+ma rgyal po dang// myur byed rdzu 'phrul mnga' bdag gshog pa mo// 'du 'bral med pa'i mkha' dbyings gzhal yas 'dir// byang chub dkar dmar 'du 'phro sna tshogs
kyis// stug po bkod pa'i sangs rgyas man chad dang// na rag 'khor ba'i dmyal khams yan chod du// dug gsum bsgral nas sku gsum lhun sbyor ba'i// byang chub sems ni dbyings ltar mdzes pa'i sku// spros
pas rgyud bskul gzi mdangs bskyed// gshog pa mo dang rol pa yin// dra ba mo dang rol pa ni// dbyings su 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba ni// gar dbang lha mchog pad+ma dbang gi sku// khros pa'i zhal

dang 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// bcu drug phyag gi phra men tshogs dang sbyor// dra ba mo dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// rgyal ba 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang ba dang// srid pa rgya mtsho dbyings nas spyod pa
dang// ma srin rgya mtsho dam la gdags pa'i phyir// byang chub sems sprin mkha' la dbab tu gsol// sder mo can dang rol pa ni// bkra shis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// zla gam dbang gi 'phro 'du

dang// rak+ta 'bar ba'i klong yangs nas// rdzu 'phrul mnga' mdzad pad+ma he ru ka/ sbas pa'i lha mo gsang ba'i sder mo can// dbang mo gcig la sbyor ba'i b+ha ga la// byang chub sems ni baiDUr+ya yi mdog/ keng rus

gsar rnying ri ltar spungs pa la// khro bo me ri 'bar 'phro klong du 'khyil// gdug pa'i tshogs bcom nga rgyal ri rab la// rak+ta dmar gyi chu bo gzhung bzhin 'phyo// gtsug tor chen po'i 'thor rlung 'tshub mar
'khrugs// nga rgyal gdug pa'i tshogs bcom nga rgyal ri rab la// ma rig mdongs pa'i mun nag rab tu gtibs// phrag dog bsgral ba'i 'thor rlung shugs kyis 'gro// rus pa thal chen byin gyis brlab pa

dang// bsgrub pa chen po'i dngos grub 'dir stsol cig/ snying po rgyun mi gcad par bzlas// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ e A ra li hriM dza/ de nas dngos grub blang ba ni/ dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor

du// rus pa thal chen mtshan ma bsgrub pa dang// lhag pa rtags kyi dbang bskur dang// gsang ba'i mchod pa dbyings su bstim pa dang// tsit+ta thugs kyi dngos grub blang ba dang// de phyir mtshan ldan gsang ba'i

rgyud ldan gyis// 'khor tshogs chen por zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// log 'dul thabs kyis nyon mongs sbyang ba dang// don dam klong du 'gro drug bsgral ba'i phyir// dung khang dkar po rgyal ba'i pho brang

na// dung dang rus pa'i 'phro 'du sprin ltar gtibs// ye shes lnga dang bdud rtsi rab sbyor bas// dpal gyi pho brang rgya mdud phyag rgya dgrol// dngos grub dbye ba'i thabs kyang yin// snum la 'phel 'gyur sgrub
pa'i rdzas// nyung la spogs shing ting 'dzin bskyar// grub nas ro la mtshan mas gdab// mtshan ldan lag mthil a bsams te// bros bskor dbang bskur byin brlabs pa// gsang chen thugs la rol pa'i
dkyil 'khor du// snyoms pa'i thugs rje bsgral ba'i me lta bus// 'khrul dang rtog pa dbyings su bsregs nas kyang// rus pa thal chen brdal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// sdug bsngal gtan nas sel ba'i bro stong
ldir// pad+ma khrag 'thung dgyes shing rol du gsol// dur khrod rab tu 'bar ba'i klong yangs su// lhag pa'i thal chen mtshan ma 'di btab pas// rab dgyes he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang// zab

sbyor dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad dang// dbang mchog pad+ma thabs kyis bsdus pa dang// bdag nyid chen po rab tu sbyor ba yin// 'di ni sngon gyi thugs dam zab mo yin// 'di yang rtags kyi phyag rgya dam pa

yin// sa ma ya/ pad+ma d+ha ra pU tsa mi/ de skad ces ni gsungs nas kyang// dngos grub bgo phyir bdud rtsi'i don// so sor thob par ma gyur par// chad na bar chad chen por 'gyur// snga rabs 'das dang da lta

ru// bzhugs pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dang// yi dam lha ste bka' drin can// mi g.yo ri rab lhun po'i tshul// rgyun dang rgyun med rtag par ni// sman ni lus la bsrel bar bya// gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje mthu
stobs kyis// bskal pa du mar mi zad gter gyi mchog/ lhag pa'i thal chen mtshan ma 'di dbul na// thugs rjes bzhes la 'khor la byin gyis rlobs// bde gshegs rigs gnyis lung gi rgyud// yab yum

sbyor ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che// rdo rje slob dpon gzungs mar bcas pa yi// phrin las rnam par dag pa'i bka' drin dang// mched dang lcam dral lhag pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// 'bar ba'i sku bskyed mtshan

ma'i rtags btab pas// dus gsum rgyal sras chu bo'i rgyun bzhin skyong// lhag pa'i rtags kyi mchod pa 'di byas pas// rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob bka' drin rjes bzung phyir// g.yel ba med par rtag tu lus la

bcangs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'thob// lus kyang dar la bab cing sra// longs spyod ldan zhing bde skyid 'gyur// de ni grub pa'i yon tan yin// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyis kyang// sman rnams
yongs su bsgrub par bya// yal bar mi gtang ma mo brten// sman rnams grub na dngos grub thob// de nas lhag ma'i gtor ma gtang// bsgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// srog la bab pa'i nyen yod kyang// dam

bcas de las ma byung tshe// mi dang 'phrad par mi bya ste// gtam dang kha rlangs 'dres na bskyar// de las byung nas zhag gsum du// bdag gi phyag kyang phar mi btsal// mkha' 'gro ma rnams rngam pa yi// khrag nad

dag gis 'chi bar 'gyur// las su sgrub rdzas bsag par bya// grangs kyi tshad kyang 'di ltar ro// zhing sar pho rdza brlag pa 'dra// b+han+da bcu gsum lcang lo can// brgyad las nyung na 'gal bar 'gyur// g.yang

gzhi gar gos med pa la// kha dog tshon gyis mdog bsgyur la// yang na lnga'am drug gtso la// bcu gcig phyogs skyong grangs dang mthun// mchog phur grangs kyang de bzhin no// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bri
ba ni// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dbus ni zla gam e yi dkyil// bcu drug 'khor los mtha' bskor te// hrI:las pad+ma nyi shu bzhi// mtshams bzhir rin chen khri rkang la// sprin med nyi
ma bdun gyis brgyan// bar khyams gnyis dang sgo bzhir ldan// de lta bu yi gnas khang du// rtse 'jo mang po lung bzhin bya// zhes gsungs pas/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
rol pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis/ a la la zhes zer zhing/ spyi gtsug gi gar gyi dbang phyug la phyag byas te/ 'og min gyi gnas ri rab kyi rtse mo la bdud rtsi chen po'i don la snyoms par zhugs

so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ thal chen bsgrub cing gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gar
dbang lha mchog pad+ma he ru kas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad/ 'og min gyi gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs te/ phyi rabs rnal 'byor mtha' dag gis// lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas

khang// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo yi// sku yi sras gyur 'jam dpal khyod// lhun gyis grub pa nga la nyon// blta ba 'di la gang gnas pa'i// rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang// yang dag ma bgrod phyin pa'i
gnas// kun tu 'od kyi sa las 'das nas ni// pad+ma can du gyur pa yin// yang dag ma bgrod phyin pa'i sa// rang la gnas pa dngos grub yin// klong du gyur pas sgrub thabs so// yang dag ma bsgrubs dngos

grub yin// bla med theg par rab gnas nges// nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyad kyang// pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin no// 'di ni tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// klong du gyur pa'i sgrub thabs so// yang dag gnyis

med spyod pa yin// gti mug zhe sdang nga rgyal dang// 'dod chags phrag dog chen po ni// bde gshegs lnga yi rang bzhin las// bsrung du med pa dam pa can// yang dag dam tshig bsrung du med// mi len byang

chub spyod pa la// byed pa med pa las yin te// de ni mi rtsol brtson 'grus so// yang dag 'bad med brtson 'grus yin// 'byung ba yum gyi gzhal yas na// snang srid phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal// bri bar bya
ba'i ming yang med// bdag nyid chen po'i don rtogs ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid can// bsgoms pas gzhan nas mi rnyed do// sangs rgyas gzhan nas ma tshol cig/ yang dag bsgom du med pa'i

lha'o// dbyings dang ye shes don rtogs na// thabs dang shes rab dbang chen yin// rdo rje dril bu'i rig pa bzung// yang dag bskur du med pa'i dbang// khams gsum yum gyi b+ha ga la// gang ltar song yang
gnas kyi mchog/ yang dag ma song phyin pa'i gnas// mtshan ma ming du btags pa yang// mtshan ma med pa'i chos yin pas// tshig tu brjod pa'i tha snyad bral// yang dag brjod med tshig yin

no// de bas 'jam dpal ye shes sku// phyi ma'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// de ltar rtogs nas yid ches na// bud d+ha tsit+ta dz+wa la yin// dz+nyA na tsit+ta dz+wa la yin// b+ho d+hi tsit+ta dz+wa la yin// de ltar yid ches ma gyur

na// don de gtan la mi pheb zer// sgro 'dogs skur pa 'debs pa dang// rtogs pa klong du ma gyur na// karma tsit+ta dz+wa la yin// rak+sha tsit+ta dz+wa la yin// nA ga tsit+ta dz+wa la yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad
kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ yang dag don gyi le'u ste zhe drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gar gyi dbang phyug pad+ma he ru kas/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la

bka' stsal ma thag tu/ thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// hUM ye shes khrag 'thung rnam rtog mi mnga' yang// sa ler mkhyen pa'i sku gsung thugs// thugs rje che bas
rmad du byung// 'di ni gsal ba thugs rje'i 'od// 'bar bas ye shes mun pa sel// 'od kyis dmyal ba'i nyes skyon sbyang// rmad byung rin chen khri yi lung// bag chags sbyangs pas rnam rtog phyir sangs
pa'i// ye shes khrag 'thung tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// gser mdog bde chen ye shes phra men ma// nyi zla 'bum du 'char ba'i 'od// ye shes chen po brtsegs la phyag 'tshal bstod// yi dwags rnams kyi

bkres skoms 'joms// bde ba chen po thugs rje'i lung// phra men rngam thabs zhes kyang bya// ma chen dbang phyug sing ha dzaM b+ha la// don dam gsang sbas che ba'i dpal ldan ma// gcig tu bde ba chen po thugs
rje'i 'od zer can// 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'od kyis de bsregs nas// thugs rje'i dkyil na nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'byung// srid gsum bsreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de la nyi ma bdun gyis rab bskor

ba// srid gsum ma lus bsreg pa'i dbang dang ldan// sprin med gsal ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'phro// de steng pad+ma kha stong ldan pa las// rdo rje rtse gcig pad+ma'i snying por gnas// rnam dag pad+ma'i lte ba zlum po

la// ye shes rgya mtsho'i klong du 'khyil ba ni// thig le chen po gsang ba yum gyi mkha'// rdo rje rtse gcig che bas de la bstod// ma chags pad+ma'i rang bzhin mnyes pa'i yum// dga' ldan kun tu bzang la phyag
'tshal bstod// 'di ni dri med pad+ma'i lung// de dbus hUM las byol song skye gnas 'joms// bden gnyis thugs las rol pa'i nyi ma la// 'od zer 'bum gyis bskor ba yum chen mo// shes rab nyi ma'i 'od
la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di ni gsal byed nyi zla 'od kyi lung// chags med skyon bral nyi zla'i 'od du snang// thugs rje khyab pas 'gro ba'i don byed pa// nyi zla thabs dang shes rab tshul du

gnas// 'od zer thugs rje byang chub sems su snang// yum chen mA ma kI la phyag 'tshal bstod// pad+ma'i lte bar gnas pa rdo rje'i dkyil// hUM las 'od 'phros mi rnams bag chags sbyang// hUM las 'khor lo
rtsibs stong ldan par grags// de steng hUM las yid bzhin gzhal yas khang// rgyal chen phyogs skyong ma lus ka dang gdung// mi ro thod rlon sbrul nag la sogs brgyan// ta kr-ita rgyal po khro bo de na

bzhugs// gdan khri drug ldan ye shes bzhi yi ngang// khro chen khros pa'i mtshan nyid gdan du bting// ta kr-ita rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de dbus rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyar gsal// 'di ni rdo rje
sems dpa'i lung du grags// rdo rje lta bur mi g.yo 'dzin pa med// chos sku dag pa lta bu'i tshul du snang// mi mnyam mnyam pa'i lha mchog dam pa la// sems dpa' la sogs 'khor gyis bskor ba

dang// thugs rje'i dbyings su snang bas mngon pa med// rdo rje sems dpa' che la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhe sdang rdo rje sems dpa'i sku mngon nas// shangs nas khro bo hUM drug sgra bton nas// rgyud drug gnas

pa'i 'khor ba rtsad bcad de// de nas rim bzhin gnas nas thim// khro bor gyur pa hUM gi lung zhes bya// zhal ni kun tu gzigs pa'i dbu// b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang pa lnga// lhun grub sangs rgyas rab tu
rdzogs// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems// ngag gi dbang phyug lhun grub pas// dbang gi mdog dmar bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rngam chen thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs bcur gzigs// dbu lnga ljang gu rta

gdong 'od kyis brgyan// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i dbu la gdangs// sbrul nag stong gis rgyan du mdzes// thod pa tshar gsum brjid par ldan// zhing lpags stod la g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs can// phyi

nang gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// gsang ba'i lha mo rdo rje dra ba mo// 'gro ba ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i yum// bcu drug phyag na ye shes mtshon char bsnams// shar du gzigs pa'i phyag bzhi'i phyag

mtshan ni// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa dang// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dang thod rlon khrag gis bkang// lho ru gzigs pa'i phyag bzhi'i phyag mtshan ni// rdo rje lcags kyu sdigs mdzub lu gu rgyud// thod pa zhal du stob

dang khro brgyad snying 'dzin cing// nub tu gzigs pa'i phyag bzhi'i phyag mtshan ni// me yi zhags pa dang ni khyung gi khra// sdigs mdzub rtse la bskal pa'i me chen 'bar// rdo rje kha T+wAM dag ni rab tu 'khrol// byang du
gzigs pa'i phyag bzhi'i phyag mtshan ni// rdo rje rtse dgu dang ni rtse lnga dang// rtse gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ zhe sdang gdug pa'i dgra bgegs mang po 'dul// zhabs kyi chas

brgyad khro bo brgyad du sbyor// dpa' bo la sogs ting 'dzin brgyad dang ldan// 'khor ba'i me dpung dmar po la sogs ni// rang gi snying pos phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad thim// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong chen
na// thugs rje chags pas dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// ye shes dpal gyi sku ste bdag nyid ma// phyag gnyis phyag rgya me dang sbrul bsnams te// spyan mig gnam lcags thog thog a la la// dpal chen zhal du

stob cing mchod pa'i bdag/ me 'brug dmar po che la phyag 'tshal bstod// rlung 'brug sngon mo rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskyed// bden gnyis lhun gyis grub pa'i yum chen mo// 'khor ba mi spong mya ngan mi 'da'

zhing// thod rlon drag po'i shugs kyis 'gro ba ste// mi mnyam pa yi klu tshogs dbang du sdud// nam mkhar mnyam pa'i sku lus tshad mnga' ba// rlung 'brug sngon mo nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// long ba rgyab sbrel mang

po gnas pa yang// yang sprul bye ba 'bum dang bcas pa ste// phyogs bzhi nas ni rnam par 'khrugs pa'o// shar phyogs long ba rgyab sbrel te// 'brug chen sngon mo chibs su bcibs// 'khor ba ma spangs mya ngan

'das// mig kyang med de cang mi smra// mdun dang rgyab med gcig gi ngang// skye ba med pa'i dbyings su bstan// long ba rgyab sbrel che la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs long ba rgyab sbrel ni// me ri sngon dmar chibs
su chibs// skye med dbyings nas cho 'phrul bstan// 'od zer mthing ga 'phro ba yis// 'o dod drag po phyogs bcur 'bod// nub phyogs long ba rgyab sbrel ni// 'brug chen gshibs pa'i gdan la

bzhugs// zag med shes rab pha rol phyin// skye ba med pa'i cho 'phrul ston// byang phyogs long ba rgyab sbrel ni// rlung nag 'tshubs ma chibs su chibs// skye ba med pa'i cho 'phrul ston// 'od zer dmar nag
'bar ba 'phro// de dag rnams kyi sku mdog kyang// gnag dang dmar la rab tu 'tsher// phyi rim dmus long 'khor ba can// shwa ri kha yis sku bsgrubs pas// mtha' dbus med par khyab par gnas// shar
phyogs dmus long 'khor ba can// lus ni mi mngon dbyings na bzhugs// yan lag med cing nyung dkar 'dra// 'od zer chen po phyogs bcur 'gyed// g.yo ba med par dbang du bsdu// lho phyogs dmus long

'khor ba can// mig ni ye nas med pa la// spyan ni me ri sngon dmar can// zhabs kyang med la nyung dkar 'dra// khyod ni gdung rgyud dang po ste// lan 'ga' drag tu mngags pa'i tshe// 'od zer chen po phyogs
bcur 'gyed// nub phyogs dmus long 'khor ba can// bdud kyi sha khrag rlon pa za// yan lag med cing dbang po med// lus kyang ci ru mi mngon pa'i// chos kyi dbyings su rol pa mdzad// ci

bgyi zhes dang chas te gnas// byang phyogs dmus long 'khor ba can// mgo yang med cing lag kyang med// rkan gyi sgra yis stong gsum bkang// dung gi tshul du gnas pa la// khrag gi mi la khrag sha za// mig

dang rna ba sna yang med// 'od zer drag po phyogs bcur 'gyed// kham rgya chen mo drug rnams ni// dkyil 'khor grwa yi phyogs su gnas// phyag rgya chen po las la g.yos// gnas pa byang chub sems la rtag gnas

pa// 'jug dang smon lam dang ldan pas// 'gro don ma lus mdzad slad du// kham rgya chen mo drug gi sku// ye shes dpal gyi khyi brgyad ni// phyogs bzhi dang ni dbus nas dgye// ma lus dgra bgegs mche bas

gcod// phyi rim lcags kyi spyang mo brgyad// dgra bo rnams la rbad par bya// de ltar phyag rgya rdzogs nas kyang// sku nyid 'khor la sbas te bzhugs// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru sbas// de yang chos dbyings che
ba'i rtags// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ thod rgal 'jigs pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gar gyi dbang

mchog gis/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang pos// gar dbang che la zhu ba zhus// phyogs bcu 'jig rten drug gyur pa'i// chu

klung rgya mtsho ji snyed dang// me tog 'bras bu yal ga'i tshogs// snang dang mi snang la sogs dang// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di// klu rgyal rdzu 'phrul yin pa'i phyir// klu rgyal zil gyis gnon par

mdzod// dbang phyug chen po longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// dug gsum dbang sdud sku gsum thugs su sbyor// nga rgyal khro gtum dbang gi rta mgo can// che la brjid pas che ba'i ye shes dang// rno la 'bigs
pas thugs rje'i lcags kyu yis// mtha' yas dung skyong la sogs klu yi 'khor// dbang du bsdus nas mngon du bsgral ba dang// phyag mtshan rtags su bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad ces ni bskul nas
kyang// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs// khams gsum khrag tu dmigs pa'i sa gzhi la// 'dod chags rtsad gcod khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrugs// rgyal rigs yongs bsgral dur khrod rgyan du sprul// gti

mug mtha' yas nA ga pra be sha/ dug lnga phung po bshig pa'i sa gzhi la// zhe sdang rtsad gcod keng rus ri rab 'khrugs// dmangs rigs yongs bsgral dur khrod brgyad du sprul// gti mug dung skyong nA ga pra be
sha/ rgyud drug gcig char bsgral ba'i sa gzhi la// nga rgyal rtsad gcod khrag gi me 'tshubs 'khrugs// rje rigs yongs bsgral dur khrod brgyad du sprul// gti mug 'jog po nA ga pra be sha/ sa gsum

lhun gyis grub pa'i sa gzhi la// phrag dog rtsad gcod rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrugs// rigs ngan klu tshogs dbang du bsdus nas kyang// dbang gi mthu bskyed dur khrod brgyad du sprul// gti mug nor rgyas nA ga

pra be sha/ dur khrod me ri 'bar ba'i sa gzhi la// las bdag phra men 'bum gyi nga ro 'khrugs// dbang chen lhun gyis grub pa'i sku la brgyan// dur khrod bdag po gsang ba'i rgyan du sprul// gti mug ma dros nA ga
pra be sha/ tshogs chen 'dus par bsdus pa'i sa gzhi la// 'khor ba rgyun gcod zhe sdang mtshon cha 'khrugs// nga rgyal dregs pa klu dbang yongs bsgral nas// g.yang gzhi 'bar bas sa gsum zil gyis

gnon// gti mug sog ma med kyang nA ga pra be sha/ gtum chen rol pas dgyes pa'i sa gzhi la// ma chen dbang phyug gad rgyangs sgra chen 'khrugs// phyag rgya rtags kyis klu dbang yongs bsgral te// dur khrod

bdag po gsang ba'i rgyan du sprul// gti mug gzi chen nA ga pra be sha/ khro bo'i gshag tu gtams pa'i sa gzhi la// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa bsgral ba'i phyag rgya 'khrugs// cho 'phrul chen pos bdud kyi dpung bshig

ste// dbang chen yum dang bcas pa'i rgyan du sprul// gti mug rigs ldan nA ga pra be sha/ phra men skar ltar 'khrugs pa'i sa gzhi la// glog stong 'bar ba'i phrin las chen po 'khrugs// zhe sdang me ltar 'bar ba'i

'brug sgra yis// bram ze klu yi rgyal po 'khor los gtubs// dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgya chen por sprul// gti mug ba ru Na yang nA ga pra be sha/ phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs pa'i sa gzhi la// bka' nyan mgyogs

ma stong gi pho nya 'khrugs// dur khrod brgyad kyi rgyan du sprul// gti mug kar ko Ta ste pra be sha/ dbang du bsdus pa'i sa gzhi la// ging chen bco brgyad rol pa'i phyag rgya 'khrugs// tshangs pa stobs kyi klu dbang

yongs bsgral nas// phyag rgya 'jigs shing rngam pa'i se ral kha// gti mug nor bu 'dzin pa pra be sha/ zhing chen gcal du bkram pa'i sa gzhi la// phra men go'u ri 'dus pa'i sgra skad 'khrugs// kha dog sna tshogs

cir yang snang ba'i sku// drag shul klu rgyal rngam pa'i shugs kyis bsgral// gsang ba'i yum chen sprul pa'i rgyan du sprul// gti mug blta na sdug kyang pra be sha/ ta kr-ita rgyal po bsnol ba'i sa gzhi la// ra ro khrag
'thung ma chen las la 'khrugs// myur la mgyogs pa'i thabs kyis klu dbang bsgral// dur khrod rgyal po dbang gi thugs dam bskul// gti mug stobs bzang nA ga pra be sha/ zla gam skar ltar 'khrugs pa'i
dkyil 'khor la// ci bgyis bka' sdod mang po'i tshogs ni 'khrugs// kha dog sna tshogs cir yang sprul pa'i sku// klu chen yongs bsgral gsang ba'i rgyan du bklubs// gti mug zla ba can yang pra

be sha/ khro bo ya mAn ta ka'i thugs ka nas// 'dul sbyong las kyi pho nya mngag gzhug gzhan yang 'khrugs// ha ha rngam pa'i phyag rgyas klu brgyad 'dul// bstim pa'i stobs kyi gad mor g.yab mos 'debs// gti

mug dung skyong nA ga pra be sha/ hUM dang phaT kyis gsang ba'i thugs dam bskul// phyag mtshan phyag na klu chen 'bum bsnams pa// gsang ba'i g.yung drung rgyal sa rtag tu 'dzin// nA ga oM nA ga hUM/ de gnas gsang

ba'i mchod 'bul ba// bsnyen pa'i sngags ni 'dis 'bul lo// oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ e ka ta/ ma hA su kha hUM/ sa ma ya ho/ nA ga pra be sha dza/ rdzu 'phrul dbrog dang phyag rgya dang// drag po'i phrin las nyi tshe

ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pas/ la la 'dod chags kyis 'gro ba sgrol// la la zhe sdang gi gdug sems las 'phro byed/ la la nga rgyal gyi dbang gis che bar bsnyems shing 'gro ba'i rgyud sbyong/ la la gti

mug dbang gis ngo bo nyid kyi rgyud bsreg/ la la phrag dog dbang gis nga dang bdag tu bzung nas lus sems la nyon mongs lnga smin par byed cing/ gdug pa'i shas dang ma bral ba las/ klu'i cho 'phrul bsam
gyis mi khyab par gnas pa la/ dbang chen gyis gdug pa can du ma gcig tu dbang du bsdus nas/ nyon mongs pa lnga'i bag chags gdar sha bcad nas/ mgrin sngon la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin

yang gser bzhus pa'i kha dog lta bur gyur te/ yum gzi ldan pad+ma can gyi thugs gsang ba'i b+ha ga la bslab pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ glog stong 'bar ba'i phrin las chen por 'khrugs// zhe sdang me ltar 'bar ba'i

'brug sgra yis// bram ze klu yi rgyal po 'khor los gtubs// dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgya chen por 'khrugs// de ring sa ru klu yi rdzu 'phrul ming yang med// rigs rnams so so'i gnas rnams bsrungs shing
bzhugs pa las// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la rin po che'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i bar bar nas/ gser gyi me stag ni me chen 'bum du 'phro zhing/ lha mo glog 'gyu+u mas sprul pa btang ba
las/ klu mgrin sngon gyi lus la phogs pas lus tshig go/ sems la phogs pas dran pa brlag go/ ngag la phogs pas smra ba'i dbang po dang bral/ yan lag nying lag la phogs pas zha bo grum por gyur te/ bye

tshan dang khyung gi 'jigs zhes de la bya'o// de bas na phyi ma'i dus kyi rnal 'byor pas/ dngos grub thob par 'dod na/ klu'i rdzu 'phrul dbrog par bya'o// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bya'o// de
cis mngon zhe na klu'i gzhal yas khang/ sbrul nag kun gyi kha nas kyang dngos grub kyi char 'bab ste/ la la'i kha nas me tog ut+pal la/ la la'i kha nas pad+ma dmar po/ la la'i kha nas u dum bA

ra'i char du 'bab ste/ yid bzhin nor bu'i gtun khung du 'khyil pas/ klad pa'i rgyas su phyung ste/ mngon par shes pa drug gi dbang thob par gyur to// za ma tog char du babs pas sku'i dbyings su 'khyil

te/ thugs kyi gnas su thim pas/ mkhyen rab 'jam dpal gyi dngos grub thob par gyur to// ut+pal sngon po char du phab pas/ phyag gi gnas su thim ste/ phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub thob par gyur to// pad+ma

dmar po'i char du phab pas/ zhabs kyi g.yas su 'khyil te/ rkang gi sbubs su thim pas/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i sgo nas dngos grub thob ste/ lus mi snang bar sbed cing// thogs pa med par rgyug nus par
gyur/ u dum bA ra char bzhin du babs pas/ yum gyi mkha' gsang la 'khyil te/ b+ha ga'i dbyings su thim ste/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dngos grub dang dbang thob ste/ sprul pa mang po 'gyed nus par gyur

to// zhes gsungs pas/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa thams cad rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yang ched du brjod do// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra

las/ klu rgyal rdzu 'phrul gyi le'u ste bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gar gyi dbang phyug des/ thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/

rol pa'i 'khor thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so// khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i gzhal yas khang// nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam cho 'phrul cir ston pa// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba

yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// 'gyur med 'jigs spangs seng ge'i khri gcal ni// dbang phyug mngar bsdus cho 'phrul cir ston kyang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// rin

chen 'bar ba'i khri rkang bzhir snang bas// rigs bzhi'i khrag 'thung cho 'phrul cir ston kyang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// pad+ma le brgan kha dog 'bar ba la// kun tu bzang

mo'i cho 'phrul cir ston kyang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// sprul sku nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba yang// thabs dang shes rab cho 'phrul cir snang yang// skye med byang chub

sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// rang sems yi ge hUM gi byin rlabs las// ye shes sems dpa'i cho 'phrul cir snang yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir//
gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// yi ge hUM drug cho 'phrul chen po las// gar dbang lha yi cho 'phrul cir snang yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar
mya ngan 'das// brjid pa'i dbu rgyan rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor cir ston kyang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan

'das// srin po 'dul byed rta mgo ljang gu ni// rdzu 'phrul myur mgyogs cho 'phrul cir ston kyang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// gsang ba thugs kyi

dpal be'u sgrom bu nas// ye shes sems dpa'i cho 'phrul cir ston kyang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// rdzu 'phrul chen po gshog pa'i gzhal yas
nas// khams gsum rnam rgyal cho 'phrul cir ston kyang// skye mched byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// gnod mdzes zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las// 'jigs

byed khro bo'i cho 'phrul cir snang yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// sku yi rgyan cha dpal gyi cha lugs dang// thugs kyi gsang yum sku la 'khril ba

yi// bka' sdod pho nya'i tshogs su bstan pa bsrung// gdul bya'i cho 'phrul khro bo so sor cir snang yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// de skad ces

gsungs nas/ mi gnas pa lhun gyis grub par bzhugs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gsang ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu dgu pa'o//// de'i tshe
'jam dpal ye shes sems dpas gar gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ci'i phyir/ gsang bar gyur pa ci'i phyir// zab mo'i don du gyur pa rnams// bdag cag rnams la
bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' nyon// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// nye lam byang chub bstan pa'i phyir// phun
sum tshogs pa lnga ldan pa// de yang gsang bar shes par bya// nye lam zhes kyang de la brjod// de ltar gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang chen rgyal po'i sku rdzogs pa// gdan lnga rim gyis rdzogs pa
dang// rdzogs pa chen po yin pa'i phyir// gzhal yas gdal ba chos kyi dbyings// nam mkha' lta bus khyab pa dang// zab mo'i don du shes par byos// de dbus gar gyi dbang phyug dang// gnyis su med pa gzi
ldan ma// zab mo zhes kyang de la brjod// dra ba can la sogs pa bzhi// gsang ba'i yum bzhi yin pas na// zab mo zhes ni rgyal bas gsungs// dkyil 'khor chen po yin pa'i phyir// sgo srung khro

bo mgo dgu brtsegs// theg chen dgu yi rim pa bzhin// de nyid gsang bar shes par bya// de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa yang// rgyal po 'khor dang ldan pa bzhin// phyi rol long ba rgyab sbrel yang// chos sku

gcig pas tha dad min// de phyir dmus long 'khor ba rnams// mi 'gyur dbyings las mya ngan 'das// 'khor ba ma spangs mya ngan 'das// de phyir dmus long 'khor ba can// de phyir kham rgya chen mo bcu drug

gi/ gzi ldan sprul par grags pas na// nyung dkar tshul bzhin zlum por bzhugs// 'khor ba dbyings su bzlum pa'i phyir// de phyir spyang mo brgyad po yang// zhabs kyi sprul pa yin pas na// pho nya bzang zhing

mngags par mgyogs// de yang chos nyid yin pa'i phyir// zab mo'i don du shes par bya// khyi brgyad dgye zhing mngag pa yang// gsang ba'i sprul pa yin pa'i phyir// phra men sprul par shes par bya// sprul pa me

'brug dmar po rnams// yab yum 'du 'bral med pa yi// sprul pa yin par bstan pa yang// yang na srid pa'i rgyal mor dmigs// rtsa ba dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa yin// phung po lnga nyid gzhal yas khang// tsit+ta
dpal be'u sems kyi rten// dbang chen yab yum phyag rgyar gsal// ma bzhi bu brgyad dbyings phyug ma// de yang mtshan ma spros dang bral// rnam shes brgyad po gnas su dag/ long ba rgyab sbrel ye nas
dag/ shes pa yul brgyad gnas su dag/ dmus long 'khor bar ye nas gnas// zhabs kyi chas brgyad gnas su dag/ lcags kyi spyang mor ye nas gnas// khyi brgyad spyang mo brgyad dang bcas// zhabs kyi sprul

par rab tu grags// de rnams rtsa bar bsdus pa'i phyir// zab mo'i bsgrub pa shes par bya// dbyings su ye nas bsgrub pa'i phyir// ye shes dbyings la zhugs pa la// rtag tu gzi ldan thugs kar sbas// zab mo
zhes kyang de la bsngags// long ba rgyab sbrel ye shes 'khor// mgo dgu brtsegs pa yan chad kun// 'khor ni chos kyi dbyings su dmigs// gtso bo yab yum ye shes te// ye shes dbyings las sbyor ba'i
phyir// rtogs pa chen por rab rtogs na// zab mo zhes kyang de la brjod// de ltar dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// mtshan ma'i dngos po bshig pa dang// log par blta ba gzhom pa'i phyir// pho nya rnams su

bshad par bya// bdag nyid chen po rab rtogs te// rtsa ba med pa'i dbyings gcig na// pho nya zhes kyang de la bya// bya dang byed pa mi dmigs shing// 'phro 'du la sogs mi rtsol na// 'gyed pa zhes kyang de la
bya// pho nya'i don drug bshad pa ni// rgyu dang rngam dang ye shes dang// sgrub dang sprul pa'i yig 'bru'o// yang na pho nya gsum du bshad// don dang las dang rig la sogs// pho nya rnams ni dgye bar

bya// zhes bshad do// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ nye lam byang chub sems kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gar dbang gis/ phyogs

bcu dus drug gi 'jig rten thams cad gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlab pa dang/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i bar chod du gyur pa bsgral ba'i zhing bcu zhe gcad pa'i phyir/ gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa

rol pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon// dben nam rang gi gnas khang du// rang gi dri chen maN+Dal bya// rang gi gur gum chag chag gdab// spos dang du ru a ka ru// li shi dang ni ga bur dang// dzA ti pha la mchog tu

bsngags// me tog phreng bas kun tu brgyan// de lta bu yi gnas mchog tu// gzhan zhig nges par bsgral na ni// rdo rje srin po'i ting 'dzin bsgom// rak+sha'i mig gis blta bar bya// kha nas sngags kyi tshig zlos

shing// pha rol rnam shes hUM gis drangs// snying gar mngon sum dmigs byas na// pha rol mngon sum 'chi bar 'gyur// mgo dang snying dang rkang lag rnams// ya mAn ta ka'i 'khor la dbul// gzhan yang lhag
ma ci yod pa// he ru ka la yon du 'bul// gnas lung 'phrul gyi dgongs pa'o// de lta bu yi dus dag tu// lag cha phur pa mchog yin te// zhi ba'i sor bdun zlum por bya// rgyas pa'i sor brgyad zur yang

brgyad// dbang la zla gam nges par bzang// drag po'i sor drug zur gsum po// kun gyi rtse mor hUM bzhag ste// ngos su ha ha ru lu bsgom/ de lta bu yi dus dag tu// sems kyi phur pa rang byung ba// 'du byed lag

gis bral bas thebs// de bas pho nya mngag par bya// pho nya 'od zer dud kha 'phro// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing// bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs pa'i rlung dang mtshungs// shar gyi
phyogs nas mngag pa ni// mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po// lus nag po la 'od phung gnag/ ral pa gnag cing mche ba gnag/ mig kyang nag cing lag nag po// mgyogs kyang rlung gis bskyod du med// 'di
dag dpal gyi pho nya ste// zhums pa med cing stobs chen 'joms// g.yas pa gsum ni s+t+wa re 'phyar// g.yon pa gsum ni lcags kyu 'dzin// yan lag sbrul nag mchog gis brgyan// g.yon gyi lcags kyus snying

nas 'dren// g.yas kyi s+t+wa res nges par 'joms// 'di ni sgo srung mchog yin te// pho nya'i rgyud du mngag par bya// bgegs rnams nges par phung bar byed// rkang gcig de yi pho nya ni// kha dog 'bar ba ci 'dra
na// gcig la gcig ni rab tu 'khril// yang na lag pa sbrel te 'gro// mig kyang med de cang mi smra// long ba kun gyi mchog yin te// rta babs kun gyi sgor bsgoms te// lan 'ga' drag tu
mngag pa'i tshe// gnyis ka song nas der phyin nas// gang la dmigs pa len par byed// sus kyang bzlog par mi byed do// lho yi phyogs nas dgye ba ni// mgo brgyad po la lag brgyad pa// rkang pa brgyad la

mig kyang brgyad// g.yas pa bzhi ni rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon pa bzhi ni phur bu 'dzin// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing// gang la dmigs pa len par byed// gshin rje'i gnas rnams nges par 'joms// rkang brgyad

de yi pho nya ni// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing// bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs pa rlung dang mtshungs// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing// gang la dmigs pa len par byed// nub kyi phyogs
nas dgye ba ni// mgo drug lag drug rkang drug po// g.yas pa gsum ni phur pa 'dril// g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma gtong// mgyogs pa rlung gis bskyod du med// 'di ni dpal gyi pho nya yin// ha ha ru lu'i

sgra sgrogs shing// rang gi rlung phyogs song ba'i tshe// khro bo kun kyang nges ngas par 'chi// rkang drug de yi pho nya ni// lcags kyi spyang mo rkang gsum ma// gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe// gzugs la rdog pas brdeg
cing 'gro// rang gi rkang pa phur pa yin// lcags kyi phur pa rab tu drag/ 'od zer dud khas reg pas ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang 'jigs byed na// gzugs can dgra bor smos ci dgos// byang gi phyogs nas
dgye pa ni// mgo gsum lag drug rkang gsum po// lag pa drug ni rgyud drug gcod// mAM sa za zhing bdud rnams sgrol// gnod sbyin gnas rnams nges par 'joms// rkang gsum de yi pho nya ni// byang gi phyogs

nas rgyug pa mo// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum la// lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu sgril ba bzhin// bang ni glog gis bskyad du med// skad ni gnam gyi 'brug pas che// rab tu mi srun 'di dag

ni// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/ rkang gcig gyen du bsgreng ba ni// ya bdud chen po'i snying nas 'dren// seng ge dril chen dmyal thag gcod// rkang gcig thur du phyung bas ni// ma bdud chen po'i snying nas

'dren// dmyal tshogs me dpung rtsad nas 'byin// rkang gcig thad kar phyung ba yis// dgra bo ma lus snying nas 'dren// 'byung po ma lus dmyal thag gcod// sku ni lcags thag sgril ma 'dra// tshems ni spu gri

gshibs pa 'dra// mAM sa za zhing ri klung rgyug/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi skal ba gcod// 'di ni dpal gyi pho nya ste// 'jig rten khams kun za ba mo// gnod sbyin kun gyi steng na rgyug/ glo snying nang khrol 'byin cing
za// bar snang khams su khros pa'i tshe// nyi zla kun kyang thang la rlog/ gza' skar kun kyang dum bur gcod// shin tu 'khrugs nas bskul ba'i tshe// bdud kyi snying khrag dron mo 'thung// bar snang

khams nas gnod byed kun// rdul cha tsam yang med par mdzod// na mo bi tsa ra b+h+yo/ ha ha ru lu b+ho/ ku ku ra tsa kha long khA hi zhes rbad cing brjod do// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i
tan+t+ra las/ gnas bstan pa dang phur bus gdab ba bstan pa dang/ sgo bzhi'i pho nya mngag pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar po tsit+ta dbyung ba'i phyir// 'di

skad gsungs so// gang la bya ba'i sems can de// spyi bo dzaHlas lcags kyu yis// dbyings las ye shes 'jug tshul du// du mar brjod cing drang bar bya// hom lnga sbrel ba'i gzhal yas kyang// ri las 'od kyi

'phro 'du 'byung// dzaHyi lcags kyus drangs pa yang// rdo la lcags ni 'ju tshul du// du mar brjod cing drang bar bya// snying gar yi ge 'od 'phros 'dus// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zur drug pa// 'khor los rab tu

gcod tshul dang// pha rol snying rtsa gcod pa'i phyir// du mar brjod cing drang bar bya// bdag nyid gar dbang chen po yis// 'dren cing sgrol ba'i pho nya ni// gang yang rung ba'i zhing bcu de'i// lus ngag yid la

rbad par bya// rta mchog rol pa'i shangs las kyang// rlung gi mi la spyang ki'i gdong// mche bas bdud kyi snying rtsa gcod// rna ba sbrul gyi 'dzul khung nas// sbrul gyi mi la spyang ki'i gdong// kha rlangs sprin gyi
dkyil 'khor nas// 'od kyi mi la 'ja' 'tshon gdong// ral pa khrag gi zar bu las// khrag gi mi la spyang ki'i gdong// spyan mig gru gsum 'bar ba las// zangs kyi mi la spyang ki'i gdong// kha la ro shal

rbad/ gum tri dun dun rbad/ de las bang chen btang ba ni// 'dren cing sgrol ba'i pho nya ni// gshog pa rdo rje gdengs pa la// pho nya yid mgyogs rlung bas myur// lcags kyi mi la kha gshog can// phyag rgya bcu drug

'bar ba las// lcags kyi spyang mo brgyad sprul pa// lcags gshog khyung gi 'dab ma can// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa ni// la la byan lag mgo bo la// lus ni lcags kyi spyang mor sprul// la la khyung gi mgo

bo la// lus ni zangs kyi wa mor sprul// la la khra yi mgo bo la// lus ni drel nag rkang gsum po// la la khra yi mgo bo la// lus ni sdig pa rkang gcig pa'o// la la chun yag mgo bo la// lus ni dung gi spyang

mor sprul// la la chu bya'i mgo bo la// lus ni bcu drug tshang mar sprul// la la bzhad kyi mgo bo la// lus ni byu ru'i seng ger sprul// la la kang ka'i mgo bo la// lus ni lcags dril rkang gsum pa'o// la la
'ug pa'i mgo bo la// lus ni dung phag dkar mor sprul// la la pu shud mgo bo la// lus ni lcags kyi sdig par sprul// la la mthing ril mgo bo la// lus ni drel nag rkang gsum po// la la
skyin gyi mgo bo la// lus ni phyi la rtsal po che// la la bya rgod mgo bo la// lus ni gser stag ser por sprul// gang la bya ba'i sems can dang// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// dmyal khams bcu

drug kha brims te// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// 'di la byin gyis brlabs nas kyang// dmar po 'byin pa'i pho nya 'gyed// dus las ma g.yel phrin las mdzod// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wAk+ka

tsit+ta badzrA nan/ oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+tAn kI li kI la ya/ sarba pA paM/ badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ de bas phyi ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// gcod dang sbyin sngags 'bum du bzlas// las
grub pa la the tshom med// ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ tsit+ta dmar 'byin gyi le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bang chen btang ba
ni// yang gcig cho 'phrul mdzad pa las// 'byung po dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i phyir// bskul pa'i las dag rbad par bya// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// dpal mchog drag shul stag gi chas// khro

bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las byung ba'i pho nya ni// stag mgo dmar po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// stag lag khro mo zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// shar
phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// dri za dbang sdus gdon bgegs thal bar rlog/ gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// gnod gdug zlog byed rgya bye'u lcags kyi chas// khro bo yab

yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// lcags mgo sngon po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// lcags lag khra bo zhe sdang glog stong 'khyug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// shar lho
khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// drang srong dbang sdus gdon bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// shes rab ting 'dzin mchod khrab dbang gi chas// khro bo yab

yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// rdo rje dmar mo dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// rdo rje zhe sdang lag pa glog stong 'khyug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// lho phyogs khyab par
rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// gshin rje dbang sdus gdon bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pas ni// dpa' brjid mnyen lcug sbrul nag 'khril ba'i chas// khro bo yab
yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// sbrul mgo nag po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// sbrul lag phra mo zhe sdang glog stong 'khyug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad
de// lho nub khyab par rgyug cig dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// srin po dbang sdus gdon bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// dbang gi bse khrab gzi 'bar bgrad pa'i

chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// za byed mche ba'i dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// mche ba'i lag pa zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad
de// nub phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan mo// rlung lha dbang sdus gdon bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pas ni// shu ken smad g.yogs chu ris dar gyi

chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// dar mgo dmar po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// dar lag khra bo zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad
de// byang phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// gnod sbyin dbang sdus gdon bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pas ni// gcan gzan rgyal po gdug byed gzig

gi chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// gzig mgo dmar po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// gzig lag khra mo zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi
bzad de// byang shar khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// dbang ldan dbang sdus gdon bgegs thal bar rlogs// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dregs pa'i dpung 'joms ma// za byed mche bas bdud
kyi dpung yang 'joms// nga rgyal bsnyems pas pha rol zil gyis gnon// dug bcom 'brug sgras srid pa'i thod rus 'joms// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa srin po dbang du bsdus// hUM dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba

'jig/ phrin las bcol thabs yin pa'i phyir// ma ma bgyis pas ma mo bskul// dzaHdzaHbgyis pas mkha' 'gro rbad// he he bgyis pas phra men dgye// hrIHhrIHbgyis pas rta mgrin mngags// b+h+yo b+h+yo bgyis pas

dbang phyug bod// dbyangs su tshangs pa'i glu drug blang// las su dgra bgegs ma lus sgrol// rtags su gsang ba'i rnge'u chung brdung// dpal gyi phrin las dus la bab// de skad ces gsungs so// rgyud thams

cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ glo rdeg chas kyi pho nya mngags pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o//// gar dbang chen po'i cho 'phrul ni// de nas bang chen btang ba ni// yang gcig
sprul pa'i pho nya ni// dbus nas sprul pa'i las bdag mo// rta mchog rol pa'i khri la bzhugs// g.yu yi spyang mo dgu 'bum gyis// kha rlangs bar snang char du 'bebs// khrag 'thung rta yi dbu lnga

las// dung gi ser phreng lnga lnga 'dril// rgyud lngar gnas pa'i 'gro ba rnams// 'bar ba'i zhal du bsdus nas kyang// bskal pa bye ba grangs pa yi// sdug bsngal zug rngu sbyang du gsol// dbang po rdul du rlog tu
gsol// dur khrod spyang mos las mdzod cig/ spyan gyi sdang mig 'bar ba nas// sprul pa'i phra men rab 'bar snang// thabs la mkhas pas srid gsum dbang du sdud// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang 'jigs byed
na// bar gcod dgra bgegs smos ci dgos// dur khrod spyang mos las mdzod la// dbang ldan phyogs kyang rdzogs par g.yengs// gdug pa'i dur khrod brgyad la rol// bgegs kun thal bar brlag par

mdzod// shangs kyi rlung sgrom 'tshubs ma las// sprul pa'i pho nya rab 'bar ma// rlung nag rdo rje'i ma mo la// rlung gi 'tshubs ma 'bum yang 'khyil// rlung 'brug sngon mo'i khri la bzhugs// rlung gi g.yang gzhi lus

la gyon// kha nas rlung gi bskal pa gtong// yang sprul lcags kyi spyang mo 'bum// kha nas ro yi khog stod bshal// dri la gnas pa'i dgra bgegs kun// thal ba bzhin du brlag par mdzod// bskal pa me yi mi
mo la// ye shes dbu lnga'i 'od zer 'phro// zhal gyi hom las rgyud lnga sgrol// me yi bskal pas khams gsum sreg/ me 'brug dmar mo chibs su bcibs// me sbrul dmar mo'i sked chings can// mu men phra chas
si li li// na bza' sbrul gyi g.yang gzhi gsol// 'o dod 'bod cing g.yab nag 'dor// me yi ral pa dmar po la// gza' chen mig dmar tshom bur gsal// zhal nas hUM gi sgra bsgrags pas/ dug dang me yi
skyugs pa 'byin// mche ba rgya zor bkug pa 'dra// rgyu skar 'bum gyi tshom bur bcas// sngags pas gdung nas bos pa'i tshe// mchi ma khrag gi gru char 'bebs// ro la gnas pa'i dgra bgegs rnams// thal ba

bzhin du brlag par mdzod// rdo rje phra men gtum mo yum// sbrul nag stong gis lus brgyan cing// dkar khras se ral mdzad pas rgyal rigs dbang du sdus// dmar khras dpung rgyan mdzad pas bram ze dbang du
sdud// ser khras phyag gdub mdzad pas rje'u rigs dbang du sdud// sbrul nag zhabs gdub mdzad pas gdug pa 'dul ba'i mchog/ lus la gnas pa'i dgra bgegs rnams// thal ba bzhin du brlag par

mdzod// sprul pa'i pho nya phra mo ni// zhe sdang khrag gi len phran can// skad ni dung skad sgrog pa la// kha rlangs sprin dmar glog stong 'gyu// shangs nas dud thul g.yab mo 'dor// rkang lag sder mo phur pa
las// s+t+wa re lcags kyi tsha tsha 'khrugs// dgra la brdeg cing dgra snying 'byin// dur khrod spyang mos las mdzod cig/ rngams byed 'bar ba'i gshog pa las// g.yas pa rdo rje'i gshog pa la// nag
mo sbrul 'dab chen mo sprul// me yi ral pas stong gsum khebs// me khrag spyang mo ro khyer bas// rU tra'i mig 'bras thang la lhung// dgra bgegs ma lus rdul du rlogs// dur khrod spyang mos las mdzod

cig/ g.yon pa rin chen gshog pa la// rdo rje rlung 'degs chen mor sprul// rlung gi ba dan rtse dgu 'phyar// bskal pa'i 'tshubs mas srid pa g.yo// ba dan lce la me 'bar bas// 'byung po'i kha so sil bur
rlogs// de yi thugs las sprul pa ni// lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu la// kha nas ro bshal dgra bgegs 'dul// lcags kyi mche ba zang yag la// rdo rje ngar sgong gser phran 'dril// bdud kyi dpung la sa ma
