rab tu bshad// srog 'dzin rlung ni kun gyi bdag/ de nyid pad+ma dbang chen sku// de las rtsol ba'i rlung byung bas// 'byung ba bzhi dang 'byung chung lnga// dkyil 'khor dgu yi lha ru 'gyur// mig la me yi rlung rgyu

yang// gzugs mthong sku+u yi kham rgya mo dang// lce la chu yi rlung yang rgyu// ro myong gsung gi kham rgya mo// lus la nam mkha'i rlung yang rgyu// reg shes thugs kyi kham rgya mo// sna la sa yi rlung yang rgyu// dri tshor yon

tan kham rgya mo// rna bar rlung gi rlung yang rgyu// sgra thos las kyi kham rgya mo// de lnga yid kyi nang du 'dus// kun khyab ye shes kham rgya mo// 'khor ba rnam rtog bag chags rlung// 'das pa rtog med ye shes

so// 'khor 'das gnyis su rgyab gyes pas// de phyir long ba rgyab 'brel shar// phyir ldang rlung las 'dod yon lngas// sangs rgyas mnyes shing sems can tshims// nang 'jug rlung las sku gsung thugs// yon

tan phrin las dngos grub thob// khong nas rlung las ye shes lngas// dngos grub rang la thob pa'o// 'byung 'jug gnas pa bco lnga las// de phyir dmus long bco lnga'i 'khor// thabs mchog dmangs la rgya che

zhing// shes rab stong pa nyid du zab// rnam par rtogs pas ya bral bzung// de phyir long ba rgyab 'brel lho// rlung 'di phyir ldang oM du 'phro// de las bder gshegs sku lngar gsal// nang du hUM 'jug hUM du

'dus// de las sangs rgyas thugs lngar thim// khong nas rlung gi yi ge AH// rgyal ba'i gsung lngas rtogs pa skye// de phyir rlung lnga'i dmus long 'khor// bem po 'byung ba'i rlung dang ni// rig pa sems kyi rlung

gnyis las// bem rigs gnyis med ma shes pas// de phyir long ba rgyab 'brel nub// phyir ldang pho rlung rnam lngar 'phro// pho yi rlung gis 'dar zhing dgod bskyod kyang/ nang 'jug mo rlung rnam lngar 'dus// mo

yi rlung gis 'dar zhing 'jums [(]'dzums[) ]/ khong gnas ma ning rlung du thim// ma ning mi rtog thom gyis 'gro// pho mo ma ning bco lnga'i rlung// de phyir dmus long bco lnga'i 'khor// dbyings kyi rlung lnga yum du

gsal// ye shes rlung lnga yab tu+u gnas// yab yum 'brel bar ma shes pas// de phyir long ba rgyab 'brel byang// phyir ldang 'gro ba'i dug 'joms nas// nang 'dus rigs lnga'i dngos grub blang// khong nas sku
lngar rang byung gsal// lnga gsum de ni dmus long 'khor// dgun dus sa yi rlung rgyu 'khyags// de yang nyin mtshan rnam pa gnyis// dpyid dus rlung gi rlung yang rgyu// de dus rlung gnyis nyin mtshan

gnyis// dbyar dus chu yi rlung rgyu bas// chu rnams 'khrugs pas nyin mtshan gnyis// ston dus me yi rlung rgyu bas// 'bras bu smin byed nyin mtshan gnyis// dus bzhi nyin zhag brgyad phyi'i phyir// za byed dpal

gyi khyi brgyad bstan// phung po lnga la gnas pa'i rlung// dbang po lnga la mgrin pa'i rlung// de dag bcu ru gyur pas na// ye shes sprul pa'i khyi bcur gnas// mtshan bcas bsgom par gang 'dod pas// bltas
pas long bas sku la blta// bsgom pas yongs rdzogs sku ru bsgom// bcur bas long bas dbugs la bshur// ma byung log gnon zhag gsum bya// 'byung ba brtan pa'i cho ga bya// sku grangs mang por bsgom pa
dang// chen po rags par bsgom pa dang// rang nyid skur bsgom dkyil 'khor zhugs// mtshan bcas la brten mtshan med 'gyur// mtshan bcas bsgom pa'i man ngag dgu// dbang gi dkyil 'khor chen po
ru// las can skal ldan gzhug pa'i phyir// shar du sgo srung mgo ru bstan// mtshan med bsgom pas gang 'dod pas// gnas pa dang ni dmigs pa gnyis// 'od gsal ba dang zung 'jug bzhi// de la yang ni

dgra bzhi ste// dgra 'dul pa yi man ngag dang// dgra ni btson tu gzung ba dang// dgra rnams tshar yang gcad pa dang// dgra la dgrar mi 'dzin pa bzhi// mtshan med bsgom pa'i man ngag brgyad// lho phyogs sgo
skyong mgo brgyad bstan// mtshan bcas mtshan med gzir gdab pa// lta ba bsgom du med pa dang// spyod pa yengs su med pa dang// lta spyod mi 'bral 'grogs pa gsum// tshe 'di'i gzer du gdab par
bya// rigs drug grong khyer gcad pa dang// bar do'i lus 'di yid ma bsgom// 'od gsal zung 'jug rtse brag bsgom// de dag bar do'i gzer gsum yin// de phyir nub sgor mgo drug bstan// spros bcas

mtshan ma'i spyod pa dang// spros med gsang ba'i spyod pa dang// shin tu spros med spyod pa gsum// zhugs phyir mgo gsum byang sgo bstan// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i man ngag gis// tshe 'dir sangs rgyas thob pa

dang// le lo can gyi gang zag gis// bar dor sangs rgyas thob pa gnyis// de phyir me 'brug rlung 'brug bstan// tshe 'dir 'byung bzhi sems su thim// bar dor sems nyid lha skur 'char// de nyid sangs rgyas

sar 'gro gsum// de phyir sku gsung thugs rnams las// yang sprul bse yi bya glag sogs// sprul pa mang po bstan pa yis// nyin zhag dag ni phrugs gcig la// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i rlung// rgyu bas pho nya
'gugs 'dren las// dbu yi spyi bo man chad nas// zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad du// sprul pa'i pho nya mang por bstan// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gzan 'bebs kyi rgyud las/
dbang chen sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pas/ 'gro drug bde chen chos skur sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen gyis gang zag gnyis sangs rgyas pa'i lam 'di
gsungs so// brtson 'grus can dang le lo can// 'di dang bar dor sangs rgyas pa'i// gsang sngags 'bras bu bla na med// rab tu sbas pa bshad par bya// brtson 'grus can gyi gang zag tu// tshe 'dir mtshan
bcas mtshan med bstan// dang por sku la blta bar bya// bltas pas dgongs pa thob gyur nas// bdag nyid sku ru bsgom par bya// bdag nyid sku la goms gyur na// de nas dkyil 'khor zhugs par bya// ma

byung log gnon zhag gsum bya// de ltar thob pa'i rting la ni// de nas brtan pa'i cho ga bya// dgun ni nyi ma gsum char bya// dbyar ni nyi ma bzhi cha bya// lugs sku kun la blo glor blta// de ltar thob pa'i rting la
ni// mtshan ma can la brten nas ni// mtshan ma med par rab tu bskyed// myur bar 'dod na spyod pa bya// sems ni 'phro ba dgag par bya// gnyis su med pa'i spyod pa bya// mtshan ma can gyi man ngag
yin// mtshan ma med pa'i man ngag ni// dang por rlung la gnas par bya// sems can rnams kyi srog gyur pa// rlung zhes bya bas las kun byed// 'di ni rnam shes zhon rta ste// lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming

can// rang bzhin phra ba brgya dang ni// drug cu tham pa 'di dag ni// rlung gi bzhon pa'i rgyu yin te// nyin dang mtshan du rgyu ba'o// gnyis par ril 'dzin rjes gzhig dmigs// mgo bo nas ni rkang pa'i bar// ji
srid snying gar phyin gyi bar// rnal 'byor yang dag mtha' la 'jug/ ril por 'dzin pa zhes bshad do// ji ltar dbugs kyi me long la// mtha' nas rim gyis dbus thim ltar// rnal 'byor yang dag mtha' la
'jug/ rjes su gzhig pa zhes bshad do// gsum par 'od gsal bsgom par bya// da ni yongs rdzogs rnal 'byor gyi// gsal ba'i don ni bshad bya ste// stong pa gsum po rnam dag gang// 'od gsal bar ni
'dir bshad do// bsam gtan 'di ni bsam gtan min// 'dis ni mthar thug mi 'thob ste// nam mkha' lta bur phyogs gyur pas// 'od gsal ba ni mi dmigs te// 'od gsal ba yi gnas thob
nas// rab dga'i gzugs su skye bar 'gyur// de tshe rab dga' rdo rje'i sku// kun gyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur// 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa// da ltar byung ba'i srid pa gsum// 'od gsal ba ni rnam dag
pas// skad cig gcig la ma lus mthong// zhi bar zung du 'jug pa ni// kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag/ so so'i cha yis phye gyur na// yang dag nyid du 'dres gyur pas// zung du 'jug par de

bshad do// mtshan med bsgom la dgra bzhi ste// dgra 'dul man ngag bshur ba ni// ji ltar sprin ni sna tshogs pa// mdog dang dbyibs ni tha dad pas// nam mkha'i ngang las byung nas ni// de nyid du ni thim par
'gyur// de bzhin rang bzhin thams cad kun// snang ba gsum gyi rgyu can te// ma lus yul la zhugs nas ni// 'od gsal bar ni 'jug par 'gyur// de 'dra rang bzhin ma shes pas// mi shes mun pas phebs
nas ni// dge dang mi dge'i las byas nas// 'gro ba lngar ni 'khor bar 'gyur// thabs chen rgyud dang ldan pa la// nyon mongs byang chub yan lag bshad// dang po sems ni bshur bar bya// bshur ba tshad du

phyin tsam na// sems ni rang log nyid du gyur// bshur ba tshad du phyin pa yin// la las tshad du phyin pas thob// la la bde ba'i sgo nas thob// la la shes pa 'tshams pas thob// la la kha bo dag gis thob// la
lar spros pa bcas pa thob// de nas gnyis med bsgom par bya// gnyis med bsgom pa'i rting la ni// dang por sems ni gnas pa skye// de nas sems ni dmigs pa skye// dmigs pa skyes pa'i rting la ni// rang
bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal skye// 'od gsal skyes pa'i rting la ni// zung 'jug bsgom pa skye bar 'gyur// le lo can yi gang zag de// srid pa bar dor sangs rgya bas// shi ba don dam bden pa yin// phung po

khams dang skye mched rnams// 'byung ba chen po bzhi la thim// 'byung ba chen po bzhi po yang// sa ni chu la thim par 'gyur// chu ni me la thim par 'gyur// me ni rlung la thim par 'gyur// rlung ni rnam par shes

par thim// rnam shes snang ba de la thim// snang ba snang ba mched la thim// snang mched snang ba thob la thim// snang ba thob pa bya ba ni// thams cad stong pa nyid la thim// thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba// shi ba

shes rab pha rol phyin// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po yin// rnal 'byor pa yi grogs yin no// de las sprul sku 'byung ba ni// ji lta chu klung dwangs pa la// nya dag myur du 'phar ba ltar// de bzhin thams cad
stong gsal las// sgyu 'dra bar ni 'byung bar bshad// de nyid bar do'i sku yin te// sngon 'byung srid pa'i sha gzugs can// dbang po kun tshang thogs med ldan// rigs mthun lha mig dag pas mthong// bar

ma do yi sku de yin// 'gro ba rigs drug grong khyer de// gnyis su med pa'i spyod pa spyad// spros pa'i rnam pas chod gyur nas// bar ma do yi sku de ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku ru bsgoms// 'od gsal yang ni
bsgom par bya// zung 'jug sku yang 'byung bar 'gyur// zung du 'jug pa gnyis yod de// slob bzhin pa dang mi slob pa// mi slob pa ru gyur tsa na// snang ba tsam dang gsal ba tsam// snang la rang

bzhin med pa gnyis// tshe 'di nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen// sangs rgyas zhing nas mi ldog pa'i// bar ma do ru mngon sangs rgyas// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gzan la 'bebs pa'i rgyud las/ 'gro ba drug gi
gang zag le lo can dang brtson 'grus can bde chen chos skur drangs pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha srin sde brgyad kyi gtso bo// gza' bdud nyi ma khros pa'i ser ba dbab

pa 'di gsungs so// nA ga shang shang/ raM raM yu yu/ rbad rbad shar shar/ phob phob da phob ya/ ma ma rag sha phob/ rag sha a ga ni phob swA hA/ pi pi phrom phrom shar shar swA hA/ sur shag tin gnas myags myags

shar shar swA hA/ pi pi ril ril sib sib b+h+yo ya/ ru lu ru lu swA hA/ bsnyen dang bsgrub dang las sbyor gsum// gcig tu dril ba'i gsang sngags yin// dben pa'i gnas su bsnyen pa bya// seng ldeng phur pa yungs

gar la// gtor ma mi dgos zhags bcur bzlas// a tsa ra ni smra ba dang// bud med phyag byed mon pa 'byung// bsgrub pa ra rog khyi nag khrag/ nyung dkar gsum la zhag ba cur bzlas// mi ring skya shar chu bo

dang// 'khyags pas yul khams khengs pa 'byung// de nas gta' bsgrub bya ba ni// mi sog gnyis la nang du sngags// phyi rol yul gyi lha klu bri// ling+ga bris la phur pa dril// thod nang bcug la khebs kyis

gdab// zhag bdun bzlas shing thun gyis brab// rtags ni zor bas 'dar ba dang// kha la 'brum bu yong ba dang// rtsas ma brngas dang sgrub steng 'babs// ser 'bru blang la thun khrag blugs// de nas las la

sbyar ba ni// gu gul tshim chen ling+gar bdug/ zhag gcig bzlas te gta' yangs bskyel// hUM muM yaM yaM shar shar ga dun phob/ rag dun phob/ rag sha a b+hi ni phob/ phi phi shar shar ni phob/ ma na ka ni phob/ nA

ga shed raM raM thug khram/ dgra bo yi yul du phob/ chem chem thog shog/ gi gaM dgra la phob/ gta' sgrub tshe na thun skabs brab// las la sbyor dus zhag gcig bzlas// sog pa gcig ni lha rten la// gta' de

lkugs par gzhug par bya// sog pa gcig ni klu gnas sar// nam mkha' mthong sar sba bar bya// phur ba ser tho ngag la gzhug/ thun gyi khrag gis gta' zam 'brel// gnam stong pa ni ri rtse nas// lha rde'u klu
rde'u zor du 'phen// ser bas yul khams phung bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bstan pa dar bar nges// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gzan 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ gza' bdud nyi ma khros pa'i le'u
ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud nag po 'dzum med kyi ser ba dbab pa'i man ngag 'di gsungs so// dam tshig ldan pa'i dben gnas su// gru gsum dkyil 'khor khru

gang ste// shar du 'bru nag gta' gtor la// lho ru skyung mda' dar nag rten// nub tu chang phud gser skyems bsham// byang du rgyun gtor sha khrag bsham// za 'ug ha thabs steng nas gur// khyi nag ra rog glang

nag dang// phag rog khrag dang khyi klad rnams// bag phyer sbrus la ril bu bya// ling+gar dril la khyi thod gzhug/ sngags 'di zla ba gsum du bsnyen/ prad nya A sa twa b+h+yo/ b+ha ga ha ta ya b+h+yo/ ma ma rak+Sha ni b+h+yo/ se la mu
ta bab/ bdud san ta ha ra ya bab/ ba la ni la bab phob b+h+yo/ ru ru hril hril phob ya/ ri la ra rog ru col gzhug/ la chas kha bcad 'od dkyil sba// gta' lkugs thun gtor bsnyen pa'o// de nas bsgrub

pa thun la bya// khyi thod nang du nyung dkar brab// bsnyen bsgrub gnyis kyi sngags dril la// zhag grangs bco brgyad bzlas par bya// ba la ba ti tu ba/ dug sa la mu tra bab/ tsa ga ma ra ya sho ba ba/ ha ha ril ril/

pha la trag trag/ shar shar shur shur phob ya// rdo rje rgya gram mu khyud la// kha gnon sngags bris thun kha gcad// yi dam nga rgyal thub par bya// kha gnon sngags 'di bcu bcu bzlas// oM ma ma ba tra nan/ ru ting

nan/ ga ga te ba ti ka nan/ pa tra pa tu mi ga nan/ nA ga yu la pa sha nan/ hUM ru ra ga ti rba la nan/ prad nya tri ga du nan/ a kro kA la bab nan/ Ar+ya saM ga ti ya nan/ de ni thun ba sdom pa'i sngags// thun gyi kha
gcod dag la bris// dmus long 'thibs long thebs/ dmus long nyams dmus long nyams/ 'ur thibs shar thibs/ 'ur ma thibs/ e ta dra thibs rbad/ hi hi ltibs rbad/ rdes sod khrag sgang sad/ 'dar

'di shar shig/ ting na shig/ he na 'ded dang thums/ ye raM mug/ de ni thun kha sdom pa ste// thun bar dag tu bzlas par bya// las sbyor khrag la bya ba ste// ra dkar ba dmar rta dkar mo'i// khrag gsum g.yas

su gzhag par bya// ba dmar 'o ma g.yon du gzhag/ skyer pa'i shing la pher ga bya// rtse mo khrag byug khrag nag dkrug/ rtsa ba dkar pos 'o ma dkrug/ zhag gsum dbab pa'i sngags 'di bzlas// braM yag sha tshil

d+he thun/ gar bi tsha bu gu+u lim sha ga ne/ ad pur tshe thul thul/ dgra yi ri rtser zangs nang du// khrag dang 'o ma ra grod blugs// be kar grod btag khrag bzang tig/ zangs zang kyang gar dbyug pa sa la

btab// phud 'di shar la gtong bas bya// sngags 'dis khrag zor dgra yul 'phang/ badzra sa ga tre ya/ ma sing traM ya/ badzra kha T+wAM ga ya/ badzra shan ku ru ya/ badzra zhung zhung ya/ tri sha me kha ma/ ya tra ba ya/ badzra bong

bong ya/ badzra ra tra ya/ badzra zhung zhung ya/ ma ra na rA dza ya/ badzra tri nar ya ma ya/ tsu ha na tri ya du yang drung laM tri ya// bdud po nag po 'dzum med ni// s+t+wa re g.yas la kha T+wAM g.yon// stag gzhu stag
slag mu stegs chas// dgra yul ser ba 'bebs par bsam// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gzan 'bebs kyi rgyud las// bdud nag po 'dzum med gzan la dbab pa'i le'u ste drug
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen gyis// lha chen pos ser ba dbab pa 'di gsungs so// dben gnas dkyil 'khor gru gsum du// dbus su dam rdzas gtor ma la// zur gsum phur pa
gsum yang gzug/ lha chen sku yang bsgom par bya// dbu ni lha yi yul na yod// 'gram g.yas dkar pos nyi ma mnan// g.yon pa ser pos zla ba gnon// sna ni nag po sde brgyad sdud// phyag g.yas yongs
'du sa brtol bskul// zil ba ser ba chen po 'bebs// phyag g.yon gnam lcags thog chen 'bebs// sked pa mi yi yul na yod// mjug ma sbrul du 'khyil ba la// zhabs ni klu yi yul du brkyang// de ru

bsgom la drag sngags ni// g.yag ru yungs kar skam thun brab// hu ha nu a ru sa tha ru da ra da ha sa ra pa ru/ ljang ni nga so he sa ha sa na/ la yo d+he se ga 'dzu e/ mun d+ha pha ri/ an 'dzu pha ri/ mun d+ha li ni/ ma hu

a ri/ a ri na mo/ ti khroM khroM hub hub/ ga li shar shar swA hA/ dgun ka kha ba bu yug yong// dbyar ni ser ba dngos su 'bab/ gtor ma la ni thun yang brab/ bya dang rta ra mtshal bu gsum// g.yag ru nang du
rlon thun sgrub/ phob phob khroM hril shar phob// gos dmar gyon la dkar gsum za// ser rgya ra mgor rdzas blug sba// phur pa gsum ni gzer dug dag/ gtor ma zor du 'phang bar bya// ser bas yul khams
khengs par 'gyur// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gzan la 'bebs pa'i rgyud las/ lha chen gdug pa gzan la 'bebs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin kyi drag ser
dbab pa 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor gru gsum dbus dag tu// phag khrag nyung dkar ra thod blugs// lha klu ser srung ra ru gsum// gnod sbyin phyag bzhi 'brug la zhon// lcags gyi ber ka ba dan

g.yas// thod khrag zor ba g.yon pa na/ oM tri byi shag pra ma ya/ tri li shag shar ser hril b+h+yo/ ting khe ser dril shar b+h+yo/ dza ra ka ra shi hril shar b+h+yo/ pre du sha shar shar b+h+yo/ g+hi tang b+ha ri tshag shar b+h+yo/ bra ma ya g+ha

ra ti phebs b+h+yo// bsnyen sngags 'bum tsho bdun po la// oM tsa na nyung dkar ru nang blug/ dang po gnyis ni bdun tsho gnyis// chu ril sngags te bsgrub par bya// tha ma bdun pa dbab sngags ni// 'bebs khar mi
tshil ra tshil dang// khyi tshil gu gul dud pas bdug/ gnad la phebs na myur du 'bab// ra rog thod pa yul dbus sba// rU ma gsum po gzer du gdab// drag sngags bdun pas yul khams
ni// ser bas 'joms te sangs rgyas kyi// bstan pa dam pa rgyas par gsungs// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gzan la 'bebs pa'i rgyud las/ gnod sbyin lcags kyi ber gcan gzan
'bebs pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo nag mo dza mun tis klu gnad la 'bebs pa'i ser ba 'di gsungs so// bya rta mtshal bu'i snying khrag dang// ra khyi ser skya'i snying

khrag bzhi// mdze khrag lnga yi thun nang du// gu gul nag po'i chu nang nas// nyung dkar phyung la thun du bya// thun khrag chang phud gtsang mas sbyar// nA ga trag rak+Sha kha mun tra/ nA ga ru lu ru lu ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ nA ga sha ni

ti shwa rbad/ thum ri li li/ nA ga trag rak+Sha mun dza/ tra ka mun tra ru lu ru lu ma ma b+h+yo/ nA ga snying kha ra ga ma/ nA ga la mA ra la b+h+yo b+h+yo// bsnyen sngags zhag ni bdun du bzlas// sngags dbal kha la 'brum bu
yong// ser ba dngos su thor thor 'bab// mthong lugs rnam pa gsum yod de// sgrub pa pos ni lo thog mthong// mkha' 'gro ma yis zas su mthong// klu yis dkor nor bang mdzod mthong// badzra tik+Sh+NA mug

ye// nA ga ma ma ra ya phros phrom/ nA ga hu ya nA ga l-ing/ ma hA u na ye phrom phrom/ nA ga ha na da ha pa tsa hril hril/ shar shar che go mo'i lo thog la phroM phroM phob ya// chu 'dril dbab pa zhag bdun bya// thun snod ma
chag ma gas par// rang ni mun pa dag la bsdad// 'bebs dus zhag gsum g.yos la dbab/ pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gzan 'bebs pa'i rgyud las// ma mo ral pa gtibs ma gzan la
'bebs pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i ser ba 'bebs pa 'di gsungs so// nyung dkar til dang mi khrag dang// sha chen ra dug re lcag dang// btsan dug sbyang tsher

dur sol dang// bdud rtsi lnga dang chang phud dang// nya sbal sbrul sha ra khrag dang// khyi khrag yugs sa'i mngal khrag dang// gu gul nag po skye tshe dang// ra dkar 'o ma bag bye dang// khyi dkar 'o ma sbrul gyi

mgo/ mchil pa'i klad pa dag dang ni// de bzhin sre mo'i klad pa dang// mdzo mo'i 'o ma kun bsags nas// zo'am bar bu'i nang du blug/ bsnyen sngags 'bum dang bye ba bzlas// oM badzra kro ta sa ma ya daMSh+to da

phaT/ hu ya hu ya hu lu hu lu/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ thum ri li ri li/ shab ta ka pa la/ ma nu pra ba hri/ sra sa ra du+u sa ni/ bi tsa la hUM/ ta thA b+ha ba na swA hA// bsnyen pa'i sngags la ma 'bad na// ser ba 'byung ba mi myur

bas// sngags la rab tu nan tan bya// bdag nyid pad+ma rta mgrin la// klu rnams thal sbyar 'khor du bsam// A+oM g+ha na sha ni ra na ba laM b+hu na ni ra hri ta ga sa laM/ sa thar ra nu hri/ a kro na ni ga nan/

shang ka pa la ra tsi naM/ sa thar d+ho d+ha g+ha na long/ nA ga ri naM naM/ a be sha ya// sgrub sngags 'di ni zhags bdun nam// bcu gcig nyi shu rtsa gcig bsgrub// ro ras dag la 'khor lo ni// dbus kyi lte ba gling dgu
la// bar ma bcu gnyis bsnyen pa'i sngags// mu khyud bcu gcig sgrub pa'i sngags// sum cu rtsa gnyis 'khor lo ste// tha ma thog 'brug glog gis brgyan// khyi nag thod par dril byas nas// dgra yul gtar
bcug thog ser 'bebs// phebs nas phyung la 'o mas bkru// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gzan 'bebs kyi rgyud las// klu rnams gzan la dbab
pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin zangs thog gi ser ba dbab pa 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la mi gzugs

re// snying gar hom bzhi phur pa bzhi// mda' bzhi dar sna lnga yang gdags// dbus kyi gru gsum 'phar thod dang// bras rgod thog sngags rta nag khrag/ zla gam gsum la wa khyi phag/ de nang ram bu'i rtsa ba

dang// rta ra khyi gsum khrag rnams blug/ sgo bzhir gtor ma dgod par bya// oM raM tra thun shag/ dmu btsan rol po dgra bo'i srog rtsa rbad ya/ thun thun dgra bo'i lo thog la yaM b+h+yo/ a ti yaM ti rak+sha hri/ yab kyi

sngags so// oM pa sha mi ki nag mo bal la// dgra bo'i srog rtsal rbad// thun thun dgra bo'i lo thog la b+h+yo/ de ma rak+Sha ma thun b+h+yo/ yum gyi sngags so// yab dang yum gyi sngags dag ni// thog bsgrub bya na nyis
'bum bzlas// ser bsgrub thun bar bzlas pa yang// brgya brgya rab tu bzlas par bya// gnod sbyin zangs mdog dmar nag sku// dbu yi rgya mdud 'khor lo can// g.yas pa ral gri g.yon pa mdung dmar

bsnams// yum ni zangs gri gtum mo bse gdong ma// sngo dmar zhags pa g.yas la nad rkyal g.yon// de yi rgyun sngags rtag tu bzlas pa ni// ban+de gos dmar skyes pa go can brgya// chu dang 'od pa lug khyu

'brug ser sgra// rtags de ma byung bar du 'bad par bya// oM ha sri ya tri sems pa dza/ ha tri a tra sems pa dza du// ba la ya sho a tri sems pa dza du kha la ya sho e ma ke tra/ kha la mu nyid ya man ta ka/ dgra bo'i

yul 'dir mA ra yan/ dza tri ke sha ya mA na ta ka hUM dza// de nas ser ba 'bebs pa'i sngags bzlas pas// bsnyen sngags nyis brgya 'bebs sngags brgya tsho gcig/ thod pa lnga yi nang du nyung dkar sngags// spyod

lam sgrub ste mi khyi bsrung bar bya// a kro te ga ta sha la ta shar/ nA ga nA ga drag phob/ phob phob shig shig/ trag mu trag sha kha ka mu ka/ ru lu ru lu ma ti ga/ gro ga gri ging/ ru lu ru lu ma mo ha ri na/

ru lu ru lu tsi ta ma la/ ru lu ru lu phrom hril shar phob b+h+yo// sngags sbrel bsnyen bsgrub bzhi 'bum bzlas par bya// las sbyor 'phar thod zhing gi dkyil du sba// thog 'bebs yul mthar khang ba'i rmang du

sba// ser ba 'bebs na khyi thod klu la mnan// wa spyang phag thod gsum gyis zhing mtha' bskor// thog 'bebs yul mkhar tha mar sba bar bya// sngags 'dis dgra yul ri rtser sbyin bsreg bya// du+u ga ya ni sa ma

ya du ya dgra ra ma shwa shwa ri ri raM raM tsag tsag swA hA// ra rog rta nag khrag dang so bya'i spu// bsreg nas thal 'jim gtor ma btab pa'i sngags// b+haM ga du ru/ yo ga dag/ nga rar la ni/ ye se ma to hi/ a ru ga ta/

sa lo ba mahur e se rtse ta/ si ta da re co dang dgra bo'i lo ga si tang kha si ting kha// thal 'jim gtor ma zor du 'phang ba'i sngags// 'od pa yul mkhar dag la brdeg par bya// nr-i kha la yak+sha zor/ snying khrag kha

bu yuM bu mA ra ya bzor/ ku+u na ma pra ti bzor/ da ra tsakra bzor/ dgra bo'i lo thog la tres ma ya phaT/ gza' rgod btsan thabs dbab pa'i sngags// rgyu ba'i dus dang bstun la dang ma/ oM su byi du dza ba sa sna si

b+h+yo/ ra mi 'ur bur 'ur bur 'ur ru/ chem chem sa ma ya bra sa ra du// sngags 'dis rang la 'khris na bzlog pa dang// ser lam bstan pa'i sngags su bzlas// oM guM ruNi baM ril baM ril/ du ru rbad/ du ru rbad/

dgra bo'i lo la b+h+yo/ ser 'bebs 'khor lo bzhi la bur pa bzhi// zur bzhi hom la dbus su thun snod gzhag/ rta nag khrag dang nyung nag thun la bsgrub/ a ti yaM ti de ma rak+sha la/ nyis 'bum ha sri 'bum la a
kro 'bum// bsnyen pa rgyun sngags dbab par shes par bya// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gzan la 'bebs pa'i rgyud las/ gnod sbyin zangs thogs gzan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ging gi ser ba dbab pa 'di gsungs so// khyi dkar sna dmar thod pa ru// ra dkar rta dkar bya dkar khrag/ nyung dkar blug ste bshos bus mchod// rta lag

g.yas g.yon sngags bris te// tri sha ru tra badzra sA d+hu sa ma ya/ phrom hril shar phob/ badzra sA d+hu a tri sems pa dza du/ khroM hril shar phob/ ma su rak+sha khal 'ur 'ur hril hril phob/ 'bum du bzlas nas las la

sbyar// rta lag g.yas pa ri rtser sba// rta lag g.yon pa ri thang mtshams// khyi thod 'ong sar zhing dkyil sba// badzra sA d+hu sa ma \u0f84ya/ hri tri na ga sa myags phob/ a tri sems pa dza yaM/ hri ga nags myags phob/ zhes pa
ging gi ser ba 'bebs// zhes gsungs pa las// 'khor rnams dgyes nas ston pa la bstod pa/ sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa la// gsung ni sprul pa cir yang snang// thugs ni chos sku dri ma

med// sku gsum dag la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod nas 'khor rnams sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs/ ye shes kyi 'khor rnams rjes su yi rang ngo// bcom ldan 'das nyid chos sku skye ba med
pa'i ngang du bzhugs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gzan la 'bebs pa'i rgyud las/ ging gi dregs pa gzan la 'bebs pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa
gzan 'bebs kyi rgyud rdzogs so// pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ kha che A nan tas bsgyur ba'o//// rgya gar skad du/ shrI pad+ma ma hA wa shaM duSh+ta nir+Ni ya tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal pad+ma

dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud ces bya ba lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he ru ka rgyal ba kun gyi spyi

gzugs can de ni/ de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnam par dag pa bde ba chen po la bzhugs te/ mkha' 'gro ma kham rgya mo drug dang/ byang chub sems dpa' don mdzad pa'i long ba brgyad/

dpa' bo chen po dmus long 'khor ba drug cu dang// gdug pa 'dul ba za byed dpal gyi khyi brgyad dang// ye shes sprul pa'i khyi bcu dang/ pho nya sgo ba chen po bzhi dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas yum

pad+ma gzi ldan mas glu 'dis bskul lo// oM shes rab chos dbyings stong pa'i ngang nyid du// thabs mchog snying rje ye shes chen por shar// stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can gyi sku// chos sku dri ma med pa'i byin rlabs
las// longs sku sras dang btsun mo gzhal yas khang// longs spyod phun sum tshogs pas sa chen 'dul// thugs rje'i sprul pa sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'gyed// mdzad pa bcu gnyis 'gro don rdzogs par

mdzad// zhi ba'i gdul byar ma gyur dregs pa can// khro bo'i sku yis thul la bstan pa srung// zhes rdo rje'i glus rnam par bskul lo// de nas yab kyis glu 'di 'gro ba'i ched du blangs so// oM don dam skye ba med

pa 'das pa'i chos// kun rdzob sgyu mar snang ba 'khor ba'i chos// kun rdzob don dam dbyer med chos kyi sku// 'khor ba ma spangs 'das pa bsgrub tu med// chos sku dri ma med pa'i snying po 'di// 'khor dang mya ngan
'das pa'i chos skur snang// de nyid gtan la dbab phyir rgyal ba rnams// dbang po bsam pa dgongs pa tha dad med// ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams chos skur gcig/ de las ma gtogs gsang ba'i nges don
med// rang sems gzung 'dzin gnyis bral dri med pa// de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos sku yin// de las ma gtogs chos sku gzhan nas 'tshol// bya long nam mkha'i mtha' la rtsad gcod
'dra// oM chos sku mthong bar dka' ba'i gdul bya rnams// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dul don du// gnas la ming btags 'og min chen po ru// ston pa rgyal ba rigs lnga longs spyod rdzogs// sems
dpa' sems ma nye ba'i sras kyis bskor// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la// dgongs pa brda' yis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// shes bya'i sgrib dag chos kyi sku la sbyor// longs sku'i 'dul bar

ma gyur 'gro drug la// sprul sku'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis don mdzad pa// lha yi yul la babs nas lhums su zhugs// lum+bi'i 'tshal du lhums nas sku yang bltam// ang+ga ma g+har gzhon nu'i rol rtsed mdzad// ri bo

khab can yul du khab tu bzhes// me ne ya yi yul du rab tu byung// chu bo nai ra'i 'gram du dka' thub mdzad// ba ra Na sir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'khor mo 'jig tu bdud kyi bar chad btul// rgyal po'i pho

brang cho 'phrul chen po bstan// rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par sangs rgyas nas// gyad yul sa la shing rtsar mya ngan 'das// grong khyer rtswa mchog dag tu sku gdung bgos// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs
pa gnad la 'bebs pa'i rgyud las/ sku gsum gyi don gnad la phab ste bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sku
gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pas bshad gyur pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po la sogs rgyud rnams kyi// bshad tshul man ngag khong nas gab pa phyung// ma 'ongs 'gro ba rnams la nges par gsungs// zhes gsungs
so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rnams la// bshad pa'i rgyan ni rnam pa bdun// gleng bslangs pa yi grangs ni lnga// sangs rgyas pa yi tshul yang

bzhi// rgyas par bshad pa'i mtha' yang drug/ bshad pa'i tshul ni rnam pa bzhi// dbye ba'i bshad pa rim pa gnyis// snod kyi gang zag rnam pa lnga// bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par nges// spyir bsdus nyi shu rtsa brgyad

kyis// gsang sngags rgyud kyi rnam bshad bya// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// gleng bslang ba yi grangs lnga ni// rgyud kyi ming ni gang btags mtshan// 'khor ba'i sems can don du gsungs// ston pa gzugs sku rnam pa

gnyis// ldang tshad cho ga le'u dum bu rim// dgos ched thun mong mchog tu bsgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas pa yi tshul bzhi ni// rgyud dang gling bzhi nges tshig rgyu// de yang 'dod chags spang ma spangs// 'dod chags
bcas nas sangs rgyas bzhi// rgyud ni lha lus rigs lnga bsgom// gling bzhi rigs lnga gcig gyur pa// nges tshig rdo rje la sogs gsungs// rgyu ni sgeg pa la sogs spyod// 'dod chags spangs pa'i
tshul yang bzhi// rgyud ni mi lus skye ba la// gleng gzhi rab tu byung ba nyid// nges tshig 'dul ba'i sdom pa blangs// rgyu ni 'bras bus sangs rgyas 'dod// rgyas par bshad pa'i mtha' drug ni// drang

don dang ni nges don gnyis// dgongs bshad dgongs pa ma yin bshad// ji bzhin sgra dang ji bzhin min// drang ba'i don ni bshad pa ni// skal ngan sbas bshad drang don du// thun mong dngos grub 'dod rnams la// mtshan
bcas bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan// nges pa'i don du bshad pa ni// yang dag don ston nges pa'i don// nye lam dga' mchog 'dod pa la// de la rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan// bskyed rim rdzogs rim 'di gnyis
ni// don gyi mtha' la brten pa'o// de yang ji ltar yin zhe na// ting 'dzin gsum las gzhal yas gdan// sku bskyod spyan drang mchod phul bsgrub// ro langs rkang mgyogs mig sman sogs// skyes bu'i sems

la ci 'dod rnams// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa bsgom pas bsgrub// sdug bsngal nyid kyang byang chub la// 'khor ba nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// sgrib pa gnyis na mngon sangs rgyas// nges don de la 'dud par

byos// dgongs pas bshad par bya ba ni// dbang po rnon po'i rigs la ni// rig pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yis// shes rab can gyi gang zag rnams// nga rgyal bcag par bya ba'i phyir// dbang po rnon po la dgongs
nas// 'gal ba'i tshig gis don ston bshad// rgyal ba rnams kyis de ltar dgongs// dgongs pa ma yin bshad pa ni// dbang po dman pa'i gang zag la// gsal bar ston pa dgongs min tshig/ dngos bral

'od gsal zung du 'jug/ dbang po rno brtul dgongs pa ni// 'di gnyis tshig gi mtha' la brten// de yang ji ltar brten zhe na// pha dang khu bo mes po dang// bu dang spun dang mdza' bo rnams// zhe sdang sems

kyis bsad byas na// rdo rje rigs kyi zhing du 'gyur// chos rnams kun gyi de kho na// rang bzhin gyi ni 'od gsal te// bden gnyis yang dag zung du 'jug/ dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'o// sgra ni ji bzhin

bshad pa ni// rang gi sgra yis ston pa yang// dkyil 'khor mchod bstod dam tshig spyod// sgra ni ji bzhin ston pa'o// ji bzhin ma yin bshad pa ni// sgra gzhan dag gis rab ston te// 'jig rten bstan bcos
dag la med// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yin// ji bzhin yin dang ma yin sgra// don tshig gnyis ka'i mtha' la brten// de yang ji ltar bstan ce na// dkyil 'khor dag tu gzhug par bya// dbang blang
dam tshig mi nyams bsrung// mchod pa gtor mas lha mnyes bya// yi dam zhal phyag gsal ba yis// mnyam gzhag rjes la spyod pas kyang// kro ta yaM dang sha ka yaM// k+Sha ta yaM gi sa bon can// lus

la rlung lngar rab tu gnas// bshad pa'i tshul bzhi bstan pa yang// tshig gi don du bshad pa ni// chos kun mkhas pas sgra tsam la// mkhas pa tshig gi don yin te// yi ge 'bru gnyer gsal sbyar na// tshig la ma

rmongs tshig mtha' yas// de dang nas ni 'byed pa'i tshig/ sa dang can gyi ldan pa'i tshig/ yang dang kyang ni brnan pa'i tshig/ ste ni lhag ma can gyi tshig/ 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa la// la ni bgar nas ston pa
sogs// phyi yi don du bshad pa ni// mdo la bzhugs nas 'gyod pa bzlog/ sngags la bzhugs na bskyed rim bsgom// sbas te bshad par bya ba ni// tshogs par mi dbyung phyir sbas gsum// 'dod chags dag

gi chos sbas pa// de ni gsang dbang snying po yin// kun rdzob chos kyi sbas pa yang// shes bya nang gyur snying po yin// ye shes sbas pas snying po yin// ye shes kun brtags ma yin pas// rnam par brtags pa'i
snying po yod// mthar thug don du bshad pa yin// 'od gsal gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis// zung 'jug sku ru chos kyi gnas// nyan bshad dbye ba rnam pa gnyis// tshogs pa rnams la bshad pa ni// ji bzhin sgra

dang dgongs min dang// drang don spyi don yi ge'i don// slob ma rnams la bshad pa ni// spra ni ji bzhin ma yin dang// nges don dgongs te bshad pa dang// sbas bshad mthar thug don rnams bshad// snod kyi

gang zag rnam lnga ni// ut+pal lta bu'i gang zag ni// sbrang rtsi mang ltar chos mang thos// sbrang rtsi 'dzin ltar 'dzin pa mkhas// sbrang rtsi yal skyin brjed nas 'gro// pad dkar lta bu'i gang zag ni// sbrang mas chos

mang thos pa yang// sbrang rtsi 'dzin ltar ston mi nus// sbrang mas sbrang rtsi blang dka' ltar// bum nang ras bal lta bu'o// pad+ma dmar po lta bu ni// yid du 'ong ltar dad par ldan// pad+ma kha dog dmar ba ltar// snying

rje dang ni shes rab che// pad+ma nyin mo kha 'byed ltar// thos nas blo kha bye ba dang// sbrang rtsi mi thub 'dzags pa ltar// tshig don mi 'dzin brjed nas 'gro// tsan dan lta bu'i gang zag ni// sdong po chung ltar thos pa

nyung// dri dang ldan pas nga rgyal che// rtsa phra yal ga lo 'dab rgyas// rtsa ba med par mang du smra// dug sbrul 'khril pas blang mi nus// rjes su gzung bar mi nus so// 'gyod shing can gyi tsan dan yin// rin chen

lta bu'i gang zag ni// nor bu rang bzhin dag pa ltar// dam tshig tshul khrims dag pa dang// gzhan don byed cing gzhan mi gnod// de bzhin 'dzin la mkhas pa dang// ci 'dod 'byung ltar shes rab ldan// nor
bus 'gro don byed pa ltar// rgyud gcig thos nas legs par ston// bden pa'i dgongs pa gnyis pa ni// bskyed rim sgyu lus kun rdzob bden// 'od gsal don dam bden pa'o// rnal 'byor
rgyud rnams mdzes pa yi// rgyan bdun gsal ba'i lde mig ni// rgyud rnams 'byed cing 'grol bar byed// ces gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad la 'bebs pa'i rgyud las/ rgyun gyi bshad tshul
gnad 'bebs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis// 'di skad gsol ba rab tu btab// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag rnams// bshad pa'i tshul ni de ltar na// rnal 'byor
dbang phyug chen po rnams// bskyed rdzogs nyams su ji ltar blang// bdag cag rnams la gsang sgo phye// 'gro ba'i don du legs par gsungs// zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dbang po
yang rab rnal 'byor la bskyed pa'i dus nas rdzogs pa ste/ rtag pa'i mtha' las rab grol nas// bsod nams tshogs kyang rdzogs pa yin// gzugs kyi sku yang 'thob par byed// rdzogs pa'i dus nas bskyed

pa ste// chad pa'i mtha' las grol byas nas// ye shes tshogs kyang rdzogs par byed// chos sku dri ma med par 'thob// dbang po 'bring dang tha ma la// lus kyi sgrib pa byang ba'i phyir// bskyed pa'i rim pa brtan

par bsgom// ngag gi bsags pa sbyong ba ni// bzlas pa'i grangs kyang rgyun mi gcad// yid kyi dran pa spang ba'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bzang po bsgom// bskyed pa'i rim pa gnyis yod de// zhi bar bsgom
dang khro bor bsgyur// rigs gnyis lung gis brgyud pas na// rdo rje'i rigs dang pad+ma bsgom// bcom ldan dpal mchog rdo rje sems// sku gsum lhun grub dbu gsum ni// mthing ga dkar gsal pad+ma

dmar// rgyud drug rtsad gcod ye shes drug/ rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma g.yas// dril bu rin chen ral gri g.yon// rnam pa thams cad mchog rab ldan// thams cad rgyan ni ma lus rdzogs// pad+ma rin chen gar gyi
dbang// zhal gsum phyag drug dga' mdangs brjid// dbus kyi sku mdog dkar dmar mdangs// g.yas sngo g.yon ser brjid pa'i zhal// pad+ma rdo rje rtse gsum mda' ni g.yas// bum pa dpal be'u gzhu ni

g.yon// rin chen sna tshogs na bza' mdzes// yum ni pad dril dmar po'i khril// khro bor gyur pa rigs lnga dbang chen sku// sku yi dbang chen dmar po dbu lnga pa// rta mgo lnga dang gshog bzhi zhabs brgyad

pa// shar du rol pa'i phyag bzhi ni// khro chen snying 'byin kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags// lho ru rol pa'i phyag bzhi ni// thod khrag rdo rje lu gu rgyud// gshin rje'i bo con rde'u chung g.yon// nub tu rol

pa'i phyag bzhi ni// me yi zhags pa khyung gi khra// sdigs mdzub me chen kha T+wAM ga/ byang du rol pa'i phyag bzhi ni// rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga dang// rtse gsum dang ni rtse gcig 'bar// gsung gi dbang chen

dbu lnga dmar// rta gdong lnga ldan gshog pa bzhi/ bcu drug phyag na bsnams pa ni// rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bur bcas// lcags kyu sbrul dang zhags pa dang// 'khor lo rin chen zur brgyad dang// ral gri rdo rje lu gu

rgyud// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni/ pad+ma yu 'dzin thod khrag bkang// khro snying gshin rje'i dbyug pa thog/ rgya gram rdo rje be con dang/ me long tri shUl khyung gi khra/ g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa'o// zhabs

brgyad khro bo 'das pa mnan// thugs kyi dbang chen dbu lnga pa// dmar po rta mgo ljang gu lnga// g.yas kyi phyag brgyad phyag mtshan ni// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul zhags dang// cang te'u kha T+wAM thod rlon khrag/ rdo rje rtse

dgu rtse lnga dang// rtse gsum dang ni rtse gcig bsnams// g.yon gyi phyag brgyad bsnams pa ni// rdo rje lcags kyu lu gu rgyud// thon rlon khro bo brgyad kyi snying// me yi zhags pa khyung gi khra// sdigs mdzub rtse la me

chen 'bar// cang te'u kha T+wAM lcags kyu bsnams// gshog bzhi zhabs brgyad khro bo mnan// pad+ma gsang ba zhes bya ba// rnal 'byor kun gyi bsgom par bya// yon tan dbang chen dbu lnga pa// dmar po rta mgo ljang

zhur lnga// gshog bzhi zhags brgyad bcu drug phyag/ g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// gau rI'i phyag na rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams// gnyis pa tsau rI sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams// gsum pa pra mo ha ni rnge'u chung

bsnams// bzhi pa bet+tA lI ni b+han+d+ha bsnams// lnga pa puk+ka rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams// drug pa tsan+d+ha rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// bdun pa sma sha rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams// brgyad pa g+hasma rdo rje rtse gcig bsnams// g.yon gyi

phyag na bsnams pa ni// sing ha mu kha rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams// gcig pa bya g+h+rI phyag na me dpung bsnams// gsum pa shwa na mu kha lcags sgrogs bsnams// bzhi ba sr-iM gA la ni thod khrag bsnams// lnga pa gr-i D+h+ra

snying chen bsnams// drug pa kang ka kha T+wAM bsnams// bdun pa kA ka cang te'u bsnams// brgyad pa u lU lcags kyu bsnams// gshog bzhi zhabs brgyad khro bo gdan// phrin las dbang chen dbu lnga dmar// rta

mgo ljang gu lnga dang ldan// gshog bzhi phyag ni bcu drug na// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul zhags dang// mu stegs mgo dang kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga dang// rtse gsum rtse gcig g.yas na bsnams// rdo rje lcags kyu

sdigs mdzub me// thod khrag lha chen brgyad kyi snying// gshin rje'i dbyug pa lcags kyu dang// rnge'u chung yu ba kha T+wAM ga/ g.yon gyi phyag na rnam par bsnams// bzlas pa'i sngags ni rab gsungs pa// oM pad+ma ma hA

shrI he ru ka ma hA tsan d+ha sarba duSh+tAn/ ta ka ha na pa tsa hUM hUM phaT/ sku'i sngags so// oM pad+ma si ta si ta ha he tsakra b+h+yo b+h+yo hUM hUM phaT/ gsung gi sngags so// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM a ra li hUM

hrIHdza/ thugs kyi sngags so// oM hri ha ha hUM hUM phaT/ yon tan gyi sngags so// hrI di ma da ri h+ya g+h+rI ba e ka dza TI hu lu hu lu hrIHdzaHdzaH/ phrin las rta mgrin gyi sngags so// na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra nan/ oM

hUM hUM hUM/ ta ru la bi ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+ha ta ka dz+wa li ta bi sdu ling+ga aT+Tar T+Tar hA sa nA da sa hI ta/ ka pa ri sa ho ba taM ad de ba badzra khu ra g+ha ta na/ tsa ta ba su d+ha tA la ni/ shwA sa ma ru twa uSh+kiSha p+ta d+ha ra ni d+ha ra/ bi Sha

na a T+Ta hA sa/ a pa ra mi tA/ ba la ba rA kra ma/ Ar+ya ga Na b+hi ta/ bud+d+ha gu Na bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ ha ya grI ba kha da kha da pa ra man+t+rA nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da sid ti mi ri sha/ a be sha ya sarba dz+wa ra/ bi sha tsI naM/ sarba gra he Sh+wa pra ti ha to

b+ha ba ba gi nan/ badzra daMSh+t+ri giny+tsi mA ya si/ i daM duSh+ta gra ha Na duSh+ta sarba b+ha d+hu na d+hu na/ mA tha mA tha/ ma rda ma rda/ ba ta ba ta/ ba ta ya ba ta ya/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ bud+d+ha d+harma/ sang+ga a nu dz+nyA na/ kar+yi gu ru/ shri gra na ha ya g+h+rI

bA phaT/ badzra ya phaT/ badzra ga rA ya phaT/ badzra na tre ya phaT/ badzra daM shA ya phaT/ badzra khu rA ya phaT/ badzra khu ra nir+g+ha ta nA ya phaT/ ba ra man tra bi nA shA ya phaT/ trai lo kya b+ha yaM sha ra ya phaT/ sarba karme shwa rA pa ti ha

tA ya phaT/ badzra ku la san tra sa nA ya phaT/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ khro bo rta'i rgyal po thams cad kyi phrin las dpal gyi phreng sngags so// dpal pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ sku
dang sngags kyis log 'dren can thams cad gnad la 'bebs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sems nyid rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon

tan dang phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo// swa bas sa yi khams yin te// khu bas chu yi khams su 'dod// dro bas me yi khams yin te// rgyu bas rlung du rab tu grags// mi shigs thig ler gsung pa ste// de bas

nam mkha'i khams yin no// reg pa las ni lha mo spyan// dro bas gos dkar mo zhes bya// chu ni mA la kI zhes bya// 'gro bas rlung du rab tu grags// bde bas rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// thig le kun snang bde skyong
ma// bde chen bde ba chen po ni// skad cig tsam du nyams myong bas// 'phral du yid ches byed pa ste// log rtog ma lus mthong 'gog pa'o// dngos dang dngos po log rtog dag/ bkag nas rnam par mi rtog
pas// bskal pa stong phrag du mar yang// gnas nas ye shes sbyor bar byed// cung zad cung zad bsgom byas pas// gong nas gong du khyad par 'gro// mthar ni mi rtog ting 'dzin dag/ lhun gyis grub pa thob
par 'gyur// ma rtog ting 'dzin la gnas nas// dpa' bo dang ni dpa' mo rnams// ring na bzhugs kyang gzigs 'gyur te// don kun 'grub par byed pa'o// dga' dang dga' bral dag gi

dbus// mtshan nyid dmigs la bstan byas pas// thun nam zla byed zla ba lo// bskal par ye shes che la sbyor// mi rtog pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// sgrib pa lnga spangs lhun grub pa'i// bde ba chen po mngon byas
nas// stobs sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// 'di ni sems can ma lus la// spyi pa'i don du bshad pa'o// ston ka'i dri med nam mkha' la// zla ba 'od zer kun snang ltar// gzung 'dzin spang ba'i ye shes
ni// bdag gzhan snang gsal byed pa'o// ston ka'i sprin med nam mkha' la// nyi ma'i 'od zer shar ba ltar// thabs kyi ye shes gnyis pa'o// don dang sems can bcas snang byed// spros med mkha' dang mun

lta bu// snang byed ye shes bsgoms byas pas// rang rig tsam las grub pa yi// sgyu ma'i lus 'di len par byed// rang bzhin tsam du 'od gsal ba'i// rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam shes kyis// chu zla 'dra ba'i
gzugs med pa'i// chags med lus ni 'grub par 'gyur// yid kyi lus dang ldan pa yi// rnal 'byor pa yis khams gsum du// bdag dang gzhan gyi don byas nas// mthar ni rang gnas bde bar 'gro// sgyu
ma'i lus la ltos byas nas// ril por 'dzin dang rjes gzhig gis// dngos po thams cad bshigs nas ni// de nas snang ba med par 'gro// thogs pa med par thabs kyi ye shes kyis// snang ba thams cad

nub byas nas// rang snang tsam la'ang chags med pa'i// snang ba med pa'i dbyings su 'gro// bdag dang gzhan du rtog pa yi// rnam rtog dra ba bsal ba ni// mtha' med dmigs pa med pa ru// snang ba med pa'i

tshul du 'gro// snang ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// snang ba tsam yang 'dzin spangs te// yang dang yang du don dam pa'i// bden pa mngon du byas pas 'gro// sgyu ma lta bu'i lus kyi 'bad med par// 'dod pa chags
bcad nam mkha' las// 'bad pa med par rnyed 'gyur te// bdag dang gzhan rnams bde bar 'tsho// yid kyi lus tshad bzung nas ni// bdag dang gzhan gyi don 'grub cing// dmigs pa thams cad zad byed
par// 'gro med gnas su nam zhig 'gro// 'dis ni 'gro ba sangs rgyas par// drang phyir sbas pa'i don du bshad// dang po sa ni chu la thim// chu yang me la thim par 'gyur// me yang rlung la thim par
'gyur// rlung yang rnam par shes la 'jug/ rnam shes gzung ba de dag ni// 'od gsal bar ni 'jug par 'gyur// stobs chen po la sogs pa yi// che ba'i yon tan rnam brgyan pa// bden gnyis sbyor ba zung
'jug sku// bde ba chen po de thob 'gyur// mkha' 'dra'i chos sku stong pa la// rtog med ye shes mkha' 'dra ba// tshogs dang smon lam stobs dag gis// 'bad pa med par lhun gyis grub// zung du
'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// nyon mongs pa yi sgrib pa dag/ bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams spangs shing// phun sum tshogs pa thob 'gyur te// gang du rnam par thar pa yi// 'dod pa tsam gyi 'gro 'ong
lding// 'ja' 'dra'i longs spyod rdzogs sku las// 'bad pa med par sprul pa'i sku// mtha' yas rdul bral ji bzhin par// sems can don kun 'grub par mdzad// gang dang gang gis 'dul gyur pa// de de
bzhin du so sor snang// mos pa'i snang ba tha dad par// sems can rnams ni 'dul bar 'gyur// lhun grub bde ba chen po'i sku// rang snang rig mas nyar brgyan pa// 'og min gnas su dus rtag tu// mtshan
dang dpe byad brgyan pas bzhugs// yid bzhin nor ltar bsams tsam gyis// 'bad med bdag dang gzhan gyi don// che ba'i yon tan rnam brgyan sku// bde ba che las 'byung bar 'gyur// rang snang rlung dang
ldan pa'i lus// 'ja' tshon bzhin du mtha' med pa// stong pa gsum la goms dbang gis// thogs pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di ni 'gro rnams sangs rgyas phyir// mthar thug pa yi don du bshad// ces
gsungs so// dpal pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ phyi spyi'i don dang nang sbas pa'i don dang gsang ba mthar thug don du bshad pa sems rdzogs pa'i rim par gtan la 'bebs pa'i
gnad 'bebs pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o//// de nas pad+ma he ru kas he ru ka'i gnas bcu la gzigs pa 'di gsungs so// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang gnyis// yul dang nye ba'i yul dang gnyis// zhing

dang nye ba'i zhing dang gnyis// dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod gnyis// tshan+do nye ba'i tshan+do gnyis// phyogs bcu rnams su gzigs par gyur// de nas pad+ma he ru kas// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad du gzigs pa

'di gsungs so// shar na dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal// shar lhor dur khrod lhun gyis grub// lho na dur khrod sku la rdzogs// lho nub dur khrod gsang chen rol// nub na dur khrod pad+ma brtsegs// nub byang dur khrod

he chen rol// dur khrod khu byug klong dgu byang// byang shar dur khrod 'jig rten skyong// de nas pad+ma he ru kas// khro bo gar dgus 'dul mdzad de// lha chen gzhon nu gdong drug gis// lha min ba su ka ra
bsad// de la dpa' bor mtshan btags pas// de bcom dpa' bo he ru ka/ dbang phyug chen po 'khyud nyams sgeg/ de bcom sku la yum 'khril sgeg/ khyab 'jug phag seng 'jigs gzugs nyams// de bcom
he ru ka 'jigs rung// sku yi gar gsum bstan pa ni// sku la tshor ba bde sdug nub// tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs rta skad rgod// de bcom rtags su zhal g.yas bzhad// tshogs kyi bdag po glang

sna gshe// de bcom zhal g.yon khro bar bshad// sgra gcan nyi zla khar mid rngam// de bcom dbus kyi zhal dmar rngam// gsung gi gar gsum bstan pa ni// gsung la tshor ba bde sdug nub// brgya byin lag na rdo

rje thogs// lha rnams snying rje'i sems kyi skyong// de bcom pas ni snying rje mdzad// klu chen se sha tsa ra yis// 'gre ldog byas pas sa 'gul byung// de bcom klu brgyan ngo mtshar che// me lhas stong gsum me yis
bshig/ de bcom me dpung dbus na bzhugs// thugs kyi gar gsum bstan pa ni// thugs la tshor ba bde sdug nub// de nas pad+ma he ru kas dpal gyi rta skad kyis phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can btul

lo// dngas ma'i bdud rtsi khyab 'jug gza' yis 'thungs// phyag rdor 'khor los lus kyang dum bu brgyad// snyigs ma dug tu gyur te gnod sel phyir// spyan ras sku khros mgur du thim pa ni// khro bo mdog sngon

gdug pa ma lus 'dul// lo rgyus don gyis phyi rabs yin ches bshad// snod kyi 'jig rten lcags ri nag po'i nang// phyi yi rgya mtsho zho las dkrug pa'i mar// ri rab srub shing klu sbrul srub thag bcas// rgyal
chen sde bzhis rab tu dkrugs pa las// tshangs pa'i gsung gis chos 'khor bskul ma 'debs// de 'dul gsung dbyangs drug cu tshangs pa'i skad// 'jig rten 'khor bar yun ring gnas nas kyang// rta mchog
rin chen yid bsring 'gro don mdzad// cang shes rta yis myur du bgrod pa ltar// 'gro drug 'khor ba'i gnas nas 'dren par mdzad// de ni 'gro ba lam 'dir gzhug pa'i phyir// gdul byar bshad pas 'gro ba
'dul bar byed// gti mug can dang nga rgyal can// 'dod chags can dang phrag dog can// zhi ba'i las dang rgyas pa'i las// dbang dang drag pos 'dul bar ston// ljang gu drag po dmar po dbang// ser po

rgyas pa dkar po zhi// rta gdong phrin las bzhi mdzad pas// rta mgo la yang rigs bzhi'i mdog/ gdul bya ma lus thams cad kun// 'dul phyir phrin las dag tu bshad// zhal nas rta skad sgra sgrogs pas// pheM

pheM hriM sogs gsang sngags 'dren// rta yi skad ces bya ba yang// rta zhal gsung du sgrogs pa'o// brda' dang rta skad 'gying skad gsum// rnal 'byor dgongs pas ma shes skyon// thugs dam mi 'khrul dbang mi

'dus// dgra bgegs mi thul skyon du 'gyur// rnal 'byor gang gis rta skad kyi// dgod pa don ldan shes pa ni// thugs rjes bzhengs dang khas blangs dran// phrin las skad cig yud la 'grub// de phyir rta skad
dgongs pa zab// lus ngag yid gsum sku gsum nyid// dug lnga ye shes lngar sgrol nas// gang gis gdeng gyur rnal 'byor rab// mi zhes byas kyang sangs rgyas yin// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal
yas dbyings// bcud kyi sems can ye shes lha// 'brel pas bde chen sras su rigs// rnal 'byor 'bring gi dgongs pa'o// lus nyid lha la ngag nyid sngags// sems nyid chos nyid tha ma'o// mya ngan 'das

pa'i chos rnams kun// rten du gyur pas chos kyi sku// rang bzhin skye med brda' sprod go/ de nyid chos sku'i gsung yin no// longs sku dgongs pa brda' yi gsungs// me long nang gi byad lta bu// gtso bo'i sku la
bltas pa yis// rang gi shes bya'i sgrib pa dag/ de nas chos sku'i sa ru 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' mngon sangs rgyas// sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing// thams cad

sa ru gnas pas na// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo che// oM ni rnam par brjid pa'i sku// AHni smra brjod 'byung bas gsung// hUM ni 'dod dgur mkhyen pas thugs// rgyal ba'i zhing khams 'di yis skyong// tshangs

pa'i lha yi gsung bzhin du// srin po 'dul yang skyon ma gos// dper na me tog pad+ma skyes// 'dam gyi skyon gyis ga la gos// de nyid grogs su gyur pa ste// 'dam med pad+ma gang las skye// ri rab rtse ni lha gnas

te// ri rab khong seng lha min yul// gling bzhir mi gnas mtho ris gsum// phyi yi rgya mtsho dud 'gro la// grong khyer ser skya yi dwags nyid// rdo rje gdan 'og dmyal ba'i gnas// kun gyi skad du chos ston
pas// thugs rje'i rta skad rigs drug 'dul// lus ngag yid kyi brda' sprad na// pho mo mthun pa'i dpe bzhin shes// dper na khwa tas gzan mthong ltar// ma dang mkha' 'gro 'grub nas byon// ma mo mkha'
'gro la sogs la// mthun pa'i sha khrag gtor ma 'bul// las bzhi'i phrin las bcol bar bya// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang// skyon dang yon tan rang bzhin bshad// rta
yi 'gros dgu bstan pa yang// dpung lag sgrog 'gros lha dang mi// gdol pa lcags bcug nyan thos 'dra// pho nya srun 'gros rang sangs rgyas// 'jab tshe gzengs ni mdo sde nyid// gom bu myol 'gros kri ya

ba// spyang mo mdul 'gros yo ga nyid// rol mo'i stabs pa ma hA yin// mjal mo dkyus 'gro a nu ste// dkyus su tshar 'gros a ti la// rta yi 'gros ni dgur bstan pas// pad+ma dbang chen rta gdong zhal// rta
skad dgongs par 'dus pas gsungs// khams gsum dbang du sdud par byed// 'khor 'das dbang gi skur rdzogs la// theg pa'i rim pa rtogs pas na// dpe dang don du bshad pa'o// zhes gsungs
so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ rta skad kyi dgongs pa he ru ka'i gnas bcu dang/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad na gnas pa rnams/ he ru ka'i gnas bcu na gar
dgu mdzad de/ 'jig rten dregs pa can rnams 'dul bar gnad la phab pa ste le'u lnga pa'o//// de nas dregs pa can ma lus pa'i srog gnad la 'bebs pa rnams gsungs so// 'di ni lho phyogs pha

rol gyi// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das// sprin dang na bun tshu rol na// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das kyi// sa mtshams lho phyogs gyad kyi yul// bla mtsho nag po'i nang shed na// nyin bzhin bskal pa'i
rlung nag 'tshubs// mtshan bzhin 'jig dus me ltar 'bar// thod pa lcags kyi grong khyer na// gson gshin gnyis kyi zam kha na// gson po skos la 'debs par byed// shi ba rnams kyi gshin rje byed// dge

byed rnams kyi stong 'dzin cing// sdig pa can gyi chad pa mkhan// dam nyams khram la 'debs byed cing// dam tshig can gyi grogs la brtson// chos rgyal gshin rje zhes bya ba// mngon shes rdzu 'phrul byin rlabs
can// ag tse'i phyogs na gnas bcas pa// nag po seng dgong ral pa can// srog pa rtsa la 'khor lo bskor// rgyungs pa dkar la rta dkar rgyug/ rak+ta dmar la rab tu 'jib// rnam par shes pa hub gyis

'debs// skye 'gro'i dbugs la sbar zin byed// 'chi bdag be b+ha swa ta'i 'khor// gshin rje'i bye ba sa ma ya// snying dang klad pa rtsa la rgyug/ srog gi dbang po'i bdag po byed// 'chi ba'i bdag pos gsad

pa'i thabs/ sngags pa gshin rje'i chas su zhugs// rabs chad ag tse nag po la// 'chi bdag gzugs bris dgra dang sbyar// brag phug lhor blta'i nang gnas la// skye tshe skye ba zi ra dang// tsha dang thal chen

nyung dkar dug/ phyi ma'i sbyor bas klad khug brab// dgra bo'i steng du babs pa dang// de ma thag tu 'chi bar nges// oM ya ma rA tsa nr-i sha ku ru rbad/ thum ril rbad/ mA ra ya che ge mo snying phyung

rbad phaT/ rngubs hril rbad sod/ rbad che ge mo mA ra ya rbad// 'chi bdag rgyal po'i mod mo'i sngags// rnal 'byor man ngag gdeng ldan pas// zhag bdun mi smra smra bcad bzlas// sha za khrag 'thung nges par rgyug/ khrag zad sogs
kyis mnar gyur nas// dbugs kyis bor nas 'pho bar 'gyur// 'chi bdag gshin rje b+ha swa ta'i dmod mos gsad pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// dus gsum bde gshegs kun gyi yum// srid pa'i dam can kun gyi

ma// lha srin sde brgyad rje mo ste// mkha' la srog gi mnga' mdzad ma// srid pa'i dbang chen ma yis mdzad// lha dang bdud dang gnod sbyin te// mi srun pa rnams ma mos bskyed// de phyir srid pa'i khams 'dir
ni// skye 'gro'i srog la dbang chen ma// ma mo rnams kyi rgyal mo ni// e ka dza ti gsang ba'i yum// dbu gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis bgrad// smug nag ral bas sa gzhi khebs// ral pa

sbrugs pa'i skra gseb nas// pho nya drug cu rtsa brgyad 'gyed// nam mkha'i klong nas ma mo ni// las byed stong dang rtsa brgyad 'gyed// mche ba'i bar na za byed dang// sgrol byed mu kha brgyad rnams 'gyed// smin ma

g.yas g.yon dkyil 'khor nas// gza' bdud brgyad rnams las la 'gyed// rdzi ma 'grugs pa'i byin rlabs las// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'gyed// spyan mig g.yas dang g.yon pa na// nyi ma zla ba'i cho 'phrul
gtong// shangs kyi rlung sgrom 'bar ba las// bskal pa'i rlung nag 'tshubs mar 'khyil// zhal gdangs kha rlangs nag po las// 'ja' tshon sprin phung 'khrigs pa las// nad rigs rnam lnga'i char pa
'bebs// srid pa'i ma mos stong gsum bkang// kha nas ma mo'i dmod sngags bzlos// de yi dbang chen ma tshogs kyis// dam las 'das pa gsang ba'i thabs// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu// ma mo'i

chas su zhugs nas su// mnol gri'i khrag la dmod sngags bzlas// gzugs brnyan steng du drag tu skyom// ma ma sa ya hir hir khrag tu ti bab ti babs che ge mo'i srog 'dril bla 'dril/ i ba thum ma hA pra 'du pra

'du/ sprig sprig ma tsa ru ti hib hib b+h+yo b+h+yo/ zhag bdun bsgrub pa byas nas ni// ma mo'i drag sngags dmod pa 'di// khrag thun dgra bo'i rjes la brdeg/ mod la khrag skyug 'chi bar nges// ma mo'i rdeg sngags de
mod pas// dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i ting 'dzin to// smug nag 'bar ba'i mkhar nang nas// srog bdag bdud pho mi zan te// phag mo zhon nas stong gsum rgyug/ gcer bu+u ral pa mun ltar gtibs// shin tu
'bar ba khrag gi mig/ sna nas mu lung 'tshubs nag 'khyil// za byed chen po'i zhal gdangs nas// glog ltar myur ba'i ljags 'dril zhing// dung gi mche bas mna' zan sgrol// skye 'gro kun gyi dbugs len
byed// zhal nas bdud kyi dmod sngags zlos// bskal pa gsum gyi pha rol na// 'jig rten mun ltar gtibs nas rgyug/ srid pa gsum gyi yang rtse nas// drag po'i thog ltar 'dril zhing mchong// 'gro ba mi la
gnya' zungs byed// dud 'gro phyugs la sbar thebs byed// lcags kyi sbar mos hab thob byed// zangs kyi sen mos glo snying 'bregs// skye 'gro kun gyi srog gcod po// bdud kyi rgyal po'i drag sngags

ni// sngags pa bdud kyi chas su zhugs// bdud rtsi rak+ta sman sbyar te// snang srid srog la bdud dbang bskur// dgra gzugs dug gi lo mar bris// brag nag rtsa ru gtum pos 'dug/ nyung dkar nyung nag thal
chen dang// mngal khrag khyi khrag gzugs la skyom// zhag bdun mi bar mi gcad par// bdud kyi drag sngags rab tu zlos// ru tra ru tra/ su ru su ru/ ti sta ti sta/ ti ri ti ri/ 'ub 'ub dzA dzA/ bdud

nag po tsag gru kA la ru tra mA ra ya/ rtse ram dgra bo'i snying la shog/ lhung ma dgra'i snying la shog/ trag phrom dgra bo'i snying la shog/ zhag bdun dgra bo'i tshe srog 'bral// gal te 'gor nas rtags med
na// bdud kyis snying phyung zos bsam nas// dgra bo'i khyim du gtor byas na// de ma thag tu myags kyis 'gro// bdud kyi drag sngags dmod mos dgra bgegs gdug pa can bsgral ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pho
brang yid 'ong rgya mtsho'i chu// ngo mtshar chu bo bzhi 'babs sa// 'dam bu me tog tshal gyi gling// dug gi na bun sprin 'khrigs nas// dug sbrul ra ba bdun gyis bskor// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas

nang// pad+ma brtsegs pa'i dkyil steng na// chu srin 'bum gyi khri steng na// gdug pa klu yi rgyal po ni// sprul mgo dgu yi gdengs ka can// dgu ka rin chen 'bar bas brgyan// ral pa sbrugs pa'i skra gseb
nas// sdom dang sdig pa char du 'bebs// khro gnyer mgo la sbrul nag 'phro// mthing ga'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'gyed// sbrul nag 'bum gyi dkyil na bzhugs// nag po'i klu rigs grangs med 'khol// ro

nye'i kha nas dmod sngags bzlos// gdug pa'i mdze nad bco brgyad gtong// klu yis dgra bo bsgral ba'i thabs// rgya mtsho'i 'gram du zhag bdun 'dug/ sngags pa klu yi chas su zhugs// kha ra sbang ma tsan+dan

dang// sha rul nya rul khrag rul dang// sbrang rtsi bu ram sgo nga dang// skye tshe sgog pa phye mar btag/ ril bu byas pa brgya rtsa brgyad// ril bu re re'i dkyil du ni// dgrar ming gro gar bris la gzhug/ ril bu re la

drag sngags ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya// nA ga ra tsa sa ma ya dzaH/ nag mo tsit+ta ma rA ya dzaH/ nA ga b+ha ling dung bA dzaH/ nA ga su pra ti sa ma yA dzaH/ nA ga tsit+ta khrag ti mA ra ya rbad/ che ge mo'i tsit+ta tsi tsi dz+wa

la mA ra ya dzaH/ nA ga shig yaM yaM dza dzaH/ zhag bdun klu yi dmod sngags bzlas// the tshom med par dgra snying bsgral// klu yi drag sngags dmod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// dmu bdud chen po ha la ka/ bar snang khams

su rgyug byed cing// skar chen 'bar ba'i thod chen bcings// sngon du su 'phrad khyur mid byed// lha chen brgyad kyi dbang po bral// klu chen brgyad kyi don snying 'byin// rgyu skar rnams kyi gral yang dkrug/ bar snang

dgu tshigs dum bur gtub// srid pa'i ri rab tsog por 'phang// rgya mtsho chen po zho ltar dkrug/ nyi ma zla ba klad la bskor/ 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phen pa yi// gnod sbyin chen po'i drag sngags ni// 'gro ba
rnams la brgyab pa na// de ma thag tu rengs par 'gyur// zhags bdun shing gcig rtsa ru 'dug/ sngags pa dmu yi chas su zhugs// yungs kar thal chen skye ba dang// gu gul nag po rta nag

khrag/ zer mo'i spu dang dgra bo'i rjes// khyim bya'i sgong skogs snod nang du// gu gul nag por dam spos sbos kyang la// zhag bdun mi bar mi gcad par// dmu bdud chen po'i drag sngags bzlas// tsi bar tsi

bar ra tsa si ti sa ma ya thibs dza/ zhung zhung ra dza A ho b+h+ruM rbad/ kril kril sha ma ru tri ma ho dzaH/ rmugs rmugs rak+sha rA tsa dum bu shig/ kyugs kyugs tsit+ta zung song ma le thun thun ma le ra tsi thun

b+h+yo// thums thums rA tsa sa ta mi tsakra ba mo la// che ge mo spud spud/ dmu bdud chen po'i dmod sngags bzlas// gang la brgyab pa shing bzhin rengs// gal te sngags pa grong khyer zhugs// chom rkun dag gis
'tshe byed dam// yang na dur khrod dgon par gnas// seng ge stag dang spyang ki sogs// gcan zan khro bo 'byung gyur na// sngags 'di bzlas la mgul khugs bcangs// tse bar zhung zhung/ kril kril rmugs
rmugs kyugs kyugs thums thums rbud rbud/ mgul khug rdzas kyis de la rgyob// rengs par 'gyur ro de ltar gyis// rang gi 'jigs med gnas slebs tshe// de'i tshe drag sngags mgo zhabs bzlog/ de yis
gnod pa grol bar 'gyur// dmu yi drag sngags dmod mo'i ting nge 'dzin to// bde gshegs bka' yi bstan pa yis// 'jig rten dregs pa dmod pa'i sngags// gad mos tA la mgo bcad bzhin// dregs pa
btsan gyi rgyal po ni// shu bo rdo rje srog len te// dmar po skye 'gro'i srog kyang gcod// brag btsan rgyal pos ltas ngan 'gyed// de yi drag sngags dbab pa'i thabs// brag dmar chol bzang rtsar song
la// sngags pa btsan gyi chas su zhugs// gser mig can gyi thod pa ru// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bcug la// thog gis bsad pa'i mchog phur la// khrag dang dug gis ngar blud ste// btsan gyi drag sngags

bzlas la brdeg/ sa ma ya tri shi rbad b+h+yo/ oM skor sod chum zlog dril/ non yaM yaM/ sprugs sngams/ myag myag dun dun thum ri li li/ btsan sha long la btsan gyis khrag 'thung/ ro khur sme sme/ ke ke rim rim zer

sad bstan pa 'jig pa'i srog chod dbugs long/ snying la thum snying la thum/ trag sha trag sha dgra bo'i snying la shog/ sra brtan brag gi mnga' bdag dus la bab/ dam nyams dgra la bdud du phob// btsan gyi

shod mas thog btsan gyi se long gis mngag pa'i las la khyod ma yel b+h+yo/ rnal 'byor pa yis zhag brgyad du// gnyid kyi bar chod rab spangs la// btsan gyi drag sngags bar med zlos// dgra bo'i lus sems
'bral bar nges// btsan gyi drag sngags dmod mo'i ting nge 'dzin to// gza' bdud chen po rA hu+u la// sgra gcan 'dzin gyi drag sngags 'di// gza' bdud gdug pa'i las yin te// ki kang dbab

dang gshed bzhi'i las// 'jig rten khams ni kun khyab ste// khyab 'jug chen po rA hu+u la// thog dang chu+u 'khyags ser ba 'bebs// srid pas ma srid mgar gyis ni// ma brdungs ye srid byung ba ni// byang chub
sems kyi ngar dbang can// rlung gis ma blud bshad pa dang// ye blud mtshon dbal ngar can de// 'byung ba gzhan gyis mi tshugs cing// nyid kyis gang la thogs med 'joms// drag po'i gnam lcags thog
mtshon ni// de dang chu 'khyags myur dbab thabs// ri gsum rtse la gcer bur gnas// sngags pa gza' bdud chas su zhugs// thog grir shi ba'i thod pa'i nang// gser dang zangs lcags 'khar ba

dngul// thod pa kha sbyor rgyu mas bcing// nang du thog gi 'khor lo la// gza' bdud sngags rnams spel la bri// thog gi steng du 'ong bar bya// rA hu+u la trag sha tsa pa ni ya/ pa sha mi ki ru ru ma ki dz+wa la ti/ ya ma

snying ya ma khrag rA hu+u la hril hril phrom phrom shar shar b+h+yo b+h+yo phaT/ ba tha ra A be sha phrom hril shar phob/ zhag bdun kha rlangs ma shor bar// nyung dkar sngags nas gtar bcug na// thog dang ser bas yul
mkhar 'joms// gza' bdud rgyu ba'i dus dang bstun// gza' bdud rA hu la'i drag sngags dmod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnang 'bebs kyi rgyud las// dregs pa bdun gyi drag sngags
gnad la 'bebs pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sde brgyad gnad 'bebs 'di gsungs so// sde brgyad rol pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// bka' thob bsnyen pa thob pa

yis// brtags pa'i sa ru dkyil 'khor bya// dbus su 'brub khung drag po ru// dur khrod zhing gi ras chen la// khrag chen rtsibs la sde brgyad 'god// lha rgyal ma hA de ba dang// bdud rgyal ha nu pag sha
dang// btsan rgyal shu bo srog len dang// gnod sbyin rag sha mgo dgu dang// klu rgyal sog ma med dang ni// gshin rje bye ba gung ring dang// srin mo me dbal nag mo dang// bgegs chen bi nA ya ga
rnams// rang rang cha lugs mthun par bris// de la ting 'dzin bstan pa ni// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa na// sde brgyad rten du byin gyis rlabs// dmigs gsum gsal bar gyur pa na// yid kyi 'gying
phur thebs pa ste// sde brgyad dngos su snang bar 'char// mkhas pas bdag nyid dbang chen bsgom// srid pa'i lha srin khams gsum bkang// rnam shes rlung 'dra bkug la bstim// lha srin mtshon cha srog

sngags brdeg/ ma hA de ba ti dza ti dza/ la sra pa na la gar sha ka ra ka la ya/ hUM de ba rA tsa ma hA nr-i dza hUM/ nr-i thum thum rbad/ shag se sen dza dza hUM hUM/ ma hA de ba ka la ka ti dza res ri na/ e ni hri se ba

na dza/ nA ga ru ru he sa gan/ bu se na tA se/ u ge na se se tse da tse/ bu ye na de ba na mA ra ya/ tsa tu ra mu kha rag sha pra ma na/ ma hA de ba che ge mo'i srog la li pra ma ni/ dam nyams dgra'i snying la dzaHdzaH/ nA ga ru ru

ha se/ srog mA ra ya/ hri dam srog ri rtse thal ma ni dam/ kro ti kro ti kro la ya/ mA ra ya dam/ srog kaM ti kaM mA ra ya dam/ srog gaM shaM tri mA ra ya dam/ srog mu tri tru'u tri mA ra ya dam dzaHdzaH/ lha chen po'i srog gi chan

pa'o// ru tra bdud tri ni ra pra na/ tri ya ma tra tri ya b+h+yo/ khaM khaM baM baM rbad/ che ge mo'i srog rtsa thun nr-i dzaHdzaH/ ya bdud kyi srog gi chan pa'o// smu tri tsa na d+ha dum dum buM baM/ kha la rag sha thum ri li li/ kha ba sha baM

rag thum thum ri li/ che ge mo ma ra Na nr-i dzaHdzaH/ dmu bdud srog gi chan pa'o/ hri dkar po tri dul dul snying khrag ril ril chom chom/ rtsa thun shig che ge mo ma ra Na dzaHdzaH/ gnod sbyin srog gi chan pa'o// nA ga tsa

tsa na ni e nan ta/ nA ga badzra la na ti san d+ha rak+Sha na/ che ge mo tsit+ta b+hasmi ku ru dzaHdzaH/ klu'i drag sngags dmod pa'i chan pa'o// ya ma tshan d+ha hri dz+wa la/ tse tra da ra na sha pa/ che ge mo nr-i mA ra la sod/ chom chom shig

dzaHdzaH/ gshin rje'i drag sngags chan pa'o// ma hA tsan d+ha rak+Sha hri tha ni ya ma tha ru ru tra mA ra ya/ che ge mo'i rna bye b+h+yo dzaHdzaH/ srin po'i srog gi chan pa'o/ ma hA ba du pra tra/ b+h+yi mu tsan d+ha tu si ni/ byi nA ya ga/ che ge

mo'i tsit+ta la b+hu dza ta khA hi/ he ka li ma hA tsan d+ha/ mA ra ya nr-i khug dzaHdzaH/ bgegs kyi srog gi chan pa'o// lha ma srin ni de rnams kyi// rang rang dag gi srog snying la// lcags kyi sdig pa kha brgyad pas// shin tu

mtshan nas gnas pa yin// rang dbang med par snying khrag drang// de ma thag tu srog dang bral// lha srin 'dus pa'i chan pa'o// dam nyams kun gyi srog gcod po// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi
rgyud las/ lha ma srin sde brgyad gnad la 'bebs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten du thog ser dbab pa 'di gsungs so// dben pa'i gnas su dam ldan

'dug/ grir shi mi yi snying dang khrag/ rgya po khyi yi snying dang khrag/ ra yang rgya bo'i snying dang khrag/ dong bur blugs la sngags bzla'o// zla ba gcig gam gnyis su bsnyen// trag mu tra kha mu tra b+h+yo/ ra ra ya ya rbad rbad

dus la bab bo// sa ma ya b+h+yo/ sa ma ya rak+sha b+h+yo/ ku ru ku ru rag sha b+h+yo/ ha he ha he rak+sha b+h+yo/ pad+ma rak+ta a mr-i ta/ bre gu gser thig dag dang gsum// rgyun gtor byas la gta' ru gzung// sku ni bcu gnyis las
mi nyung// rang gi g.yas su gzhag par bya// sgrub pa dkyil 'khor gru gsum ste// mi rkang skyed po bzhi btsugs la// rabs chad thod pa'i nang du yang// ra khyi rgya bo mi khrag dang// chu mig chu sbyar

blugs pa ste// glang ma'i byang bur skul tshig bris// zhing lpags kha bcad steng du gzhag/ kham kong zur gsum bdun nang du// thun bdun legs par bsham par bya// dang por nyung dkar ra khrag blug/ trag ni

ru ma sha swA hA/ gnyis par dre'u thod rus khrag brdzis// ma ma du yang phaT/ gsum par thod par yungs nag la// oM dub nur dub swA hA/ bzhi par mi khrag nyung dkar ro// oM ya tsi la 'du lu tshal pa tshal hUM hUM

phaT phaT swA hA/ lnga par khyi khrag 'o ma la// oM hab hab rub rub hUM phaT swA hA/ drug par sngo sna 'o ma mar/ oM dud shing mA ra ya pa ta na phaT/ bdun par sha ru tshil chen yin// oM pra shed ra na hUM phaT/ zhag bdun
dgu bcu rtsa gcig bzlas// ma mo bskul par bya ba ni// g.ya' shing dud pa'i dbang mo che// sku ni mthing nag chen mo la// phyag na thog gi bu yug bsnams// srid bdag chen mo srid pa'i dpal// srid bdag
chen mo kun gyi rje// khros pas klu 'brug bran du 'khol// ma mo chen mo gshegs su gsol// dam nyams yul du thog ser phob// dkon mchog gsum gyi bstan pa srungs// de nas las la sbyor ba ni// thog ser

'bebs na thun bdun po// yul lha klu dang btsan gnyan la// thab kyi sbyin sreg bya ba yi// ser ba mu khrid 'bebs pa na// b+han+d+ha glang ru gtar gzhug ste// glang ru'i phye ma skyi 'bru dang// lan tshwa yungs kar brngos

pa la// ldong ros dang ni thal chen dang// bud med lo ni bcu bdun pa'i// mngal khrag bsres la blug par bya// glang ru zhing gi dbus su sba// thod pa zhing gi mtha' bskor nas// zhing gi mu+u ma dag la sba// rta kyi

dza ho// khri tsho klu ba yang hUM ya/ ru lu ru lu swA hA/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya'o// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ ma mo gnad 'bebs ser ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis e ka dza ti'i rigs sngags kyis zhing bcu bsgral ba 'di gsungs so// ral gcig ro langs gsang bsgrub ni// dgra la khrag nad gtong ba'i thabs// drag sngags bya ba 'di gsungs

so// byi tri pu tra lo bdun pa// man chad lon pa'i sha tshil la// dang po gtor ma gcig bya ste// drag sngags 'dis ni bod par bya// sku dngos byung na dngos grub ster// dri 'u dri 'u tridu/ ma ma sha sha dza dza b+h+yo b+h+yo/

gsang sngags yi ge bcu gsum 'dis// nyi shu rtsa gcig bsgrub pa na// rab ni zla ba gcig na yang// mngon gsum dag tu sgrol bar 'gyur// trag rag sha ma ma dza dza/ sa ma ya snying la rbud rgyud/ tsit+ta rak+ta thun dza

b+h+yo/ ma ma srog sham sham khyer b+h+yo/ trag rag mo e ka dza ti dza/ ma ma snying mu rag ti sha la rbad/ ma ma tsa pa le mu ru/ khrag snying mi rbud/ ling+ga la nyung dkar brdeg/ tsit+ta mngon du 'ong bar
'gyur// ral gcig ro langs gsang bsgrub yin// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ e ga dza ti'i gnad 'bebs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu la
gtad pa 'di gsungs so// gdug pa klu la gtad bya na// ling+ga mdze khrag bri bar bya// mtha' ma sngags kyis bskor bar bya// mdze thod nang bzhugs gru gsum gzhug/ bdag nyid dbang chen gsal ba

yis// bsnyen pa zhag ni bdun du bzlas// ni nA gas zung zung ni/ nA gas rbud rbud/ ni nA gas hring hring/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta gyur ling nan/ thibs thibs khyer khyer/ rlag shing lhar che ge mo mA ra ya rbud/ stag dang

dom dred seng ge rnams// rtags su 'khol na bzang ba yin// nA ga rA tsa a mr-i te g+ha tsa ga kha khA hi/ nA ga du ma tha le nA ga rA tsa a nan te swA hA/ dkar gsum mngar gsum mchod sngags so// bsgrub pa zhag

gsum thun brab pa// nyung dkar nyung nag thun du brab// nA ga hu ya b+ha ling dung sa che ge mo thun sod/ zung nA ga shig shig/ ro la thibs thibs/ mA ra ya sod/ sha tra pa tra tsit+ta gu la nan/ mA ra ya rbud/ ling+ga la
cha'i ri lur gzhug/ de ni mdze thod glang rur gzhug/ yugs sa'i zhabs mas gril la gtad// rgyal rigs nam mkha' 'dra ste g.yel// rje'u rigs chu 'dra 'joms pas 'byams// bram ze sa 'dra 'gul zhing

lci// dmangs rigs me 'dra shin tu drag/ de la gtad na myur ba yin// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar nus// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ klu'i dregs pa gnad la phab nas zhing bcu
pha tshan ma lus par bsgral ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas 'khor gyi tshogs ma lus pa thams cad las/ ye shes 'khor rnams ni 'og min gyi gnas na dgongs pa la spyod cing rjes su yi rang bar gyur

to// 'jig rten gyi 'khor rnams kyis bstan pa bsrungs zhing bka' bzhin phyi rabs kyi rjes su bsrung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes can ni/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i

ngang du/ chos sku dri ma med par bzhugs so// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis rgyud 'di yi ger bris nas/ phyi rabs kyi gang zag chos kyi spyan lam sla spro bar gyur to// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud
las/ rjes su yi rang zhing/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud rdzogs so// paN+Di ta pad+ma sam b+ha wa dang/ lots+tsha ba kha che A nan tas
bsgyur ba'o//// rgyud 'di dpe gcig las bsdur sa ma 'byor/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI pad+ma ma hA ba sha saM b+hA ta tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal pad+ma dbang chen

dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid de ni/
pad+ma can nam bde ba can zhes bya ba'i gnas btsun mo'i b+ha ga las bzhengs te/ 'di ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs pa ni/ sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzigs nas
shes bya'i sgrib pa cha phra ba rnams sbyangs par mdzad do// rang sangs rgyas rnams la gzigs nas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams rnam par dag par ston par mdzad do// nyan thos rnams la gzigs nas
'gog pa las bslangs shing sbyangs par mdzad do// bya ba las kyi rgyud kri ya ba la gzigs nas rigs gsum gyi don rnam par dag par mdzad do// cha mthun spyod pa'i rgyud u pa ya la gzigs nas rigs

bzhi'i gdung rnam par dag par mdzad do// rnam grol rig pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor theg pa la gzigs nas sum cu rtsa gnyis rnam par dag pa mdzad do// rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gsum
gyi blta spyod kyis dregs pa thams cad dbang du sdud par mdzad par yang gzigs so// de nas 'gro ba'i rigs bsam yas pa la gzigs nas/ sems nyid sangs rgyas pa yin pa las/ snang ba snod dang bcud

du snang ba 'di thams cad ni/ sems nyid chos sku las snang ba chos sku'i 'od gsal du gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir/ nyid sku zhal gsum phyag drug par bstan pa ni de lta ste/ dbus kyi sku mdog dkar dmar pad+ma

rA ga'i mdangs su gnas/ g.yas thugs kyi zhal sngo ba/ g.yon yon tan gyi zhal ser ba/ g.yas dang po la pad+ma'i sdong bu/ bar ma na rdo rje rtse gsum/ tha ma na mda' 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang po na bum pa/ bar pa

na dpal be'u/ tha ma na gzhu 'dzin pa/ rgyan rin chen sna tshogs pa'i na bzas mdzes pa/ yum phyag rgya ma dang bcas pa/ dmar po rdo rje dril bus 'khyud pa/ rin chen seng ge nyi zla pad+ma'i khri la/ ye shes 'od

'khyil gong bu'i nang na bzhugs pa/ zhal nas gsang ba'i sngags brjod pa ni// oM A ro li ka/ pAM rA gar ti stAM swA hA/ zhes brjod pas 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mthong bar gyur te/ de nas

'khor rnams kyis bstod pa 'di mdzad nas bstod do// hUM dri med rnam dag zhi ba las// spros pa thams cad rab zhi ba'i// ye shes tshogs mchog mnga' brnyes pa// rang bzhin dag pa chos kyi sku// thugs rjes
sdug bsngal sel mdzad pa// bsod nams tshogs rdzogs gzugs kyi sku// las dang nyon mongs shes bya yi// dri ma spangs pa'i skur grub pa// gsung mchog sku gsung dang pa [+]dang// lus ngag
sems kyis phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rje chen pos gzung ba dang// ye shes snang ba gsal bar mdzod// dus kyis mnar ba'i skye bo rnams// 'dul phyir khro bo bzhengs su gsol// rtag chad mtha' la zhen pa

yi// gdug pa can rnams dbang du sdus// zhes bstod do// de nas gar dbang bde ba chen po'i sku des/ hUM drug rol pa'i cho 'phrul bstan nas// oM ma hA pad+ma shrI he ru ka pad+ma kro tI shwa rI hUM/ ma hA tsan+d+ra sarba duSh+tA na

hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ nyid kyi sku khro bor chen po dbu lnga phyag bcu drug par gyur te/ sku mdog dmar po dbu lnga pa/ dbu lnga'i nang na rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du gsal ba/ ltag pa na rta mgo lnga'i rta
mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor du gsal ba/ gshog pa khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang// thugs ka ye shes sems dpa' dang/ gzi ldan yum gyi dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag g.yas pa brgyad na rdo rje dang/ kha

T+wAM dril bur bcas pa dang/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ sbrul gyi zhags pa dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rin po che zur 'phyang brgyad pa dang/ ral gri dang/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phreng ba'o// phyag g.yon pa brgyad na/ pad+ma'i yu

ba nas 'dzin pa/ thod khrag snod bkang ba dang/ khro bo chen po'i snying 'byin po dang/ gshin rje'i dbyug pa thogs pa dang/ rdo rje rgya gram dang/ rdo rje be con dang/ me 'od kyi phreng ba dang/ tri shUl dang/ khyung gi khra

bsnams pa/ zhabs khro bo brgyad kyi gdan la bzhugs par gyur te/ zhal nas nyid kyi snying po yi ge bcu bdun pa 'dzin pa 'di brjod do// oM pad+ma sid+d+ha sid+ho ha he tsakra b+h+yo/ b+h+yo hUM hUM phaT/ ces brjod cing gdug pa

can 'dul ba'o// de nas nyid kyi 'khor ni/ sku yi kham rgya dkar mo 'khor lo dang/ gsung gi kham rgya dmar mo pad+ma dang/ thugs kyi kham rgya nag mo rdo rje dang/ yon tan kham rgya ser mo dril bu dang/ las kyi

kham rgya ljang gu ral gri dang/ gsang ba'i kham rgya sna tshogs mdog can khA T+wAM bsnams pa/ kham rgya mo drug po kun kyang g.yon na bdun rtsi'i thod pa bsnams pa/ zhal nas rang sngags brjod pa/ bud+d+ha badzra oM/ sa twa

badzra hUM/ rat+na badzra trAM/ d+harmA badzra hrIH/ karma badzra hA/ gu h+ya badzra phaT/ ces brjod cing 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo drug la bzhugs so// long ba chen po brgyad ni/ shar rdo rje'i long ba dkar po dang/ lho rin chen

long ba ser po dang/ nub pad+ma'i long ba dmar po dang/ byang las kyi long ba ljang gu dang/ mtshams kyi long ba phyed gzugs kyi mdog can dang/ phyag bzhi na g.yas pa zangs gri dang thod pa/ g.yon rgyu phreng dang

snying bsnams pa/ rang gi zhal nas rang sngags brjod pa ni// oM shwa ri khA hi hUM/ oM shwa ri khA hi trAM/ oM shwa ri khA hi hriH/ oM shwa ri khA hi hA/ zhes brjod cing thod rus kyi bar khyams dang po la/ sku gcer
bu'i tshul gyis gnas so// de nyid kyi gnas la bzhugs pa'i dmus long drug cu bo rnams ni// phyogs re na rigs kyi mdog can bco lnga bco lnga bzhugs te/ phyag g.yas na lcags kyu g.yon phur bu bsnams

pa'o// zhal nas rang sngags brjod pa ni// oM shrI raM khA hi hUM/ oM shrI raM khA hi trAM/ oM shrI raM khA hi hrIH/ oM shrI raM khA hi hA/ zhes brjod cing bar khyams dang po la gnas so// za byed dpal gyi khyi brgyad ni/ sku mdog

mthing nag spyang ki'i mgo can/ g.yas gri gug/ g.yon thod pa 'dzin pa/ rang gi sprul pa ce spyang brgyad dang/ ye shes kyi sprul pa khyi bcu yang/ zhal nas rang sngags brjod pa ni// oM dIp+ta tsakra shwa na mu kha kha long

kha hUM phaT/ ku ru ku ru yak+sha hUM phaT/ ces brjod cing bar khyams gnyis pa me ri dmar po la bzhugs so// 'khor gyi sgo ba bzhi ni/ mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po/ mdog dkar lag na lcags kyu bsnams pa/

zhal nas hUM hUM phaT/ ces brjod cing shar sgor bzhugs so// 'od gshog mgo brgyad rkang brgyad po ser po lag na zhags pa thogs shing// hUM trAM trAM phaT/ ces brjod cing lho sgor bzhugs so// ye shes mgo drug

lag drug rkang drug po dmar po phyag na lcags sgrog bsnams shing/ zhal nas hrI hrIHhrIHphaT/ zhes brjod cing/ nub sgor bzhugs so// gsang ba mgo gsum lag gsum rkang gsum po ljang gu ni/ phyag na dril bu

bsnams shing/ zhal nas hUM hUM hA hA phaT/ ces brjod cing byang sgor bzhugs so// sgo ba de kun gyi phyag g.yon na/ thod khrag nyid kyis longs spyod mdzad pa// me 'brug dmar po b+h+raM nge gi ri ti dang/ rlung 'brug

sngon po ka la sha ni/ oM dzi na laM te tse ri/ yak+sha ku b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ ces brjod cing steng 'og phyogs mtshams kun tu khyab bo// yang sprul pho nya ni/ dur bya dang/ khrung khrung dang/ ba se'i byan glag dang/ khyi spyang ma

rnams dang gdong dgu grangs med pa yang/ oM ha ha ru lu ma hA tsan+d+re shwa rI na ye a hUM hUM hUM phaT/ ces brjod par byed cing/ phyi rol sgo nas ra ba'i mtshams kyi bar du gnas so/ pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang
sdud kyi rgyud las nyid kyi sku mngon par bstan pa rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi las yongs su rdzogs pa 'di gsungs so// gsang sngags

kun gyi ngo bo ni// spyi dang bye brag rnam pa gnyis// spyir ni sngags kyi ngo bo ni// thabs dang shes rab rnam pa gnyis// de la thabs zhes brjod pa ni// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du snang// shes rab zhes ni gang brjod
pa// don dam skye ba med pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// khyad par sngags kyi ngo bo ni// khyed la ngas ni rab bshad na// sngags kyi ngo bo lha yi sku// drang srong mthu las khyad par

'phags// nges tshig spyi dang khyad par gnyis// spyi yi nges pa'i tshig bshad pa// skyobs pa'i phyir na sngags yin te// yid bskyab pa yi don yin no// khyad par sngags kyi nges tshig ni// shes skyob yon tan ldan pa

yin// sngags kyi dbye ba rnam pa gnyis// spyi dang bye brag gnyis su bshad// spyi yi dbye ba rnam gnyis te// kun rdzob kyi ni sngags zhes bya// lha yi dkyil 'khor yid la byed// don dam pa yis sngags zhes
pas// gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin te// stong pa chen po ye shes dang// de yul byed pa'i ye shes te// yul dang yul can ye shes te// rtogs pa 'khor ba bdag la skyob// bye brag sngags kyi dbye ba
gsum// gsang sngags rigs sngags gsang sngags yin// gsang sngags don ni rnam pa bzhi// bzod pa thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur gzungs// gsang sngags gzungs dang chos kyi gzungs// don gyi gzungs zhes bya
bar 'dod// bzod pa thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur pas// bskyed rim mthar phyin rnal 'byor ram// mtshan bcas rdzogs rim rnal 'byor ram// mtshan med rnal 'byor a dang hUM// de dag brjod bya thob byed
rnams// rang bzhin med par sems pa ni// de ltar yul dang yul can de// rang bzhin med par rtogs pa ni// dga' ba mchog tu dga' chen skyes// de la gzungs thob ces bya'o// dran dang shes rab gcig tu

byas// bzod pa 'dzin par byed pas gzungs// gzungs thob pa des de ma thag/ phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes skye// mthun pa'i bzod pa chen po ste// don dam chos rnams bzod pa ni// de skyes ring po mi thogs
