par// phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes thob// gsang sngags kyi ni gzungs shes pa// de yang phyag rgya chen po ni// thob pa yan chad gang zag des// rang gi ting nge 'dzin dang ni// sngon gyi smon lam stobs bskyed
pas// gsang sngags tshig ni 'di dag gis// sems can rnams kyi nad sogs pa// med par gyur cig ces brjod cing// ting 'dzin dbang gi stobs kyis ni// sems can rnams kyi yams nad sogs// med
cing byin brlabs lhar 'grub 'gyur// des na ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang// de ltar gyur pas gsang sngags rnams// 'dzin par byed pas gsang sngags gzungs// chos kyi gzungs zhes bya ba yang// phyag rgya chen

po'i thob pa'am// ston pa mkha' 'gro'am bla ma yis// sngon chad ma thob ma shes pa'i// bdag nyid gsang ba'i chos bshad pa// thos pa tsam gyis mi brjed 'dzin// dran pa shes rab chos kyi gzungs// don gyi
gzungs ni de bzhin du// gsungs pa'i chos rnams de dag ni// don rnams mi brjed 'dzin pa ni// dran pa shes rab don gyi gzungs// de la rig sngags zhes bya ba// stong pa chen po'i ye shes

de// ye shes yul du byas rtogs pas// ma rig spangs shing rig pa skyed// de phyir rig sngags zhes bya ba'o// gsang sngags mtshan rgyud sngags dang don// 'di zhes nges par shes par bya// mtshan ni gsang sngags

zhes bya ste// snod ma yin la gsang ba dang// blo chung theg pa dman la gsang// gsang thub dngos grub mi yal phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsang bar bsngags// de phyir gsang sngags nges pa'i mtshan// rgyud
ni 'brel phyir rgyud ces bya// gzhi thabs 'bras bu'i 'brel ba'i phyir// gzhi ni bden gnyis rang bzhin gnas// thabs ni bsgrub pa'i rang bzhin gnas// 'bras bu chos sku gzugs skur gnas// sngags ni

nus pa'i mthu chen de// bsgom pa'i gsang sngags bskyed rdzogs gnyis// spyod pa'i gsang sngags sbyor sgrol gnyis// bzlas pa'i gsang sngags ye shes nyid// bza' ba'i gsang sngags bdud rtsi lnga// don ni kun
rdzob don dam gnyis// don dam yul dang yul can nyid// yul ni stong pa'i ye shes nyid// yul can zhes su bya ba yang// mi rtog ye shes yul byas shing// de rtogs gzungs su gyur pa yis// gnod pa'i 'tshe

ba nub par byed// kun rdzob sngags de thob pa'i thabs// sngags kyi gzungs dang sngags kyi ming// brda' dang tshig sogs thams cad yin// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/
gsang sngags thams cad dbang du sdud par/ sngags kyi ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi lam rnam par bkod pas sngags thams cad dbang du

bsdu ba 'di gsungs so// 'bras bu'i theg chen gsang sngags 'di// khyad par gyur phyir khyad par che// thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang// dbang po rnon po'i dbang gyur dang// don gcig phyir na'ang ma smongs

pas// sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags// 'bras bu nyid du lam shes pas// tshe lus gcig la rdzogs sangs rgyas// de la gsang sngags slob ma ni// snod dang ldan pa gces pa ste// de phyir dam tshig srog
ldan gzhug/ dam tshig mi ldan spang bar bya// dam tshig dang ldan bzlog pa ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'tshe ba dang// dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang// shi nas dmyal bar 'gro ba'o// dam tshig mi ldan bcug pa

yang// tshul de nyid du shes par la// theg chen sngags kyi spyod pa la// skyon 'dogs smod par byed pa ni// mkha' 'gro ma yis myur du gsod// de nas dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// des na zab mo'i spyod pa la//
skyon 'dogs smod pa spang bya'o// skal dang ldan pa'i gang zag de// bla ma dam par gyur pa ni// theg pa mtha' dag ma lus pa'i// grub pa'i mtha' la ma rmongs shing// rgyud kyi dgongs pa shes pa
dang// dkyil 'khor la sogs kun mkhas shing// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa// bla ma'i bka' ni thob pa la// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dga' ston bya// yon dbul dbang bskur gsol ba btab// de ltar gsol

ba btab pa dang// bla mas kyang ni bsnyen pa dang// sa chog lhag gnas cho ga dang// dkyil 'khor cho ga rgyas pa dang// 'jug pa dbang bskur yon blang bya// de ltar slob mas bla ma la// sems bskyed sdom blang
dbang mnos nas// de nas slob ma dam pa yis// dbang sems de nyid dam tshig bsrung// de bas bsrung la 'bad par bya// dam tshig bsrungs pa'i yon tan yang// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub 'grub// ma

bsrungs pa yi skyon rnams kyang// rdo rje dmyal bar nges par ltung// de yi sdug bsngal bzod par dka'// mtshan nyid shes par bya ba yang// de ltar snod du rung ba dang// rang gi bla ma dam pa la// theg chen

sngags kyi rgyud mnyan nas// sngags song mtshan nyid shes par bya// de nas rang sems sbyang bar bya// sems sbyang don ni rnam par drug/ skyon yon yul dang rgyud la bskyed// spang bya spong thabs 'bras bu
yin// rnal 'byor rang sems ma sbyangs par// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi 'grub la// de ma grub par gyur pas ni// gzhan gyi don rnams mi 'grub pas// de phyir sems ni spyad par bya'o// sems sbyang yon tan
bsam mi khyab// dpag tu med pa'i dngos grub thob// yul ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// 'jug pa'i yul ni sngon byung gi/ ston pa'i spyod pa bzhin du 'jug/ dmigs pa'i yul yang rnam pa gnyis// mtshan bcas

mtshan ma med pa ste// ye shes thig le phyag mtshan sku// de sogs mtshan ma can du 'dod// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la// dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis dmigs// lam gyis rgyud la skyed pa yang// nye grogs
lam dngos de grogs gsum// nye ba'i grogs kyang rnam pa lnga// bsgrub pa'i gnas dang shis pa'i dus// mtshan ldan grogs dang mthun pa'i rdzas// shes pa'i ston pa phun sum tshogs// lam dngos 'di ltar
'jug par bya// phyi lam dngos mchog rim pa rnams// rnal 'byor bsgom pas bslab par bya// bya spyod rnal 'byor rgyud gsum ni// mtshan ma dang bcas bsgrub thabs ni// mtshan ma med pa'i bsgrub par
'dod// rnal 'byor rgyud lung man ngag gsum// bskyed rim rdzogs rim rnam pa gnyis// rdzogs chen lam ni rang sems nyid// sangs rgyas rang sar grol ba'o// lam de cho ga'i rim pa dang// don rim dgos
pa'i rim pa bshad// cho ga'i rim pa bya ba ni// rgyas pa dpe byas bsdus pa yin// rgyas par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor ni// bsgrub pa rten gyi gang zag gis// dang po bla ma dam pa las// dam tshig
dbang thob bsrung la 'bad// gdams ngag mnos nas nyams su blangs// gnas gzhi yid du 'ong ba ru// grogs ni chos dang mthun pa'am// bdag nyid gcig pu sgrub pa pos// dus tshig bzang po dag la
'jug/ gtor ma gtang zhing sAts+tsha gdab// sbyin sreg yi dam bzlas pa bya// khrus byas maN+Dal me tog bkram// srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya// sems can sdug bsngal bral bar 'dod// de nas byams pa
bsgom par bya// sems can bde dang ldan par 'dod// de nas dga' ba bsgom par bya// bdag gis byang chub thob par bya// sems can don bya spro bar bya// de nas btang snyoms bsgom par bya// de gsum mi
dmigs par yang bsgom// de nas lha dang bla ma sprul// phyag 'tshal mchod dang sdig bshags sogs// bdun po rnam dag bsod nams tshogs// de nas ting 'dzin rnam pa gsum// ye shes tshogs las rang nyid
lha// bya spyod rnal 'byor rgyud rnams ni// stong pa nyid kyi sngags brjod nas// bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpar bskyed// mdun du ye shes sems dpar sprul// bla med rnal 'byor bskyed rdzogs dang// dbang

bskur sku gsung thugs byin brlab// spyan drangs bzhugs mchod bstod par bya// yi ge phyag mtshan thig le sku// phra mo spro bsdu 'bar 'dzag la// dmigs nas rdzogs rim bsgom par bya// skyo bar gyur na ngag

bzlas bya// shin tu skyo bar gyur pa na// mchod bstod byas la spyan drangs pa// rang bzhin gnas su gshegs su gsol// sprul pa rnams ni rang la bsdu// de yang mtshon pa'i dpe bshad pa// snying rje rtsa ba lta ba
la// byams pa sdong po yin par 'dod// dga' ba yal ga rgyas pa ste// tshogs gnyis lo ma lta bu la// rnal 'byor gzhan ni me tog 'dra// bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa yi rgyud// yongs su smin pa 'bras bu
yin// bsdus pa'i cho ga rim pa bzhin// bya spyod rnal 'byor bsgom pa yang// bdag nyid lha ru bskyed byas nas// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mdun du sprul// mar me gyes pa'i tshul gnyis su// gcig ni dkyil

'khor gtso bor snang// gcig ni las kyi lhar byas nas// mchod bstod de bzhin thams cad bya// de ni phyi nang thun mong yin// khyad par lam du bshad pa ni// rnal 'byor bla na med pa ni// bdag nyid lha ru
gsal byas nas// dbang bskur byin brlab spyan drangs nas// bdag dang gnyis su med byas te// bdag nyid lha yi snying ga nas// lha mor sprul nas bya ba'am// 'khor gyi lha mos bdag nyid la// mchod bstod
la sogs byas nas ni// yang ni bdag gi snying ga'am// sku la sogs par bsdu bar bya// bzlas pa'i dus ni thams cad du// mgal me bskor ba lta bu'am// thag mdung 'phen pa'i tshul 'dra

dang// sgro yi chun po 'dra ba dang// thig gu bsgril pa lta bu dang// sgrog spel lcags sgrog lta bu ni// skabs kyi stobs kyis shes par bya// de ltar bsgoms shing bsgrubs pa las// mtshan ma brtan po 'byung bar

'gyur// mtshan ma thob nas mtshan med bsgom// mtshan ma med pa mngon gyur nas// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub yin// de dag gsang sngags phyi nang gi/ thun mong lam de gnyis su dbye// de nas don gyi rim
pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pas tshad med bsgoms// tshogs ni rnam gnyis bsags pa dang// bdud rnams thams cad btul ba dang// thams cad la yang ma chags dang// snga phyi byang chub mchog sems

bskyed// thos pa'i shes rab byang ba dang// bsam pa'i shes rab dpyad pa dang// bsgom pa'i shes rab mthar phyin bslab// de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// tshad med pa dang tshogs gnyis dang// srung ba'i

'khor lo pad+ma dang// zla ba dang ni yi ge dang// phyag mtshan sku ru gyur pa bstan// yang ni de bzhin gshegs pa yi// tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam// mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam// mi slob pa yi
lam dang ni// gzhan don sku gnyis byin brlabs so// de bzhin du ni sgrub pa pos// bsod nams tshogs dang ye shes tshogs// yi ge'am zla ba tshes pa'am// zla rgyas yi ge 'phro 'du dang// zla ba'am zla ba

gnyis pa'am// phyag mtshan dang ni sku dag brtan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phro 'du ni// mdzad pa spro dang bsdu ba dang// byin gyis brlab par bstan pa'o// de dag bya spyod rnal 'byor 'dod// yang ni bla med
rnal 'byor pas// bdud rnams gdul phyir mtshams rnams gcad// bsod nams rgyud ldan phung gtor brlab// ma dag rgyud la brten nas ni// tshogs bsag phyir na tshad med bsgom// dag pa sangs rgyas la
brten nas// tshogs bsag phyir na yan lag bdun// bsod nams tshogs bsag bshags pa bya// ye shes tshogs ni bsag pa'i phyir// sku gsum byung tshul ting 'dzin gsum// snod rnams sbyang bas gzhal
yas gsal// bcud rnams sbyang bas lha tshogs gsal// lam gyi dbang rnams blang ba'i phyir// ye shes rnam lngas dbang yang bskur// zab mo'i dbang gsum ldan pas na// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis
brlab// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med phyir// ye shes dam tshig gnyis med bsre// gang yang bdag las gnyis med phyir// mchod cing bstod de bzlas pa bya// rtag pa'i mtha' la mi gnas phyir// stong
nyid rang gi yul du thim// dgos pa de bzhin gshegs pa yis// bden gnyis lam bzhir bsgom byas shing// tshogs bsags sku gsum thob pa bzhin// rnal 'byor rnams kyis thun gcig

la// bsgom pa'i tshul yang de bzhin snang// goms pas phyis kyang de bzhin 'grub// de phyir khyad par 'bras bu'i lam// de yi grogs ni rnam pa lnga// gtor ma sbyin sreg rab tu gnas// tsha tshwa bum pas dbang
bskur ro// bdag gzhan bar chad nyer zhi phyir// gtor ma'i cho ga bya ba yang// ma chag gtor bas gtor ma ste// 'byung po spyi yi gtor ma dang// lha mgron so so'i gtor ma yin// lha tshim bar chad bgegs

la sogs// zhi phyir sbyin sreg cho ga bya// rtogs sgrib nyams chags la sogs bsreb// gang 'dod dngos grub sbyin par byed// don dam sbyin sreg mi rtog bsgom// kun rdzob sbyin sreg phyi dang nang// nang ni rang

gis bza' ba nyid// phyi yi sbyin sreg rnam pa gnyis// las rnams thams cad sbyin sreg dang// las bzhi so so'i sbyin sreg go/ de nyid gang mos rigs lnga dang// phrin las dbang du bya ba yin// dngos grub shin
tu myur ba dang// sku gsung thugs rten khyad par phyir// rab gnas bzang po'i cho ga bya// khyad par gyur pas rab tu gnas// rab tu gnas pa rnam pa gsum// sku gzugs glegs bam rdo rje dril// bsod nams

khyad par can bsags phyir// tsha tshwa gdab pa'i cho ga bya// mchod pa'i yul gyur tsha tshwa bshad// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis yin te// cho ga rgyas bsdus phral du bya// bag chags sbyangs dang dbang bskur phyir// bum pa'i
cho ga rab tu bya// yon tan thams cad 'du ba dang// dgos pa byed phyir bum pa'o// bum pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// skabs su bya dang dkyil 'khor bzhengs// gnas skabs phyi nang gsang ba de// phyi ni rdza

pa rin chen sogs// nang ni thod pa mtshan dang ldan// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga nyid// dkyil 'khor dbang gi bum pa dang// khrus dang mchod pa tshe bum yin// spang bar bya ba rnam pa gnyis// ngan rtog sems

bdag mtshan 'dzin dang// bzang rtog sangs rgyas bdag tu 'dzin// spong ba'i thabs ni rnam pa gnyis// ngan rtog bzang rtog bdag gis spang// bzang rtog mi rtog pa yis spang// spyod pa 'gro nyal 'dug sdod
kun// nyid kyi lha yi nga rgyal ldan// 'gro dus lha yi spyod pa yang// lhag pa'i lha'am rigs gsum mam// lha'am lha mo gang 'dod bya// skabs su lus phyag bskor ba bya// maN+Dal dbul dang yi dam

bzlas// brtul zhugs spyod pa rab tu bya// yangs pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis// thun mong don shes grub chen brgyad// mchog la rig 'dzin rnam bzhi dang// sku gsum sku bzhi sku lnga sogs// phyag rgya chen po
mchog bsgrub bo// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/ gsang sngags kyi lam dbang du bsdu ba ste le'u gsum pa'o//// de nas 'khor gyi byang chub sems
dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gar gyi dbang phyug chen po la rang rang gi mngon pa don du gnyer bar bya ba'i phyir/ mgrin gcig tu 'di skad du ces ched du brjod do// hUM mi gnas ye

shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// 'bar ba'i rgyal po khro bo kun gyi rje// gar dgu 'jigs pa'i cha lugs hUM sgra can// 'khor bcas khro bo'i tshogs rnams gshegs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn
sa ma ya s+t+waM/ srid gsum 'dren mdzad thar lam 'dren pa'i dpal// rigs lnga bde gshegs sems dpa' sras bcas tshogs// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med 'gro don mdzad// rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil

'khor tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang drag klu rgyal 'joms mdzad gsung nyid lha// thugs rje thabs mkhas phra men 'dul mdzad cing// phrin las sna tshogs rta mgo ljang gu ston// 'gro 'dul brjid pa'i sku la
phyag 'tshal lo// thig le chos sku gdal ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// gnyis med sna tshogs ma bsgribs sa ler gsal// thugs rje ye shes sems dpa' sngags kyi gnas// phyag rgya'i rten gnas 'phro 'du mdzad la

phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' 'gro bcu drug rab tu rngam chen sku// 'jigs pa'i tshon chas 'gro ba'i las rgyud stongs// gnas rnams so so sna tshogs ston pa'i sku// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// dregs

byed dbang sdud khro bo gnon pa'i stobs// mi mthun tshogs 'joms gnyen po'i tshul du gnas// brjid pa'i chas brgyad phrin las bla na med// bdud 'dul khro bo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje'i mdzad
pas khams gsum zil gyis gnon// thabs dang shes rab 'dam rdzab mun pa sel// gsang ba'i phyag rgya drug pa'i ting 'dzin gsal// khams gsum gnon pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum sangs rgyas
kun gyi rang bzhin las// dkyil 'khor thams cad sku gsung thugs su sdud// gnas gsum ston pas chos bshad rgyud sbyangs shing// byin rlabs nam mkha'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs

pa thams cad bskyed pa'i lam// yum gyi tshul gyis bde chen dgyes par mdzad// rang rig mkha' 'gro'i gtso mo dbyings kyi tshul// chags chen gzi ldan gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sku mnyam nyid bde chen

byang chub sems/ ma bsgribs phyi nang med pa'i bde gsal ba'i// zab mo'i tshul gnas rang bzhin g.yo ba med// snang stong bde ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu hoH// pra tIts+tsha hoH// pad+ma ban+da naM ka ro mi/ a
la la hoH// oM dga' bo rol mo glu bro gar gyi tshogs// 'dod pa'i yon tan khyad par 'phags pa'i sprin// stong gsum mthun par snang ba'i spyod yul du// lha mo'i tshogs bcas zag pa med par

dbul// A+oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tat+khaM ud+ga te s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ A+oM badzra d+hUM pe hUM swA hA/ A+oM badzra puSh+pe hUM swA hA/ A+oM badzra A lo ke hUM swA hA/ oM badzra nai bi d+ya hUM swA hA/ A+oM badzra gan+d+he hUM

swA hA/ rang byung bdud rtsi lnga dang sman sna tshogs// mnyam pa'i don gyis dbyer med rang bzhin gcig/ dam rdzas lnga po legs sbyar byin brlabs pas// gnyis med dgyes pa'i dam tshig bskang gyur cig/ ma hA

pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ oM hu lu hu lu raM dz+wa la oM e A ra li/ dzaHhUM baM hoH// a la la ho// A+oM ma traM rU tra ha la ha la hUM phaT/ dug gsum dngos po'i tshogs rnams sbyang ba'i phyir// rngam pa'i khro tshogs sprul

pa phyogs bcur spros// khro 'dzum phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams bsten mdzad cing// ha he ru lu gsang sngags drag tu brjod// ha la'i rdo rje'i bshug pa'i gad rgyangs kyis// bdud dang srin po'i tshogs rnams brgyal

bar mdzad// A+oM sarba pA paM ka ra hi ta sa bi shwa ma tang rU tra hUM phaT/ A+oM pA pa ka ra hi ta sa bi shwa kha T+wAM ga rU tra hUM phaT/ A+oM sarba pA pa ka re hi ta sa bi shwa a ka ra ya rU tra hUM phaT/ hUM dpal chen thugs kyi pho nya'i

tshogs// dpal chen rdo rje thog thog ser chen 'bebs// hUM dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jigs// hUM chen hUM gi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skem// rdo rje mtshon cha gnam

lcags mthu 'dra bas// gsang sngags log par lta ba'i bdud rnams 'joms// rdo rje'i ser chen rang bzhin thog bcas 'khrugs// nyams pa'i snying srog khrag bcas thang la phyung// ye shes rngam pa'i thugs rje

a la la// A+oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha gardza gardza ha la ha la hUM phaT/ hUM thugs rje rnam dag pad+ma'i rang bzhin las// thugs rje'i sprul pa thar lam byang chub sems// phyogs bzhi dbus lngar brjid pa'i dbu

mchog ni// grub pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen lnga ye shes lnga// dpa' lus khyad par 'phags pa zhal gyi dbyibs// dbang mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i rta skad can// thugs las thugs rje thabs mkhas sprul pa ni// ye
shes byin rlobs khro rgyal 'bum du ston// smin mdzad smon lam yun ring las grub pa'i// dmigs pa'i mtha' bral pad+ma yum gyi tshul// chos rnams ma lus gsal bar gzigs pa yi// chags med thugs rje

pad+ma spyan gyi tshul// sgra skad thams cad mtha' las grol ba yi// zab dang rgya che chos kyi mtshan nyid gsan// shangs kyi rlung sgrom dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// zhal gyi hom lnga gdangs las rgyud lnga sgrol// rno
dbal mche bas skye shi rtsad nas gcod// le brgan ljags kyis gsungs rab rgya mtsho 'chad// rol pa'i phyag gis 'gro ba 'dul la mkhas// gshog bzhi brkyangs pas phrin las rnam bzhi
mdzad// zhabs brgyad rol pas gzir gnon mdzad pa'i tshul// sku che yan lag rags to ri bo bzhin// thugs mchog ye shes stong gi nyi ma brdal// lha yi lha mchog byin brlabs 'byung ba'i gnas// ngo mtshar

rol pas khro bo kun gyi rje// dpa' bo thabs mchog mnga' la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rjes 'khor la dam tshig sbyin mdzad cing// gtor ma rgya chen byin brlab sngags kyis dbul// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta sa

ma yo ga sid+d+hi hUM/ sa ho ka ma la pu ra ta hUM/ A+oM badzra sa ma ya ma hA kro ta oM AHhUM/ ma hA yo ga tsit+ta ri/ ba me la rak+ta khA hi khA hi hUM/ oM kha kha le le ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ i dan sa ma ya a la la ho// thun skabs tha

ma'i gtor ma la// bsreg sbyang byin brlab 'dod lnga bdud rtsi'i tshogs// rang gi sngags kyis mgron tshogs kun bsdus te// de dag sbyang zhing byin brlabs phyag rgya'i rgyu// sku gsung thugs gsal rigs kyi cod

paN can// mnyam snyoms longs spyod bdud rtsis tshim gyur nas// rang nyid lha dang gnyis med gnas pa dang// rgyal ba'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i phrin las bcol// oM lha klu gnod sbyin srin po gshin rje klu// dri za

grul bum me lha mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// lha min 'dab bzangs dbang ldan srul po dang// 'gro drug gnas pa'i gang zag rdzu 'phrul can// snying rje lan chags mgron bcas ma lus kun// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag
rgya sbyang byas nas// rang rig lhas brgyan gnyis med gnas pa dag/ bdud rtsi dga' ba'i longs spyod 'di bzhes la// bdag gi zhi rgyas dbang drag las bsgrub cing// rnal 'byor 'khor bcas bsrung bar mdzad
pa dang// 'gro ba bde legs phun sum tshogs mdzad cing// nad rkyen bar chad ma lus bsal ba dang// rgyal ba'i bstan pa rjes su bsrung mdzod la// rang gi gnas su bde bar gshegs par mdzod// A+oM hri ha

ha ya shA+o ta ma bi na sa ma ya ba liM ta khA hi/ ar+g+haM mAM sa khA hi/ zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/ ye shes dkyil 'khor dbang sdud mnyes pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de
nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen he ru kas rje btsun 'phags pa gnod mdzes chu dbang gi sgrub pa'i thabs 'di dag gsungs so// 'di bsgrub pa yi gang zag ni// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed
pa// sdom pa dang ni dam tshig ldan// dbang bskur thob cing brtson 'grus can// bla ma mched grogs dag la gus// de lta bu yi sngags pas bsgrub// gnas ni yid du 'ong ba dang// shin tu dben par bya
ba'am// rang nyid gang du gnas kyang rung// rgyun du gang du 'dugs par bsgrub// gnyis pa bya thabs rten bshad pa// gser dngul zangs kyi shog bu la// pad+ma 'dab brgyad gnyis byas
la// gcig la gnod sbyin pho dgu bri// gcig la gnod sbyin mo dgu bri// de la rab gnas legs byas nas// de gnyis kha sbyar mnyes bsam la// mar dang sbrang rtsi ka ras gril// za ma tog gi nang du ni// me
tog ser pos bkang ba yi// dbus su ga'u stsal byas nas// maN+Dal gru bzhi khru brgyad pa// byi dor legs byas rnam lngas byug/ me tog ser po bkram pa'i dbus// za ma tog ni bzhag nas kyang// dus gsum
mchod bstod bskor dang bzlas// de ltar byed pa'i sngags pa la// grub chen brgyad kyang ster byed na// dngos grub phal cher lta ci dgos// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang gsang sngags bshad pa

'di'o// A+oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+rA ya swA hA/ dbus gnod 'dzin gyi sngags so// A+oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya swA hA/ shar nor bu bzang po'i sngags so// oM pur+Na b+ha drA ya swA hA/ lhor gang ba bzang po'i sngags so// A+oM d+ha na pa ta ye

swA hA/ nub nor sbyin gyi sngags so// A+oM bai shrA ma NA ya swA hA/ byang nor sbyin chen po'i sngags so// A+oM ke li mA li ne swA hA/ shar lho rol pa'i phreng ba'i sngags so// oM mu khen drA ya swA hA/ lho nub sgo'i dbang po'i

sngags so// A+oM tsa rin+d+ra ya swA hA/ nub byang spyod pa'i dbang po'i sngags so// A+oM tsi bi kun+Da li ne swA hA/ byang shar rgyal ba 'khyil pa'i sngags so/ A+oM ba su d+hA ri N+yai swA hA/ dbus nor sbyin ma'i sngags so// A+oM tsan+d+ra

skAn+tA yai swA hA/ shar du zla 'od ma'i sngags so// oM Ar+ya yai swA hA/ lhor 'phags ma'i sngags so// oM su da t+tA yai swA hA/ nub rab sbyin ma'i sngags so// oM dat+tA yai swA hA/ byang sbyin ma'i sngags so// oM sa ra swa t+yai swA hA/

shar lho dbyangs can ma'i sngags so// A+oM de byai swA hA/ lho nub lha mo'i sngags so// A+oM gu p+ta yai swA hA/ nub byang sbas ma'i sngags so// oM su b+ha drA yai swA hA/ byang shar bzang mo'i sngags so// oM dzaM dzaM b+ha la swA hA/

bzlas pa'i sngags so// oM dzaM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra d+ha na me d+hi hrIHswA hA/ bsgrub pa'i sngags so// oM dzaMlu swA hA/ las sbyor chu 'bul ba'i sngags so// gnod sbyin chen po 'di brgyad yang// sku mdog phyogs mthun

dbus ma ser// g.yas pa'i phyag na a ru ra// g.yon pa ne'u le'i rkyal bu 'dzin// de yi chung ma dgra bo yang// dbus ma gser mdog phyogs mthun 'khor// g.yas pa mchog sbyin phyag rgya la// g.yon pa 'bras

kyi snye ma 'dzin// yang na zhal gsum phyag drug ste// sku mdog rigs mthun phyogs kyi mdog/ g.yas na lcags kyu zhags pa dang// ne'u le'i rkyal ba 'dzin pa'o// g.yon na bi dza bU ra dang// rdo rje lcags kyu

'dzin pa dang// ne'u le'i rkyal ba bsnams pa ni// blo mchog rnams kyis bsgom par bya// de nas yi ge dgod pa ni// spyi bor A+oM ste kha la dzaM// dpung g.yas b+ha ste dpung g.yon la// snying khar dza ste
brla g.yas len// brla g.yon dra la gsang bar ya// byin par swA ste rkang mthil hA// de nas phyag rgyas dgug pa yang// lag gnyis snying gar khu tshur bcang// gung mo'i tshigs ni dbus ma dang// gsum po

bkug la phyag rgya'o// de la chu 'bul man ngag ni// zla ba dang ni rdo rje bsam// yi ge A+oM las gdu bu ni// so sor mkhrig mar bsam par bya// baM ni zla ba'i mdog can de// de la bdud rtsi rab 'bar ba// dri

med so sor mngon phyogs pas// mkhas pas bum pa bzhin du blta// mdzub mo la ni nor bu bzang// gang ba bzang zhes gung mo la// srin lag la ni nor sbyin te// nor sbyin chen po mthe'u chung la// mthe bor tsi

pi kuN+Da li// ki li mi li mkhrig mar te// sgo dbang spyod pa'i dbang po dag/ lag pa'i ngos la rnam par bsam// sngags pas nor 'dzin chu dbang ni// lag pa'i dbus su rnam bzhag ste// rang rang sngags kyis

rim bzhin bsam// dang por yi ge oM dang ni// rat+na badzra rang ming ldan// bzhi yi mtha' dang de bzhin du// swA hAr bcas pa sngags su drangs// rdo rje bdud rtsi lag par bsam// 'di ltar spyi bor cho ga
bzhin// mkhas pa chu yi sbyin blugs brgya// nyin re bzhin ni legs par dbul// de nas gal te 'gyangs pa na// nan tur bya bar rigs pa yis// bdag nyid pad+ma dbang chen gyis// thugs las yi ge mthing

nag hUM// de las rdo rje hUM mdzad sprul// zhal gcig spyan gsum phyag bzhi pa// g.yas g.yon dang po phyag gnyis na// rdo rje dril bu bsnol mar 'dzin// 'og ma lcags kyu zhags pa thogs// stag gi sham thabs

mdzes par bsam// sbra tshil sku gzugs chu bdag 'dra// dug dang tsha ba gsum dang ni// skye tshe tsha ba'i mar khu dang// khrag gis gzugs la byug nas ni// de sngags bzlas shing dur khrod kyi// me la bdug na
zhag bdun gyis// mngon sum 'dod pa ster bar byed// de nas bzod par gsol byas nas// rdzas dang bral bar byas pa yi// mtshan ma dben par bzhag la mchod// de ni nan tur bsgrub pa'o// de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa dzaM b+ha lha la bstod pa 'di gsungs so// nor gyi dbang phyug rin chen gter mnga' ba// gnod sbyin mang po'i nor 'chang kun gyi rje// byang phyogs skyong ba'i mgon po dzaM b+ha
la// bcom ldan grub mchog stsol la phyag 'tshal bstod// gang gi thugs ni ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba// yon tan 'od zer thams cad rab rdzogs shing// nyes pa'i mun pa ma lus rab sel ba// bcom ldan
nor lha'i pad+mar rab tu 'dud// thugs rje'i dbang byas bkra shis sku mnga' ba// gser gyi pad+ma lta bur yid 'ong zhing// dman pa rnams kyis mthong dka' dam pa yi// gtsug gi nor bu khyod la

phyag 'tshal bstod// gsung gi chu 'dzin shin tu sdug po las// chos dbyings bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun rab 'bebs pas// dad pa'i lto ba rab rgyas dge ba yi// pad+ma skyed mdzad khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// byams dang

snying rje'i rang bzhin mi g.yo yang// nor bu rin chen dpag bsam shing lta bur// sa gsum po yi dgos pa dus gcig tu// rtsal bar mdzad pa khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// yul rnams sgyu ma lta bur rab mkhyen
kyang// sngon gyi smon lam ljags kyi so brdar bas// gter gyi dbang po ma lus rab bsnams pa// gnod sbyin gzugs 'dzin khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma rig mun pas thar pa'i lam dang bral// srid pa'i
g.yang sa sdug bsngal me nang du/ brtse med stobs ldan las kyis 'phangs pas na// mgon po nyid kyis bdag la myur du skyobs// zhes ni rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// gang gis bstod pa 'dis bstod na// nor gyi
char pa myur du 'bebs// 'bru yi bang mdzod rgyas par 'gyur// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las// mgon po gnod sbyin shing rta'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

bgegs kyi rgyal po tshogs kyi bdag po rnams sgrub pa'i thabs rnams gsungs so// gang zhig rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// sku yi tshogs bdag dkar po bsgrub// dbyi mong shing ngam tsan+dan shing// mthe bong tsam

pa'i tshogs bdag sku// dkar po glang chen gzhon nu'i gdong// g.yas na la phug bgrang phreng dang// g.yon gnyis la du dgra s+t+wa bsnams// byi ba sngon po'i khri la bzhugs// de yi gsang sngags rab bshad

kyis// nor gyi bdag po dbang du byed// A+oM gu ma ga Na pa ti swA hA/ bsnyen pa'i sngags so/ sngags rnams ma phy-i sor bzhags// oM hri ha sti mu kha la la ma b+h+yo d+ha ra ya/ u tsit+ta ma la ya ma hA ra ma ne/ kraM brum hri hUM traM/ u tsit+ta

ya swA hA/ snying po'o// oM bar ta ka u tsit+ti swA hA/ bsgrub pa'i sngags so// oM badzra a ru sha gu te sa te A ka ra sha ma hUM dzaH/ dngos grub blang ba'i sngags so// yang ngo'i tshes brgyad gnam stong par// dus gsum

brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na// yul khams dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// mchan khung g.yon du tshogs bdag sku// sbas nas sngags bzlas gang 'dod pa// rang gi dbang du byed par 'gyur// rnal 'byor gang zhig sgrub

pa pos// gsung gi tshogs bdag dmar por bsgrub// zangs la tshogs bdag dmar po'i sku// glang chen gdong can phyag bzhi pa// g.yas na la phug nor bu dang// g.yon pa dgra s+t+wa kha T+wAM ga/ gsum po che la

rgyan gyis brgyan// zla ba'i gdan bzhug sngags 'dis bsgrub// oM b+huM ga Na pa ti sa ra ka rat+na sid+d+hi hUM/ 'bod pa'i sngags so// A+oM b+ha ga trai ka dang Sh+ta bi d+ha hUM phaT/ bsgrub pa'i sngags so// tsan+dan
dmar po byug pa'i maN+Dal steng du tshogs bdag bzhugs/ me tog dmar pos mchod pa bya// lha klu mi yi bu mo yis// bdag la bkur sti byed par 'gyur// bud med thams cad dbang du sdud// gang gi bsgrub
pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thugs kyi tshogs bdag nag po bsgrub// dur khrod ras la sku bris te// mdun du maN+Dal steng du gzhag/ mi sha mar khu 'bras la sogs// gtor ma thod par bshams la 'dul// rang nyid

pad+ma dbang chen bsgom// mdun du tshogs bdag glang gdong nag/ ral gri g.yas la thod pa g.yon// rtsangs pa zhon pa bsam par bya// A+oM hri dzaM be mo hri stam b+hi a na d+hi hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha/ bi nA ya ka ha ti b+hi sha tsi

ba liM g+h+r-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ 'bum tsho gsum bzlas gtor ma 'bul// mi sha glang khrag mar khu yis// sbyin sreg khri 'bum dngos su yang// de la gang 'dod dngos grub blangs// gsad par 'dod na btsan du

gdang// gu gul tsha dang dgra yi ming// mar ngo'i bcu bzhi'i nub mo la// tsher ma'i hom du khri tsho gcig/ bsreg na zhag bdun dag na gsod// de yi gsang sngags 'di bzlas so// A+oM hri pi nA ya ka che ge mo sha tUM

na sha ya s+t+waM b+ha mA ra ya hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor gang zhig grub pa pos// yon tan tshogs bdag ser po bsgrub// rin chen gser sogs rdza sa la// tshogs bdag ser po sprel mgo can// phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar

bar bya// khong du rin chen 'bru spos dang// dar zab sngags dang bcas pa gzhug/ maN+Dal gru bzhi ser po yi// steng du bzhag nas mchod par bya// sngags 'di bzlas na 'dzam gling gi/ longs spyod nor gyi char

ba 'bebs// gu gul dud pas rtag tu bdug/ A+oM rat+na rat+na rat+na rat+na ga Na pa ti ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga Na pa ti tsu ru tsu ru ma nu pa tra ru ru ru ru ga Na pa ta ye ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/ bsnyen pa go brgyad pa'i sngags

so// A+oM badzra a ru ru sha ma hA gu ra be/ ma ma puSh+tiM ku ru/ A kar+sha ya hUM dzaH/ sgrub pa'i sngags so// 'dod pa'i longs spyod ma lus dang// gter chen po yang rnyed par 'gyur// gang zhig rnal 'byor sgrub pa

pos// phrin las tshogs bdag nag po bsgrub// tshogs bdag nag po glang chen mgo// phyag bzhi zhabs ni brkyang bskum bzhugs// g.yas pa mche ba zhags pa 'dzin// g.yon pa dgra s+t+wa kha T+wAM bsnams// yum

ni phag gdong dgra s+t+wa kha T+wAM dang// b+han+d+ha khrag bkang zhal du stob// A+oM na mo ga Na ba d+he dzaH ya ba ra ne dz+hi ba tri ya swA hA/ 'bod pa'o// rU pa bak+Sha bi nA ya ka me ra hUM/ tri na ga b+he the su ru b+ha hUM phaT/ yak+sha ka la ma

hA b+hai ra be tri bra tsa sha truM nr-i dza nr-i dza/ rbad pa'i sngags so// yak+sha ka la/ ma hA b+hai ra be de ba yak+sha ma/ nA ga che ge mo thum ril ya/ rbad pa'i sngags gnyis pa'o// nA sha ya nA sha ya/ se ga ya sa sha ya/

tsU ra Na tsU ra Na/ tra sa ya/ na ga ya ka tra sha mA ra ya/ ha na tsakra/ ha na tsakra/ bi nA ya ka dzi bi tAn+ta ta ka rA ya/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ gsad pa'i sngags so// A+oM b+hi g+ha b+hi ba b+h+yi sarba bir+yA bi sha ya/ hri da yA

hri da yA/ tsi tu ba tu/ sra ma du ta ya/ ha na ha na gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ya ma/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ gsang ba'i sngags gnyis pa'o// rbad sngags gnyis ni nyin dang mtshan// dang po dgra bo
srog nas 'dren// gnyis pa dgra la rbad par bya// gsad sngags gnyis ni nyid dang mtshan// dang po gsad pa'i gsang sngags yin// gnyis pa thun gyis gsad pa'i sngags// dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag po

ru// dgra gzugs spra tshil ras byas te// de yi snying gar ming rus gzhug/ dgra rdzas rnyed tshad de la byug/ la du+u la phug nya sha dang// sgog btsong 'bras chen dkar gsum dang// mngar gsum sbyar ba'i gtor ma

dang// ce spyang thod par spye tshe dang// nyung dkar nyung nag zi ra yis// thun bya ling+gar brab par bya// tha mar bka' rten 'og tu gnan// dgra bgegs 'byung po dbang du byed// tshogs kyi bdag pos 'dul bar
'gyur// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las// tshogs kyi bdag pos dbang du sdud pa sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis spre'u'i rgyal po ha lu man+d+ha'i sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// shes rab snying rje ldan pa yis// dbang dang dam tshig thob nas ni// sems can kun la snying rjer ldan// de lta bu yi gang zag gis// rgyal gyi nyin

par sku gzugs 'cha'// de yang snga dro'i dus su shis// rab ni gser dngul zangs dang lcags// 'bring ni spre'u shing zhes bya dang// bra ma tsa ra'i shing la bya// tha ma rdza sa dag la byas// dbang dang dam tshig ldan

pa yi// bzo bo mkhas pas bya ba yang// tshad ni rtse sor brgyad pa la// dbyibs ni zhal gsum phyag bzhi pa// rtsa zhal dbus ma spre'u gdong dmar// g.yas pa khyung gi mgo ni ser// g.yon pa seng ge'i dbu yang

dkar// phyag g.yas dang po rin po che// g.yon pa 'bras bu can gyi shing// 'og ma gnyis ni thugs kar ni// thal mo khong stong sbyar ba la// spre'u'i zhabs gnyis tsog bur bzhugs// sku mdog ser po mjug ma

can// legs par byas nas dbang po tshang// gdan ni bum pa pad+ma dang// brag gi steng na bzhugs par bya// sku gzugs khong stong nang du ni// spre'u'i snying dang rin chen lnga// byi ba'i pho mtshan 'bru sna lnga// snying po

lnga dang sman lnga dang// dri sna lnga dang tsan+dan dmar// dar zab gu gul dkar po rnams// nang du bcug la zhabs sdom bya// de la g+ha las sku bskyed nas// spyan drang rang rgyud bstim mchod de// rten
'brel snying po bzlas nas ni// dben pa'i gnas sam mchod pa'i gral// maN+Dal steng du bzhugs su gsol// yi ge g+ha las sku yang bskyed// rang nyid yi dam rta mgrin sku// thugs ka'i nyi ma'i dbus nyid
nas// hrIHlas 'od zer 'phros nas ni// rang rgyud gnas nas 'gugs par bya'o// yi ge hrIHdmar 'od dpung ste// nub phyogs snang mdzad zhing khams nas// kha sar pa Ni'i nus mthu rnams// mdun gyi spre'u

la thim pas// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// de dus oM AHhUM zhes brjod// kha sar pA Ni thugs rje che// de yi byin rlabs sprul pa yi// spre'u ha lu ma d+ha yi// srog nas drong pa'i sngags 'di yin// A+oM ba ra

ta ka ha ya grI ba ha lu man d+ha swA hA/ bzhi gsum bcu gnyis ngo bo las// mgo mjug 'bru bzhi ldan pa ni// bsnyen pa'i sngags zhes bya ba ste// gsang sngags chen po rang srog yin// bsnyen pa 'bum du bzlas
pas na// bud med thams cad dbang du 'du// bsnyen pa nyis 'bum bzlas gyur na// skyes pa pho rnams dbang du sdud// bsnyen pa sum 'bum bzlas gyur na// 'jig rten nor rdzas dbang du sdud// 'di dus thal

sbyar phyag gi nang// spre'u la spos kyi rengs bu dbul// bsnyen pa them par gyur nas ni// skar ma rgyal gyi dus su'am// yang na zla stod bco lnga la// mchod pa gtor ma rgya chen 'bul// kham bu'i gtor rgyan la

phug dang// 'bras chen gtor ma dbul bya zhing// rtsa sngags bsnyen pa'i mjug tu yang// dngos grub blang ba'i sngags 'di gdags// rat+na rat+na sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/ pha la pha la/ ba shang ku ru/ ba su d+ha ra/ puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/

zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/ byang chub sems dpa' spre'u'i rgyal po ha lum d+ha dbang sdud kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs
kyi mkha' 'gro mas dbang du sdu ba 'di dag bsgrub par gsungs so// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma yi// mkha' 'gro rnam gsum bsgrub par bya// sku yi rin chen mkha' 'gro ser// gsung gi pad+ma mkha' 'gro
dmar// thugs kyi rdo rje mkha' 'gro nag/ kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// g.yas pa yid bzhin nor bu la// g.yon pa gter gyi bum pa bsnams// de yi gsang ba'i thugs kyi sngags// A+oM na ma su tri mu

khri ma hA bi sha tsirna ye swA hA/ nor 'du ba'i sngags so// A+oM gr-i na ba na ma hA bi sha tsi ne ye swA hA/ zas 'du ba'i sngags so// A+oM mi li ki li se li ki swA hA/ gos 'du ba'i sngags so// de nas gtor ma bya ba ni/ chang
gi chang bu gsum byas nas// oM dang AHdang hUM zhes pa// byin brlab bdud rtsi gsol dgyes bsam// sgrub pos 'di skad brjod la dbul// mkha' 'gro ma khyed gsum gtor mas mchod pas/
nor dang zas dang gos kyis mi phongs pa'i dngos grub dang/ de nyid chos dang mthun pa'i grogs su mdzad du gsol// zhes brjod gtsang sar gtor ba yis// sems can rnams la ci 'dod pa// gtor ma de
las 'byung bar bsam// trAM las rin chen phung por bsam// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/ mkha' 'gro ma rnam pa gsum gyi dbang du sdud pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dang po sgrub par 'dod pa yis// byang phyogs gnas su dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi pa yi rnam lngas byug/ de dbus dmar la zlum pa
bya// bshos bu dag la ri bong snying// le'u brgan dar yang gdags par bya// hrIHlas gri gug 'od zhu bas// gnod sbyin gzhan gyis mi thub dmar// gri gug g.yas la thod pa g.yon// ne'u le'i rkyal pa mchan

khung bkal// yab yum nor sbyin sku mdog ljang// rin chen g.yas la rkyal bu g.yon// spyan drang bzhugs mchod sngags 'di bzlas// A+oM hri a pa ra dzi ta yag sha hUM/ A+oM u ma ri hring hring dza dzaH 'bum tsho gsum
du bzlas par bya'o// rdza yi ga'u la sbyor du// pho mo'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// gser dngul bye ru mu tig shel// dkar gsum mngar gsum blug la bzhag/ nya nas gzug la nya la gdon// grangs them

dkar gsum mngar gsum za// ga'u dben par sba bar bya// ma d+hal tsan+da chu yis bsil// oM hrIHA+oM hUM/ a ba ra dzi ta hrIH/ hUM u ma ri hring hring/ dzo ba ri dzo ba ri hring hring hUM hUM/ a ka sha ya dzaHdzaH/ shIn+taM ku ru puSh+tiM
ku ru swA hA/ bud med 'du dang nor 'phel dang// dgra yi gnod pa mi 'byung dang// lha min rnams kyis gter char 'bebs// dkar gsum 'bras chan khu ba sha/ shing thog bzang drug gtor ma chang// 'bru

gsum sngags kyi byin brlabs nas// rdo rje gsum gyi phyag rgya byas// A+oM a par dzi ta yag sha hriM u ma ri hriM hriM hUM hUM/ ba liM ta a mr-i ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ha na ha na/ sha truM pa tsa ya/

shIn+taM pu+iSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ sngags bdun brjod la gtor ma dbul/ A+oM 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod cing// khams gsum dbang du sdud byed pa'i// ci bsam lhun gyis 'grub pa yi// dngos grub chen po bdag la

stsol// tshig 'di zangs kyis bris nas ni// gung mo bar du bcug byas na// nya yi nub mo kho 'ong bas// rnal 'byor mi smra brtan par bya// smras na bar chad chen po 'byung// bla ma mched la gnod pa dang// sangs
rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba la// dkyil 'khor gru gsum nang du ni// ri bong thod pa bzhag byas la// ltag par pha dang mes po bri// rna ba g.yas pa pha spun la// g.yon pa la ni bu sring bri// kha ru ming

rus gang yin gzhug/ A+oM ya sha a pa ra dzi ta che ge mo A kar+sha ya dza dzaH/ dgug pa'i sngags so// a pa ra dzi ta 'ub tre ya yA/ gzugs la dbab pa'o// rbad bu ni rbad bu ni tsit+ta la dza dzaH/ yag sha che ge mo thum

laM thus ril rbad dza dzaH/ yag sha tshal pa tshal ba yA yA/ che ge mo ma ra ya a ba ra dzi tas sod sod// nyung dkar nyung nag dug khrag dang// skye tshes brdeg cing zla gcig bsgrub// dmag dpon byed dang srog

chags bshas// a tsar bskor ba byed pa na// ling+ga me la bsreg par bya// thal ba chu la bskur bar bya// dgra bo myur du 'chi bar 'gyur// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/ gnod sbyin chen po
a pa ra dzi ta sgrub pa'i thabs bstan pa ste le'u dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spre'u sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa ni// byang chub sems

dpa' spre'u ru bstan// dang po byang chub sems bskyed nas// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las// A+oM las byang chub sems spre'u// g.yas na ri bong 'dzin pa la// g.yon na shing lo 'dab mas 'dzin// sngags

'dis de nyid bskyed par bya// oM sid+d+hi wa rna mu kha ma// rang 'dra spyan drang bstim mchod 'bul// oM b+ho tre b+ho tre/ ma b+hi sha ma b+hi sha/ ma dza ra ma dza ra hUM phaT swA hA/ lag mthil mchil ma blugs nas ni// rang gi

srin lag g.yas pa yis// smin phrag dag tu thig le ni// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig bya// gnod pa kun las bsrung bar 'gyur// gal te thig le 'chor ba na// lus kyi gzugs kyis bsrung ba la// shing la pho
mtshan gzugs bya la// sngags bris gur gum chus byugs la// rang gi sked par gdags par bya// khye'u bu mo gtsang ma ni// chags pa ma spyad gzhon pa yis// bkal ba'i skud pa gsum sgril la// mdud pa

bdun nam gsum byas nas// brgya'am stong btab ske la gdags// yang na khyi yi rnga ma dang// ra dag gi ni og zhol dang// ra pho'i rmang kha'i spu gsum la// skud pa byas nas sngags bzlas te// sked pa dag la

gdags par bya// nga yi sngags 'di bzlas pa bya// oM ha ra ha ra/ b+han+d+ha ni/ shu kra d+ha ra ni/ si ra the swA hA/ yang ni sa bon 'dzag pa la// seng ge dkar mo'i thag pa gcad// rang gi bu sring 'doms kyi spu// khyi
mo'i mjug spu'i skud pa yis// gang 'dzag gsang ba'i rdo rje bcing// seng ge dkar mo'i lcags thag gcad// gsang ba rdo rje'i gzugs bris nas// sngags bris bu mo gtsang ma yis// skud pa bkal nas 'khor

lo de// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas rang sked gdags// A+oM shukra d+ha ra d+ha ra swA hA/ g.yon du bris pa'o// A+oM shu kra d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM hUM swA hA/ g.yas su bri ba'o// 'chang ba po ka s+ya rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ dbus su bri

ba'o// oM a na lha 'tshug 'tshug swA hA/ rtse mor 'khor lo bri ba'o// rdo rje che ba'i man ngag la// thar nu re'u lcags lan tshwa dang// bong bu'i gsang tsher zo 'jor dang// khyi yi gsang tshil sbrang rtsi sbyar// byugs shing

mnyes nas bskam par bya// rdo rje mi ldang bsrung ba ni// rdo rje'i gzugs ni bris nas kyang// sngags bkod ngor rtar gdags par bya// des ni ldang bar 'gyur ba yin// ta ra so phul/ 'bras bu g.yon pa'i rtsa

bar bri ba'o// h+ya then then then/ 'bras bu'i dbus su bkod pa'o// mo ri/ pho phul/ 'bras bu g.yas pa'i rtsa bar bri ba'o// thas has khyi sing lang lang/ 'bras bu gnyis kyi bar du bkod par bya'o// b+hi mo khyi

gang le lang la/ g.yon du bri'o// khyi kha la ni lang lang/ g.yas su bri ba'o// ma he so ni par lang lang/ dbus su bri'o// ba baMd baMd baMd/ 'khor lo la bri'o// pi sa ra tha kha la bri'o// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa

dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/ lus zungs dbang du bya ba rtsa ba rang gsang gi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje phub khur zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// dbus su A+oM gyi khog pa na// lus

ngag yid kyi srung sngags bri// gru bzhi logs la sngags kyis brgyan// A+oM gyi mgo mjug ngos su ni// brnag pa'i ling+ga gnan par bya// logs gnyis rdo rje mtshan par bya// zur bzhir sde brgyad bdud dang ni// klu

dang sa bdag bsrung bar bya// de yi sngags ni 'di yin no// badzra hUM sang ha kha ma/ badzra kA ya/ badzra bA ka tsit+ta badzra ha ri sang sang/ rdo rje'i rgyal po'i lus ngag yid gsum la ka s+ya ye rak+Sha rak+Sha/ A+oM gyi khog par

bri ba'o// sang sang her her b+ha dzo/ ne lo khi khi/ ka la sad mo ni na ti/ dz+ha ba kyi/ gru bzhi'i lcags ri'i nang du bri ba'o// tsakra badzra he ru ka rak+Sha/ he badzra mu+u seng kha rak+Sha/ ta lo le sa ra rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ma sa dz+ha rak+Sha

rak+Sha/ zur bzhir shar du bri ba'o// lam lam bdud/ lim lim klu/ phem phem sa bdag sa ma ya sde brgyad/ zur bzhi bri ba'o// pa ra ya/ se ba ra ni/ kang kha mo ni/ ba ra ya/ 'og tu bri ba'o// 'khor lo nam

mkha' bskor byas na// lha srin gnod pa dbang du byed// sa la brdung na klu rnams brgyal// shog dril mgul du btags pa na// rdo rje'i phub khur lta bu ste// cis kyang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// thams cad dbang
du sdud par byed// dregs pa dbang sdud chen po yin// spre'u thal sbyar byang chub sems// spyan ras gzigs sprul chen po ste// g.yas na kham shing 'dzin pa la// g.yon na 'khor lo 'phyar bar
bsgom// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/ rdo rje gur phub kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad nyid kyi ngang du

rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ gsang ba'i man ngag 'di dag gsungs so// rnam par shes dang bem rig las// mgal ma ma thag bde ba spro// sgo nga dag la brten pa yi// dmigs pa de la gsal ba na// mi rta chu dang
'o ma bzhin// yul la 'brel nas byung ba ste// snang dang mched grogs nyer thob pas// gsum gsum dag tu gsal ba stong// snang stong gnyis med phyogs dag pa// gser gyi ba thag 'dra bar bya// g.yas pa me

la g.yon rlung dang// gnyis pa brdal chu khams kun stong// gtso dang 'khor du gang byung ba// lo zla zhag dang nyi ma las// srog dang rtsol ba bsgom par bya// gsang stong rtogs par gyur pa na// spyi mgrin snying lte
gsang ba ru// dga' bzhi brgyad gnyis yab yum las// lhan cig skyes pas bde chen bzlas// rig pa kun khyab srog la byung// mi rtogs thabs kyi gnas su tshud// bde ba ye shes 'char ba'o// rang byung ye

shes chen po yin// pho mo ma ning thod rgal gzung// tsha grangs rus pa yon tan zin// du ba smig rgyu srin me dang// mar me nyi ma lus sems mthong// rdo rje'i bzlas pa de ltar bya// gru gsum las ni gzhan

bzlas pa// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i oM// lnga pa'i dang por bzhi gsum sbyar// lnga pa'i tha ma lnga dang po// steng du i zhes bya ba dang// bzhi yi dang po bdun pa'i gsum// de la i yis spras pa ni// bzhi pa'i

dang po is spras te// bdun pa'i tha ma gnyis blangs pa'i// tha ma i yis brgyan par bya// gnyis pa'i dang po dang po'i gsum// de sbyar dang po drug gnyis spras// lnga pa'i bzhi pa lan gnyis blangs// de la drug
pa'i dang po ni// gnyis sbyar oM gnyis brgyan bar bya// bdun pa'i bzhi pa lan gsum la// u gsum sbyar nas thig le gsum// lnga pa'i gnyis la bzhi'i dang po// de gnyis spras pas bcu bdun pa'o// bzlas

pa'i sngags rnams 'di las byung// ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ aM aH/ zhes gsungs
so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/ rlung rdo rje bzlas pa gsang sngags bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs las hrIHzhes brjod pas/ pad+ma he
ru ka don yod pas// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// rta mgo ljang gu hrIHbrjod pa// g.yas na rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dang cang te'u// g.yon na me dpung zhags pa thod khrag bsnams/ yum gzi
ldan ma dang 'khril bar gyur nas/ nyid kyi 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa// rnam par rtog bral gdod nas skye med dbyings// ma bcos mtha' yas chen por gsal// mnyam nyid bde chen byang
chub sems kyi mchog/ smra bsam yul 'das mtha' dag 'od gsal zhing// de lta'i chos kyi sku la gnas bzhin du// dmigs med yul bral snying rjes yongs la khyab// mkha' snang stong pa'i cho 'phrul gsal
mdzad cing// de lta'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bzhengs nas// dri med thugs rje'i 'od mdangs gsal ba yis// thugs kyi rtags ston 'od zer rgyal ba'i sku// rnam gsum sems dpa' gsang sngags 'od

phreng tshogs// chags pa'i skyon bral ye shes lnga yi mdangs// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid de// rkyen gyi sngags bcas ma lus gsal bar byed// de lta'i sprul ba sku ru shar ba yis// dbang sdud
dbang gi rgyud chen gsungs pa ni// zung la mtha' yas 'gro ba'i don du spyod// ces gtad pas 'khor thams cad kyis rjes su 'dzin par gyur to// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon dbang du sdud pa las/
rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud rdzogs so// gu ru pad+ma dang kha che A nan+das bsgyur ba'o//// dbang chen 'dus rgyud dam gal por grags pa/

rgya gar skad du/ ma he sha sa mU'u dA ya ma hA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyu chen po zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/

rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po ji ltar dngos grub dam pa thob par 'dod na/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i stong pa nyid las langs te/ yi ge hUM du bsgom la/ yid kyis bar snang gi

khams thams cad gser gyi seng ge spyan gsum pa la 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrigs pa drug gi steng du rin po che'i khri phyogs bcur 'od 'bar ba'i steng du pad+ma le brgan 'od phyogs bcur 'bar ba/ de bas zhabs

gang tsam gyis mtho ba'i steng du/ ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur pa dmigs la/ de'i steng du sbyor ba'i dbang phyug chen po/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya badzra hUM zhes pa

'dis bcings nas/ mngon sum du bsgrub pa'o// hUM zhes bzlas pa tsam gyis phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir rin po che'i ka ba 'phang du dpags tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong bas kyang dpags pa/ ka ba gcig la yang

sprin med pa'i nyi ma bdun bdun gyis brgyan pa/ 'od zer stong gsum gyi stong chen po bas kyang dpag par dmigs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ skye gnas bzhi las skyes
pa'i sems can thams cad dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang/ rigs ngan thams cad dang rigs med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags hUM zhes zer ba las/ bskal pa'i me 'bar ba mang

pos brgyan pa'o// g.yas kyi gshog pa gnyis ni/ steng ma rin po che'i rgyu las byung bar nga rgyal bskyed do// 'og ma sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yin pas/ rgyun mi chad par rdo rje 'bar

bas 'joms pa'o// the'u gshog rnams ni gang gi snying la 'dren pa yin pas rdo rje lcags kyu rnon po'i mchog kyang yin la/ sgrol ba'i thabs ma brtson pa yin pas grol ba dam pa'o// phyag g.yon gyi dang po ni
sdigs pa'i mdzub mo la bskal pa'i me chen po 'bar ba'o// gcig gis ni lu gu rgyud kyi zhags pa'o// gcig gis ni thod pa khrag gis bkang ba'o// bdag nyid chen po'i zhal du 'bul lo// gcig gis ni khra

bo chen po brgyad kyi snying dang rgyu ma kun lhan cig du tshang bar bcug nas za'o// gcig gis ni rdo rje kha TAM ga dang/ rngai'u chung dang/ lcags kyu lhan cig tu bzung ste gang gi snying nas 'dren pa'o// phyag g.yas dang

g.yon pa brgyad char yang sbrul nag po dang sngo bkra dag gis brgyan pa'o// kha nas byang hUM gis sgra grags par sha stag go/ de dag gis snying po 'di brjod par bya'o// oM ha ha ru lu ru lu phaT dzaHzhes brjod pas/

snga phyi'i brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ phra men ma'i 'khor mang po dbang du bsdus nas/ gzhan yang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mang po sprin phung bzhin du dbang du 'dus nas/ de'i steng du bdag nyid chen pos
hUM thang gcig bzlas pas zhabs dmar po brgyad dus gcig la byung bar bsam mo// de nas shar phyogs kyi khams 'dul ba'i zhabs ni/ drag shul dpal 'bar ldan pas stag gi gdong gis dkris te/ shar

phyogs kyi hUM kA ra'i snying gar rdog pas brdzis te nyam thag pa'i 'bod sgrog chen po 'don pa'o// shar lho mtshams su Ar+ya a tsa le mdog sngo skya gan rkyal du mnan pa'i snying gar zhabs kyi bol man chod nub par

dmigs te/ zhabs baiDUr+ya sngon po zhu bas g.yogs pa'o// zhabs gcig ni lho phyogs gyi khams 'dul ba yin pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i na bzas bklubs te ya mAn+ta ka'i snying gar rdog pas mnan pas zhabs kyi bol
man chad nub pa'o// zhabs gcig gis lho nub kyi nI la daN+Da'i snying gar rdog pas mnan te 'bod sgrog gi sgrar 'byin par dmigs la zhabs pas khrab smug pos sgrib pa'o// zhabs gcig ni rdo rje phur par
dmigs pas sbrul nag pos dkris pas pad+ma kuN+Da li mdog nag po'i snying gar btsugs nas 'khor mang po dbang du 'dus pa'o// nub byang mtshams kyi 'dod pa'i khams dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir zhabs dmar
po'i mthil gnyis khro bo chen po'i khar dmigs la/ rkang pa'i nang gzhal yas khang du dmigs la/ zhabs kyi mthil nas kha dog dmar po las 'od 'phro bas 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i mgo rkang gi nang

du song ba dmigs la/ rdo rje mche bas bcom par bltas nas 'khor mang po 'phrog par byed do// zhabs gcig ni chu srin gyi smad g.yogs can byang phyogs su brkyangs pas a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha bub tu mnan nas/
rdog pas 'gel ba thams cad bcom nas/ bol man chad rlon pa'i nang du nub par dmigs la/ sdug bsngal thams cad myong bar byas te/ phyi ma'i dus na rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po thob par gyur cig par
smon lam 'debs so// zhabs gcig ni 'dod pa'i lha mos phyag byas la gzig gi mgo yis dkris te/ byang shar mtshams su ma hA ba la'i ldan par mnan pas dung chen po bcom ste/ 'khor gyi lha mo'i tshogs

dang/ ma sring mo dang chung ma dang bu mo dang tsha bo tsha mo rnams 'phrog go/ gshog pa g.yas dang g.yon pa'i steng ma ni/ rin po che'i rgyu las byung ba 'dod chags chen po yin no// gshog pa 'og ma khro bo'i rgyu las

byung bas rdo rje drag po'i tshogs yin no// the'u gshog rnams ni 'dod pa'i gtso bo yin pas shes rab kyi mchog dang sbyor ba'o// spyi'i gshog pa bzhi char gyi bar bar ni sbrul nag po'i rgyu las byung ba'o// bar bar

ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa las byas pa'o// bar bar ni rin po che'i rgyu las byas pa'i nyi ma stong gis bklubs pa'o// 'di dag thams cad kyi bzlas pa ni/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra hUM/ oM badzra a mo g+ha hUM/ zhes brjod cing

las thams cad bcol lo// gong ma'i rdo rje'i grwa la 'og min lha mo glog 'gyu ma/ de la he ru ka khro bo thams cad kyi bzlas pa ni 'di yin no// A+oM ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ e ma ra li hrIM hUM dza/ nye ba'i snying po bzhi

'bum byas na las nus so// de lta bas na dpal chen he ru ka khro bo mtha' dag gi mchog/ chos kyi dbyings yin pas/ 'dod chags chen po sbyor ba/ zhe sdang mchog la brtson pa/ nga rgyal gyi dbang du 'dus pa/

phrag dog gi 'dod pa'i dbang po tshur bcas nas/ dpal dbang chen pad+ma he ru ka nyid sgrub par dam bcas te/ dpal chen po'i sgrub pa la brtson pa la sdang ba dang gnod pa'i bgegs rnams tshar gcod pa ni/

dpal chen po nyid byung bas drag po'i bgegs rnams kyi dbang du 'dus par mi 'gyur ro// des na dpal pad+ma he ru ka la brtson zhing sgrub par byed pa'i rgyal sras kyi mthu bo che zhig byung nas/ des dngos grub kyi
khyad par gcig sbyin par gyis/ ma 'jigs shig dang 'dod pa'i dbang po thob par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa ni/ sngon mkhan po mkhas pa zhig gis sngon pad+ma he ru ka bsgrubs te he ru ka'i dngos grub kyi
mchog thob po// man ngag gi gzhung ni 'di yin no// de la 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/ bud med kyi tshogs mang po dag rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ rab tu mdzes pa mang po dag rgyan mdzes

par brgyan nas/ 'ong srid kyis des chags pa'i sems bskyed cing/ bar bar du phra men ma'i tshogs mang po dag mi'i thod pa mang pos brgyan te/ lag na thod khrag dang mi'i thod pa mang po thogs/ mig gdugs
pa'i 'bru tshugs su blta zhing/ mi snyan pa'i tshul gyis bdag la gsad do// bza'o brdeg go/ tshig chad dam/ thams cad 'od zer des bcom btags nas bla na med pa'i byang chub las bkod pa'i thabs 'dis

bya'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yang dag yin la khams gsum gyi bdag po chen po yang dag kyang yin zhing/ khro bo chen po yang dag yin no zhes dmigs la/ nyi

ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du snga ma'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin las/ sku mdog dmar po dbu lnga phyag bcu drug tu dmigs la rin po che dang/ rdo rje'i rgyu las byung ba'i gshog
pa bzhi yang bskyed par bya ste/ dbu lnga po'i bzhi ni phyogs bzhir 'bar ba'i gzugs kyis blta'o/ dbus ma'i klad par/ rin po che'i gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs nas/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad
bzhugs par dmigs la/ thod pa'i ngos bzhi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i/ rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dmar po phyag rgya tshul bzhin du bcas nas bsgom mo// g.yas g.yon gyi dbu ni sku mdog dmar

po/ spyan gsum du dmigs la/ ral pa dmar po'i dbus nas/ rta mgo ljang gu re re byung bar bsam mo// lhag par rta mgrin dngos su byung bar bsams te/ hUM rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra grags pa tsam gyis/ nub

phyogs kyi phra men ma rnams kyis/ 'khor mang po'i klu thams cad drag po'i brtul zhugs kyis dbang du 'du bar bya'o// lho dang byang du blta ba'i mgo yang hUM hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin pas/ gnod sbyin gyi
'khor thams cad dang grul bum gyi 'khor thams cad dang/ phra men gyi 'khor thams cad kyis/ hUM hUM zhes bsgrags pa tsam gyis zhabs 'og tu song bar dmigs la gnas la bstab par bya'o// shar phyogs su

blta ba'i mchog dmar po spyan gsum pa'i zhal nas kyang/ hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra drag po bsgrag cing ljags 'dril ba tsam gyis kyang/ spyi gtsug tu rdo rje kha T+wAM ga 'bar ba gsum gnas par bsam mo// yang shar

phyogs su 'bar ba'i gzugs kyis blta bar bya'o// smin ma glog bzhin 'bar ba/ smin mtshams kyi bar khro gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod par bya ste/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshig gi hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis brgya byin dang/
tshangs pa dang/ de'i gnas thams cad/ phra men ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa zhabs 'og tu song bar dmigs la/ gnas la bstab par bya'o// hUM kA ra rgyud dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir/ phyag rgyas

bcings la dbang po cher nga rgyal bskyed do// phyag bcu drug la g.yas g.yon gnyis na rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas 'gugs pa'o// phyag g.yas gcig na sbrul nag gi zhags pa bsnams pa'o// phyag g.yas pa
gcig na rnge'u chung dang kha T+wAM gcig tu 'dzin pa'o// phyag g.yas pa gcig na thod rlon khrag gis bskang ba nas dung nang bsres pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab 'byams mtha' klas pa'i 'od zer

bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs te za ba'o// phyag g.yas pa bzhi ni/ rgyun mi chad par zlos shing rdo rje 'bar bas brdeg go/ phyag g.yas pa'i dpung rgyan dang/ gdu gu sbrul nag po mi sdug pa kha nas zer ba mang po

srid kyis/ de la ma 'jigs par khro bo chen po'i sku sgoms shig dang/ bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin las ma g.yos pa dang/ 'khor thams cad kyis rang dbang med par phyag byed kyis dngos grub dang po gcig dang

sbyor ro// de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin gyi tshul ston cing ral pa 'bar ba la/ mi mgo mang pos lus brgyan cing/ lag na rdo rje dang ral gri thogs pa dag mi'i rgyu ma ske nas 'dogs shing/ sbrul nag po dag lus la za

ba'i rnam par snang ba dag 'byung bas dkris te/ rtsib ma skra tshom dam du bsdam pa dag 'ong gis/ de la ma 'jigs shig dang/ dngos grub dam pa gnyis pa thob pa yin no// de nas gnod sbyin dang grul bum gyi

dbang por 'gyur ba yin no// bar snang la gnas pa'i lha khro bo rnams kyis sdigs pa dang/ gnod pa sna tshogs 'dra ba byed do// lha gshegs pa dag gis sgra drag po dag 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa dang/ sbrul nag po

dag me dang dug kha nas skyugs pa dang/ a la la zer zhing sgra 'byin pa dang/ mig g.yas g.yon nyi mar gyur te 'bar ba'i gzugs kyi blta ba dang/ lto ba phyes nas mi ro gsar rnying dag ston pa dang/ pho mo'i
mtshan ma thams cad za ba'i khar sgyur nas/ 'jigs tshogs kyi mche ba 'dar ba/ rkang pa phur par gyur te/ bdag la 'debs shing gnod par byed par de ltas mgo mi lpags rlon pas g.yogs shing/ lag
pas rdo rje brdegs pa dag 'ong gis ma 'jigs shig dang/ dngos grub gsum pa thob pa yin no// de ni lha thams cad kyi dbang por gyur to// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ de man chad kyis dpal dbang
chen pad+ma he ru ka'i gal po las/ sgrub pa don gyi le'u ste dang po'o//// sku gsung thugs kyi cho 'phrul cir yang bsgyur zhing cir yang ston pa thams cad du gnas te/ gcig tu ma nges pa'i phyir
na/ thugs kyi che ba nyid dang/ sku'i che ba nyid la sogs te/ sku gsung thugs gang yang ma 'gags pa'i sgo nas/ byin rlabs so sor 'byung ste/ khams gsum rnam par gnon rab tu gnon

to// dper na nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams kyis/ blta ba theg pa chen po ma mthong ste/ 'dul ba nyi chol gnas pa'i sgo nas sbyangs pa'i bar snang la gnas pa gnod sbyin mthu bo che shin tu nye'o zhes dran pa nye

bar gzhag pa/ dge ba chung ba la gsal bar 'byung ngo// de bzhin du sbyar te/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam tshig la gnas pa'i khro bo rnams shin tu rlabs che'o// de yang ci'i

phyir zhe na/ nyan thos skyes bu chen po rnams kyis zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ dmangs rigs rnams 'dul ba dang/ nyan thos kyi sa la bzhag pa rnams/ gdon nus par zad kyi/ bla na med

pa'i theg pa chen po'i don mi skyod pas/ khro bo chen po rnams kyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams spyod pa'i ye shes bla na med pa ston pa'i yon tan thogs pa med par spyod pas/ nyan thos pa'i mi

nye'o// rgyu'i dus na yang mi nye'o// de bzhin rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po ni/ snying ga'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa las/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sa ler snang bzhin

du me long lta bu'i ye shes dang sbyor/ sems can gyi gnas dang/ lha klu gnod sbyin la sogs pa/ sems can gyi rgyu la snang ba thams cad kyang bdag gi ye shes la snang bar zad kyi/ gzhan sus kyang snang bar mi

nus so// shAkya thub pa'i ye shes kyi dus yin no// dper na ri rab lhun po'i rtser/ dpal snang mdzad kyi skur brlabs nas/ lha'i rigs 'dzin gnas pa'i dus ni/ nga'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po yin
no// zhes sems bskyed do// bdag dang 'khor thams cad dbu mthon mthing lta bur gyur te/ bar snang gi khams bkang ste/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi khro bo dang/ khro mos bkang ste/ gser gyi seng ge spyan

gsum pa dang/ glang po che dang/ rta dang/ rma bya dang/ nam mkha'am lding la sogs pa'i khri steng/ grangs med pa la gnas pa'i dus na/ 'og min gyi gnas na khro bo rnam par rgyal ba/ rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba zhes
bya ba/ sku mdog dud kar sbyor ba dbu gsum la tshar gsum pa/ tshar gsum nyid kyang bus pa'i mgo rlon pa btags pa zhig las tshar gsum du gyur pa'o// lag pa bar bar ni bcu drug pa/ bar bar ni zhi ba'i

ting nge 'dzin/ bar bar me long lta bu'i ye shes/ bar bar ni klong chen po/ bar bar ni bar snang gi khams lta bu/ ye shes hUM gi tshogs kyis khengs par byed pa dang/ bar bar ni thibs pos stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bdag gis lto bo che'i gzhal med khang du tshud pa/ mche ba dkar po srid pa ma lus pa'i yar thal sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi steng du gtsigs pa/ ral pa dmar

po dpag gis mi lang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad zil gyis gnon pa bar bar du rdo rje'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po nges par bsgying pas rdo rje'i gnas thams cad rab

tu sra bar gyur pas nam mkha' khengs pa rab tu 'khrugs par byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings dur khrod chen po zil gyis gnon par byed pa/ zhab bgring rdo rje'i rol mo byed pa khrag khrig/ rjes su 'breng ba/ rigs

sngags kyi rgyal po rta mgrin dang rdo rje khro bo thams cad thabs gcig tu gshegs pa'i dus na/ mda' shur du 'phangs na/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha thams cad/ mkha' dag pa byed pa'i gnas la bzhugs pa'i tshe na/
ye shes kyi lha la bltas nas/ bar snang gi khams bdag gi lha'i gzhal yas khang/ nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshams kyi bar tshigs na dpal rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba/ seng ge'i gdan dang rin po che'i gzhal

med khang na/ 'khor dang ldan te bzhugs pa/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan to// dpal rnam par snang mdzad lcang lo can gyi pho brang na lha'i 'khor mang po dang ldan te/ nga ni byang chub mchog dang ldan pas/

'di las gong na med do// zhes nga rgyal skyes pa'i tshe na/ khro bo'i 'khor rnams kyi ye shes la snang bar gyur te/ de dag kyang nga rgyal gzhom zhing/ rigs gcig pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes don rtog par bya ba'i

phyir/ thabs 'di lta bus 'dul lo// rdo rje khro bo he ru ka khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas/ bar snang gi khams thams cad yi ge hUM gis bkang ste/ bdag nyid chen po bus pa'i tshul du cha byad du bzhugs nas
sems kyi ye shes la snang ba'i tshad ni nyi ma 'bum 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor bas kyang gsal bar byas la bdag gi 'khor gyi lha mo grangs med pa rnams kyang bdag gi lus la 'dus nas phyag bzhi pa sku
lus thams cad kyang sbrul nag po khros pas spyangs pa lus kyi yan lag thams cad kyang thod rlon gyi phreng bas brgyan pa dbu gsum pa ste/ g.yas dmar g.yon nag po dbus mthing ga spyan gsum gsum thad

gar drang por gnas pa/ dbu'i ral pa las me stag phyogs bcur 'phro ba/ phyag bzhis g.yas pa dang po rnge'u chung/ 'og ma na mdung rtse gsum pa/ g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ tha ma na rgyu ma'i zhags

pa thogs pas/ 'di skad ces smras so// tshar gsum can gyi rnge'u chung gis// lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'joms// snang mdzad chen po a la la// gnod sbyin chen po a la la// chos kyi dbyings nyid a la la//
sangs rgyas bden tshig a la la// sems dpa' chen po a la la// zhes smras nas/ rnge'u chung lan gsum brdungs pas/ snga mas lcang lo can gyi 'khor thams cad kyang/ rdul phra mo cha shas tsam du

gyes te/ stong pa bdag med par gyur pa dang/ bar snang gi khams yi ge hUM gis bkang ba rnams de las/ hUM hUM zhes bya ba'i sgrar gyur pa las/ sngar rdul phra mo cha shas su gyur pa de dag thams cad dbang du 'dus

nas/ de dag thams cad tri shUl dang zhags pa thogs pa sha stag tu gyur pa ste/ stong pa bdag med par gyur pa dang/ de dag thams cad kyang he ru ka'i 'khor du 'dus te/ rigs gcig tu nges par byas so// rdo

rje rnam par rgyal ba khro bo chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad la snyoms par zhugs te/ khro bo'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu mthon mthing lcang lo rin po che'i kha la reg pa dang/ in+d+ra nI

la'i rgyu las byung ba dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi lcang los brgyan pa rin po che 'bar ba lngas gtsug phud byas pa/ se mo do dang do shal dang/ mgur chu la sogs pa thams cad kyi 'od gcig gis kyang phyogs
bcur 'khrigs pa/ smad g.yogs me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ pad+ma stong du sbel bas smad g.yogs byas pa/ zhabs kyi mthil nas 'od gcig gis kyang/ phyogs bcur 'khrigs pa 'od zer

bye ba phrag drug cu dus gcig tu 'gyed pa/ 'od zer rnams kyis kyang lha klu bye ba khrag khrig zil gyis gnon par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyi ma'i tshogs sprin phung bzhin du 'dus pa'i

steng du/ bdag nyid byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings nas/ oM AHhUM/ zhes brjod pas tshul bzhin du gnas par bya'o// de nas bdag gi zhabs kyi sprul pas/ khro bo chen pos brgyad mnan pa de dag kyang/
lus kyi gzugs dgu ma lags/ rmi lam bzhin du bor te/ yang dag pa'i dbang gis/ gzhan thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed pa'i/ ji las kyang mi shigs pa'i hUM kA ra brgyad du dbang bskur te/ phyogs

bzhi gling brgyad bla 'og tu dbang thob par bya'o// de ltar rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos thabs phra ba ni mtshan nyid med par dbyings gcig ste/ ming dang mtshan mas mi thogs par tshul bzhin shes par
bya'o// chos kyi dbyings mnyam par nyid yin pa las/ dkon mchog dpal dang gtsug tor dang/ lang kar shes pa bsam gtan dgra bcom pa rnams kyis so sor phye ba las/ rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i dbang phyug
ni// bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das rnams dang// bdud rnams thams cad 'joms pa'i lha// dper na rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po rnams thabs rnam pa sna tshogs pa
la tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs pas yang dang yang du mchod pa dang/ des ci bya ba yod pa'i bsgo ba thams cad dag byed/ bran gyi tshogs ni de yin no// dper na dam tshig mchog rab ni// smad

par bya ba ma yin te// khams gsum kun gyi dbang phyug ma// btsun mo rab tu sdud pa las// drag tu smra ba gang byed pa// sgeg pa'i tshogs kyis brgyan nas su// sri zhu sems kyi gdung ba la// ye shes tshogs kyis
rab 'byor ba// mnyam pa'i dbyings nyid ye shes te// gnyis ka nges par mnyam na ni// stong gsum dbang bsgyur gdon mi za// 'jig rten khams na rgya mtsho bzhin// gzugs med kun la nam mkha'i

sgra// dper na rang gi gnas khang du// rang gi gur gum chag chag gdab// rang gi dri rnams maN+Dal bya// me tog phreng bas kun tu brgyan// spos dang du ru a ga ru// li shi dang ni ga bur dang// dza ti pha la mchog

tu bsngags// lag pa phur pa mchog yin te// zhi ba sor drug zlum po bya// rgyas pa sor brgyad zur yang brgyad// dbang la zla gam nges par bzang// drag po la ni sor drug pa'o// kun kyang rtse mor hUM bzhag

ste// ngos su ha ha ru lu ru lu bsgom// rgya mdud thogs tu oM bsam ste// pho nya'i 'od zer dud kha spro// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing// bskal pa'i brag cha chen po bzhin// kun kyang rtse mor hUM bzhag ste// mig
gsum po la lcag sder can// mgo gsum po la rkang gsum po// mi sha za zhing bdud khyim 'joms// bltas pas bdud rnams tshig par byed// klu yi gnas rnams rab tu 'joms// mgo brgya po la lag brgya
ba// rkang brgya po la mig kyang brgya// lag pa rdo rje phur pa 'dzin// rta mgrin gnas ni nges par 'joms/ rkang drug po la mgo drug po// lag pa drug la mig kyang drug/ lag pa drug gis rgyud drug
'joms// g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma 'thor// g.yas pa gsum ni phur pa 'dzin// mgyogs pa'i rlung gi shugs dang 'dra// 'di rnams khro bo'i pho nya yin// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing// rang gi phyogs la

song ba'i tshe// khro bo kun kyang nges par 'chi// gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe// rang gi rkang pa phur pa yin// lcags kyi phur par rab tu grags// 'od zer dud kha reg na ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu

'joms// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas ni// phra men rnams kyang 'khor dang bcas// kun kyang ral pa 'bar ba la// lcags kyi dgra s+t+wa rab thogs te// zhing chen rab tu 'dzin pa'o// byang gi phyogs su rgyug pa

ni// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum pa'o// lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i gzugs// phub kyi lcags kyu 'dril ba bzhin// bang ni glog gis bskyod du med// skad ni nam mkha'i 'brug pas che// rab tu mi srun 'di dag
gis// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/ rkang gcig gyen du bsgreng ba ni// ya bdud chen po'i snying nas 'dren// dmyal tshogs me dpung rtsad nas gcod// rkang gcig mthur du brkyang ba yi// ma

bdud chen po'i snying nas 'dren// dmyal tshogs me dpung rtsad nas gcod// rkang gcig thad kar byung ba yi// dgra bo rnams kyi snying nas 'dren// 'byung po dag kyang dmyal thag chod// sku ni lcags thag 'khril

pa 'dra// tshems ni spu gri bshibs pa 'dra// mdangs la za zhing rengs par rgyug/ gnod sbyin mang po bsgral ba'i mchog/ de ni dpal gyi pho na ste// 'jig ten khams su za ba yi// gnod sbyin kun gyi rting na

rgyug/ glo snying nang khrol 'byin cing za// bar snang dkyil du khros pa'i tshe// nyi zla kun kyang thang la bzlog/ gza' skar kun kyang dum bur gcod// shin tu 'khrugs shing rbad pa'i tshe// bdud kyi snying khrag dron mo

'thung// bar snang khams na gnod sbyin kun// rdul phran phra mo bzhin du brlag/ dza la dza la yak+Sha khA hi/ de bas 'di rnams bstan pa'i phyir// dbang chen nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// glu bro dam tshig mchog yin

te// sgrub pa'i cho ga rdzogs pa'i tshe// sa yi 'og tu 'dom gsum bya// bru yin nam// bar bar rdo rje sems dpa' che// cha lugs ci 'dra 'khor dang bcas// sems kyis mnyam par dgod par bya// phra men 'khor

tshogs mang po kun// gnod sbyin mang po dang rol bar mdzad nas/ mang po bdag nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs/ sku mdog dkar por bsgyur byas te// glu dang bro ni bstan par bya'i// 'khor
mang po dang mnyam par 'dug pa'i dus na/ bdag gi sku mdog dmar por bsgyur ro// lam du zhugs te 'gro ba'i dus na/ sku mdog ljang gur bsgyur te/ he he zhes bya ste dgod cing 'gro'o// gang du phyin pa'i

dbus su hUM zhes bya ste 'dug par bya'o// 'on tang ma mo thams cad dbang du bsgyur bas nyal ba'i dus na a zhes bya ste tsog tsog por yud tsam zhig gnas par bya'o// bdag nyid gser btso ma'i kha dog bzhin
du 'tsher bar 'gyur te/ kun tu bzang mo nam mkha' la langs nas/ mngon sum du 'dzum par mdzad nas snyan par smra ba dang/ 'dod sbyor gyi longs spyod rtse mo yang byas par bsam mo// sa'i 'og tu mda'

'phangs pas// gnam gyi steng gi lha bran 'chi// spyod lam sgrub pa 'di ltar ro// mtshon thogs kun gyi rgyal po ste// ral gri 'dzin pa'i rgyal por gyur// 'jam dpal 'khor gyis phyag byas pa'o// gzhan zhig

nges par sgrol ba ni// rdo rje srin po'i ting 'dzin bsgom// rak+sha mig gis blta bar bya// kha nas sngags kyi tshig zlos shing// pha rol rnam shes hUM gis drang// snying gar thim pa dmigs byas na// pha rol mngon
sum 'chi bar 'gyur// mgo dang mig dang rkang lag dag/ ya mAn+ta ka'i 'khor la dbul// gzhan rnams lhag par gang yod pa// he ru ka dpal dbul bar bya// mgo dgu po la rkang gcig
po// lus nag po la 'od phung nag/ ral pa nag cing mche ba nag/ mig kyang nag cing lus nag po// mgyogs ni rlung gis bskyad du med// 'di dag pho nya'i mchog yin te// zhum pa med pa'i stobs chen

'joms// 'di dag dpal gyi pho nya ste// g.yon pa gsum ni lcags skyu 'dzin// g.yas pa gsum ni s+t+wa gri phyar// yan lag sbrul nag mchog gis brgyan// lcags kyu rnams kyis snying nas 'dren// g.yas kyi s+t+wa
gris nges par 'joms// 'di ni sgo srung mchog yin te// pho nya kun tu mngag par bya// bgegs rnams nges par phung bar byed// gnod sbyin phra men 'khor bcas kyis// bdag la rab tu gtses gyur na// phag

gi brtul zhugs chen po ni// sa yi 'og tu mngon sum bya// las kyi hUM zhes brjod par bya// mAM sa dag kyang mang du bza'// nam mkha' la ni sems dpa' bsam// bgrang phreng glad la bskor bar bya// de ltar

byas na bdag rgyal zhing// nad gtong rnams ni 'chi bar 'gyur// rkang gcig dag gi pho nya ni// kha dog zla ba ci 'dra ste// gcig la gcig ni rab tu 'khril// yang na lag pa sprel te 'gro// mig kyang med de cang
mi smra// long ba kun gyi mchog yin te// stangs stabs dag gi pho nya ni// lan 'ga' drag tu mngags pa'i tshe// gnyis ka bsdongs te der phyin nas// gang la dmigs pa len par bya// sus kyang bzlog par mi
'gyur ro// gnod sbyin rnams ni 'khol 'dod na// gnod sbyin gzugs ni khrag gis bri// dur khrod chen po mngon sum du// de yi snying gar phur mnan nas// 'gugs pa'i brtul zhugs hUM zhes bzlas// ma
'ongs bar du bzlas na ni// zhag bdun dag gis khug par 'gyur// gnod sbyin kun la ci dgar spyad// bdag gi bran dang 'dra bar 'gyur// phra men rnams ni 'khol 'dod na// phra men gzugs ni khrag gis
bris// yan lag phur pas btab nas ni// snying gar rdog pas rab mnan te// dgugs pa'i brtul zhugs hUM zhes bzlas// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par 'ong// phra men rnams ni dga' bar 'khol// khong gis
'gal na khong rnams 'chi// bdag gis 'gal na bdag nyid nyams// 'gro nyal 'dug sdod ci byed kyang// 'khor dang bcas pa'i bsnyen pa bzlas// nangs par mal nas langs nas kyang// yi dam mnos pa'i
sa phyogs su// gom gsum 'phags na dran par bya// bshang gci byed pa'i sa rnams su// dri chen lag tu blangs nas kyang// phyogs bcu kun tu kha bltas te// sus ma mthong bar khams gsum bza'// dri chu
khyor ba gang dag ni// sum ma mthong bar thengs gsum btung// shin tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// yan lag bzhi ni sa la gzugs// phag skad thengs gsum ngur bar bya// ru lu ru lu tshal pa tshal

pa/ kha ya kha ya/ rak+ta rak+ta/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ ma tang kha ru shag/ kha kha khA hi zhes byang gi phyogs su kha bltas te/ gnod sbyin dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// dri chen mdun du bzhag nas ni// mi skad thengs gsum bos nas

na// ru lu ru lu kha long kha kha long kha/ ku ku rak+sha 'grin/ ha la ha la khA hi/ nyin dang mtshan du thug phrad du// rigs ma 'chol bar sbyor bar bya// skye bos mthong na dam tshig nyams// sus ma mthong na dngos grub

yin// byang chub sems ni lce la bzhag/ dus dang rnam pa med par ni// sbyor ba kho nas las su bya// skabs la bab pa'i dus dus su// dur khrod gnas su byug par bya// zhing dang b+han+d+ha mang po bsogs// rang gi

sman sangs gang yin pa// skye bo rnams la thag bsrings nas// srod dang tho rangs nam gyi gung// ro dang nyin phyed dgong ka'i dus// dbyangs kyi skad du shes par bya// dus drug kun tu rnge'u chung brdung// srod la

'khor gsum bro brdung ste// nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas la// rta skad 'tsher ba'i glu snyan blangs// ru lu'i bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas shing// snum chen gsur gyi spos me btang// nam gyi gung la mi nyal bar// phrin

las gong ma bzhin du bzlas// byang gi phyogs su kha bltas te// dbyangs kyis shin tu brdung bar bya// de yang bsnyen pa gong ma bzhin// dus la bab pa'i bro mchod la// phyi nang drag tu mtshams bcad nas// rnge'u
chung ldir ldir lan gsum brdung// dbyangs ni yid tsam gdung bar bya// de yang dus drug kun tu blangs// sha khrag gtor ma mchod pa bshams// glu bro shar gyi phyogs su dbul// gtor ma cha gsum btang ba

yis// nyi ma phyed kyi dus su ni// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te// grul bum skad ni gtso ru bya// phrin las dgongs pa gong ma bzhin// dngos mchod dus la bab pa'i tshe// sgrin po klog pa'i cho ga bya// ha cang skad

ni mi che ba// de yang rnge'u chung dir dir brdung// dbyangs ni yid tsam gdung bar blangs// de yang dus drug kun tu yang// gsang ba'i mchod pa rgyun mi gcad// mi yi bu mo bsten par bya// lan 'ga' de dang ma
ldan na// ku ku ra dang ra la sogs// ba dang bud med gang yang rung// shin tu dgon gnas med pa'i tshe// byes dang 'gron po byed pa dang// lus la sprul pa'i lha mo yis// sbyar ba'i dam tshig mi gcad

do// 'di ltar byas na dngos grub thob// rgyun dang rgyun mi gcad par ro// sman ni lus la bsrel bar bya// sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// srog la bab pa'i gal yod kyang// dam bcas de ni ma byung tshe// mi dang
'phrad par mi bya ste// gtam dang kha rlangs 'dres pa bcad// de ltar byung na zhag gsum du// bdag gi phyag rgya 'bral mi bya// phyag nad dag gis 'chi bar 'gyur// las su dam rdzas bsags par

bya// grangs ni tshad ni 'di ltar te// zhing pa pho nya bslab pa bzhin// b+han d+ha bcu gsum lcang lo can// dgu las nyung na 'gal bar bshad// dung chen mtshan dang ldan pa la// ngas thob pa yi yo byad rung// zhal

bzhi'i gdong gas med pa la// kha dog tshon gyis mdog bsgyur te// yang na lnga'am drug tsam mam// min na dgu 'am bcu gcig go/ phyogs skyong gzhung dang mthun par bstan// mchog phur grangs kyang de bzhin

te// thod pa bu ga med pa la// kha dog tshon gyis mdog bsgyur te// mthug srab chung ba'i zlum po ni// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhag par shes// skyon med gzhan ni phyogs mtshams dgod// sman dang rak+ta dri chu

dag/ mAM sa dkyil 'khor khyab par dgram// stegs bu'i tshad ni 'di yin no// 'dom gang gru bzhi lham pa ru// dbus su 'khor lo zur drug bri// yang na pad+ma kha brgyad bri// bar khyams kun tu thod pa bri// sgo

bzhi chu srin kha yang bri// thod pa'i phyi rim re re bri// de yi tha ma rdo rjes bskor// le'u tshe dgu pa yan chad bgyi'o// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gal po las rgyud kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// thog
mar gzhal yas khang bsgom ste// tshangs pa chen po mngon sum du// dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin sngags kyis bsgral// nyan thos mdo sde kri ya dang// theg pa chen po yo ga dang// gsang ba yi ni theg pa
gsum// gzhung dang mthun pa'i gzhal yas khang// sgo bzhi rta babs mu khyud bcas// drag po khro bo'i khyams la sogs// tshangs pa'i gdung chen gshag tu gtams// yang na tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ni// brgya
byin lha yi dbang po bsgral// khyab 'jug chen po 'khor dang bcas// theg mchog a nu yo ga yi// lugs las byung ba'i gzhal yas bsgom// yang na tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ni// theg chen rgyal po a ti'i
gzhung// khyab dang gnas dang 'byung la sogs// rnam pa gsum pa'i gzhal yas khang// snod bcud 'byung ba'i yum du gsal// ting 'dzin gsal bas skad cig la// bskyed nas gsang ba yum gyi mkha'// b+ha
ga dgyes pa'i ngang du bsgom// de yi dkyil du bdag po dmigs// de la rang bzhin med pa ste// nam mkha' lta bur rab rtogs nas// gzhal yas khang ni zhes gsungs so// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/

gzhal yas khang tshangs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// skal par ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// log rtog dngos po gzhom pa dang// cho 'phrul mngon du bstan pa'i phyir// hUM mdzad chen po'i tan+t+ra las// skal
ba'i thog thos thog gsal ba'i// le'u dgongs pa'i rgyud dang mthun pa'i phyir// dang po ting 'dzin rnam gsum las// rgyu yi ting 'dzin hUM dmar gsal// de yi skad cig ting 'dzin las// kha dog
lnga yi 'bru bsgom ste// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin// kha dog gsum po'i 'bru nyid las// dbang po rkyen dang 'tshams pa'i gnas// thug pa med pa'i gzhal yas khang// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam

par bskyed// de yin nang du dmigs pa yang// cho ga gsum dang ldan pa'i hUM// de las zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku// rgyu las pad+ma he ru ka/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ ha ha hUM dza/ sa bon sngags kyis gsal bar gyur// hUM hrIHphaT/

A+oM a hrIHma dza dza hu lu dza shan bra be sha ya/ badzra badzra dz+wa la/ yak+sha badzra hUM b+h+yo/ badzra hUM/ A ra li a ling a hi ni sha tsa ta ka ba ma ti tsakra/ sku bskyed gsal bar gyur pa dang// log rtog gzhom phyir 'di gsungs

so// thog ser 'bar ba dbab pa'i phyir// hUM/ dbang chen rgyal po thog thog 'bebs// hUM dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig/ hUM mdzad hUM gi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho
skem// rdo rje mtshon chen gnam lcags mthur 'dril ba// gsang sngags log par lta ba'i bdud rnams 'joms// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol gnyis su yang// gdung ba sel cing dug gsum rtsad nas

gcod// ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+taM/ ta ka ha na pa tsa hUM phaT/ log rtog dregs pa bsgral nas kyang// rab tu rngam pa'i tshig gis bsngags// skrag cing dbang du 'dus par 'gyur// tshangs pa la sogs lha chen

rnams// thog thog dbang gis myos gyur te// sems ni bla med gnas su spar// tsakra zhes ni sngags dag gis// dbang gi sku bskyed che btsan sku// shangs kyi sgo nas thog thog 'khril// 'khor ba lus kyi rnam rtog
bcom// A+oM gyis nyes byas thams cad sbyangs// hUM gis sems kyi gzung 'dzin spang// swA yis nga rgyal ri bo bshig/ hA yis phrag dog gnas su dag/ khams gsum rgyud drug ma lus kun// ye shes mtshon

cha thog thog gis// sgrol bar ma gyur cig kyang med// nan tan thugs rjes bskyed pa'i phyir// 'khor ba'i dong sprug chen po mdzad// mngon spyod ya mtshan chen po yis// mchog dang tsa ra 'byor tshogs la// nan

tan gyis ni pra be sha/ hUM gis rgyal sras gzhon nu'o// g.yung drung lta bu'i sku yang thob// 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings su'o// de nas phung po bshig bya ste// lhag ma brgyad la bro brgyad brdungs// mgo la ling+ga

gnon pa'i bro// tsit+ta 'khor ba'i bro mo che// rnam shes ta kr-ita brgyad bro'o// yan lag lha mo za byed stabs// nang khrol ngan song gnas kyi bro// g.yang gzhi ma mo 'khrug pa brdung// brla bzhir khro bo zil gnon

bya// oM nA sha ya s+t+wam b+ha ya na/ yak+sha sum b+ha/ gan di ri ri sha/ b+han+d+ha di ri sha hUM kA ra pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA ts+tshin+da hUM ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ kro d+ha ni kro d+ha ni hUM phaT/ tshogs dang gtor ma'i las kyang

bya// thog mngon ser ba 'bebs pa yi// rdo rje dUr mo'i ting nge 'dzin// gsal nas sngags ni bzlas par bya// ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn/ ha na ta ka pa tsa hUM phaT/ dz+wa la raM/ raM dz+wa la hUM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM raM/ dzi na ta mo raM/
