ma hA ru lu sha/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ gser la btab te gtor ma bya// de yi tshig kyang rab tu brjod// ang+ku sha zhes bgrang bar bya// las ni nges par bsgrub bya na// mkha' lding rdzas la dpang btsug ste// chu mig
lkugs pa'i klu la gtad// thog thog 'bebs shing dgra bo 'chi// nges par 'di la the tshom med// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ thog 'bebs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// gnod sbyin phra men 'khor
bcas kyis// bdag la rab tu gtses gyur na// dka' thub brtul zhugs smyon pa yis// sa yi 'og tu 'dom gsum bya// las kyi hUM zhes cung zad 'das// mAM sa dag kyang mang du bza'// nam mkha' las ni

sems dpa' bsam// bgrang 'phreng klad la lan gsum bskor// de ltar byas na bdag rgyal zhing// nad gtong rnams ni 'chi bar 'gyur// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// ru lu ru lu kha tang kha/ ku ku rak+Sha

rak+Sha g+h+r-i h+Na g+h+r-i h+Na/ ha la ha la/ dz+wa la kha khA hi/ nyin dang mtshan du thug phrad du// rigs ma 'chol bar spyod par bya// skye bos mthong na dam tshig nyams// sus ma mthong na dngos grub yin// sbyor ba'i byang sems
lce la bzhag/ rang gis dben ri gang yin pa// skye bo'i gnas dang thags bsrings te// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs chen po yis// dbyangs kyang drag tu blang bar bya// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// dbyangs
kyang drag tu blang bar bya// rta yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// khams gsum dum bur gtub par bya// phag gi brtul zhugs chen po ni// srid gsum khron du brko bar bya// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po

yis// dmyal khams zas su za bar bya// srod dang tho rangs bro brdung pa// dka' thub smyon pa'i bro brdung ste// ru lu'i bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas te// gnod sbyin phra men 'khor bcas kyang// bdag gi de ni dbang

du 'gyur// klu dbang gi skad byang du gzugs// khyi yi dka' thub smyon pa yis// nub tu rta skad 'tsher ba bya// rta yi bro ste dang po yin// nam gyi gung la phag skad dbyung// phag gi brtul zhugs chen po ste// gnod
sbyin bran du 'khol ba yin// de ltar byas na brtul zhugs su// hUM zhes bya ba'i brtul zhugs kyis// hUM zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor kun// bdag gi lus la gzhug par bya// dus la bab pa'i bros mchod
la// rnge'u chung lan gsum brdung bar bya// de nas dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i phyir// brtul zhugs ting 'dzin zhugs nas kyang// glu bro dam tshig bzhin du blang// sgrub pa chen po'i bar chod

la// brtul zhugs chen pos bsgral nas kyang// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas nas// grul bum skad du ku co 'don// dka' thub chen po yin pa'i phyir// su dang gtam yang de

mi bya// smyon pa'i tshul du mchongs pa yis// gnod sbyin phra men rnams kyang brgyal// nam yang bdag gi dbang du 'gyur// nyan thos dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// sngags kyi dka' thub chen po yis// bdud rtsi lnga la

longs spyod bya// ma spangs par n-i dbang du bsdu// nan dbang drag shul smyon thabs su// su dang 'phrad pa sbyor zhing bsgral// 'di ni dpal gyi thugs dam ste// rgyun mi 'chad par spyad na ni// bdag gi ji ltar
'dod pa bzhin// dka' thub bsrungs pas dngos grub po// 'di la som nyi ci ste za// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dka' thub smyon pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// skal dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos// klu

rgyal zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir// gzhung las byung ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom// hUM las phyag rgya gdan dang bcas// dmar po'i dbu lnga phyag bcu drug/ gsal bar bsgom pa'i byin rlabs kyis// klu chen dbang du
bsdu ba'o// phyag rgya klu rnams rab tu bsnams// de ltar gsal bas ma lus bsgral// klu yi rigs bcas dbang du bsdus// g.yas kyi dbang po bsnams pa ni// klu chen rgyal rigs dang du bsnams// g.yas kyi
dang 'og dung skyong bsnams// de yi 'og ma stobs rgyu bsnams// 'khor ba 'di las sgrol ba'i bdag pos so// de yi 'og mas nor rgyas bu// 'og mas ma dros bu bsnams pa'o// sog ma med kyang rab tu
bsnams// 'og mas stobs ldan rab tu bsnams// 'og ma nyid kyis gzi ldan 'dzin// g.yon gyi phyag na 'dzin pa ni// thog mar kar ko Ta bsnams pa'o// 'og mas blta na sdug kyang 'dzin// 'og mas
stobs rgyu rab tu bsnams// 'og mas zla ba can yang 'dzin// 'og mas dung skyong rab tu bsnams// 'og mas gang ba bzang po ste// de 'og nor bu'i mgrin yang bsnams// klu yi rgyal po de rnams ni// snying
gar dbang gi zhabs kyis brkyang// tsham rngams stabs dang chas pa'o// rdzogs pa chen po yin pa'i phyir// sku bskyod 'og tu gzhal yas khang// sbrul nag grub pa'i 'byam klas pa'i// mtha' dang mnyam par

dmigs par bya// de yi dbus su bsgom pa yang// gtso bo yab yum 'khor dang bcas// hUM las rdzogs pa'i tshul du bskyed// de nas gsang ba'i bsnyen pa dbul// bsnyen pa'i sngags ni 'di dag ni// pad+ma ma hA

shrI he ru ka/ e ga de ma hUM sa ma ya ho// nA ga pra be sha dza zhes bya/ rdzu 'phrul mchog dang phyag rgya dang// drag po'i phrin las nyi tshe ba// sgrub pa'i dus su klu yang bsgom// bsnyen pa chos kyi dbyings

nas grangs// rdzu 'phrul 'phrog phyir bsnyen par zhugs// klu rnams dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// mgrin sngon la sogs rnam shes ni// gser zhun lta bur gyur nas ni// gzi ldan b+ha ga'i dbyings su blan// gnas kyi
rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// sku yi gshog pa mkha' dang mnyam// bar nas gser gyi me tog 'phro// bye mas 'jigs zhes de la sngags// khyung ltar gnas pas klu chen gnon// dbang du gnas pas klu rgyal

'dul// rdzu 'phrul phrogs pas dngos grub thob// klu'i le'u zhes pa brjod// dkyil 'khor bsdu ba snga ma bzhin// hUM gi spro bsdus dbyings su bstim// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ klu rgyal rdzu 'phrul gyi le'u

ste drug pa'o//// tshangs pa gnas kyi pho brang gis// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi klu drug ni// breng nge ba dang dung nge ba// shad+ha ba dang gardza ba// cang kar de dang pang ka de// glu drug blangs las don drug

'grub// breng nge ba yi glu blangs pas// tshangs pa lha yi dkyil 'khor nas// sku yi dngos grub chen po thob// dung nge ba yi glu blangs pas// brgya byin lha yi dbang po yi// gsung gi dngos grub chen po thob// sha d+ha

ba yi glu blangs pas// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi// yon tan chen po'i dngos grub thob// gardza ba yi glu blangs pas// phyogs skyong chen po bcu rnams kyi// yon tan chen po'i dngos grub thob// cang ka de'i glu

blangs pas// 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i// dngos grub brlabs chen 'khrigs pa thob// pang ka de'u'i glu blangs pas// srid pa dbang sdud bro mo che// dregs pa'i yul dag dbang du sdud// pad+ma gar

gyi bro drug ni// bdud bzhi thal bar brlag pa ni// 'khor ba'i phyi nas 'dren pa'i bro// breng nge ba yi glu dang sbyar// sdug bsngal nad sel thugs rje'i bro// dung nge ba yi glu dang sbyar// thugs dam dbyings su

bskul ba'i bro// sha d+ha ba yi glu dang sbyar// ye shes rgyan gyi bro mo che// gardza ba yi glu dang sbyar// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi glu dang sbyar// ma mo 'khrugs pa'i bro mo che// cang ka de'u'i glu dang sbyar// lang+ka bsgral ba'i bro

mo che// pang ka de'u'i glu dang sbyar// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi glu blangs nas// pad+ma gar gyi bro brdungs pas// khams gsum ma lus dbang du 'gyur// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bu mo drug gi glu blangs kyi bro
zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// stong gsum 'jig rten rab 'byams kun// mthu chen lang ka'i rgyal po yi// khyad par rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul te// gnyen por gyur pa gzhan med nas// gzhan las
bzang ba'i tan+t+ra las// nges pa'i lung du gsang ba'i le'u// lang ka gnon pa zhes kyang bya// srin po mnan phyir 'di gsungs so// dang po ting 'dzin rnam gsum las// rgyu yi ting 'dzin dmigs pa

yang// cho ga gsum dang ldan pa'i hUM// 'phro 'du rdo rje rab tu dmigs// de las gar yi glu gsal zhing// dbu lnga bcu drug bsgom pa yang// snying po sngags kyi 'phros par bsgom// hrIHphaT oM AHhUM/ lu raM a
badzra e A ra li dza// de las spro bsdu gsal ba las// rgyu ru brtan par gyur pa dang// nyid kyis 'dul bar zhal 'ches te// sdigs mdzub nam mkhar phyar ba yang// bskal pa'i me lce 'bar ba las// a la la

yi thog thog 'khrugs// de yang thugs rje gsang ba'i thabs// klu dang nam mkha'i snying nas 'dren// sgrol sngags drag pos rab tu bsgral// 'dren pa'i snying pos tsit+ta phyung// srin po bzhi yang rnam par sprul// me
sbrul rnams su de bzhin te// phung po las ni gzhal yas khang// tshogs brgyad dur khrod brgyad du grags// bka' dang mthun pa'i gzhal yas su// rgyan dang cha lugs gsungs pa bzhin// de yi nang du dmigs
pa yang// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom// gsang ba'i rdzas dang mchod par bcas// 'khor lo yon tan bsam mi khyab// lce la rtsibs dang gru chad dang// mu khyud bar khyams sgo khyud bcas// sbas

shing dbyings su bstim byas te// dbyings nas 'bar ba'i sku yang bskyed// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin las// hUMM las sku bskyed 'bar ba yis// klu dang lang ka bcad gtub ste// nyon mongs lnga yang gnan par
bya// de ltar bzlas nas mnan nas kyang// 'khor gyi lha mos bstod pa gsungs// bsdu bar bya ba'i lung du grags// 'bar ba'i zhabs gang 'od lta bu// mchod rten chen po bzhi la 'dus// long ba'i tshogs

la rim pa bzhin// nga su ra bzhin bdag nyid de// skye ba med pa'i dbyings la bsdu// dkyil 'khor bsdu bar gsungs pa yi// mchod rten sgo khyud rim pa bzhin// de nas bsgrub rdzas bsu ba yang// sha khri mnan

pa'i khrag la bsu// khrag dang tsan ni snga ma bzhin// las kyi gnan pa bya ba'i phyir// spro ba'i thabs ni 'di dag go/ sku gsung thugs dang phyag rgya 'phro// mtshon cha la sogs snga ma bzhin// las kyi rnam pa bya ba'i

phyir// klu dang srin po mnan pa'i thabs// hom khung dag tu mnan pa'i phyir// ling+ga'i gnas su mnan par bya// me lha gzhung bzhin bsgoms la bzhag/ rab gnas sbyin sreg bya ba'am// rnga yi rol mos drangs te
bya'o// mi mthun phyogs bzhi hUM du gtams// dkyil 'khor bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir// sgo lnga la sogs dbus nas len// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ lang+ka'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// thod rgal
'jigs pa'i phrin las kyis// rnal 'byor dgra bo 'dul ba'i phyir// rgyud las 'byung ba'i nges pa'i lung// 'di dag gis ni bkres skoms 'joms// bde ba chen pos thugs rje'i le'u// phra men

rngams thabs zhes kyang bya// de la nyi ma 'bum gyis rab bskor ba// srid gsum ma lus bsreg pa'i dbang dang ldan// sprin med gsal ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'phro// de steng pad+ma kha stong ldan pa las// rdo rje rtse
gcig pad+ma'i snying por gnas// de dbus hUM las byol song skye gnas 'jom// 'di ni gsal byed nyi zla 'od kyi lung// pad+ma'i lte bar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil// hUM las 'od 'phros mi rnams bag chags

sbyangs// 'khor lo rtsibs stong ldan pa'i hUM du grags// de'i steng b+huM las yid bzhin gzhal yas khang// rgyal chen phyogs skyong la sogs ka dang gdung// me ri thod phreng la sogs sbrul gyis brgyan// de'i dbus

rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyar gsal// de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i lung du grags// de las hUM gi 'od zer gsal ba las// zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku ru thun mong bsgoms nas kyang// shangs nang khro bo hUM drug sgra 'thon

pas// rgyud drug gnas pa'i 'khor ba'i rtsad gcod do// spros nas rim pa bzhin du thim byas nas// khro bor gyur pa'i hUM gi le'u'o// hUM de las 'bar ba'i sku bskyed gsal ba las// ljags kyi dkyil du hUM las

rin po che// A+oM la sogs pa'i 'phro 'du las// dpal chen 'bar ba'i skur gsal te// khang bu lnga dang ldan par dmigs// de dbus rta mgo ljang gur bsgom// sbrul nag stong gis rgyan du mdzes// thod pa tshar

gsum brjid par ldan// zhing lpags g.yas na sham thabs can// phyi nang gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// gsang ba'i lha mo rdo rje dra ba can// 'gro ba ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i yum// bcu drug phyag na

mchod cha sna tshogs bsnams// zhe sdang gdug pa'i dgra bgegs mang po 'dul// zhabs kyi chas dang khro bo brgyad gnon sbyor// dpa' bo la sogs ting 'dzin brgyad dang sbyar// 'khor gyi me 'brug rlung 'brug la

sogs ni// rang sngags snying pos phyogs mtshams thim par ro// klu 'brug sngon po rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsgom// rlung gi sha ba ljang gu rab tu sngags// long ba rgyab 'brel mang po dmigs pa yang// yang sprul bya
ba 'bum dang bcas pa ste// phyogs bzhi nas ni rnam par 'khrugs pa'o// phyi rim dmus long 'khor ba can// shwa ri ka li sgras bskyed cing// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa'o// kham rgya chen mo drug rnams

ni// dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su yang gsal// ye shes dpal gyi khyi brgyad ni// phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams nas dgyes// ma lus dgra rnams mche bas gcod// phyi rim lcags kyi spyang mo brgyad// dgra bo rnams

la rbad par bya// de ltar phyag rgya rdzogs pa dang// sku nyid 'khor la sbas pa ste// phyogs bzhi dbus lnga khang bur sba// rta mgo la sogs rim pa bzhin// de yang chos kyi dbyings su bsdu// da ni phur

pa'i las bya ste// rgya mdud 'khor lo'i tshul du sba// spyi bor pad+ma khrag 'thung ste// zur brgyad logs brgyad rgyab 'brel tshogs// rgya mdud 'og mar dmus long dmigs// rtse mor lcags kyi khyi mo bsam// ngos

la lcags kyi spyang mo ste// rtse mor khro bo dmigs bya la// mgo dgu brtsegs pa zur la'o// da ni bsdu bar bya ba yang// sgo srung spyang mo nyid la'o// spyang mo zhabs kyi chas brgyad la'o// spyang mo rnam shes brgyad po

la'o// de yang dur khrod brgyad la 'dus// dur khrod ye shes chen po ste// de yang mi gnas ye shes la'o// me 'brug gshog pa nyid la 'dus// gshog pa sku yi rgyan la'o// de yang tshon sna lnga la 'dus// tshon sna

dbu rgyan lnga la'o// de yang rin chen khang bu ste// de yang sku gsung thugs la bsdu// de yang chos kyi dbyings su bsdu// dbyings kyang kun gzhi nyid du ste// mi dmigs chos sku chen por gnas// dbang chen 'dus

pa'i tan+t+ra las/ yan lag spros pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// A+oM d+harma d+hA tu b+ha ga maN+Da la gu h+ya si ti hUM zhes brjod pas/ rin po che'i gzhal yas khang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gcig bsgom/ yang 'od zer

grangs med pa gcig 'phros nas yang 'dus pa las// badzra satwa hUM/ ya tha badzra sarba ta thA ga ta/ ta thA a hUM zhes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas dang po rdo rje

bar ma 'khor lo/ tha ma rin po che/ g.yon dang po dril bu/ bar ma pad+ma/ tha ma ral gri sku rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhig bsgom/ hUM drag tu brjod pas lha'i shangs nas/ hUM dmar po 'jig rten gyi
khams gang bar bsgom/ 'phros 'dus pa las 'di skad do/ hUM gis srid gsum ma lus dbang du bsdus/ hUM gis nyon mongs dug gsum mun khang 'joms/ hUM gis thams cad 'jigs shing thams cad bsdu/ hUM

gis bla med byang chub gnas su sgrol/ hUM gis ngan song gnas kun stongs par byed/ hUM gis dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed// A+oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ pad+ma da ra hrIM zhes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he
ru ka sku che la yan lag rags pa/ sku mdog nyi ma dmar thag 'dra ba/ dbu lnga phyag bcu drug pa zhabs dmar po brgyad pa zhig gsal bar bsgom/ de nas lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgrengs nas/ khams
gsum sdigs par byas nas 'di skad du/ phyag rgya chen po 'dis bcings la// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// bdud ni rnam par sdigs zhes bya// phung byed thams cad 'jigs par byed// bdud dang mu
stegs thams cad 'jigs par byed// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jigs par byed// thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud/ oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ da sha pa la te dzo ba le ma ma he me dra/ dpyid

ka ste pa pa shang ku ru hUM zhes brjod pas/ shar dri za/ lhor gshin rje/ nub klu dbang/ byang gnod sbyin la sogs pa rnams/ gcer bu lhags pas btang ba bzhin/ rdzu 'phrul bsnyen cing mthur ldan pas// thugs

rje chen pos nan tan gyis// rgyud drug gnas su bsgral ba dang// sdang ba'i dgra bgegs gsad pa'i phyir// pha rol snying dag dbyung bar bya// dmar chen khrag dang bcas pa yang// zhal du gsol zhing 'dren

par bya// dmar 'byin le'u zhes de la sngags// rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin skad cig mas// bdag nyid phyag rgya'i skur bsgoms la// hUM zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'o// dbyings las ye shes gzhug tshul du// du mar brjod

cing drang bar bya// khA hi raM las 'od 'phros 'dus// dza yi lcags kyus drang ba yang// rdo bar lcags ni 'du tshul du// du mar brjod cing drang bar bya// bdag gi phyag rgya gsal ba dang// 'dren zhing sgrol ba'i pho

nya ni// gang yang rung ba'i sems can de'i// lus ngag yid la rbad par bya// rta mchog rol pa'i shangs lnga yang// rlung gi mgo la spyang ki'i gdong// mche ba bdud kyi snying rtsa gcod// rna ba sbrul gyi 'dzul khung

nas// sbrul gyi mi la spyang ki'i gdong// kha rlangs sprin gyi dkyil 'khor nas// 'od kyi mi la gzha' tshon gdong// ral pa khrag gi zar bu la// khrag gi mig la spyang ki'i gdong// spyan mig gru gsum 'bar ba

la// zangs kyi mi la spyang ki'i gdong// kha la ro sha rbad/ dgung tri dun dun rbad/ gang la bya ba'i sems can de'i// lus ngag yid la rbad par bya// bdag nyid phyag rgyar gsal ba dang// 'dren cing sgrol ba'i pho

nya ni// gshog pa rdo rje gdengs pa yis// pho nya yid mgyogs rlung bas myur// lcags kyi mig la mkha' gshog can// phyag ni bcu drug 'bar ba las// lcags kyi khyi mo brgyad sprul pa// lcags gshog khyung gi

'dab ma can// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa ni// la la byan lag mgo bo la// lus ni lcags kyi spyang mor sprul// la la khyung gi mgo bo la// lus ni zangs kyi wa mor sprul// la la khra yi mgo bo la// lus ni
dril nag rkang gsum pa'o// la la khra yi mgo bo la// lus ni sdig pa rkang gcig pa// la la chun lag mgo bo la// lus ni dung gi spyang mor sprul// la la chu byi'i mgo bo la// lus bo bcu drug tshang mar

sprul// la la bzhad kyi mgo bo la// lus ni byi ru'i seng ger sprul// la la kang ka'i mgo bo la// lus ni lcags dri'u rkang gsum po// la la 'ug pa'i mgo bo la// lus ni dung phag dkar mor sprul// la la pu
shud mgo bo la// lus ni lcags kyi sdig par sprul// la la mthing ril mgo bo la// lus ni drel nag rkang gsum pa'o// la la skyin gyi mgo bo la// lug ni byi la rtsal po che// la la bya rgod mgo bo
la// lus ni gser stag ser por sprul// gang la bya ba'i sems can de'i// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i rtsad bcad nas// dmyal khams bcu drug khrims bsad de// thugs rje chen pos byin brlabs te// 'di la byin
gyis brlabs nas kyang// dmar ser 'byin pa'i pho nya 'gyed// dus las ma g.yel phrin las mdzad// bdag kyang phyag rgyar gsal byas la// gnod sbyin pa yi gsang sngags bzlas// las 'grub pa la the tshom
med// rdo rje sder mo can gyis gsang sngags kyis drang ngo// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dmar byin gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// skal bar ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rigs gnyis lung gi brgyud pa'i

lung// chos kun gnyis med mnyam pa las// 'dzin rtog dngos po tha ba ni// zhing la gnas 'gyur gsungs pa ni// gdeng dang ldan na tha dad med// sa bon las ni 'bras bu'i tshul// rtog pa'i klong du 'dres pa
las// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// snang mdzad las gyur kun tu gzigs// byang chub sems dpa' nyid la rdzogs// mi bskyod pa sogs shar du'o// rin chen 'byung ba lho nyid do// mtha' yas la sogs

nub tu'o// don yon byang gi phyogs su 'gyur// 'byung ba yum gyi gnas gyur pa// sa bon las ni myu gu'i tshul// bzang mo las gyur gzi dang ldan// spyan ni 'gyu ba glog 'gyu ste// mA ma kI ni dra ba 'gyur// na
bza' dkar mo sder mo can// sgrol ma las byung gshog pa can// yab yum bcu ni rab sbyor te// skyes pa'i dbyings su bstan pa las// byang chub sems ni chags pa'i gzhi// rta mgo ljang gu yin par
grags// dbu lnga ye shes lnga yi dbyings// sems dpa' brgyad 'tshar dmus long tshogs// sems ma las gyur rgyab 'brel te// sems dpa' sems ma ldan sbyor bas// byang chub sems ni chags pa'i

rgyu// mkha' la 'phros pa'i 'od zer ni// sprul pa yin par spyang mo brgyad// dbyings su 'dren pa'i ye shes kyi// lcags kyu la sogs sgo ma bzhi// bsgyur bas dbu dgu rab tu brtsegs// sprul sku thub drug las

sprul pa// kham rgya dag tu sprul pa yin// gnas ni ma nor chos kyi dbyings su don rtogs na// dbyings la ye shes rol pa ni// gnas 'gyur mchog gi le'u zhes bya// zhi ba mi g.yo chos sku las// khro bor gyur
pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// ston pa'i bka' dang mi 'gal bar// phyi rabs rnal 'byor skal rab la// nges pa'i lung du brtsams pa ste// rtogs na the tshom med par 'grub// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/
zhi ba gnas 'gyur mchog gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// rig 'dzin dbang phyug chen po yi// snyan khung brgyud nas 'gro don du// khrag 'thung chen po hUM gi le'u// blta ba chen po 'di gsungs
pa'o// hUM las 'byung ba yum gyi dbyings// gzhal yas hUM nyid b+ha ga'i klong// 'dus ma byas te rnam par dag/ hUM las khrag 'thung rigs bzhir 'bar// spros med thig ler gnas pa'i phyir// ma bcos lhun

gyis grub par gnas// ma tshogs hUM gis dbang phyug ma// seng ge lta bu'i sgra sgrogs shing// sgra nyid sgra ltar stong ba'i phyir// stong pa'i ye shes rnam par dag/ mnga' bdag chen po hUM nyid de// thams cad yongs su

khyab pa'i phir// thugs rje'i nyi ma rnam par dag/ hUM las pad+ma kha stong ldan// gsang ba b+ha gar lhun gyis grub// nyi zla dum bur brtsegs pa yang// shes rab thabs su 'brel ba yi// phyag rgya bskyod pa'i dkyil

'khor che// hUM las zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku// 'bar byed chen por gyur pa ni// skye med chos dbyings rnam par dag/ sprul pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyang// ye shes thugs kyi rang bzhin te// thig le hUM las rgyan

gyis bye brag rnams// dbyings las ye shes 'jug par byed// dbyings nyid lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyan// hUM las 'bar ba'i skur gyur pas// chos sku gcig pur sbyor ba'i don// hUM las dbu lngar snang ba ni// ye

shes lnga nyid dbyings la byon// hUM las spyan lngar grags pa yang// dbang po yul lngar rnam par grags// hUM las ljags lngar grags pa yang// dbang po ro la sbyor ba'o// hUM las shangs lnga'i 'tshubs ma
yang// dbang po dri la rnam par dag/ hUM las snyan lngar gsan pa yang// ma 'gags sgra la ci bder sbyor// hUM las zhal lngar gdangs pa yang// srid gsum dbyings su za ba'o// hUM las rta mgo ljang gu
yang// tshangs pa dbang du bsdu nas ni// ma chags dbyings la ye shes rol// e ma ho ya mtshan dbang gi sku// sna tshogs cir yang ston mod kyi// spros med thig le rnam dag pas// 'di ni rnam dag hU~M gi
le'u'o// thams cad stong pa'i dbyings su blta// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ khrag 'thung gi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// skal dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'gro drug thabs kyis 'dul ba

yang// ngan song gnas nas 'dren pa'i phyir// bskyed rdzogs chen po 'di gsungs so// ting 'dzin bskyed pa'i sa bon sngags// e dang yaM sogs rim pa bzhin// ma nor tsam du bsgom par bya'o// b+h+rUM las rin

chen gzhal yas khang// rin chen rgyan la sogs pas mdzes// de yi nang du dmigs pa ni// tsakra la sogs 'khor lo che// rtsibs dang rtsibs kyi mu khyud dang// lte ba bar khyams sgo khyud sogs// rdo rje dbyings
kyi dkyil 'khor ldan// lte ba zlum por gyur pa la// dpa' bo hUM las rdo rje che// de las phyag rgya bskyed pa ni// zhe sdang rgyal po rnam par bsgom// 'khor lo mdun gyi dang po ni// dpa' bo oM las

'khor lo che// ma skyes pa las phyag rgya'i sku bskyed pa// gti mug rgyal po rnam par bsgom// g.yas su lta ba'i 'khor lo la// dpa' bo swA las rin chen che// de la phyag rgya'i skur bskyed pa// nga rgyal rgyal po rnam

par bsgom// nub tu lta ba'i 'khor lo la// dpa' bo A+oM las pad+ma ste// de las phyag rgya'i skur bskyed pa// 'dod chags rgyal po rnam par bsgom// g.yon gyi rtsibs la dmigs pa ni// dpa' bo hA las rgya gram

ste// de las phyag rgya'i skur bskyed pa// phrag dog rgyal po rnam par bsgom// dpa' bo 'bru lngar gyur pa'i sku// yab yum phyag rgyar sbyor ba las// byang chub sems kyi sa bon ni// dbang chen pad+ma gar gyi

sku// rdzogs pa chen po bsgom pa yang// dpa' bo lnga las bskyed pa ni// rtags su dbu lnga rab tu brtag/ hUM las kun tu thal ba'i dbu// 'dod khams dbang du sdud pa'o// oM las dri za gnon pa'i dbu// swA
las grul bum dbang du sdud// AM las klu yang grol bar byed// hA las gnod sbyin dbang po 'dul// thar ba brgyad dang ldan pa'i zhabs// khro bo brgyad la khyab par sbyor// bkra shis yum dang sprul pa'i
'khor// dbang chen sku la yongs su rdzogs// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bskyed rdzogs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// thugs rje byin rlabs rmad po che// 'jig rten yongs grags mdzad pa
che// sngon gyi las dbang drag po yis// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog dang// lhan cig ldan pa'i bag chags rnams// mnan pa'i don du 'di gsungs so// mtshan yang gdon gzir drag po'i le'u// phyi rabs

sngags 'chang rnal 'byor pa'i// don du cho ga 'di rnams so// na sha s+t+waM b+ha na d+ha yak+sha sum+b+ha na/ gan+da ri ri sha shan+da re sha ma ma tsa dur nan/ sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// 'bar ba chen por
bdag bskyed la// lnga dang bcu drug phyag char ldan// ting 'dzin brgyad kyi byin rlabs las// dmar pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa'i zhabs// bag chags mi ldang gnon pa'i phyir// tsham rngams chen po 'di skad
brjod// mtshungs med che ba'i khyad par rab ston cing// nga rgyal dpa' bsnyems bdud kyi dpung bcom nas// 'jig rten 'das pa'i khro bo brgyad// che ba'i rtags dang ldan pas dbang phyug yang che
mnan// bdag nyid chen por gsal ba las// zhabs dmar po brgyad 'bar ba'i chas dang ldan par dmigs la/ 'di skad ces bskul zhing gzir bar bya'o// 'dul ba'i zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams brgyad
du bgrad// snying gar mkhrig ma nub phyir sgal rtsib khong du 'joms// sdug bsngal nyam thag 'bod sgrog di ri ri// zhes brjod pas/ tsham rngams chen po dang bcas pas/ lan cig gzir bar
bya'o// gdul ba'i zhabs gcig shar du bgrad// dpa' bo stag gi chas dang ldan// hUM kA ra la rnam par gzir// tsham rngams chen po mnyam par sbyor// gdul ba'i zhabs gcig shar lho mtshams// gnod

gdug zlog byed lcags dang ldan// Ar+ya a tsa la nub par gzir// tsham rngams chen po mnyam par sbyor// gdul ba'i zhabs gcig lho phyogs su// shes rab ting 'dzin chas dang ldan// ya mAn+ta ka'i snying gar

gzir// tsham rngams chen po mnyam par sbyor// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig lho nub mtshams// dbang gi bse khrab chas dang ldan// nI la daN+Di'i snying gar nub// tsham rngams chen pos mnyam par sbyor// gdug pa'i

zhabs gcig nub tu bgrad// dpa' brjid sbrul gyis chas dang ldan// pad+ma kuN+Da li yi snying gar nub// tsham rngams chen po mnyam par sbyor// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig nub byang mtshams// dmar gsal che ba'i

chas dang ldan// TAk+ki rA dza'i b+han+d+ha mnan// mche bas phye ma bzhin du btags// tsham rngams chen po mnyam par sbyor// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig byang du bgrad// mnyem lcug chu skyes chas dang ldan// oM mr-i ta
mgrin sgal rtsib bcom// tsham rngams chen po mnyam par sbyor// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig byang shar mtshams// gtum chen gzig gi chas dang ldan// ma hA ba la'i ldan par gzir// 'khor rnams dbang du

bsdus nas kyang// tsham rngams chen po mnyam par sbyor// hUM kA ra pra be sha phaT nan/ ar+ya a tsa la pra be sha phaT nan/ ya mAn+ta ka pra be sha phaT nan/ nI la daN+Da pra be sha phaT nan/ pad+ma kuN+Da li pra be sha phaT nan/

DAk+ki rA dza pra be sha phaT nan/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li pra be sha phaT nan/ ma hA ba la bra be sha phaT nan// phyag rgya chen po'i skur bsgoms la// gzir gnon drag po'i las byas na// sdug bsngal chu bo'i rgyun skam pa// sngon
gyi rgyal ba rnams kyi bka'// zhi bas thams cad tshim par brjod// rgyas pas ma lus mngon sangs rgyas// dbang du ma bsdus gang yang med// mngon spyod byin rlabs rmad po che// thabs la mkhas pa'i
mdzad spyod kyis// bsad cing mnan pa ma lus kun// phra mo'i sku med sku don byas// slar 'dus chos kyi dbyings su thim// dmigs su med pa'i chos skur bsgom// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gdon
gzir drag po'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// rgyud la goms shing don la yid ches kyang// dbang bskur dbang rtags lag tu ma byin na// nor bu'i rgyal sa zin par ga la 'gyur// de bas dbang gi khyad
par 'di gsungs so// rnam grangs bcu po 'di dag ni// rgyal thabs spyi blugs theg pa'i dbang// bskur ba tsam gyis thob pa'o// de la thabs gang gis dbang ba dang/ don ched ci la dbang ba
dang/ dbang gi dngos gzhi bstan pa dang/ dbang gi grangs bstan pa dang/ dbang gi rtags bstan pa dang// dbang yul spyi la bsgyur bas bstan pa dang/ dbang bskur ba'i thabs bstan pa dang/ dbang gi khyad

par dang/ dbang gi man ngag dang/ dbang gi yon tan bstan pa'o// de lta bas na phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa'i rim pa ji snyed gsungs mod kyang/ de'i nang nas 'bras bu'i theg rgyal gsang sngags zhes/ 'bras

bu'i theg rgyal nang nas dbang bskur gces/ shes dbang med rlom sems kyi sa// kha cig ya ma brla dang gsob 'dra la// don dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dbang chen la// rtags dang 'brel pas dbang bskur shin tu
rigs// dbang med kha cig rang dbang zos gyur cing// thug thub khong longs shes thob chod bzhag nas// tshe gzhi med bzhin yod pa'i las spyod pa// ngan song gsum gyi sa bon 'di yin pas// srid lam
'khyams shing chos lam ring pas na// bka' la brten nas dbang med bka' rkun la// dbang lung tshad mar gyur pa'i skyes bu yis// bskur yang mi thob nong bu'i spyod pa bzhin// thob par mi 'gyur chags par

mi 'gyur ro// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi khyad par gyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// rmad byung byang chub sems kyi le'u// 'bar ba'i dbu lnga rmad du byung ba ni// ye shes lnga dang yab lnga dbang

por sbyor// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i ral pa rmad du byung ba ni// dbyings las ma g.yos chos sku mnyam pa la// khro bo mun dza'i cod pan bye ba 'bum// sprul sku'i 'gro drug sgrol

bar lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i shangs lnga rmad du byung ba ni// dbang po dri dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// gsung ba mchog gi bye brag so sor yang// tshor pa nyams su myong zhing tshim gyur nas// skye 'gag med

pa'i ngang la lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i snyan lnga rmad du byung ba ni// gsan pa ma 'gags sgra mtha' so so yang// de nyid sgra mtha' stong pa chos kyi sku// med la zad med shes par lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i

zhal lnga rmad du byung ba ni// hom lnga 'brel pas sdug bsngal bsreg pa'i phyir// 'bar ba'i me dpung rab tu 'phro ba yi// sprul pa'i 'phro 'du nyid du snang mod kyi// gar yang ma 'phros dbyings su lhan ner

bsgom// 'bar ba'i ljags lnga rmad du byung ba ni// bden pa'i don ston gsung rab mang po 'chad// sde snod rgyud la rmongs pa mi mnga' ba'i// le brgan ljang nag sgrol bar bsgom// 'bar ba'i ag tshom rmad du
byung ba ni// chos sku mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo las// gzugs sku gzha' tshon lta bur sprul par bsgom// 'bar ba'i tshems lnga rmad du byung ba ni// 'khor ba rtsad gcod ye shes chen po lngas// skye med

don rtogs dbyings su bzhugs pa'i phyir// ma g.yos chos kyi dbyings su lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan rmad du byung ba ni// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa dang// khro chen snying 'byin rdo rje kha T+wAM

'dzin// thod rlon khrag dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud// rdo rje be con dang ni rnge'u chung 'dzin// me yi zhags pa dang ni khyung gi khra// sdigs mdzub rtse la me 'bar khaT+wAM 'khrol// rdo rje rtse lnga rtse dgu pa dang ni// rtse gsum rtse

gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ so so'i phyag mtshan mngon du gsal ba yang// snang tsam nyid la rang bzhin med pas na// stong pa chen po'i thig le sa ler bsgom// 'bar ba'i sku rgyan rmad du byung ba ni// rdo

rje rin chen las byung gshog pa dang// thod rlon sbrul dang glang chen stag la sogs// rngom brjid ldan pa'i cha lugs cir ston pa// nam mkha' lta bu'i dbyings su lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i zhabs lnga rmad du

byung ba ni// phyin ci log pa'i dngos po gzhom pa ni// rdo rje mtshan ma sna tshogs mtshan med pas// so so'i na bza' go cha ci 'dra ba// ye shes dbyings la sbyor ba nyid du bsgom// 'bar ba'i gdan khri rmad du byung
ba ni// gzhan gyi dngos grub bdag gir bya ba dang// mnyam pa chen po'i don la dgod pa'i phyir// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par bsgom// 'bar ba'i gzhal yas rmad du byung ba ni// sna tshogs mang

po'i rgyan dag dgram pa yang// nam mkha'i mtha' dang dbyer med stong pas na// spros med thig le byang chub sems su bsgom// de ltar bas na rmad du byung ba'o// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rmad du byung

ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// rtse rgyal bstan pa'i theg pa las// ya rgyal ma hA yo ga'i gzhung// ma spangs lhan cig bsgrub pa ni// sgrub thabs zab mo'i spyi bstan pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i le'u 'di
gsungs so// sgrub pa chen po gang mdzad kyang// phun sum tshogs dang ldan nas brtsam// gnas phun sum tshogs pa btsal ba dang/ dus phun sum tshogs pa btsal ba dang// 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan
pa btsal ba dang/ rdzas phun sum tshogs pa btsal ba dang/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa bsags pa dang/ ting 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa gsal ba dang/ phrin las phun sum tshogs pa spyad pa dang/ dngos grub

phun sum tshogs pa bsdu ba'o// de lta bas na sgrub pa chen po'i dus dag tu// gnas ma rtag dang dus las yol// 'khor dang mi ldan rdzas mi rnyed// yo byad ma tshang ting 'dzin g.yel// phr-in las ma grub dngos
grub yal// 'di rnams bsgrub pa'i skyon brgyad do// phyi rabs sngags 'chang sgrub pa pos// don la yid ches ma gyur kyang// thos la rtse gcig sems kyis ni// rtags dang phun sum tshogs byas
nas// sgrub pa'i 'bras bu yal mi 'gyur// 'di la the tshom ci ste za// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ phun sum tshogs pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// dngos grub brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rigs

gnyis rgyud pa'i tan+t+ra las// ro sbyor bdud rtsi bya ba'i phyir// sgrub thabs gsang ba 'di gsungs so// dang por phun sum tshogs ldan nas// yid du 'ong ba'i dgon gnas su// bslang dang byin gyis brlab pa
dang// mtshams la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin// maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi pa// bka' dang mthun pa'i chag chag btab// thig bzhi btag pa'i mtha' skor la// rU tra rnam gsum bsnol te mnan// dbus su zla
gam bzhi pa ste// de dbus mthing nag gru gsum pa'o// kha bzhi pa la sbyin sreg bya'o// mtha' skor 'bar ba'i 'od kyis so// mthun pa'i rdzas rnams gnas pa'i sar// drug gnyis ldan pa'i ting 'dzin
gyis// mtshan mas btab ste hUM zhes bskor// brtul zhugs chen po spros pas ni// gar gyi dbang phyug chen po'i bro// brdungs pa tsam gyis las rnams 'grub// phud nyul chen pos las mdzad mnyes// bdag

nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// gtsug gi rta mgo ljang gu las// rta yi brtul zhugs chen po ste// hrIHzhes du mar brjod cing bsdu// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// zhabs las sprul pa'i khyi brgyad
kyis// bag chags gnas su sbyang ba'i phyir// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po ste// ku ku rA zhes rbad cing brdung// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa las// gzung 'dzin gnas
su gsad pa'i phyir// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po yang// dzaHzhes brjod cing mgyogs par ro// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms la// mi dmigs sku yi sbrul mgo las// phag gi brtul zhugs chen po

yis// gti mug gnas su sbyang ba'i phyir// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs hUM dang bcas par brdung// chas brgyad las kyi spyang mor dmigs// thod pa dbye ba sder mo nyid// ngan song gnas kyi 'dul phyir sbyor// ting

'dzin phyag rgyar bcas pas dbye// rdzogs nas maN+Dal nyid du dgram// rten ni drug gsum nyid du ste// lnga ni zla gam bzhi pa la'o// snyigs ma bar khyams grwa bzhi la// rtse mo ma traM ka la'o// sgo zur la ni brdeg pa

rnams// sgo yi nang rol rdo rje ste// phyag mtshan bcu drug phrag gnyis la'o// yan lag bar du ba su ta// 'od la rak+ta khrag dang bcas// shun chen bla re nyid du'o// rdzi ma skra dang kha spu rnams// mchod pa'i phyir na
gtor ma'o// sul mang dbang gi b+han+d+ha la// phyi ma rak+tar bcas pa rnams// g.yos sam yang na brdzis pa la// steng nas bcings te rgyas btab ste// sku gsum thod pa shar phyogs su// rak+ta chang

dang sbyar ba la// steng nas rdo rje rgya gram btab// gling gsum pa ni lho phyogs te// rak+ta 'o mar sbyar ba la// steng nas rin chen rgyas btab nas// dbang du bsdu ba'i b+han+d+ha ru// rak+ta sbrang rtsi mar la sogs// steng

nas pad+ma'i rgyas btab nas// gling bzhi rgya gram byang phyogs te// rak+ta mngar dang cha bsnyams pa// steng nas las kyi rgyas btab po// rdzogs nas ting 'dzin chas su bsal// mtshams dang bsrungs dang go

cha'o// phyag rgya bskyed dang go cha dang// drod tshad bslang dang thugs rje dbab// tshe gnas bstim dang lnga pa'o// yang nas yang du bsnyen par bya// phrin las skabs dang sbyar nas bcom// dbang dang the tshom mi za

ste// zhi ba ma yang dkyil 'khor gyi// 'phro 'du rim gyis bsnyem pas sbyang// bskul dang don byas 'dus pa dang// cho ga gsum gyis snang mdzad sku// sems su zhu nas dbyings su thim// skye med dbyings nas

dngos med sku// hUM du gyur nas rtse lnga 'bar// bskul nas don byas mi bskyod sku// sems su zhu nas dbyings nyid do// skye med dbyings nas dngos med sku// swA las rin chen zur brgyad 'phro// bskul dang don

byas 'byung ldan nyid// sems su zhu nas dbyings nyid do// skye med dbyings nas dngos med sku// AM las pad+mar gsal ba dang// bskul dang don byas snang mtha' yas// sems su zhu nas dbyings nyid do// skye
med dbyings nas gnyis med sku// hA las rgya gram 'bar 'phro bas// bskul nas don byas don grub pa'o// sems su zhu nas dbyings nyid do// 'phro 'du gsal dang las su rung// dngos grub 'grub nas myan

gan 'das// mang du spel phyir bsnyen par bya// grub nas dngos grub gsol ba dang// brtan par bya phyir bdud rtsi'i snod// yum gyi gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sngags dang ldan pas dbang bskur te// gnas lnga dag
tu bstim par bya// de nas rgya bshig mdud pa dgrol// bkra shis mtshan dang ldan pa'i yum// dar la babs pas skul ba'i dbyangs// pra be sha yis mdud pa dgrol// cha gcig 'phags pa mchod phyir
dbul// cha gcig slob dpon nyid la'o// gcig ni yongs la sbyin par gsungs// de nas bdud rtsi dam pa'i snod// de ni spyi bor blangs nas kyang// bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa bsgrag/ rang bzhin dkyil

'khor rdzogs pa yang// gzugs brnyan bud+d+ha nyid la 'bul// tsit+ta la sogs rang bzhin rdzas// rang bzhin mchod pa nyid du'o// rna ba sgra yi mchod pa yis// glog 'gyu nyid de dbyings su bstim// dri ni a mi d+he
ba ste// spros pa med pa'i ngang la'o// mig ni rdo rje sder mo ste// mtha' gnyis bral ba'i dbyings su gzhag/ lce ni rdo rje dra ba mo// mi 'gyur dbyings su yang dag nyid// rang bzhin mchod pa rdzogs
par ldan// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor dra ba la// yongs su bsngo bar bya ba ni// pho ba shar phyogs par khyams na// dbyangs dang bcas pas dbul ba ni// rdo rje kham rgya chen mo la// phul bas gzi ldan

dbyings su thim// grod pa lho phyogs nyid la ste// rin chen kham rgya chen mo la// dbyangs dang bcas pa snga ma bzhin// phul bas gzi ldan dbyings su thim// gnye ma nub nas snga ma bzhin// ma chags pad+ma'i kham

rgya la// phul bas gzi ldan b+ha ga la'o// long ka byang nas rim pa bzhin// don rab lhun grub kham rgya la// dbyangs kyis bstod nas mnyes par bya'o// gzi ldan la ni 'du 'phro'i tshul// sul mang shar lho

mtshams su ste// de bzhin kham rgya nyid la'o// dbyings dang ldan pa'i ye shes dang// rgyu ma lho nub mtshams su ste// de bzhin kham rgya nyid la mchod// lgang pa ye shes kham rgya la'o// dbyangs dang tshig ldan snga ma'i
ngang// sgal tshigs phyogs bzhi gru chad la// long ba'i tshogs la dbul ba yang// dbyangs dang ldan pa'i tshig dag gis// ye shes lnga yi ngang la gzhag/ dkyil 'khor yan lag bar bar nas// dmus long
tshogs la dbul ba ni// ne'u seg dbyangs dang ldan pa yis// phul bas ye shes lnga yi dbyings la sbyor// gsang ba'i chu ba nang sgo nas// dbu dgu rab tu brtsegs pa la/ dbyangs kyi mnyes par snga ma'i

tshul// me ri la ni ba su ta// spyang mo brgyad la mchod pa yang// dbyangs tshig ldan pas dbyings la thim// khrag gi lce yi bar bar nas// za byed ye shes ku ku rA// brgyad la dbyangs kyi mchod pa yang// ma skyes
dbyings la thim par bya// bsdu ba'i thabs ni 'di dag gsungs// dbyings kyi cho 'phrul rab spros te// mtha' skor za byed ye shes kyi// spyang mo mgo dgu brtsegs pa la// dbu dgu nyid kyang dmus long
ste// dmus long long ba'i tshogs la 'phros// long ba kham rgya chen mo la// de nyid gtso bo yab yum la'o// yum yang dpal be'u'i thugs la bsdu// dpal be'u skye med dbyings su ste// brjod pa med pa'i

dbyings su thim// bdag dang dkyil 'khor ji bzhin te// bdag nyid maN+Dal nyid las 'phros// maN+Dal zla gam nyid la ste// zla gam gzi ldan yum gyi mkha'// yang na bdag nyid chen pos te// skye ba med pa'i

dbyings su thim// maN+Dal ye shes lnga la 'du// dam rdzas gsang ba'i b+ha gar bsdu// yongs su spros zhing bsdu ba rnams// skye ba med pa'i ngang la gzhag/ cung zad skye med bsgoms nas kyang// gong ma bzhin du
rim par bsdu// dbang bskur ba dang 'byung ba dang// tshe dang dngos grub len pa dang// bzod par gsol dang smon lam gdab// gtor ma gtang ba gzhung bzhin bya// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra
las/ ro sbyor bdud rtsi'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// rigs 'dzin go 'phang thob pa yis// rim gnyis lung gi brgyud pa'i lung// sa bon las ni 'bras bu bzhin// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i dkyil
'khor las// dbang chen dbang gi dkyil 'khor rgyud// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas las// lha chen 'khor bcas bsgral ba'i phyir// rgyal mtshan lnga dang ka bar bcas// 'phan dang za ram bla re

rnams// khams gsum dbang du sdud par gyur// hUM las rin chen khri bzhi yang// 'khor ba thabs kyis gnon pa dang// srin po ru tra sgrol ba dang// khyad par gzhan las 'phags pa'i phyir// khrag 'thung chen

po'i sku bzhir brgyud// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni// thabs kyi rtsal 'phang seng ger brgyud/ seng ge'i khri brgyad ni// gdan khri bzhi chen 'khril skyong ni// nyi zla pad+ma brtsegs par brgyud// zhe sdang khrag 'thung 'bar

ba'i sku// ngag gi dbang phyug nyid du brgyud// kro d+hI shwa ri la sogs yum// gzi ldan gsang ba'i yum nyid do// rigs la dbang rnams mi za bar// thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir// khrag 'thung lnga po'i

dbu la brgyud// khro bo chen po mthu chen brgyad// bsgral nas zhabs kyi gdan la brgyud// rdzogs pa chen po yin pa'i phyir// ting 'dzin brgyad dang ldan par dmigs// rgyan gyi bye brag mang po rnams// rdo rje rin
chen las byung ba'i// gshog pa dag tu rnam par brgyud// sgo ba khro bo yab yum brgyad// dbu lnga brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig po// 'jigs kyang// rigs dang bcas pa nyid du brgyud// rgyas 'debs la sogs lha

mo ni// kham rgya chen mor brgyud pas te// sprul pa yang sprul bsam yas pa// long ba'i tshogs dang khyi spyang du// brgyud pa yin zhes 'dren pas bstan// phra men bcu drug thugs kyi yum// phyag rgya bcu drug dkyil

'khor du// lcags kyi rdo rje la sogs pa'i// phyag mtshan bcu drug nyid du brgyud// gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba// yang gsang thugs la gab pa ste// 'di ni man ngag brgyud pa'i lung// rjes su rnal 'byor
rnams kyis spyod// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rigs 'dzin go 'phang thob pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// mkha' ldan chen pos gsungs pa las// 'da' dka' dam tshig le'u gsungs// rnal
'byor gang zhig rtsom pa yang// mnyam pa chen po rtogs pa yang// don las nam yang 'da' mi bya// bsdams par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// srog gi phyir yang mi 'da' ba'i// sna tshogs dngos po snang ba
yang// dngos po med pa'i skur gsal bas// rtogs pa'i don las yongs mi 'da'// sgra mtha' sna tshogs sgrogs pa yang// smra ba med pa'i gsung du rig/ rig pa'i don las 'da' mi bya// bsam
du med pa'i sems gang yin// de ni thugs kyi rang bzhin te// de las 'da' ba ma yin no// sku gsung thugs las ma g.yos kyang// che ba'i yon tan sna tshogs 'byung// 'on kyang zad med 'phel med
pas// yon tan dam tshig yin par grags// de las 'da' bar yongs mi bya// rtsol ba med pa'i las gang yin// de ni thabs kyi spyod pa bas// phrin las dam tshig 'da' dka' 'o// lnga po 'di la gang gnas

pa// rnal 'byor skal ldan dam pa'o// bsgrub bya'i dam tshig chen po ni// byang chub sems dang sha rnams dang// khrag dang dri chu dri chen po// dbang po lnga dang bcas pa ni// bde gshegs lnga yi thugs dam

ste// bsgrub la gnas pas mi spang zhing// 'da' bar bya ba ma yin no// brtul zhugs dam tshig chen po ni// dka' thum sdom la gnas pa'i phyir// bdud rtsi dam rdzas rkyen bcas la// thogs pa med pa'i brtul

zhugs kyis// spang len med par rol bya'o// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig chen po ni// lha dang rdzas dang tshe la sogs// snying po yig 'bru bcas pa rnams// gnyis su med par rtogs byas nas// mnyam pa chen po'i

dbyings su gzhag/ spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// pad+ma can dang dung can ma// ban glang ma dang ri mo can// bu mo mig ring la sogs kun// phrad par gyur nas sbyar ba yang// mthong ba tsam gyi dam tshig

ste// dbang po'i yul dang shes mtshon ldan// bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// nyon mongs lnga po gnas su dag/ sku dang ye shes ldan sbyor zhing// thams cad lha yi phyag rgyar gsal// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig

ni// 'khor ba'i chos lnga ma spangs shing// spyad pas grol te mya ngan 'das// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// dang du blang ba'i dam tshig ni// ta na ga Na la sogs spyad pa

yang// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka'// ma byin pa yang blang ba dang// mi tshangs pa yang spyad bya zhing// lha dang slob dpon mched la sogs// 'tshe la rdzun gyi tshig smra zhing// brlang po gang gis zher

gdab po// glu bro gsang ba'i dam tshig ni// dbyings nyid gsang ba'i sa gzhi la// b+hud+d+ha khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// gti mug gnas su 'joms pa ste// 'da' dka' sku yi dam tshig go/ me long gsal ba'i sa gzhi

la// rdo rje khrag 'thung rol ba'i bro// zhe sdang gnas su 'joms pa ste// 'da' dka' thugs kyi dam tshig go/ mnyam pa chen po'i sa gzhi la// rin chen khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// nga rgyal gnas su 'joms pa
ste// yon tan lhun grub dam tshig go/ so sor rtogs pa'i sa gzhi la// pad+ma khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// 'dod chags gnas su 'joms pa'i bro// sgra mtha' chub pa'i dam tshig go/ nan tan chen

po'i sa gzhi la// karma khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// phrag dog gnas su 'joms pa ste// phrin las 'da' dka'i dam tshig go/ stong nyid ye shes sa gzhi la// dbang chen khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// dug lnga gnas su

'joms pa ste// sku lnga lhun sbyor dam tshig go/ dbyings phyug lnga yi sa gzhi la// ye shes lnga yi bro brdungs shing// dug lnga 'joms pa'i glu blangs pas// sdug bsngal chu bo'i gzhung bskams nas// 'khor ba'i rgya
mtsho gting bskams te// sku gsung thugs su rgyas btab nas// bde ba chen por rnam sbyar te// dmyal tshogs me dpung gnas su bsad// 'di ni dpal gyi bro mo che// thos pa tsam gyis rtogs pa dang// brdungs

pa tsam gyis thugs dam skong// 'di ni glu bro'i dam tshig ste// thams cad chos sku gdal ba che// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ 'da' dka' dam tshig gi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig

'dzin brnyes pa'i sa// dus gsum rgyal ba mnyes par bya ba dang// rnal 'byor phyi rabs dngos grub thob pa'i phyir// rdo rje gsang ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so// cho ga srung dang ting 'dzin bcas pa'i sa// bdag

nyid phyag rgya chen po'i nga rgyal bskyed// de la ye shes rgyan gyi glu blangs pa// oM// gtsug tu 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan snang mdzad che// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// 'khor lo snying
gi dbus su bsgom// de yang rang bzhin med par dmigs// hUM/ dpral bar rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan sems dpa' che// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// rdo rje snying gi dkyil du bsgom// de
yang rang bzhin med par dmigs// swA/ g.yas su rin chen zur drug 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan rin po che// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// rin chen snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med pang
dmigs// AM/ rgyab tu pad+ma 'bab brgyad 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan mtha' yas che// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// pad+ma snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// hA/ g.yon du rdo
rje rgya gram 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan don yod grub// yab yum gnyis med rol pa las// rgya gram snying gi dbus su bsgom// de las rang bzhin med par dmigs// sku gsung yon tan phrin las lnga// rigs

lnga dpal gyi glu blangs pas// gsang ba'i yum gyi bro brdungs shing// dpa' bo 'bru lngas dbang bskur bas// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya'i sku// lus pa med pa chos kyi dbyings// hrIH/ rta mgrin gtsug na nor bu
'bar// cho ga gsum ldan ha ya grI// yab yum gnyis med rol pa las// nor bu snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// hUM// g.yas pa brgyad na lcags kyu 'bar// cho
ga gsum ldan phra men ma// gtso dang gnyis med 'khril pa las// lcags kyu snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// g.yon pa brgyad na mtshon cha 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan badzra

ste// gtso dang gnyis med 'khril ba las// mtshon cha snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// hUM/ truM/ zhabs brgyad pho nya za byed brgyad// cho ga gsum dang lan pa mo// gtso dang gnyis

med 'khril ba las// chas brgyad snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// phaT/ sku gsung thugs las rnam 'phrul ba'i// sgo skyong khro bo mgo dgu brtsegs// kham rgya mo dang long ba'i

tshogs// dmus long dang ni khyi spyang tshogs// dpal chen sku la rab tu 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan sprul tshogs ldan// de yang yab yum sbyor ba las// 'khor rnams snying gi dkyil du bsgom// de la rang bzhin

med par dmigs// 'di ni ye shes rgyan gyi glu'o// rgyan nyid ye shes glu blangs pas// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// bdag nyid phyag rgya rta mchog 'bar// A+oM/ 'khor lo ye shes can rnams kyis// 'khor lo

rdo rje bsgom byas na// de nyid chos sku nam mkha' che ho// hUM/ rdo rje ye shes can rnams kyis// rdo rje rdo rje bsgom byas na// de nyid chos nyid ngang la rdzogs ho/ swA/ rin chen ye shes can rnams kyis// rin chen rdo

rje bsgom byas na// de nyid longs spyod lhun gyis 'grub ho// AM/ pad+ma ye shes can rnams ni// pad+ma rdo rje bsgom byas na// de nyid brten par gyur pa med// hA// rgya gram ye shes can rnams ni// rgya gram rdo rje

bsgom byas na// de nyid sprul sku ngo mtshar che ho// rgyan nyid ye shes glu blangs pas// bskul dang don byas 'dus pa dang// thams cad a ste dngos med sku// stong pa chen po'i ngang la gzhag ho// dbang chen 'dus

pa'i tan+t+ra las/ glu'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// tshar gsum pa yi rnga brdungs pas// lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'joms// snang mdzad chen po a la la// zhes brjod de/ gzhung bzhin lnga'i don shes par

bya'o// dang por rgyu dang rang bzhin dang// don dang bsgom dang grangs dang ni// bsnyen par bya dang thabs la sogs// bdun po 'di la rnga zhes bya// de la rnga yi rgyu dag ni// phyi yi rgyu dang nang gi rgyu// gsang ba'i rgyu

dang gsum du bstan// rang bzhin la yang gsum gsum ste// rnga'i rang bzhin dang/ skad kyi rang bzhin dang/ lcags kyi rang bzhin no// don la yang gnyis te/ rnga kun nas zlum por gyur pa dang/ rnga kun nas
yongs su rnam par grags pa'o// bsgom pa la yang gsum ste/ blta bar bsgom pa dang/ lha'i sku phyag rgyar bsgom pa dang/ sprul pa bsgom pa dang/ rnga'i grangs la yang gsum ste/ sgrub pa las kyi rnga

dang/ gsang ba yum gyi rnga dang/ rol mo dbyangs kyi rnga'o// bsnyen pa la yang gnyis te/ bsnyen pa dang nye ba'i bsnyen pa'o// brdung thabs la yang rnam pa drug ste/ dpal chen rang bzhin gyi rnga brdung thabs dang/

dur khrod ma mo'i brdung thabs dang/ rbod gtong pho nya rbad pa'i brdung thabs bstan pa'o// phra men gau ri lang ka 'du ba'i brdungs thabs dang// phyogs skyong zil gyis mnan pa'i brdung thabs dang// dngos grub
nye bar len pa'i brdung thabs dang drug tu gsungs so// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rnga brdung ba'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// dbang gi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// gnod sbyin rnams ni 'khor
'dod na// gnod sbyin gzugs ni khrag gis bri// dur khrod chen por mngon sum du// dur khrod dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ste// dbus kyi gru gsum mthing nag la// mtha' skor zla gam brgyad kyis bskor// dbus su

yum chen gzi ldan ma// zla gam brgyad la bzhag pa yang// mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han d+ha la// bsgrub pa'i ma mo brgyad bris te// dur khrod ma mo dgod pa yang// shar du rdo rje sder mo dang// lho ru ma mo glog 'gyu

ma// nub tu rdo rje dra ba mo// byang du ar mo de la bzhag/ shar lho mtshams su dgod pa yang// rdo rje kham rgya chen mo'o// lho nub mtshams su dgod pa yang// rin chen kham rgya dgod par bya// nub byang mtshams

su pad+ma rgya// byang shar mtshams su las kyi rgya// phyi rim bar khyams chen po la// zla gam dmar po bcu drug la// phra men bcu drug rim pa bzhin// sgo bzhir zla gam bzhi bris te// steng du lcags kyu la sogs
dgod// de ltar bsham pa'i dkyil 'khor du// gnod sbyin gzugs ni khrag gis bri// snying gar rdog phur mnan nas su// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs hUM bzlas pas// gnod sbyin ma 'ongs par du ni// sdod na
zhag bdun nas khugs 'gyur// gnod sbyin kun la ci dgar spyod// rnal 'byor pa yi bran du 'gyur// phra men rnams ni 'khol 'dod na// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus dag tu// ro ras gro ga shing shun la/ phra men
gzugs ni khrag gis bri// dbang po yan lag phur pas gdab// snying gar rdog pas mnan nas ni// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs hUM zhes bzlas// gong ma bzhin du bdun gyis 'ong// bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod pa
bzhin// phra men rnams ni ci dgar 'khor// khong gis 'gal na khong dag 'chi// bdag gis nyams na bdag nyid nyams// ma mo sgrub pa'i dus dag tu// nang par mal nas langs nas kyang// yi dam gnas
pa'i sa phyogs su// goms gsum 'phags nas sku gsum dran// bshang gci byed pa'i sa phyogs su// dri chen lag tu blangs nas su// sus ma mthong bar khams gsum bza'// dri chu khyor ba gang
blugs nas// sus ma mthong bar thengs gsum btung// phra men chen mo bkol ba'i phyir// shin tu dben pa'i dur khrod du// rkang gcig sa la btsugs nas kyang// phag skad thengs gsum ngur bar bya// byang gi

phyogs su kha bltas te// gnod sbyin dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// dri chen mdun du bzhag nas kyang// khyi skad thengs gsum zug par bya// nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas te// rta skad 'tsher ba'i glu dbyangs blangs// phra
men rnams la ci dgar spyod// 'di ni ma mo bskol ba'i le'u'o// dkyil 'khor 'di la bkram pa yang// dbus su bkram pa 'di dag ste// gnyis ldan byang chub sems chen po// 'o ma dang ni bsres la

gzhag/ 'phyar zhing ma mo rten dbyangs blangs// phyogs bzhir bdud rtsi bzhi rnams ni// rim pa bzhin du zla gam la'o// yi ge'i 'phro 'du byas nas kyang// ma mo rten dbyangs blangs shing 'phyar// mtha' skor

shar lho mtshams su ni// rdzas su khyo tshe bcu drug la// raka ta khrag dang bsres pa yi// snga ma bzhin du 'phyar zhing gzhag/ phyi rim phra men bcu drug la// rdzas su khyo tsho bcu drug dgod// de yi steng du snying po
bri// rak+ta khrag dang bsres pa yi// kha ches bos la 'phyar zhing gzhag/ sgo ba rnams ni dgod pa yang// byang skya gnag bcas bris pa la// kha li li bos 'phyar la gzhag/ 'di ltar rtogs nas bsgom pa
dang// gnod sbyin byan mo las byed dang// ma mo mngag gzhug drag mo las byed dang// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gtor ma cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// slob mar rak+tas dbang bskur ro// dngos grub

brten phyir bzlas pa las// srod la 'khor gsum bro brdung pa// tho rangs sbyor ba'i las kyang bya// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur na// dngos grub rab tu brtan par 'gyur// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/
ma mo bkol ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// chas kyi blo dag las grol tshig zab mo dang// gdug byed pho nya'i le'u// bskul ba'i las dag 'bad pa'i phyir// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer

ni// dpal mchog drag shul stag gi chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// stag mgo dmar po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// stag lag khro mo zhe sdang glog stong 'khyug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi
bzad de// shar phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// dri za dbang sdud gdon bgegs thal bar rlog/ gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pas ni// gnod gdug zlog byed rgya bye'u lcags kyi
chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// lcags mgo sngon po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// lcags lag khro mo zhe sdang glog stong 'khyug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// shar lho

khyab par rgug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// drang srong dbang sdud gdon bgegs thal bar rlog/ gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje 'chol ba'i chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor
ba'i byin rlabs las// rdo rje dmar mo dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// rdo rje lag pas zhe sdang glog stong 'khyug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// lho phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan
ma// gshin rje dbang du sdud cing gdon bgegs thal bar rlog/ gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// rngom brjid gnyen lcug sbrul nag 'khyil ba'i chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs

las// sbrul mgo nag po'i dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// sbrul nag khro mo zhe sdang glog stong 'khyug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// lho nub khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// srin por dbang
sdud gdon bgegs thal bar rlog/ gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// dbang gi bse khrab gzi ldan bgrad pa'i chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs kyis// bse mgo dmar po dbu lnga me ltar
'bar// bse lag khro mo zhe sdang glog stong 'khyug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// nub phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// klu srin dbang sdud gdon bgegs thal bar

rlog/ gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// za byed chen po ting 'dzin mche ba'i chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// za byed mche ba'i dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// mche ba'i lag pa zhe sdang glog
stong 'khyug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// nub byang khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// rlung lha dbang sdud gdon bgegs thal bar rlog/ gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa

ni// gzi ldan shu kan smad g.yogs dar gyi chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// drang srong dmar po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// dar lag khro mo zhe sdang glog stong 'khyug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin
tu mi bzad de// byang phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// gnod sbyin dbang sdud gdon bgegs thal bar rlog/ gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// gcan gzan rgyal bo gdug pa

gzig gi chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// gzig mgo khra mo dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// gzig lag khro mo zhe sdang glog stong 'khyug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// byang shar khyab
par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// dbang ldan dbang sdud gdon bgegs thal bar rlog/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dregs pa'i dpung 'joms ma// za byed mche bas bdud kyi dpung tshogs
'joms// nga rgyal bsnyems pas pha rol zil gyis gnon// thugs chom 'brug sgras srin po'i thod rus 'joms// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa srin po dbang du sdud// hUM dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig/ phrin las
dus la bab po gshegs su gsol// ma ma bgyis pas ma mo bskul// dza dza bgyis pas khro bo rbad// ha ha bgyis pas pho nya 'gyed// hrIHhrIHbgyis pas rta mgrin rngam// b+h+yo b+h+yo bgyis pas dbang phyug

'bod// dbyangs su tshangs pa'i glu drug blang// las su dgra bgegs ma lus bsgral// rtags su gsang ba'i rnga chung brdung// dpal gyi phrin las dus la bab// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ chas kyi pho nya

mngag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// tshad mar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas// hUM mdzad chen po'i tan+t+ra las// nye bar bsgrub pa'i man ngag ni// sbyor ba'i dam tshig 'di gsungs so// phyi rabs skal
bar rab ldan pa'i// mi nyams tsam du bcas pa las// the tshom med cing nges par 'grub// lus ngag yid gsum rgya che la// dbyings nas gsang ba'i yum bskyed pa// snying po 'bru dang bcas pas so// mnyam

pas mnyam pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i rtse mor oM ser po// ye shes lnga yi sa bon bsam// rdo rje rtse lngar gyur par dmigs// de dkyil a las zla ba ste// thabs kyi

phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul lo// gzi ldan gsang ba e gru gsum// de dkyil ma la nyi ma ste// de'i steng baM las pad+mar btag/ shes rab phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul lo// sku bskyed phyag rgya gsal ba las// so sor gsal ba'i

brdas mtshon te// bstod cing bskul nas ldan byas na// oM dang muM gyi 'phro 'du las// cho ga gsum gyis byin rlabs nas// pra be sha yi sgo dbye la// 'dab brgya pad+ma nyi mar bcas// de dbus gsang ba'i rdo rje

dbul// hUM gis gsor cing ha yis bskyod// yang dang yang du bskyod pa yis// sku gsum dbyings su bsdu ba'o// hUM ni yab kyi byang chub sems// go ro tsa na'i dbyings nas bton// srog dag gsang ba'i dbyings

su sbyangs// ljags kyi dbang por 'khyil pa yang// nA sa'i dbyings nas klad par bskul// tshor ba nyams su myong nas ni// sgal ba'i rtsa ru brgyud nas kyang// gsang ba'i rdo rje'i lam du byung// b+ha ga gsang ba'i

dkyil 'khor du// yang dang yang du spro zhing bsdu// nyi ma zla ba pad+ma dang// rdo rje la sogs 'dren pa dang// sbyor ba'i byang chub rab spros pas// phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul// mtha' yas sems can
las don byas// slar 'dus phyag rgya'i skur gyur pas// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang pa'o// de yang yab yum sbyor ba las// byang chub sems ni sprin chen blangs// rdzas las tshe yi dngos grub

gsol// 'di ni sbyor ba'i lung du grags// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer las// slar yang yum gyi dbyings su thim// de las phyag rgya'i skur bsgoms pas// dong tshe tsam gyi zla dkyil du// ye shes sems dpa'
tshon gang dmar// 'bru gsum tsam gyi spro mtshams la// g.yas pa yid bzhin nor bu bsnams// g.yon pa rin chen za ma tog/ de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal ba dang// sprul pas gzhan gyi don byas nas// thams

cad ma lus phyag rgya'i skur// sbyor ba chen pos bskyed pa'o// rdzogs nas mthol bshags bzod par gsol// za byed thams cad chos kyi dbyings// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu

rtsa lnga pa'o//// dpal mchog pad+ma he ru ka'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rngom brjid ni// skye med thabs kyi phyag rgya che// 'di ni dpa' bo chen po'i sku// khro bo rngom brjid rgyal po'i le'u// blo dang ldan pa'i rnal

'byor gyis// sku la rngom brjid bzhir grags pa// nam mkha'i rang bzhin phyag rgya rngom// cir yang bsgyur ba'i bzhugs thabs rngom// zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan mchog rngom// tsham rngams chen po stabs kyi

rngom// gsung la rngam pa bzhir grags pa// hom lngar 'brel bas zhal gyi rngom// zla gam cir yang bsgyur ba ljags kyi rngom// skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa tshems kyi rngom// gsung sgra 'brug ltar sgrogs pa dbyangs kyi

rdom// thugs kyi rngam pa bzhir grags pa// ting 'dzin nam mkha' rgyan gyi skar ltar rngom// phrin las rgya mtsho rgyan gyi rlabs ltar rngom// yon tan sa gzhi rtsi shing lta bur rngom// mdzad pa rol mo rgyan gyi gar

stabs rngom// yon tan rngam pa bzhir grags pa// rU tra bcom pa'i gnas lngar rngom// lha chen mnan pa'i gdan gyi rngom// khams gsum bsgral ba'i zhing gi rngom// rtog 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngom// sku
yi brjid pa bzhir grags pa// sku che yan lag rags pas brjid kyang che// grangs mang rkyen dang mtshams pas brjid kyang che// bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid kyang che// khyad zhugs bla ma yin pas
brjid kyang che// gsung gi brjid pa bzhir grags pa// gdangs tshe stong gsum gang bas1 brjid kyang che// tshig myur 2the tshom gcod pas3 brjid kyang che// gsal bas 4mtha' gnyis spangs pas brjid kyang

che// thugs kyi brjid pa bzhir grags pa// yangs pa re dogs med pas brjid kyang che// thugs rje thugs dam mthar phyin brjid kyang che// ma bkag sa ler mkhyen pas brjid kyang che// ma rmongs cir yang sprul
pas brjid kyang che// yon tan brjid pa bzhir grags pa// med pa zad mi shes pas brjid kyang che// gcig las 'dod dgur bsgyur bas brjid kyang che// gnod sbyor pham par mdzad pas brjid

kyang che// thabs mkhas skyon gyis ma gos brjid kyang che// phrin las brjid pa bzhir grags pa// mi bsnyengs nyams bag rol pas brjid kyang che// 'khor ba yun ring mi brnyengs brjid kyang che// mgo skyabs
rgyun du mdzad pas brjid kyang che// dgongs pa'i don rnams 'grub pas brjid kyang che// de ltar dpa' chen yon tan sum cu rtsa drug gis// dug gsum sku gsung thugs su sbyar// sdug bsngal bde ba chen por
gcad// dbyings las ye shes chen po ste// ngan 'gro mtho ris skyas btab pas// dmyal tshogs dongs sprugs chen po mdzad// rgyal ba gang gi thugs rjes kyang// 'di la rdul tsam bskyad du med// srid gsum
dbang du bsdus nas ni// khams gsum dus gcig dbyings su thim// thig le chos skur ye gnas pas// dbang chen zhes kyang 'di la bsngags// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ khro bo rngam brjid rgyal

po'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//// dngos grub bsnyems pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rdo rje tshe mchog sgrub pa'i phyir// nges pa'i don la 'di gsungs so// bkra shis gsang chen
che yi lung// gzi mdangs ldan pa sgrub pa'o// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas mchog tu// phun sum tshogs dang ldan byas nas// bkra shis dkyil 'khor zlum po la// 'dom gang tshad dang ldan pa'o// pad+ma 'dab ma

brgyad pa la// steng du zla gam re re dkod// phyogs bzhi'i zla gam bzhi po la// gshog pa mo la sogs pa bzhi// steng du b+han d+ha bzhi dang bcas// mtshams kyi zla gam bzhi po la// za byed la sogs yum bzhi

yang// b+han d+ha bzhi la rdo rjes mtshan// shin tu brtags te dgod par bya// dbus kyi lte ba zlum po la// yum mchog gzi ldan pad+ma can// zla gam kha sprod thod par bcas// snying po sngags dang bcas pa

dgod// mtshan ma med pa'i chos sku la// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog mi mnga' yang// bdud dang gshin rje'i 'dul ba dang// tshe dang bsod nams brtan pa'i phyir// rdo rje'i ra bas kun tu bskor// rnal 'byor gang
zhig skal yod la// dkyil 'khor 'di yi don yang bshad// rdzas las dngos grub gsol ba dang// tshe yi rig 'dzin thob pa'i phyir// tshe bum b+han d+ha srubs med la// mgul chings gsang ba'i ras kyis
dkri// nang du dpa' bo sman dang bcas// snying po yum gyi skur bskyed cing// gsang ba'i bsnyen la dgu 'bum dbul// bum par bsdu zhing dbyings su bstim// sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dang bcas// mkha' la
spro zhing dbyings su bstim// de las sems dpa'i skur bsgom pa// tshon gang sku yis stong gsum dgang// tshe gnas sprug pa'i dgongs pa ste// spel ba'i cho ga yin par gsungs// rnal 'byor yab
yum sbyor ba'i sems// dmar po hrIHdang ldan spros nas// gzi ldan thugs kar bstim byas te// gnyis su med par gyur pa ni// stim pa'i cho ga yin par gsungs// sbyor ba'i sems la 'du 'phro ni// khams
gsum gang nas 'dus pa dang// gzi ldan lte ba'i gzhal yas su// thim gyur rgya gram gtams pas gcad// bdud dang mu stegs gang gis kyang// 'di la mthong bar mi nus pas// sba ba'i cho ga yin par

gsungs// sbyor ba'i byang chub lcags kyu 'phros// dzaHdzaHsprin phung 'du 'phro las// klu dang srin po 'khor bcas kyi// cho dang gzi byin bkug nas kyang// bum pa'i gzi ldan thugs gar bcug/ 'di ni dgug
pa'i cho gar gsungs// sbyor ba'i sems las hUM dkar spros// de las rtse gsum rdo rje lcags kyu yis// tshe nyams 'degs pa'i sbror ba yis// lus ngag yid gsum brlabs nas ni// sku gsung thugs su gsal

ba dang// nr-i yang hUM du byin brlabs te// shin tu gang ngam rgyas pa ni/ gso ba'i cho ga yin par gsungs// thams cad gcig tu gyur pa dang// mnyam nyid chos sku dag pa yis// srid gsum dbang du gyur pa

ni// dbang du bsdu ba'i cho ga yin// cir snang ci srid byang chub sems// de las phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor che// g.yo dang mi g.yo sna tshogs kun// mi nub ldan pa'i A yuH'od// dmar pos dbang bsdus rgyas
btab pa// rgyas btab cho ga yin par gsungs// thams cad ma lus gzi ldan yum// dkyil 'khor bum par bcas pa kun// mi dmigs gzi ldan mkha' la 'khyil// tshon gang gsal ba'i skur bskyed
nas// mu tig nas tsam phyag na bsnams// de nyid ye shes phyag rgya la// gnyis su med par gyur pa dang// skye med chos skur rtogs pa ni// gnas kyi cho ga yin par gsungs// so so'i pho nya gtang ba
yang// spel ba'i dus na gshog pa mo// bstim pa'i dus na dra ba can// sba ba'i dus na sder mo can// dgug pa'i dus na glog 'gyu ma// gso ba'i dus ni mgo brnyan can// dbang du bsdu ba dmar mo'i
tshogs// rgyas 'debs dus na gsang yum bzhi'o// bsgrub pa chen po rdzogs pa dang// dngos grub gsol dang dbang bskur dang// smon lam gdab dang pra la sogs// phrin las gzhol dang gtor ma
gtang// gzhung las byung ba bzhin du bya// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bkra shis tshe'i lung gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//// phyi rabs sngags 'chang bsgrub pa pos// dpal chen 'khor bcas
bsgrub pa dang// tshe dang gzi brjid spel ba'i phyir// gzi brjid che ba'i le'u gsungs// dang po phun sum tshogs ldan nas// bka' dang mthun pa'i dgon gnas su// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru

bzhi la// dbus su gru gsum tshad du ni// khru gsum khru gang 'phang du brtsig/ ngos su zla gam bzhi pa la/ bar khyams sgo dang sgo khyud bcas// me dpung 'bar bas mtha' bskor zhing// shin tu mdzes dang ldan

par bri// lag cha phun sum tshogs bris la// gzi ldan mtshan dang ldan pa des// thod pa ma gas khyad par can// lcang lo 'bar bas brgyan pa lnga// dbus dang phyogs bzhi'i zla gam la'o// sman dang dza gad rgun

chang dang// mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma las// ji tsam 'byor ba'i yo byad rnams// gong ma'i snod rnams rab tu dgang// de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// tshe dang gzi brjid spel ba'i phyir// thabs la mkhas
pas 'di skad gsungs// sbyang dang spel dang bsgom pa dang// yig 'byu 'phro 'dus bkug pa dang// rigs kyi pho nya btang ba dang// bsnyen pa'i grangs rnams rgyas btab dang// phra dang rig pa mngon sum

du// bltas pas lhan ne gsal ba'o// de la sbyang bar bya ba yang// sngags dang phyag rgya'i pho nya dang// chos nyid dag pa'i ngang gis so// spel ba'i don dang rang bzhin ni// chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos

kyang// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mkha' ltar khyab// de ni spel ba'i lung zhes bya// bsgom par bya ba 'di dag ste// snod bcud yum gyi dbyings su bsgom// snang srid phyag rgya'i tshogs su bsgom// yig 'bru spro bar bya ba
ni// A yuHdmar po dbang gi sku// bskyed pa'i sa bon nyid du spro// bskul dang don byas bsdu ba dang// gzi dang ldan ma'i dpal be'u nas// sems dpa'i sku dang ldan par bya// 'di ni bsdu ba'i lung du

gsungs// rigs kyi pho nya btang ba ni// shar nas rdo rje pho nya mo// gshog pa'i lus la rdo rje sbrul gyi gdong// rgyan la sogs pa'ang de bzhin bskul// lho nas rin chen gshog pa mo// gshog pa'i lus la rdo rje
rin chen gdong// rgyan la sogs pa'ang de bzhin bskul// nub nas sbrul nag gshog pa mo// gshog pa'i lus la sbrul gyi gdong// rgyan la sogs pa de bzhin bskul// byang nas rdo rje the'u gshog ma// sprul
pa'i lus la the'u gshog gdong// rgyan la sogs pa de bzhin sprul// dbus nas mgyogs pa'i bka' nyan ma// mu men lus la 'khor lo'i gdong// rgyan la sogs bde bzhin sprul// bsnyen pa'i grangs ni 'di
drug ste// A yuHsems kyi rang bzhin te// gdod nas ma skyes nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// puN+ye ma bkag ci bder yin// rtogs nas zhag gcig drug stong ste// de ltar rtogs nas grangs rdzogs te// mkhas
ldan chen pos rgyas btab nas// thams cad mnyam nyid chos sku+u la// gcig tu bsdus nas gzi ldan rgya// thugs kar rdo rje rgya gram gyis// 'gyur ba med par bstim la bzhag/ 'phral ma dbab

par bya ba ni// rin chen me tog dor nas kyang// gang la bab pa'i tshe dbang bskur// rig pas sku gsal 'bar ba dang// lta ba thams cad sangs rgyas pa'o// de ltar bskur zhing don bya'o// yid la gang gi bya ba
dang// yang na dpal gyi thugs ka nas// lcags kyu zhags pa pho nya rnams// tshe dang gzi mdangs 'phrog phyer bskul// lcags kyus bskul bas gshin rje 'dzin// zhags pa thogs pas 'byung po 'joms// sgrog
gis thams cad 'joms par byed// dril bus lus sems spro ba bskyed// tshe la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gang na gnas pa thams cad kun// bkug nas rnam shes a dkar dmigs// 'phro 'du byas nas
slar 'dus nas// A yuHskye med dang por gnas// 'dus nas chos kyi dbyings su thim// tshe dang gzi brjid 'phel rgyas shing// sdug bsngal bde bar byin brlabs nas// gzi brjid 'di la sngags rdzas

dang// sman la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams// mkhas ldan chen po 'di ltar ro// sna tshogs mtshan mar snang ba ni// rdzas dang lag cha'i mtshan ma kun// so so'i mtshan ma mngon sum las// sgyu ma lta bur mngon byas

te// sgyu ma nyid la sgyu ma rol// ye shes nyid la ye shes thim// thim gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya che// 'di ni byang chub sems kyi rgyu// ma btang bzhin du yongs la gsal// skye shi med pa'i chos skur dmigs// 'du
'bral med pa'i gsung du 'gyur// 'gyur ba med pa'i sku brnyes nas// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las// gzi byin tshe'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//// bsdus na yid bzhin rin po che// yid

bzhin gter du gyur pas sbas pa yin// phrin las zhi khro lta bu yang// sprul pa mang po ji ltar ston pa yang// dus gsum sgrol ba'i nus mthu bsam yas kyang// lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings su sbas pa yin// snang
srid 'khor ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa// yab yum bde ba'i ngang du ro gcig ste// rtag par bden pa'i byin rlabs chen po yang// ye nas btsal ba med par lhun gyis gnas// sdug bsngal nyid kyang bde ba'i

longs spyod dpal// ma btsal gzhan na man ngag sbas pa yin// lta ba 'di la skal ldan gang gnas pa// da lta nyid du lta ba dbye bsal med// spyod pa 'di la su zhig gang brtson pa// da lta nyid nas phrin las

lhun gyis grub// dam tshig 'di la skyes bu gang sdom pa// klong du gyur pas bsrung du med pa'o// ngang gis ma ltos dngos grub yin pas na// ma bsgrub lhun gyis grub pas bzhag pa yin// chos rnams thams cad
'byung ba ro gcig pas// sa chu la sogs rnam pa tha dad pa// mtshan ma mngon du gsal bar gyur na yang// don gyi lha mo bzhi yi dbyings la rdzogs// man ngag sbas pa'i lung du grags pa'o// sa

la gnas pa'i skyes bu yang// rab kyi gdams ngag rna brgyud pa// 'di rtags tshe rabs nges pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rigs dang tshad ma sbyor ba'i nges blo yin// sems kyi gting du zhen pa gyur pa ni// sbas pa'i

man ngag snod dang mi 'gal bas// lta bas ji ltar chod bzhin gdon mi za// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las// man ngag sbas pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//// lta ba rgya mtsho'i le'u 'di// snod ldan rnal
'byor don du gsungs// bden pa gnyis kyi lam mtshon te// sa dang sa yi rim pa bzhin// bgrod nas phyin par 'dod pa gang// mdongs pas nam mkhar bsnyeg pa bzhin// phyin pa'i gnas med khyab pa
la// gnas las 'phos pa med pas nas// lta ba rgya mtsho bzhin du blta// rten cing 'brel bar bcas pa yi// phyi nang 'bras bu rgyur bcas kun// lugs dang lugs las ldog pa ni// sa yi rim par 'dod pa
dag/ smig rgyu bzhin du chur dmigs te// phrad par mi 'gyur phyin mi 'gyur// 'on kyang ma bgrod sar bzhag pas// lta ba rgya mtsho bzhin du blta// dmigs su med par dmigs bya ba// de nyid dmigs pa chen

po ste// mtshan ma med dang bcas pa yang// mtshon pa yul dang bral lo zhes// thams cad dmigs pa'i yul las 'das// bla med go 'phang bgrod pa yang// ma bgrod phyin pas bla na med// lta ba rgya mtsho bzhin

du blta// dag pa'i don phyir rang gi rig rtogs pas// bran dang rje bo lta bu'i tshul gyis kyang// sangs rgyas sa yi go rim btsal btar 'dod// phyi nang dag pa'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa yis// mtho ris lha yi

gnas thob gang yin pa// lta ba 'di yi lung du lhan ne ba// rgya mtsho bzhin du g.yo ba med par blta// de nyid gzhi dang ldan par bsgom pa yang// gang la mi rtog ci la mi chags te// me long bzhin du rig pa

mngon sum yal// 'bras bu lam du ma nor rtsol ba ni// bsgom pa'i mthu yod 'phags lam ring ba yang// lta ba rgya mtsho bzhin du blta// byin rlabs chen po sangs rgyas khyad par can// thams cad lha yi dngos

grub pas// rig pa sgom par bcas pa yis// sa dang sa yi rim pa bgrod pa yang// theg pa mchog gi ngang la ye gnas pas// lta ba rgya mtsho bzhin du zab mor blta// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur yab yum yin pas

na// drug lnga nyid kyang ye nas sangs rgyas pas// sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba'i 'gro ba rnams// sgrol dang sbyor ba'i phrin las zab mo yis// zhing bcu gnas su sgrol ba'i sangs rgyas kyang// lta ba 'di yi ngang du
sangs rgyas pas// lta ba rgya mtsho bzhin du lhun gyis grub// sna tshogs kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems// de nyid ma skyes pa ni yum gyi mkha'// snang la rang bzhin med par yab kyi dbyings// de yang

dbyer med 'bras bu sku gsung thugs// rtsol dang bral ba'i sa la dgod pa yang// lta ba'i ngang la rgya mtsho ji bzhin du// rgya mtsho chen por chu bo kun 'bab ltar// theg pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang po 'di// bde

mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i man ngag pas// ming dang mtshan ma'i spyod yul ma yin te// dbye ba med pa'i ngang du rdzogs sangs rgyas// lta ba rgya mtsho'i ting 'dzin ye nas dag/ de bas lta ba rgya mtsho bzhin du

blta// gu ya sa ma ya yi thugs ka nas// skal ldan 'ga' yi don du gsungs pa ni// snod min phal gyi spyod yul ma yin pas// chu srin dang ni nor bu rin chen tshul// rgya mtsho'i gting gi rdo ltar khar phyung

min// rmongs shing 'chal bas gal te khar phyung na// rang gzhan ngan song gsum du nges 'khyams na// gdeng dang ldan pa'i skyes bu'i tugs la brnag/ dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las// lta bu rgya mtsho'i le'u ste
sum cu pa'o//// dngos grub brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// sgrub pa'i man ngag sbas pa ni// phyi rabs rnal 'byor skal rab la// snyan khyung brgyud nas gsungs pa dag/ man ngag sbas pa'i

le'u zhes bya ste// sngon tshe man ngag sbas pa'i bka'// dbang phyug go 'phang thob pa'i rgyu// sku gsung thugs su bsgrub pa la// bdud dang gshin rje dregs pa yis// dngos grub bar du gcod pa la// dpal
gyi thugs rjes nan tan gyis// bdud dang srin po bsgral ba dang// phyi rabs sngags 'chang sgrub pa po// dbang phyug gral du bzhag pa'i phyir// sbas pa'i tan+t+ra gsungs pa las// man ngag sbas pa 'di

rnams so// pho brang rin chen gzhal yas khang// gdan dang 'byung bar gyur pa rnams// dbang chen nyid kyi sku bskyed pa'i// 'byung lnga yi ge hUM la sbas// rigs la dbang ba'i he ru ka/ rin chen khri bzhir sbas

pa'o// ma tshogs dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad// 'degs pa'i gdan du sbas par bshad// ma bdun gsang ba'i phyag rgya yang// nyi ma bdun du sbas pa yin// gdan khri pad+mar brtsegs pa yang// shes rab yum gyi rang

bzhin te// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar sbas// zhe sdang rdo rje'i phyag rgya yang// man ngag gsang bar brgyud pas ni// gar gyi dbang phyug sku la sbas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// dbu lnga'i gzhal yas

nyid la sbas// khro rgyal thabs kyis brgyud pa'i sku// dmar po srog gi rang bzhin ni// ha ya grI ba'i rta mgor sbas// hU~M kA ra dang khro bo brgyad// 'khor ba zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir// chas dang ting 'dzin zhabs
su sbas// dur khrod gsang ba'i yum rnams ni// lha mo bzhi yang rab brgyud nas// rin chen gshog par sbas pa'o// ta krita bcu drug khros pa yang// dur khrod phra men bcu drug ni// thabs dang shes

rab tshul gyis su// phyag mtshan bcu drug nyid la sbas// sprul pa'i 'khor du grags pa kun// long ba'i tshogs su sbas pa'o// sgo ba chen po yum dang bcas// mgo dgu brtsegs pa nyid du sbas// bka' nyan las

kyi mngag gzhug ma// cir yang snang zhing mdzad pa pas// dmigs pa bzhin du gzhal nas ni// dngos po med pa'i thig le che// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus phyag rgya'i sku// dngos dang dngos med mtshan ma thams

cad kyang// dang po nyid kyang skye 'gag med pa'i ngang// dbyings nas ma g.yos g.yos pa'i mthu dang bral// mnyam pa chen por gcig pas sbas pa yin// de lta bas na don la mi gnyis kyang// sgra mtha' mang po

ji skad brjod pa ni// de nyid sgra mthar stong pas brjod du med// bsam du brjod med chos dbyings nam mkha' 'dra// de yi ngang las rdul tsam ma g.yos kyang// byin rlabs so so'i rigs dang kha dog kun// ma
'dres bzhin du bye brag gsal ba yang// ngo bo gcig nyid du mar sbas pa yin// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad du byung ba ni// che ba'i yon tan dpag gis mi lang bas// 'ub kyis gcig par dbyer med pa// stong

pa chen po'i 'bras bu mya ngan 'das// gsal ba'i phyag mtshan bcu drug 'bar ba ni// sprul pas klu srin 'dul bar khro bsar yang// ye shes dbyings la sbyor ba mya ngan 'das// dbu rgyan tshar gsum phreng bas
bklubs pa ni// dug sum sgrol zhing mdzes par snang ba yang// dngos gzhi byang chub sems su mya ngan 'das// na bza' rdo rje'i go chas brgyan pa ni// gdul byar thabs su brjid par bstan pa yang// rang

bzhin nyid ni chos skur gcig pa'i phyir// ma skyes sems kyi ngang la mya ngan 'das// rta mgo ljang gu'i rgyan gyi bye brag kyang// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par 'dzin pa'i phyir// rak+ta yum gyi klong du mya ngan

'das// sbrul nag gdu bu la sogs brgyan pa rnams// klu rgyal dbang du bsdu phyir snang ba ni// bkra shis klu yi rgyal sa gzung ba'i phyir// nag po ser po dmar po bsnams pa yang// mtshan ma chos kyi dbyings

su mya ngan 'das// stong khams khyab pa'i ral pa dmar po yang// spyan dang shangs dang snyan la sogs pa yi// dbang po lnga yi khyab pa'i bye brag las// mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul mang por rab tu sprul// spyi mthun lnga lnga
so so'i snang ba yang// stong pa chen po'i dbyings su mya ngan 'das// 'khor dang sprul pa'i khyad par ma lus kun// snang tsam nyid nas cir yang mi dmigs pas// gzi ldan yum gyi dbyings su mya ngan
'das// phyag rgya la sogs mtshan ma thams cad kun// kun bzang gnyis med nam mkha'i dbyings yangs na// rtsol ba med par lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir// gsang ba myang 'das zhes ston pas
gsungs// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las// mya ngan 'das pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// rigs gnyis lung gi brgyud pa las// dngos grub ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// lta ba byang chub sems
le'u// zab mo'i don du 'di gsungs so// ting 'dzin thabs kyi brgyud pa'i bye brag las// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rim pa cir snang ba// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// gzhal yas yid
bzhin lhun gyis grub pa yang// skyon med yon tan phun sum tshogs ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// me ri dmar po phyogs bzhir 'phro ba yang// stong khams yongs su bsreg pa'i
mthur ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// me sbrul dmar po nag por snang ba yang// zhe sdang gdug pa'i dgra bgegs 'dul ba dang// gnyen po gzhan na med pa'i mthur ldan
pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// ka ba gdung ma nyi mas brgyan pa yang// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'degs pa'i mthu ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// 'phan dang

za ra tshag dang ba dan dang// bla re rgyal mtshan la sogs mang po kun// chos kyi ru mtshon chen po 'phyar ba yis// bdud bzhi bsnyal ba'i mgo bo gnan pa'i phyir// gdug pa'i gnyen po gzhan med pas// pha
rol zil gyis gnon pa'i mthu// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// rin chen khri rkang phyogs bzhir gsal ba yang// sprin med nyi bdun gsal ba'i mthur ldan pa'i// yab yum gnyis med byang

chub sems su blta// gser gyi seng ge nyi shu bzhir snang ba// stobs kyi dpag tshad gzhan las 'phags pa'i phyir// theg pa'i nang nas rgyal po'i blta ba ste// theg pa phra mo 'dul ba'i mthu ldan pas// yab yum

gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// pad+ma kha stong ldan par snang ba yang// sna tshogs 'byung zhing skye ba'i rgyu dang ldan// nyes pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i mthu yod pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su

blta// yid bzhin rin chen nyi zla'i 'od snang bas// 'jig rten yongs su sgron ltar 'bar ba yang// stong gsum mun nag sel ba'i mthu ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// zhe sdang rdo rje
phyag rgya'i skur gsal bas// rgyal ba mang po thugs kyi dngos gzhi ste// gcig las 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i mthu ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// rmad byung pad+ma gar gyi skur gsal
